Kalo pana malubatan ilo manatang ra ngaangai' kuliamos nilono, sabap ra ngaangai' kuliamos mongoonsoi kaga' ra titikop ru Misir ti masauk ra ilo tatangan.”
Gagayaa' ru anak-anak ri Jakub nanusuban ru raja' no. Anii' ilo ri Jusup ra kukula' kurita' kuda sumugut ra susuban ru raja' i am lutui' ilo ra akanon ra pangkiralanan.
Inanian no ilo sigagama' ra ralinan, kaa' i Binjamin inanian no talu ngaatus ruit pirok am limo bayang ralinan.

Pootoro' no ra ama' nano mopor ngainan kaladai ondo' napasakayan ra kuliamos mongoonsoi kaga' intor ra Misir, am mopor kaladai poyo napasakayan ra gandum, ruti' am akanon ra bokon koson lutu' ru ama' nano ra pangkiralanan mongoi ra Misir ra tauli no.
Pintari' ilo ri Jusup, am tatanga' ilo mugar, indagu i Jusup risilo, “Pai' kau pansasangor ra pangkiralanan.”
Tatango' nilo pagun ru Misir am saguli' ra ama' nilo i Jakub giu' ra Kanaan.
Konilo nambala' ri Jakub, “Lakat poyo maayag i Jusup! Gabenor io ra titikop ru Misir!” Kaining ri Jakub tanou no nakasioro' io am kalo mangintopot io risilo.
Kaa' katunung nilo ngaangai' ondo' rinagu ri Jusup i risilo, am kakito no kurita' kuda ondo' pinaator ri Jusup koson sakayan mongoi ra Misir, pakatutun io boo intor ra naliangan.
Kono, “Anak ku i Jusup, lakat poyo maayag! Ginio ayuk boo koogot kuno! Musiti' tumuum aku riso ra aku kalo poyo matoi!”
Tomposo' ri Jakub ngaangai' kuliamos nano am ongoi ra Birsyiba, intok nano mapataak ra taak simbalui nano ri Aki Kapuuno' ru ama' nali i Isak.
Paat ra iorondom rondo' intalangan riso, indagu i Aki Kapuuno' riso, “Jakub, Jakub!”
Taam io, “Iou, Tuhan.”
Kono, “Aku noyo i Aki Kapuuno' sambaan ri ama' muli, pai' kalaa' mongoi ra Misir. Saukon Ku papag muno rondo' bansa' maayo ra giu' no.
Bayaan Tokou mongoi ra Misir am magibit ra papag muno sumaguli' ra tana' ragitio. Soroi i Jusup ra sapapa' muno paat ra okou matoi.”
Ugar boo i Jakub intor ra Birsyiba no. Posokoyo' io ru anak-anak nano, am andu' nilono nabaya' ra anak-anak mongoborok nilono ra kurita' kuda pinaator ru raja' ru Misir.
Ibito' nilo niayuk ngaangai' biniag nilono am kuliamos ondo' naalap nilo ra Kanaan, am ongoi ra Misir. Ibito' ri Jakub ngaangai' papag nano, iono,
ngaangai' anak ungkuyon am ruandu', ngaangai' akupu ungkuyon am ruandu'.
Gitio noyo sasambaloi ri Jakub ondo' nababaya' riso minongoi ra Misir. Anak katuaan ri Jakub iono i Rubin,
am anak-anak ungkuyon ri Rubin; Ginok, Palu, Gijron am i Karmi.
I Simion am anak-anak ungkuyon nano; Jimuil, Jamin, Ogad, Jakin, Jogar am i Saul anak ungkuyon intor ra andu' nano ra ruandu' ru Kanaan.
I Liwi am anak-anak ungkuyon nano; Girson, Kigat am i Mirari.
I Jiuda am anak-anak ungkuyon nano; Syila, Piris am i Jirag, kaa' anak-anak ungkuyon ra bokon no; i Ir am i Onan minatoi noyo giu' ra Kanaan. Anak ungkuyon ri Piris iono i Gijron am i Gamul.
I Isakar am anak-anak ungkuyon nano; Tola, Pua, Jasub am i Simron.
I Jibulon am anak-anak ungkuyon nano; Sirid, Ilon am i Jagliil.
Ginio noyo anak-anak ungkuyon ondo' inanak ri Liya giu' ra Misopotamia, am poyo anak ruandu' nano i Dina. Ngaangai' papag ri Jakub intor ra andu' nano i Liya suang no talu ngoopor am talu ngaulun.
I Gad am anak-anak ungkuyon nano; Jipyon, Gagi, Suni, Ijbon, Iri, Arodi am i Arili.
I Asyir am anak-anak ungkuyon nano; Jimna, Jiswa, Jiswi, Biria am pagaka' ra ruandu' i Sira. Anak ungkuyon ri Biria iono i Gibir am i Malkiil.
Koopor am onom ngaulun ti papag ri Jakub intor ri Jilpa, iono ulipon ruandu' ondo' pinataak ri Laban ra anak ruandu' nano i Liya.
I Ragil andu' ri Jakub makaanak ungkuyon ruo ngaulun iono i Jusup am i Binjamin.
Giu' ra Misir makaanak ungkuyon i Jusup ruo ngaulun, iono i Manasi am i Ipraim, ondo' inanak ru andu' nano i Asnat, anak ri Potipira sangulun imam giu' ra Giliopolis.
Anak ungkuyon ri Binjamin iono i Bila, Bikgir, Asybil, Gira, Naaman, Igi, Ros, Mupim, Gupim am i Arid.
Koopor am apat ngaulun ti papag ri Jakub intor ra andu' nali i Ragil.
I Dan am anak ungkuyon nano i Gusyim.
I Naptali am anak-anak ungkuyon nano; Jagjiil, Guni, Jijir am i Syilim.
Katulu' ngaulun ti papag ri Jakub intor ri Bilga, iono ulipon ruandu' ondo' pinataak ri Laban ra anak ruandu' nali i Ragil.
Papag ri Jakub ondo' minongoi ra Misir ngaangai' no suang onom ngoopor am onom ngaulun, kalo nakasimpung anak-anak mangiwan ruandu' nano.
Anak ungkuyon ri Jusup ondo' inanak ra Misir ruo ngaulun, am suang ru sasambaloi ri Jakub ondo' soroi ra Misir tulu' ngoopor ngaulun.
Panusub i Jakub ri Jiuda sumigulu riso mongoi pambala' ri Jusup koson muma' ra ama' nano giu' ra Gosyin. Pakasuku' ilo ra Gosyin,
sakoi i Jusup ra kurita' kuda nano muma' ra ama' nano ra giu' no. Pakapaguma' ilo, ganggol i Jusup ra ama' nano am pantangi' io ra nabuoi kaga'.
Indagu i Jakub ri Jusup, “Raino nakatampos aku noyo matoi ra nakakito aku noyo rirun am nakapandai ra maayag kou ayuk poyo.”

Indagu i Jusup ra pagaka'-pagaka' nano am ra pabukat-pabukat ra bokon no, “Musiti' aku muma' ra raja' am mambala' riso ra nakaratong noyo pagaka'-pagaka' kuti am ngaangai' sasambaloi ru ama' kuno ondo' minayan ra Kanaan.
Balain ku io ra akau ti magagalung ra domba am sapi', am inibit min biniag mino am ngaangai' longgom min.
Amon ru piawon kau ru raja' am mangkuot atan kandoi mino,

balai' min ra magagalung ra biniag ayuk kaayagan mino mogondo' ra kinamatuaan mini. Intor raginio, susubon kau boo mayan ra libung ru Gosyin.” Rinagu ri Jusup ginio sabap ra ulun ru Misir maasaban ilo amon ru sumimpung ra magagalung ra biniag.

Ibito' boo ri Jusup limo ngaulun pagaka' nano muma' ra raja'. Kono ra raja' i, “Ama' am pagaka'-pagaka' kuno intor ra Kanaan nakasuku' noyo nababaya' ra ngaangai' kambing am domba, sapi' am ngaangai' kuliamos nilono. Raino soroi ilo ra libung ru Gosyin.”
Pauligo' no boo pagaka'-pagaka' nano ra raja'.
Pangkuot raja' no risilo, “Atan kandoi min ti?”
Taam ilo, “Akai ti magagalung ra biniag mogondo' ra kinamatuaan maili.

Minatong akai ragiti koson mayan ra pagun ti sabap ra bitilan giu' ra tana' ru Kanaan makalalaa' saboi kolondo' sakot ru limayak kotopon ru biniag maino. Malansan akai mangiou kou ramon mayan ra libung ru Gosyin.”
Indagu raja' ri Jusup, “Raino ama' am pagaka'-pagaka' muno nakaratong noyo ragiti,

baalo' min tana' ru Misir ti koson akau ra ampu' raino. Polosoon ilo noyo mayan ra libung ru Gosyin, libung ondo' moonsoi kaga' ra pagun ru Misir ti. Amon ru mokoondo' matasik risilo no, paalungin ku biniag kuno galama'.”
Pauligo' niayuk ri Jusup ama' nano ra raja'. Pambarakat i Jakub ra raja',
am pangkuot raja' no riso, “Kula' noyo umur muti?”

Taam i Jakub, “Umur kutu ra sangulun majajawot ti maatus am talu ngoopor ngambilor noyo. Buoi ru ginio malimanan ra sangkinolor ayuk am masuang kapaganan, sala' ka koson ra kaayagan ru kinamatuaan kuli ra majajawot.”
Anii' ri Jakub raja' no ra barakat pantuliaran am ugar.
Paayano' boo ri Jusup ama' am pagaka'-pagaka' nano ra tana' ru Misir. Anii' no ilo ra rapu' iono tana' ondo' moonsoi kaga' mamaar ra bandar Ramisis, koson ra nanusuban ru raja' no.
Tinampasan ri Jusup ra akanon ama' nano, pagaka'-pagaka' nano am ngaangai' sasambaloi ru ama' nano, nakaaya' ondo' mangamulok poyo kaga'.
Bitilan no liminanja' poyo saboi kolondo' akanon ra ati-ati intok. Ulun-ulun ru Misir am ulun-ulun ru Kanaan mangalaut am kalo makalulu' sabap ra nangaitilan.
Moonong ra ilo mambali ra gandum, luluron ri Jusup ngaangai' ruit no am ibito' ra istana raja'.
Paat nangakayan ra ruit ulun ru Misir am Kanaan, ratong ulun ru Misir ri Jusup am indagu, “Anii' akai ra akanon! Pai' polosoo' akai matoi. Nakayaan akai noyo ra ruit.”
Taam i Jusup, “Amon ru nakai' noyo ruit mino, pataako' biniag mino, aniin takamin ra akanon.”

Pataako' nilo boo biniag nilono ri Jusup am anii' ilo ra akanon pangalig ra kuda, domba, kambing, sapi' am kaladai. Bilor raginio nangani' i Jusup risilo ra akanon koson alig ra ngaangai' biniag nilono.

Bilor ra sumunu' no ratong ilo poyo ri Jusup am indagu, “Tuan, mambala' akai toojo rirun, ruit mai nakai' noyo am biniag mai pana naalap mu noyo. Kolondo' atan-atan pataakon mai rirun, ondo' ayuk am akai galama' am tana' mai.

Pai' polosoo' akai matoi! Pai' polosoo' umo maino malaparan. Balio' akai am tana' maino koson pangalig ra akanon no. Akai masauk ra ulipon ru raja' am umo maino raja' ra ampu'. Anii' akai ra gandum am kalo boo matoi akai, am anii' akai niayuk ra sampug patiason mai ra umo maino!”
Balio' ri Jusup ngaangai' tana' ru Misir no tayar ru raja'. Najajalan moonong ulun ru Misir mantalan ra tana' nilono sabap ra bitilan no maaja', am ngaangai' tana' ru Misir no raja' boo ra ampu'.
Ngaangai' mamagun ru Misir inulipon ri Jusup.
Tana' ra kalo binali no iono tana' ru imam-imam. Kalo pana talanon nilo tana' nilono sabap ra mokoondo' ilo ra elaun magulayun intor ra raja' koson pakuan ru kaayagan nilo.
Indagu i Jusup ra mamagun, “Ilai', binali takamin am tana' mino tayar ru raja'. Gitio noyo sampug ondo' patiason min ra umo mino.
Paat ra mangkumos pataaki' min sampilimo intor ra ampos no ra raja'. Suwo no alapon min ra sampug am akanon min am sasambaloi mino.”
Taam ilo, “Tuan, namayag kou ramon am moonsoi kou kaga' ramon. Masaga' akai sumauk ra ulipon ru raja'.”

Ginio ra pambaal i Jusup ra ukum ru tana' ru Misir, iono sampilimo intor ra ampos ru umo nilono musiti' raja' ra ampu'. Saboi raino ukum no lakat ayuk poyo paugaron. Tana' ru imam-imam ayuk sala' ka raja' ra ampu'.
Minayan ulun ru Israil ra pagun ru Misir giu' ra libung ru Gosyin, am liminangkaya' ilo am makaanak ra masuang.
Mopor am tulu' ngambilor i Jakub minayan ra Misir, am saboi umur nano maatus apat ngoopor am tulu' ngambilor.
Paat ra mamaar noyo io matoi, piawo' no anak nano i Jusup am indagu riso, “Poompoyo'
Masaga' aku lobongon ra intok ru kinamatuaan kuli. Ibito' aku mingkual ra Misir am ongoyo' aku lobongo' ra kalabangan nilai.”
Taam boo i Jusup, “Suguton ku ondo' rinagu muno raki', ama'.”
Indagu i Jakub, “Pagibot noyo ra suguton mu ginio raki'.” Pagibot i Jusup am paringkuanang i Jakub ra nambalangan nano.
Kukula' buoi raginio binalaan i Jusup ra ama' nano marualan ra malanjag. Ginio ra ibito' ri Jusup karuo ngaulun anak ungkuyon nano mongoi ilong ri Jakub.
Kabalai' i Jakub ra nakaratong noyo i Jusup anak nano, ikang io am panturung ra nambalangan nano.
Indagu i Jakub ri Jusup, “I Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa' minintalang raki' ra Lus giu' ra tana' ru Kanaan, am nambarakat noyo raki'.
Indagu io raki', ‘Mangani' Aku rirun ra masuang anak maa' raginio papag muno masauk ra bansa' masuang. Taakin Ku ra papag muno tana' ragitio koson ilo ra ampu' ra sabuoi-buoi no!’ ”

Tungguli' poyo ri Jakub, “Jusup, karuo ngaulun anak ungkuyon muno ondo' inanak ra Misir ra kalo poyo nakaratong aku ragiti, iloti aku ra ampu'. I Ipraim am i Manasi mogondo' koson ra anak ungkuyon kuno i Rubin am i Simion.
Amon ru makaanak ungkuyon kou poyo, ilono kalo karaan ku ra anak kuno kaa' anak muno. Maapu nilo sugul intor ri Ipraim am i Manasi.

Binaal ku gitio sabap ra ina' muli i Ragil. Tatanga' pangkiralanan kuno muli' intor ra bandar Misopotamia, ina' muli minatoi ra tana' ru Kanaan ondo' kalo maalur intor ra Iprata, mangiluk kaga' guang kuno. Linobong ku io giu' ra kiing ru ralan mongoi ra bandar Iprat.” (Raino Iprat mauligan ra Bitligim.)
Kakito ri Jakub anak ri Jusup, pangkuot io riso, “Osoi kia anak-anak ungkuyon ti?”
Taam i Jusup, “Ilo ti anak kuno ondo' pinataak noyo ri Aki Kapuuno' raki' giti ra Misir ti.”
Indagu i Jakub, “Painggaaro' ilo raki' am mabarakat ku.”
Mato ri Jakub kalo makakito toojo sabap ra matutuo io noyo. Kalo makito no toojo. Painggaaro' ri Jusup anak-anak nano ri Jakub, ganggali' ri Jakub am alaki' no ilo.
Indagu boo i Jakub ri Jusup, “Indos ku ru kalo boo makapantuum to, kaa' raino pinailong aku ri Aki Kapuuno' ra anak-anak muti niayuk.”
Alapo' ri Jusup anak-anak nano intor ra sapau ri Jakub am igulatur io galama' ra saang ru ama' nano.
Kopongo raginio poongoyo' ri Jusup i Ipraim ra kait ri Jakub am i Manasi ra pamiris.
Kaa' pasandiapalo' ri Jakub kalindu' nano, pokopoo' no kalindu' pamiris nano ra ulu ri Ipraim kabalu' pana io anak ra mamulok, am kait nano ra ulu ri Manasi ondo' katuaan no.
Barakato' no i Jusup,
“Gama' ru i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' sambaan ru kinamatuaan kuli i Abragam am i Isak,
mambarakat ra anak-anak ti.
Gama' ru i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' nagalung raki' saboi orou raiti',
mambarakat risilo.
Gama' ru malaikat ondo' namayag raki' intor ra baal makalalaa',
mambarakat risilo.
Gama' ru inggalan kuno am inggalan ru kinamatuaan kuli,
i Abragam am i Isak, magail sisiraan
sabap ra anak-anak ragitio!
Gama' ru mokoondo' ilo masuang anak am masuang papag!”

Kalo naansayan i Jusup magilong ra ama' nano napakapo ra kalindu' pamiris nano ra ulu ri Ipraim. Ginio ra guuto' no kalindu' ru ama' nano, am pabandingo' no intor ra ulu ri Ipraim tapik ra ulu ri Manasi.
Kono ra ama' nano, “Sala' ka koon ragino ama'. Gitio anak ra katuaan, pokopoo' noyo kalindu' pamiris muno ra ulu nati.”

Kaa' ansang ama' nano ri Jusup, “Nakapandai aku, anak kuno, nakapandai aku. Masauk niayuk papag ri Manasi no ra bansa' maayo. Kaa' boborok nati makakuasa' poyo ka intor riso, am papag nano masauk ra bansa' mangaayo.”
Indagu boo i Jakub ri Jusup, “Koson ra makito muno, patayan kuno mamaar noyo, kaa' sumbayaan kou ri Aki Kapuuno' am magibit Io saguli' rirun ra pagun ru kinamatuaan muno.
Okou noyo am sala' ka pagaka'-pagaka' muno ondo' papataakan kuno ra pagun ru Sikgim, libung malabung ondo' ginaau kuno intor ra ulun ru Amori ra ilang am panah kuno.”
Piawo' ri Jakub anak-anak ungkuyon nano am indagu, “Tulibung kano am balain takamin ra atan ondo' masauk ramuyun ra tauli no:
Timung kano, anak ri Jakub kau,
Rongogo' min noyo ragu ru ama' min i Israil.
“I Rubin, anak katuaan kuno,
okou noyo ikang kuno,
anak ungkuyon ra kasaa' ru kinabaani kuno,
ondo' mapanggol kaga' am maikang kaga',
intor ra ngaangai' anak ungkuyon kuno.
Mogondo' kou koson ra liur ondo' marapai,
kaa' kalo masauk kou ra maatang.
Sabap ra riminulug kou ra ruandu' parulug kuno i Bilga,
jinaka' mu pambalangan ru ama' muno.
“I Simion am i Liwi ti magaka',
manangilang ilo koson mambaal ra kalaatan.
Kalo maya' aku ra inatangan malaat nilo ondo' nasibuni no,
am kalo maya' aku ra pansunuran nilono.
Sabap ra mamatoi ilo ra ulun paat ra sumangit,
am mapalawo ilo ra sapi' gawayan sabap ra pangkulian.
Kausung noyo sangit nilono,
sabap ra najanjayan kaga'.
Kausung noyo pamatayan nilono,
sabap ra najanjayan laat.
Pantuliaron ku ilo
ra titikop tana' ru Israil,
Pantuliaron ku ilo ra popolos ru mamagun nano.
“I Jiuda, omporon kou ru pagaka'-pagaka' muno.
Manikak kou ru pantula' muno.
Pagaka'-pagaka' muno migulatur ra saang muno.
Makapansaam io,
sumaguli' io ra luang nano;
mambilor am magupu' io,
am kolondo' osoi pana makakau' mangulinjo riso.
Mampaguut i Jiuda ra susukur ru parinta.
Papag nano magail mamarinta.
Bansa'-bansa' magibit ra upiti riso,
am migulatur ra guang gumagaya' ra saang nano.
Pinarukug no anak kaladai ra puun anggur,
puun anggur ra moonsoi kaga'.
Mampupu' io ra konoon nano ra wain,
koson ra kinalia' ru raraa'.
Malia' mato nano sabap ra nanginum ra wain,
mapulak ripon nano sabap nanginum ra gatas.
“I Jibulon mayan ra kiing ru raat.
Raralan ru kapal nagas nano.
Wilayah nano lumangka' suku' ra Sidon.
“I Isakar abigin koson ra kaladai
makalangan ra kuliamos inibit nano.
Kaa' ilain no intok tangusan nano moonsoi kaga'
am tana' no mapabansuk kaga',
kuung io mansaan ra kuliamos,
am jinajalan mangandoi koson ra ulipon.
“I Dan mamarinta ra bansa' nano.
Masauk ilo koson ra santayaran ra bansa' ru Israil ra bokon.
Koson kou ra kukuo ra kiing ru ralan,
kukuo makapalig ra kiing ru pangkiralanan,
ondo' maninduk ra kakating ru kuda saboi makapatir ulun kumura' no.
“Maginaa aku ra pamayagan Muno
“I Gad ongoyon bulunsaro' ru ulun-ulun mantatakou,
kaa' tumbalikon no ilo takawi'.
“I Asyir, tana' muno mapatuu' ra akanon mangalabung,
manampos kou ra akanon ru raja'.
“I Naptali koson ra tambang ondo' nakalabus pagisisimbul,
maganak io ra anak
“I Jusup koson ra sanginan kaladai masigo ra kiing ru taur,
sanginan kaladai ra masigo ra kiing ru bulur.
Pantula' nano mamulunsar riso ra masangit am mangilou riso ra panah.
Kaa' panah ri Jusup mokotog,
am kalindu' nano paikangon
iono Magagalung am Mangampin ra ulun ru Israil.
I Aki Kapuuno' ri ama' mu noyo nangindangan rirun.
Io Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa' ondo' nambarakat rirun
ra rasam intor ra limbowon
am timug intor ragana' ru tana',
barakat ra masuang sapi' am masuang anak.
Barakat ra masuang gandum am bunga'.
Barakat ri Aki Kapuuno' ru ama' muno lumanja' poyo ka intor ra kalangkayaan ru gunung, ondo' matutuo noyo kaga'.
Gama' ru poongoyon ngaangai' barakat no ra ulu ri Jusup,
ra rabas ru ulun ondo' painggaluron intor pagaka'-pagaka' nano.
“I Binjamin koson ra taani masangit.
Paat ra susuab ti mongoi io pansaam ra kana'.
Paat ra rondom bibinsangon no.”
Ginii noyo koopor am ruo tayar ru bansa' ru Israil, am ginii noyo rinagu ru ama' nilono paat ra io namulintor indagu ra anak-anak ungkuyon nano.
Intok raginio noyo nampalabangan ri Abragam am andu' nali i Sara. Intok raginio noyo nampalabangan ri Isak am andu' nali i Ribika, am giu' no niayuk nampalabangan kuno ri Liya.
Umo am luang batu ondo' soroi ra giu' no binali intor ra ulun ru Git. Lobongo' min aku ra giu' no.”
Kabilini' ri Jakub anak-anak ungkuyon nano, luya' io am patoi.
Gaba' i Jusup ra ama' nano, pantangi' io am alaki' no bulos ru ama' nano.
Panusub boo i Jusup maparatok ra tutuu' maamis owou ra baangkai ru ama' nano koson pangampin.
Buoi ru kandoi raginio apat ngoopor ngoorou, iono buoi ru kaindalaman maparatok ra tutuu' maamis owou ra baangkai. Ulun ru Misir nangulir buoi tulu' ngoopor ngoorou.
Kaampus nangulir, indagu i Jusup ra pagawai-pagawai ru raja', “Posoboyo' bilin ragitio ra raja':

‘Paat ra ama' kuli maar matoi, nanusub io raki' mabantu' riso ra makilobong io raki' ra kalabangan ondo' pinongo no giu' ra tana' ru Kanaan. Sabap raginio malansan aku mataak mu aku mongoi pompolobong ra ama' kuno. Mopongo ginio sumaguli' aku.’ ”
Taam raja' no, “Ugar no, ongoyo' noyo lobongo' ama' muno koson ra atan ondo' bantu' muli riso.”
Ugar boo i Jusup ongoi pompolobong ra ama' nano. Ngaangai' pagawai ru raja', ulun-ulun mangaatang lair ra pamisaraan am ngaangai' ulun maatang ru pagun ru Misir nababaya' ri Jusup.
Sasambaloi nano, pagaka'-pagaka' nano am pabukat-pabukat no ra bokon no minaya' niayuk. Ondo' ayuk kalo minaya' lalaing-lalaing, domba, kambing am sapi' nilono soroi ra libung ru Gosyin.
Sampulalai nangkurita' kuda am nangkuda niayuk minaya' saboi ilo ti masuang kaga'.
Pakasaboi ilo ra intok mangagik ra gandum giu' ra Atad, tampilon sirangon ru Sungoi Jordan, panulaboi ilo ra mangiluk am bolos matangil. Paugaro' ri Jusup kaulayan mangulir buoi katuluan.
Pakakito mamagun ru Kanaan ra panguliran ru ulun-ulun raginio giu' ra Atad, konilo, “Mapara' boo ngiluk ru kaulayan mangulir ru ulun ru Misir!” Ginio ra ininggalanan intok raginio ra Abil-Mijraim.
Ginio noyo ra ginagaya' ru anak-anak ungkuyon ri Jakub bilin nali risilo.
Inibit nilo baangkai nano ra Kanaan, am lobongo' ra luang batu Makpila, tampilon sirangon ru Mamri, umo ondo' binali ri Abragam intor ra ulun ru Git iono i Ipron koson saukon ra tana' kalabangan.
Kolobong ri Jusup ama' nano, saguli' io ra Misir nababaya' ra pagaka'-pagaka' nano, am ngaangai' ondo' minaya' riso ra nampalabangan no.
Kopongo pinatayan ru ama' nilono, pagindagu pagaka'-pagaka' ri Jusup no, “Atan nua' koson amon ru mansuli' i Jusup ritakau am mambalos io ra kalaatan takali riso ra galing i?”
Pangator ilo boo ra bilin ri Jusup, “Kalo poyo minatoi ama' takali,

nambilin io ramon mambala' rirun, ‘Ampuno' noyo kalaatan ondo' binaal ru pagaka'-pagaka' muno ragili.’ Raino, ampuno' noyo kasalaan mai, ra akai ti ulipon ri Aki Kapuuno' ondo' sambaan ru ama' takali.” Nantangi' i Jusup nakaapu ra bilin no.
Ilo galama' pana minatong am igulatur ra saang ri Jusup. Konilo, “Akai ti ulipon muno.”
Kaa' kon ri Jusup risilo, “Pai' kano kalaa' sabap ra kalo makatimbalos aku koson ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Nangatang kau mambaal ra kalaatan raki', kaa' kalaatan no kinulau ri Aki Kapuuno' ra kaansayan, maa' raginio atan ondo' nasauk ra galing i mamayag ra masuang ulun ondo' mainono' ra raino ti.
Pai' kano pagalabo, alungin takamin mabaya' ra anak-anak min.” Ginii noyo i Jusup nanimayo ra pagaka'-pagaka' nano ra ragu molomoi saboi guang nilo nabinsaluyan.
Liminayun ayan i Jusup ra Misir nababaya' ra pagaka'-pagaka' nano. Umur nano maatus am mopor ngambilor paat ra io minatoi.
Nakarampot io poyo ra anak am akupu ri Ipraim. Nakarampot io poyo nangapu ra anak-anak ri Makir, akupu ri Manasi koson anak nano galama'.

Indagu i Jusup ra pagaka'-pagaka' nano, “Mamaar noyo patayan kuno, kaa' i Aki Kapuuno' magalung ramuyun am magibit ramuyun mingkual intor ra pagun ti am mongoi ra pagun ondo' binantu' Nano ri Abragam, i Isak am i Jakub.”
Pagiboto' boo ri Jusup ngaangai' pabukat nano, kono, “Pabantu' kano raki', ra paat ri Aki Kapuuno' magibit ramuyun ra tana' nabantuan i, ibiton min niayuk baangkai kutu mababaya' ramuyun.”
Patoi boo i Jusup giu' ra Misir am umur nano maatus am mopor ngambilor. Lataki' nilo baangkai nano ra tutuu' maamis owou am pasuango' ra karanda'.
i Rubin, Simion, Liwi, Jiuda,
Isakar, Jibulon, Binjamin,
Dan, Naptali, Gad am i Asyir.
Ngaangai' suang ru papag ri Jakub tulu' ngoopor ngaulun.
Buoi kabuoi i Jusup am pinongkotob nano minatoi, am koson niayuk ra ngaangai' ulun ondo' santuu' riso.
Kaa' papag nilo iono ulun ru Israil, makaanak ra masuang. Siminuang ilo kaga' am suang nilo giminaai toojo ra mataki' saboi pagun ru Misir natikop nilo.
Indagu raja' no ra mamagun nano, “Makalalaa' ulun ru Israil ritakau, sabap ra masuang kaga' ilo am maikang poyo intor ritakau.
Amon ru makamasauk pangayawan, maaru' lair magamung ilo ra pantula'-pantula' koson manggal ritakau am magiru' manatang

Ginio ra pangalap ulun ru Misir ra kukula' ngaulun tingganai ru ulipon koson mangimbolo' ra ulun ru Israil ra kandoi maagat. Jajalin ulun ru Israil mambaal ra bandar Pitom am Ramsis ondo' saukon ra pusor pambulian ra kuliamos tayar ru raja' ru Misir.
Kaa' gumaai ingkotog ru ulun ru Misir mangimbolo' ra ulun ru Israil, gumaai poyo suang ru ulun ru Israil am nokopolos ngai' ra titikop ru pagun no, saboi mangalaa' ulun ru Misir risilo.
Mangimbolo' ulun ru Misir ra ulun ru Israil ra malaat,
am nangkinibit ra kaayagan nilo naimbolo'. Kalo makaasi', jinajalan ulun ru Israil mangandoi ra maagat giu' ra projek-projek panambalayan am giu' ra umo-umo.
Panusub boo raja' ru Misir ri Sipra am i Pua, mampaanak ondo' mangindangan ra ruandu' Ibrani maganak.
Kon ru raja' ru Misir, “Paat ra akau mangindangan ra ruandu' Ibrani maganak, karaa' gitio: Amon ru lalagang ungkuyon, potoyon min io. Amon ru lalagang ruandu', polosoon min io maayag.”
Kaa' ulun-ulun mampaanak no malaa' ri Aki Kapuuno'. Marara' ilo mambaal ra susuban ru raja', am pinoloso nilo lalagang ungkuyon maayag.
Piawo' boo ru raja' no ulun mampaanak no am pangkuot, “Kua baalo' min gitio? Kua polosoo' min lalagang ungkuyon maayag?”
Taam ilo, “Ruandu' ru Ibrani kalo mogondo' ra ruandu' ru Misir; ruandu' ru Ibrani maluoi maganak. Kalo poyo makaratong mampaanak, naanak noyo lalagang.”
Nambarakat i Aki Kapuuno' ra ulun-ulun mampaanak no am nanaak risilo ra papag, sabap ra malaa' ilo ri Aki Kapuuno'. Ulun ru Israil pana riminuang poyo am maikang.
Indagu boo raja' ru Misir ra moonong mamagun, “Moonong anak ungkuyon ru ulun ru Ibrani ondo' kakaanak no musiti' patirin ra Sungoi Nil, kaa' ngaangai' anak ruandu' polosoon maayag.”
Paat ragili sangulun ungkuyon intor ra bansa' ru Liwi nanangandu' ra sangulun ruandu' intor ra bansa' raginio niayuk.
Naganak boo ruandu' no ra sangulun anak ungkuyon. Kakito no ra mapara' bonsoi ru lalagang no, bunio' no lalagang no buoi talu ngansila'.

Kaa' kalo mabuni no ra mabuoi poyo. Ginio ra alap io rondo' bakul ondo' binaal intor ra sakot galaga am sinalitan no ra tiir, maa' raginio kalo masubol ru timug. Pabantaa' no lalagang nano ralalom bakul no, am patampako' no ra tatanga' ru sakot galaga ra kiing ru sungoi.
Minigor maayo ruandu' ru lalagang no maalur-alur intor ra giu' no koson magilong ra atan kasaukan ru lalagang no.

Paat raginio tumuun anak ruandu' ru raja' ra sungoi koson mariu', liliwa' ulipon-ulipon ruandu' nano mugar-ugar ra kiing ru sungoi. Kakito ru anak ruandu' ru raja' no bakul pinaunor ra sakot galaga. Nanusub io ra sangulun ulipon ruandu' mongoi pangalap ra bakul no.
Ukabo' ru anak ruandu' ru raja' bakul no am kakito no sangulun lalagang ungkuyon mantangi'. Makaasi' anak ruandu' ru raja' no ra lalagang no am indagu, “Gitio sangulun intor ra lalagang ru Ibrani.”
Pangkuot boo maayo ruandu' ru lalagang no ra anak ruandu' ru raja' no, “Anak ruandu' ru raja', masaga' kou kia amon ru maguyum aku ra sangulun ruandu' Ibrani mapatiti' ra lalagang ti?”
Taam anak ruandu' ru raja' no, “Iou, ongoi no.” Ugar boo ralaa no am piawo' no ina' galama' ru lalagang no.
Indagu anak ruandu' ru raja' no riso, “Alapo' lalagang ti am patitio' raki', ayupin tokou.” Alapo' boo ru ruandu' no lalagang no am patitio' no.
Paat ra anak no maayo noyo, ibito' ru ruandu' no anak no ra anak ruandu' ru raja', am anak no koson pinangkaanak ayuk boo ru anak ruandu' ru raja' no. Indagu io, “Inggalanin ku ri Musa,
Pulolowo' ri Musa liliut, am ilai' no kolondo' sangulun pana nakakito riso, potoyo' no ulun ru Misir no am bunio' no baangkai no ralalom ru agis.
Suabon ragili ongoi poyo i Musa ra giu' no, kakito no boo ruo ngaulun Ibrani mansangor. Kuati' ri Musa ulun ondo' makasala no, “Kua lambaa' mu ulun ondo' mogondo' ra bansa' muno galama'?”
Taam ulun no, “Osoi napasauk rirun ra mangnguasa' am akim mai? Potoyon mu kia aku koson okou namatoi ra ulun ru Misir i?” Malaa' am mangkara' i Musa, “Maaru' napandayan noyo ru ulun binaal kuli.”
Kaala' boo raja' ra nasauk no, kinam io maguyum ra ralan koson mamatoi ri Musa, kaa' nagiru' noyo i Musa ra pagun ru Midian am ayan ra giu'.
Paat ra rondo' orou, panturung i Musa maar ra rondo' tulubong.

Imam giu' ra Midian, inggalan no i Jitro makaanak ra ruandu' tulu' ngaulun. Ratong katulu' ngaulun anak ruandu' ri Jitro mongoi sagou, am suangi' pambulian-pambulian ra timug koson painumon ra domba am kambing ru ama' nilo.
Kaa' ratong kukula' ngaulun magagalung am pagiruo' nilo tulu' ngaulun ralaa no. Indangano' boo ri Musa ralaa-ralaa no am painumo' bibiag tinambiag nilo.
Pakauli' ralaa-ralaa no, pangkuot ama' nilo, “Kua mataki' kaga' akau minuli' orou raiti'?”
Taam ilo, “Sangulun bansa' ru Misir nangindangan ramon intor ulisoon ru magagalung ra bokon. Sinagawan no akai am napainum ra bibiag tinambiag takau.”
“Ati ulun i raino?” Kuot ri Jitro ra anak-anak nano. “Kua iruani' min io? Ongoyo' min kimaiti' io mangakan mabaya' ritakau.”
Nangiou boo i Musa mayan ra giu' no. Paganduo' ri Jitro anak ruandu' nano, i Jipora ri Musa.
Naganak i Jipora ra sangulun anak ungkuyon. Indagu i Musa, “Aku ti ulun bansa' ru bokon ra pagun ti, ginio boo ra inggalanin ku anak ti i Girsom.”
Bilor kabilor raiti patoi raja' ru Misir, kaa' ulun ru Israil lakat poyo maguros sabap ra inulipon am golok ilo makiindangan. Golok nilo nakasaboi ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Naining ri Aki Kapuuno' golok ru ulun ru Israil, am nakara' No nabantuan Nano ri Abragam, i Isak am i Jakub.
Nakakito i Aki Kapuuno' ra ulun-ulun ru Israil no inulipon am mampalio ra baal nilo.

Paat ragili nagalung i Musa ra domba am kambing ri Jitro iwan nano, imam giu' ra pagun ru Midian. Paat ra io magibit ra bibiag tinambiag no sumandaup ru tana' kaagisan, nakasaboi io ra Gunung Sinai, gunung ra matulai.
Giu' no minintalang malaikat ru
“Makaimuag!” Mangkara' i Musa, “Kua ra bulungkut no kalo mosolob? Moonsoi inggaarin ku.”
Paat ra nakito ru
Taam i Musa, “Iou, giti aku.”
Indagu
Aku ti i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' sambaan ru kinamatuaan muli, i Aki Kapuuno' ri Abragam, ri Isak am ri Jakub.” Ginio ra silii' ri Musa bulos nano sabap ra malaa' io magilong ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Indagu boo

Ginio ra tumuun Aku mongoi pampalabus risilo intor ra ulun ru Misir, am magibit risilo mingkual intor ra pagun no am mongoi ra rondo' pagun ondo' mapila', langkaya' am malabung. Paat ragitio pagun no inayanan ru ulun ru Kanaan, Git, Amori, Piris, Giwi am Jibusi.
Sotopot no naining Ku noyo golok ru ulun Kuno am nakito Ku ati kulaan ru ulun ru Misir nangulipon kaga' risilo.
Raino manusub Aku rirun mongoi uma' ra raja' ru Misir maa' raginio matingganai mu ulun Kuno mingkual intor ra pagun ru raja' no.”
Kaa' indagu i Musa ri Aki Kapuuno', “Osoi kia aku ti? Kalo makakau' aku muma' ra raja' am magibit ra ulun ru Israil mingkual intor ra Misir.”
Indagu i Aki Kapuuno', “Mabaya' Aku rirun. Paat ra maibit mu noyo ulun ru Israil mingkual intor ra Misir, sumambayang kau samba Raki' ra gunung ti. Ginio noyo inono' ra Aku nanusub rirun.”
Balai' ulun ru Israil ra A
Ongoi noyo am timungo' tingganai-tingganai ru ulun ru Israil no am balai' ilo ra Aku,

Napatas Ku noyo magibit risilo mingkual intor ra Misir, intok ilo inimbolo', am magibit risilo mongoi ra rondo' tana' ondo' langkaya' am malabung, iono pagun ru ulun ru Kanaan, Git, Amori, Piris, Giwi am Jibusi.
Ulun Kuno mangining ra ragu muno. Mongoi kou toojo uma' ra raja' ru Misir mabaya' ra tingganai-tingganai ru ulun ru Israil no am mindagu riso, ‘
Nakapandai Aku ra raja' ru Misir kalo mapaugar ramuyun, ondo' ayuk am ru jajalin io mambaal raginio.
Kaa' mamakai Aku ra kuasa' Kuno am mangukum ra ulun ru Misir am mambaal ra sauk ondo' makalalaa' ra giu' no. Mopongo raginio paugaron no akau.

Moonong ruandu' ru Israil makitaak ra bayang, am niayuk kuliamos mas am pirok intor ra pasambalayan nano ulun ru Misir am intor ra ruandu' ru Misir ondo' minayan ra pasambalayan nano. Papakayin min ginio ra anak-anak min. Ginio noyo ralan min mampagaau ra rapu' ru ulun ru Misir.”
Indagu boo i Musa ra
Ginio ra pangkuot
“Jujuga',” taam ri Musa.
Indagu
Indagu boo
Indagu
Indagu poyo
Indagu boo
Indagu

Amon ru lakat poyo kalo masaga' ilo mangintopot rirun kabalu' pana nakakito noyo ra karuruo kaimuagan no, am kalo masaga' ilo mangining ra ragu muno, alap sanganu timug intor ra Sungoi Nil am pasasaro' ra tana'. Makulau timug no masauk ra raraa'.”
Kaa' indagu i Musa ra
Indagu boo
Raino, ongoi noyo. Indanganon Tokou mindagu am mambala' rirun ra atan musiti' raguon muno.”
Taam i Musa, “Iou
Sangit boo
Makapansunur kou riso, am mambala' riso atan ondo' musiti' raguon nano. Indanganon Ku akau ruo am mambala' ramuyun atan ondo' musiti' raguon am baalon.
Mindagu io ra ulun raginilo ra tayar ru bala muno. Masauk io ra mindadagu muno, am masauk kou koson ri Aki Kapuuno' ondo' mambala' atan ondo' musiti' raguon nano.
Ibito' jujuga' ti am pakayon mu mambaal ra kaimuagan.”

Kopongo raginio saguli' i Musa ra baloi ri Jitro iwan nano ra ungkuyon. Indagu i Musa riso, “Iowo' aku no rumuli' ra pabukat-pabukat kuno giu' ra Misir, mongoi pagilong ru lakat poyo kia naayag ilo.” Nangiou i Jitro am pamintor ri Musa.
Paat ra lakat poyo i Musa giu' ra Midian, indagu
Ginio ra nagibit i Musa ra andu' am anak-anak nano am posokoyo' no ilo ra kaladai am ongoi ra Misir. Inibit niayuk ri Musa jujuga' nano sumugut ra susuban ri Aki Kapuuno' riso.
Indagu poyo
Indagu ra raja' no ra Aku
Nanusub Aku noyo rirun ra makataak ra anak Kuno mugar maa' raginio makasamba io Raki', kaa' marara' kou. Raino potoyon Ku anak ungkuyon katuaan muno.’ ”
Giu' ra rondo' intok nangkiman, giu' ra tatanga' pangkiralanan mongoi ra Misir, ratong
I Jipora andu' ri Musa, nangalap ra batu malarom am lomporo' no kungkung ra pompor ru tali' ru anak nano, am kama' ra kalayam
Minindagu i Jipora koson raginio sabap ra kaulayan ru sunat no. Ginio ra kalo namatoi
Liliwa' raginio indagu
Pambala' i Musa ri Arun ra ngaangai' rinagu ru
Ongoi boo i Musa am i Arun ra Misir, am patimungo' ngaangai' tingganai ru ulun ru Israil.
Pambala' i Arun risilo ra ngaangai' baal kaimuagan ondo' pinabala' ru
Mangintopot ilo, am igulatur samba paat ra nakaining ra nampalio
Ongoi boo tuum i Musa am i Arun ra raja' ru Misir am indagu, “Koson ragitio ragu ru
“Osoi kia
Indagu i Musa am i Arun, “Minintalang noyo i Aki Kapuuno' ru ulun ru Ibrani no ramon. Iowo' akai noyo mongoi ra tana' kaagisan, ra galur talu ngoorou pangkiralanan mapataak ra taak simbalui ra
Indagu raja' no ri Musa am i Arun, “Kua kinibiti' min ngaangai' ulun no mampalilian ra kandoi nilo? Susubo' ulipon raginilo mangandoi!
Bansa' min masuang noyo intor ra ulun ru Misir. Raino masaga' kau lumonggo' ilo mangandoi!”
Paat ra orou raginio niayuk nanusub raja' ru Misir ra tingganai ru ulipon ra bansa' ru Misir am mandur ra bansa' ru Israil. Kon ru raja' no,
“Pai' anii' bansa' raginilo ra rami mambaal ra batu bata. Polosoon ilo galama' maguyum.

Kaa' susubo' ilo mambaal ra batu bata koson ragili suang nali; pai' irurui' suang no kabalu' pana rondo'. Kalo nosonong ilo ra kandoi, ginio sabap ra makitaak ilo mugar mapataak ra taak simbalui ri Aki Kapuuno' nilo.
Jajalin ulun raginilo mangandoi ra maagat poyo, maa' raginio kumantisuk ilo ra kandoi am kolondo' boo kaluagan mangining ra tunung abawon ayuk.”
Tingganai ru ulipon ra bansa' ru Misir am mandur ra bansa' ru Israil miningkual am indagu ra ulun ru Israil, “Nanusub raja' ra kalo boo aniin kau ra rami.
Musiti' akau galama' mongoi paguyum ra rami ra ati ayuk kaawatan min. Kaa' musiti' kau mambaal ra batu bata koson ra kinasuang ragili.”
Ginio ra ongoi ulun ru Israil ra titikop pagun ru Misir maguyum ra rami.
Tingganai-tingganai ru ulipon no narayus nangulisok maa' raginio moonong orou mambaal ulun ru Israil ra batu bata koson ra kinasuang ondo' binaal paat ilo inanian ra rami ragili.
Tingganai ru ulipon no napalamba' ra mandur ra bansa' ru Israil ondo' sinusub magalung ra kandoi no. Pangkuot ilo, “Kua kalo binaal min batu bata koson ra kinasuang ragili?”
Ongoi boo tuum mandur no ra raja' am pambala', “Kua baalo' mu raja' baal ragitio ramon?
Kalo inanian akai ra rami, kaa' jinajalan akai mambaal ra batu bata. Raino lambaan akai, ali ka ulun muno ondo' makasala.”
Taam raja', “Andang ru akau matiar am marara' mangandoi. Ginio nai ra akau makitaak mongoi papataak ra taak simbalui ra
Raino ongoi kau poyo pangandoi. Kalo aniin kau ra rami, kaa' musiti' mambaal kau ra batu bata koson ra kinasuang ragili.”
Nakaliman mandur no ra makakapaganan ilo paat binalaan ra moonong orou inaru' toojo ra pambaalon ilo ra batu bata koson ra kinasuang ragili.
Pakaingkual mandur no intor ra istana, ongoi ilo tuum ri Musa am i Arun ondo' tatanga' maginaa risilo.
Konilo ri Musa am i Arun, “Nakakito
Tuum boo i Musa ra
Intor ra aku timinuum ra raja' am minindagu ralalom inggalan Muno, nangimbolo' noyo raja' no ra ulun Muno. Okou pana kalo nambaal ra rondo' pana koson mangindangan risilo!”
Indagu
Indagu i Aki Kapuuno' ri Musa, “Aku noyo
Minintalang Aku noyo ri Abragam, ri Isak am ri Jakub koson ra i Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa', kaa' kalo napaulig Aku risilo ra inggalan Kuno ondo' matulai, iono
Nambaal Aku niayuk ra bantu' risilo. Nambantu' Aku koson mangani' risilo ra tana' ru Kanaan, tana' inayanan nilo ra galing i koson ulun bansa' ru bokon.
Naining ku noyo laa ru ulun ru Israil ondo' inulipon ru ulun ru Misir am nakara' Ku boo bantu' Kuli.
Ginio ra balai' ulun ru Israil ra bala' Kuno risilo, ‘Aku noyo
Mapasauk Aku ramuyun ra ulun Kuno galama', am masauk Aku ri Aki Kapuuno' min. Makapandai kau ra Aku noyo
Magibit Aku ramuyun mongoi ra pagun ondo' binantu' Kuno ra ibot koson pataakon Ku ri Abragam, ri Isak am ri Jakub. Mapataak Aku ra tana' no ramuyun ra longgom min. Aku noyo
Pinasaboi ri Musa ngaangai' bala' no ra ulun-ulun ru Israil no, kaa' marara' ilo mangining ra ragu-ragu nano, sabap ra pangulipanan ra malaat no nangkinibit risilo malawo guang.
Indagu boo
“Ongoi no tuum ra raja' ru Misir am raguo' ra moonsoi paugaron ulun-ulun ru Israil mangiruan ra pagun nano.”
Kaa' taam i Musa, “Ulun-ulun ru Israil galama' marara' mangining ra ondo' raguon kuno, mulu' poyo raja' ru Misir. Mailo aku mindagu.”
Kaa' indagu
Gitilo noyo papag ri Musa am i Arun: I Rubin anak ungkuyon katuaan ri Jakub makaanak ungkuyon apat ngaulun: I Ginok, Palu, Gijron am i Karmi. Ilo noyo kinamatuaan ru bansa'-bansa' ra bala ri Rubin.

I Simion makaanak ungkuyon onom ngaulun: I Jimuil, Jamin, Ogad, Jakin, Jogar am niayuk i Saul anak ungkuyon intor ra sangulun ruandu' ru Kanaan. Ilo noyo kinamatuaan ru bansa'-bansa' ra bala ri Simion.
I Liwi makaanak ungkuyon talu ngaulun: I Girson, Kigat am i Mirari. Ilo noyo kinamatuaan ru bansa'-bansa' ra bala ri Liwi. Naayag i Liwi buoi 137 ngambilor.
I Girson makaanak ungkuyon ruo ngaulun: I Libni am i Simii; makapapag ilo ra masuang.
I Kigat makaanak ungkuyon apat ngaulun: I Amram, Jijgar, Gibron am i Ujiil. Naayag i Kigat buoi 133 ngambilor.
I Mirari makaanak ungkuyon ruo ngaulun: I Magli am i Musi. Ilo noyo bansa'-bansa' ralalom ru bansa' ru Liwi am papag ru sigagama'.
I Amram nagandu' ri Jokgibid, boborok ruandu' ru ama' nano; anak nilo iono i Arun am i Musa. Naayag i Amram buoi 137 ngambilor.
I Jijgar makaanak ungkuyon talu ngaulun: I Kora, Nipig am i Jikri.
I Ujiil makaanak ungkuyon talu ngaulun niayuk: i Misail, Ilsapan am i Sitri.
I Arun nagandu' ri Ilisiba, anak ruandu' ri Aminadab; i Ilisiba pabukat ruandu' niayuk ri Nagason. Naganak i Ilisiba ri Nadab, Abigu, Iliajar am i Itamar.
I Kora makaanak ungkuyon talu ngaulun: I Asir, Ilkana am i Abiasap. Ilo noyo kinamatuaan ru sasambaloi ra bala ri Kora.
I Iliajar anak ungkuyon ri Arun nagandu' ra sangulun intor ra anak ruandu' ri Putiil. Anak nilo iono i Pinigas. Ilo noyo tingganai ru bansa' am tingganai ru sasambaloi ra bansa' ru Liwi.
I Arun am i Musa noyo ondo' sinusub ru
Ilo ruo noyo timinuum ra raja' ru Misir am makitaak ra raja' maa' raginio mapalabus ra ulun ru Israil.
Paat ra mindagu
indagu
Kaa' indagu i Musa, “Nakapandai Kou ra kalo matanda' aku mindagu. Masaga' kia nua' lair raja' no mangining ra ondo' raguon kuno?”
Indagu
Balai' i Arun ra ngaangai' ondo' nanusuban Kuno rirun. Susubo' noyo io mambala' ra raja' maa' raginio mangiou ra ulun ru Israil manatang ra pagun nati.
Kaa' mangkinibit Aku ra raja' no bambalingatan, am kalo mangining ra ondo' raguon muno, kabalu' pana maparatong Aku ra masuang karaat ra Misir.
Mangukum Aku boo ra pagun no ra makalalaa', am magibit ra ulun Kuno Israil mingkual intor ra Misir.
Makapandai boo ulun ru Misir ra Aku noyo
Nambaal i Musa am i Arun ra nanusuban ru
Umur ri Musa 80 ngambilor am i Arun 83 ngambilor paat ra ilo timinuum ra raja' ru Misir.
Indagu
“Amon ru makitaak raja' no ramuyun mambaal ra kaimuagan koson ra inono', susubo' i Arun mangalap ra jujuga' nano am patirin ra saang ru raja'. Makulau jujuga' no sumauk ra kukuo.”
Ginio ra ongoi i Musa am i Arun tuum ra raja' am pambaal ra kaimuagan koson ra nanusuban ru
Kopongo raginio pampiau raja' no ra ulun makakapandayan am ulun mapandai kaga' ra sihir, am ra kapandayan ra sihir, nambaal ilo ra baal nogondo'.
Papatiro' nilo jujuga' nilo, nakulau jujuga' no nasauk ra kukuo. Kaa' jujuga' ri Arun nonolon ra jujuga' nilono.
Kaa' bambalingatan noyo raja' am marara' mangining ra ragu ri Musa am i Arun, koson ra rinagu noyo ru
Kopongo raginio indagu boo
Ginio ra ongoi noyo tuum ra raja' tampilon ra susuab ti, paat ra io tumuun ra Sungoi Nil. Ibito' noyo jujuga' ondo' igondo' nakulau nasauk ra kukuo, am inaani' io ra kiing ru sungoi.
Ragui' raja' no, ‘
Ginio ra indagu
Matoi papait, am masauk sungoi ti ra mootong kaga' saboi kalo mainum timug no ru ulun ru Misir.’ ”
Indagu
Baalo' boo ri Musa am i Arun nanusuban ru
Patoi papait-papait ralalom ru sungoi no, am mootong kaga' owou no saboi timug ru sungoi no kalo mainum ru ulun ru Misir. Titikop pagun ru Misir makararaa'.
Kopongo raginio ulun-ulun mapandai kaga' ra sihir ra pagun ru Misir nambaal niayuk ra baal koson raginio ra kapandayan nilo, saboi bambalingatan noyo raja'. Koson ra rinagu ru
Kaa' uli' raja' ra istana nano ra kalo noyo nampalio ra baal ondo' nasauk no.
Nangkali ngaangai' ulun ru Misir ra luang giu' ra galur ru kiing Sungoi Nil koson makaalap ra timug inumon, sabap ra timug ru sungoi no kalo mainum nilo.
Nasailan noyo tulu' ngoorou intor ra kinulau ru
Indagu boo
Amon ru kalo iowon mu, totopon Ku pagun muno ra antit koson ra ukuman.

Sungoi Nil mototop kaga' ra antit, saboi mingkual antit intor ra timug am mumpos ra istana muno, mumpos ra lamin kaalangan am rasawat ru katil muno, am niayuk mongoi ra baloi ru pagawai muno am mamagun muno, am poyo mumpos ra pangansakan ra ruti' am intok pambaalan ra ruti'.
Tumindak antit no rirun, mamagun muno am ngaangai' pagawai muno.’ ”
Indagu
Patutuyo' ri Arun jujuga' nano ra rasawat ru timug, ujak boo antit no saboi nokototop ra titikop ru pagun no.
Kaa' ulun mapandai kaga' ra sihir ru Misir niayuk namakai ra kapandayan mapiot nilo, am nangkinibit ra antit-antit no sabulujak saboi nototop titikop ru pagun.
Nampiau raja' ri Musa am i Arun am indagu, “Pakiasi' noyo ra

Indagu i Musa ra raja', “Nakatampos aku noyo makiasi' rirun raja'. Aruo' noyo paat no am makiasi' aku rirun raja', pagawai muno am mamagun muno. Palabuson kou raja' intor ra antit-antit no, am kolondo' boo soroi ondo' ayuk am antit ondo' soroi ralalom ru Sungoi Nil.”
Taam raja' no, “Pakiasi' noyo ra bala kuno ra susuab no.”
Indagu i Musa, “Makiasi' aku koson ra kitaak muno raja', am makapandai kou raja' boo ra kolondo' koson ra
Antit-antit no painggaluron intor rirun raja', baloi muno, pagawai muno am mamagun muno. Kolondo' boo antit soroi ondo' ayuk am soroi ralalom ru Sungoi Nil.”
Iruani' boo ri Musa am i Arun raja' no. Nakiasi' i Musa ra
Sinugut ru
Timungo' ru ulun ru Misir baangkai ru antit no saboi paribujuk, saboi mootong titikop ru pagun.
Paat ra nakito ru raja' ra minatoi noyo ngaangai' antit, bambalingatan saguli' raja'. Marara' raja' mangining ra ragu ri Musa am i Arun koson ra rinagu ru
Indagu
Ginio ra lambaa' ri Arun tana' ra jujuga' nano, am kaau ra titikop ru pagun ru Misir nakulau nasauk ra pulias ondo' muroom ra ulun am bibiag.
Ulun mapandai kaga' ra sihir no kuminam mamakai ra kapandayan ru sihir nilo koson mapasalula' ra pulias kaa' kalo naalap nilo. Pulias soroi ra ngaangai' intok.
Indagu ulun mapandai kaga' ra sihir no ra raja', “Binaal gitio ri Aki Kapuuno'!” Kaa' lakat poyo bambalingatan raja' am marara' mangining ra ragu ri Musa am i Arun, koson ra rinagu ru
Indagu
Amon ru marara' kou, maparatong Aku ra bulongor rirun, pagawai muno am mamagun muno. Baloi-baloi ru ulun ru Misir, am poyo titikop ru pagun matikop ra bulongor.
Kalo mapatiu' Aku ra tampilon Gosyin intok inayanan ru ulun Kuno. Kolondo' bulongor ra giu' no. Mambaal Aku ra baal ragitio maa' raginio makapandai kou ra Aku,
Pansalaan Ku
Naparatong
Pampiau boo raja' ri Musa am i Arun am indagu, “Ongoi noyo papataak ra taak simbalui ri Aki Kapuuno' mino ra pagun ti.”
Kaa' taam i Musa, “Kalo makapambaal akai ra ngaangai' raginio, sabap ra manginalu ulun ru Misir paat ra makakito ramon mapataak ra bibiag koson taak simbalui ra
Musiti' akai mongoi ra tana' kaagisan galur no talu ngoorou pangkiralanan koson mapataak ra taak simbalui ra
Indagu raja', “Mapaugar aku ramuyun mongoi ra tana' kaagisan koson mapataak ra taak simbalui ra
Taam i Musa, “Makaugar aku ayuk, makiasi' aku ra
Iruani' ri Musa raja' no am pakiasi' ra
Sinugut ru
Kaa' raino ti pana bambalingatan raja' am marara' mapaugar ra bansa' no.
Indagu
Amon ru lakat poyo marara' kou mapaugar risilo,
ukumin Tokou. Maparatong Aku ra maruol ondo' malaat kaga' ra ngaangai' bibiag tinambiag muno; kuda, kaladai, unta, sapi', domba am kambing.
Pansalaan Ku bibiag tinambiag ru ulun ru Israil am bibiag tinambiag ru ulun ru Misir. Sanginan pana ra bibiag tinambiag ru ulun ru Israil kalo matoi.
Aku
Paat ra suabon no nambaal
Nangkuot raja' ra atan ondo' nasauk, am binalaan raja' ra bibiag tinambiag ru ulun ru Israil kolondo' sanginan pana minatoi. Kaa' lakat poyo bambalingatan am marara' raja' mapaugar ra ulun ru Israil.
Indagu boo
Makatuba' kaau no koson ra tapung kaau ra titikop ru tana' ru Misir. Makalabui kaau no ra talipos ondo' maturak masauk ra pilat makanana' ra ulun am bibiag.”

Ginio ra alap i Musa am i Arun ra kaau intor ra rapuan am bigor ra saang ru raja'. Patauko' ri Musa kaau no ra rasawat, pakalabui boo kaau no ra talipos ondo' maturak masauk ra pilat makanana' ra ulun am bibiag.
Kalo makatuum ulun mapandai kaga' ra sihir no ri Musa sabap ra napuu ilo ra talipos koson ulun ru Misir ra bokon no.
Kaa' nangkinibit
Indagu boo
Raino ti mangukum Aku sala' ka ayuk ra pagawai muno am mamagun muno, kaa' okou niayuk, maa' raginio makapandai kou ra kolondo' osoi pana ondo' koson Raki' ra titikop ru tana' ti.
Amon ru nangukum Aku rirun am mamagun muno ra maruol, maaru' malingon kau ngai' maluus.
Kaa' polosoon Tokou maayag koson mapakito rirun ra kuasa' Kuno, maa' raginio inggalan Kuno mauligan toojo ra titikop ru tana' ti.
Kaa' lakat kou poyo lumimbau am kalo mapaugar ra ulun Kuno.
Olo'-olo' paat ragitio ra susuab no, paratuon Ku rasam batu ondo' maawas, ondo' kalo igondo' nasauk buoi ra sejarah ru pagun ru Misir.

Raino panusub no maa' raginio bibiag tinambiag am ngaangai' longgom muno ondo' soroi ra lisar ibiton ra intok masindungan. Ngaangai' ulun am bibiag tinambiag ondo' soroi ra liwar am kalo makasindung matoi malumpa' ru rasam batu.’ ”
Malaa' kukula' ngaulun pagawai ru raja' sabap ra bala' ru
Kaa' pagawai ra bokon no kalo nampalio ra bala' ru
Indagu boo
Ginio ra kakato' ri Musa jujuga' nano tampilon ra limbowon, am porotongo' ru
rasam batu ondo' maawas, am ganit nakatiu' ra giu' am giti. Ginio noyo rasam ondo' makalalaa' kaga' ondo' igondo' nasauk buoi ra sejarah ru Misir.

Giu' ra titikop pagun ru Misir, pinuso ru rasam batu ngaangai' ondo' soroi ra lisar, nakaaya' ngaangai' ulun am bibiag tinambiag. Namuso rasam batu no ra ngaangai' tutuu' ra umo am napagaba' ra ngaangai' puun tataun.
Tampilon ayuk ra Gosyin, intok inayanan ru ulun ru Israil kalo nalumpa' ra rasam batu.
Pampiau boo raja' ri Musa am i Arun am indagu, “Raino ti natulaan aku. Motopot toojo
Pakiasi' noyo ra
Indagu i Musa ra raja', “Makaingkual aku ayuk ra bandar, makiasi' aku ra
Kaa' nakapandai aku ra okou raja' am pagawai muno kalo poyo malaa' ra
Tatanom rami am barli nangalupis, sabap ra barli nangkawa' noyo am rami mambusak,
kaa' gandum kalo nalupis sabap ra kalo poyo bulintok no.
Iruani' boo ri Musa raja' am ongoi ra liwar ru bandar. Giu' no nakiasi' io ra
Pakakito raja' ra atan nasauk no, makatula poyo raja'. Raja' am pagawai nano magulayun bambalingatan.
Mogondo' ra rinagu ru
Indagu boo
am maa' raginio mabalaan min anak am akupu min ati kulaan inanja'-anja' Ku ulun ru Misir, paat ra Aku mambaal ra kaimuagan. Makapandai kau ngaangai' ra Aku noyo
Ginio ra ongoi boo tuum i Musa am i Arun ra raja' am indagu riso, “
Amon ru lakat poyo marara' kou, ra susuab no maparatong Aku ra gapu' ra pagun muno.
Titikop ralimbou ru tana' matikop ra masuang kaga' gapu'. Mangakan gapu' ra ngaangai' tatanom am niayuk puun tataun ondo' kalo natungkob ru rasam batu.

Mototop ru gapu' istana muno am baloi ru pagawai muno, am niayuk baloi ru ngaangai' mamagun muno. Karaat ragitio makalalaa' poyo intor ra atan ondo' nailian ru kinamatuaan muli.’ ” Talikur i Musa am ugar.
Indagu pagawai no ra raja', “Kula' poyo buoi ru ulun no mantipagon ritakau? Polosoon noyo ulun ru Israil no mugar maa' raginio makasambayang ilo ra
Ginio ra piniau saguli' i Musa am i Arun tumuum ra raja'. Indagu raja' risilo, “Paugaron kau koson sumambayang ra

Taam i Musa, “Makakai' akai mugar, makaaya' lalaing am ulun mangatutuo. Anak ungkuyon am anak ruandu', ngaangai' domba, kambing am sapi' ibiton mai sabap ra moonsoi ra akai mambaal ra rondo' pangiantakan maayo koson mangurumat ra
Indagu raja' risilo, “Mampator aku ralalom inggalan ru
Kalo! Bala ungkuyon ayuk paugaron koson mongoi sambayang ra
Indagu
Ginio ra kakato' ri Musa jujuga' nano, am pagangino' ru
Ratong gapu' ra sampanon ra mangaayo saboi nakatikop ra titikop pagun. Kalo igondo' pakakito ulun ra kinasuang ru ginio, am kalupus ginio pana baal raginio kalo boo nasauk.

Natikop ra gapu' ralimbou ru tana' saboi makito ra maitom tana'. Nangakan gapu' ra ngaangai' ondo' kalo nalupis ru rasam batu, nakaaya' ngaangai' kawa' ra puun tataun. Titikop pagun ru Misir, kolondo' rondo' pana ondo' masansam soroi ra puun tataun kapoam tutuu'.
Pampiau mataki' raja' ri Musa am i Arun, indagu io, “Makatula' aku ra
Ampuno' noyo tula kuno raino ti ayuk, am pakiasi' noyo ra
Iruani' ri Musa raja' am pakiasi' ra
Ginio ra kulawo' ru
Kaa' nangkinibit
Indagu
Kakato' ri Musa longon nano tampilon ra limbowon, am kalandaman ondo' molondom kaga' matikop ra titikop ru tana' ru Misir buoi kataluan.
Kalo makapangkito ulun ru Misir ra rondo' am bokon, am buoi ru ginio kolondo' sangulun pana ondo' mingkual intor ra baloi. Kaa' intok inayanan ru ulun ru Israil nagulayun matawang.
Pampiau boo raja' ri Musa am indagu, “Paugaron kau am makasambayang ra
Taam i Musa, “Amon ru koon raginio, musiti' okou no manampos ra bibiag tinambiag koson ra taak simbalui pataakon ra
Musiti' akai magibit ra ngaangai' bibiag tinambiag; sanginan pana kalo patatangon. Musiti' mai pilion bibiag tinambiag ondo' pataakon ra
Nangkinibit
Indagu raja' ri Musa, “Ugar noyo intor ragiti! Pai' noyo tuum raki'! Amon ru tumuum kou poyo raki', matoi kou.”
“Koson ra rinagu muno raja',” taam ri Musa, “kalo boo tuumon tokou.”
Indagu boo
Ginio ra indagu no ra ngaangai' ulun ru Israil; susubo' noyo ilo ngaangai' makitaak ra kuliamos limpor mas am pirok intor ra sambalayan nilo.”
Nangkinibit
Indagu boo i Musa ra raja', “Gitio noyo rinagu ru

Moonong anak ungkuyon katuaan ra Misir matoi, intor galing ra anak ungkuyon katuaan ru raja' ondo' manungkus ra kurisi' pamarintaan, polos ra anak ungkuyon katuaan ru inulipon ruandu' ondo' mampagiling ra unor-unor. Matoi niayuk anak katuaan ru ngaangai' bibiag tinambiag.
Maining tangi' mosongou ra titikop ru Misir; baal raginio kalo igondo' kasauk am kalo boo masauk.
Kaa' intor ra tayar ru ulun ru Israil, ulun kapoam bibiag kalo jojowon. Raginio boo, makapandai kou ra Aku,

Pupus no indagu i Musa, “Ngaangai' pagawai muno matong am samba ra saang kuno. Makitaak ilo maa' raginio magibit aku ra ngaangai' bansa' kuno mangiruan ra pagun ti. Mopongo raginio mugar aku.” Nabaya' ra siminangit toojo, iruani' ri Musa raja'.
Indagu
Nambaal i Musa am i Arun ra ngaangai' kaimuagan ra saang ru raja', kaa' nangkinibit
“Bulan ragitio masauk ra bulan kasaa' tayar ru bilor ra kalendar min.
Posoboyo' noyo susuban ti ra ngaangai' ulun ru Israil: Paat orou koopor ra bulan ragitio moonong ungkuyon musiti' mampili' sanginan anak domba kapoam anak kambing akanon magulung ra sasambaloi nano.

Amon ru boborok kaga' sasambaloi no koson mangai' ra sanginan bibiag, sasambaloi raginio mangakan ra bibiag no magulung ra pasambalayan nano ondo' mamaar toojo. Bibiag no musiti' tayaron maya' ra suang ru ulun ondo' mangakan.
Pampilion kau ra sanginan domba kapoam sanginan kambing, kaa' musiti' gawayan bibiag no ondo' umur no sambilor, am ondo' kolondo' maruol nano.
Musiti' min alungin bibiag no saboi orou ra koopor am apat sila' raginio. Tampilon ra mai' ti orou raginio, ngaangai' ulun ru Israil manimbalui ra bibiag raginio.
Musiti' ilo mangalap koborok ra raraa' ru bibiag no am pakupilon ra karuruo lugu' ru kulobon am ra angob ru kulobon ru baloi, intok ilo mangakan ra bibiag no.
Tampilon ra rondom no, kual ru bibiag no musiti' patunuon am akanon ra sayur mapait am niayuk ruti' kalo latakin ra ragi.
Musiti' bibiag no tundunon patunuon, makaaya' ulu, kalayam am kalabuat nano. Akano' noyo kual ondo' matunuan no; pai' akano' kual ondo' makata' kapoam ondo' tonokon.
Pai' tatango' koborok pana intor ra kual no saboi susuab no, amon makasuwo, solobon kual no saboi makai'.
Paat mangakan, musiti' kau makapambayang noyo ra bayang koson mugar; mangkasut kau noyo am mampaguut ra jujuga'. Musiti' kau magindibok mangakan. Ginio noyo pangiantakan Paska koson mangurumat Raki',

Paat ra rondom raginio ongoyon Ku liputo' titikop ru pagun ru Misir, am mamatoi ra moonong anak ungkuyon katuaan, am niayuk moonong anak ungkuyon katuaan ru bibiag. Mangukum Aku ra ngaangai' dewa ra Misir; Aku noyo
Raraa' ra lugu' ru kulobon ru baloi masauk ra tatandu' tayar intok inayanan min. Makito Ku raraa' no, sumail Aku ramuyun, am kalo mangukum ramuyun paat ra Aku mangukum ra ulun ru Misir.
Musiti' kau mangiantak ra orou raginio koson pangiantakan ra
Indagu
Paat ra orou kasaa', am igondo' poyo paat ra orou katulu', musiti' kau tumimung koson sumambayang. Paat ra orou-orou raginio kalo pongondoyon kau ra atan pana, kaa' akanon matampos min.

Iantakon noyo Pangiantakan Ruti' Kalo Linatakan ra Ragi, sabap ra paat ra orou raginio magibit Aku ra bansa' mino mingkual intor ra Misir. Iantakon noyo orou raginio koson pangiantakan ra moonong bilor koson ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Musiti' kau mangakan ra ruti' kalo linatakan ra ragi, intoron ra rondom ru orou ra koopor am apat sila' kasaa' saboi ra rondom ru orou ra karuo ngoopor am rondo'.
Buoi katuluan, kalo paulion ragi ra baloi min, sabap ra osoi ayuk mangakan ra ruti' linatakan ra ragi, io no ulun bansa' ru bokon kapoam ulun ru Israil, kalo boo karaan io ra ulun Kuno.”

Pampiau i Musa ra ngaangai' tingganai Israil am indagu risilo, “Moonong ulun intor ramuyun musiti' mangalap sanginan anak domba kapoam sanginan anak kambing tayar ru sasambaloi sigagama'. Simbaluyon boo bibiag no maa' raginio tayar ru sasambaloi mino makapangiantak ra Paska.
Alap sabangkos Isop am pososopon ralalom mangkuk ondo' makasuang
Paat ra liputon ru
Musiti' akau am anak mino gumagaya' ra kaulayan ti ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Paat ra akau mumpos ra pagun ondo' binantu' ru
Amon ru mangkuot anak mino, ‘Atan kia arati' ru upacara ti?’
Musiti' min taamon ra, ‘Gitio noyo taak simbalui Paska koson mangurumat ra
Igulatur boo ulun ru Israil ra sumamba.
Kopongo raginio ugar ilo am baalo' atan ondo' nanusuban ru

Rondom raginio raja' am ngaangai' pagawai nano, am niayuk ngaangai' ulun ru Misir nangakarat. Tangi' mosongou maining ra titikop ru pagun ru Misir, sabap ra giu' ra moonong baloi makapinatayan ra anak ungkuyon.
Rondom raginio niayuk, pampiau raja' ri Musa am i Arun am indagu, “Ugar noyo, akau am ngaangai' ulun ru Israil! Iruani' noyo pagun kutu! Ongoi noyo sambayang ra
Ibito' noyo domba, kambing am sapi' mino am iruani' noyo intok ragitio. Pakiasi' noyo ra barakat ra tayar kuno niayuk.”
Nangulisok ulun ru Misir ra ulun ru Israil mangiruan ra pagun nilo ra mataki'. Indagu ulun ru Misir, “Matoi akai ngai' amon ru kalo iruanin min intok ragitio.”
Ginio ra suangi' ru ulun ru Israil mangkuk nilo ra ruti' makata' kalo linatakan ra ragi, lopoto' ra konoon, am saani' linopot no.
Nambaal ulun ru Israil ra atan ondo' nanusuban ri Musa. Nakitaak ilo ra kuliamos limpor ondo' binaal intor ra mas am pirok, am niayuk konoon intor ra ulun ru Misir.
Nangkinibit
Ugar noyo ulun ru Israil ra mantana' intor ra bandar Ramsis mongoi ra bandar Sukot. Suang nilo 600,000 ngaulun ungkuyon, kalo nakaaya' ruandu' am lalaing.
Nagibit ilo masuang sapi', domba am kambing. Masuang ulun bansa' ru bokon niayuk minaya' risilo.

Nangansak ilo ra ruti' kalo linatakan ra ragi intor ra ruti' makata' ondo' inibit nilo intor ra Misir. Pinagiru' ilo intor ra giu' no ra namulali', saboi kalo nakapanampos ra lutu' kapoam nakapangansak ra ruti' kalo linatakan ra ragi.
Kaukop bilor ra ka 430, ngaangai' bansa' intor ra ulun ru
Rondom raginio nararayus
Indagu
Kaa' ulipon ondo' binali min makaakan ra akanon no, amon ru sinunatan io noyo.
Ulun minayan ayuk ra buoi kapoam mangngandoi ondo' pinangandoi kalo makaakan ra akanon Paska.
Ngaangai' akanon Paska no musiti' akanon ralalom baloi, intok ru akanon no tinampos. Kalo paibitin akanon no mingkual. Pai' pandako' rondo' pana bungul ru bibiag no.
Ngaangai' ulun ru Israil musiti' mangiantak ra pangiantakan ti.
Ulun ondo' kalo sinunatan kalo makaakan ra akanon no. Amon ru makaminayan ramuyun ulun bansa' ru bokon am moogot mangiantak ra Paska koson mangurumat ra
Kaulayan ra nogondo' masauk niayuk ra ulun ru Israil am ulun bansa' ru bokon ondo' minayan ramuyun.”
Ngaangai' ulun ru Israil gumagaya' ra kaulayan no am mambaal ra atan ondo' nanusuban ru
Paat orou raginio magibit
Indagu
“Patimpokon Raki' ngaangai' anak ungkuyon katuaan. Moonong anak ungkuyon katuaan ru ulun ru Israil, am moonong anak ungkuyon katuaan ru bibiag Aku noyo tatangan.”
Indagu i Musa ra ulun ru Israil, “Karaa' orou raiti', orou ra akau nangiruan ra pagun ru Misir, intok akau inulipon. Paat ra orou raiti' nagibit
Nangiruan kau ra Misir ra orou raiti', paat ra bulan Abib, iono bulan ra kasaa'.
Nampator
Musiti' kau mangakan ra ruti' kalo linatakan ra ragi buoi katuluan, am paat ra orou ra katulu' no baalon min pangiantakan koson mangurumat ra
Buoi tulu' ngoorou no, musiti' kau mangakan ra ruti' ondo' kalo linatakan ra ragi. Giu' ra titikop ru pagun min, kalo mataak makaragi kapoam atan ayuk pana makaragi.
Paat ra talimpuun ru pangiantakan no, balai' min toojo anak ungkuyon mino ra mambaal kau ngaangai' no sabap ra atan ondo' binaal ru
Pangiantakan ti masauk rondo' pangkaraan, koson ra tatandu' ondo' pinabangkos ra longon kapoam rabas mino, koson mapakara' ramuyun ra musiti' kau marayus-rayus mindagu am mintutun ra Ukum ru
Iantakon noyo pangiantakan ti ra moonong bilor, paat ra ondo' inaru' noyo.”
Indagu i Musa ra ulun ru Israil, “Ibiton kau ru
musiti' kau mapataak ra moonong anak ungkuyon katuaan ra

Kaa' moonong anak ungkuyon katuaan ru kaladai musiti' min pulion intor Riso am mapataak ra sanginan anak domba koson ra palit. Amon ru marara' kau mamuli' ra anak kaladai no, musiti' min pandakon liog no. Musiti' min pulion moonong anak ungkuyon katuaan min.
Paat ra orou matong, paat ra mangkuot anak ungkuyon mino ra arati' ru ngaangai' ti, musiti' min taamon koson ragitio, ‘Ralalom ru kuasa' ondo' maayo, inibit takau ru
Paat bambalingatan raja' ru Misir am manginga' ritakau mugar, namatoi
Pangiantakan ti masauk rondo' pangkaraan, koson ra tatandu' ondo' pinabangkos ra longon kapoam rabas takau, koson mapakara' ritakau ra inibit takau ru
Paat ra makataak raja' ru Misir ra ulun ru Israil mugar, kalo naningganai
Ginio ra nagibit Io risilo ra ralan lumimpuong mansail ra tana' kaagisan mongoi ra Raat Galaga.
Iniruanan ulun ru Israil Sukot am nangkim giu' ra Itam, kiing ru tana' kaagisan.
Tampilon ra matawang, soroi
Buoi songorou lugu' ru gaun soroi ra saang ru bansa' raginio, am buoi sorondom lugu' ru apui soroi ra saang nilo.
Indagu boo Tuhan ri Musa,
“Susubo' noyo ulun ru Israil sumaguli' am mangkim ra tuma' ru bandar Pi-Agirot, nangkilolot ra bandar Migdol am Raat Galaga,
Tantamon ru raja' Misir ra tumanggau ulun ru Israil ra pagun ti am malaa' mansail ra tana' kaagisan.
Mangkinibit Aku ra raja' ru Misir bambalingatan saboi mangilou io ramuyun; kamanangan Kuno ra raja' no maparatong ra pangurumatan Raki'. Makapandai boo ulun ru Misir ra Aku noyo

Kabalai' raja' ru Misir ra nagigiru' ulun ru Israil, nababaya' raja' no ra pagawai nano nangulau ra pangkaraan, am indagu, “Atan binaal takau? Nopoloso takau ra ulun ru Israil nagigiru' saboi natatakan takau ra inulipon.”
Panampos raja' ra kurita' kuda nano koson mangayou, am niayuk saujor nano.
Ugar raja' ra ngaangai' kurita' kuda nano, nakaaya' onom ngaatus kurita' kuda ra moonsoi kaga' ondo' sinakayan ru panglima ru saujor no.
Nangkinibit
Saujor ru Misir nababaya' ra ngaangai' kuda, kurita' kuda am mapaugar, nangilou ra ulun ru Israil am nanunu' risilo ra intok nangkiman nilo giu' ra kiing ru Raat Galaga,
Pakakito ulun ru Israil ra raja' am saujor ru Misir matong koson manggal risilo, kalaa' ilo am pampalaa ra
Indagu ilo ri Musa, “Kolondo' kia lobong giu' ra Misir saboi nagibit kau ramon ra tana' kaagisan koson matoi? Ilai' noyo atan ondo' nasauk sabap ra okou nagibit ramon miningkual intor ra Misir!

Kalo poyo minintor takau, minindagu akai noyo ra masauk baal ragitio. Nambala' akai noyo rirun maa' raginio kalo mampajajou ramon, am mopoloso ramon marayus masauk ra inulipon ru ulun ru Misir. Moonsoi poyo masauk akai ra inulipon ra giu' i ka matoi ra tana' kaagisan ti.”
Taam i Musa, “Pai' kalaa'! Ikang kano! Ilai' atan ondo' baalon ru
Ra akau noyo
Indagu
Kakato' jujuga' muno am patutuyo' ra rasawat ru raat. Timug ru raat malapak, am makaugar ulun ru Israil mansail ra raat rasawat ru lonor no ondo' mapua'.

Mangkinibit Aku ra ulun ru Misir bambalingatan kaga' saboi mangilou ilo ra ulun ru Israil, am poyo ralalom ru raat pana. Kamanangan Kuno ra raja' ru Misir, saujor nano, kurita' kuda nano am mapaugar ra kurita' kuda nano maparatong ra pangurumatan Raki'.
Paat ra kalaan Ku ilo, makapandai ulun ru Misir ra Aku noyo
Malaikat ri Aki Kapuuno' ondo' soroi ra saang ru saujor Israil manding ra tinaulian. Lugu' ru gaun soroi ra saang nilo niayuk manding

ra pangkilolot ru saujor ru Misir am ulun ru Israil. Gaun no maparatong ra kalandaman ra ulun ru Misir kaa' mangani' ra sinda ra ulun ru Israil, saboi buoi ru rondom karuo-ruo pulalai no kalo makapaginggaar ra rondo' am bokon.
Patutuyo' ri Musa kalindu' nano rasawat ru raat, am mangkinibit
am mansail ulun ru Israil ra raat ra rasawat ru tana' ondo' mapua', liliwa' timug tampilon pamiris am kait koson ra rinding masawat ru timug.
Ulun ru Misir nabaya' ra kuda, kurita' kuda am mapaugar ra kurita' kuda nangilou ra ulun ru Israil saboi ra tanga' ru raat.
Paat ra tumawang orou, intor ra lugu' ru apui am lugu' ru gaun, nagilong
Nangkinibit Io ra luda' ru kurita' kuda nilo maimpong saboi mapagon mugar. Indagu ulun ru Misir, “Sumumbung
Indagu
Ginio ra patutuyo' ri Musa kalindu' nano rasawat ru raat. Katawang orou, saguli' timug koson ra kaindalaman. Kuminam ulun ru Misir magiru' intor ra raat, kaa' napalinjob
Saguli' timug no am napalinjob ra ngaangai' kurita' kuda am mapaugar no, am niayuk ngaangai' saujor ru Misir ondo' nangilou ra ulun ru Israil ra tanga' ru raat; kolondo' sangulun pana naayag.
Kaa' ulun ru Israil nansail ra raat ralimbou ru tana' ondo' mapua', liliwa' timug tampilon pamiris am kait nasauk ra rinding masawat ru timug.
Paat ra orou raginio, namayag
Pakakito ulun ru Israil ra nangala
“Masaga' ku rimbayin
sabap ra namanang Io ra moonsoi kaga';
namatir Io ra kuda
am ondo' kiminura' ra kuda ralalom ru raat.
Io noyo namayag raki'.
Io i Aki Kapuuno' kuno, am mongompor aku Riso;
Io i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' sambaan ri ama' i, am marimbai aku ra kinaayo Nano.
Namatir Io ra saujor ru Misir am kurita' kuda nilo ralalom ru raat;
pagawai ru saujor ondo' moonsoi kaga' nolosor giu' ra Raat Galaga.
Raat ondo' napalinjob risilo,
nolosor ilo ra lonor ru raat koson ra batu.
Iou
nanutuk Kou ra pantula' saboi natutuk kaga'.
Ra kinaayo kaga' Muno,
pinuso Mu pantula' Muno;
sangit Muno nasimbuluk
am nonolob risilo koson ra rami.
Sinampui Mu raat saboi timug no siminimpor;
timinolorog timug no koson ra rinding batu;
lonor nano ra malandom kaga' no nasauk mapua'.
Kon ru pantula', ‘Mangilou aku am mamparakop risilo;
tatayaron ku kalangkayaan nilono,
am timpokon ku alapon kuno;
pajuloyon ku ilang kuno am mangalap ra ngaangai' longgom nilo.’
Kaa' ra rondo' ayuk paminawo Muno, iou
nolosor ulun ru Misir,
nolosor ilo koson ra timah ralalom libut ru timug ra makalalaa' kaga'.
Iou
Osoi kia ondo' koson Rirun, matulai kaga'?
Osoi kia ondo' makapambaal ra kaimuagan
am baal ra makaimuag koson ra binaal Muno?
Napatutui Kou ra kalindu' pamiris Muno,
am nonolon tana' ti ra pantula' maino.
Naningganai Kou ra ulun ondo' binayag Muno,
sabap ra gagaya' Muno ra bantu' Muno.
Ra ikang Muno ondo' maayo,
naningganai Kou risilo mongoi ra tana' Muno ondo' matulai.
Bansa'-bansa' ondo' mangining raginio monontol ra laa',
ulun ru Palistin pinaliman ra monontol.
Tingganai-tingganai ru Idom mangalaa',
ulun ru Moab ondo' mangapanggol monontol;
liminiot kinabaani ru ulun ru Kanaan.
Talou am laa' lumumpa' risilo.
Nakito nilo ikang Muno, iou
kalo makalulu' ilo sabap ra matalou,
saboi ulun Muno nansail ra saang nilo –
ulun ondo' pinalabus Muno intor ra pangulipanan.
Nagibit Kou risilo mumpos,
am mapaayan risilo giu' ra gunung Muno,
intok ondo' Okou, iou
Baloi ondo' binaal Muno galama'.
Okou, iou
Nansail ulun ru Israil ra raat rasawat ru tana' ondo' mapua'. Kaa' pakasubol kurita' kuda am kuda ru ulun ru Misir, am niayuk mapaugar ra kurita' kuda ralalom ru raat, pasagulio' ru
I Miriam boo, sangulun nabi, iono maayo ruandu' ri Arun, nangalap ra tamburing nano. Ngaangai' ruandu' pana minaya' napalamba' ra tamburing liliwa' mansayau.
Rinimbayan ri Miriam ilo,
“Rimbayi' min
sabap ra moonsoi kaga' kamanangan noowot Nano;
Namatir Io ra kuda am ulun nangura' ra kuda ralalom ru raat.”
Kopongo raginio naningganai i Musa ra ulun ru Israil nangiruan ra Raat Galaga
Pakasaboi ilo boo ra rondo' intok inggalan no Mara,
Pasabutok mamagun ri Musa am pangkuot, “Atan boo inumon mai?”
Pakiasi' toojo i Musa ra
Giu' ra intok no, nangani'
Indagu Io, “Amon ru totopot kau gumagaya' Raki',
Pakasaboi ilo boo ra Ilim. Giu' no mokoondo' mopor am ruo taur ru timug am tulu' ngampuun kurma. Nangkim ilo maar ra timug ra giu' no.
Ngaangai' ulun ru Israil minugar intor ra Ilim. Paat ra orou koopor am limo ralalom sila' karuo intor ilo nangiruan ra Misir, nakasaboi ilo ra tana' kaagisan Sin nangkilolot ra Ilim am Sinai.
Ngaangai' nilo pasabutok ri Musa am i Arun giu' ra tana' kaagisan no.
Konilo ri Musa am i Arun, “Moonsoi poyo ru minatoi akai pinatoi ru
Paat ra koonom ngoorou, musiti' ilo manimung ra akanon no induo ruli' suang no am manampos raginio.”
Ginio ra kon ri Musa am i Arun ra ngaangai' ulun ru Israil, “Tampilon ra mai' ru raiti' makapandai kau ra
Tampilon ra susuab ti makakito kau ra sinda ru katulayan ru
Kon boo ri Musa, “Mangani'
Indagu i Musa ri Arun, “Susubo' ilo ngaangai' matong muma' ra
Tatanga' i Arun mindagu risilo ngaangai', ponontong ilo tampilon ra tana' kaagisan, am pulusat ru sinda katulayan ru
Indagu

“Naining Ku noyo butok ru ulun ru Israil. Ragui' ilo, ra tampilon ra mai' ti makaalap ilo ra kual ra akanon, am tampilon ra susuab ti makaalap ilo ra ruti' masuang ondo' gogoton nilo. Ginio ra makapandai ilo ra Aku noyo
Tampilon ra mai' ti, masuang kaga' tantarau matong ra nangkiman nilo saboi natikop ngaangai' nangkiman. Tampilon ra susuab ti, mokobolobou boo ra liput ru nangkiman.
Mairu' bolobou no, rondo' ondo' malilis koson ra sisi' am malumot koson ra bolobou ondo' kiminotog soroi ralimbou ru tana' kaagisan.
Pakakito ulun ru Israil raginio, kalo makapandai ilo atan ginio. Pasakuot ilo ra rondo' am bokon, “Atan kia ginio?”
Indagu i Musa risilo, “Gitio noyo akanon pinataak ru
Nanusub
Nambaal ulun ru Israil raginio; mokoondo' nanimung nasailan intor ra ruo ngalito am mokoondo' poyo ondo' nanimung nantutus intor raginio.
Pakapaat ra ilo manuku', mapandayan ra ulun ondo' nanimung masuang kalo nasailan, am ulun ondo' nanimung koborok kalo tupo nairuruan. Moonong ulun nanimung ra kinasuang ru kaukapan nano.
Kon ri Musa risilo, “Kolondo' osoi pana makapambuli ra akanon kabalu' ra koborok pana saboi susuab no.”
Kaa' mokoondo' popolos risilo ondo' kalo mampalio ra ragu ri Musa no, am nambuli santayaran ra akanon no. Suabon no ra iosusuab, uloron am malaat owou ru akanon no, sangit boo i Musa risilo.
Moonong susuab ti manimung ilo ra akanon no, kinasuang ra kaukapan. Makapangit mato ru orou, akanon ondo' soroi ra tana' no matunang.
Paat ra koonom ngoorou manimung ilo ra akanon induo ruli' suang no, apat ngalito suang no tayar ru moonong ulun. Ngaangai' tingganai ru ulun no matong am mambala' ra baal raginio ri Musa.
Kon ri Musa risilo, “Nanusub
Koson ra nanusuban ri Musa, nambuli ilo ra suwo ru akanon no saboi ra suabon no; kalo moonos am kalo uloron akanon no.
Kon ri Musa, “Akano' noyo akanon ti ra orou raiti', sabap ra orou raiti' orou Sabat, orou tangusan ondo' patimpokon ra
Musiti' kau manimung ra akanon buoi kaanaman, kaa' paat ra orou katulu', orou tangusan no, kolondo' akanon timungon.”
Paat ra orou katulu' ingkual kukula' ngaulun ra ulun no koson manimung ra akanon, kaa' kalo nokoowot ra atan-atan.
Indagu boo
Karaa' noyo ra Aku,
Ginio ra kalo mangandoi ilo ra orou ra katulu'.
Kon ri Musa, “Nanusub
Indagu i Musa ri Arun, “Alapo' rondo' rarapu' am suangi' ra ruo ngalito manna, am pabantaa' rarapu' no ra saang ru
Pabantaa' ri Arun rarapu' no ra saang ru Kaban Nabantuan ra buliin, sumugut ra susuban ru
Nangakan ulun ru Israil ra manna buoi apat ngoopor ngambilor polos ilo nakasaboi ra tana' ru Kanaan, intok pamagunan nilo. (
Tukuan ru kuliamos mapua' ondo' kaindalaman pinakai ru ulun paat ragili, makasuang ruo ngoopor ngalito.)
Ngaangai' ulun ru Israil nanatang ra tana' kaagisan Sin am pababanding intor ra rondo' intok mongoi intok ra bokon maya' ra susuban ru
Mambubutok ilo ri Musa am indagu, “Anii' akai no ra timug inumon.”
Taam i Musa, “Kua pambubutok kau? Kua pangkinam kau ra

Kaa' ulun-ulun pinaason kaga' am marayus-rayus ilo mambutok ri Musa. Konilo, “Kua ibito' mu akai mingkual intor ra Misir? Maa' kia raginio akai am anak maiti, am niayuk tinambiag mai matoi ra paason?”
Pakiasi' toojo i Musa ra
Indagu
Migor Aku ra saang mino rasawat ru rondo' batu maayo giu' ra Gunung Sinai. Lambaa' batu no, am mingkual timug ra inumon ru ulun.” Baalo' ri Musa ginio ra saang ru tingganai ulun ru Israil no.
Intok no ininggalanan ra Masa
Ratong ulun ru Amalik am pamulunsar ra ulun ru Israil giu' ra Rapidim.
Indagu i Musa ri Josua, “Pilio' kukula' ngaulun koson mangayou ra ulun ru Amalik ra susuab no. Migor aku ra tampak ru bulur liliwa' mampaguut ra jujuga' koson ra nanusuban ri Aki Kapuuno'.”
Baalo' ri Josua atan ondo' nanusuban ri Musa am ingkual boo mangayou ra ulun ru Amalik, liliwa' i Musa, i Arun am i Gur nagaloi ra tampak ru bulur.
Buoi ri Musa nangakat ra kalindu' nano, mamanang ulun ru Israil, kaa' makatuun kalindu' nano, tumalimpuun mamanang boo ulun ru Amalik.

Paat ra naagui noyo kalindu' ri Musa, pangalap i Arun am i Gur rondo' batu am manusub ri Musa manturung ra rasawat no, liliwa' migor ilo ra sapapa' nano koson manungka' ra kalindu' ri Musa polos tumolop mato ru orou.
Koon raginio noyo ulun ru Amalik kinala ri Josua.
Nambaal i Musa rondo' altar am inggalani' no ra “
Kon ri Musa, “Bingkalo' Bandira' ru
I Jitro, iwan ri Musa, imam giu' ra Midian, nakaining ra ngaangai' ondo' binaal ri Aki Kapuuno' tayar ri Musa am ulun ru Israil no paat ra
Ginio ra nabaya' i Jitro am i Jipora manambului ri Musa. Jipora ti andu' ri Musa, ondo' lakat poyo minayan giu' ra Midian.

Nagibit niayuk i Jitro ri Girsom am i Iliijir, ruo ngaulun anak ungkuyon ri Jipora. (Nakaindagu i Musa ra, “Aku ti sangulun bansa' ru bokon ra tana' ondo' kalo nauligan kutu.” Ginio ra ininggalanan no sangulun anak ungkuyon nano i Girsom.

Minindagu io niayuk ra, “I Aki Kapuuno' ondo' sambaan ru ama' kuli nangindangan am namayag raki' intor ra potoyon ru raja' ru Misir.” Ginio ra ininggalanan no anak ungkuyon no ra sangulun poyo ri Iliijir.)
Nababaya' i Jitro ra andu' ri Musa am anak ungkuyon ri Musa minongoi ra tana' kaagisan, intok ri Musa nangkim maar ra gunung matulai.
Pambilin i Jitro ri Musa ra tanou ra matong ilo.
Ginio ra ingkual i Musa mongoi uma' riso. Igulatur io ra saang ri Jitro am alok riso. Sikuot ilo ra moonsoi ilo kia sigagama', am umpos ra kim ri Musa.
Nambala' i Musa ri Jitro ra ngaangai' ondo' binaal ru
Naansukan i Jitro nakaining ra ngaangai' baal raginio.
Indagu io, “Omporo' noyo
Nakapandai aku ra
Pagibit boo i Jitro ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Paat ra suabon no, nanalasai i Musa ra pansangaran tayar ru ulun ru Israil. Ginio ra kumantisuk io intor ra susuab ti saboi ra rondom ti.

Pakakito i Jitro ra ngaangai' ondo' baalon ri Musa, pangkuot io, “Atan kia ngaangai' baal ti ondo' baalon muno ra ulun ragitilo? Kua baalo' mu sangulun kandoi ti, saboi ngaangai' ulun migor ragiti intor ra susuab ti polos ra rondom ti makibilin rirun?”
Taam i Musa, “Musiti' ku baalon kandoi ti sabap ra ulun matong raki' koson makapandai ra kasagaan ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Amon ru mansangor ruo ngaulun, matong ilo raki' am patasin ku osoi intor risilo ondo' motopot. Mapasaboi aku niayuk ra susuban am ukum ri Aki Kapuuno' risilo.”
Indagu boo i Jitro ri Musa, “Kalo natanda' kandoi mutu.
Ralan ragitio mapabagui rirun am niayuk ngaangai' ulun ti. Kandoi ti maagat kaga' ra okou sangulun mambaal.
Raino iningo' bilin kutu, am i Aki Kapuuno' soroi sumimpung rirun. Motopot ra suali kou ru ulun ragitilo ra saang ri Aki Kapuuno' am mambala' ra pansangaran nilo Riso.
Musiti' mu ilaan ilo ra susuban am ukum ri Aki Kapuuno', am niayuk mambala' ati kulaan ilo maayag am atan matanda' baalon.

Kaa' suai raginio, musiti' kou mampili' ra kukula' ngaulun ungkuyon ondo' mangapintar. Lantiko' ilo ra tingganai ru mamagun ondo' maningganai ra saribu ngaulun, maatus ngaulun, limo ngoopor ngaulun am mopor ngaulun. Musiti' ilo no ulun ondo' malaa' ri Aki Kapuuno', malansanan am kalo masaga' mangapu ra ruit pangambi'.

Polosoon ilo magail mangandoi koson ra akim ra ulun. Makapambala' ilo rirun ra ngaangai' ondo' mapagon, kaa' musiti' ilo galama' mamatas ra pansangaran ra mongoborok. Ralan ragitio mapakaluoi ra kandoi muno, sabap ra makaindangan ilo rirun mansaan ra maagat.
Amon ru baalon mu gitio koson ra nanusuban ri Aki Kapuuno', kalo makabagui rirun am ngaangai' ulun makauli' ra baloi am pansangaran masalasai noyo.”
Sinugut ri Musa bilin ri Jitro.

Nampili' i Musa ra kukula' ngaulun ungkuyon ondo' mapintar ra popolos ru ulun ru Israil, am nampalantik risilo ra tingganai ondo' maningganai ra saribu ngaulun, maatus ngaulun, limo ngoopor ngaulun am mopor ngaulun.
Magail ilo mangandoi koson ra akim ru ulun ru Israil. Nambala' ilo ra baal ondo' mangapagon ri Musa, kaa' ilo galama' manalasai ra pansangaran ondo' mongoborok.
Indagu boo i Musa ra tumoojo ri Jitro, am uli' boo i Jitro ra pagun nano.
Iruani' boo ru ulun ru Israil Rapidim. Paat ra orou kasaa' sila' katalu ra ilo nakaingkual intor ra Misir, nakasaboi ilo ra tana' kaagisan Sinai. Nangkim ilo ra giu' no, lonson toojo ru Gunung Sinai.
Nagaloi i Musa rasawat ru gunung mongoi tuum ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Pampiau
“Nakito min atan ondo' binaal Kuno ra ulun ru Misir, ati kulaan Aku nagibit ramuyun Raki' ra intok ragitio, koson sanginan kanui ondo' nagibit ra anak nano ra kawo nano.
Masauk kau ra ulun ondo' patimpokon Raki' galama', am mangandoi kau ayuk Raki' koson ra imam.”
Ginio ra tuun i Musa, am pampiau ra tingganai ru ulun raginilo koson tumimung. Pambala' io boo risilo ra baal ondo' nanusuban ru
Taam ngaangai' ulun no ra nagagampan, “Baalon mai ngaangai' ondo' rinagu ru
Indagu
Pinasaboi ri Musa taaman ru ulun raginilo ra
Indagu
am mopongo ra orou malaas. Paat ra orou raginio tumuun Aku ra Gunung Sinai. Giu' no moonong ulun makakito Raki'.
Baalo' balitan ra liput ru gunung no maa' raginio kalo makasail ulun no. Balai' ilo maa' raginio kalo magaloi ra gunung no kapoam minggaar. Osoi sumail ra balitan no ukumin ra matoi.

Musiti' ulun no bobolon kapoam tiwon ra panah, am kalo makambong ru osoi pana. Aturan ti masauk ra ulun am bibiag; ngaangai' ondo' sumail ra balitan no kalo polosoon maayag. Kaa' makaining ra bolos maawar intor ra bujung, musiti' ulun raginilo magaloi ra gunung.”
Tuun boo i Musa intor ra gunung am panusub ra ulun raginilo tumampos ra sumambayang. Mampupu' ilo ra bayang,
indagu boo i Musa risilo, “Tampos kano ra orou malaas, am liliwa' ragitio kalo parulugon kau.”
Nagibit i Musa risilo mingkual intor ra pangkiman koson mongoi tuum ri Aki Kapuuno', am bigor ilo ra lonson toojo ru gunung.
Titikop ru Gunung Sinai natikop ra lisun sabap ra timinuun
Bolos ru bujung sumongou poyo. Mindagu i Musa ri Aki Kapuuno' am tumaam Io ra tingkalur.
Timinuun
am indagu
Imam-imam pana ondo' matong inggaar Raki' musiti' impasawin inan nilo. Amon ru kalo ukumin Ku ilo.”
Indagu i Musa ra
Taam
Tuun boo i Musa koson tumuum ra ulun raginilo am pambala' risilo ra atan ondo' rinagu ru
Indagu boo i Aki Kapuuno' am gitio noyo ragu Nano,
“Aku noyo
“Pai' samba ra tuhan-tuhan ra bokon; samba ayuk Raki'.
Pai' samba ra sinungkalalaing ru atan pana, sabap ra Aku noyo
Kaa' mapakito Aku ra togom Ku ra riribu papag
Akau mokoonom ngoorou mangandoi,

kaa' orou ra katulu' iono orou tangusan ondo' patimpokon Raki'. Paat ra orou raginio sangulun pana kalo pongondoyon: okou, anak muno, ulipon muno, bibiag tinambiag muno kapoam ulun bansa' ru bokon ondo' minayan ra pagun muno.
Buoi onom ngoorou Aku,
Konilo ri Musa, “Amon ru mindagu kou ramon, iningon mai. Kaa' amon ru mindagu i Aki Kapuuno' ramon, matoi akai.”
Taam i Musa, “Pai' kalaa'; i Aki Kapuuno' matong koson mangkinam ayuk ramuyun, maa' raginio rumayus kau gumagaya' Riso am maa' raginio kalo makatula kau.”
Kaa' ulun raginilo lakat poyo migor maalur intor ra giu' no, am i Musa ayuk mininggaar ra gaun makapal intok i Aki Kapuuno' minatong.
Panusub
Pai' taligama' pambaal ra sinungkalalaing intor ra pirok kapoam mas koson sambaan ra sapapa' Kuno.
Baali' Aku ra altar intor ra tana'; papatampakan min ra taak domba am sapi' min koson ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Amon ru baalin min Aku ra altar intor ra batu, pai' baalo' intor ra batu ondo' pinutul ra pahat, sabap ra paat ra akau mamakai ra pahat raginio, batu no kalo boo maaya' Raki'.
Pai' Aku baali' ra altar ondo' makatukar, maa' raginio kalo makito tayar ru inan min ondo' kalo maaya' ilain.”
Indagu boo
Amon mambali kau ra ulipon bansa' ru Ibrani, musiti' io mangandoi rirun buoi onom ngambilor. Paat ra bilor katulu' musiti' io palabuson ra kalo bayarin kau ra atan pana.

Amon ru lakat poyo kalo nanangandu' io paat ra io nasauk ra ulipon min, andu' nano kalo makaaya' riso paat ra io palabuson. Kaa' amon ru makaandu' io noyo paat ra io nasauk ra ulipon min, makapabaya' io ra andu' nano mugar.

Amon ru inuatan io ru tuan nano ra sangulun ruandu', am naganak andu' nano kukula' ngaulun anak ungkuyon am ruandu', tuan nano tatangan ra andu' am anak nano, am kalo makaaya' paat ra ulipon no palabuson.
Amon ru mangiou ulipon no ra motogom io ra tuan nano, andu' am anak nano, am marara' palabuson,

musiti' tuan nano magibit riso ra intok sambayangan. Giu' no susubon ulipon no migor am sumandig ra kulobon kapoam lugu' ru kulobon, musiti' tibakin ru tuan nano talingo ru ulipon no. Koon raginio boo masauk ulipon no ra ulipon ru tuan nano saboi matoi.
“Amon ru sangulun ama' mantalan ra anak ruandu' nano koson ra ulipon, kalo palabuson ulipon ruandu' no koson ra ulipon ungkuyon.

Amon ru talanon ruandu' no ra sangulun ungkuyon ra kaatangan saukon io ra andu' ru ungkuyon no, amon ru marara' ungkuyon no ra ruandu' no, musiti' talanon saguli' ruandu' no ra ama' nano. Kalo matalan ru tuan nano ruandu' no ra ulun bansa' ru bokon sabap ra kalo tinanda' ru tuan nano pamakuan nano riso.
Amon ru mambali sangulun ama' ra sangulun ulipon ruandu' koson paganduon ra anak ungkuyon nano, musiti' ama' no tandaan no pamakuan ra ulipon no koson ra anak ruandu' nano galama'.
Amon ru manangandu' poyo anak ungkuyon no, rayuson no mampakan am mangani' ra konoon am niayuk kaapuan nano ra andu' kasaa' nano.
Amon ru kalo suguton no ginio ra andu' nano, musiti' io mampalabus ra andu' nano ra kalo mangapu ra bayaran atan pana.”
Kaa' amon ru kalo siningon am kalo makaguang io mamatoi, pagiruon ulun no ra rondo' intok ondo' patuluon Kuno ramuyun. Giu' no maampinan ulun no.
Kaa' amon ru sumangit sasangulun am sumingon mamatoi ra ulun bokon, musiti' io ukumin ra matoi kabalu' pana magiru' io ra altar Kuno makiampin.
“Osoi mapalamba' ra ama' nano kapoam ina' nano musiti' ukumin ra matoi.

“Amon ru ralalom rondo' pansangaran, napalamba' sasangulun ra ulun bokon ra batu kapoam linuntug no, kaa' kalo pinatoi no, kalo ukumin ulun no. Amon ru ulun linamba' no makalangan kinibit ru lamba' no,
kaa' makatirong am makaugar ra manjujuga', musiti' ulun napalamba' no mambayar ra palit ru kalubatan buoi ru ulun no marualan, am mantalimo riso saboi mapali'.
“Amon ru mapalamba' sasangulun ra ulipon nano ra tataun, ulipon ra ungkuyon kapoam ruandu', am marayus matoi ulipon no, musiti' ulun ra napalamba' ra ulipon no ukumin.
Kaa' amon ru ulipon no kalo matoi malupus songorou kapoam ruo ngoorou, kalo ukumin tuan nano. Namusaan ra ulipon noyo ukuman riso.
