Musiti' imam no mopososop ra bubua' ru kalindu' nano ra ralalom ru raraa' ru kambing no, pakupilon raraa' no ra sangau ra pisuk ru altar, am suwo ru raraa' no pawason boo ra tampilon ragana' ru altar.
Musiti' io boo mapasuai ra ngaangai' lomok ru kambing no, koson ra io napasuai ra lomok ru bibiag tayar ru taak simbalui koson makibarakat ra
Amon ru mapataak sasangulun no ra sanginan domba koson mangampun ra tula nano, musiti' domba no ruandu' am kalo najamaran no.

Musiti' ulun no mapabanta' ra kalindu' nano ra rasawat ru ulu ru kambing no, am simbaluyon boo ginio giu' ra tampilon ralayo ru altar, intok panimbaluyan ra bibiag tayar ru taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Musiti' imam no mopososop ra bubua' ru kalindu' nano ra ralalom ru raraa' ru domba no, pakupilon raraa' no ra sangau ra pisuk ru altar, am suwo ru raraa' no pawason boo ra tampilon ragana' ru altar.
Musiti' io mapasuai boo ra ngaangai' lomok ru domba no, koson ra io napasuai ra lomok ru domba ondo' sinimbalui tayar ru taak simbalui koson makibarakat ra
Taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula gogoton pataakon ra tayar ru baal ragitio:
Amon ru sasangulun no napatas noyo kitaakon mangani' ra inono' giu' ra makama, kaa' kalo nangani' ra pambalaan ra ondo' nakito nano noyo kapoam naining nano, am musiti' io mansaan ra kinibit no.
Amon ru kalo singonon ru sasangulun mangambong ra rorondo' ondo' majamol, koson ra baangkai ru bibiag, masauk io ra majamol am makasala ra natutunan no ayuk binaal nano.
Amon ru kalo singonon ru sasangulun mangambong ra atan ayuk majamol intor ra ulun, makasala io ra natutunan no ayuk binaal nano.
Amon ru magibot sasangulun ra bonyowon koson mambaal ra atan ayuk, makasala io ra natutunan no ayuk binaal nano.
Paat makasala sasangulun, musiti' io mangiou ra tula nano.
Koson ra ukuman ru tula nano, musiti' ulun no mapataak ra
Amon ru ulun makatula no kalo makapanaak ra sanginan domba kapoam kambing koson mamuli' ra tula nano, musiti' io mapataak ra

Musiti' io mapataak ra susuit-susuit no ra imam. Musiti' imam no mapataak galing ra susuit ondo' inaru' tayar ra taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula. Musiti' imam no mamilos ra liog ru susuit no, kaa' pai' masaboi mauntas ulu ru susuit no.
Santayaran ra raraa' ru susuit no musiti' patakison boo ra sapapa' ru altar. Suwo ru raraa' no musiti' boo pawason ra ragana' ru altar. Taak simbalui ti iono taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula.
Kopongo raginio mapataak boo imam no ra sanginan poyo ra susuit no koson taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru

Amon ru ulun makatula no kalo makapanaak ra ruo ngainan susuit maningkuluuk kapoam ruo ngainan susuit asang, musiti' io mapataak ra sakilogram tapung koson ra taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula. Kalo latakin tapung no ra umau jaitun kapoam kaminyan sabap taak simbalui no iono taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula am sala' ka taak simbalui koson paringkuanangan.

Musiti' ulun no magibit ra tapung no ra imam. Mangalap boo imam no sogonggom ra tapung no am solobon no ra rasawat ru altar koson ra taak ra akanon; gitio tatandu' no ra ngaangai' ru tapung no pinataak noyo ra
Koson raginio noyo imam no mapataak ra taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula ru ulun no, am ampunon boo ulun no ru
Nangani'
Amon ru kalo singonon ru sasangulun mambaal ra tula sabap ra kalo nakasugut manaak ra tayar ra taak ondo' inaru' ra tayar ru

Musiti' ulun no mambayar ra atan ondo' kalo nasugut nano ragili, ruangin poyo ra ruo ngoopor piatus. Musiti' io mapataak ra bibiag no ra imam. Pataakon boo bibiag no ru imam koson ra taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula ru ulun no, am ampunon boo ulun no ru
Amon ru osoi ayuk pana ra kalo singonon mambaal ra tula sabap ra manggal rondo' intor ra susuban ru

Koson ra taak simbalui koson mambayar ra kalubatan, musiti' io magibit ra imam ra sanginan domba gawayan kapoam sanginan kambing gawayan ondo' kalo najamaran. Logo no musiti' maya' ayuk ra logo ondo' inaru' noyo giu' ra Kim ru
Gitio noyo taak simbalui koson mambayar ra kalubatan ra tayar ru tula ondo' binaal nano ra
Amon ru makatula sasangulun ra

Musiti' ulun ondo' makatula no mambayar ra ngaangai' ondo' noowot nano ra kalo matanda'. Paat ra orou io narampatan ra makasala, musiti' io mambayar ra ngaangai' logo no ra tatangan no, ruangin poyo ruo ngoopor piatus.
Musiti' ulun ondo' makasala no magibit ra imam ra sanginan domba gawayan kapoam sanginan kambing gawayan ondo' kalo najamaran no koson taak simbalui koson mambayar ra kalubatan ra
Musiti' imam no mapataak ra taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula ru ulun no, am ampunon boo ulun no ru
Panusub
maa' raginio manaak ri Arun am anak-anak nano ra aturan ragitio intor ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Musiti' boo imam ondo' nambayang ra sukub am nansaluar mariwa' intor ra linon no mangalap ra kaau mokolomok ondo' soroi giu' ra altar no, am pabantaan no ra kiing ru altar no.
Kopongo raginio musiti' imam no mangalig ra binayang nano am magibit ra kaau mongoi ra liwar ru pangkiman, giu' ra intok ondo' timpok ru kaau no.

Apui giu' ra rasawat ru altar no musiti' mararayus mapaang am kalo malasa'. Moonong ra susuab ti imam musiti' mapatampak ra luton giu' ra rasawat ru altar, mapatampak ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Apui no musiti' mararayus mapaang ra rasawat ru altar am kalo malasa'.
Gitio noyo aturan intor ra taak simbalui koson paringkuanangan ra
Musiti' imam no mangalap ra sogonggom tapung mabaya' ra umau, am ngaangai' kaminyan no, am solobon boo ngaangai' no ra rasawat ru altar koson tatandu' ra ngaangai' no pinataak noyo ra
Suwo ru tapung no musiti' baalon ra ruti' kalo latakin ra ragi am akanon ru imam giu' ra intok mapasau, iono giu' ra liliut ru Kim ru
Koson kalo boo lalanggain, moonong ungkuyon ra papag ri Arun makaakan raginio koson ra tayar nilo intor ra akanon ondo' pataakon ra
Nangani'

tayar ru patimpokon ra imam papag ri Arun. Paat ra orou ru sangulun imam patimpokon, musiti' io mapataak ra sakilogram tapung ondo' moonsoi kaga' (nogondo' suang no ra taak simbalui koson paringkuanangan, ondo' pataakon moonong orou) ra
Tapung no musiti' latakin ra umau am ansakon ra pamanggangan, pipilangon am pataakon tayar ra taak simbalui koson paringkuanangan ra
Koson kalo boo lalanggain, taak simbalui ti musiti' pataakon ru moonong papag ri Arun ondo' masauk ra Tingganai Maayo Imam. Taak simbalui ti musiti' solobon ngaangai' koson taak ra
Sanganu pana intor ra taak simbalui koson paringkuanangan ra
Panusub

koson manaak ri Arun am anak-anak nano ra aturan ragitio intor ra taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula. Bibiag ondo' tayar ru taak ragitio musiti' simbaluyon tampilon ralayo ru altar, giu' ra intok manimbalui ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Imam ondo' mapataak ra bibiag no musiti' mangakan raginio giu' ra intok ondo' mapasau, iono giu' ra liliut ru Kim ru
Sasangulun kapoam atan pana makatiu' ra kual ru bibiag no mausung sabap ra kaikangan ru kapasawan no. Bayang ondo' matakisan ru raraa' ru bibiag no musiti' pupuin ra intok ondo' mapasau.
Pagangan ru tana' ondo' nantanakan ra kual no musiti' popolon. Amon ru binaal pagangan no intor ra basi', musiti' pagangan no isasin am liungin ra timug.
Moonong ungkuyon intor ra sasambaloi ru imam paakanon ra taak simbalui ti; taak simbalui ti matulai kaga'.
Kaa' amon ru makararaa' ru bibiag no ondo' inumpasan ralalom ru Kim ru
Gitio noyo aturan ra taak simbalui koson mambayar ra kalubatan; taak simbalui ti matulai kaga'.
Bibiag ru taak simbalui ragitio musiti' simbaluyon giu' ra tampilon ralayo ru altar, intok manimbalui ra bibiag tayar ru taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Ngaangai' lomok ru bibiag no musiti' pasuayon am pataakon giu' ra rasawat ru altar: Iku' ondo' mokolomok, lomok nokolopot ra kalabuat,
angkawa' pabayaan ra lomok no, am niayuk tayar ra moonsoi kaga' intor ra angkayau ru bibiag no.
Ngaangai' lomok no musiti' solobon ru imam ra rasawat ru altar koson ra taak akanon ra
Moonong ungkuyon intor ra sasambaloi ru imam makaakan ra kual ru taak simbalui ragitio, kaa' musiti' nilo akanon ginio giu' ra intok mapasau sabap ra taak simbalui ti matulai kaga'.
Aturan ondo' nogondo' masauk ra taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula am taak simbalui koson mambayar ra kalubatan: Kual ru bibiag no masauk ra longgom ru imam ondo' mapataak ra taak simbalui no.
Kungkung ru bibiag ondo' pinataak tayar ru taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Moonong taak simbalui koson paringkuanangan ra
Kaa' ngaangai' taak simbalui koson paringkuanangan ra
Gitio noyo aturan ra taak simbalui koson makibarakat ra

Amon ru mapataak sasangulun no koson ra taak paringkuanangan ri Aki Kapuuno', musiti' io mapataak ra ruti' ondo' kalo linatakan ra ragi pabayaan ra bibiag ondo' pataakon no. Ruti' no kakapalon ayuk pana, ondo' baalon intor ra tapung latakin ra umau jaitun, kapoam ruti' malilis ondo' luitin ra umau jaitun, kapoam kuui ondo' baalon intor ra tapung ondo' latakin ra umau jaitun.
Suai raginio, musiti' io niayuk mapataak ra ruti' ondo' baalon latakin ra ragi.
Musiti' io mapataak ra santayaran intor ra moonong salinut ru ruti' no koson ra taak lilion ra
Kual no musiti' akanon paat ra orou papataakan ra bibiag no; kalo patatangon sanganu pana saboi ra suabon no.
Paat ra sasangulun mapataak ra taak simbalui koson makibarakat ra
Kaa' amon ru lakat poyo makasuwo ru kual saboi ra orou katalu, kual no musiti' solobon ngaangai'.

Amon ru sanganu pana intor ra suwo ru kual no akano' paat ra orou katalu, kalo apuon ri Aki Kapuuno' taak simbalui no. Kalo masauk taak simbalui no ra barakat ra ulun raginio, kaa' masauk ra kalo matulai. Osoi ayuk ondo' mangakan ra suwo ru kual no makasala am musiti' mansaan ra kinibit no.
Kual ondo' nakatiu' ra atan ayuk ondo' majamol kalo maakan, kaa' musiti' solobon ngaangai' no.
Ulun ondo' kalo majamol makaakan ra kual intor ra taak simbalui raginio.
Amon ru mangakan sasangulun ra kual no paat ra io majamol, kalo boo karaan io ra ulun ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Paat ra mangambong sasangulun no ra ondo' majamol, am mangakan boo ulun no ra kual ru bibiag ondo' pinataak noyo, kalo boo karaan ulun no ra ulun ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Nangani'
ra tayar ru ulun ru Israil. Kalo maakan no lomok ru sapi', domba kapoam kambing.
Lomok intor ra bibiag ondo' matoi toojo kapoam ondo' sinaam ru bibiag masigo, kalo maakan kaa' alapon koson pakuan ra bokon.
Ulun ondo' mangakan ra lomok intor ra bibiag ondo' pataakon koson taak akanon ra
Ati ayuk ayanan ru ulun ru Israil, kalo toojo makaakan ilo ra raraa' ru susuit kapoam raraa' ru bibiag.
Osoi ayuk manggal ra aturan ti kalo boo karaan ra ulun ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Nanaak
ra tayar ru ulun ru Israil. Osoi ondo' mapataak ra taak simbalui koson makibarakat ra
Musiti' ulun no galama' magibit ra taak simbalui no koson taak akanon. Musiti' io magibit ra lomok am kubab ru bibiag no, am pataakon no koson ra taak lilion ra
Musiti' lomok no solobon ru sangulun imam giu' ra rasawat ru altar, kaa' kubab ru bibiag no longgom ru imam-imam.
Musiti' paa ra pamiris ru bibiag no pataakon koson ra taak lilion
ra imam ondo' mapataak ra raraa' am lomok intor ra taak simbalui koson makibarakat ra
Kubab am paa ra pamiris ru bibiag no iono taak lilion ondo' alapon ru
Gitio noyo tayar ru taak akanon ra
Paat ra orou raginio manusub
Ginio noyo aturan ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Nanaak
Indagu

“Ibito' i Arun am anak-anak nano mongoi ra kulobon ru Kim Kuno, am ibito' niayuk bayang ru imam, umau upacara, sapi' gawayan mamulok tayar ra taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula, ruo ngainan domba gawayan, am sambakul ruti' ondo' kalo latakin ra ragi.
Timungo' ngaangai' ulun ru Israil giu' ra kulobon ru Kim Kuno.”
Binaal ri Musa atan ondo' nanusuban ru
indagu i Musa risilo, “Atan ondo' baalon kutu raino ti iono susuban ru
Ibito' boo ri Musa i Arun am anak-anak nano mongoi ra saang, am baalo' boo upacara mariu' risilo.
Kopongo raginio pambayango' ri Musa i Arun ra bayang imam: bayang maayo, sukub am abot. Pabayango' no niayuk efod
Pautawo' niayuk ri Musa utau no ri Arun am pasuango' Urim am Tumim
Pasampako' ri Musa serban ra ulu ri Arun, am tampilon ra saang ru serban no patakino' ri Musa limpor mas koson tatandu' patimpokon, koson ra nanusuban ru
Alapo' boo ri Musa umau upacara am paluito' no ra Kim
Alap io ra sanganu intor ra umau no am patakiso' no intulu' ra rasawat ru altar am kuliamos no, am niayuk ra bisin am niayuk antulan no, koson patimpokon ngaangai' no ra
Patimpokon ri Musa i Arun ra umau upacara pasasaron no ra ulu ri Arun.
Ibito' boo ri Musa i Arun am anak-anak nano mongoi ra saang. Pambayango' ilo ri Musa ra bayang maayo am abot, am pansigalo' no ilo, koson ra nanusuban ru
Kopongo raginio pagibit i Musa ra sanginan sapi' gawayan mamulok ra tayar ru taak simbalui mangampun ra tula, pabantaa' boo ri Arun am anak-anak nano kalindu' nilo ra rasawat ru ulu ru sapi' no.

Simbaluyo' boo ri Musa sapi' no am alapo' sanganu raraa' no. Ra bubua' ru kalindu', pakupilo' boo ri Musa raraa' no ra sangau ru altar koson patimpokon no. Pasasaro' no suwo ru raraa' no ra tampilon ragana' ru altar. Ginio noyo ralan ri Musa napakapasau ra altar no am patimpokon no ra
Alap i Musa ra ngaangai' lomok ondo' soroi ra kalabuat ru sapi' no, tayar moonsoi kaga' intor ra angkayau ru sapi' am angkawa' nakaaya' lomok no, solobo' no ngaangai' no giu' ra rasawat ru altar.
Alap io ra suwo ru sapi' no pinaaya' kungkung, kual am tinai' no, solobo' no boo ngaangai' no giu' ra liwar ru pangkiman, koson ra nanusuban ru
Kopongo raginio pagibit boo i Musa sanginan domba gawayan koson ra tayar ru taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Simbaluyo' ri Musa domba gawayan no am pawaso' raraa' no ra kaapat-apat sapapa' ru altar.
Puputulo' no domba gawayan no, kalabuat am paa ru domba no binaguan ra timug. Solobo' no boo ulu, lomok am suwo ru domba gawayan no giu' ra rasawat ru altar, koson ra nanusuban ru
Kopongo raginio pagibit i Musa ra sanginan domba gawayan poyo tayar ru patimpokon ra imam, pabantaa' boo ri Arun am anak-anak nano kalindu' nilo ra rasawat ru ulu ru kambing no.

Simbaluyo' ri Musa domba gawayan no. Pangalap io boo sanganu raraa' ru domba no am pakupilo' ra talingo pamiris ri Arun, am ra pangina' ru bubua' kalindu' ra pamiris nano, am niayuk ra pangina' ru bubua' kalayam ra pamiris nano.

Ibito' boo ri Musa anak-anak ri Arun no giu' ra saang. Pakupilo' boo ri Musa sanganu raraa' ru domba no ra talingo ra pamiris nilo, ra pangina' ru bubua' kalindu' ra pamiris nilo, am niayuk ra pangina' ru bubua' kalayam ra pamiris nilo. Pawaso' boo ri Musa suwo ru raraa' no ra kaapat-apat sapapa' ru altar.

Alap i Musa ra lomok ru domba no, am niayuk iku' ondo' mokolomok, lomok ondo' nokolopot ra kalabuat no, tayar ra moonsoi kaga' intor ra angkayau no, angkawa' pabayaan ra lomok no am paa ra pamiris ru domba no.
Kopongo raginio, alap i Musa rondo' ruti' intor ra sambakul ruti' ondo' kalo linatakan ra ragi, ondo' patimpokon noyo ra
Pabantaa' no ngaangai' akanon no ra kalindu' ri Arun am anak-anak nano, am pataako' nilo boo ngaangai' no koson ra taak lilion ra
Alapo' boo ri Musa akanon no intor risilo am solobo' no giu' ra rasawat ru altar, ralimbou ru taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Kopongo raginio alap i Musa ra kubab ru domba no am pataako' no koson ra taak lilion ra

Alap i Musa sanganu umau upacara am niayuk sanganu raraa' ondo' giu' ra rasawat altar, am patakiso' no ginio ri Arun am anak-anak nano am niayuk ra bayang nilo. Gitio noyo ralan ri Musa mambaal ra patimpokon risilo am niayuk bayang nilono ra
Indagu i Musa ri Arun am anak-anak nano, “Ibito' kual ru taak simbalui ti giu' ra kulobon ru Kim ru
Solobo' ngaangai' suwo ru kual am ruti'.
Pai' kau ingkual intor ra kulobon ru Kim no buoi tulu' ngoorou, saboi mopongo upacara patimpokon ramuyun no.
Manaak
Musiti' kau soroi giu' ra kulobon ru Kim ru
Ginii noyo nambaal i Arun am anak-anak nano ra ngaangai' ondo' nanusuban ru
Paat ra orou kabalu', pampiau i Musa ri Arun am anak-anak nano am niayuk tingganai ru ulun ru Israil.
Indagu i Musa ri Arun, “Alapo' sanginan sapi' gawayan ondo' mamulok am sanginan domba gawayan, am karuo-ruo no kalo najamaran no, pataako' boo karuo-ruo no koson taak simbalui ra

Susubo' boo ulun ru Israil mapataak sanginan kambing gawayan tayar ru taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula, sanginan anak sapi' am sanginan anak domba ondo' umur ru karuruo no sambilor am kalo najamaran no, tayar ru taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Papataak niayuk ra sanginan sapi' gawayan am sanginan domba gawayan tayar ru taak simbalui koson makibarakat ra
Pagibit ilo ra ngaangai' ondo' nanusuban noyo ri Musa mongoi ra saang ru Kim ru
Indagu i Musa, “Nanusub
Indagu i Musa ri Arun, “Ongoi no ra altar am papataak ra taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula am taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Ongoi boo i Arun giu' ra altar no am panimbalui ra sapi' gawayan mamulok ondo' paluntukon tayar ru taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula nano galama'.

Anak-anak ri Arun nagibit ra raraa' ru sapi' no riso, pososopo' ri Arun bubua' ru kalindu' nano ra raraa' no, pakupilo' boo raraa' no ra sangau giu' ra pisuk ru altar. Pawaso' no suwo ru raraa' no giu' ra tampilon ragana' ru altar.
Solobo' no boo lomok ru sapi' gawayan no, angkawa' am paat ra moonsoi kaga' intor ra angkayau ru sapi' no giu' rasawat ru altar, koson ra nanusuban ru
Kaa' solobo' ri Arun kual ru sapi' gawayan no am kungkung no giu' ra liwar ru pangkiman.
Kopongo raginio simbaluyo' ri Arun bibiag no tayar ru taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Pataako' ru anak-anak ri Arun no riso ulu am tayar ra bokon ru bibiag no, am solobo' ri Arun ginio giu' ra rasawat ru altar.
Bagui' no boo kalabuat am paa ru bibiag no, solobo' boo ginio giu' ra altar, ralimbou ru ngaangai' taak simbalui ra bokon, iono taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru

Papataak boo i Arun ra taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula ru ulun ru Israil. Alap io ra kambing ondo' pataakon, simbaluyo' no am pataako' kambing no koson ra ondo' binaal no ra taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula nano galama'.
Pagibit io niayuk ra bibiag tayar ru taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru

Pataako' no taak simbalui koson paringkuanangan, am alap ra sogonggom tapung am solobo' no ginio giu' ra rasawat ru altar. Taak simbalui ti iono paruangon ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Panimbalui i Arun ra sanginan sapi' gawayan am sanginan domba gawayan koson ra taak simbalui koson makibarakat ra
Pabantaa' ri Arun tayar ra mokolomok intor ra sapi' am domba no
giu' ra rasawat ru kubab ru karuruo bibiag no, am ibito' boo ngaangai' no giu' ra altar. Solobo' ri Arun lomok no giu' ra rasawat ru altar.
Pataako' no kubab am paa ru bibiag no koson taak lilion ra
Umpos i Musa am i Arun ralalom Kim ru
Pulali' ru
Paat ra sangarawan, anak-anak ri Arun, i Nadab am i Abigu, nagibit ra intok ru apui nilo sigagama' am suangi' ra baa ru apui. Anii' nilo ra kaminyan rasawat ru baa no, am pataako' ginio ra
Pulali' ru
Indagu boo i Musa ri Arun, “Gitio noyo ondo' koon ru
Pampiau boo i Musa ri Misail am i Ilsapan, anak ilo ri Ujiil, kamaman ri Arun. Indagu i Musa risilo, “Ibok, ibito' baangkai ru pantukir minti mingkual intor ra Kim ru
Ratong ilo am kayango' baangkai no ra nampaguut ra bayang ru baangkai no, am ongoi boo ra liwar ru pangkiman, koson ra nanusuban ri Musa.

Kopongo raginio indagu i Musa ri Arun am anak-anak nano, i Iliajar am i Itamar, “Pai' polosoo' masasung abuk mino, am pai' rilako' bayang mino koson tatandu' ra mangulir. Amon ru baalon min ginio, matoi kau am sumangit
Pai' kau ingkual ra buoi intor ra kulobon ru Kim ru
Indagu
“Pai' noyo okou am anak-anak muno umpos ralalom ru Kim ru
Musiti' kau makapandai mapasuai ra atan ondo' paluntukon ri Aki Kapuuno' am atan ondo' kalo, am atan ondo' kalo majamol am atan ondo' majamol.
Musiti' min ilaan ulun ru Israil ra ngaangai' ukum ondo' tinaakan Ku noyo ramuyun ondo' pinabala' galing ri Musa.”
Akano' ruti' no giu' ra intok ondo' matulai. Ruti' ti intor ra akanon ondo' pinataak noyo ra

Kaa' okou am anak-anak muno, ungkuyon am ruandu' makaakan ra kubab ondo' pinataak koson ra taak lilion am niayuk paa ru bibiag ondo' pataakon koson ra taak lilion, sabap ra ngaangai' no longgom ru imam-imam. Maakan min ginio ra ati ayuk intok ondo' kalo majamol. Taak ti iono tayar intor ra taak simbalui koson makibarakat ra
Musiti' ulun ru Israil magibit ra paa am kubab ru bibiag no paat ra ilo mapataak ra lomok no koson ra taak akanon ra
Paat ri Musa mangkuot intor ra kambing tayar ru taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula, binalaan io ra sinolob noyo kambing no. Gitio nangkinibit ri Musa sumangit ri Iliajar am i Itamar. Kon ri Musa,
“Kua kia kalo inakan min taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula no giu' ra intok ondo' matulai? Taak simbalui raginio matulai kaga' am nanaak noyo
Sabap ra kalo inibit raraa' ru kambing no giu' ralalom ru Kim ru
Taam i Arun, “Amon ru inakan ku taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula no ra orou raiti', mapabansuk kia ginio ra guang ru
Pakaining i Musa ra taam no, naansayan io.
Nanaak
ra tayar ru ulun ru Israil. Maakan mino atan ayuk bibiag ru lantur
ondo' makajajampang am ondo' manapa' ra akanon ra kainduo no.
Kaa' kalo maakan mino unta, karuui batu kapoam arnab. Bibiag-bibiag ragitio karaan ra majamol sabap ra kabalu' pana manapa' ra akanon ra kainduo no, kaa' kolondo' jajampang.
Pai' pangakan ra bauwi. Musiti' karaan bauwi no majamol kabalu' pana makajajampang, kaa' kalo manapa' ra akanon ra kainduo no.
Pai' akano' bibiag-bibiag raginio, am pai' kombongo' baangkai nano; mangajamol bibiag-bibiag raginio.
Maakan mino ngaangai' salinut ru papait ondo' makasunsulur am makasisi',
kaa' kalo maakan mino atan ayuk bibiag ondo' biag giu' ralalom timug am ondo' kolondo' sunsulur am sisi'.
Bibiag koson raginio musiti' karaan ra majamol. Kalo maakan min ginio kapoam mangambong ra baangkai no.
Kalo maakan mino atan ayuk bibiag ondo' biag ralalom timug am ondo' kolondo' sunsulur am sisi'.

Kalo maakan mino susuit-susuit ragitio: Susuit kanui, puok, ngaangai' salinut ru kanui, susuit nasar, bangkaak, susuit unta, susuit camar, susuit ranggung, susuit pucung, am ngaangai' salinut ru susuit kanawai, undan, kosa am bangkawot.
Ngaangai' bibiag mangalumot ondo' makakawo no majamol,
ondo' ayuk am bibiag mangalumot ondo' tumindak.
Maakan mino gapu', ilik am gapu' masansam.
Kaa' ngaangai' bibiag mangalumot ra bokon ondo' makakawo am niayuk ondo' kaam-kaam musiti' karaan ra majamol.

Sasangulun ondo' mangambong ra baangkai ru bibiag ragitio majamol saboi ra tumolop mato ru orou: Ngaangai' bibiag ra makasalindu, ondo' ayuk am ondo' makajajampang am ondo' manapa' ra akanon ra kainduo no, am ngaangai' bibiag ondo' apat kalayam am ondo' makasalindu kumayus. Osoi ondo' magibit ra baangkai salinut ru gitio musiti' mampupu' ra bayang nano, kaa' io magulayun majamol saboi tumolop mato ru orou.
Tikus mondok, tikus, totok, andaatan am ngaangai' salinut ru palaki' sukat musiti' karaan ra majamol.
Sasangulun ondo' mangambong ra bibiag no kapoam baangkai nano, majamol saboi tumolop mato ru orou.

Amon ru maratu' baangkai ru bibiag no ra rasawat ru atan ayuk kuliamos, majamol kuliamos no; intor kia kuliamos no ra tataun, konoon, kungkung kapoam karung, kalo karaan atan pana pamakayan ru kuliamos raginio. Kuliamos raginio musiti' paabugon ra timug, kaa' kuliamos raginio magulayun majamol saboi tumolop mato ru orou.
Amon ru maratu' baangkai no ralalom ru pagangan tana', ngaangai' ondo' soroi ra ralalom no majamol, am musiti' popolon pagangan no.
Atan ayuk akanon ondo' kaindalaman no maakan majamol, amon ru matiu' ra timug intor ra pagangan no, am inumon ondo' soroi ralalom ru pagangan no majamol niayuk.
Atan ayuk ondo' maratuan ru baangkai no majamol. Amon ru kuliamos no oven tana' kapoam rapuan arang, musiti' popolon kuliamos raginio.
Kaa' taur ru timug am tulubong kalo majamol, kabalu' pana ondo' ngaangai' ra bokon no majamol paat ra matiu' ra baangkai no.
Amon ru maratu' rondo' ra baangkai no ra rasawat ru sampug ondo' tonomon, kalo majamol sampug no.
Kaa' amon ru tatanga' abugon sampug no ralalom ru timug am maratu' rondo' ra baangkai no ra rasawat no, majamol sampug no.
Osoi mangambong ra baangkai ru bibiag ondo' kalo majamol masauk ra majamol saboi tumolop mato ru orou.

Osoi mangakan ra atan pana tayar intor ra baangkai ru bibiag no musiti' mampupu' ra bayang nano, kaa' magulayun io majamol saboi tumolop mato ru orou. Osoi magibit ra baangkai no musiti' mampupu' ra bayang nano, kaa' magulayun io majamol saboi tumolop mato ru orou.
Kalo maakan mino bibiag mongoborok ondo' kaam-kaam ra tana',
ondo' kia mamuntana', mugar ra apat kalayam, kapoam ondo' masuang kalayam.
Pai' jamali' inan mino ra mangakan rondo' ra bibiag raginio.
Aku noyo
Aku noyo
Ginio noyo aturan intor ra bibiag, susuit, ngaangai' ondo' biag ralalom timug, am ondo' mugar ra tana'.
Pagilalain mapasuai ra atan ondo' kalo majamol am atan ondo' majamol, bibiag ondo' maakan am bibiag ondo' kalo maakan.
Nanaak
ra tayar ru ulun ru Israil. Paat ra sangulun ruandu' maganak ra sangulun anak ungkuyon, majamol ruandu' no buoi tulu' ngoorou koson buoi io liuran.
Paat ra orou kabalu', moonsoi sunatin anak no.
Kopongo raginio, lakat poyo majamol ruandu' no buoi talu ngoopor ngoorou poyo sabap ra mampuraa'. Kalo makakambong io ra atan pana ondo' pakayon paat ra sambayang, kapoam mumpos ralalom Kim ru

Paat ra sangulun ruandu' maganak ra sangulun anak ruandu', majamol ruandu' no buoi mopor am apat ngoorou koson buoi io liuran. Kopongo raginio, lakat poyo majamol ruandu' no buoi onom ngoopor am onom ngoorou poyo sabap ra mampuraa'.

Paat ra mopongo pamasawan riso no, ondo' kia ra maganak ra anak ungkuyon kapoam anak ruandu', musiti' ruandu' no magibit sanginan anak domba ondo' makaumur sambilor ra imam tayar ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Pataakon boo ru imam no taak ru ruandu' no ra
Nanaak
Amon ru sasangulun no manduruko, mantalipos kapoam lumia' kungkung nano, ondo' maaru' lair masauk ra maruol ru kungkung ondo' maaja', musiti' io paumaan ra imam papag ri Arun.

Ilain ru imam no kagal ru ulun no, am amon ru bulu ru kungkung ra giu' no mapulak noyo am kungkung no malandom noyo intor ra kungkung ru kiing nano, ruruko no maruol ru kungkung ondo' maaja'. Mailayan ru imam ulun no, musiti' no potonowon ra majamol ulun no.
Amon ru ruruko no mapulak kaa' kalo malandom intor ra kungkung ra kiing nano am kalo mapulak bulu ru kungkung, musiti' pasuayon ru imam no ulun raginio buoi tulu' ngoorou.

Paat ra orou katulu', musiti' ilain poyo ru imam no ulun raginio, am amon ru guang ru imam no ruruko no lakat poyo koson ayuk raginio am kalo gumaai, musiti' pasuayon no ulun raginio buoi katuluan poyo.

Paat ra orou katulu', musiti' ilain poyo ru imam no ulun raginio. Amon ru mapali' galing noyo ruruko nano am kalo gumaai, musiti' imam no mapatanou ra mapasau ulun no. Musiti' ulun no mampupu' ra bayang nano am mapasau io boo. Ruruko raginio ruruko ayuk toojo.
Kaa' amon ru gumaai kagal ru ulun no ra mopongo inilayan ru imam am nakatanou ra mapasau io, musiti' ulun no muma' poyo ra imam.
Musiti' imam no magilong poyo ra ulun raginio, am amon ru totopot gumaai ruruko no, musiti' imam no mapatanou ra majamol ulun no. Ruruko no maruol ru kungkung ondo' maaja'.
Paat ra sasangulun marualan ra kungkung ondo' maaja', musiti' io paumaan ra imam.
Ilain io ru imam no. Amon ru mapandayan ru imam ra ruruko ra kungkung ru ulun no mapulak, mampunana' am mapulak bulu ru kungkung no,
ruruko no maruol ru kungkung ondo' maaja'. Musiti' imam no mapatanou ra majamol ulun no. Kalo pana pasuayon ulun no sabap ra napandayan noyo ra majamol io.
Amon ru gumaai maruol ru kungkung no intor ra ulu saboi ra kalayam,

musiti' ilain poyo ru imam no ulun raginio. Amon ru mapandayan ru imam ra maruol no totopot nakai' noyo titikop inan ru ulun no, musiti' imam no mapatanou ra mapasau ulun no. Amon ru mapulak noyo titikop ru kungkung nano, mapasau ulun no.
Kaa' makaujak ayuk ruruko ondo' makanana', majamol ulun no.

Musiti' ilain poyo ru imam no ulun raginio, am amon ru mapandayan ru imam ra ruruko ru ulun no makanana', musiti' imam mapatanou ra majamol ulun no. Ruruko makanana' iono maruol ru kungkung ondo' maaja', am majamol ulun no.
Kaa' amon ru mapali' kungkung no am mapulak saguli', musiti' ulun no muma' ra imam
ra ilain poyo. Amon ru mapulak noyo ruruko nano, mapasau ulun no, am musiti' potonowon ra mapasau ulun no.
Amon ru sasangulun makatalipos ondo' napali' noyo,
kaa' tauli no babaya' ru talipos no makalanit mapulak kapoam lanit mapulak ra malia'-lia', musiti' muma' ulun no ra imam.

Ilain io ru imam, am amon ru lanit no malandom poyo intor ra kungkung ra kiing nano, am bulu ru kungkung ra giu' no mapulak noyo, potonowon ru imam ra majamol ulun no. Maruol nano maruol ru kungkung ondo' maaja' ondo' minuun ra talipos no.

Kaa' amon ru ilain ru imam no talipos no am mapandayan ra bulu ru kungkung ra giu' no kalo mapulak, am tayar raginio kalo malandom poyo intor ra kungkung ra kiing nano, kaa' mabula' poyo, musiti' pasuayon ru imam no ulun raginio buoi katuluan.
Amon ru lanit no gumaai, moonsoi potonowon ru imam no ra majamol ulun no. Marualan ulun no ra kungkung ondo' maaja'.
Kaa' amon ru kalo makulau am kalo gumaai lanit no, babaya' intor ra talipos ayuk lanit no, am musiti' potonowon ru imam no ra mapasau ulun no.
Paat malinsu kungkung ru sasangulun, am kungkung ra napilat no mapulak kapoam mapulak ra malia'-lia',

musiti' io ilain ru imam. Amon ru bulu ru kungkung ra lanit no mapulak am malandom poyo intor ra kungkung ra kiing nano, maruol nano maruol ru kungkung ondo' maaja', ondo' minuun intor ra kungkung ondo' malinsu. Musiti' potonowon ru imam no ra majamol ulun no.

Kaa' amon ru bulu ru kungkung ra lanit no kalo mapulak am lanit no kalo malandom poyo intor ra kungkung ra kiing nano, kaa' makito mabula' poyo, musiti' pasuayon ru imam no ulun raginio buoi katuluan.
Paat orou ra katulu', musiti' ilain poyo ru imam no ulun raginio. Amon ru gumaai lanit no, marualan io ra kungkung ondo' maaja'. Musiti' potonowon ru imam no ra majamol ulun no.

Kaa' amon ru lanit no kalo makulau am kalo gumaai, kaa' ilain ra mabula' poyo, lanit no sala' ka maruol ru kungkung ondo' maaja'. Musiti' potonowon ru imam no ra mapasau ulun no; babaya' ayuk ru nalinsu lanit no.
Paat manduruko sangulun ungkuyon kapoam ruandu' ra ulu kapoam salura nano,

musiti' io ilain ru imam. Amon ru ruruko no malandom poyo intor ra kungkung ra kiing nano, am bulu kapoam jangut ra ruruko no masisilou am sanganu, marualan ulun no ra kungkung ondo' maaja'. Musiti' potonowon ru imam no ra majamol ulun no.

Amon ru mapandayan ru imam ondo' nagilong riso no ra ruruko no kalo malandom poyo intor ra kungkung ra kiing nano, kaa' kolondo' poyo bulu kapoam jangut ondo' moonsoi ra giu' no, musiti' pasuayon ru imam no io buoi katuluan.

Paat orou ra katulu', musiti' io ilain poyo ru imam am amon ru ruruko no kalo gumaai am kolondo' bulu kapoam jangut ondo' masisilou ra giu' no, am ruruko no kalo malandom poyo intor ra kungkung ra kiing nano,
musiti' kauron ru ulun no bulu kapoam jangut nano, ondo' ayuk am kiing ru ruruko no, am musiti' pasuayon ru imam no io buoi katuluan poyo.

Paat orou ra katulu', musiti' ruruko no ilain igondo' poyo ru imam no. Amon ru kalo gumaai ruruko no, am kalo malandom poyo intor ra kungkung ra kiing nano, musiti' potonowon ru imam ra mapasau ulun no. Musiti' pupuin ru ulun no bayang nano am mapasau io boo.
Kaa' amon ru gumaai ruruko no ra makatanou noyo ra mapasau ulun no,
musiti' ilain igondo' poyo ru imam no io. Amon ru giminaai noyo ruruko no, kalo pana maguyum imam ra bulu kapoam jangut ondo' masisilou riso sabap napandayan noyo ra majamol ulun no.
Kaa' amon ra guang ru imam ra kalo gumaai ruruko no, am mokoondo' ra bulu kapoam jangut ondo' moonsoi ra tayar raginio, napali' noyo ruruko no. Musiti' potonowon ru imam ra mapasau ulun no.
Paat makalanit mapulak ra kungkung ru sangulun ungkuyon kapoam ruandu',
musiti' ilain ru imam no ulun raginio. Amon ru mapulak ra mabula' lanit no, lanit raginio sosorom ayuk am mapasau ulun no.
Amon ru naampakan sasangulun ungkuyon tampilon ra saang am tampilon ra bakulung ru ulu nano, kalo majamol ulun no.
Kaa' amon ru mokoondo' mamutining ondo' mapulak ra malia'-lia' giu' ra ampak no, mamutining no maruol ru kungkung ondo' maaja'.
Musiti' ilain ru imam no ulun raginio, am amon ru makaruruko ondo' mapulak ra malia'-lia',
musiti' potonowon ru imam ra majamol ulun no, sabap ra ruruko ra ulu nano maruol ru kungkung ondo' maaja'.
Musiti' sasangulun ondo' marualan ra kungkung ondo' maaja' mambayang ra ondo' marilak am mopoloso ra masasung abuk nano. Musiti' siliin no ragana' ru bulos nano am gumolok, “Majamol! Majamol!”
Magulayun io majamol buoi ra io marualan. Musiti' io mayan ra liwar ru pangkiman, sumuai intor ra ulun bokon.
Amon ru mokoondo' ra kulapuk
kapoam giu' ra putul ru konoon linon kapoam konoon intor ra bulu domba, kapoam giu' ra kungkung kapoam atan ayuk ondo' binaal intor ra kungkung,
am amon ru batik ru kulapuk no masasansam kapoam malia'-lia', kulapuk no salinut ondo' gumaai, am musiti' pakitonon ra imam.
Musiti' ilain ginio ru imam, am pasuayon kuliamos no buoi katuluan.
Paat orou ra katulu', musiti' ilain poyo ru imam no kuliamos no. Amon ru gumaai kulapuk no, majamol kuliamos no.
Musiti' kuliamos no solobon ru imam sabap kulapuk no salinut ondo' gumaai am musiti' solobon.
Kaa' amon ru sumugut ra pagilayan ru imam, kalo gumaai kulapuk no ra kuliamos no,
musiti' manusub imam no ra pupuin kuliamos no am pasuayon buoi katuluan.

Mopongo raginio musiti' ilain ru imam no kuliamos raginio. Amon ru kalo makulau batik ru kulapuk no, kabalu' pana kalo gumaai, lakat poyo majamol kuliamos no. Musiti' solobon ngaangai' kuliamos no, kabalu' pana ondo' natiu' ra kulapuk no tampilon ayuk ra saang kapoam tampilon ra bakulung.
Kaa' paat ra kulapuk no ilain poyo ru imam, am mapandayan ra nakulau noyo batik ru kulapuk no, musiti' rilakon no tampilon raginio intor ra bayang kapoam kuliamos ru kungkung no.
Amon ru mujak saguli' kulapuk no, baal ragitio makaarati' ra gumaai poyo kulapuk. Musiti' solobon ru tatangan no kuliamos raginio.
Amon ru malulu' kulapuk no ra mapupuan, musiti' pupuin poyo kuliamos no, am mapasau boo kuliamos no.

Gitilo noyo aturan intor ra kulapuk ra bayang ondo' binaal intor ra bulu domba kapoam linon, kapoam giu' ra konoon linon kapoam konoon intor ra bulu domba, kapoam ra atan ayuk ondo' binaal intor ra kungkung. Gitio noyo ralan no koson mangaru' ru rorondo' kuliamos no mapasau kapoam majamol.
Nanaak
aturan ragitilo intor ra upacara pamasawan ra sasangulun ondo' mapali' noyo intor ra maruol ru kungkung ondo' maaja'. Paat ra orou pinatanou ra ulun no mapasau, musiti' io ibiton ra imam.
Imam pana mongoi giu' ra liwar ru pangkiman am ilain ulun no. Amon ru napali' noyo maruol no,
manusub imam ra ulun magibit ruo ngainan susuit ondo' kalo majamol am ondo' biag, saputul tataun sidar, rondo' tali malia' am rondo' isop.
Imam pana manusub ra ulun maa' raginio manimbalui ra sanginan ra susuit no giu' ra rasawat ru pagangan tana' ondo' suang no timug intor ra taur ru timug.
Mangalap io ra susuit sanginan no poyo am pososopon no ralalom ru raraa' ru susuit ondo' sinimbalui no, mabaya' ra tataun sidar, tali malia' am isop no.

Patakison ru imam raraa' no intulu' ra ulun ondo' kapasawon intor ra maruol ru kungkung ondo' maaja', am potonowon no ra mapasau ulun no. Palabuson boo ru imam susuit ondo' biag no giu' ra tana' malimparang.

Ulun ondo' nakatanou noyo ra mapasau no musiti' mampupu' ra bayang nano, kaurin no ngaangai' abuk nano, am mariu'; am mapasau io boo. Makaumpos io ralalom ru pangkiman, kaa' musiti' io mayan ra liwar ru kim nano buoi katuluan.
Paat orou ra katulu', musiti' igondo' poyo kaurin no abuk nano, jangut nano, am ngaangai' bulu ru kungkung ondo' soroi ra inan nano. Musiti' no pupuin bayang nano am mariu', am mapasau io boo.

Paat orou ra kabalu', musiti' io magibit ruo ngainan anak domba gawayan am sanginan anak domba ruandu' umur no sambilor, ondo' ngaangai' no kalo najamaran, am niayuk talu ngakilo tapung ondo' naratok ra umau jaitun am niayuk sampitalu ngalito umau jaitun.
Magibit imam ra ulun no am ngaangai' taak no giu' ra kulobon ru Kim ru
Mapataak boo imam no ra sanginan intor ra anak domba gawayan no am sampitalu ngalito umau jaitun no koson taak mambayar ra kalubatan. Mapataak io ra taak ti koson ra taak lilion ra
Musiti' simbaluyon ru imam anak domba no giu' ra intok mapasau, intok ru ulun manimbalui ra bibiag tayar ru taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula am taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Mangalap imam ra sanganu raraa' ru anak domba no am pakupilon ra talingo pamiris, pangina' ru kalindu' ra pamiris, am ra pangina' ru kalayam ra pamiris ra ulun ondo' potonowon ra mapasau.
Mangalap boo imam ra sanganu intor ra umau jaitun am lingigon ra palar ru kalindu' ra kait nano,
am pososopon no boo bubua' ru kalindu' ra pamiris nano ra umau no am patakison no intulu' giu' ralalom Kim ru

Musiti' imam mangalap ra sanganu umau ra palar ru kalindu' nano am sanganu intor ra raraa' ru anak domba, am pakupilon no ra talingo pamiris, pangina' ru kalindu' ra pamiris, am pangina' ru kalayam ra pamiris ra ulun ondo' potonowon ra mapasau.
Paluiton boo ru imam suwo ru umau ra palar ru kalindu' nano ra ulu ru ulun no. Kon raginii noyo imam no ra mapaugar ra upacara pamasawan.
Musiti' pataakon boo ru imam taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula am mambaal ra upacara pamasawan. Mopongo raginio musiti' no simbaluyon bibiag tayar ru taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
am mapataak raginio mabaya' ra taak simbalui koson paringkuanangan ra

Amon ru musikin ulun no am kalo makapanaak ra taak ondo' inaru', tayar ru pamasawan riso no makapapataak io ra sanginan ayuk anak domba gawayan tayar ru taak mambayar ra kalubatan, iono taak lilion ra
Musiti' io niayuk magibit ruo ngainan susuit asang kapoam maningkuluuk, sanginan tayar ru taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula am sanginan poyo tayar ru taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Paat orou ra kabalu' paat pamasawan ra ulun no, musiti' io niayuk magibit ra ngaangai' taak no ra imam giu' ra kulobon ru Kim ru
Alapon ru imam anak domba no am umau jaitun no am mapataak raginilo koson taak lilion ra
Manimbalui io ra anak domba no am mangalap ra sanganu raraa' no, am pakupilon ginio ra talingo pamiris, pangina' ru kalindu' ra pamiris, am ra pangina' ru kalayam ra pamiris ru ulun no.
Lingigon ru imam sanganu ra umau no ra palar ru kalindu' ra kait nano galama',
am ra kalindu' pamiris nano patakison no umau no intulu' giu' ralalom Kim ru
Musiti' pakupilon ru imam sanganu umau no ra intok napakupilan no ra raraa' no: ra talingo pamiris ru ulun no, ra pangina' ru kalindu' ra pamiris nano, am ra pangina' ru kalayam ra pamiris nano.
Musiti' pakupilon ru imam suwo ru umau ra palar kalindu' nano ra ulu ru ulun no koson upacara pamasawan ra inan nano ra saang ru
Musiti' imam mapataak boo ra sanginan intor ra ruo ngainan susuit asang kapoam maningkuluuk no
koson ra taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula, am sanginan poyo tayar ru taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Gitio noyo aturan ra ulun ondo' marualan ra kungkung ondo' maaja', kaa' kalo makabayar ra taak ondo' inaru' noyo tayar ru upacara pamasawan riso.
Nanaak
ra aturan ragitilo intor ra baloi ondo' natiu' ra kulapuk ondo' gumaai. Aturan ragitilo musiti' gagayaan ru ngaangai' ulun ru Israil mopongo mumpos ralalom pagun Kanaan, ondo' taakin ru

Manusub imam ra maa' raginio ngaangai' ondo' soroi ralalom ru baloi no paingkualon ra io kalo poyo magilong ra kulapuk no. Amon ru kalo, ngaangai' ondo' soroi ralalom baloi no potonowon ra majamol. Mopongo raginio mongoi imam no ra baloi no
am magilong ra kulapuk ra giu' no. Amon ru gumutitikan ra masansam-sansam kapoam malia'-lia' ondo' makito nakalabat ra rinding batu no,
musiti' io mingkual intor ra baloi no am pioton no buoi katuluan.
Paat orou ra katulu', sumaguli' imam mongoi pagilong ra kulapuk no. Amon ru gumaai kulapuk no,
musiti' io manusub maa' raginio batu-batu ondo' natiu' ra kulapuk no iruon am patirin giu' ra intok majamol ra liwar ru bandar.
Mopongo raginio musiti' titikop rinding batu ru baloi no kauron, am nakaur no patirin giu' ra intok majamol ra liwar ru bandar.
Musiti' batu-batu ondo' baguon pakayon koson pamalit ra batu-batu ondo' pinatiran noyo. Musiti' titikop ru rinding batu no angkupin ra simin baguon.
Amon ru mujak saguli' kulapuk no ra ralalom ru baloi ra maaligan noyo batu-batu, am rinding batu no makauran noyo am maangkupan noyo saguli' ra simin,
musiti' imam mongoi poyo pagilong. Amon ru gumaai kulapuk no, majamol baloi no.
Musiti' lunsayon baloi no, am batu-batu, tataun no am ngaangai' angkup ru simin no musiti' ibiton ra liwar ru bandar, giu' ra intok majamol.
Osoi ondo' mumpos ralalom baloi no paat lakat poyo napiot, majamol io saboi mokotolop mato ru orou.
Osoi ondo' mombolong kapoam mangakan giu' ra ralalom baloi no, musiti' mampupu' ra bayang nano.

Kaa' makaratong imam mongoi pagilong ra baloi no, am sumugut ra pagilangan nano kolondo' boo kulapuk giu' ra ralalom baloi ondo' inangkupan saguli' no, musiti' potonowon ru imam ra baloi no mapasau sabap ngaangai' kulapuk nairu' noyo.
Koson mapapasau ra baloi no, musiti' imam no magibit ruo ngainan susuit, tataun sidar, rondo' tali am rondo' Isop.
Musiti' simbaluyon ru imam sanginan intor ra susuit no giu' rasawat ru pagangan tana' ondo' makasuang ra timug mapasau intor ra taur ru timug.

Musiti' imam mangalap boo ra tataun sidar, Isop, tali malia', am susuit ondo' biag no, am pososopon no boo ngaangai' no ra raraa' ru susuit ondo' sinimbalui noyo am niayuk ra timug mapasau no; am musiti' no patakison intulu' ra baloi no.
Kon ragitio noyo imam no mapapasau ra baloi no ra raraa' ru susuit, timug mapasau, susuit ondo' biag, tataun sidar, Isop am tali malia' no.
Musiti' no palabuson boo susuit ondo' biag no giu' ra liwar ru bandar, giu' ra tana' malimparang. Kon ragitio noyo imam no nambaal ra upacara pamasawan ra baloi no, am mapasau boo baloi no.
Gitilo noyo aturan intor ra maruol ru kungkung ondo' maaja';
kagal, talipos kapoam lanit; am niayuk intor ra kulapuk ra bayang kapoam baloi.
Aturan ragitilo mangaru' ru rorondo' kuliamos no majamol kia kapoam mapasau.
Nanaak
ra tayar ru ulun ru Israil. Paat mingkual timug intor ra tingkuangon ru sasangulun ungkuyon sabap maruol mologo, majamol timug raginio,
timug ondo' tumilis kapoam moorot, majamol ulun no.
Majamol niayuk katil intok nanturungan am nambalangan ru ulun no.
Osoi ayuk mangambong ra katil ru ungkuyon ondo' nangingkual ra timug no,
kapoam manturung ra atan ayuk ondo' naturungan noyo ru ungkuyon no, musiti' mampupu' ra bayang nano am mariu', kaa' magulayun io majamol saboi tumolop mato ru orou.
Osoi ayuk mangambong ra ungkuyon ondo' nangingkual ra timug, musiti' mampupu' ra bayang nano am mariu', am magulayun ulun no majamol saboi tumolop mato ru orou.
Amon ru mantiwog ungkuyon ondo' nangingkual ra timug no ra sasangulun ondo' mapasau, musiti' ulun mapasau no mampupu' ra bayang nano am mariu', am magulayun io majamol saboi tumolop mato ru orou.
Pelana kapoam atan ayuk turungin ru ungkuyon ondo' nangingkual ra timug no masauk ra majamol niayuk.

Osoi ayuk mangambong ra atan ayuk ondo' naturungan noyo ru ungkuyon no, majamol io niayuk saboi tumolop mato ru orou. Osoi ayuk mangkayang ra atan ayuk ondo' naturungan noyo ru ulun no musiti' mampupu' ra bayang nano am niayuk mariu', am magulayun io majamol saboi tumolop mato ru orou.

Amon ru kumambong sangulun ungkuyon ondo' nangingkual ra timug no ra ulun bokon ra kalo poyo nambagu' ra kalindu' nano, musiti' ulun kinambong no mampupu' ra bayang nano am niayuk mariu', am magulayun io majamol saboi tumolop mato ru orou.
Musiti' popolon moonong pagangan tana' ondo' kinambong ru ungkuyon ondo' nangingkual ra timug no, am moonong kuliamos intor ra tataun ondo' kinambong nano musiti' liungin.
Kopongo ungkuyon no mapali', musiti' io maginaa io saboi katuluan, am mampupu' ra bayang nano am mariu' ra timug intor ra taur ru timug, am io pana mapasau.
Paat orou ra kabalu', musiti' ungkuyon no magibit ruo ngainan susuit asang kapoam ruo ngainan susuit maningkuluuk giu' ra kulobon ru Kim ru
Mapataak imam ra sanginan intor ra susuit no koson taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula am sanginan poyo koson ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Paat mingkual uwa' intor ra sasangulun ungkuyon, musiti' io mariu', kaa' magulayun io majamol saboi tumolop mato ru orou.
Atan ayuk ondo' binaal intor ra konoon kapoam kungkung ondo' natiu' ru uwa' no musiti' pupuin, am magulayun kuliamos no majamol saboi tumolop mato ru orou.
Mopongo marulug, musiti' ungkuyon am poyo ruandu' mariu', am magulayun ilo majamol saboi tumolop mato ru orou.
Paat sangulun ruandu' tatanga' liuran, majamol io buoi katuluan. Majamol osoi ayuk mangambong riso saboi tumolop mato ru orou.
Atan ayuk ondo' turungin kapoam kaalangin ru ruandu' no paat io liuran, kuliamos no pana majamol.
Osoi ayuk mangambong ra katil ru ruandu' no kapoam atan ayuk ondo' naturungan no noyo, musiti' pupuin ru ulun bayang nano am niayuk mariu', am magulayun io majamol saboi tumolop mato ru orou.

Amon ru marulug sangulun ungkuyon ra ruandu' ondo' tatanga' liuran, najamalan ungkuyon no ra jamol ru ruandu' no, am ungkuyon no pana majamol buoi katuluan. Moonong intok pambalangan ru ungkuyon no majamol niayuk.

Amon ru kasarungan sangulun ruandu' buoi kukula' ngoorou ra sala' ka paat io liuran, kapoam amon ru raraa' mingkual no kalo poyo mataru' mopongo io liuran ra kaindalaman no, majamol io buoi ru raraa' no mingkual, koson paat io liuran.
Moonong intok kaalangan nano, kapoam atan ayuk ondo' turungin nano paat raginio pana majamol.
Majamol osoi ayuk ondo' mangambong ra kuliamos no am musiti' mampupu' ra bayang nano am mariu'; magulayun ulun no majamol saboi tumolop mato ru orou.
Mataru' kasarungan no, musiti' ruandu' no maginaa buoi katuluan, am io pana mapasau.
Paat orou ra kabalu', musiti' io magibit ra imam ruo ngainan susuit asang kapoam ruo ngainan susuit maningkuluuk giu' ra kulobon ru Kim ru
Mapataak imam no ra sanginan intor ra susuit no koson taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula am sanginan poyo koson taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Ginio noyo nanusub

Ginio noyo aturan intor ra ulun nangingkual ra timug sabap ra maruol mologo, am intor ra ungkuyon ondo' nangingkual ra uwa', am intor ra ruandu' ondo' tatanga' liuran, am intor ra ungkuyon marulug ra ruandu' ondo' majamol.
Kopongo minatoi ruo ngaulun anak ungkuyon ri Arun sabap ra nampataak ra apui ondo' kalo kasagaan ru

“Balai' i Arun, maayo muno, ra paat ra ondo' inaru' ayuk, mokoongoi io ra talikuron ru tabir, mongoi ralalom ru Lamin Matulai Kaga', sabap ra giu' no mintalang Aku ralalom ru gaun rasawat ru tataub ru Kaban Nabantuan. Amon ru manggal i Arun ra susuban raginio, matoi io.

Makaumpos io ra ralalom ru Lamin Matulai Kaga' ra io mopongo ayuk magibit ra sanginan sapi' gawayan mamulok tayar ru taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula am sanginan domba gawayan tayar ru taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru

Musiti' i Arun manutun ra aturan ragitilo. Kalo poyo mumpos i Arun ra Lamin Matulai Kaga', musiti' io mariu' am mambayang ra bayang ru imam; sukub, saluar mariwa', abot am serban, ondo' ngaangai' no binaal intor ra konoon linon.
Musiti' ulun ru Israil manaak ri Arun ra ruo ngainan kambing gawayan tayar ru taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula, am sanginan domba gawayan tayar ru taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Musiti' io mapataak ra sanginan sapi' gawayan tayar ru taak simbalui koson mamuso ra tula nano galama' am tula ru sasambaloi nano.
Musiti' io magibit boo ra ruo ngainan kambing no giu' ra kulobon ru Kim ru
Giu' no musiti' no undion mampakai ra ruo batu: ondo' tatanduin rondo' no ra “Tayar ru
Simbaluyon ri Arun kambing ondo' napili' ra tayar ru
Kambing ondo' napili' ra tayar ru Ajajil, musiti' pataakon ra io biag no ra
Makataak ri Arun sapi' gawayan no tayar ru taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula nano galama' am sasambaloi nano,
musiti' io magibit rondo' intok ru baa ondo' nototop ra baa ru apui intor ra altar am ruo ngogonggom kaminyan malumot, ibiton boo ngaangai' no mumpos ralalom ru Lamin Matulai Kaga'.

Giu' no, giu' ra saang ru Kaban Nabantuan, musiti' io monolob ra kaminyan no am lisun ru kaminyan no manaub ra tataub ru Kaban Nabantuan maa' raginio tataub no kalo makito ri Arun; amon ru makito no tataub no, matoi io.
Musiti' io mangalap sanganu ra raraa' ru sapi' gawayan no, am ra bubua' ru kalindu' nano patakison raraa' no tampilon saang ru tataub ru Kaban Nabantuan am intulu' giu' ra saang ru Kaban no.

Kon ragitio noyo io nambaal ra upacara koson mapatulai ra Lamin Matulai Kaga' intor ra kajamalan ru ulun ru Israil am intor ra ngaangai' tula nilo. Musiti' io mambaal ra upacara ragitio tayar ru tampilon ra bokon no ra Kim ru
Kolondo' sangulun pana posoroyon ralalom ru Kim ru
musiti' io mongoi ra altar intok monolob ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru

Ra bubua' ru kalindu' nano boo, musiti' io mapatakis ra raraa' no ra rasawat ru altar suang intulu'. Kon ragitio noyo io mapapasau ra altar no intor ra jamol ru ulun ru Israil, am mapasauk ra altar no mapasau.
Pakapambaal i Arun ra upacara mapatulai ra Lamin Matulai Kaga', tayar ra bokon ra Kim ru

Musiti' i Arun mapabanta' ra karuo-ruo kalindu' nano ra rasawat ru ulu ru kambing no am mangiou ra ngaangai' kalaatan, tula am ginuaran ru ulun ru Israil. Ginio noyo ra ngaangai' tula ru ulun ru Israil patapikon ra rasawat ru ulu ru kambing no. Musiti' kambing no anjungon boo giu' ra tana' kaagisan ru sangulun ondo' sinusub noyo mapaugar raginio.
Magibit kambing no ra ngaangai' tula ru ulun ru Israil maalur giu' ra tana' kolondo' tutuu', ondo' kalo inayanan ru ulun. Palabuson boo kambing no giu' ra tana' kaagisan.
Musiti' io mariu' giu' ra rondo' intok ondo' inaru' ra mapasau, bayangon no boo bayang nano galama'. Mopongo raginio musiti' io mingkual, mampataak boo ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Musiti' io monolob ra lomok ru bibiag ondo' pataakon tayar ru taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula, giu' ra rasawat ru altar.
Ulun ondo' mapalabus ra kambing gawayan tayar ru Ajajil giu' ra tana' kaagisan, musiti' mampupu' ra bayang nano am mariu' ra kalo poyo muli' ra pangkiman.

Sapi' gawayan am kambing ondo' pataakon tayar ru taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula, am ondo' raraa' no ibiton giu' ra ralalom ru Lamin Matulai Kaga' tayar mamuso ra tula, musiti' ibiton mingkual giu' ra liwar ru pangkiman am solobon. Kungkung, kual am tinai' ru karuruo bibiag no musiti' solobon ngaangai' no.
Ulun ondo' monolob no musiti' mampupu' ra bayang nano am mariu' ra kalo poyo muli' ra pangkiman.
Paat ra orou raginio musiti' baalon upacara mamasau risilo intor ra ngaangai' tula maa' raginio mapasau ilo.
Orou raginio iono orou ondo' matulai kaga', paat ra ulun ru Israil mampali am lingon kalo mangandoi. Musiti' aturan ragitilo gagayaan ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Tingganai Maayo Imam ondo' patimpokon noyo koson sumuali ra ama' nano, am palilion ayuk ri Aki Kapuuno', musiti' mambaal ra upacara pamasawan. Musiti' io mambayang ra bayang ru imam,
am mambaal ra upacara papatulayan ra Lamin Matulai Kaga', tampilon ra bokon ru Kim ru
Aturan ragitilo musiti' gagayaan ra sabuoi-buoi no. Musiti' baalon upacara ragitio igondo' sambilor koson mapapasau ra ulun ru Israil intor ra ngaangai' tula nilo.
Ginio ra, baalon ngaangai' no koson ra nanusuban ru
Nanusub
maa' raginio manaak ri Arun am anak-anak nano ra aturan ragitilo, am ra ngaangai' ulun ru Israil.
Paat sangulun Israil no mapataak ra
Susuban ragitio makaarati' ra intor paat raginio, musiti' ulun ru Israil magibit ra ngaangai' bibiag ondo' masaga' pataakon giu' Kim ru
Musiti' pawason ru imam raraa' ru bibiag no ra sapapa'-sapapa' ru altar giu' ra saang ru kulobon ru Kim, am monolob ra lomok ru bibiag no maa' raginio owou no mapabansuk ra guang ru
Musiti' ulun ru Israil magulayun gumagaya' ra
Paat sangulun Israil kapoam sangulun bansa' ru bokon ondo' minayan ra popolos ru ulun ru Israil mapataak ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
ra
Painawo ru moonong ondo' maayag soroi ra ralalom ru raraa' nano. Ginio sabap ra nanaak
Ginio sabap ra manginggalar

Ulun ru Israil kapoam bansa' ru bokon ondo' minayan risilo, ondo' mamparakop ra sanginan bibiag kapoam susuit ra mapasau, musiti' mapasasar ra raraa' ru bibiag no ra tana' am taubin raraa' no ra tana'.
Painawo ru moonong ondo' maayag soroi ra ralalom ru raraa' nano. Ginio sabap ra nambala'

Osoi ayuk, ulun ru Israil kapoam ulun bansa' ru bokon, ondo' mangakan ra raraa' ru bibiag ondo' minatoi noyo, ondo' minatoi toojo kapoam ondo' sinaam ru bibiag masigo, musiti' mampupu' ra bayang nano am niayuk mariu', am maginaa saboi tumolop mato ru orou, am io pana mapasau saguli'.
Amon ru kalo pupuin no bayang nano am kalo mariu', musiti' io mansaan ra sonor no.
Nanusub
mambala' ra ulun ru Israil ra bala' ragitio, “Aku noyo
Pai' tiluo' binaal ru ulun giu' ra Misir, pagun inayanan min ragili, am pai' tiluo' binaal ru ulun giu' ra Kanaan, intok pagibitan Kuno ramuyun.
Gagayaa' noyo ukum Kuno am baalo' noyo atan panusuban Kuno. Aku noyo
Suguto' ngaangai' ukum am susuban ondo' taakin Kuno ramuyun. Ulun ondo' mambaal raginio maayag. Aku noyo
Nanaak
Pai' asabi' ama' muno ra marulug ra ina' muno. Pai' asabi' ina' muno galama'.
Pai' asabi' ama' muno ra marulug ra sangulun intor ra andu' nano.
Pai' parulug ra pabukat ruandu' muno, ondo' kia ra pongkotob kapoam pansukapu, ondo' kia ra nasukor nabaya' rirun ra rondo' baloi kapoam giu' baloi ra bokon.
Pai' parulug ra akupu ruandu' muno. Baal ragitio magasab rirun galama'.
Pai' parulug ra pabukat ruandu' muno, ondo' kia rondo' ama' nansuai ra ina' kapoam rondo' ina' nansuai ra ama', sabap io pana pabukat muno.
Pai' parulug ra kaminan muno, ondo' kia pabukat ru ama' kapoam pabukat ru ina' muno.
Pai' parulug ra andu' ru kamaman muno; io kaminan mu niayuk.
Pai' parulug ra anak mangiwan ra ruandu' muno
kapoam along ra ruandu' muno.
Pai' parulug ra anak ruandu' kapoam akupu ruandu' ru sangulun ruandu' ondo' nakarulug noyo rirun. Maaru' lair mabukat ilo rirun, am baal raginio baal ondo' makauyuyu'.
Pai' paguot ra pabukat ruandu' ru andu' muno buoi ru andu' muno lakat poyo maayag.
Pai' parulug ra andu' ru ulun bokon, baal raginio mampajamol rirun.
Pai' pataako' sangulun intor ra anak muno alapon ra taak koson pataakon ra Dewa Molok, sabap ra baal raginio magasab ra inggalan ri Aki Kapuuno' muno, iono
Ungkuyon kalo parulugon ra ungkuyon ra bokon. Masisang i Aki Kapuuno' ra baal raginio.
Ungkuyon kapoam ruandu', kalo toojo parulugon ra bibiag. Baal raginio mapajamol ramuyun.
Pai' jamali' inan mino ra baal raginio. Kon noyo ginio bansa' raginilo ondo' minayan ra pagun Kanaan ra kalo poyo akau, napajamol noyo ra inan nilo. Ginio sabap ra napagiru'
Binaal nilono napajamol ra pagun no. Ginio sabap ra nangukum

Nambaal ilo ra ngaangai' baal jajajou am niayuk napajamol ra pagun no, kaa' akau inggalarin mambaal raginio. Akau ngaangai', ondo' ulun ru Israil kapoam ulun bansa' ru bokon, musiti' gumagaya' ra ukum am susuban ru
Kon raginio kalo pagiruon kau intor ra pagun no koson ra bansa'-bansa' ondo' minayan ra giu' i ra pinagiru' ragili.
Makapandai kau ra osoi ondo' mambaal ra baal jajajou no, kalo boo karaan ra ulun ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Indagu
Nanusub
mambala' ra ulun ru Israil, “Musiti' kau matulai sabap ra matulai Aku
Musiti' moonong ulun mangurumat ra ama' am ina' nano, am niayuk mangiantak ra orou Sabat koson ra nanusuban Kuno. Aku noyo
“Paat ra akau manimbalui ra bibiag tayar ru taak simbalui koson makibarakat ra
Musiti' kual no akanon paat ra orou ru bibiag no simbaluyon kapoam paat ra orou suabon no. Kual ondo' soroi ra paat ra orou katalu no musiti' solobon,
sabap ra kual no kalo mapasau. Amon ru osoi mangakan raginio, kalo mangapu Aku ra taak no.
Makasala osoi mangakan raginio, sabap ra binaal nano ra atan ondo' pinataak noyo Raki' no ra akanon toojo ayuk; kalo boo karaan ulun no ra ulun Kuno.
Pai' timungo' kawa' ru anggur ondo' matatang ra mopongo akau mangupu' ra kasaa'; pai' anamo' kawa' ru anggur ondo' maratu'. Tatango' ginilo ngaangai' ra ulun musikin am ulun bansa' ru bokon. Aku noyo
Pai' ulaso' ulun barat, am pai' pabantaa' batu kasaruan ra saang ru ulun bolou saboi maratu' io. Musiti' kau malaa' Raki'; Aku noyo
Pai' potonowo' ragu sinimbaal intor ra ulun bokon. Paat ra bisaraan sasangulun no, pai' pangani' ra inono' magabau ondo' mangkinibit ra ulun no ukumin ra matoi. Aku noyo
Pai' balos malikokot ra osoi pana, kapoam mararayus masisang ra ulun. Tagami' noyo ulun ra bokon koson okou mitotogom galama'. Aku noyo

“Amon ru sangulun ulipon ruandu' binantuan ra sangulun ungkuyon koson saukon ra parulug nano, kaa' kalo poyo nabayaran ruandu' no, am amon ru sangulun ungkuyon ra bokon narulug ra ulipon ruandu' no, musiti' ilo ruo ukumin,
Musiti' ungkuyon no magibit ra sanginan domba gawayan giu' ra kulobon ru Kim ru
Mapataak imam ra domba no ralalom upacara pamasawan koson mamuso ra tula ru ulun no, am mangampun i Aki Kapuuno' riso.
“Paat ra akau mumpos ra pagun ru Kanaan am mantanom ra puun ru kinawa' salinut ru atan pana, karaan noyo ra kinawa' ru puun no majamol buoi talu ngambilor ra kasaa', am kalo maakan min ginio.
Paat ra bilor kaapat, musiti' ngaangai' kawa' no patimpokon koson ra taak mambala' ra paringkuanangan min Raki',
Paat ra bilor kalimo, am maakan min boo kawa' ru puun no. Amon ru mambaal kau koon raginio, puun ru kinawa' mino mangkawa' ra masuang poyo. Aku noyo
Pai' lomporo' abuk ra pusisingo muno kapoam lomporon jangut muno.
Pai' baliso' kungkung muno, kapoam pilato' inan muno koson ra tatandu' mangulir ra ulun matoi. Aku noyo
“Pai' tauyuo' anak ruandu' muno ra mapasauk risilo ra ruandu' mantalan ra inan giu' ra kuil.
Iantakon orou Sabat am urumaton intok sumamba Raki'. Aku noyo
“Panangguang noyo am urumato' noyo ulun ondo' matutuo noyo. Musiti' kau mangurumat am malaa' Raki', sabap ra Aku noyo
Koonsoi kano risilo koson akau moonsoi ra ulun mino galama', am tagami' ilo koson akau mitotogom galama'. Karaa' ra nakaili' kau nagayan koson ra ulun bansa' ru bokon giu' ra pagun ru Misir. Aku noyo
Pakayo' noyo batu timbangan, timbangan am tukuan ondo' motopot. Aku noyo
Gagaya' no ra ukum am susuban Kuno; Aku noyo
Nanusub

mambala' ra ulun ru Israil, “Osoi ayuk ra popolos mino, kapoam ulun bansa' ru bokon ra popolos mino, ondo' mapataak ra anak nano koson ra taak simbalui ra Dewa Molok, musiti' bobolon saboi matoi ru ngaangai' mamagun.
Osoi ayuk mapataak ra sangulun intor ra anak nano ra Dewa Molok, mapajamol ra Kim Kuno am magasab ra inggalan Kuno ondo' matulai. Mangukum Aku riso am kalo boo karaan io ra ulun Kuno.
Kaa' amon ru siliin ru mamagun mato ra baalon ru ulun no, am kalo mangukum ra ulun no ra matoi,
am Aku galama' boo mangukum riso am ngaangai' sasambaloi nano, am niayuk ngaangai' ulun ondo' mababaya' riso mangiruan Raki' am sumamba ra Dewa Molok. Kalo boo mangkara' Aku risilo ra ulun Kuno.
“Osoi ayuk mongoi pakibilin intor ra ulun ondo' mapandai makimansunur ra ambiluo ru ulun namagatoi, ukumin Ku am kalo boo mangkara' Aku ra ulun Kuno.
Ilai' min maa' raginio magulayun kau matulai, sabap ra Aku noyo
Gagaya' no ra ukum Kuno, sabap ra Aku noyo
Sangulun ondo' narulug ra sangulun intor ra andu' ru ama' nano, magasab ra ama' nano; musiti' io am ruandu' no ukumin ra matoi. Matoi ilo sabap ra kasalaan nilo galama'.
Amon ru sangulun ungkuyon marulug ra anak mangiwan ra ruandu' nano, musiti' ilo ruo ukumin ra matoi. Nambaal ilo noyo ra baal makauyuyu', am matoi ilo sabap ra kasalaan nilo galama'.
Amon ru sangulun ungkuyon marulug ra ungkuyon ra bokon, nambaal ilo ra baal makauyuyu'. Musiti' ilo ruo no ukumin ra matoi; matoi ilo sabap ra kasalaan nilo galama'.

Amon ru sangulun ungkuyon maguot ra sangulun ruandu' am ina' ru ruandu' no niayuk, musiti' ilo tatalu no solobon saboi matoi, sabap ra binaal nilono makauyuyu'. Binaal koson raginio kalo iowon ra popolos mino.
Amon ru sangulun ungkuyon marulug ra sanginan bibiag, musiti' io am bibiag no ukumin ra matoi.
Amon ru sangulun ruandu' kuminam marulug ra sanginan bibiag, musiti' ruandu' no am bibiag no ukumin ra matoi. Matoi karuruo no sabap ra kasalaan galama'.
Amon ru sangulun ungkuyon marulug ra sangulun ruandu' ondo' tatanga' liuran, karuruo no kalo boo karaan ra ulun Kuno.
Amon ru sangulun ungkuyon marulug ra andu' ru kamaman nano, magasab io ra kamaman nano. Musiti' ungkuyon am ruandu' no magantung ra ukuman nilo galama'; ilo ruo kalo makaalap ra anak.
Amon ru sangulun ungkuyon mamundus ra andu' ru maayo ungkuyon nano, matoi ilo ruo ra kolondo' anak. Nambaal noyo ungkuyon no ra baal makauyuyu', am magasab io ra maayo ungkuyon nano.”
Indagu
Pai' tilu ra kaulayan ru bansa' ondo' namagun ra giu' no. Pagiruon Ku ilo maa' raginio makaumpos kau ra pagun no. Napajala' ilo Raki' sabap ra binaal nilo ondo' makauyuyu'.
Kaa' binantu' Ku noyo ra manaak ramuyun ra pagun ondo' langkaya' am malabung no. Masauk pagun no longgom min. Aku noyo

Ginio ra musiti' kau mapandai mapasuai ra bibiag am susuit ondo' maakan am bibiag am susuit ondo' kalo maakan. Pai' akano' bibiag kapoam susuit ondo' kalo maakan. Nambala' Aku noyo ra ngaangai' no majamol. Amon ru mangakan kau, majamol kau niayuk.
Musiti' kau matulai am masauk ra longgom Kuno ayuk, sabap ra Aku noyo
Moonong ungkuyon kapoam ruandu' ondo' mapandai makimansunur ra ambiluo ru ulun namagatoi, musiti' bobolon saboi matoi. Ulun ondo' mambaal ragitio matoi sabap ra kasalaan galama'.”
Nanusub
ondo' ak am ulun matoi no ina' nano, ama' nano, anak ungkuyon nano, anak ruandu' nano, pabukat ungkuyon nano,
kapoam pabukat ruandu' nano ondo' kalo poyo inuot am minayan rondo' baloi riso.
Kalo mijamol io ra inan ra maya' ra upacara pampalabangan ra pabukat ru andu' nano.
Musiti' sangulun imam matulai am kalo iowon magasab ra inggalan Kuno. Mapataak io Raki' ra taak akanon, sabap raginio musiti' io no matulai.
Sangulun imam kalo iowon maguot ra ruandu' mantalan ra inan, kapoam ruandu' ondo' kalo boo ralaa, kapoam ruandu' ra inali noyo, sabap ra patimpokon noyo imam Raki'.
Musiti' ulun ru Israil mangakun ra imam koson ulun pinatimpok Raki' sabap ra mapataak imam Raki' ra taak akanon. Aku noyo
Amon ru anak ruandu' ru sangulun imam masauk ra ruandu' mantalan ra inan, magasab io ra ama' nano; musiti' ruandu' no solobon saboi matoi.

“Patimpokon noyo Tingganai Maayo Imam ra pinasasar umau upacara ra ulu nano, am pinambayang io ra bayang ru tingganai maayo imam. Ginio ra kalo polosoon no abuk nano masasung, kapoam mamparilak ra bayang nano koson mapakito ra mangulir io.

Pinatimpok io noyo Raki', ginio ra kalo mijamol io ra inan. Kalo pairuanin riso Kim Kuno am mumpos ra baloi ru mokoondo' ra baangkai, kabalu' pana baangkai no ama' kapoam ina' nano galama'. Mapajamol binaal nano ra Kim Kuno.
Musiti' maguot Tingganai Maayo Imam ra sangulun ruandu' ondo' lakat poyo ralaa.

Kalo paguoton io ra sangulun napuor, kapoam ruandu' ondo' inali noyo, kapoam ruandu' ondo' ragili mantalan ra inan. Paguoton io ayuk ra sangulun ruandu' ondo' lakat poyo ralaa intor ra bansa' nano galama'.
Amon ru manggal io ra aturan raginio, anak-anak nano ondo' sotopot no matulai, masauk majamol. Aku noyo
Nanusub
mapasaboi ra baal ragitio ri Arun, “Osoi ayuk intor ra papag muno ondo' kalo matanda' batang ru inan, kalo makapapataak ulun no Raki' ra taak akanon. Aturan ragitio masauk ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Ulun kalo matanda' batang ru inan koson ragitio kalo makapapataak ra taak simbalui: ulun bolou, ulun kimpo', ulun makapipilat bulos kapoam makaruruko inan nano;
ulun nongkokoi kalindu' kapoam kimpo' kalayam nano;
ulun ondo' bakuung kapoam taguguo'; ulun makamaruol ra mato kapoam makamaruol ra kungkung, am ulun ondo' inintalian.
Moonong papag ru imam Arun ondo' mokoondo' kalo matanda' ra batang ru inan nano, kalo makapapataak Raki' ra taak akanon.
Kaa' ulun raginilo makaakan ra akanon ondo' nakataak noyo Raki', ondo' kia' taak akanon ondo' mapasau, am niayuk taak akanon ondo' mapasau kaga'.

Kaa' sabap ra kalo matanda' batang ru inan nano, kalo makainggaar io ra tabir ondo' mapatuliar ra Lamin Matulai kapoam matong ra altar. Kalo majamalan no kuliamos ondo' patimpokon noyo Raki', sabap ra Aku noyo
Ginilo noyo aturan ondo' pinasaboi ri Musa ri Arun, anak-anak ri Arun no am ngaangai' ulun ru Israil.
Nanusub

koson mapasaboi ra susuban ti ri Arun am anak-anak nano, “Baalo' min ra matanda' taak-taak simbalui ondo' pataakon ru ulun ru Israil palilion Raki' ayuk, maa' raginio kalo magasab kau ra inggalan Kuno ondo' matulai. Aku noyo

Osoi ayuk intor ra papag mino, ondo' mapaat ra majamol, minggaar ra taak-taak simbalui ondo' pataakon ru ulun ru Israil palilion ayuk Raki', kalo boo pongondoyon io giu' ra altar. Aturan ragitio masauk ra sabuoi-buoi no. Aku noyo

“Osoi ayuk intor ra papag ri Arun ondo' makamaruol ra kungkung ondo' maaja', kapoam makamaruol ra mologo saboi mingkual timug, kalo paakanon io ra atan pana intor ra taak simbalui ondo' palilion ayuk no, ra io kalo poyo potonowon ra mapasau. Sasangulun imam no majamol amon ru mangambong io ra ondo' majamol sabap ra natiu' ra baangkai, kapoam imam no mangingkual ra uwa',
kapoam nangambong io ra bibiag ondo' majamol kapoam ulun ondo' majamol.
Imam ondo' majamol ra atan pana baal no, magulayun majamol saboi ra tumolop mato ru orou. Kalo makaakan io ra taak simbalui ondo' palilion ayuk no ra io kalo poyo makapariu'.
Mokotolop mato ru orou bagu no mapasau io, am makaakan io ra taak simbalui ondo' palilion ayuk no sabap ra ginio noyo akanon nano.
Kalo makaakan io ra kual ru atan pana salinut ru bibiag ondo' matoi ayuk toojo, kapoam ondo' sinaam ru bibiag masigo. Binaal raginio mapajamol riso. Aku noyo
“Musiti' ngaangai' imam gumagaya' ra aturan raginilo ondo' tinaakan Kuno. Amon ru kalo, makasala ilo am matoi sabap ra manggal ra aturan ra mangapasau no. Aku noyo

“Ulun intor ra sasambaloi ru imam no ayuk ondo' makaakan intor ra taak simbalui ondo' palilion ayuk no. Ulun ra bokon kalo makaakan raginio, kabalu' pana mayan ulun no masimpung ra imam, kapoam ulun no mangngandoi ra imam.
Kaa' ulipon ondo' binali ra ruit ru imam galama', kapoam ondo' inanak ralalom baloi ru imam, makaakan ra akanon ondo' apuon ru imam.
Anak ruandu' ru imam ondo' nangindalaki ra sangulun ondo' sala' ka imam, kalo makaakan ra akanon taak simbalui ra palilion ayuk no.

Kaa' anak ruandu' ru imam ondo' napuor noyo, kapoam ondo' inali am kolondo' anak, am minayan saguli' ra ama' nano am ama' nano mampakan riso, makaakan ra akanon ondo' maapu ru ama' nano ra imam no. Sasambaloi ru imam ayuk makaakan ra taak simbalui no.

“Amon ru sangulun ondo' sala' ka sasambaloi ru imam, am kalo singonon nangakan ra taak ondo' palilion ayuk, musiti' io mangani' saguli' ra imam no ra ondo' nogondo' suang no, ruangin poyo ra ruo ngoopor piatus.
Kalo majamalan ru imam taak simbalui ondo' palilion ayuk no,
ra mangani' raginio ra ulun ondo' kalo maaya' mangakan no. Baal ragitio maparatong ra kasalaan am ukuman ra ulun ondo' mangakan raginio. Aku noyo
Nanusub

maa' raginio mangani' ra aturan ragitilo ri Arun am anak-anak nano, am niayuk ra ngaangai' ulun ru Israil. Paat ra sangulun Israil kapoam sangulun bansa' ru bokon ondo' mayan ra pagun ru Israil mapataak ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Musiti' bibiag no ungkuyon ondo' kalo najamaran, maa' raginio apuon.
Amon ru mapataak ra bibiag ondo' najamaran, ginio kalo apuon ru
Paat ra sasangulun no mapataak ra taak simbalui koson makibarakat ra
Pai' papataak ra
Akau makapapataak ra bibiag ondo' kalo matanda' baal no koson ra taak simbalui ondo' pataakon ra kalo kibayarin, kaa' taak simbalui ti kalo apuon koson ra taak simbalui manugut ra nazar.
Pai' papataak ra
Pai' papataak ra atan ayuk bibiag tayar ru taak akanon, amon ru bibiag no noowot intor ra ulun bansa' ru bokon. Karaan bibiag no ra najamaran am kalo apuon.

Sanginan anak ru sapi', kapoam anak ru domba, kapoam anak ru kambing ondo' bagu inanak, kalo patuliaron intor ra indung no buoi tulu' ngoorou. Mopongo raginio bagu no pataakon bibiag no tayar ru taak akanon.
Indung ru sapi' am anak no, kapoam indung ru domba am anak no, pai' pataako' ginio koson ra taak simbalui ra maginamot orou.
Paat ra akau mapataak ra taak simbalui koson paringkuanangan ra
Akano' noyo ngaangai' taak simbalui raginio ra orou raginio niayuk, am pai' panatang ra atan-atan polos ra suabon no.
Indagu
Pai' pagasab ra inggalan Kuno ondo' matulai. Musiti' ngaangai' ulun ru Israil sumamba Raki' koson Ondo' Matulai Kaga'. Aku noyo
Nagibit Aku ramuyun miningkual intor ra Misir maa' raginio masauk Aku ri Aki Kapuuno' min. Aku noyo
Nanaak
ri Musa ra aturan ragitilo intor ra pangiantakan ru ugama ondo' musiti' potonowon ra koson paat sumambayang.

Mokoondo' onom ngoorou akau mangandoi, kaa' karaa' noyo ra paat orou katulu', iono orou Sabat, iono orou tangusan. Pai' pangandoi orou raginio, kaa' pantimung no ra sumambayang. Orou Sabat no orou timpokon ra
Sumunu' ti iono pangiantakan ondo' inaru' noyo ru
Paat ra orou koopor am limo, tumalimpuun Pangiantakan ra Ruti' Kalo Linatakan ra Ragi. Buoi katuluan akau kalo makaakan ra ruti' latakin ra ragi.
Paat ra orou kasaa' ru pangiantakan no, musiti' kau tumimung ra sumambayang, am pai' baalo' kandoi moonong orou.
Buoi katuluan, musiti' kau mapataak ra taak akanon ra
Paat ra akau mumpos giu' ra pagun ondo' taakin ramuyun ru
Pataakon boo ru imam barli no ra
Paat ra orou akau mapataak ra barli no, musiti' kau mapataak niayuk ra sanginan domba gawayan ondo' sambilor umur no am kalo najamaran no, koson ra taak koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Pabayaan ra taak no, musiti' kau mapataak ra ruo ngakilogram tapung ra moonsoi kaga' ondo' latakin ra umau jaitun tayar ru taak akanon. Owou ru taak no mapabansuk ra guang ru

Pai' min akano' barli baguon no, ondo' makata', ondo' sininggala', kapoam sinauk ra ruti', ra kalo poyo mapataak kau ri Aki Kapuuno' ra barli baguon no. Aturan ti musiti' gagayaan ru ngaangai' papag mino ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Paat orou kalimo ngoopor, iono orou ra mopongo orou Sabat ondo' katulu', pataako' noyo gandum baguon no tayar ru taak simbalui koson paringkuanangan ra
Musiti' moonong sasambaloi magibit ruo ngantaun ruti', koson ra taak lilion ra

Pabayaan ra ruti' no, musiti' ulun ru Israil mapataak ra tulu' ngainan anak domba ondo' makaumur sambilor, sanginan sapi' gawayan, am ruo ngainan kambing gawayan. Ngaangai' bibiag no kalo najamaran. Pataako' noyo ngaangai' no ra

Suai raginio pataako' noyo sanginan kambing gawayan tayar ru taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula, am ruo ngainan anak domba gawayan ondo' sambilor umur no tayar ru taak simbalui koson makibarakat ra
Pataakon boo ru imam ruti' am ruo ngainan anak domba no tayar ru taak lilion ra
Paat ra orou raginio pai' baalo' kandoi moonong orou, kaa' timung no ra sumambayang. Musiti' aturan ti gagayaan ru papag mino ra sabubuoi no, ra ati ayuk inayanan nilono.
Musiti' orou kasaa' ra sila' katulu' iantakon koson ra orou ondo' timpokon ra tangusan. Paat samputin bujung ra orou raginio, musiti' tumimung kau sumambayang.
Papataak no ra taak akanon ra

Orou koopor ra sila' katulu' iono orou mapaugar ra upacara kabilaran tayar pangampunan ra tula ru ulun ru Israil. Paat orou raginio musiti' kau mampali am tumimung ra sumambayang, am niayuk mapataak ra taak akanon ra
Pai' pangandoi paat orou raginio, sabap orou raginio iono orou mapaugar ra upacara pangampunan ra tula, maa' raginio mokoowot kau ra pangampunan giu' ra saang ru
Osoi ayuk ondo' mangakan paat orou raginio kalo boo karaan ra ulun ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Osoi ayuk ondo' mangandoi paat orou raginio potoyon ru
Musiti' aturan ragitio gagayaan ru ngaangai' papag mino, ati ayuk ayanan nilo.

Intor ra paat mato ru orou tumolop paat orou kasiam ra sila' raginio, saboi ra paat mato ru orou tumolop paat orou koopor ra sila' ra nogondo', musiti' min iantakon ginio koson ra orou Sabat, ondo' timpokon ra tangusan. Musiti' kau mampali buoi ru orou raginio.
Paat ra orou kasaa' ru pangiantakan no, musiti' kau tumimung sumambayang. Pai' baalo' kandoi moonong orou paat orou raginio.

Moonong orou buoi tulu' ngoorou, musiti' kau mapataak ra taak akanon. Paat orou kabalu', musiti' kau tumimung poyo sumambayang am musiti' kau mapataak ra taak akanon. Orou raginio iono orou sumambayang; pai' kau pangandoi paat orou raginio.
Gitilo noyo pangiantakan ru ugama ondo' inaru' ru

Pangiantakan raginilo iono pinaruang paat ra orou Sabat ondo' kaindalaman, am taak raginilo iono pinaruang ra taak ondo' kaindalaman min taakin koson manugut ra gogoton kapoam tayar ru taak ondo' pataakon ayuk toojo ra

Paat ra orou kasaa', alapo' kawa' ondo' moonsoi kaga' intor ra puun kinawa' mino, am alapo' niayuk raun palma, raan ru tataun ondo' maawas raun, am puun tataun magana' ra nambusak intor ra kiing ru sungoi, am talimpuunin noyo pangiantakan makaansuk koson mangurumat ra
Iantakon noyo pangiantakan raginio buoi tulu' ngoorou. Musiti' aturan ragitio gagayaan ru ngaangai' papag mino ra sabubuoi no.
Musiti' ngaangai' ulun ru Israil mayan giu' ra kalukub ru raun buoi tulu' ngoorou,
maa' raginio papag mino makapandai ra nanusub
Ginii noyo nangani' i Musa ra ulun ru Israil ra aturan-aturan koson mangiantak ra pangiantakan ru ugama ra tayar mangurumat ra
Nambala'
maa' raginio mapasaboi ra susuban ragitilo ra ulun ru Israil: Pagibit no ra umau jaitun ra kopoyo ondo' moonsoi kaga' tayar ru lampung giu' ralalom Kim ru
Moonong rondom musiti' i Arun mansikit ra lampung no am polosoon ginio mapaang saboi ra susuab ti. Musiti' lampung no pabantaan giu' ra saang ru
Musiti' i Arun magalung ra lampung-lampung no ondo' pinatampak ra rasawat ru tampakan ra lampung ondo' binaal intor ra mas kopoyo, maa' raginio ngaangai' no magulayun mapaang giu' ra saang ru
Pabantaa' ruti'-ruti' no ra ruo ngatinting, onom ruti' ra moonong tinting, giu' ra rasawat ru mija' ondo' inangkupan ra mas kopoyo, ondo' pinabanta' giu' ralalom Kim ru
Anii' noyo ra kaminyan kopoyo ra moonong tinting ru ruti'. Baal ragitio tatandu' ra ruti' no taak akanon tayar ru
Koson ra sabubuoi no, paat ra moonong orou Sabat, musiti' ruti' no pabantaan giu' ralalom Kim ru
Ruti' no tayar ri Arun am papag nano. Musiti' nilo akanon ruti' no giu' ra intok mapasau, sabap ra ruti' no tayar ondo' mapasau kaga' intor ra taak akanon ondo' pataakon ra

Giu' ra pangkiman ru ulun ru Israil, mokoondo' sangulun ungkuyon. Ama' nano ulun ru Misir am ina' nano ulun ru Israil ondo' inggalan no Silomit anak ri Dibri intor ra bansa' ru Dan. Paat ra sangarawan nansangor ulun no ra sangulun Israil giu' ra pangkiman. Paat ra ilo nansangor, nagulas io ri Aki Kapuuno'. Ginio ra ibito' io ru ulun ru Israil paumaa' ri Musa,
am inaput io ra buoi maginaa ra kapatasan ru
Indagu

“Ibito' noyo ulun no giu' ra liwar ru pangkiman. Polosoon noyo moonong ulun ondo' nakaining riso nagulas ri Aki Kapuuno', mapabanta' ra kalindu' ra tampak ru ulu ru ulun no ra mangani' ra kaintutunan ra makasala io. Mopongo raginio musiti' ngaangai' ulun ru Israil momobol riso saboi matoi.
Mopongo raginio balai' noyo ulun ru Israil ra osoi ayuk magulas ri Aki Kapuuno' musiti' magantung ra kinibit no.
Musiti' ulun no ukumin ra matoi. Osoi ayuk magulas ra
am osoi ayuk mamatoi ra bibiag ru ulun bokon musiti' no aligin bibiag ru ulun no. Puun no painawo aligin ra painawo.
Paat ra sasangulun mangkinibit ra ulun bokon mapilat, atan ayuk ondo' binaal nano musiti' baalon niayuk riso.

Amon ru mamandak io ra bungul ru ulun bokon, musiti' bungul nano pana pandakon. Amon ru mopokoolou io ra samataan ru ulun bokon, musiti' samataan nano niayuk bolowon. Amon ru mamandak io ra rondo' ripon ru ulun bokon, musiti' pandakon niayuk rondo' ra ripon nano. Atan ayuk baalon no saboi mapilat ulun ra bokon, musiti' niayuk balasin baalon riso.
Osoi ayuk ondo' mamatoi ra bibiag musiti' aligin bibiag no, kaa' osoi ayuk ondo' mamatoi ra ulun musiti' ukumin ra matoi.
Matiu' kau ngaangai' ru ukum ragitio, iou ra ulun ru Israil am niayuk ulun bansa' ru bokon ondo' minayan ra tatanga' min, sabap ra Aku noyo

Pakasaboi ri Musa bala' raginio ra ulun ru Israil, ibito' nilo ulun ondo' nagulas ri Aki Kapuuno' no giu' ra liwar pangkiman, am bobolo' io boo saboi minatoi. Koon raginio noyo ulun ru Israil nambaal ra atan ondo' nanusuban ru
maa' raginio manaak ra ulun ru Israil ra aturan ragitilo. Paat ra akau mumpos ra pagun ondo' taakin ru
Buoi onom ngambilor musiti' kau magitanom ra umo, mangindaan ra puun ru anggur, am manimung ra ampos ru tinanom,
kaa' moonong bilor katulu' musiti' timpokon ra
Pai' pangkumos ra gandum ondo' tumuu' galama', am pai' pangupu' ra kawa' ru anggur intor ra puun ondo' kalo inindaanan, sabap ra paat ra bilor raginio tana' kalo noyo tanamin lingono'.
Kabalu' pana raginio, tana' ondo' kalo tanamin min paat ra bilor raginio mangingkual ra ampos koson saukon ra akanon min, ulipon mino, ulun mangandoi mino, ulun bansa' ru bokon ondo' minayan ramuyun,
bibiag tinambiag mino am bibiag masigo giu' ra pagun mino. Atan ayuk ondo' ampos ru tana' no, maakan.
Untobo' intulu' tulu' ngambilor, iono apat ngoopor am siam ngambilor.
Paat boo ra orou koopor ra sila' katulu', iono Orou Pangampunan ra Tula, susubo' ulun manamput ra bujung ra titikop pagun.

Kon raginio ra akau palilion ayuk bilor ondo' kalimo ngoopor, am mapatanou ra kalabusan ra ngaangai' mamagun ru pagun. Paat ra bilor raginio ngaangai' rapu' ondo' natalan noyo musiti' pasagulion ra tatangan toojo kapoam ra papag ru tatangan no. Osoi ayuk ondo' tinalan noyo koson ra ulipon musiti' pasagulion ra sasambaloi nano.
Pai' tanami' umo mino; pai' kumoso' gandum ondo' tumuu' galama' ra umo mino; pai' pangupu' ra kawa' ru anggur intor ra puun ru anggur ondo' kalo inindaanan giu' ra umo mino.
Bilor raginio bilor ondo' mapasau ramuyun. Atan ondo' tumuu' galama' ra umo mino, am ondo' alapon mino galama', ginio ayuk maakan mino.
Paat ra bilor raginio, ngaangai' tana' ondo' natalan noyo moonsoi pasagulion ra tatangan toojo no.
Ginio sabap ra paat ra mantalan kau ra tana' ra gino ngai' ulun ru Israil, kapoam mambali ra tana' intor risilo, pai' baalo' mantalan am mambali no ra kalo matanda'.
Musiti' aruon logo ru tana' no sumugut ra suang ru bilor ra tana' no nanangampos ra kalo poyo Bilor Papasagulian ra matong.
Amon ru lakat poyo mabuoi, logo ru tana' no mologo poyo, kaa' amon ru lakat poyo soroi kukula' ngambilor ayuk, maaru' logo no maningka' poyo sabap ra ondo' tinalan no iono suang ru ampos ru tana' no.
Pai' pamparuung ra gino ngai' ulun ru Israil, kaa' kalaa' noyo ra
Gagayaa' ngaangai' ukum am susuban ru
Tana' ru pagun no manangampos saboi makaakanon kau ra maukop am mayan ra giu' no ra namio-mio.
Kaa' maaru' lair mokoondo' ulun mangkuot ra, “Atan kia akanon ondo' soroi ra bilor katulu' no, sabap ra tana' kalo tanamin am kalo kumoson ampos no?”
Barakaton ru

Paat ra akau mantanom ra umo mino ra bilor kabalu', lakat kau poyo mangakan ra ampos ru tinanom gili ra bilor koonom. Maukapan kau ra akanon saboi ra paat ra akau manimung ra ampos ru tinanom bilor raginio.

Tana' mino kalo matalan ra mantilayun sabap ra sala' ka akau tatangan ra tana' no. I Aki Kapuuno' tatangan ra tana' no, am akau koson ra ulun bansa' ru bokon ondo' nakaalap ra pangiawan magitanom ra tana' no.
Paat ra matalan sampila' tana', musiti' iowon kuasa' ru tatangan toojo ra tana' no koson mamuli' raginio.
Amon ru sangulun Israil nasauk ra musikin am mantalan kalalaat ra tana' nano, pabukat nano ondo' mamaar kaga' musiti' mamuli' ra tana' no.
Sasangulun ondo' kolondo' pabukat koson mamuli' ra tana' nano, maaru' lair paat ra orou matong masauk langkaya' am maalap no mamuli' raginio galama'.

Amon ru ginio baal no, musiti' io mambayar ra ulun ondo' nambali ra tana' no, ngaangai' logo ondo' maaya' ra ampos ondo' moowot ra kalo poyo Bilor Papasagulian ra matong no. Koon raginio noyo io makaalap saguli' ra tana' nano.
Kaa' amon ru kalo maalap no mamuli' raginio, tana' no magulayun ra ulun nambali saboi ra Bilor Papasagulian ra matong no. Paat ra bilor raginio, musiti' tana' no pasagulion ra tatangan toojo no.
