Giu' ra tana' kaagisan nanaak Io ramuyun ra manna, rondo' salinut ru akanon ondo' kalo igondo' akano' ru kinamatuaan min. Naparatong Io ra kapaganan koson mangkinam ramuyun, maa' raginio paat ra pupus no mobonsoi Io ramuyun.
Ginio ra pai' lingon mangkara' ra lumangkaya' kau sabap kuasa' am kaikangan min galama'.
Karaa' noyo ra
Pai' liliani'
Amon kalo gumagaya' kau ra

“Rongogo' noyo, ulun ru Israil kau ngai'! Paat ra orou raiti' lumaup kau ra Sungoi Jordan, am mayan ra tana' ondo' linonggom ru bansa'-bansa' ondo' maayo poyo am maikang poyo intor ramuyun. Bandar-bandar nilo mangaayo, am timbok ru bandar-bandar no masawat saboi ra limbowon.
Ulun ra giu' mangasawat am mangaikang; ilo no maayo ulun, am norongog min noyo ra kolondo' sangulun pana makagula' risilo.
Kaa' raino nakito min galama' ra
Mopongo
Nangiou
Pangintopot noyo ra sala' ka sabap ra maaya' kau, inanian kau ru
Karaa' noyo ati kulaan akau nangkinibit ra
Mulu' poyo giu' ra Gunung Sinai pana nangkinibit kau ra
Nagaloi aku ra gunung raginio koson nangapu ra ruo batu tulis ondo' tinulisan ra nabantuan ondo' binaal ru
Kopongo raginio nanaak
Nalupus apat ngoopor ngoorou am apat ngoopor ngorondom, nanaak
Kopongo raginio indagu
Indagu poyo

Pai' kinam manginga' Raki'. Makaguang Aku mamuso risilo maa' raginio kolondo' sangulun pana mangkara' boo risilo. Okou pana saukon Ku ra ama' ru rondo' bansa' ondo' maayo poyo am maikang poyo intor risilo.’
Aku pana tumuun intor ra gunung no liliwa' nagibit ra ruo batu tulis ondo' tinulisan ra nabantuan no. Apui ondo' bibilak makito giu' ra gunung no.
Nakito ku mapara' mataki' akau minanggal noyo ra ukum ondo' tinaakan ru
Ginio ra, giu' talupak ru mato min, pinampasan ku ruo batu tulis i saboi nopopol-popol.
Kopongo raginio igondo' poyo kubu samba aku ra saang ru
Malaa' Aku ra sangit ru
Siminangit kaga'

Inalap ku kuliamos jajajou ondo' binaal min noyo, iono sapi' intor ra logam, am pinatiran ginio ralalom ru apui. Kopongo raginio pinilang-pilang am inumok ku nasauk ra kaau, am pinatiran ralalom ru sungoi ondo' timinilis intor ra gunung no.
Paat ra Io nanusub ramuyun nangiruan ra Kadis-Barnia ra susuban maa' raginio mayan ra tana' ondo' tinaakan Nano ramuyun, giminuor kau Riso. Kalo nangintopot am kalo giminagaya' kau Riso.
Intor ra aku nakaulig ramuyun, magail kau gumuor ra
Ginio ra samba kubu aku ra saang ru
Aku pana nakiasi' Riso, ‘Iou
Karaa' noyo ulipon muno i Abragam, i Isak am i Jakub. Pai' lioo' bambalingatan, kalaatan am tula ru ulun ragitio.

Amon mamuso Kou risilo, mindagu ulun ru Misir ra kalo masaga' Kou magibit ra ulun Muno mongoi ra tana' ondo' binantu' Muno risilo. Mindagu ilo ra magibit Kou ra ulun Muno mingkual intor ra tana' kaagisan koson mamatoi risilo, sabap masisang Kou risilo.
Sala' ka kia ilo ti ulun ondo' pinili' Muno masauk ra ulun Muno galama'? Ilo noyo ondo' inibit Muno miningkual intor ra Misir ra kuasa' am kaikangan Muno ondo' maayo.’ ”
am ra batu tulis raginio manulis Aku ra atan ondo' natulisan Ku noyo ra batu tulis ondo' pinopol muli. Buliin boo batu tulis no giu' ralalom kaban.’
Aku pana nambaal boo rondo' kaban intor ra tataun akasia, am nanuyu' ruo batu tulis koson ragili. Nagibit aku ra batu tulis no giu' rasawat ru gunung.
Giu' ra batu tulis no nanulis
am tuun aku intor ra gunung. Koson ra nanusuban ru
Iniruanan ru ulun ru Israil tulubong ru ulun longgom ru Jaakan, am ongoi ra Mosira. Giu' ra Mosira, pinatayan am nampalabangan ri Arun, am anak nano i Iliajar minalit riso ra Imam.
Intor ra giu' minongoi ilo ra Gudgod, am ra Jotbata, intok ondo' masuang timug no.
Giu' rasawat ru gunung,
Ginio sabap ra bansa' ru Liwi kalo nakaalap ra tana' koson ra bansa'-bansa' ra bokon, sabap ra nangapu ra kaapuan inaru' koson masauk ra imam ru
Kopongo raginio nanusub Io raki' mugar am masauk ra tingganai min, maa' raginio mokoowot kau ra tana' ondo' binantu' Nano ra kinamatuaan min.”
“Raino ulun ru Israil kau ngai', rongogo' noyo pulion ru
gagayaa' noyo ngaangai' ukum Nano. Manaak aku ramuyun ra ukum-ukum raginio ra orou raiti' koson ra kaatangan min.
Limbowon ondo' masawat kaga' pana
Kaa' togom ru
Ginio ra intor raino, gagaya' noyo ra
i Aki Kapuuno' mino makakuasa' ra ngaangai' tuhan ra bokon am ngaangai' kakuasaan. Matulai am makakuasa' Io, am musiti' gagayaan Io. Kalo magimbas am kalo mangapu ra rasua.
Manutun Io maa' raginio anak kolondo' matuo am napuor matimpok pamakuan. Motogom Io ra ulun bansa' ru bokon ondo' minayan mabaya' ra bansa' takau; nanaak Io risilo ra akanon am bayang.
Ginio ra musiti' motogom kau ra ulun bansa' ru bokon no sabap akau galama' nakaili' nasauk ra ulun bansa' ru bokon giu' ra Misir.
Urumato' noyo
Omporo' noyo Io sabap Io Aki Kapuuno' min, am ra mato galama', nakito min baal mangaayo am makaimuag ondo' binaal Nano ramuyun.
Paat kinamatuaan min minongoi giu' ra Misir, suang nilo tulu' ngoopor ngaulun ayuk, kaa' raino
“Tagami' noyo
Paat orou raiti' karaa' atan ondo' napandayan min intor ra
am kaimuagan Nano. Nakito min noyo atan ondo' binaal Nano ra raja' ru Misir am titikop pagun nano.
Nakito min noyo ati kulaan
Nakapandai kau ra atan ondo' binaal ru

Nakara' min ra atan ondo' binaal Nano ri Datan am i Abiram, anak ri Iliab intor ra bansa' ru Rubin. Giu' ra talupak ru mato ru ngaangai' ulun, nonolon tana' risilo nabaya' ra sasambaloi, pangkiman am ngaangai' ulipon am bibiag nilo.
Sotopot no, akau noyo ondo' nakakito ra ngaangai' baal maayo no ondo' binaal ru
“Gagayaa' noyo ngaangai' ukum ondo' posoboyon kuno ramuyun ra orou raiti'. Amon ru mambaal kau koson raginio, lumaup kau ra sungoi am mayan ra tana' ondo' angayan min.
Maayag kau ra mabuoi giu' ra tana' ondo' langkaya' am malabung, ondo' binantu' noyo ru
Tana' ondo' ayanin mino sala' ka koson pagun ru Misir, intok inayanan min ra galing. Paat akau mantanom ra sampug giu' ra Misir, musiti' kau mingkotog mangandoi koson manimug ra umo;
kaa' tana' ondo' ayanin mino intok kagunungan am limayak, ondo' timugin ru rasam.
Alungin ru

Amon ru mambaal kau koson raginio, mamparatu' Io ra rasam ra tana' min ra bulintok nano, bulintok mopongo mangkumos am bulintok tumalimpuun mantanom. Koson raginio boo mokoondo' kau ra gandum, wain, umau jaitun,
am sakot tayar ru bibiag tinambiag min. Makaalap kau ra ngaangai' akanon ondo' kasagaan min.
Pai' polosoo' akau palayawon saboi tumalikur intor ra
Amon ru manggal kau ra ukum no, sumangit
Pailaa' noyo ukum raginio ra anak-anak mino. Raguo' noyo ukum raginio paat akau giu' ra baloi kapoam mugar, paat akau tumangus kapoam mangandoi.
Tulisi' noyo ukum raginio ra lugu' ru kulobon ru baloi am ra kulobon ru garabang min.
Amon nambaal kau raginio, akau am anak-anak mino maayag ra mabuoi giu' ra tana' ondo' binantu' ru
“Gagayaa' noyo toojo ngaangai' ukum ondo' tinaakan kuno ramuyun: Tagami' noyo
Pagiruon No boo ngaangai' bansa' no paat akau jumalai, am mayan kau ra tana' ra linonggom ru bansa' ondo' mangaayo poyo am mangaikang poyo intor ramuyun.

Ngaangai' tana' ondo' kinjangin min masauk ra longgom min. Wilayah min malangka', intor ra tana' kaagisan giu' rabugus saboi ra kagunungan Libanon giu' ra ralayo, am intor ra Sungoi Iprat giu' ra sirangon saboi ra Raat Tanga' giu' ra kalasaan.
Ati ayuk angayan min giu' ra tana' no,
“Paat ra orou raiti' pampilion takamin ra barakat am ulas –
barakat, amon ru gumagaya' kau ra susuban ru
kapoam ulas, amon ru kalo gumagaya' kau ra susuban no, am tumalikur koson sumamba ra tuhan-tuhan ra bokon ondo' kalo igondo' kau samba.
Paat nagibit

Soroi karuo-ruo gunung no ra tampilon kalasaan ru Sungoi Jordan giu' ra wilayah ru ulun ru Kanaan ondo' minayan giu' ra Limayak Jordan. Gunung raginio nakatingkuang ra kalasaan, kalo maalur intor ra puun tataun karamat giu' ra Mori, maar ra bandar Gilgal.)
Kalo boo mabuoi lumaup kau ra Sungoi Jordan am mayan ra tana' ondo' taakin ramuyun ru
tutuno' ra gumagaya' kau ra ngaangai' ukum ondo' taakin kuno ramuyun ra orou raiti'.”
“Raino rongogo' noyo ngaangai' ukum ondo' musiti' gagayaan buoi akau mayan giu' ra tana' ondo' taakin ru

Giu' ra tana' ondo' ayanin min, pusoo' noyo ngaangai' intok sambaan ra dewa giu' ra rasawat ru gunung ondo' masawat, am giu' ragana' ru tataun masansam, intok ru bansa' ondo' minayan ra giu' no sumamba ra tuhan-tuhan nilo.
Puuto' altar nilo am popolo' lugu'-lugu' batu karamat. Solobo' tatandu' ru Dewi Asyira am popolo' sinungkalalaing nilo, maa' raginio ngaangai' no kalo boo sambaan giu' ra intok raginio.
Paat sumamba kau ra
Intor ra titikop wilayah ru ngaangai' bansa' min, mampili'
Giu' ra intok no akau musiti' mampataak ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Giu' no, giu' ra saang ru
Masaboi paat no, akau iowon mambaal ra baal ondo' baalon min raino. Saboi raino akau ngaangai' sumambayang maya' ra saga' ru guang min,
sabap kalo poyo nakasaboi kau ra tana' ondo' taakin ramuyun ru
Mopongo akau lumaup ra Sungoi Jordan, iowon kau ru
Mampili'
Pakaansuk noyo ra saang ru
Pai' papataak ra taak simbalui min giu' ra intok pinili' min galama';
pataako' noyo taak simbalui raginio giu' ayuk ra rondo' intok ondo' pinili' ru
Kaa' iowon kau manimbalui ra bibiag tinambiag min am mangakan ra kual nano ra ati ayuk ayanan min. Makaakan kau ra kula' suang ru bibiag tinambiag ondo' taakin ramuyun ru
Kaa' pai' pangakan ra raraa' ru bibiag no; sasari' raraa' no ra tana' koson ra timug.
Kolondo' sangulun pana ramuyun mapataak ra
Akau am anak-anak mino, mabaya' ra ulipon-ulipon mino am ulun ru Liwi ondo' minayan giu' ra bandar-bandar mino, musiti' mangakan ra taak raginio giu' ayuk ra saang ru
Pai' liliani' ulun ru Liwi, buoi akau mayan ra tana' min.
Paat napalangka'
Amon maalur kaga' intok sambayangan no, am sasanggilan ayuk, iowon kau manimbalui ra sapi' kapoam domba ondo' taakin ramuyun ru
Osoi ayuk ondo' mapasau kapoam majamol, iowon mangakan ra kual raginio koson ra akau nangakan ra kual ru tambang kapoam paus.
Kaa' pai' pangakan ra kual ondo' lakat poyo makararaa', sabap painawo ru bibiag no soroi ralalom ru raraa' nano. Kalo makaakan kau ra painawo mabaya' ra kual.
Pai' pangakan ra raraa'; sasari' raraa' ra tana' koson ra timug.
Amon gumagaya' kau ra ukum raginio, maansayan
Ibito' noyo taak simbalui am taak ondo' binantu' min noyo ra
Giu' no pataako' noyo taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Ngaangai' baal ondo' nanusuban ku noyo ramuyun musiti' gagayaan ra matanda'. Ginio ra akau am papag min makakaansayan ra sabuoi-buoi no, sabap ra mambaal kau ra atan ondo' motopot am mapabansuk ra
“Mamuso
Mopongo
Pai' samba ra
Maaru' lair sangulun nabi kapoam mambala' ra inupi
koson mangkimait ramuyun sumamba am mangandoi ra tuhan-tuhan ondo' kalo igondo' kau samba. Kabalu' pana baal ondo' binantu' ru nabi no totopot masauk,
pai' lioo' ragu nano. Namakai
Baya' noyo ra
Kaa' potoyo' noyo nabi kapoam mambala' ra inupi ondo' nanusub ramuyun gumuor ra

Mulu' poyo pabukat min, kapoam anak ungkuyon min, kapoam anak ruandu' min, kapoam andu' ondo' tagamin min, kapoam rangan toojo min pana, maaru' lair ra suminok mangambi' ramuyun koson sumamba ra tuhan-tuhan ra bokon, ondo' kalo igondo' kau samba, am ondo' kalo igondo' sinamba ru kinamatuaan mini.
Sangulun intor ra gino ngai' min maaru' lair mangambi' ramuyun koson sumamba ra tuhan ru bansa' ondo' minayan mamaar ramuyun, kapoam tuhan ru bansa' ondo' minayan ra maalur.
Kaa' pai' polosoo' ulun no mangambi' ramuyun, am pai' rongog ra ragu nano. Pai' pakaasi' ra ulun raginio am pai' pangampin riso.
Potoyo' io! Polosoon noyo akau masauk ra ulun kasaa' momobol riso, am polosoon noyo ngaangai' ulun momobol riso.
Bobolo' noyo io saboi matoi! Kuminam io mapainggalur rirun intor ra
Kopongo raginio ngaangai' ulun ru Israil mokorongog ra baal ondo' masauk, am mangalaa' ilo. Sangulun pana kalo boo mambaal ra koson kinalaat raginio.
Paat akau mayan giu' ra bandar-bandar ondo' tinaakan ramuyun ru
ra kukula' ngaulun mangalaat intor ra bansa' min napalayau noyo ra mamagun ru bandar nilo saboi mamagun ra giu' no sumamba ra tuhan-tuhan ondo' kalo igondo' kau samba.
Amon ru morongog min tanou lumabui koson raginio, imumuyi' toojo baal raginio. Amon ru motopot ra baal malaat no totopot nasauk,
potoyo' noyo ngaangai' mamagun ru bandar raginio am niayuk ngaangai' bibiag tinambiag nilo. Lunsayo' noyo ngaangai' bandar raginio.
Timungo' noyo ngaangai' rapu' ru mamagun ru bandar raginio am pabantaa' ngaangai' no giu' ra padang ru bandar. Solobo' boo bandar raginio am ngaangai' soroi ra ralalom no koson ra taak ra
Pai' alap ra atan pana ondo' inulas noyo ra pusoon, am tumalikur
Mambaal Io baal raginio amon gumagaya' kau ra susuban Nano ondo' tinaakan ku noyo ramuyun ra orou raiti', am mambaal kau ra atan ondo' kasagaan Nano.”
Akau longgom ru
“Pai' pangakan ra atan-atan ondo' pinabala' ru
Maakan mino bibiag ragitio: sapi', domba, kambing,
tambang, domba ru kataunan, kambing ru kataunan am paus.
Moonong bibiag ondo' makajajampang am ondo' manapa' ra kainduo maakan.

Kalo maakan mino bibiag ondo' kolondo' jajampang am ondo' kalo manapa' ra kainduo. Pai' pangakan ra kual ru unta, arnab kapoam karuui batu. Majamol bibiag raginio sabap kabalu' pana manapa' ra kainduo, kaa' kolondo' jajampang.
Pai' pangakan ra bauwi. Majamol bibiag raginio, sabap kabalu' pana makajajampang kaa' bibiag raginio kalo manapa' ra kainduo. Pai' pangakan ra bibiag koson raginio, am pai' kambong ra baangkai no.
“Makaakan kau ra ngaangai' salinut ru papait ondo' makakiwos am sisi',
kaa' atan ayuk bibiag ondo' maayag ralalom timug am ondo' kolondo' kiwos am sisi', kalo maakan. Bibiag raginio majamol.
“Makaakan kau ra ngaangai' salinut ru susuit ondo' kalo majamol.

Kaa' kalo maakan mino salinut ru susuit ragitio: susuit rajawali, puok, ngaangai' salinut ru kanui, susuit nasar, bangkaak, susuit unta, susuit camar, susuit ranggung, susuit pucung am ngaangai' salinut ru susuit kanawai, susuit undan, susuit kosa am pungit.
“Majamol ngaangai' bibiag malumot ondo' makakawo; pai' pangakan ra bibiag mangalumot salinut raginio.
Pangakan ra bibiag mangalumot salinut ra kalo majamol.
Pai' tonoko' anak domba kapoam anak kambing ralalom ru gatas ru ina' nano.”
Kopongo raginio ongoi noyo ra rondo' intok ondo' pinili' ru
Amon mayan kau maalur kaga' intor ra rondo' intok sambayangan no, am mapagon kau magibit ra taak sampiopor intor ra ampos ru umo ondo' taakin ramuyun ru
Talano' ampos ru umo raginio am ibito' noyo ruit ru logo no ra rondo' intok sambayangan no.
Ra ruit raginio pambali ra atan ayuk ondo' kasagaan min – sapi', domba, wain am inumon makagauk. Kopongo raginio giu' ra intok raginio, giu' ra saang ru
“Pai' liliani' ulun ru Liwi ondo' minayan giu' ra bandar-bandar mino; kolondo' rapu' nilo.
Paat ra pompor ru moonong bilor katalu, ibito' noyo taak sampiopor intor ra ngaangai' ampos ru tinanom min am bulii' noyo ngaangai' no giu' ralalom ru bandar-bandar mino.

Akanon raginio tayar ulun ru Liwi sabap ra kolondo' rapu' nilo. Akanon raginio niayuk tayar ru ulun bansa' ru bokon, anak nailusan ra matuo am napuor ondo' minayan giu' ra bandar-bandar mino. Iowon ilo matong am mangalap ra ngaangai' ondo' kaukapan nilo. Baalo' noyo koson raginio am
“Paat ra pompor ru moonong bilor katulu', pusoo' noyo utang ru ulun ondo' magutang ra ruit min.
Koson ragitio ralan no: Moonong ulun ru Israil ondo' nagira' noyo ra ruit ru gino ngai' ulun ru Israil, musiti' mamuso ra utang no. Kalo pansikaan io ra utang no, sabap ra sumugut ra kapatasan ru
Pansikaan kau ra ruit ondo' iniraan ru ulun bansa' ru bokon, kaa' kalo pansikaan kau ra ruit ondo' iniraan ru gino ngai' bansa' min.
Mambarakat ramuyun
amon ru gumagaya' kau ra
Mambarakat
Kaa', moonsoi ru mataau guang min am mapaira' ra ulun no ra kula' suang ondo' pakuan nano.
Pai' kau karara' mapaira' riso ra sasaban ayuk ra bilor mamuso ra utang mamaar noyo. Pai' polosoo' pangkaraan kinalaat raginio sumubol ra guang min. Amon ru marara' kau mapaira', mampalaa ulun no ra
Anii' io ra atan ayuk ra kalo kibayarin am ra taau ru guang, am mambarakat
Gino ngai' ru ulun ru Israil, masalok mokoondo' kukula' ngaulun musikin am ondo' gumogot makiindangan. Ginio ra manusub aku ramuyun maa' raginio mataau guang risilo.”
Paat ra akau mapalabus riso, pai' io polosoo' mugar ra kolondo' ibiton.
Ra taau ru guang anii' io ra atan ayuk ondo' tinaakan ru
Karaa' noyo ra galing i akau sinauk ra inulipon giu' ra Misir, am pinalabus kau noyo ru
Kaa' maaru' lair ra inulipon mino kalo masaga' palabuson, sabap ra motogom io ramuyun am sasambaloi min, am masaga' mayan ramuyun.

Amon ru koson raginio, ibito' io ra kulobon ru baloi min, am giu' no tibakin talingo nano. Masauk io boo ra inulipon min buoi ru bayag nano. Koson raginio niayuk ondo' musiti' min baalon ra inulipon ruandu' min.
Pai' pansagulian guang paat ra akau mapalabus ra sangulun inulipon, sabap ra nangandoi io noyo ramuyun buoi onom ngambilor, ra sampiruo gaji' ru sangulun mangngandoi.
Moonong bilor musiti' akau am sasambaloi min mangakan ra kual no giu' ra saang ru
Amon ru bibiag no najamaran koson kimpo', bolou, kapoam najamaran ra bokon ondo' mapaja', pai' pataako' bibiag no koson ra taak simbalui ra
Maakan min bibiag koson raginio giu' ra baloi. Iou pana ra mapasau kapoam majamol kau, maakan min ngaangai' bibiag raginio koson akau mangakan ra kual ru tambang kapoam paus.
Pai' pangakan ra raraa' ru kual no; pasasaro' noyo raraa' no ra tana' koson ra timug.”
Ongoi noyo ra rondo' intok sambayangan no, am giu' no simbaluyo' noyo sanginan intor ra domba kapoam sapi' min koson bunsag ru Paska tayar mangurumat ra

Paat ra akau magakan ra bunsag raginio, pai' pangakan ra ruti' ondo' linatakan ra ragi. Buoi tulu' ngoorou musiti' mangakan ra ruti' ondo' kalo linatakan ra ragi, koson ondo' binaal min ragili paat ra akau nagiru' ra naagou-agou intor ra Misir. Akano' noyo ruti' ondo' kalo linatakan ra ragi – ruti' ondo' sabiton ra ruti' kaimbalaan – maa' raginio buoi ru bayag mino, makara' min orou ra akau nangiruan ra Misir, intok pangimbalaan no.

Buoi tulu' ngoorou, sangulun pana giu' ra tana' min kalo iowon mambuli ra ragi ralalom ru baloi nano; am kual ru bibiag ondo' sinimbalui paat ra rondom kasaa' no musiti' akanon paat ra rondom raginio niayuk.
“Simbaluyo' noyo bibiag tayar ru bunsag Paska giu' ra rondo' intok sambayangan no, am sala' ka ra ati-ati intok ra bokon giu' ra tana' ondo' pataakon ramuyun ru
Ansako' noyo kual no am akano' noyo giu' ra rondo' intok sambayangan no, am uli' noyo ra baloi ra iosusuab ru suabon no.
Buoi onom ngoorou, musiti' kau mangakan ra ruti' kalo linatakan ra ragi, am paat ra orou katulu' musiti' kau tumimung koson sumambayang ra
Kopongo raginio iantako' Pangiantakan ra mangkumos koson mangurumat ra
Pakaansuk noyo ra saang ru
Gagaya' noyo ra susuban-susuban ragitio ra matanda'. Karaa' noyo ra inulipon kau giu' ra Misir ragili.”
Pakaansuk noyo mabaya' ra anak-anak mino, mangngandoi mino, ulun ru Liwi, ulun bansa' ru bokon, anak nailusan ra matuo am napuor ondo' minayan giu' ra bandar-bandar min.
Urumato' noyo
“Ngaangai' ungkuyon ru bansa' min musiti' matong koson sumambayang ra
sumugut ra kaandaran nano am sumugut ra suang ru barakat ondo' pinataak noyo riso ru
“Lantiko' noyo tingganai-tingganai ru bansa' am pagawai-pagawai ra bokon giu' ra moonong bandar ondo' pataakon ramuyun ru

Kalo iowon kau jajajou kapoam pagimbason paat mapaugar ra pangakiman. Kalo iowon kau mangapu ra rasua sabap rasua mokobolou ra ulun, am poyo ulun mapintar am mabanis guang pana, saboi mamatas ilo ra masala.
Akau musiti' magail matimpok am kalo magimbas, maa' raginio makaayan kau ra tana' ondo' pataakon ramuyun ru
Pai' tirongo' lugu' batu tayar ru sumamba ra sinungkalalaing giu' ra intok raginio. Masisang
“Pai' papataak ra sapi' kapoam domba ondo' najamaran ra
“Amon ru norongog min ra giu' ra rondo' ra bandar min, mokoondo' kukula' ngaulun ungkuyon kapoam ruandu' ondo' makatula noyo ra
am niayuk susuban ru
Amon ru norongog min tanou koson raginio, musiti' imumuyin toojo baal raginio. Amon ru motopot ra baal malaat raginio nasauk noyo giu' ra Israil,
ibito' noyo ulun raginio giu' ra liwar ru bandar am bobolon ra batu saboi io matoi.
Iowon ayuk sangulun bobolon saboi matoi amon ru mokoondo' ruo kapoam talu ngaulun sasi' ondo' mononsol riso, kaa' kalo iowon io bobolon amon mokoondo' sangulun ayuk sasi'.
Ulun ondo' nasauk ra sasi' raginio noyo ondo' musiti' magulu momobol ra batu, bagu no ngaangai' ulun ra bokon momobol ra ulun no ra batu. Gitio ralan min mamuso ra kalaatan raginio.

Maaru' mokoondo' kukula' baal ra mompolonggom, kapilatan, kapoam intor ra baal pamatayan ra siningon, kapoam kalo siningon ondo' mapagon kaga' akimin ru akim rondo' intok. Paat ra mokoondo' baal koson raginio, kataki' noyo mongoi ra rondo' intok sambayangan ondo' pinili' ru
Giu' no, pabalaa' baal raginio ra imam ru bansa' ru Liwi, am ra akim ondo' mangandoi paat raginio. Polosoo' noyo ilo mangakim ra baal raginio.
Mamatas ilo ra baal raginio, am musiti' baalon min ra matanda' atan ondo' raguon nilo ramuyun.
Apuo' noyo kapatasan nilo am baalo' noyo atan ondo' inaru' nilo saboi ra baal ra toboborok.
Osoi baani mansang ra akim kapoam imam ondo' mangandoi musiti' ukumin ra matoi; gitio ralan min mamuso ra kalaatan ra Israil.
Ngaangai' ulun pana mokorongog boo ra baal raginio am malaa', saboi kolondo' sangulun pana baani mambaal koson raginio.”
Aruo' noyo ra ulun pilion min masauk ra raja' iono ulun ondo' pinili' ru
Kalo iowon raja' no mokoondo' ra pulalai mangkuda ondo' masuang kaga' no. Kalo iowon raja' no mangator ra ulun mongoi ra Misir mambali ra kuda,
Kalo iowon raja' no makaandu' ra masuang, sabap baal raginio mangkinibit riso tumalikur intor ra
Paat io potonowon masauk ra raja', musiti' io aniin rondo' kitab ru ukum ri Aki Kapuuno' ondo' pinaralin intor ra kitab kopoyo ondo' binulian ru imam-imam bansa' ru Liwi.
Kitab no musiti' masalok paumbiron ra raja', am musiti' io mambasa' ra kitab no buoi io maayag, maa' raginio migila' io mangurumat ra
Amon mambaal raja' koson raginio, kalo mangkara' io ra io no moonsoi poyo intor ra ulun sabansa' riso, am kalo manggal io ra susuban ru
“Ngaangai' bansa' ru Liwi, nakaaya' imam-imam kalo iowon mangapu ra tayar ru tana' giu' ra Israil, kaa' makaapu ilo ra santayaran ra taak am taak simbalui ra bokon ondo' pataakon ra
Ondo' apuon nilono iono tungkuson nilo, koson ondo' binantu' noyo ru
“Paat ra pataakon sapi' kapoam domba koson ra taak simbalui, am tampilon ra limbawo, bungul ru salura am tinai' ru bibiag no musiti' pataakon ra imam.
Imam-imam musiti' aniin ra ampos kasaa' intor ra unor-unor, wain, umau jaitun am bulu ru domba.
Nampili'
“Osoi ayuk ulun ru Liwi ondo' intor ra ati pana bandar giu' ra Israil, porotongon ra rondo' intok sambayangan no,
am iowon mangandoi ayuk ra
Io musiti' aniin ra akanon koson ra suang ru maapu ru imam-imam ra bokon, am io iowon mambuli ra atan ayuk ondo' atarin ru sasambaloi nano.”
“Paat ra akau makasaboi ra tana' ondo' pataakon ramuyun ru
Pai' papataak ra anak-anak min koson ra taak ondo' solobon ra rasawat ru altar. Pai' polosoo' osoi pana ra gino ngai' min masauk ra mangngilong kapoam maguyum ra tatandu', kapoam mamakai ra jampi
kapoam kapandayan ru sihir, kapoam makitulu' ra ambiluo ru ulun minatoi.
Masisang
Musiti' kau gumagaya' toojo ra
I Musa pana mindagu, “Bansa'-bansa' giu' ra tana' ondo' ayanin mino magibaya' ra bilin ru mangilong am ulun ondo' maguyum ra tatandu', kaa'
Kaa' manusub
Paat ra akau tumimung giu' ra Gunung Sinai, pakitaak kau maa' raginio kalo bagu mokorongog kau ra
Ginio ra minindagu
Manusub Aku ra sangulun nabi risilo, nabi koson rirun, am intor ra bansa' nilo galama'. Mapasaboi Aku ra bala' Kuno riso, am io
Mindagu nabi no ralalom ru inggalan Kuno, am mangukum Aku

Kaa' amon ru baani sangulun nabi mapasaboi ra tanou ralalom ru inggalan Kuno, kaa' sotopot no kalo manusub Aku riso mambaal raginio, nabi no musiti' matoi. Moonong nabi ondo' mindagu ralalom ru inggalan ru tuhan-tuhan ra bokon musiti' matoi.’
“Maaru' lair ru kukuot kau ralalom ru guang, ‘Ati kulaan akai makapandai ru tanou ru nabi no intor ra
Amon ru mindagu sangulun nabi ralalom inggalan ru

tayaro' noyo tana' no masauk ra talu wilayah. Moonong wilayah musiti' mokoondo' rondo' bandar ondo' mataki' masaboi, maa' raginio paat mamatoi sasangulun ra ulun bokon, makapagiru' io ra rondo' ra bandar no koson makisindung.
Amon ru kalo siningon namatoi ra ulun ondo' sala' ka pantula' nano, makapagiru' io rondo' ra bandar no maa' raginio mabayag.

Koson ra, amon ruo ngaulun mongoi ra kataunan mantagar ra tataun, am sangulun no liliwa' mantagar, kapak no nabutus intor ra tanggayan am pakatiu' ra rangan nano am patoi. Ulun ondo' namatoi ra kalo siningon no iowon pagiruon ra rondo' ra bandar no maa' raginio kalo potoyon.

Amon rondo' ayuk bandar pakisindungan no, galur ru bandar no maaru' lair maalur kaga' am pabukat-pabukat ondo' makaguang koson mansuli' maaru' makarakop ra ulun ondo' namatoi noyo ra kalo siningon no, am ra likokot ru guang pabukat-pabukat nano mongoi pamatoi ra ulun kolondo' sala. Ulun no namatoi ra kalo siningon, am poyo ulun ondo' pinatoi no sala' ka pantula' nano.
Ginio sabap ra manusub aku ramuyun maa' raginio mapasuai ra talu bandar panindungan.
Paat
am musiti' kau mampili' talu bandar poyo. (Manaak
Baalo' ginio maa' raginio ulun kolondo' sala kalo matoi, am maa' raginio kalo makatula kau sabap namatoi ra ulun ondo' kolondo' sala giu' ra tana' ondo' pataakin ramuyun ru
“Kaa' suai ru amon sasangulun magawang ra pantula' nano am ra siningon am niayuk masisang mamatoi riso, am magiru' ra rondo' ra bandar panindungan koson makisindung.

Ralalom ru baal raginio tingganai-tingganai intor ra bandar ru ulun namatoi no galama' musiti' mampiau riso, am mapataak riso ra pabukat-pabukat ondo' makaguang koson mansuli' tayar ru namatayan raginio. Koson raginio ulun namatoi no iowon ukumin ra matoi.
Pai' pakaasi' ra ulun namatoi no. Palabuso' ulun ru Israil intor ra ulun namatoi no maa' raginio makakaansayan kau.”
Amon kuminam sasangulun manguu' ra ulun bokon ra nambaal io ra kalaatan,
musiti' ilo karuruo mongoi ra rondo' intok sambayangan no. Giu' no akimin ilo ru imam-imam am akim ondo' mangandoi paat raginio.
Akim-akim musiti' mangimumui toojo ra baal raginio. Amon sasangulun sumonsol ra gino ngai' ru bansa' nano,
musiti' io ukumin ondo' ukuman ondo' kuayan no ra ulun pinasala nano. Koson raginio akau mamuso ra kalaatan no.
Moonong ulun pana mokorongog boo ra atan ondo' nasauk noyo. Malaa' ilo, am kolondo' sangulun pana boo baani mambaal ra kinalaat raginio.

Ralalom ru baal-baal raginio, pai' pakitono' makaasi'. Ukuman no musiti' no: painawo aligin ra painawo, mato aligin ra mato, ripon aligin ra ripon, kalindu' aligin ra kalindu' am kalayam aligin ra kalayam.”
“Paat ra akau mingkual koson mangayou ra pantula' min, pai' kalaa' paat akau makakito ra kurita' kuda, kuda am saujor ru pantula' ondo' masuang poyo intor ramuyun. Namayag noyo ramuyun
Ra akau kalo poyo tumalimpuun mangayou, sangulun imam musiti' jumalai am mindagu ra pulalai ru saujor,
‘Rongogo' noyo, ulun ru Israil kau ngai'! Orou raiti' mangayou kau. Pai' kalaa' ra pantula', pai' katatak ambiluo am pai' pagalabo.
i Aki Kapuuno' min mabaya' ramuyun; manaak Io ramuyun ra kamanangan.’

Kopongo raginio pagawai-pagawai ru saujor mindagu ra pulalai no, ‘Mokoondo' osoi kia ragiti ondo' bagu nambaal ra baloi am kalo poyo napaugar ra upacara pampalasuan ra rapuan? Amon mokoondo', polosoon io muli'. Amon kalo maaru' lair matoi io ra pangayawan am ulun ra bokon mayan ra baloi nano.

Mokoondo' osoi kia ragiti ondo' bagu nanangumo ra anggur am kalo poyo igondo' pangupu' ra kawa' no? Amon mokoondo', polosoon io muli'. Amon kalo, maaru' matoi io ra pangayawan am ulun ra bokon makasia' ra ampos ru umo ru anggur no.
Mokoondo' osoi kia ragiti ondo' nantamung kapoam naguot noyo? Amon mokoondo', polosoon io muli. Amon kalo, maaru' ulun ra bokon maguot ra tamung nano.’

Polosoon pagawai-pagawai ru saujor mindagu niayuk risilo, ‘Mokoondo' osoi kia ragiti ondo' malaa' am natatak ambiluo? Amon mokoondo', polosoon io muli. Amon kalo, mangkinibit io ra ulun bokon matatak ambiluo.’
Mopongo pagawai-pagawai ru saujor mindagu, tingganai ru moonong pasimpungan musiti' pilion.
Paat ra akau mamulunsar ra rondo' bandar, pagulu anii' mamagun ru bandar no ra kaluagan koson mitaak ra inan.
Amon mangukab ilo ra kulobon garabang am mitaak ra inan, masauk ilo ra ulipon min am mambaal ra kandoi pajajalon.
Kaa' amon mamagun ru bandar no kalo masaga' mitaak ra inan, am masaga' poyo gumula' ramuyun, liputo' bandar no ra saujor min.
Kopongo raginio paat ra
Iowon kau mangalap ra ruandu'-ruandu', lalaing-lalaing, bibiag tinambiag am ngaangai' ondo' soroi ra ralalom ru bandar no. Iowon kau mamakai ra ngaangai' rapu' ru pantula' min. Nanaak noyo
Koson raginio noyo pamakuan mino ra bandar-bandar ondo' maalur intor ra tana' ondo' ayanin min.
Kaa' paat ra akau mampagaau ra bandar-bandar giu' ra pagun ondo' pataakin ramuyun ru
Pusoo' noyo ngaangai' bansa' ra pagun no: ulun ru Git, Amori, Kanaan, Piris, Giwi am Jibusi, koson ra akau sinusub ru
Potoyo' noyo ilo, maa' raginio kalo mangkinibit ilo ramuyun makatula ra

Paat ra akau kuminam mampagaau ra rondo' bandar, pai' tagaro' puun ru kikinawa' ra giu' no kabalu' pana liputin min bandar no ra mabuoi. Akano' noyo kinawa' no, kaa' pai' pusoo' puun-puun no. Puun-puun no sala' ka pantula' min.
Kalo pantagaron kau ra puun-puun tataun ra bokon am mamakai raginio koson lumiput ra bandar no, saboi magaau bandar raginio.”
“Amon mapandayan sangulun pinatoi giu' ra padang, giu' ra tana' ondo' pataakon ramuyun ru
am tingganai-tingganai mino am akim mino musiti' mingkual koson manuku' ra galur intor ra intok ru baangkai no natuum mongoi ra moonong bandar ondo' nakainggaar.
Kopongo raginio tingganai-tingganai intor ra bandar ondo' nakainggaar ra intok ru baangkai no natuum musiti' mampili' ra sanginan sapi' mamulok ondo' kalo igondo' pinakai ra mangandoi.

Musiti' nilo ibiton sapi' no ra rondo' intok maar ra sungoi boborok ondo' timug no kalo igondo' kalasak, am tana' ra giu' no kalo igondo' rinadu' kapoam tinanaman ra atan pana. Giu' no, musiti' nilo pandakon liog ru sapi' no.
Imam-imam ru bansa' ru Liwi niayuk musiti' mongoi ra giu' no, sabap musiti' ilo mangakim ra moonong baal ondo' makalabit ra kalaatan. Nampili' noyo
Mopongo ginio ngaangai' tingganai intor ra bandar ondo' mamaar kaga' ra intok ru baangkai no natuum, musiti' mambagu' ra kalindu' ra rasawat ru sapi',
liliwa' mindagu, ‘Kalo namatoi akai ra ulun ragitio am kalo nakapandai akai osoi namatoi riso.
Iou
Ginio ra mambaal ra atan ondo' kitaakon ru
“Paat ra
maaru' ra gino ngai' nilo nakakito kou ra sangulun ruandu' mantalur ondo' kalaayin muno, am moogot mu anduon.
Ibito' noyo ruandu' no ra baloi muno. Giu' no sukuri' ulu nano
am niayuk ralinin bayang. Ruandu' no musiti' mayan ra baloi muno am mangulir tayar ra matuo nano buoi sansila'. Mopongo ginio, bagu no maandu' mu io.
Amon paat ra orou tauli kalo boo masaga' kou riso, palabuso' noyo io. Kalo iowon pamakuan muno riso koson ra ulipon kapoam mantalan riso, sabap jinajalan mu io makimarulug rirun.”
“Amon mokoondo' sangulun ondo' makaandu' ruo ngaulun, am karuruo ngaulun andu' no naganak ra anak ungkuyon, kaa' anak ondo' katuaan sala' ka anak ru andu' tagamin nano.

Paat ra ulun no masaga' mangaru' ra pantayaran ra rapu' nano ra karuruo ngaulun anak nano, kalo iowon io maayo guang ra anak ru andu' tagamin nano, am aniin no anak no ra tayar ru rapu' ondo' masauk ra tayar tungkuson ru anak katuaan.

Musiti' io mantayar ra rapu' induo ruli' ra anak katuaan nano, kabalu' pana anak raginio sala' ka anak ru andu' tagamin nano. Musiti' sangulun ama' mangiou ra anak katuaan nano, am mangani' riso ra tayar ru rapu' ondo' masauk ra tungkuson nano sumugut ra aturan.”
Amon mokoondo' sangulun ondo' makaanak ra bambalingatan, masaga' gumuor am kalo gumagaya' ra matuo nano kabalu' pana mangukum ilo riso.
Musiti' matuo ru anak no magibit riso ra saang ru tingganai-tingganai ru bandar, intok inayanan nilo, am mangitaak ra akimin anak raginio.
Musiti' matuo no mindagu ra tingganai-tingganai no, ‘Bambalingatan anak mai, masaga' gumuor am kalo masaga' gumagaya' ramon; mampalubat am magauk.’
Kopongo raginio bala ru ungkuyon giu' ra bandar no musiti' momobol ra anak no saboi matoi. Koson raginio, namuso kau ra kalaatan no. Moonong ulun giu' ra Israil mokorongog ra sauk raginio am malaa'.”
“Amon sangulun inukum ra matoi sabap nambaal ra kalaatan, am baangkai nano tairon ra lugu',

am baangkai no kalo polosoon matair ra giu' no saboi ra suabon no. Baangkai no musiti' lobongon ra orou raginio niayuk, sabap baangkai ondo' polosoon matair ra lugu' maparatong ra ulas intor ri Aki Kapuuno' ra tana' raginio. Lobongo' noyo baangkai ru ulun no maa' raginio kalo jamalin min tana' ondo' pataakon ramuyun ru
Amon ru minayan tatangan no ra maalur, kapoam kalo nakapandai kau ra osoi tatangan no, ibito' bibiag no ra baloi min. Paat ra matong tatangan ra bibiag no maguyum, pataako' riso bibiag no.
Koson niayuk ondo' musiti' baalon amon ru makatuum kau ra kaladai, bayang kapoam atan ayuk tatangan no ulun sabansa' min.
“Amon ru kaladai kapoam sapi' naaba' ra ralan tatangan no ulun sabansa' min, pai' itambingai ra kalo nakapandai. Indangano' io mapabigor saguli' ra bibiag no.
“Ruandu' kalo iowon mambayang ra bayang ru ungkuyon, am ungkuyon kalo iowon mambayang ra bayang ru ruandu'; masisang
“Amon ru makito min bunsut ru susuit giu' rasawat ru puun kapoam rasawat ru tana', am puunan ru susuit tatanga' mamut kapoam mabaya' ra anak-anak nano, pai' rokopo' puunan ru susuit no.
Maalap min anak-anak ru susuit no, kaa' musiti' min palabuson puunan ru susuit, maa' raginio akau maawar painawo am makakaansayan.
“Paat ra akau mambaal ra baloi bagu, musiti' kau manginsor ra liput ru kiing ru taap ru baloi no. Koson raginio kalo pinalansan kau ra amon maratu' sasangulun intor ra rasawat ru taap am matoi.
“Pai' patuopo' sanginan sapi' am sanginan kaladai ra rondo' radu'.
“Pai' pambayang ra ondo' binaal intor ra bulu domba am linon ra rondo' tenunan.
“Amon ru mokoondo' sangulun ungkuyon maguot ra sangulun ralaa, am malupus raginio kalo boo masaga' ungkuyon no ra ralaa no.
Ginio ra nambaal ungkuyon no ra panguwan magabau ra andu' nano sala' ka ralaa paat ra ilo naguot.

“Ralalom ru baal raginio musiti' matuo ru ruandu' no mangalap ra konoon ondo' makararaa' koson ra inono' ra ruandu' no ralaa toojo paat ra paguguatan nano. Musiti' mapakito ilo ra konoon no ra tingganai-tingganai ru bandar ra intok pangakiman.
Mindagu ama' ru ruandu' no, ‘Pinawatan ku anak kuno ra ungkuyon ragitio, kaa' raino kalo boo masaga' io riso.
Nambaal io ra panguwan magabau ra anak ruandu' kuno sala' ka ralaa toojo paat ilo naguot. Kaa' ilai' noyo raraa' ra konoon ti; gitio noyo inono' ra anak kuno topot ralaa toojo paat ragili.’
Tingganai-tingganai ru bandar pana musiti' mampiau ra ungkuyon no am mapalamba' riso.

Musiti' ilo niayuk mantagi' ra ungkuyon no suang maatus ngampila' ruit pirok. Musiti' pataakon ruit no ra iwan ungkuyon nano, sabap ra napakauyu' ungkuyon no ra sangulun ruandu' ru Israil. Ra am poyo, magulayun ruandu' no masauk ra andu' ru ungkuyon no am kalo maali buoi ru bayag nano.
“Kaa' amon ru panguwan ru ulun no motopot, am kolondo' inono' ra ruandu' no lakat poyo ralaa toojo paat io inuot,

tingganai-tingganai ru bandar no pana musiti' magibit ra ruandu' no giu' ra kulobon ru baloi ru matuo nano. Ungkuyon ru bandar no pana musiti' momobol riso saboi matoi, sabap nambaal io ra baal mapakauyu' ra gino ngai' ru bansa' takau. Nakimarulug io noyo ra kalo poyo nawot, paat ra io lakat poyo soroi ra baloi ru ama' nano. Koson raginio noyo akau namuso ra kalaatan no.
“Amon ru sangulun ungkuyon narampatan paat narulug ra andu' ru ulun bokon, ilo karuruo musiti' ukumin ra matoi. Koson raginio noyo akau namuso ra kalaatan no.
“Amon ru giu' ra rondo' bandar mokoondo' sangulun ungkuyon narampatan paat ra narulug ra sangulun ralaa ondo' nantamung noyo ra ulun bokon,

musiti' min ibiton ilo ruo ra liwar ru bandar am bobolon ilo saboi matoi. Ralaa no musiti' ukumin ra matoi sabap ra kalo giminolok io makiindangan kabalu' pana soroi io ralalom ru bandar, am bolos nano maluoi rongogon ru ulun. Ungkuyon no musiti' niayuk ukumin ra matoi sabap narulug io ra sangulun ralaa ondo' nantamung noyo. Koson raginio noyo akau namuso ra kalaatan no.

“Kaa' suai baal no amon ru giu' ra intok ru liwar bandar, nanawa' sangulun ungkuyon ra sangulun ralaa ondo' nantamung noyo ra ulun bokon. Ralalom ru baal raginio ungkuyon no ayuk ondo' musiti' ukumin ra matoi.
Kalo maukum ralaa no, sabap ra kalo nambaal io ra rorondo' ondo' mangkinibit ra io ukumin ra matoi. Baal ragitio nogondo' ra baal ru sangulun ondo' namulunsar ra ulun bokon am namatoi riso.
Sinawa' ralaa no giu' ra intok ru liwar bandar, am kabalu' pana giminolok io nakiindangan, kolondo' sangulun pana nakapangindangan riso.

am ralalom ru baal raginio musiti' ungkuyon no mambayar ra mulo suang limo ngoopor ngampila' ruit pirok ra ama' ru ralaa no. Ralaa no musiti' masauk ra andu' ru ungkuyon no, sabap ra nampajajal noyo ungkuyon no riso ra nakimarulug riso. Buoi ru ungkuyon no maayag, kalo iowon io mangali ra andu' nano.
“Ulun ondo' inintalian noyo kapoam pinutut tali' nano kalo masauk ra ulun ru
“Ulun ondo' inanak ra sawa' am ngaangai' papag nano saboi ra ondo' koopor kalo masauk ra ulun ru

Kalo masaga' ilo mangani' ramuyun ra akanon am timug paat pangkiralanan min miningkual intor ra Misir. Nambayar ilo ri Biliam anak ri Bior, intor ra bandar Pitor giu' ra Misopotamia, koson nagulas ramuyun.
Kaa'
Buoi ra akau maayag am saboi ra sabuoi-buoi no, pai' pambaal ra atan-atan koson mangindangan ra bansa'-bansa' raginio, kapoam mapasauk risilo ra langkaya'.
“Pai' pagasab ra ulun ru Idom, sabap ilo pabukat min. Pai' pagasab ra ulun ru Misir, sabap galing i minayan kau ra pagun nilo.
Papag nilo ra katalu am rayus no, iowon masauk ra ulun ru
“Paat ra pangayawan, paat ra akau mangkalukub, alungi' inan mino am inggio' atan ayuk ondo' mapajamol ramuyun.
Paat ra sasangulun masauk ra majamol sabap nangingkual ra uwa' paat ra rondom, musiti' io mingkual intor ra pangkiman am mayan ra giu' no.
Mamaar mamai' musiti' io mariu', am paat ra tumolop mato ru orou bagu no iowon io sumaguli' ra pangkiman.
“Musiti' kau mambaal giu' ra liwar ru pangkiman koson intok mampangara'.
Paat ra akau masaga' mampangara', ibito' niayuk saputul tataun suai ra kaukapan min koson mangkali ra luang am mamumpun no poyo.
Alungi' noyo maa' raginio pangkiman min kalo majamol, sabap ra
“Amon ru sangulun ulipon nagiru' intor ra tuan nano matong ramuyun koson makiampin, pai' io susubo' muli'.
Makaayan io ra bandar ra ati ayuk ondo' pilion nano. Pai' kalaat pamakuan riso.
Ruit ondo' moowot ra ralan ragitio kalo iowon ibiton ra ralalom Baloi ru
Makapakitaak kau ra bunga' paat akau mapaira' ra ulun bansa' ru bokon, kaa' kalo pambaalon kau koson raginio paat mapaira' ra ulun sabansa' ramuyun. Gagayaa' noyo aturan ragitio, bagu no mambarakat
Akau kalo makatula amon ru kolondo' nazar min ra
kaa' amon ru akau ra kasagaan ru guang mokoondo' ra nazar ra
“Paat ra akau mugar mansail ra umo ru anggur ru ulun bokon, iowon kau mangakan ra kawa' ru anggur ra kula' suang ondo' kasagaan min, kaa' kalo panimungon kau raginio ralalom bakul.
Paat ra akau mugar mansail ra umo ru gandum ru ulun bokon, makaakan kau ra gandum ondo' katuon min ra kalindu', kaa' kalo iowon kau mamutul raginio ra tantab.”
Kopongo raginio inandu' poyo ruandu' no ru sangulun ungkuyon ra bokon.

Kaa' kalupus kukula' buoi, ungkuyon raginio niayuk kalo boo masaga' riso. Ungkuyon no pana nanaak riso ra surat pangalian am pinagiru' io intor ra baloi nano. Kapoam maaru' lair niayuk ra ungkuyon ra karuo no minatoi.

Ralalom ru karuruo baal raginio, ralaki kasaa' ru ruandu' no kalo iowon maguot poyo riso. Ralaki no musiti' mangkara' riso koson ra ruandu' ondo' jinamol noyo. Amon ru maguot poyo ungkuyon no ra ruandu' no, baal raginio masauk ra rondo' pagasaban ra

“Sangulun ungkuyon ondo' bagu ayuk naguot kalo susubon masauk ra saujor kapoam kandoi ra inaru' ra bokon. Musiti' io aniin ra kalabusan buoi sambilor maa' raginio makapanalingapu io ra baloi nano am mapabansuk ra guang ru andu' nano.

Paat ra mapaira' kau ra rorondo' ra sasangulun, kalo iowon kau mangalap ra batu kinsaran nano ondo' pakayon manginsar ra gandum, koson ra jaminan. Ra mangalap raginio gumaau kau ra kuliamos ondo' pakayon ru sasambaloi nano koson manampos ra akanon tayar panunggul ra bayag.
Karaa' noyo atan ondo' binaal ru
Paginaa ra liwar; polosoon noyo ulun no galama' magibit raginio ramuyun.
Amon ulun no musikin, pai' bulii' bayang no saboi ra suabon no.
Pasagulio' noyo bayang no riso moonong rondom maa' raginio mabayang no ra mombolong. Ra koson raginio, maringkuanang ulun no ramuyun am maansayan ramuyun
Moonong orou ra kalo poyo tumolop mato ru orou, gajiin io noyo tayar ru kandoi ra orou raginio. Makapakuan io ra gaji' no am malansan ra maapu' no. Amon kalo aniin min io ra gaji', mambala' io ra
Karaa' noyo, nakaili' kau nasauk ra ulipon giu' ra Misir am pinalabus kau noyo ru
Mopongo ra akau igondo' mangupu' ra kawa' jaitun min, pai' rulio' koson mangupu' ra kawa' ondo' natatang. Kawa'-kawa' raginio tayar ru ulun bansa' ru bokon, anak nailusan ra matuo am napuor.
Mopongo ra akau igondo' mangupu' ra kawa' ru anggur min, pai' rulio' koson mangupu' ra kawa' ondo' natatang. Kawa'-kawa' raginio tayar ru ulun bansa' ru bokon, anak nailusan ra matuo am napuor.
Pai' toojo makalilian ra nakaili' kau nasauk ra ulipon giu' ra Misir. Ginio noyo sabap ra nanaak aku ramuyun ra aturan ragitio.
“Amon ru ruo ngaulun ru Israil mongoi ra makama koson manalasai ra pansangaran, am sangulun napandayan ra kolondo' sala am sangulun poyo napandayan ra makasala.
Amon ru ulun ondo' makasala no ukumin ra loposon, akim no musiti' manusub riso lumaub am loposon io. Loposon io nogondo' ra kalaatan ondo' binaal nano.
Malapos io saboi suang no inggapat ngoopor, kaa' kalo masailan intor raginio. Amon ru masailan intor raginio, asabin ulun no ra saang ru ulun nasuangan.
Anak ungkuyon ra katuaan nilo musiti' karaan koson ra anak ru ulun ondo' minatoi no, maa' raginio makapapag io ra gino ngai' ru bansa' ru Israil.

Kaa' amon ru pabukat ru ulun minatoi no kalo masaga' maguot ra napuor no, musiti' napuor no mongoi ra tingganai-tingganai ru bandar no am mindagu, ‘Pabukat ru ralaki kuli kalo masaga' mambaal ra inaru' riso. Kalo masaga' io manaak ra pabukat nano ra papag ra gino ngai' ru bansa' ru Israil.’
Tingganai-tingganai ru bandar no pana musiti' boo mampiau ra ulun no am mindagu riso. Amon ru lakat poyo marara' io maguot ra napuor no,

am musiti' napuor no minggaar riso giu' ra saang ru tingganai-tingganai ru bandar no. Napuor no pana musiti' mamagus sanggipa' ra kasut ru pabukat ru ralaki nali am mantiwog ra bulos nano, liliwa' mindagu, ‘Gitio noyo ondo' masauk ra ulun ondo' kalo masaga' manaak ra papag ra pabukat nano.’
Giu' ra Israil, sasambaloi ru ulun no sabiton ra ‘sasambaloi ru ulun ondo' pinagus kasut nano.’ ”
“Amon ru ruo ngaulun ungkuyon mansangor, am andu' ru sangulun ra ungkuyon no kuminam mangindangan ra andu' nano ra nangkama' ra tingkuangon ru ungkuyon pansangor ru ralaki nano,
pungguo' noyo kalindu' ru ruandu' no. Pai' pakaasi' riso.
Pakayo' timbangan am panuku' ra motopot, maa' raginio maawar umur min giu' ra tana' ondo' pataakon ramuyun ru
i Aki Kapuuno' min masisang ra ulun mamparuung.”
Kalo malaa' ilo ri Aki Kapuuno'. Namulunsar ilo ramuyun intor ra tinaulian paat akau naagui am kalo maikang, am namatoi ra ngaangai' ulun ondo' natatang ra tinaulian.
Ginio ra paat ra
“Mopongo ra akau mongoi ra tana' ondo' pataakon ru
moonong ulun musiti' mangumung ra ampos kasaa' ru tinanom nano am pasuangon no ra rondo' bakul. Akau pana musiti' magibit raginio ra rondo' intok sambayangan no.
Ongoi noyo ra imam ondo' mangandoi paat raginio am indagu noyo riso, ‘Raino mangiou aku ra
Alapon ru imam bakul no intor ramuyun am pabantaan no ra saang ru altar ru
Giu' boo ra saang ru
Malaat pamakuan ru ulun ru Misir ramon am nampajajal ramon mangandoi koson ra ulipon.
Pampiau akai boo makiindangan ra
Ra kuasa' am kaikangan Nano ondo' maayo namayag Io ramon intor ra Misir. Nambaal io ra kaimuagan, am baal makaimuag, am niayuk baal ondo' makalalaa'.
Nagibit io ramon ragiti am nanaak ramon ra tana' ondo' langkaya' am malabung ti.
Ginio ra, raino ra
“Mopongo raginio pabantaa' bakul no giu' ra saang ru
Paringkuanang noyo ra tayar ru ngaangai' akanon ondo' tinaakan ramuyun am sasambaloi min ru
indagu noyo ra

Kalo nangakan aku sanganu pana intor ra sampiopor no paat aku mangulir. Kalo nagibit aku raginio intor ra baloi paat aku majamol. Kalo tinaakan ku ginio koson ra taak tayar ru ulun matoi. Sinugut ku noyo susuban Muno, iou

Ilai' noyo ragana' intor ra intok Muno ondo' matulai giu' ra suruga' am barakato' noyo ulun Muno Israil; barakato' niayuk tana' ondo' langkaya' am malabung ti, ondo' tinaakan Muno sumugut ra bantu' Muli ra kinamatuaan mai.’ ”
“Paat ra orou raiti'
Paat ra orou raiti' nangiou kau ra
Paat ra orou raiti' niayuk
Mapasauk Io ramuyun ra mauligan kaga' poyo intor ra ngaangai' bansa' ra bokon ondo' sinauk Nano, am omporon am urumaton kau.
I Musa pana nabaya' ra tingganai-tingganai ru bansa' ru Israil, mindagu ra ulun raginio, “Gagayaa' noyo ngaangai' susuban ondo' pataakon kuno ramuyun ra orou raiti'.
Paat ra orou akau liminaup ra Sungoi Jordan am nakasaboi giu' ra tana' ondo' pataakon ramuyun ru
Tulisi' noyo ngaangai' ukum ti ra batu-batu raginio. Paat ra akau makasaboi giu' ra tana' ondo' langkaya' am malabung ondo' binantu' ru
am soroi kau giu' ra sandaup ru Sungoi Jordan, potolorogo' batu-batu no giu' rasawat ru Gunung Ibal koson ra nanusuban kuno ra raino ti, am kapuri' noyo batu-batu no.
Baalo' noyo rondo' altar intor ra batu ondo' kalo igondo' ginarit ra basi',
sabap altar ondo' baalon min tayar ru
Pataako' niayuk taak simbalui koson makibarakat ra
Ginio ra batu-batu no ondo' kinapuran no, tulisi' noyo ra matanda' moonong ragu intor ra ukum ri Aki Kapuuno' no.”
Kopongo raginio i Musa, nabaya' ra imam-imam ru Liwi, minindagu ra ngaangai' ulun ru Israil, “Rongogo' noyo, ulun ru Israil kau ngai' am tutuno'. Paat ra orou raiti' nasauk kau noyo ra ulun ru
Ginio ra gagayaa' noyo
I Musa pana mindagu boo ra ulun ru Israil,
“Mopongo kau makalaup ra Sungoi Jordan, bansa' ru Simion, Liwi, Jiuda, Isakar, Jusup, am Binjamin musiti' migor giu' rasawat ru Gunung Girijim, paat raguon barakat tayar ru ulun ru Israil.
Paat raguon pagulasan, bansa' ru Rubin, Gad, Asyir, Dan, Jibulon am Naptali musiti' migor giu' rasawat ru Gunung Ibal.
Ulun ru Liwi musiti' mindagu ra ragu ragitio ra bolos mosongou:
“Ngaangai' ulun tumaam ra, ‘Amin!’
“Ngaangai' ulun tumaam ra, ‘Amin!’
“Ngaangai' ulun tumaam ra, ‘Amin!’
“Ngaangai' ulun tumaam ra, ‘Amin!’
“Ngaangai' ulun tumaam ra, ‘Amin!’
“Ngaangai' ulun tumaam ra, ‘Amin!’
“Ngaangai' ulun tumaam ra, ‘Amin!’
“Ngaangai' ulun tumaam ra, ‘Amin!’
“Ngaangai' ulun tumaam ra, ‘Amin!’
“ ‘Kaulas noyo ulun ondo' nambaal ra pamatayan ra sinokon.’
“Ngaangai' ulun tumaam ra, ‘Amin!’
“ ‘Kaulas noyo ulun ondo' nangapu ra ayup koson mamatoi ra ulun ondo' kolondo' sala.’
“Ngaangai' ulun tumaam ra, ‘Amin!’
“Ngaangai' ulun tumaam ra, ‘Amin!’ ”
Gagayaa' noyo
“Barakatin noyo bandar am umo min.
“Barakatin noyo akau saboi masuang anak min, ampos ru tatanom min maulian am masuang sapi' am niayuk domba min.
“Barakatin noyo kumoson ra gandum min, am akanon min ondo' binaal intor raginio.
“Barakatin noyo ngaangai' pirot min.
“Kalaan ru
“Mambarakat
Amon ru gumagaya' kau ra
Kopongo raginio ngaangai' bansa' ra tana' ti makapandai ra nampili' noyo
manaak ramuyun ra masuang anak. Bibiag tinambiag min sumuang, am ampos ru tatanom min maulian giu' ra tana' ondo' binantu' ru

mamparatu' ra rasam ra bulintok nano intor ra intok pambulian ra rasam giu' ra limbowon; mambarakat Io ra ngaangai' kandoi min maa' raginio makapapaira' kau ra masuang bansa', kaa' akau galama' kalo boo magira' ra atan pana intor ra osoi pana.

i Aki Kapuuno' min mapasauk ramuyun ra tingganai ra gino ngai' ru bansa'-bansa' am sala' ka maamaya'. Magail kau makasugut am kalo igondo' kasulang, amon ru gumagaya' kau toojo ra ngaangai' susuban ru
Kaa' pai' noyo lingon anggal ra panusuban no ra atan pana ralan, am pai' samba ra tuhan-tuhan ra bokon.”
“Kaa' amon kalo gumagaya' kau ra
“Kaulas noyo bandar am umo min.
“Kaulas noyo kumoson ru gandum min, am akanon ondo' baalon min intor ra gandum no.
“Kaulas noyo akau saboi sanganu ayuk anak min, ampos ru tatanom min sanganu am sapi' am niayuk domba min kalo masuang.
“Kaulas noyo ngaangai' kandoi min.
“Amon nambaal kau ra malaat am mangimpai ra
Maparatong Io ra maruol-maruol ramuyun, saboi kolondo' sangulun pana ra popolos mino matatang ra tana' ondo' ayanin mino.
Mangukum
Kalo rumasam am tana' min masauk ra mokotog koson ra basi'.
Kalo parasamon ru
Paat ra akau matoi, susuit am bibiag masigo matong am mangakan ra baangkai min. Kolondo' sangulun pana mangunjau ra susuit am bibiag raginio.
Maparatong
mangkinibit ramuyun ra mantuyang am mapasauk ramuyun ra bolou am niayuk maubong.
Paat ra matawang, matukangkam kau koson ra ulun bolou, am kalo makauyum kau ra ralan. Atan pana baalon min, kalo makasugut kau. Magail kau imboloon am takawin, am kolondo' mangindangan ramuyun.
“Makatamung kou sangulun ralaa, kaa' ulun ra bokon maguot riso. Manambaloi kou, kaa' kalo maayanan mu. Mantanom kou ra puun ru anggur, kaa' kalo makaakan kou ra kawa' no.

Simbaluyon sapi' muno ra talupak ru mato muno, kaa' kalo makaakan kou ra sanganu pana kual no. Ralaaton kaladai muno liliwa' tantangin mu, kaa' kalo pasagulion kaladai no rirun. Pataakon domba muno ra pantula', am kolondo' sangulun pana makaindangan rirun.

Ra talupak ru mato min, anak-anak min, iou ra ungkuyon am ruandu', pataakon koson ra ulipon ra ulun bansa' ru bokon. Moonong orou, mapari' mato min maguyum ra anak-anak min, kaa' pirot mino banangan ak, sabap kalo sumaguli' ilo.
Talingaawon ru bansa' ru bokon ngaangai' ampos ru tatanom ondo' piniratan min toojo. Akau galama' kalo mangapu ra rondo' pana, kaa' pangimbalaan ondo' mararayus am baal kalaatan.
Kaimbalaan mangkinibit ramuyun mantuyang.
Nalimpot kalayam min ra kagal ondo' maruol, am kalo mababas. Mantalipos kau intor ra pompor ru kalayam saboi ra pompor ru abuk.
Giu' ra pagun-pagun intok napatuliaran ru
“Mantanom kau ra masuang sampug, kaa' sanganu ayuk kumoson sabap ra akanon ru gapu' ampos ru tatanom min.
Mantanom kau ra anggur am magalung ra anggur no, kaa' kalo mangupu' kau ra kawa' ru anggur kapoam manginum ra wain, sabap akanon ru ulor puun ru anggur no.
Puun-puun ru jaitun tumuu' ra titikop ru pagun min kaa' kalo makaalap kau ra umau no sabap matutu' kawa' no.
Mokoondo' kau ra anak ungkuyon am ruandu', kaa' mailusan kau risilo sabap ibiton ilo mugar koson ra ulun rinakop ra pangayawan.
Ngaangai' puun am tatanom min akanon ru bibiag malumot.
“Ulun bansa' ru bokon ondo' minayan ra pagun mino lumanja' makakuasa', kaa' akau lumanja' lumiot kuasa'.
Makaruit ilo koson pairain ramuyun, kaa' akau kolondo' atan pana koson pairain risilo. Pupus no, mamarinta ilo ramuyun.
“Ngaangai' ulas no sumulung ramuyun saboi ra akau mapuso, sabap ra kalo gumagaya' kau ra
Karaat-karaat masauk ra inono' ru ukuman ru
i Aki Kapuuno' min nambarakat noyo ramuyun ralalom ru ngaangai' baal, kaa' kalo mangandoi kau Riso ra guang masaga' am maansukan.
Ginio ra mangandoi kau ra pantula' ondo' porotongon ru
Maparatong
Malaat ilo am kalo makaasi' ra osoi pana, iou ra ulun matutuo am ra lalaing-lalaing.
Mangalap ilo ra bibiag tinambiag am ampos ru tatanom min, kaa' matoi kau ra maitilan. Kalo manatang ilo ramuyun ra gandum, wain, umau jaitun, sapi' kapoam domba am matoi kau.
Mamulunsar ilo ra moonong bandar giu' ra tana' ondo' taakin ramuyun ru
“Paat ra pantula' magawang ra bandar min, malawo guang min sabap ra maitilan saboi mangakan kau ra anak ondo' pinataak ramuyun ru

Mulu' piboo ra sangulun ungkuyon moonsoi ondo' matanda' kaga' paliso nano, majajalan kaga' paat awangin bandar no, saboi mangakan io ra anak-anak nano galama' sabap ra kolondo' boo akanon ra bokon. Kalo masaga' io mantayar ra pabukat nano sanganu pana, kapoam andu' ondo' tagamin nano, kapoam anak-anak nano ondo' lakat poyo maayag.

Mulu' piboo ra sangulun ruandu' moonsoi ondo' matanda' kaga' paliso nano, am langkaya' kaga' saboi kalo poyo igondo' mantana' mongoi ra ati intok, masauk koson raginio niayuk. Paat ra pantula' magawang ra bandar nano, majajalan io kaga' sabap maitilan, saboi ra suminok io mangakan ra lalagang ondo' bagu inanak nano, am niayuk supu ru lalagang no. Kalo masaga' io mantayar ra ralaki ondo' tagamin nano, kapoam ra anak-anak nano ondo' lakat poyo maayag.
“Amon ru kalo totopot kau gumagaya' ra ngaangai' susuban ri Aki Kapuuno' ondo' natulisan ralalom ru kitab ti, am kalo mangurumat ra
maparatong Io ramuyun am papag min ra maruol ondo' kalo maalap kababas am maruol tumapik ondo' kalo maalap ra longgo'.
Io mampalumpa' ramuyun ra ngaangai' maruol ondo' makalalaa' ondo' kalaanin min giu' ra Misir ragili. Kalo mababas kau intor ra maruol raginio.
Maparatong
Kabalu' pana akau sinauk koson ra kinasuang ru butitin giu' ra limbowon, kaa' sanganu ayuk ulun ra gino ngai' min mabayag, sabap ra akau kalo gumagaya' ra
Koson ra
Pantutuliaron kau ru
Ra gino ngai' ru bansa'-bansa', kalo makaalap kau ra kamiaan am kolondo' intok ondo' maalap min kasabit ra akau tatangan;
Bayag mino masalok makalalaa'. Matawang am molondom kalaanan ngai' min ak, magail kau malaa' ra kapatayan.
Atan ayuk ilain min mangkinibit ra guang min monontol sabap ra malaa'. Moonong susuab ti malansan kau ra molondom, am moonong rondom malansan kau ra susuab ti.
Atarin kau saguli' ru
Gitio noyo kitaak-kitaak ra nabantuan ondo' sinusub ru
Nanusub i Musa ra ngaangai' ulun ru Israil tumimung am indagu risilo, “Nakito min galama' atan ondo' binaal ru
Nakito min noyo maruol tumapik ondo' makalalaa', kaimuagan am baal makaimuag ondo' binaal ru
Kaa' saboi orou raiti' lakat poyo kalo mangiou Io ramuyun makarati' ra ngaangai' ondo' nailian min noyo.
Buoi apat ngoopor ngambilor paat
Kolondo' ruti' ra akanon min, wain kapoam inumon makagauk ra inumon, kaa' nanampos
Paat ra itakau nakasaboi ra intok ragitio, ratong Raja' Sigon intor ra Gisybon am Raja' Og intor ra Basan namulunsar ritakau, kaa' kinala takau ilo
am ginaau tana' nilo. Tinaakan takau boo tana' nilo ra bansa' ru Rubin, Gad am sampiruo ra bansa' ru Manasi.
Gagayaa' noyo toojo ngaangai' kitaak ru nabantuan ti maa' raginio makasugut kau ralalom ngaangai' ru kandoi min.
“Paat ra orou raiti' migor kau ngaangai' ra saang ru
bala ru ruandu', lalaing am ulun bansa' ru bokon ondo' minayan ramuyun, ondo' namutul ra tataun am niayuk nansagou ramuyun ra timug.
Soroi kau ragiti paat ra orou raiti' koson mambaal ra nabantuan ondo' binaal ru
Ra nabantuan raginio, nangiou
Nambaal
kaa' ra itakau ngaangai' ondo' minigor ragiti paat ra orou raiti', giu' ra saang ru
“Lakat poyo akau nangkara' ra kaayagan min giu' ra Misir, am baal no ra akau nansail ra pagun-pagun ru bansa' ra bokon.
Nakito min sinungkalalaing nilo ra majamol, ondo' binaal intor ra tataun, batu, pirok am mas.
Ginio ra alungi' noyo maa' raginio kolondo' sangulun pana ragiti ra orou raiti', iou ra ungkuyon, ruandu', sasambaloi kapoam bansa' ondo' timinalikur intor ra

Ra gino ngai' min ondo' nokorongog ra kitaak moporos no ra orou raiti', pai' sangulun pana ondo' mangkara' ra io magulayun mabayag kabalu' pana gumogot toojo io am manugut ra kasagaan nano galama'. Binaal koson raginio mamuso ramuyun ngaangai', ulun ondo' moonsoi am ondo' malaat.
Kalo mangampun
Mapasauk
“Paat ra orou matong, papag min am ulun bansa' ru bokon intor ra pagun mangaalur makakito ra karaat am kaimbalaan ondo' porotongon ru

Umo mino masauk ra mapua' am kolondo' onong sabap ra natauban ru bilirang am usi'. Kalo matanaman tana' raginio, am kalo tuwin ru sakot giu' no. Masauk tana' mino koson ra bandar Sodom, Gomora, Adma am Jiboim ondo' pinuso ru
Paat raginio titikop ru tana' ti mangkuot, ‘Kua kia nambaal
Taaman no iono, ‘Sabap ra liminungkang ulun ru
Mangandoi ilo ra tuhan-tuhan ra bokon ondo' kalo igondo' ilo samba, sotopot no manginggalar
Ginio ra siminangit
Sangit ru
Topot ra mokoondo' kukula' baal ondo' kalo pinabala' ru
“Nangani' aku noyo ramuyun ra pilian ru barakat kapoam ulas. Paat ra ngaangai' baal ragitio masauk ramuyun, am mayan kau ra gino ngai' ru bansa'-bansa' ra intok akau pinantutuliar ru
Amon ru timinampos kau am papag min sumaguli' ra
am
Kabalu' pana pinantutuliar kau noyo ra titikop ru tana', timungon kau saguli' ru
Ginio ra akau tatangan saguli' ra tana' ondo' inayanan ru kinamatuaan min ragili. Io mampasauk ramuyun ra langkaya' poyo am masuang kau poyo intor ra kinamatuaan min.
i Aki Kapuuno' min manaak ramuyun am papag min ra guang ondo' gumagaya' maa' raginio motogom kau Riso ra sotopot ru guang, am makaayan magulayun giu' ra tana' no.
Maparatu' io ra ngaangai' ulas no ra pantula' ondo' masisang am mangimbolo' ramuyun.
Sumaguli' kau gumagaya' ra
manugut ra ngaangai' kandoi mino. Makaanak am makabibiag kau ra masuang; manangampos umo mino suku' malabaan kau.
Kaa' akau musiti' gumagaya' ra
“Susuban ondo' taakin kuno ramuyun ra orou raiti' kalo mapagon kaga' kapoam kalo maalur kaga'.
Intok no sala' ka giu' ra limbowon, am kalo pana mangkuot kau, ‘Osoi kia magaloi ra giu' no am magibit raginio tumuun maa' raginio mokorongog am magagaya' mai?’
Intok no sala' ka niayuk giu' ra sandaup ru raat. Kalo pana mangkuot kau, ‘Osoi kia lumaup ra raat am magibit raginio ramon maa' raginio mokorongog am magagaya' mai?’
Pai' pangkuot koson raginio sabap susuban no soroi ramuyun. Nakapandai kau noyo am makaindagu raginio; mambaal kau ayuk raginio.
“Paat ra orou raiti' pambaal noyo ra pilian ra ondo' moonsoi am ondo' malaat, ondo' maayag am matoi.
Amon ru gumagaya' kau ra susuban ru
Kaa' amon ru kalo gumagaya' kau am kalo masaga' rumongog, am polosoon inan min palayawon koson sumamba ra tuhan-tuhan ra bokon,
maaru' pusoon kau. Umur min kalo maawar giu' ra tana' ra sandaup ru Sungoi Jordan, ondo' kalo boo mabuoi am ayanin min. Karaa' noyo! Mapakara' aku toojo ramuyun ra orou raiti' ra intok ragitio.
Raino makapampili' kau ra bayag am matoi, ra barakat ri Aki Kapuuno' am ulas Nano. Mampiau aku ra limbowon am tana' ti koson masauk ra sasi' ra kapatasan min. Pilio' noyo bayag.
Tagami' noyo
i Aki Kapuuno' min galama' maningganai ramuyun am mamuso ra bansa'-bansa' ondo' minayan ra giu' no, maa' raginio makaayan kau ra tana' nilo. Masauk i Josua ra tingganai min, koson ra rinagu noyo ru
galama' mamuso ra bansa'-bansa' no, koson ra Io nangala ra Raja' Sigon am Raja' Og, raja' ru ulun ru Amori, am niayuk namuso ra pagun nilo.
manaak ramuyun ra kamanangan intor risilo. Pamakuan min risilo musiti' no motopot koson ra rinagu ku noyo ramuyun.
Musiti' kau mangintopot am baani. Pai' kalaa' ra bansa'-bansa' no.

I Musa pana nampiau ri Josua am indagu riso ra saang ru ngaangai' ulun ru Israil, “Musiti' kou mangintopot am baani. Okou noyo ondo' maningganai ra bansa' ti koson mayan ra tana' ondo' binantu' noyo ru
galama' maningganai am mabaya' rirun. Totopot Io kalo noyo maninduol kapoam mangiruan rirun. Ginio ra, pai' kalaa' kapoam malawo guang.”
I Musa pana nanulis boo ra Ukum ri Aki Kapuuno' no am taaki' no ra imam-imam Liwi ondo' nanalingapu ra Kaban Nabantuan ru
Nanaak i Musa risilo ra susuban, “Paat ra pupus ru moonong bilor katulu', ralalom ru bilor pamusaan ra utang, basaa' noyo Ukum ti ra bolos mosongou paat ra Pangiantakan Mangkalukub ra Raun.
Basaa' noyo Ukum ti ra ulun ru Israil paat ilo matong koson sumamba ra
Susubo' noyo ngaangai' ungkuyon, ruandu', lalaing-lalaing am ulun bansa' ru bokon ondo' minayan ra bandar min, maa' raginio ngaangai' ulun mokorongog ra pambasaan ru Ukum am migila' mangurumat ra
Ginio ralan ru papag min ondo' kalo poyo igondo' nokorongog ra Ukum ru
am minintalang
Indagu

Paat baal raginio masauk, sumangit Aku risilo. Mangiruan Aku risilo am mapuso ilo. Masuang karaat makalumpa' risilo; am makaliman ilo boo ra ngaangai' no masauk risilo sabap Aku, i Aki Kapuuno' nilo, kalo boo mabaya' risilo.
Paat raginio kalo boo masaga' Aku mangindangan risilo, sabap nambaal ilo noyo ra malaat am siminamba ra tuhan-tuhan ra bokon.
Raino tulisi' noyo rimbai ragitio am ilaa' ra ulun ru Israil. Rimbai ragitio masauk ra sasi' risilo.

Magibit Aku risilo ra tana' ondo' langkaya' am malabung no koson ondo' binantu' Ku noyo ra kinamatuaan nilo. Giu' no makaalap ilo ra akanon ondo' pakuan nilo am matasu' kaayagan. Kaa' tumalikur ilo intor Raki' am sumamba ra tuhan-tuhan ra bokon. Mangimpai ilo Raki' am lumungkang ra nabantuan Kuno.

Masuang karaat makalalaa' makalumpa' risilo, kaa' rimbai ragitio magulayun rimbayon am masauk ra sasi' risilo. Mulu' ra raino pana, ra Aku kalo poyo magibit risilo ra tana' ondo' binantu' Kuno, nakapandai Aku noyo ra pangkaraan nilo.”
Paat orou raginio niayuk nanulis i Musa ra rimbai raginio am nangila' ra ulun ru Israil.
Nanulis i Musa ra Ukum ri Aki Kapuuno' ralalom ru rondo' Kitab. Nanulis io raginio ra nasusui intor ra talimpuun polos ra pupus.
Kakai' io nanulis raginio, indagu io ra imam-imam ru Liwi ondo' nanalingapu ra Kaban Nabantuan ru
“Alapo' noyo kitab ru Ukum ri Aki Kapuuno' ti am pabantaa' ginio ra sapapa' ru Kaban Nabantuan ru
Nakapandai aku ra mapara' bambalingatan ulun ragitilo. Magail ilo gumuor. Giminuor ilo noyo ra
Raino susubo' noyo ngaangai' tingganai ru bansa' am pagawai tumimung ra saang kuno, maa' raginio mabalaan ku ilo ra baal-baal ragitio. Mampiau aku ra limbowon am tana' masauk ra sasi' kuno risilo.
Makapandai aku ra malupus aku matoi, lumaat ilo am mangimpai ra atan ondo' nangilaan kuno. Paat ra tauli no malumpa' ilo ra karaat, sabap nangkinibit ilo ra
I Musa pana mindagu ra ngaangai' rimbai ti liliwa' ulun ru Israil mangkirongog raginio.
“Akau limbowon am tana', rongogo' noyo ragu kutu,
rongogo' toojo ragu kutu.
Pangilaan kuno rumatu' koson ra timug ru rasam,
am masauk koson ra bolobou rasawat ru tana'.
Ragu ku rumatu' koson ra rasam ondo' manguas ra tatanom mamulok,
am koson ra rasam manulabuk ondo' rumatu' ra ralimbou ru sakot.
Mongompor aku ra inggalan ru
am ulun Nano mapatanou ra Kinaayo Nano.
Io matanda' am matimpok ralalom ru ngaangai' baal;
i Aki Kapuuno' min mampagagaya', kolondo' abau Riso,
nambaal Io ra ondo' moonsoi am ondo' motopot.
Kaa' kalo gumagaya' kau, am kalo maaya' kau masauk ra ulun Nano;
akau bansa' ondo' masaga' mamparuung am makatula.
Koson raginio kia ralan pamakuan min ra
akau ngai' ulun sasambungon, am kolondo' pangkaraan?
Io noyo Ama' min, Namangun ramuyun,
Io noyo napasauk ramuyun ra rondo' bansa'.
“Karaa' noyo paat ragili, galing i poyo;
kitaako' ama' min mantunung raginio ramuyun;
kitaako' ulun matutuo mantunung ra tunung ragili.
nangaru' Io ra wilayah intok ayanan nilo,
am malaikat koson ra manindung,
kaa' papag ri Jakub pinili' ru
“Natuum No ilo timinanggau giu' ra tana' kaagisan,
tana' kaagisan ondo' masiluk am makauma' ra angin.
Nanindung am nagalung Io risilo
koson ra Io nagalung ra unor ru mato Nano.
Koson ra susuit kanui mangila' ra anak nano mansiab,
am ibain ginio ra kawo ondo' miningkal,
koson raginio noyo
ra kalo inindangan ru tuhan-tuhan ra bokon.
“Nangiou Io risilo mamarinta ra gunung-gunung,
mangakan ilo ra ampos ru tinanom giu' ra umo-umo.
Nakaalap ilo ra ruu' maningot ru kataunan giu' ra bulur batu;
puun jaitun nilo timinuu' ra malabung giu' ra tana' ondo' makabatu.
Sapi' am kambing nilo nanangampos ra masuang gatas;
mokoondo' ilo ra domba, kambing am sapi' ondo' moonsoi kaga',
am niayuk gandum, am niayuk wain ondo' moonsoi kaga'.
“Ulun ru
maasug ilo ra akanon, am molomok ilo.
Mangiruan ilo ri Aki Kapuuno', Namangun risilo,
am nangimpai ra Mamamayag risilo ondo' mapanggol.
Sumamba ilo ra sinungkalalaing, am nomposolon ra
nambaal ilo ra kalaatan, am napasangit Riso.
tuhan-tuhan bagu ondo' kalo nauligan ru kinamatuaan nilo,
dewa-dewa ondo' kalo igondo' gagayaa' ru Israil.
Nalilianan nilo i Aki Kapuuno', Mamamayag ondo' mapanggol,
Nanaak Io risilo ra kaayagan.
“Paat ra nakito ru
anak Nano ra ungkuyon am ruandu', inimpayan No.
‘Kalo boo masaga' aku mangindangan risilo,’ ragu Nano,
‘Masaga' aku magilong ra atan ondo' masauk risilo,
ulun ondo' bambalingatan am kalo gumagaya'.
ra ondo' sala' ka Aki Kapuuno',
am sumangit ra sinungkalalaing nilo.
Ginio ra mangkinibit Aku risilo sumangit
ra ondo' sala' ka bansa'.
Mangkinibit Aku risilo mangusolon
ra bansa' ondo' sasambungon.
Sangit Kuno bibilak koson ra apui,
am monolob ra ngaangai' rasawat ru tana'.
Tumuun apui no ra tana' ru ulun namagatoi,
am mangumpo ra bakat ru gunung-gunung.
“ ‘Mapatiu' Aku risilo ra karaat ondo' kalo makakai',
am patiwon ngaangai' anak panah Kuno risilo.
Matoi ilo sabap ra mansalom am bitilan;
matoi ilo sabap ra maruol ondo' makalalaa'.
Maparatong aku ra bibiag masigo koson mansaam risilo,
am kukuo makatuwo koson maninduk risilo.
Pangayawan magibit ra patayan giu' ra ralan mangaayo,
kalaanan makalumpa' ra ulun giu' ra baloi-baloi.
Ulun mamulok, ungkuyon am ruandu' matoi,
lalagang am ulun matutuo niayuk kalo pasuayon.
Aku musiti' no mamuso risilo ngaangai',
maa' raginio kolondo' sangulun pana mangkara' risilo.
Kaa' kalo mokoloso Ku pantula' ra lumimbau,
ra ilo noyo ondo' nangala ra ulun Kuno,
atika Aku noyo manutuk ra ulun Kuno.’
“Israil rondo' bansa' ondo' kolondo' napandayan;
ilo kolondo' noyo toojo ra kapintaran.
Kalo nakapandai ilo kua kinala ilo,
kalo makarati' ilo ra atan ondo' nasauk noyo.
Kua kia saribu ngaulun naala ru sangulun,
am mopor ngaribu ngaulun naala ru ruo ngaulun ayuk?
i Aki Kapuuno' nilo ondo' mapanggol napataak noyo risilo ra pantula'.
Nakapandai pantula' ru Israil ra mangampin risilo malawo,
kalo mapanggol koson ri Aki Kapuuno', Manindung ru Israil.
Pantula' ru Israil malaat koson ra Sodom am Gomora,
koson ra puun ru anggur ondo' mapait am makaanit kawa' nano,
koson ra wain ondo' binaal intor ra tuwo ru kukuo makatuwo.
“Mangkara'
maginaa Io ra paat ondo' motopot koson mangukum risilo.
masaboi paat no ra ilo maratu' am mapuso,
orou katutukan nilo mataki' makasaboi.
paat ra Io makakito risilo kolondo' ikang.
Makaasi' Io ra ulipon Nano,
paat ra Io nakakito risilo kalo makalulu'.
‘Ati kia tuhan-tuhan ra mangapanggol ondo' inintopot mini?
Napataak kau ra wain
am taak simbalui ra moonsoi kaga' risilo,
nanaak kau risilo manginum ra wain.
Raino polosoo' noyo ilo mangindangan ramuyun,
polosoo' noyo ilo mamayag ramuyun.
“ ‘Aku noyo rorondo' i Aki Kapuuno';
kolondo' bokon ondo' ayuk am Aku.
Mamutus Aku ra painawo, am manaak Aku ra painawo,
mamilat Aku ra ulun, am mamabas Aku ra ulun;
kolondo' sangulun pana makagula' ra baalon Kuno.
Sabap ra Aku galama', i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' naayag,
mangakat Aku ra kalindu' am mampator
ra mangasa' Aku ra ilang Kuno ondo' manguliat,
am mapaugar ra pangukuman.
Mansuli' Aku ra pantula' Kuno,
am mangukum ra ulun ondo' masisang Raki'.
Anak panah Kuno maluitan ra raraa' nilo,
am ilang Kuno mamatoi ra ngaangai' ulun ondo' manggal Raki'.
Kolondo' sangulun pana ondo' manggal Raki' no maayag;
am ulun napilat am ulun rinakop pana matoi.’
Mangukum
mansuli' Io ra pantula' Nano,
am mangampun ra tula ru ulun Nano.”
Rinagu ri Musa am i Josua anak ri Nun rimbai no maa' raginio morongog ru ulun ru Israil ginio.
Kopongo i Musa nampasaboi ra pangilaan ri Aki Kapuuno' ra ulun raginio,

indagu io, “Musiti' kau gumagaya' ra ngaangai' susuban ondo' taakin kuno ramuyun ra orou raiti'. Balai' anak-anak min ra ngaangai' no, maa' raginio gumagaya' ilo toojo ra ngaangai' pangilaan ri Aki Kapuuno'.

Pangilaan ti sala' ka ragu ra kolondo' onong, kaa' pangilaan ti noyo painawo min. Gagayaa' noyo ngaangai' no maa' raginio maawar umur min giu' ra tana' ra sandaup ru Sungoi Jordan, tana' ondo' mataki' min ayanin.”
Paat ra orou raginio niayuk minindagu
“Ongoi noyo ra Kagunungan Abarim giu' ra tana' Moab, ondo' nantaluma' ra bandar Jiriko. Pagaloi noyo ra Gunung Nibo, am impalo' noyo tana' ru Kanaan ondo' mataki' Kuno pataakon ra ulun ru Israil.
Matoi kou giu' ra rasawat ru gunung no koson ra pabukat muno i Arun minatoi giu' ra rasawat ru Gunung Gor,

sabap ra akau ruo kalo giminagaya' Raki' giu' ra saang ru ulun ru Israil. Paat okou soroi maar ra taur ru timug Miriba, ondo' mamaar ra bandar Kadis giu' ra tana' kaagisan Jin, kalo nangurumat kou Raki' ra saang ru ulun ru Israil.
Monontong kou ra tana' no intor ra maalur, kaa' kalo mokoongoi kou ra tana' ondo' taakin Kuno ra ulun ru Israil.”
Ra kalo poyo minatoi, i Musa, ulipon ri Aki Kapuuno' no, nambarakat ra ulun ru Israil ra ragu-ragu ragitio:
Minatong
Siminila' io koson ra mato ru orou giu' ra rasawat ru Idom,
am intor ra Gunung Paran simininda Io ra ulun Nano.
Riribu malaikat mabaya' Riso;
ra kalindu' pamiris Nano mokoondo' ra apui ondo' bibilak.
Motogom
Mangampin Io ra ngaangai' ulun ondo' masauk ra longgom Nano.
Ginio sabap ra kumubu takau ra saang Nano,
am gumagaya' ra susuban Nano.
Gumagaya' takau ra Ukum ondo' tinaakan ri Musa ritakau;
ginio noyo rapu' ru bansa' ondo' mologo kaga'.
Masauk
paat ra bansa'-bansa' ru Israil natitimung nabaya' ra tingganai-tingganai nilo.
Intor ra bansa' ru Rubin, indagu i Musa,
“Gama' ru bansa' ru Rubin kalo mapuso,
kabalu' pana suang nilo sanganu ayuk.”
Intor ra bansa' ru Jiuda, indagu io,
“Iou
Pasimpungo' noyo ilo saguli' ra bansa'-bansa' ra bokon.
Iou
am indangano' noyo ilo gumula' ra pantula' nilo.”
“Iou
ralalom ru ulun ru Liwi, ulipon Muno ondo' gumagaya'.
Nangkinam Kou noyo risilo giu' ra Masa,
am napainono' ra gagaya' nilo giu' ra taur ru timug Miriba.
Napakito ilo ra pampagagayaan Rirun
ondo' nasailan ra pampagagayaan ra matuo, pabukat kapoam anak.
Ginagaya' nilo susuban Muno
am minintopot ra nabantuan Muno.
Mangila' ilo ra ulun Muno am gumagaya' ra Ukum Muno;
Mapataak ilo ra taak simbalui giu' ra rasawat ru altar Muno.
Iou
gama' ru maansayan kou ra kandoi nilo.
Tutuko' noyo ngaangai' pantula' nilo,
polosoo' noyo pantula' nilo kalo lumuat saguli'.”
Intor ra bansa' ru Binjamin, indagu io,
“Gitio noyo bansa' ondo' tagamin am sindungin ru
magalung Io risilo ra tutukir paat,
minayan Io ra tatanga' nilo.
Intor ra papag ri Jusup, indagu io,
“Gama' ru mambarakat
am ra timug intor ra ragana' ru tana'.
Gama' ru mambarakat
am manaak risilo ra masuang kawa' paat ra tutukir bulintok.
Gama' ru bulur-bulur lair nilo,
matauban ru kikinawa' ondo' moonsoi kaga'.
Gama' ru mapanu' tana' nilo ra ngaangai' ondo' moonsoi,
tana' ondo' barakaton ra kinoonsoi ru
Io ondo' igondo' minindagu intor ra bulungkut ondo' bibilak.
Gama' ru barakat-barakat ragitio pasasaron ra papag ri Jusup,
sabap ra io tingganai ra gino ngai' ru pongkotob nano.
Mokoondo' i Jusup ra kaikangan ru sapi' gawayan,
am sangau ru sapi' gawayan ru kataunan.
Sangau nano papag ri Manasi ondo' riribu,
am papag ri Ipraim ondo' kaaparan ribu.
Ra ngaangai' ulun ti nanangau io ra bansa'-bansa',
am napagiru' risilo saboi ra pompor ru tana' ti.”
Intor ra bansa' ru Jibulon am Isakar, indagu io,
“Gama' ru Jibulon langkaya' sabap ra pantalanan giu' ra intok ra bokon,
am gama' ru kalangkayaan ri Isakar sumingkot giu' ra pangkiman.
Nangkimait ilo ra bansa' ru bokon mongoi ra gunung;
giu' no mapataak ilo ra taak simbalui ondo' kaansayin.
Makaalap ilo ra kalangkayaan intor ra raat,
am intor ra agis ra galur ru nagas.”
Intor ra bansa' ru Gad, indagu io,
“Omporo' noyo i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' napalangka' ra intok nilo.
Nagiginaa i Gad koson ra sanginan singa',
masaga' maminsang ra longon kapoam kungkung ru ulu.
Mangalap ilo ra tana' ondo' moonsoi kaga' ra tayar nilo galama'.
Makaalap ilo ra tayar ru sangulun tingganai.
Gumagaya' ilo ra susuban am ukum ru
paat ra tingganai-tingganai ru Israil mabaya' tumimung.”
Intor ra bansa' ru Dan, indagu io,
“Koson i Dan ra sanginan singa' mamulok
ondo' tuminindak mingkual intor ra Basan.”
Intor ra bansa' ru Naptali, indagu io,
“Labain i Naptali ra barakat am togom ru
tana' nilo mapila' intor ra Tasik Galilia saboi ra rabugus.”
Intor ra bansa' ru Asyir, indagu io,
“Barakaton i Asyir nasailan intor ra bansa'-bansa' ra bokon.
Gama' ru tagamin io ru pabukat-pabukat nano,
gama' ru lumabung puun jaitun giu' ra tana' nano.
Gama' ru ampinin bandar-bandar nano ru kulobon garabang basi',
gama' ru bayag nano magail moonsoi am mamimio.”
Akau ulun ru Israil, kolondo' ondo' koson ri Aki Kapuuno' mino,
ondo' marapas ra limbowon ra katulayan,
am mujak ra gaun koson mangindangan ramuyun.
I Aki Kapuuno' ondo' mantilayun masauk ra mangampin ramuyun,
am kalindu' Nano manungka' ramuyun.
Paat ra akau jumalai,
napagiru' Io ra pantula' min,
am nanusub ramuyun mamuso risilo ngaangai'.
Ginio ra papag ri Jakub maayag ra mamimio;
makakaansayan ilo giu' ra tana' ondo' napanu' ra wain am gandum;
am basaan tana' no ru bolobou intor ra limbowon.
Akau Israil, maansukan kau kaga'!
Kolondo' osoi pana koson ramuyun,
bansa' ondo' binayag ru
koson manaung ramuyun am manaak ramuyun ra kamanangan.
Matong pantula' min makimasi',
am kikinjangin min ilo.
Iruani' boo ri Musa tana' marata' ru Moab am pagaloi ra Gunung Nibo, mongoi ra tampak ru Gunung Pisga tampilon ra sirangon ru bandar Jiriko. Giu' no nanulu'
titikop ru wilayah Naptali; wilayah Ipraim am Manasi; wilayah Jiuda tampilon ra kalasaan saboi ra Raat Tanga';
tayar rabugus ru Jiuda; am tana' marata' intor ra Joar saboi ra Jiriko, bandar ru puun kurma.
pana mindagu boo ri Musa, “Ginio noyo tana' ondo' binantu' Kuno ri Abragam, i Isak am i Jakub koson pataakon ra papag nilo. Pakitonon Ku okou raginio kaa' kalo poongoyon Ku okou ra giu'.”
Kopongo raginio i Musa, ulipon ru
Linobong io ru
Umur ri Musa maatus am ruo ngoopor ngambilor paat io minatoi. Paat ra io minatoi, lakat poyo maikang inan nano am lakat poyo makakito io.
Ulun ru Israil nangulir ri Musa buoi talu ngoopor ngoorou giu' ra tana' marata' ru Moab.
Nanaak
Kolondo' boo nabi ondo' igondo' nambaal ra kaimuagan am baal makaimuag koson ra binaal ri Musa; nanusub
Kolondo' nabi ra bokon ondo' nambaal ra baal maayo am makalalaa' koson ra binaal ri Musa ra saang ru ngaangai' ulun ru Israil.
Pakapatoi i Musa ulipon ru
Indagu
Nambala' Aku ri Musa ra ngaangai' tana' ondo' kirawin min pataakin Kuno rirun am ra ngaangai' ulun Kuno.

Balitan ru wilayah min tumalimpuun intor ra tana' kaagisan tampilon ra rabugus saboi ra Kagunungan Libanon tampilon ra ralayo; intor ra sungoi ondo' maayo, iono Sungoi Iprat tampilon ra sirangon am titikop pagun ru ulun ru Git, saboi ra Raat Tanga' tampilon ra kalasaan.
Okou Josua, kolondo' sangulun pana makapangala rirun buoi ra okou maayag. Mabaya' Aku rirun koson Aku nabaya' ri Musa. Magail Aku mabaya' rirun, am kalo toojo mangiruan rirun.
Musiti' kou mangintopot am baani, sabap masauk kou ra tingganai ru ulun ragitio paat ra ilo mampagaau ra tana' ondo' binantu' Kuno ra kinamatuaan nilo.

Musiti' kou mangintopot am baani, am tutuno' noyo maa' raginio gumagaya' kou ra ngaangai' Ukum ondo' tinaakan rirun ru ulipon Kuno, i Musa. Pai' liliani' ati-ati tayar ru Ukum no, maa' raginio makasugut kou ra ati pana angayan muno.

Tutuno' noyo maa' raginio magail Kitab ru Ukum basaan ra ulun Kuno paat akau sumambayang. Igila' noyo ra kitab no ra matawang am rondom; tutuno' noyo maa' raginio gumagaya' kou ra ngaangai' ondo' tinulisan ra ralalom no. Koson raginio noyo okou langkaya' am makasugut.
Karaa' noyo susuban Kuno rirun maa' raginio mangintopot am baani kou! Pai' kalaa' kapoam mapalo guang, sabap Aku
Kopongo raginio nanusub i Josua ra tingganai-tingganai ru Israil maa' raginio
lumiput ra titikop pangkiman am mambala' ra ulun raginio, “Pongoo' noyo akanon sabap talu ngoorou poyo lumaup kau ra Sungoi Jordan koson mampagaau ra tana' ondo' pataakon ru
“Karaa' noyo! I Musa, ulipon ru

Andu' am anak min am niayuk bibiag tinambiag min musiti' mayan ragiti, kaa' saujor-saujor mino musiti' tumampos koson mangayou. Musiti' ilo lumaup galing ra sungoi intor ra ulun ru Israil koson mangindangan ra gino ngai' bansa' min,
saboi magaau nilo tana' tampilon ra kalasaan ru Sungoi Jordan, ondo' pataakon ru
Indagu ilo ri Josua, “Baalon mai ngaangai' ondo' rinagu muno, am mongoi ra ati ayuk panusuban muno ramon mongoi.
Gumagaya' akai rirun koson ra akai magail giminagaya' ri Musa. Gama' ru
Moonong ulun ondo' marara' kumuku' ra kuasa' muno kapoam kalo gumagaya' rondo' ra susuban muno ukumin ra matoi. Musiti' kou mangintopot am baani!”
Binalaan raja' ru Jiriko ra kukula' ngaulun ru Israil minatong rondom raginio koson mansigo ra pagun nano.
Raja' no pana nanusub ra ulun mambala' ri Ragab, “Ulun giu' ra baloi muno matong koson mansigo ra titikop pagun ti. Ibito' ilo mingkual!”

Taam ri Ragab, “Topot mokoondo' kukula' ngaulun minatong ra baloi kutu, kaa' kalo nakapandai aku ati intor nilo. Minugar ilo paat ra palunggai' ti, ra kalo poyo inangaban kulobon garabang. Kalo nangkuot aku ati angayan nilo kaa' amon ru ilowon ilo ra mataki', marakop ilo.” (Ati ka pinasibuni ri Ragab ruo ngaulun pansigo no giu' rasawat ru taap ru baloi ondo' marata', giu' ragana' ru pupug ru rami, ondo' pinabanta' no ra giu' no.)
Pakaingkual ayuk ulun-ulun sinusub ru raja' intor ra bandar, inangaban kulobon garabang. Naguyum ilo ra ulun-ulun pansigo no saboi ra intok laupan ru Sungoi Jordan.
Ra kalo poyo nombolong ulun-ulun pansigo no ra rondom raginio, nagaloi i Ragab ra taap ru baloi
am indagu risilo, “Nakapandai aku ra nanaak noyo
Nokorongog akai ra kinapua' ru
Nangalaa' akai paat akai nokorongog ra baal raginio. Kalio boo kabaanian mai sabap ra akau.
Raino pagibot no ralalom inggalan ru
Bantuo' noyo raki' ra bayagon min matuo kuno am pabukat kuno ra ungkuyon am ruandu', am niayuk ngaangai' sasambaloi nilo. Pai' polosoo' akai potoyon!”
Indagu ulun-ulun pansigo no riso, “Polosoon noyo i Aki Kapuuno' mamatoi ramon amon ru kalo suguton mai bantu' maiti.
Baloi ri Ragab binaal ra timbok ru bandar. Ginio ra pinatuun no ulun-ulun pansigo no namakai ra tali ra liwar ru timbok mansail ra gigimpalan.

Indagu i Ragab, “Ongoi no ra intok kabuluran maa' raginio kalo matuum kau ru ulun-ulun sinusub ru raja' no. Pansibuni kau ra giu' no buoi talu ngoorou saboi ulun-ulun sinusub no sumaguli'. Rayusi' min boo pangkiralanan min.”
Indagu ulun-ulun pansigo no ri Ragab, “Suguton mai bantu' maiti sumugut ra kitaak muno.

Baalo' noyo baal ragitio. Paat bulunsaron mai pagun min, pobongkoso' tali malia' ti ra gigimpalan ru intok napatuunan muno ramon. Timungo' noyo ina' ama' muno, pabukat-pabukat muno am ngaangai' pabukat ru ama' muno ra baloi mutu.

Osoi intor risilo ondo' mingkual intor ra baloi ti, patayan nano sala' ka akai ra sala, ginio kasalaan nano galama'. Kaa' amon ru sasangulun ondo' soroi ra baloi mutu mapilatan, akai noyo ondo' mansaan ra kinibit no.
Kaa' amon ru mambala' kou ra ulun pasal ramon, palabuso' akai intor ra bantu' maiti.”
Nangiou i Ragab ra baal raginio am nanusub risilo mugar. Pakaugar ilo, pobongkoso' no tali malia' no ra gigimpalan nano.

Ulun-ulun pansigo no minongoi giu' ra kabuluran am nansibuni ra giu' no. Naguyum ulun-ulun sinusub ru raja' no risilo ra titikop intok liwar ru bandar buoi talu ngoorou, kaa' kalo natuum nilo. Ginio ra siminaguli' ulun sinusub no ra bandar Jiriko.
Bagu no ulun-ulun pansigo no timinuun intor ra kabuluran, liminaup ra sungoi, am saguli' ri Josua. Nambala' ilo ri Josua ra ngaangai' ondo' nasauk risilo.
Indagu ilo boo, “Mangintopot akai ra manaak

Tawang ra suabon no, kiminarat mataki' i Josua am ngaangai' ulun ru Israil. Nangiruan ilo ra pangkiman giu' ra Sitim, am ongoi ra Sungoi Jordan. Nangkim ilo ra giu' no liliwa' naginaa koson lumaup ra sungoi no.
Kopongo talu ngoorou, liminiput tingganai nilo ra pangkiman
am indagu ra ulun ru Israil, “Paat ra akau makakito ra imam-imam magibit ra Kaban Nabantuan ru
Kalo igondo' kau ongoi ragiti, ginio ra maningganai ilo ra pangkiralanan min. Kaa' pai' inggaar ra Kaban Nabantuan. Ugar noyo olo'-olo' sakilomito giu' ra tinaulian ru Kaban Nabantuan.”
Indagu i Josua ra ulun raginio, “Impasawi' min inan mino sabap ra susuab no mambaal
I Josua pana nanusub ra imam-imam nangkayang ra Kaban Nabantuan am minugar siminigulu ra ulun ru Israil. Imam-imam no pana nambaal koson raginio.
Indagu
