Paat ra ulun ru Israil natimung giu' ra Mijpa, Nagibot ilo. Konilo, “Kolondo' sangulun pana intor ramon ti mangiou ra anak ruandu' mai pawatin ra ulun ru Binjamin.”
Raino minongoi ulun ru Israil ra Bitil am panturung ra saang ri Aki Kapuuno' saboi ra rondom. Nantangi' ilo am nampiau,
“Iou
Suabon no ra iosusuab, nambaal ilo ra rondo' altar ra giu' no. Napataak ilo ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Pangkuot ilo boo, “Mokoondo' kia bansa'-bansa' ra gino ngai' ru ulun ru Israil ondo' kalo maya' sambayang ra
Makaasi' ilo ra bansa' ru Binjamin am indagu, “Paat ra raiti' natatakan ulun ru Israil ra rondo' intor ra bansa' nano.
Atan kia musiti' baalon takau koson mokoowot ra andu' ru tayar ru bansa' ru Binjamin ondo' soroi no? Nakapagibot takau noyo ra
Paat ilo nangkuot ru lakat poyo mokoondo' bansa' ra gino ngai' ru ulun ru Israil ondo' kalo minaya' sambayang ra
Paat inilayan nanulisan ra inggalan, natutun ra kolondo' sangulun pana intor ra Jabis ondo' siminaang.
Ginio sabap ra ulun ondo' timinimung ra Bitil no nangator ra 12,000 ngaulun ondo' baani kaga' ra Jabis, nabaya' ra susuban, “Potoyo' moonong ulun giu' ra Jabis, makaaya' ruandu' am lalaing.
Potoyo' ngaangai' ungkuyon am moonong ruandu' ondo' sala' ka ralaa.”
Intor ra bansa' ondo' minayan ra Jabis no, natutun nilo ra 400 ngaulun ralaa ondo' lakat poyo mamulok. Nagibit ilo ra ngaangai' ralaa no ra pangkiman giu' ra Silo, giu' ra tana' ru Kanaan.
Kopongo raginio ngaangai' ulun ru Israil nangator ra ulun sinusub ra bansa' ru Binjamin ondo' giu' ra gunung batu giu' ra Rimon koson makimobonsoi.
Ginio ra bansa' ru Binjamin pana siminaguli', am pataako' ru ulun ru Israil risilo ralaa intor ra Jabis ondo' kalo pinatoi ra paanduin risilo. Kaa' suang no kalo naukop.
Makaasi' ulun ru Israil ra bansa' ru Binjamin sabap jinajou ru

Ginio sabap ra indagu tingganai-tingganai giu' ra pantimungan no, “Kolondo' boo kia ruandu' ru bansa' ru Binjamin. Atan musiti' takau baalon maa' raginio bala ru ungkuyon ondo' lakat poyo soroi ti mokoowot ra andu'?

Pai' masaboi ra Israil ti matatakan ra rondo' pana intor ra mopor am ruo bansa' nano. Musiti' takau maguyum ra ralan maa' raginio bansa' ru Binjamin mokoowot ra papag am magulayun manungkus ra titikop ru tana' nilo;
kaa' kalo mangiou takau ra anak ruandu' takau pawatin risilo, sabap ra nakapagulas takau noyo ra osoi ayuk ondo' mangiou ra ulun ru Binjamin maguot ra anak ruandu' takau.”
Kakara' nilo boo pangiantakan kabilaran tayar ru
Indagu boo tingganai-tingganai ra ulun ru Binjamin ondo' lakat poyo soroi, “Pansibuni giu' ra umo ru anggur giu' ra Silo

am paginaa ra giu'. Paat ralaa ru Silo matong mansayau paat ra pangiantakan no, ingkual intor ra umo ru anggur no, am sigagama' jumajal mangalap ra ralaa-ralaa no. Saukon ilo ra andu' min am ibiton ilo muli' ra wilayah ru Binjamin.
Amon ama' kapoam pabukat ungkuyon nilo matong am mansang, paraguon min,

Bansa' ru Binjamin pana nambaal boo raginio. Sigagama' nampili' ra andu' intor ra ralaa ondo' nansayau giu' ra Silo, am nagibit risilo minuli'. Kopongo raginio siminaguli' ilo ra wilayah ru sigagama' am nambaal saguli' ra bandar nilo am niayuk minayan ra giu' no.
Ulun ru Israil ra bokon pana minuli' ra bansa' am niayuk sasambaloi ru sigagama', am ra tana' longgom nilo.

Galing i ra kalo poyo ulun ru Israil makaraja', makabitilan nasauk giu' ra tana' ru Kanaan. Naintuma' ragili mokoondo' sangulun ungkuyon ininggalanan ri Ilimilik. Io intor ra bansa' ru Iprata, am minayan giu' ra Bitligim ra libung Jiuda. Sabap ra bitilan no, ongoi io ra pagun Moab nabaya' ra andu' nano i Naomi, am poyo ruo ngaulun anak ungkuyon nano, i Maglon am i Kilion. Minayan ilo ra Moab ra buoi. Buoi nilo ra giu',
patoi i Ilimilik, am soroi ayuk i Naomi am ruo ngaulun anak ungkuyon nano.
Anak-anak ungkuyon nano nanangandu' ra ruandu' ru Moab, ondo' ininggalanan ri Orpa am i Rut. Pakaayan ilo ra Moab buoi mopor ngambilor,
i Maglon am i Kilion ti boo minatoi, i Naomi ayuk boo sangulun soroi. Io nairuanan ru ralaki nali am karuruo anak nali.
Kopongo raginio nakaining i Naomi ra nambarakat
Pintor ilo ngaangai' koson sumaguli' ra Jiuda. Kaa' ralalom pangkiralanan,
indagu i Naomi ra karuruo ngaulun anak mangiwan nano, “Uli' kano ra baloi ru ina' mino. Gama' ru gumonsoi
Gama' ru manaak
Karagu no ginii, alok i Naomi risilo am pamintor. Kaa' sisikok nantangi' i Orpa am i Rut.
Indagu ilo ri Naomi, “Kalo! Maya' akai rirun sumaguli' ra bansa' muli.”
Kaa' taam i Naomi, “Moonsoi poyo muli' kau. Kua baya' kau raki'? Aku ti kalo boo maganak koson paganduon ramuyun!
Uli' kano. Matutuo aku noyo kalo boo sama' mangindalaki. Amon ru sama' poyo aku mangindalaki ra rondom raiti' niayuk am makaalap ra anak ungkuyon,

makainaa kau kia saboi ilo masukor? Babaai boo ru ginio mongompong ramuyun ra kalo mangindalaki ra bokon? Pai' koon raginio anak kau. Mangiluk guang kuno ra atan ondo' mailian min kalalaat sabap ra ukuman ru
Sikok poyo ri Rut am i Orpa nantangi'. Pintor boo i Orpa alok ra kalindu' ru iwan nano am uli'.
Indagu i Naomi riso, “Ilai' Rut, ilas muno minuli' noyo ra bansa' nano am ra dewa-dewa nano. Ugar no anak kuno. Uli' no koson ra ilas muno.”
Kaa' taam i Rut,
“Pai' aku susubo' muli'. Iowo' aku no maya' rirun.
Ati ayuk angayan muno, maya' aku ayuk.
Ati ayuk ayanan muno, giu' no niayuk ayanan kuno. Bansa' muno, bansa' ku niayuk, am i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' sambaan muno, sambaan ku niayuk.
Ati ayuk patayan muno,
giu' niayuk patayan kuno am labangan kuno.
Polosoon noyo
amon ru mopoloso aku ra atan-atan mampatuliar rito
ondo' ak am kapatayan.”
Kakito ri Naomi ra jumajal i Rut maya' riso, kolondo' boo atan-atan ragu ri Naomi.
Parampus ilo ugar polos ilo nakasuku' ra Bitligim. Pakasaboi ilo, posongonsol ngaangai' namagun ra bandar no. Indagu ruandu'-ruandu' ra giu' no, “Motopot kia ginio i Naomi?”
Taam i Naomi, “Pai' aku piawo' ri Naomi. Piawo' aku ri Mara,
Galing i paat ra aku nanatang ra intok ragitio naukapan aku, kaa' raino inibit aku saguli' ru
Ginio noyo tunung ri Naomi minuli' intor ra Moab nabaya' ri Rut, anak mangiwan nano, ulun ru Moab no. Nakasaboi ilo ra Bitligim ra talimpuunan ru mangkumos ra barli.
I Naomi mokoondo' ra pantukir ru ralaki nali, i Ilimilik. Sangulun intor risilo no ininggalanan ri Boas, am io paawang am niayuk urumaton.

Paat ra sangarawan, indagu i Rut ri Naomi, “Susubo' aku no mongoi ra umo koson mampalulur ra barli ondo' napulayat intor ra kalindu' ru nangkumos. Maaru' makatuum aku ra ulun ondo' nakapulayat raginio.”
Taam i Naomi, “Ugar no anak kuno.”
Ongoi boo i Rut ra umo. Minaya' io ra ulun-ulun mangkumos ra giu' liliwa' nanganam ra barli ondo' napulayat. Naintuma' ra io soroi ra umo ri Boas, sangulun intor ra pantukir ri Ilimilik.
Kalo nabuoi raginio, i Boas galama' minatong intor ra Bitligim. Nangani' io ra ompor ra ngaangai' mangandoi nano. “Gama' ru
“Gama' ru
Nangkuot boo i Boas ra tingganai ru mangandoi nano, “Osoi kia ralaa raginio?”
Tingganai ru mangandoi no nambala', “Io ruandu' bansa' ru bokon ondo' bagu minatong intor ra Moab minaya' ri Noami.
Nakiasi' io maya' ra ngaangai' mangandoi takau koson mampalulur ra barli napulayat. Nokorondom io ra susuab i nangandoi, am bagu io ayuk tangus sangkinolor ra kim.”
Indagu boo i Boas ri Rut, “Rongogo' noyo ragu kutu. Pai' no ongoi pampalulur ra barli umo ra bokon, ondo' ayuk am umo ragitio. Pangandoi no mabaya' ra ngaangai' mangandoi ruandu' ragiti.

Ilai' ati pangandayan nilo am baya' no risilo. Sumangit aku toojo ra ngaangai' ungkuyon mangandoi koson mangulipon rirun. Amon ru paason kou, inum no ra timug ondo' sinuangan nilo ra rarapu'-rarapu' no.”
Igulatur i Rut am indagu ri Boas, “Kua guango' mu aku koon raginio am bonsoi ru guang muno raki'? Aku ti ulun ru bansa' ra bokon ayuk!”

Taam i Boas, “Norongog ku noyo nansalinut ondo' binaal muno ra iwan muno intor ra ralaki muli minatoi. Nakapandai aku ra okou nanatang ra matuo muno ra pagun min koson maya' simpung ra bansa' ondo' kalo nauligan min.
Gama' ru balasin ru
Kon ri Rut, “Moonsoi toojo guang muno. Napabansuk kou ra guang kutu. Molomoi kou mindagu raki', kabalu' pana aku kalo nokogondo' ra mangngandoi muno.”

Paat mangakan tanga' ru orou, indagu i Boas ri Rut, “Ibok akan takano. Pososopo' ruti' muno ra ruu' no.” Panturung i Rut pababaya' ra mangandoi ra bokon no am pasulungo' ri Boas riso barli sininggala'. Pangakan i Rut saboi naasug. Kopongo nangakan, kumoso' no suwo nano.

Paat io mongoi poyo pampalulur ra barli, indagu i Boas ra ngaangai' mangngandoi nano, “Polosoo' io noyo mampalulur ra barli napulayat am niayuk binangkos no. Pai' io sawayo'. Butuso' kukula' ngantaun barli intor ra binangkos no am patatango' noyo ra giu' maa' raginio makapampalulur io.”
Mampalulur i Rut ra barli ra umo no suku' mamai'. Kopongo io nangagik ra barli no, ilai' no barli ondo' linulur nano maar mopor ngakilogram.
Ibito' no barli no ra bandar, am patalango' no ra iwan ruandu' nano kula' suang ru barli ondo' linulur nano. Taaki' no niayuk ra iwan nano ondo' kalo nakai' nilo kaakan.
Indagu i Naomi riso, “Ati naalapan mu ra ginii? Osoi ra umo nangandayan muno? Gama' ru barakaton ri Aki Kapuuno' ulun ondo' moonsoi rirun!”
Tunungo' ri Rut ri Naomi ra io nangandoi ra umo ru sangulun ondo' ininggalanan ri Boas.
“Gama' ru barakaton ru
Kon ri Rut, “Niayuk io nopoloso raki' nampalulur ra barli nababaya' ra ngaangai' mangngandoi nano suku' makai' nilo mangkumos ra umo no.”

Indagu i Naomi ri Rut, “Moonsoi noyo ginio, moonsoi poyo okou mangandoi mababaya' ra ngaangai' mangngandoi ruandu' ra umo ri Boas. Amon mangandoi kou ra umo ru ulun ra bokon, ati ru uliponon kou ru ulun ra giu' no.”
I Rut pana masaga' maya' ra ngaangai' ruandu' mangngandoi ra umo ri Boas. I Rut mampalulur ra barli am gandum ra giu' no suku' nakai'. Buoi raginio i Rut minayan ra iwan ruandu' nano.
Tauli no indagu i Naomi ri Rut, “Moonsoi uyumin tokou ra ralaki, koson makabaloi kou galama' am moonsoi kaayagan.
Karaa', ulun tatangan ra umo intok nangandayan muno am ngaangai' mangngandoi ruandu' no pabukat to poyo. Raino rongogo'! Maino no mangagik io ra barli.
Pariu' no raino am pagumau ra umau maamis owou
Kuliararin mu intok luyaan nano. Makalunus io, sukiapon mu bajang nano am luya' no ra maar ra tupakon nano.
Taam i Rut, “Maya' aku ayuk ra ngaangai' raguon muno ina'.”
Kopongo raginio ongoi boo i Rut ra pangagikan ra barli am nambaal ra koson ra nanusuban ru iwan nano.
Pakaakan am pakainum i Boas, naansukan io. Ongoi io ra tinuntur ra barli, luya' am pombolong. Sinok-sinok boo i Rut mininggaar riso. Sukiapo' no bajang ri Boas am pombolong maar ra tupakon nano.
Olo'-olo' mampayung rondom, nangkailan i Boas am pambuir. Naliangan io nakakito ra sangulun ruandu' nombolong maar ra tupakon nano.
“Osoi kou?” kuot ri Boas.
“Aku i Rut, tuan,” taam nano. “Kasaga' no mamingkal ra sukub koson mangampin raki'; kasaga' no manangandu' raki'. Sabap okou no pabukat mamaar ramon, okou noyo napalansanan ra bayag kuno.”
“Mambarakat
Pai' kaimamang, Rut. Suguton ku ngaangai' kitaakon muno. Ngaangai' ulun ru bandar nakapandai ra okou ruandu' ondo' moonsoi paliso.
Sotopot no aku ti pabukat molongkot muno am magalung rirun, kaa' mokoondo' poyo sangulun pabukat muno molongkot poyo intor raki'.

Kaa' ayan ayuk poyo ragiti. Susuab no, amon ru pabukat raginio masaga' magalung rirun, moonsoi niayuk. Amon ru kalo mambaal aku ra bantu' sabap ri Aki Kapuuno' ondo' maayag ra magalung aku rirun. Raino pombolong no saboi ra susuab.”
Nombolong i Rut ra tupakon ri Boas, kaa' suabon no, nakarat i Rut ra lakat poyo molondom. Marara' io makito ru ulun, sabap marara' i Boas mapandayan ru ulun ra soroi i Rut ra giu'.

Indagu i Boas riso, “Paguso' sakiking muno am pabingkalo' ragiti.” Ginagaya' ri Rut susuban raginio. Pabuuro' boo ri Boas olo'-olo' ruo ngoopor ngakilogram barli ra sakiking no. Kopongo raginio pasaano' ri Boas ra limbawo ri Rut. Minuli' i Rut liliwa' nansaan ra barli no.
Pakasaboi i Rut ra baloi, pangkuot iwan no ra ruandu' riso, “Atan boo kulaan ru ugar muni?”
Tinunung ngaangai' ri Rut ondo' binaal ri Boas riso.
Kon poyo ri Rut, “Kon ri Boas, kalo sumaguli' aku rirun amon ru kolondo' ibiton. Taaki' no boo raki' ngaangai barli ti.”
Indagu i Naomi riso, “Kulimani' ayuk, Rut. Mapandayan mu niayuk ra kapupusan ru ngaangai' ti. Kalo mongkoror i Boas amon ru kalo masalasai baal ragitio ra orou raiti' niayuk.”

Ongoi i Boas ra baloi pantuuman giu' ra kulobon garabang ru bandar am panturung io. Paat ragili pansail ulun ondo' sabiton no ra pabukat mamaar ri Ilimilik no. Piawo' ri Boas ulun no. “Ibok no pabukat ku,” kono. “Panturung no.” Ratong pabukat no am panturung ra giu' no.
I Boas pana nakitaak ra mopor ngaulun tingganai ru bandar no koson maya' panturung ra giu' no. Ilo pana nanturung,
indagu i Boas ra pabukat nano, “Nakasaguli' noyo i Naomi intor ra Moab, am mantalan io ra tana' longgom ru pabukat takau i Ilimilik.

Kara' ru guang kuno akau musiti' balain pagulu. Amon moogot kau mambali ra tana' no moonsoi balion min ra saang ru masuang ulun nanturung ragiti. Kaa' amon ru kalo masaga' kau mambali ra tana' no, pambala' no; sabap ra akau noyo maatang mambali am bagu no aku.”
Indagu ulun no, “Balion ku tana' no.”
Indagu poyo i Boas, “Iou noyo. Amon ru balion min tana' no intor ri Naomi, arati' no alapon min niayuk i Rut,
Taam ulun no, “Koon poyo ragino kalo masaga' aku mambali ra tana' no. Balion ku pana tana' no, lalaing-lalaing kuno kalo makatungkus raginio. Okou noyo mambali ra tana' no, kalo boo masaga' aku.”

Bulintok ragili, koson mangiou ra pantalanan kapoam pangaligan ra rapu', kaubasan no paguson ru mantalan no kasut nano am taakin ra ulun mambali. Sumugut ra kaulayan ru Israil, koon raginio napatas noyo nantalanan ra tana' no.
Ginio ra, paat ra ulun no minindagu ri Boas, “Okou noyo mambali ra tana' no,” paguso' no kasut nano am taaki' no ri Boas.

Kopongo raginio indagu i Boas ra tingganai-tingganai no am ngaangai' ru ulun ondo' soroi ra giu', “Akau noyo sasi' ra orou raiti', ra intor ri Naomi binali ku ngaangai' longgom ri Ilimilik am anak-anak nano, i Kilion am i Maglon.

Ra am poyo i Rut ruandu' ru Moab no, napuor ri Maglon no, andu' ku raino ti. Raginio noyo, tana' longgom ru ulun minatoi masauk ra longgom mantilayun ru papag nano. Papag nano pana magulayun soroi ra pabukat-pabukat nano am mayan ra bandar nano. Akau noyo sasi' ru ginio ra orou raiti'.”
Gama' ru anak-anak ondo' taakin ru
I Boas pana nagibit boo ri Rut minuli' koson andu' no. Binarakat ru
Ruandu'-ruandu' ra giu' no mindagu ri Naomi, “Koompor noyo

Motogom mangiwan muno rirun nanguyumo rirun moonsoi poyo intor ra tulu' ngaulun anak ungkuyon. Raino nanaak io rirun ra sangulun akupu ondo' mangulau suku' masauk ra kaayagan bagu rirun, am magalung rirun ra okou matutuo.”
Alapo' ri Naomi anak no, kubibilo' no am talanaako' no.
Ruandu'-ruandu' ondo' pasambalayan ri Naomi nanginggalan ra anak no i Obid. Mindagu ilo ra moonong ulun, “I Noami makaanak sangulun ungkuyon!”
I Obid ti noyo masauk ra ama' ri Isai ra tauli no, am i Isai masauk ra ama' ri Daut.
Papag ri Piris polos ri Daut koson ragitio: Piris, Gijron, Ram, Aminadab, Nagason, Salmon,

Mokoondo' sangulun ungkuyon inggalan no i Ilkana. Ioti intor ra bansa' ru Ipraim ondo' minayan giu' ra bandar Rama, tampilon ra kabuluran Ipraim. I Ilkana ti anak ri Jirogam am akupu ri Iligu. I Ilkana ti intor ra sasambaloi ri Togu, rondo' ra sasambaloi intor ra bansa' ru Jup.
Ruo ngaulun andu' ri Ilkana, i Ana am i Pinina. I Pinina ti makaanak kaa' i Ana kolondo'.
Moonong bilor mintor i Ilkana ra Rama am mongoi ra Silo koson sumambayang am mapataak ra taak simbalui ra
Moonong ri Ilkana napataak ra taak simbalui, nangani' io ri Pinina ra santayaran ra kual ru taak simbalui no am santayaran ra moonong anak nano.
Kabalu' pana motogom kaga' i Ilkana ri Ana, nangani' i Ilkana riso ra rondo' tayar ayuk ru kual, sabap ra
Masalok i Ana sindualin am asabin ri Pinina, paguntu nano sabap ra
Baal raginio nasauk ra bibilor buoi no. Pogonong ra ilo minongoi ra baloi ru

Moonong boo raginio ralaki nano i Ilkana mangkuot riso, “Ana, kua pantangi' kou? Kua karara' kou mangakan? Kua masalok mangiluk guang? Sala' ka kia aku ti maatang poyo rirun intor ra mopor ngaulun anak ungkuyon?”
Sangarawan raiti, pakaakan ilo giu' ra baloi ru
Kopongo raginio rinagu ri Ana rondo' bantu', kono, “Iou
Nabuoi kaga' i Ana nakiasi' ra
Nakiasi' i Ana ra ralalom ru guang; ginio ra bibil nano ayuk ondo' kukuniam kaa' bolos nano kalo morongog. Ginio ra indoson ri Ili nagauk io.
Kopongo raginio indagu i Ili riso, “Pai' gauk ragiti! Pai' boo panginum ra wain!”
Taam i Ana, “Tuan, kalo nagauk aku. Kalo nanginum aku ra wain. Aku ti malumpus guang, am tatanga' aku makiasi' koson mapaingkual ra suang ru guang ra
Pai' pangkara' ra aku ti ruandu' jajajou. Makiasi' aku koson ragitio sabap ra mangiluk kaga' guang kutu.”
Indagu boo i Ili, “Amon ru koson raginio, uli' no ra kaansayan. Gama' ru i Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil mangiou ra kitaakon muno.”
Indagu i Ana, “Gama' ru makaalap aku ra kimasi' muno.” Kopongo raginio ugar i Ana intor ra giu' no, am pangakan am kalo boo mangiluk guang.
Suabon raginio, i Ilkana am sasambaloi nano kiminarat ra mataki'. Pakasambayang ilo ra
Maapang i Ana am naganak ra sangulun anak ungkuyon. Ininggalanan ri Ana anak nano ri Samuil,
Kopongo raginio nasaboi noyo paat ri Ilkana am sasambaloi nano mongoi poyo ra Silo koson mapataak ra taak simbalui kabilaran ra
Kaa' raino ti kalo minaya' i Ana. Indagu io ra ralaki nano, “Lumonggo' ayuk i Samuil ti ra tumiti', ibiton ku io ra baloi ru
Indagu i Ilkana, “Iou, baalo' noyo ondo' ilain mu ra moonsoi. Soroi no ra baloi ti saboi anak tano lumonggo' ra tumiti'. Gama' ru mambaal
Pokolonggo' anak no ra tumiti', inibit io ri Ana ra baloi ru
Kasimbalui nilo sapi' no, atari' nilo i Samuil no ri Ili.
Indagu i Ana ri Ili, “Tuan, lakat mu poyo kia makara' aku? Aku noyo ruandu' ondo' nakito muli minigor ragiti ragili, ondo' nakiasi' ra
Kinitaak ku anak ragitio intor ra
Ginio ra pataakon ku anak ti ra
Kopongo raginio sambayang ilo
“Napakaansuk
mapara' boo bansuk kutu,
sabap ra atan ondo' binaal Nano raki'.
Raino kuritin ku pantula' kuno;
mapara' boo bansuk kuno
sabap ra nangindangan noyo i Aki Kapuuno' no raki'.
“Kolondo' sangulun pana matulai koson ra
kolondo' mokogondo' Riso;
i Aki Kapuuno' takano ayuk makapanaak ra panindungan.
Langgai' noyo ragu muno ra malilimbau,
pai' indagu ra ragu masumbung.
Sabap ra
mangakim Io ra ngaangai' baalon ru ulun.
Napandak noyo busur ru saujor ondo' mapanggol,
kaa' nasauk boo ulun ondo' malawo ra mapanggol.
Ulun ondo' naasug ragili,
raino ti moonsoi mangandoi ra maginakan;
kaa' ondo' nangaitilan ragili, raino ti nangaasug boo.
Andu' ondo' tabanang naganak ra tulu' ngaulun anak,
kaa' ina' ondo' makaanak ra masuang,
tinatang am pinoloso naimbolo'.
am Io niayuk mamayag risilo.
Io mangator ra ulun mongoi ra intok ru ulun namagatoi,
am Io niayuk magibit risilo saguli'.
am bokon no pasaukon ra langkaya'.
Io mapainggana' ra santayaran ru ulun,
am bokon no painsawaton.
Io mangkayang ra ulun musikin intor ra kaimbalaan,
am Io mapalabus ra ulun asabin intor ra kaimbalaan.
Ilo pasaukon ra rangan ru ulun mangaatang ondo' makapangkat,
am aniin ra intok maatang kaga'.
Lonor ru tana' ti longgom ru
giu' ra ralimbou ru lonor no, tinirong no tana' ti.
“Manindung Io ra kaayagan ru ulun Nano ondo' gumagaya',
kaa' ulun malaat mapuso ralalom ru molondom kaga'.
Ra kaikangan galama', ulun kalo makasugut.
Pantula'-pantula' ru
maningkalur Io intor ra limbowon koson gumula' risilo.
Mangakim
Manaak Io ra kuasa' ra raja',
am manaak ra kamanangan ra raja' pilion Nano.”
Kopongo raginio minuli' i Ilkana ra baloi nano giu' ra Rama, kaa' i Samuil, anak no minayan giu' ra Silo am mangandoi ayuk ra
Anak-anak ri Ili malaat kaga'. Kalo mampalio ilo ra

Ilo niayuk kalo mampalio ra aturan intor ra ondo' kitaakon ru imam intor ra ulun ru Israil. Kaa', amon ru mokoondo' ulun ondo' mapataak ra taak simbalui, ulipon ru imam no matong liliwa' magibit ra garapu' talu tutujok. Buoi ru kual no tonokon,

patujokon ru ulipon no garapu' no ra pagangan, intok nangansakan ra kual no. Atan ayuk ondo' asakin no ra garapu' no masauk ra longgom ru imam. Ngaangai' ulun ru Israil ondo' matong ra Silo koson mapataak ra taak simbalui no koson raginio pamakuan no.

Mambai-ambai poyo, ulipon no matong ra kalo poyo malilip lomok ru bibiag no koson solobon, am mindagu io ra ulun ondo' mapataak ra taak simbalui no, “Taaki' kual ondo' makata' ayuk poyo no ra imam maa' raginio solobon no; kalo masaga' io mangapu ra kual ondo' tinanok noyo.”

Amon ru tumaam ulun no, “Moonsoi gagayaan takau aturan am solobon galing lomok no; malupus raginio alapon mu boo atan ondo' kasagaan muno,” am mindagu ulipon no, “Kalo! Taaki' kual no raki' raino niayuk! Amon ru kalo, jajalin ku alapo'.”
Koon raginio noyo karuruo anak ri Ili no makatula ra maayo ra pagilangan ru
Liliwa' raginio, i Samuil ondo' lalaing ayuk poyo narayus mangandoi ayuk ra
Moonong bilor ina' ri Samuil mambaal ra sukub boborok, am sukub no pataakon ri Samuil paat ra ina' no matong mabaya' ra ralaki nano koson mapataak ra taak simbalui ra kabilaran.
Barakato' boo ri Ili no i Ilkana am andu' nano, am niayuk mindagu ri Ilkana, “Gama' ru
Kopongo raginio minuli' ilo ra Rama.
Binarakat i Ana ru

I Ili ti matutuo noyo kaga'. Masalok io mokorongog ra ragu intor ra binaal ru anak-anak nano ra ulun ru Israil. Nakapandai niayuk i Ili ra ilo riminulug ra ruandu'-ruandu' ondo' mangandoi giu' ra kulobon ru Kim ru
Ginio ra indagu i Ili ra anak-anak nano, “Binalaan aku noyo ru moonong ulun intor ra kalaatan ondo' binaal mino. Kua kia baalo' min ginio?
Pai' min boo inganai' ginio, anak kau. Malaat kaga' baal ondo' rinagu ru ulun ru
Amon ru sasangulun no makatula ra ulun, saungon io ri Aki Kapuuno'; kaa' amon ru sasangulun no makatula ra
Kaa' anak-anak ri Ili no kalo mampalio ra bilin ru ama' nilono, sabap ra namatas noyo
Sangarawan raiti sangulun nabi minatong ri Ili am nampasaboi ra tanou intor ra
Intor ra ngaangai' bansa' ru Israil, pinili' Ku sasambaloi nano nasauk ra imam Kuno koson mangandoi giu' ra altar, monolob ra kaminyan, am mambayang ra efod

Kaa' kua kia lakat kou poyo mangangkum ra taak am taak simbalui ondo' pinataak ru ulun Kuno Raki'? Mapataak ilo ra ngaangai' no Raki' sumugut ra susuban Kuli risilo. Okou Ili, kua kia okou mangurumat poyo ra anak-anak muno intor ra mangurumat Raki', am nompoloso risilo liminomok ra tayar moonsoi kaga' intor ra moonong taak simbalui ondo' pinataak ru ulun Kuno Raki'?
Aku
Rongogo', masaboi paat no ra mamatoi Aku ra ngaangai' ungkuyon intor ra sasambaloi am bansa' muno, saboi kolondo' boo sangulun pana ungkuyon intor ra sasambaloi muno ondo' maayag saboi matutuo.
Mangiluk guang am mangusolon kou magilong ra ngaangai' barakat ondo' taakin Kuno ra ulun bokon ra Israil, am ralalom ru sasambaloi muno galama' ngaangai' ulun matoi ra mamulok.
Kaa' sangulun intor ra papag muno polosoon Ku maayag, am mangandoi io Raki' ra tayar ru imam. Kaa' moolou io am maayag ra malumpus guang. Ngaangai' ru papag muno ra bokon no potoyon ra moporos.
Paat ra karuruo anak muno, i Gopni am i Pinigas, matoi ra nogondo' orou, bagu no malimanan mu ra ngaangai' ondo' raguon Kutu totopot masauk.
Mampili' Aku ra sangulun imam ondo' gumagaya' Raki' am ondo' mambaal ra ngaangai' ru susuban Kuno. Manaak Aku riso ra papag ondo' magail mangandoi tayar ra imam ra raja' ondo' pilion Kuno.

Moonong ra papag muno ondo' lakat poyo maayag mongoi ra imam no koson makitaak ra ruit am akanon. Makitaak io maa' raginio paindanganon ra imam-imam koson makaalap ra akanon ioupana ru sambayut ayuk.’ ”
Liliwa' raginio, i Samuil ondo' lalaing ayuk poyo, tatanga' mangandoi ayuk ra
Sarandaman raiti, i Ili ondo' matutuo noyo kaga' am mamaar moolou, tatanga' nombolong ra lamin nano.
Paat raginio i Samuil nombolong giu' ra ralalom baloi ru
pampiau
Kopongo raginio pasimbul io ongoi ri Ili am indagu, “Tuan nampiau kou raki', am ratong aku boo.”
Taam i Ili, “Kalo nampiau aku rirun. Ongoi no koolong.” I Samuil pana minongoi boo koolong saguli'.
Kopongo raginio pampiau poyo
Kaa' taam i Ili, “Kalo nampiau aku rirun. Ongoi no koolong.”
Nampiau
Kopongo raginio nakaliman i Ili ra
Ginio ra indagu i Ili ri Samuil, “Ongoi no koolong. Amon ru piawon kou poyo, taamo' ra, ‘Indagu no, iou
Kopongo raginio ratong
Taam i Samuil, “Indagu no, iou
Indagu
Paat ra orou raginio baalon Ku ngaangai' lolob Kuno ra sasambaloi ri Ili, intor ra talimpuun saboi ra pupus.
Nambala' Aku noyo riso
Ginio ra magibot Aku ra sasambaloi ri Ili, ra koson mantilayun kolondo' taak simbalui kapoam taak ra atan pana ondo' makapuso ra tula ondo' makalalaa' kaga' no.”
Kopongo raginio luya' i Samuil ra intok nambalangan nano saboi ra iosusuab. Kopongo raginio sukal io am nangukab ra kulobon-kulobon ra baloi ru
kaa' nampiau i Ili riso, “Samuil, anak kuno!”
Taam i Samuil, “Iou tuan.”
Nangkuot i Ili, “Atan kia rinagu ru
Ginio ra nantunung i Samuil ra ngaangai' no. Kalo binuni no atan pana. Kopongo raginio indagu i Ili, “Io noyo
Siminukor poyo i Samuil.
Ngaangai' boo ru ulun ru Israil intor ra titikop pagun no nangiou ra i Samuil no nabi ru
Narayus

Moonong i Samuil mindagu, ngaangai' ulun ru Israil rumongog riso.Paat raginio nanimung ulun ru Palistin ra saujor nilo koson mamulunsar ra Israil. Ginio ra saujor ru Israil pana minongoi ra intok pangayawan. Saujor ru Israil nangkim giu' ra Ibin-Gaijir, am saujor ru Palistin nangkim giu' ra Apik.
Namulunsar saujor ru Palistin ra saujor ru Israil, am kalupus nampapatoi toojo, naala saujor ru Israil. Olo'-olo' 4,000 ngaribu ngaulun ru Israil pinatoi ru saujor ru Palistin ra pangayawan no.
Paat ra saujor ru Israil ondo' lakat poyo naayag no minuli' ra pangkiman, indagu tingganai-tingganai ru Israil, “Kua kia nopoloso
Ginio ra nanusub ilo ra ulun mongoi ra Silo koson mangalap ra Kaban Nabantuan ru
Paat ra Kaban Nabantuan no nakasaboi ra pangkiman, noloos saujor ru Israil ra mapuor kaga' sabap ra naansukan, saboi tana' ti mapuyu'.
Nokorongog niayuk saujor ru Palistin ra noloos no am indagu, “Kua nua' noloos ulun ru Ibrani no?” Kaa' kalupus ra ilo nakapandai ra Kaban Nabantuan ru
nalaa' ilo. Konilo, “Mokoondo' ra dewa minatong ra pangkiman nilono! Aibui boo ritakau ti! Kalo poyo igondo' takau pakaili' ra baal koson ragitio!
Osoi kinua' makapamayag ritakau intor ra dewa-dewa ondo' maikang no? Dewa-dewa raginio noyo ondo' nakapamuso ra ulun ru Misir giu' ra tana' kaagisan ragili.

Pai' kau kalaa', saujor ru Palistin kau ngai'! Pangayou kano koson ra ungkuyon! Amon ru kalo, masauk takau ra ulipon ru ulun ru Ibrani koson ilo ragili nasauk ra ulipon takau. Ginio ra baani kano ra mangayou!”
Nangayou toojo saujor ru Palistin, am kinala nilo saujor ru Israil. Nagigiru' saujor ru Israil minongoi ra kim ru sigagama' sabap ra ilo naala toojo; suang 30,000 ngaulun saujor ru Israil no minatoi.
Kaban Nabantuan ri Aki Kapuuno' no ginaau ru pantula', am karuruo anak ri Ili, i Gopni am i Pinigas minatoi.

Sangulun intor ra bansa' ru Binjamin nagiru' intor ra intok pangayawan no am ongoi ra Silo. Nakasaboi io ra Silo ra orou raginio niayuk. Rinilak-rilak no noyo bayang nano am pinatauk tana' ra ulu koson ra tatandu' mangiluk guang.

I Ili ondo' magalabo kaga' mangkara' ra Kaban Nabantuan no tatanga' nanturung ra kurisi' giu' ra kiing ru ralan, liliwa' mangkuliman. Paat ra ulun no napatanou ra kakalaan ru ulun ru Israil giu' ra titikop ru bandar, nantatangi' ngaangai' ulun ra mosongou.
Norongog ri Ili noloos no am pangkuot, “Atan noloos no?” Liliwa' raginio pasimbul ulun ra raitii' ni am pambala' ra tanou malaat no.
Paat raginio umur ri Ili siam ngoopor am balu' ngambilor am mamaar io no moolou.
Indagu ulun no ri Ili, “Nagiru' aku intor ra intok pangayawan ra orou raiti' am kakasaboi ku ayuk.”
Pangkuot i Ili riso, “Atan tanou muno, ali ra anak kuno?”

Taam ulun nagibit ra tanou no, “Nagigiru' saujor ru Israil intor ra saujor ru Palistin. Naala akai kaga'. Masuang ulun pinatoi, nakaaya' ruo ngaulun anak muli, i Gopni am i Pinigas. Kaban Nabantuan ri Aki Kapuuno' niayuk ginaau ru pantula'!”

Paat ra ulun no nanabit ra Kaban Nabantuan, naratu' i Ili pakalangan intor ra kurisi' nano, giu' ra kiing ru kulobon garabang. Matutuo io noyo kaga' am molomok kaga', saboi paat io naratu' napandak liog nano. Paat raginio niayuk io minatoi. Nasauk io ra tingganai ru Israil buoi apat ngoopor ngambilor.

Paat raginio, anak mangiwan ri Ili, iono andu' ri Pinigas, tatanga' maapang am maar noyo paat ru paganakan nano. Paat ra io nokorongog ra Kaban Nabantuan ri Aki Kapuuno' ginaau noyo am iwan nano ra ungkuyon am niayuk ralaki nano minatoi noyo, namulali' io marualan ra maganak, am kalo nabuoi raginio naganak io.
Paat ra io mamaar noyo matoi, ruandu'-ruandu' ondo' nangindangan riso no mindagu riso, “Ikango' guang muno! Ungkuyon anak mutu!” Kaa' kalo timinaam io kapoam nampalio risilo.
Ininggalanan no anak raginio i Ikabod.
Kono, “Katulayan ri Aki Kapuuno' nangiruan noyo ra Israil, sabap ra ginaau noyo Kaban Nabantuan ri Aki Kapuuno'.”
Kopongo ulun ru Palistin napagaau ra Kaban Nabantuan, inibit nilo ginio intor ra Ibin-Gaijir minongoi ra Asdod, bandar nilono.
Giu' ra bandar no, inibit nilo Kaban Nabantuan no pinaumpos ra kuil Dagon, dewa nilono. Pinabanta' nilo Kaban no ra sapapa' ru dewa sinungkalalaing no.
Suabon no ra iosusuab, paat mamagun ru Asdod minongoi ra kuil no, nakito nilo sinungkalalaing Dagon nakakubu ra tana' giu' ra saang ru Kaban Nabantuan ru

Paat ra suabon raginio iosusuab, nakito nilo sinungkalalaing no naratu' poyo ra saang ru Kaban Nabantuan. Raino ti ulu ru sinungkalalaing no am karuruo longon nano naputul am nakabanta' ra kulobon no; inan ayuk boo ru sinungkalalaing no lakat poyo soroi. (
Ginio sabap ra saboi raino ti giu' ra Asdod imam ru Dagon am ngaangai' ru sumamba riso no lumandang ra kulobon ru kuil Dagon am kalo kuminjang raginio.)
Nangukum
Paat ilo nakakito ra atan ondo' tatanga' masauk no, indagu ilo, “I Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil no nangukum ritakau am i Dagon dewa takano. Pai' takau polosoo' Kaban Nabantuan no soroi poyo ragiti.”
Ginio ra nampiau ilo ra kalilimo ngaulun raja' ru Palistin ra tumimung, am pangkuot, “Atan kinua' moonsoi baalon takau ra Kaban Nabantuan ri Aki Kapuuno' ru ulun ru Israil no?”
Taam raja'-raja' no, “Pabandingo' Kaban no ra bandar Gat.” Kaban no pana pinabanding boo ra Gat, rondo' bandar ru Palistin ra bokon.
Kaa' kalupus Kaban no nakasaboi ra giu' no, nangukum

Ginio ra inataran nilo Kaban Nabantuan no ra Ikron, rondo' bandar ru Palistin ra bokon poyo. Kaa' paat Kaban no nakasaboi ra giu' no, indagu mamagun ru bandar no, “Ilai' noyo, nagibit ilo ra Kaban Nabantuan ri Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil no ragiti koson mamatoi ritakau ngai'!”

Ginio ra nampiau ilo ra ngaangai' raja' ru Palistin tumimung, am indagu, “Atarin min Kaban Nabantuan ri Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil no ra intok toojo nali, maa' raginio kalo makapamatoi ritakau am sasambaloi takau.” Ngaangai' mamagun ru bandar no maimamang sabap ra i Aki Kapuuno' nangukum risilo ra maagat kaga'.
Ulun ondo' kalo minatoi, natiu' ra maruol lumanit-lanit saboi mamagun ru bandar no giminolok makiindangan ra dewa-dewa nilo.
Kopongo ra Kaban Nabantuan ru
nampiau ulun ru Palistin ra imam-imam am ulun-ulun mapandai kaga' ra sihir, am pangkuot, “Atan kinua' baalon takau ra Kaban Nabantuan ru

Taam ilo, “Pai' min pasagulio' Kaban Nabantuan ri Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil no ra kolondo' paayaan ra atan pana taak ra tayar Riso no. Moonsoi Kaban no bayain ra taak ru tayar ra mamuso ra tula takau. Koon raginio noyo ra akau babason, am makapandai kau boo ra sasaban ri Aki Kapuuno' no mararayus mangukum ramuyun.”
Pangkuot poyo ulun ru Palistin, “Taak ra atan kinua' ondo' moonsoi pootoron takau?”

Taam ilo, “Atari' min limo lanit ra binaal-baal intor ra mas am niayuk limo tikus binaal-baal intor ra mas, nogondo' ra suang ru raja' ru Palistin. Baal makalalaa' ondo' nogondo' nakalumpa' noyo ramuyun ngaangai', iou ra mamagun am poyo ra raja'.

Musiti' takau mambaal ra binaal-baal intor ra lanit-lanit am tikus ondo' tatanga' kumokot malarom ra pagun minti. Koon raginio noyo akau manaak ra pangurumatan ri Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil. Maaru' lair lumonggo' Io mangukum ramuyun, dewa am tana' mino.

Atan onong no ra akau bambalingatan koson ra raja' ru Misir am mamagun nano ragili? Pai' min liliani' pinamakuan ri Aki Kapuuno' ra nangnganja' risilo, saboi nasuraan ilo am nopoloso ra ulun ru Israil nangiruan ra Misir.

Ginio sabap ra panampos kano ra rondo' padati ondo' baguon am ruo ngainan sapi' ondo' tatanga' mapatiti' ra anak, am ondo' kalo igondo' pinakai maparalaat ra padati no. Rukugi' noyo karuruo ngainan sapi' no ra padati no, am uyungo' anak-anak ru sapi' no sumaguli' ra kandang.
Mopongo raginio alapo' min Kaban Nabantuan ru

Ilain min ati angayan ru sapi' no; amon ru Kaban Nabantuan no ibiton mongoi ra pagun toojo nano, giu' ra bandar Bit-Simis, baal ragitio makaarati' ra i Aki Kapuuno' ru ulun ru Israil naparatong noyo ra karaat makalalaa' kaga' ritakau. Kaa' amon ru padati no kalo mongoi ra giu' no, makapandai takau ra baal makalalaa' raginio sala' ka intor ri Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil, kaa' nakainamot ayuk.”

Sinugut ru ulun-ulun ru Palistin; nangalap ilo ra karuruo ngainan sapi' ondo' tatanga' mapatiti' ra anak, am parukugo' karuruo ngainan sapi' no ra padati no, am anak-anak ru sapi' no boo inaput ralalom kandang.
Kopongo raginio pinasakoi Kaban Nabantuan no ra rasawat ru padati, pinabaya' ra kaban ondo' sinuangan ra tikus binaal-baal intor ra mas am lanit-lanit ra binaal-baal intor ra mas.

Narayus sapi'-sapi' no minugar sumaboi ra tampilon Bit-Simis; nampangaa' sapi'-sapi' no liliwa' narayus ugar, ra kalo liminisang ra kait kapoam ra pamiris intor ra ralan maayo. Kalilimo ngaulun raja' ru Palistin no narayus nanunu' ra sapi'-sapi' no saboi ra balitan ru bandar Bit-Simis.
Paat raginio mamagun ru Bit-Simis tatanga' mangkumos ra gandum giu' ra limayak. Paat ra ilo nakakito ra Kaban Nabantuan no, mapara' boo bansuk nilo!

Minuog padati no mamaar ra rondo' batu maayo giu' ra umo ri Josua, sangulun mamagun ru Bit-Simis. Mamagun ru bandar no nampalapak ra padati tataun no am nanimbalui ra ruo ngainan sapi' no, am pataako' ngaangai' no ra tayar ru taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Kopongo raginio pinatuun ru ulun-ulun ru Liwi Kaban Nabantuan ru
Paat ra kalilimo ngaulun raja' ru Palistin no nakakito ra ngaangai' kasaukan no, uli' ilo ra Ikron ra orou raginio niayuk.
Napakirim ulun ru Palistin ra limo lanit ra binaal-baal intor ra mas ra

Napakirim ilo niayuk ra tikus binaal-baal intor ra mas, rondo' ra tayar ru moonong bandar ondo' pinarinta ru limo ngaulun raja' ru Palistin no, iou ra bandar ondo' makatimbok am pekan ondo' kolondo' timbok. Inono' ru kasaukan raginio iono batu maayo intok napabantaan nilo ra Kaban Nabantuan ru
Namatoi
Indagu mamagun ru Bit-Simis, “Osoi kinua' masaga' muma' ra
Nangator ilo ra kukula' ngaulun maa' raginio mambala' ra mamagun ru Kiryat-Jiarim, “Pinasaguli' noyo ru ulun ru Palistin Kaban Nabantuan ru
Nabuoi niayuk Kaban Nabantuan ru
Indagu i Samuil ra ulun ru Israil, “Amon ru masaga' kau sumaguli' ra
Ginio ra ulun ru Israil namatir ra ngaangai' sinungkalalaing Dewa Baal am Dewi Asyitorit, am siminamba ra
Kopongo raginio indagu i Samuil, “Timungo' noyo ngaangai' ulun ru Israil giu' ra Mijpa. Mopongo raginio makiasi' aku ra tayar min ra giu' no.”
Ginio ra ilo ngaangai' timinimung giu' ra Mijpa. Nansagou ilo ra timug am sinasaran ginio ra tayar ru taak ra

Pakaining ulun ru Palistin ra ulun ru Israil timinimung noyo giu' ra Mijpa, limo ngaulun raja' ru Palistin no minongoi ra giu' nababaya' ra saujor nilo koson mamulunsar ra ulun ru Israil. Nalaa' ulun ru Israil paat ra ilo nokorongog ra baal raginio.
Indagu ilo ri Samuil, “Pai' kou longgo' makiasi' ra
Nanimbalui i Samuil ra sanginan anak domba mamulok am pinataak no ginio ra tayar ru taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Tatanga' i Samuil mapataak ra taak simbalui no, tumalimpuun ulun ru Palistin mamulunsar risilo. Kaa' paat raginio niayuk, naningkalur
Miningkual saujor ru Israil intor ra Mijpa am nangilou ra ulun ru Palistin saboi mamaar makasaboi ra Bit-Kar, liliwa' namatoi risilo ra galur ru ralan.
Kopongo raginio pinatirong ri Samuil rondo' batu giu' ra balitan ru Mijpa am Siin. Kono, “Nangindangan noyo toojo
Koon raginio noyo ra ulun ru Palistin kinala. Buoi ri Samuil naayag, nongompong

Ngaangai' bandar ru Israil tinalingaau noyo ru ulun ru Palistin, intor ra Ikron saboi ra Gat, pinasaguli' ra Israil. Koon raginio ra Israil nakaalap saguli' ra titikop ru wilayah nilo. Ulun ru Israil am ulun ru Amori pana naayag ra moonsoi.
Namarinta i Samuil ra Israil ra buoi ru bayag nano.
Moonong bilor ongoyon no liputo' Bitil, Gilgal am Mijpa. Giu' no nanalasai io ra baal-baal ru pansangaran.
Kopongo raginio masalok io muli' ra baloi nano giu' ra Rama. Giu' no nasauk io niayuk ra akim ru ulun ru Israil. Giu' ra Rama, nambaal io rondo' altar ra tayar ru
Paat ra i Samuil matutuo noyo, pinili' no anak-anak nano masauk ra akim giu' ra Israil.
Anak nano ra katuaan makainggalan ri Joil am ondo' karuo no makainggalan ri Abia. Karuruo no nasauk ra akim giu' ra Birsyiba.
Kaa' kalo namaya' ilo ra ama' nilono. Naguyum ilo ayuk ra kalabaan galama'; nangapu ilo ra rasua am nangakim ra mamagun ra kalo matanda'.
Kopongo raginio ngaangai' mamagun ru Israil timinimung am minuma' ri Samuil giu' ra Rama.

Indagu ilo risilo, “Rongogo' tuan, matutuo kou noyo am anak-anak muno kalo namaya' rirun. Ginio ra moonsoi poyo pilion mu sangulun raja' ra tayar mai, maa' raginio akai ti pana mokoondo' sangulun raja' koson ra bansa'-bansa' ra bokon.”
Kalo naansayan i Samuil ra kitaakon nilono, am nakiasi' io ra
Indagu
Intor ra Aku nagibit risilo miningkual intor ra Misir, tinalikuran nilo noyo Aku am siminamba ra dewa-dewa. Raino, atan ondo' binaal nilo rirun, masalok nilo noyo baalon Raki' niayuk.
Ginio ra suguto' noyo kitaakon nilono; kaa' anii' ilo ra papakaraan ra malasang, am balai' noyo ra baal pamakuan ru raja' nilono risilo ra maagu no.”
Pinasaboi ri Samuil ngaangai' ragu ru

Nambala' i Samuil, “Gitio noyo baal pamakuan ru raja' mino ramuyun ra maagu no. Alapon ru raja' no anak ungkuyon mino koson pasaukon ra saujor. Mokoondo' ondo' masauk ra pulalai ru mangkarita' kuda, mokoondo' poyo ondo' masauk ra pulalai ru mangkuda, mokoondo' poyo ondo' masisimbul ra saang ru kurita' kuda ru raja' no.

Mokoondo' ondo' pasaukon ra tingganai ru pulalai ra saribu ngaulun saujor, am mokoondo' poyo tingganai ru pulalai ra limo ngoopor ngaulun saujor. Jajalin ru raja' no anak ungkuyon mino maparagus ra umo nano, mangkumos ra ampos ru tinanom nano, am mambaal ra kinandoi am niayuk kuliamos ra tayar ru kurita' kuda ru raja'.
Anak ruandu' mino susubon mambaal ra umau maamis owou, am pongondoyon koson ra mangngansak am niayuk mambaal ra ruti' ra tayar ru raja'.
Alapon ru raja' no umo, umo ru anggur mino, am umo ru puun jaitun mino ra moonsoi kaga' no, am pataakon ngaangai' no ra pagawai-pagawai nano.
Umo am umo ru anggur mino kitaakin ra cukai mopor piatus intor ra ampos no, am paatakon ru raja' ginio ra pagawai-pagawai am pagawai ru saujor ru raja' no.
Alapon ru raja' no ulipon am bibiag tinambiag
Alapon ru raja' no mopor piatus intor ra ngaangai' bibiag tinambiag mino. Mulu' poyo ra akau galama' masauk ra ulipon ru raja' no.
Paat raginio mambutok kau sabap ra raja' mino, raja' ondo' pinili' mino galama'. Kaa' kalo lioon ru
Kalo lioon ru ulun ru Israil ragu ri Samuil no, kaa' konilo, “Polosoon noyo! Totopot akai masaga' ra sangulun raja'.
Masaga' akai masauk koson ra bansa'-bansa' ra bokon. Raja' maino mamarinta ramon am maningganai ramon ralalom ru pangayawan.”
Norongog ri Samuil ngaangai' ru ragu nilono, am pabalaa' no ginio ra
Taam

Mokoondo' sangulun ungkuyon ondo' langkaya' am makakuasa' intor ra bansa' ru Binjamin. Inggalan ru ulun no i Kis anak ri Abiil, akupu ri Jiror, intor ra sasambaloi ri Bikorat, iono santayaran intor ra bansa' ru Apia.

I Kis ti mokoondo' ra sangulun anak ungkuyon makainggalan ri Saul, sangulun buayoi ondo' maindon am mapanggol. Maindon poyo i Saul intor ra ngaangai' ru ulun giu' ra Israil am niayuk masawat poyo; kasuangan no ulun ru Israil ra bokon no polos ayuk ra limbawo ri Saul.
Sangarawan raginio, kukula' ngainan kaladai longgom ri Kis no natatak. Ginio ra indagu io ri Saul, “Ibito' sangulun ra ulipon no mabaya' rirun am ongoi uyumo' kaladai-kaladai no.”

Kopongo raginio i Saul am ulipon nano liminiput ra intok kabuluran ru Ipraim am Salisa, kaa' kalo natuum nilo kaladai-kaladai no. Kopongo raginio rinayus nilo pangkiralanan mongoi ra libung Saalim, kaa' kaladai-kaladai no kalio ra giu' no. Naguyum ilo poyo giu' ra wilayah Binjamin, kaa' kaladai-kaladai no lakat poyo kalo natuum.
Pakasaboi ilo giu' ra libung Jup, indagu i Saul ra ulipon nano, “Uli' tano, ati lair ru magalabo poyo i ama' i mangkara' rito intor ra kaladai-kaladai no.”

Taam ulipon no, “Pai' poyo! Giti ra bandar ti mokoondo' sangulun ulipon ri Aki Kapuuno'. Urumaton io kaga' ru ulun sabap ra atan ondo' raguon nano totopot masauk. Ongoi to uma' riso. Maaru' lair makapambala' io rito ra ati intok ru kaladai-kaladai no.”
Indagu i Saul, “Amon ru mongoi to uma' riso, atan kinua' pataakon to riso? Lutu' ra inibit tati nakai' noyo, am kolondo' atan pana boo pataakon to ra ulipon ri Aki Kapuuno' no?”
Taam ulipon no, “Aku ti mokoondo' sampila' ruit pirok. Pataakon ku ruit ti ra ulipon ri Aki Kapuuno' no, maa' raginio makapambala' io rito ra ati intok ru kaladai-kaladai no.”

Taam i Saul, “Iou noyo! Ongoi tano.” Ongoi ilo boo ra bandar, intok inayanan ru ulipon ri Aki Kapuuno' no. Paat ilo nangkiwa' ra bulur sumuku' ra bandar no, nakatuum ilo ra kukula' ngaulun ralaa ondo' mongoi pansagou giu' ra tulubong. Kuati' nilo ralaa-ralaa no, “Mokoondo' kia ulun mangilong soroi ra bandar ti?”
(Paat raginio, sangulun nabi sabiton ra ulun mangilong. Ginio ra paat sasangulun masaga' mangkuot ra rorondo' ri Aki Kapuuno', mindagu ilo, “Ongoi takau ra ulun mangilong.”)

Taam ralaa-ralaa no, “Mokoondo'. Bagu io ayuk nakapagulu ramuyun. Amon ru mataki' kau, maaru' masunu' min io. Makasaboi kau ayuk ra bandar no, matuum min io. Bagu io minatong ra bandar no sabap ra paat orou raiti', mamagun mapataak ra taak simbalui ra rasawat ru altar giu' ra bulur. Ulun-ulun piniau kalo mangakan ra io kalo poyo makaratong, sabap ra io galing musiti' mambarakat ra taak simbalui no. Amon ru mongoi kau raino, makatuum kau riso ra io kalo poyo mangkiwa' ra bulur koson mangakan.”
Ginio ra i Saul am ulipon nano minongoi ra bandar. Paat ra ilo mumpos ra kulobon garabang, nakapantalison ilo ri Samuil ondo' tatanga' mangkiralan mongoi ra intok sambayangan giu' ra bulur.
Songorou ra kalo poyo raginio, minindagu noyo

“Susuab no tampilon ra susuab ti olo'-olo' paat koson ragitio, manusub Aku ra sangulun ungkuyon intor ra bansa' ru Binjamin muma' rirun. Umawo' ulu nano ra umau koson ra tatandu' nampili' riso masauk ra raja' ru ulun Kuno Israil. Mapalabus io ra ulun Kuno intor ra ulun ru Palistin. Nakito Ku noyo kaimbalaan ru ulun Kuno, am norongog Ku noyo tangi' nilo ra makiindangan.”
Pakakito i Samuil ri Saul, indagu
Liliwa' raginio i Saul no mongoi inggaar ri Samuil mamaar ra kulobon garabang, am pangkuot, “Makimaap aku, tuan, ati kinua' baloi ru ulun mangilong i?”

Taam i Samuil, “Aku no io i. Pagulu kano intor raki' mongoi ra intok sambayangan giu' ra bulur, sabap ra orou raiti' mangakan kau mabaya' raki'. Susuab no ra iosusuab taamon ku ngaangai' pangkuatan mino. Mopongo raginio muli' kau boo.
Pai' kaimamang ra kaladai ondo' natatak ra talu ngoorou ra nakasail ti. Kaladai-kaladai no natuum noyo. Ra mulu' poyo ra ondo' gogoton kaga' ru ulun ru Israil iono okou;

Taam i Saul, “Aku ti intor ra bansa' ru Binjamin, bansa' ondo' boborok kaga' giu' ra Israil, am sasambaloi kuno ondo' kalo maatang kaga' ralalom ru bansa' raginio. Kua indagu kou raki' koson raginio?”

Kopongo raginio nangkimait i Samuil ri Saul am ulipon nano mongoi ra rondo' lamin ondo' maayo. Nangani' i Samuil ra intok ondo' maatang no risilo giu' ra saang ru ulun-ulun piniau, ondo' suang no olo'-olo' talu ngoopor ngaulun.
Indagu i Samuil ra ulun mangngansak no, “Pasulungo' noyo kual ondo' pinataak kuli rirun, ondo' pinabulian kuli rirun.”
Kopongo raginio nagibit ulun mangngansak no ra kual moonsoi kaga' intor ra kual ru paa am pasulungo' no ginio ri Saul. Indagu i Samuil,
Ginio ra minaya' i Saul ri Samuil nangakan paat ra orou raginio.
Kopongo raginio minugar ilo intor ra intok sambayangan am umpos ra bandar no. Inanian i Saul ra intok pambalangan
am pombolong io ra giu' no.
Paat ra sumirang mato ru orou, nampiau i Samuil ri Saul ondo' soroi ra rasawat ru baloi no. Kono, “Sukal no. Rapitin tokou.” Sukal i Saul, am ugar nabaya' ri Samuil.

Paat ra ilo nakasaboi ra kiing ru bandar, indagu i Samuil ri Saul, “Susubo' ulipon muno magulu ugar.” Kopongo raginio minugar ulipon no, am indagu poyo i Samuil, “Uog ragiti sangkinolor. Masaga' aku mambala' rirun ra ragu ri Aki Kapuuno'.”
Kopongo raginio nangalap i Samuil ra sambutul umau jaitun, am pabuuro' umau no ra rasawat ru ulu ri Saul. Inalok no i Saul am indagu, “Pinili' kou ru

Mopongo kou mangiruan raki' ra orou raiti', makauma' kou ra ruo ngaulun ungkuyon mamaar ra lobong ri Ragil giu' ra Jilja, giu' ra wilayah Binjamin. Mindagu ilo rirun koson ragitio, ‘Kaladai-kaladai ondo' inuyum muli natuum noyo. Raino ama' muli kalo boo maimamang ra kaladai-kaladai no, kaa' ruruli' mangkuot ra atan ondo' moonsoi baalon nano koson makatuum rirun.’ ”

Indagu poyo i Samuil, “Intor ra giu' no, rayuso' noyo pangkiralanan muno saboi kou makasuku' ra puun tataun ru intok sambayangan giu' ra Tabor. Giu' no makatuum kou ra talu ngaulun ungkuyon ondo' tatanga' mongoi ra Bitil koson mapataak ra taak simbalui ri Aki Kapuuno'. Sangulun intor risilo no manguyung ra talu ngainan anak kambing, sangulun poyo magibit ra talu ruti', am sangulun poyo magibit ra kantungan kungkung ondo' napanu' ra wain.
Tumabi' ilo rirun am mangani' ilo ra ruo ruti' ondo' musiti' apuon mu.

Mopongo raginio ongoi ra bulur ri Aki Kapuuno' giu' ra Gibia. Giu' no mokoondo' ra pangkiman ru ulun ru Palistin. Giu' ra kulobon mumpos ra bandar, makatuum kou ra sampulalai nabi ondo' mambusul intor ra bulur, intok ru altar no. Mangkuli ilo ra gambus, rabana, suling am jitor. Saliligo' am sogogolok ilo.
Paat raginio niayuk kuasaan kou ru Ambiluo ru
Paat ra masauk baal raginio, baalo' atan ayuk limanin muno ra moonsoi, sabap ra i Aki Kapuuno' mabaya' rirun.

Mopongo raginio musiti' kou mongoi ra Gilgal ra makapagulu intor raki', am paginaa ra giu' no buoi tulu' ngoorou. Mopongo raginio matong aku koson mapataak ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Kairuani' ayuk ri Samuil no i Saul, nangani' i Aki Kapuuno' no ri Saul ra paliso ondo' bagu. Ngaangai' baal ondo' pinabala' ri Samuil riso no nasauk ra orou raginio niayuk.

Paat ri Saul am ulipon nano nakasaboi giu' ra Gibia, tinuum i Saul ru sampulalai nabi. Paat raginio niayuk Ambiluo ri Aki Kapuuno' no nanguasa' ri Saul, am minaya' io ra nabi-nabi no saliligo' am sogogolok.
Ulun ondo' nakaulig ri Saul intor ragili, nakakito ra paliso nano am sakukuot ra rondo' am bokon, “Atan kinua' nasauk ra anak ri Kis no? Inda' nua' ru i Saul niayuk nasauk ra sangulun nabi?”

Kopongo raginio pangkuot sangulun ondo' minayan ra giu' no, “Ati kulaan ra nabi-nabi ra bokon no – guang min osoi kia ama' nilono?” Ginio noyo puun ru pagabigan ragitio, “Inda' nua' ru i Saul niayuk nasauk ra sangulun nabi?”
Kopongo i Saul liligo' am gogolok, ongoi io ra altar giu' ra rasawat ru bulur.
Kamaman ri Saul no nakakito ri Saul am ulipon nano, am kuati' no ilo, “Ati intor min ti?”
Taam i Saul, “Minongoi akai paguyum ra kaladai ondo' natatak, kaa' kalo natuum mai, ongoi akai tuum ri Samuil.”
Nangkuot kamaman nano, “Atan rinagu ri Samuil?”
Taam i Saul, “Kono, kaladai-kaladai no natuum noyo.” Kaa' kalo nambala' i Saul ra kamaman nano ra i Samuil no napasauk noyo ri Saul ra raja'.
Kopongo raginio piniau ri Samuil ngaangai' ulun ru Israil tumimung ra saang ru
Indagu io risilo, “Kon ragitio noyo ragu ru

Aku noyo i Aki Kapuuno' min ondo' napalabus ramuyun intor ra ngaangai' kaimbalaan am kapaganan. Kaa' raino nangimpai kau Raki', i Aki Kapuuno' min, sabap ra nakipili' kau Raki' ra sangulun raja' min. Iou noyo, timung kano ra saang Kutu,
Kopongo raginio nanusub i Samuil ra moonong bansa' no jumalai ra saang, am bansa' ri Binjamin ondo' napili'.

Nanusub i Samuil ra ngaangai' sasambaloi ri Binjamin jumalai, am sasambaloi ri Matri ondo' napili'. Paat ra ulun ru sasambaloi ri Matri muma' ra mansusunu' sangulun am sangulun, i Saul anak ri Kis ondo' napili'. Naguyum ilo ri Saul kaa' kalio io ra giu' no.
Ginio ra kuati' nilo
Taam

Ginio ra nasisimbul ilo am nagibit ri Saul giu' ra tatanga' ru mamagun. Pakabigor i Saul ra tatanga' ru mamagun, nakito nilo ra io noyo ondo' malanggou kaga'; ulun ra bokon polos ayuk ra limbawo nano.
Indagu boo i Samuil ra mamagun, “Gitio noyo ulun ondo' pinili' ru
Ngaangai' nompoloos ra, “Kaayag no raja' mai!”

Kopongo raginio nambala' i Samuil intor ra katapatan am kandoi ru raja', am tulisi' no ra rondo' buuk. Binulian no buuk no ra rondo' intok ondo' mapasau. Kopongo raginio sinusub ri Samuil ulun-ulun no minuli' ra baloi ru sigagama'.
Raja' Saul niayuk minuli' ra baloi nano giu' ra Gibia, binaya' ru kukula' ngaulun ondo' mangapanggol.
Kaa' mokoondo' kukula' ngaulun malaat ondo' mindagu ra, “Ati kulaan ru ulun ragitio mokoonong ritakau?” Nagasab ilo ra Raja' Saul am kalo nanaak riso ra tangguang, kaa' talingoon bauwi ru Raja' Saul.

Kopongo raginio Raja' Nagas, raja' ru pagun Amon, naningganai ra saujor nano am nagawang ra bandar Jabis giu' ra tampilon ru Giliad. Mamagun ru Jabis nampasaboi ra inatang no ra Raja' Nagas, “Pakimabantu' noyo ramon, am apuon mai okou raja' koson ra mamarinta ramon.”
Indagu Raja' Nagas, “Mambaal aku ra nabantuan ramuyun ra rondo' kitaakon: Kiulon ku unor ru mato ra pamiris ru moonong ulun ondo' nanauyu' ra ngaangai' ru ulun ru Israil.”

Kopongo raginio indagu tingganai-tingganai ru bandar Jabis, “Anii' akai buoi tulu' ngoorou koson mangator ra tanou ra titikop ru pagun Israil. Amon ru kolondo' makapangindangan ramon, am akai ngaangai' makirakop rirun.”
Ulun-ulun sinusub no nakasaboi giu' ra Gibia, intok inayanan ru Raja' Saul. Paat ra tanou no pinasaboi, ngaangai' mamagun ra giu' no tumalimpuun mantangi' sabap ra nangkaus.

Paat raginio kakauli' ayuk ru Raja' Saul intor ra umo nabaya' ra sapi'-sapi' nano. Kuati' no, “Atan kinua'? Kua pantangi' ngaangai' ru ulun?” Nalingas io binalaan ra tanou ondo' inibit ru ulun-ulun sinusub intor ra Jabis.
Paat ra Raja' Saul nakaining ra tanou no, kinuasa' io ru Ambiluo ri Aki Kapuuno', am sangit io boo.

Nangalap Raja' Saul ra ruo ngainan sapi' am tinata'-tata' no nasauk ra masuang tata'. Kopongo raginio nanusub io ra kukula' ngaulun nagibit ra tata'-tata' ru sapi' no ra titikop ru pagun ru Israil nabaya' ra susuban, “Osoi ayuk kalo maya' ra Raja' Saul am i Samuil mongoi pangayou, sapi' nano tataan koson ragitio!”
Nalaa' ulun ru Israil ra atan lair ondo' baalon ru
Nanimung Raja' Saul risilo giu' ra Bijik: 300,000 ngaulun intor ra Israil am 30,000 ngaulun intor ra Jiuda.

Indagu ilo ra ulun-ulun sinusub intor ra Jabis no, “Balai' noyo mamagun ru Jabis ra susuab no, ra kalo poyo tanga' ru orou, makaalap ilo ra indangan.” Paat ra mamagun ru Jabis nokorongog ra tanou raginio, naansukan ilo kaga'
am indagu boo Raja' Nagas, “Susuab no akai ngaangai' makirakop am guguang mu mambaal ra atan ayuk pamakuan muno ramon.”

Suabon no riminondom Raja' Saul nantatayar ra ulun-ulun nano nasauk ra talu ngampulalai. Kopongo raginio, paat ra matatawang, minongoi ilo ra tatanga' ru nangkiman ru ulun ru Amon am namulunsar risilo. Kalo poyo ra tanga' ru orou, kinala noyo pantula' ru saujor-saujor ru Raja' Saul. Ulun ru Amon ondo' kalo minatoi, nantabulias am saboi kolondo' ruo ngaulun ondo' nabaya' ra nagiru'.
Kopongo raginio indagu ulun ru Israil ri Samuil, “Ati kinua' ulun ondo' ragili makakau' mindagu ra Raja' Saul kalo maaya' masauk ra raja' takau? Pataako' ilo ramon. Potoyon mai ilo!”
Kaa' indagu Raja' Saul, “Kolondo' sangulun pana potoyon ra orou raiti', sabap paat ra orou raiti' namayag
Indagu i Samuil risilo, “Ibok ongoi takau ra Gilgal am igondo' poyo mapasauk ra Raja' Saul koson raja' takau.”
Ginio ra ilo ngaangai' minongoi ra Gilgal, am giu' no, giu' ra intok sambayangan no sinauk nilo Raja' Saul ra raja'. Napataak ilo ra taak simbalui koson makibarakat ra
Kopongo raginio indagu i Samuil ra ngaangai' ulun ru Israil, “Sinugut ku noyo ngaangai' kinitaak mino. Nampili' aku noyo ra sangulun raja' koson mamarinta ramuyun.

Intor raino io noyo ondo' maningganai ramuyun. Ilai' noyo, aku ti matutuo noyo am makauan; anak-anak kuno soroi mababaya' ramuyun. Naningganai aku ramuyun ra nabuoi kaga' – intor ra aku mamulok saboi raino.
Raino ti, migor aku ra saang min. Amon ru nambaal aku noyo ra kasalaan, panguu' kano raki' ra saang ru
Taam ngaangai' ulun no, “Kalo, kalo igondo' kou pamparuung kapoam pangimbolo' ramon. Kalo igondo' kou pangalap ra atan pana longgom ru ulun.”
Ginio ra indagu i Samuil, “Polosoon noyo
Taam ilo, “Iou motopot.
Raino, pai' kapo ugar. Manguu' aku ramuyun ra saang ru
Paat ri Jakub am sasambaloi nano minongoi ra Misir, am paat ra ulun ru Misir nangimbolo' risilo, kinamatuaan nilai nampiau nakiindangan ra
Kaa' kalupus raginio linilianan nilo
Kopongo raginio nampiau ilo nakiindangan ra
Kopongo raginio nanusub
Kaa' paat ra akau nakapandai ra Raja' Nagas intor ra Amon no masaga' mamulunsar ramuyun, inimpayan min
“Raino ti, mokoondo' kau ra sangulun raja' pinili' min galama'. Nakitaak kau ra sangulun raja', am nanaak noyo
Pakaansuk kano amon ru mangurumat kau ra
Kaa' amon ru kalo rumongog kau ra
Raino ti, rongogo' kano toojo! Ilai' min toojo baal maayo ondo' baalon ru
Raino sala' ka kia bulintok ru tampio? Kaa' makiasi' aku, am patuunon ru
Kopongo raginio pakiasi' i Samuil, am paat ra orou raginio niayuk napatuun
Indagu ilo ri Samuil, “Anii pangindangan tuan, pakiasi' no ra
Taam i Samuil, “Pai' kau kalaa'! Kabalu' pana ra nambaal kano ra baal ondo' malaat, pai' talikuri'
Pai' baya' ra dewa-dewa ondo' kalo makapangindangan kapoam makapamayag ramuyun, sabap ra dewa-dewa no sotopot no kolondo'.
Nagibot noyo
Ra aku ti, makatula aku ra
Gagaya' kano ra
Kaa' amon ru mararayus kau makatula, akau am raja' mino pusoon.”
Sangarawan raginio, paat ra Raja' Saul nasauk ra raja',

nampili' io ra talu ngaribu ngaulun ru Israil; intor ru suang ragitio, ruo ngaribu ngaulun minayan simpung riso giu' ra Mikmas am giu' ra kabuluran ru Bitil. Suang saribu ngaulun ra bokon minongoi nababaya' ri Jonatan, anak ungkuyon nano giu' ra Gibia, giu' ra wilayah ru bansa' ru Binjamin. Ulun ra suwo no sinusub ru Raja' Saul minuli' ra baloi ru sigagama'.
Kopongo raginio namatoi i Jonatan ra panglima ru Palistin

Ngaangai' ulun ru Israil binalaan ra Raja' Saul namatoi noyo ra panglima ru Palistin no, am ra ulun ru Palistin masisang kaga' ra ulun ru Israil. Ginio ra tininong ru mamagun piau koson mumung ra Raja' Saul giu' ra Gilgal.
Liliwa' raginio ulun ru Palistin niayuk timinimung koson mamulunsar ra ulun ru Israil. Ulun ru Palistin mokoondo' talu ngoopor ngaribu

Kopongo raginio namulunsar ilo ra masaran ra ulun ru Israil, saboi ulun ru Israil soroi ra makalalaa'. Kukula' ngaulun ru Israil nansibuni giu' ra ralalom ru luang batu am luang ru gunung, kapoam siminilot ra ralalom ru batu maayo, kapoam giu' ra ralalom ru tulubong am luang ru tana'.
Mokoondo' niayuk kukula' ngaulun ondo' liminaup ra Sungoi Jordan, am minongoi ra wilayah ru Gad am Giliad.
Lakat poyo Raja' Saul no soroi ra Gilgal, am ulun-ulun ondo' minaya' riso nonontol ra nalaa'.
Naginaa Raja' Saul ri Samuil buoi tulu' ngoorou, koson ra bilin ri Samuil riso, kaa' i Samuil kalio poyo nakasaboi ra Gilgal. Kopongo raginio ulun ru Israil tumalimpuun mangiruan ra Raja' Saul.
Indagu Raja' Saul risilo, “Ibito' min ragiti taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
kaa' kopongo ayuk Raja' Saul napataak raginio, nakasaboi i Samuil. Tuum Raja' Saul ri Samuil ra manguma' riso,
kaa' nangkuot i Samuil, “Atan kia binaal mu noyo?”
Taam Raja' Saul, “Nakakito aku ra mamagun tumalimpuun noyo mangiruan raki', am okou kalio minatong ra paat ondo' inaru' muli. Mulu' poyo ra timinimung noyo ulun ru Palistin giu' ra Mikmas.
Ginio ra nangkara' aku, ‘Ati lair ru saujor ru Palistin mataki' mamulunsar raki' ragiti, ra Gilgal, alika aku ti kalo poyo nakimasi' ra
Taam i Samuil, “Sasambungon binaal muno. Kalo giminagaya' kou ra susuban ru
Kaa' raino pamarintaan muno kalo mabuoi. Sabap ra okou kalo giminagaya' Riso,

Kopongo raginio nangiruan i Samuil ra Gilgal am naparayus ra pangkiralanan nano. Ulun ra bokon no minaya' ra Raja' Saul koson mamung ra saujor nano. Kopongo raginio intor ilo ra Gilgal minongoi ra Gibia giu' ra wilayah Binjamin. Tinutun ru Raja' Saul pulalai nano am napandayan no ra suang no olo'-olo' onom ngaatus ngaulun.
Raja' Saul, anak ungkuyon nano i Jonatan, am saujor nilono nangkim ra Giba giu' ra wilayah Binjamin, liliwa' ulun-ulun ru Palistin nangkim giu' ra Mikmas.
Paat raginio niayuk talu ngampulalai saujor ru Palistin minugar intor ra pangkiman ru Palistin no koson mantakou; sampulalai ra kasaa' no minongoi ra tampilon Opra giu' ra wilayah Syual,
sampulalai ra karuo no sumuku' ra Bit-Oron, am sampulalai ra rondo' poyo sumuku' ra balitan ondo' mongoi ra Limayak Jiboim am tana' kaagisan.
Paat raginio giu' ra titikop ru Israil kolondo' ulun manukang ra basi', sabap ra ulun ru Palistin kalo mangiou ra ulun ru Ibrani mambaal ra ilang am tutura'.
Ginio ra ulun ru Israil minongoi kalalaat ra ulun ru Palistin amon ru masaga' mangasa' ra radu', sangkul, kapak am tantab
Pambayar no sampila' ruit boborok ra tayar mangasa' ra kapak kapoam mamuna' ra kusa ru sapi',
Ginio ra, paat ra pangayawan giu' ra Mikmas, kolondo' sangulun pana intor ra saujor ru Israil nanangilang kapoam nantutura', ondo' ayuk am Raja' Saul am i Jonatan, anak ungkuyon nano.
Ulun ru Palistin nampaayan ra sampulalai saujor koson magalung ra ginting ru gunung giu' ra Mikmas.
Sangarawan raginio, indagu i Jonatan ra buayoi magibit ra kinandoi nano, “Ibok ongoi to ra pangkiman ru ulun ru Palistin.” Kaa' kalo binalaan ri Jonatan ama' nano, Raja' Saul no.
Paat raginio soroi Raja' Saul ra saau ru puun dalima' giu' ra Migron, kalo maalur intor ra Gibia; mokoondo' ra olo'-olo' onom ngaatus ngaulun nababaya' ra Raja' Saul.
(Imam ondo' nagibit ra efod paat raginio iono i Agiya anak ri Agitub, akupu ri Pinigas anak ri Ili; i Ili ti iono imam ru
Koson mongoi ra pangkiman ru Palistin, musiti' i Jonatan mansail ra ginting ru gunung ondo' nakatatanga' ra ruo batu maayo ondo' manius, ondo' ininggalanan ra Bojis am Sini.
Batu maayo ondo' tampilon ra ralayo tumingkuang ra Mikmas, am batu maayo ondo' rondo' poyo, ondo' tampilon ra rabugus tumingkuang ra Giba.
Kon ri Jonatan ra buayoi no, “Ibok ongoi to ra pangkiman ru ulun ru Palistin ondo' kalo nakaulig ri Aki Kapuuno'. Maaru' lair ru mangindangan
Taam buayoi no, “Atan ayuk ondo' masaga' mu baalon,
Kon ri Jonatan, “Iou noyo, Paat ra ito mongoi ra sandaup, tumalang to ra ulun ru Palistin.
Amon ru manusub ilo rito muog am maginaa risilo matong rito, sumoroi to ra giu' no am kalo pana mongoi ra sandaup.
Kaa' amon ru manusub ilo rito mongoi risilo, mongoi to ra giu' no, sabap ginio noyo tatandu' no ra pataakon ilo ru
Ginio ra pinoloso nilo ulun ru Palistin nakakito risilo. Indagu boo ulun ru Palistin, “Ilai' kon! Mokoondo' ulun ru Ibrani miningkual intor ra luang nansibunian nilono!”
Pampiau ilo boo ri Jonatan am ulipon nano, “Ibok kau ragiti! Mokoondo' ondo' masaga' mai pakitonon
Kon ri Jonatan ra buayoi no, “Baya' no raki'. Napataak noyo

Binaya' ru buayoi no nanungkama' i Jonatan ra rasawat ru ginting no saboi nakasail raginio. Namulunsar i Jonatan ra ulun ru Palistin am nangaratu' ilo sabap ra linamba' no, am buayoi no namatoi risilo.
Ralalom ru pangayawan kasaa' no, i Jonatan am buayoi no namatoi ra olo'-olo' ruo ngoopor ngaulun giu' ra intok ra langka' no sampiapat hektar.

Kasaukan raginio napakalaa' kaga' ra ngaangai' ulun ru Palistin giu' ra tampilon ru liwar bandar; pulalai ru mantakou am saujor ru Palistin giu' ra pangkiman nonontol ra nalaa'; am poyo nogonggon tana' ti, am nasauk kajajawan.
Liliwa' raginio saujor ru Raja' Saul ondo' nagalung giu' ra Gibia, giu' ra wilayah Binjamin nakakito ra ulun ru Palistin nagigiru' ra nangaubong.

Ginio ra indagu Raja' Saul ra saujor-saujor nano, “Untobo' min kon saujor takati am tutuno' min osoi ondo' kalio.” Paat ilo nambaal raginio, katutuni' nilo ra i Jonatan am buayoi magibit ra kinandoi nano kalio ra giu' no.
Indagu Raja' Saul ra Imam Agia, “Ibito' noyo efod
Paat ra Raja' Saul lakat poyo mindagu ra imam no, baal ru giu' ra pangkiman ru ulun ru Palistin gumaai jajajou. Ginio ra indagu Raja' Saul riso, “Kalo boo makarampot takau koson makitulu' intor ra
Raja' Saul am saujor-saujor nano pana minongoi boo ra intok pangayawan. Giu' no nakakito ilo ra ulun ru Palistin ondo' najajajou; ilono magagabu' am mampatoi ra rondo' am bokon.
Kukula' ngaulun Ibrani ondo' minayan giu' ra libung ru ulun ru Palistin am ondo' minaya' noyo ra saujor nilono, nangulau saguli' ra binayaan
Ulun ru Israil ondo' nansibuni giu' ra kabuluran Ipraim niayuk nokorongog ra nagigiru' noyo ulun ru Palistin, ongoi ilo boo simpung ra Raja' Saul am namulunsar ra ulun ru Palistin.
Giminula' ulun ru Israil ra galur ru ralan saboi nakasail ra Bit-Awin. Namayag

Paat orou raginio mangalawo ulun ru Israil ra nangaitilan sabap ra Raja' Saul nagibot koson ragitio, “Kaulas noyo ulun ondo' mangakan ra atan pana ra orou raiti', ra kalo poyo mansuli' aku ra pantula'.” Ginio ra kolondo' sangulun pana ondo' nangakan buoi ru orou raginio.
Kopongo raginio ilo ngaangai'
kaa' kolondo' sangulun pana ondo' nangakan ra ruu' maningot no. Malaa' ilo matiu' ra ulas ondo' rinagu ru Raja' Saul.

Kaa' kalo nakapandai i Jonatan ra ama' nano nopololob noyo ra mamagun ra ulas raginio; ingkualo' no boo jujuga' ondo' inibit nano, am patujoko' ra ralalom ru tambaloi ru maningot no, am niayuk nangalap ra ruu' maingot no am inakan no. Pulali' no nakaliman ra moonsoi am gumaai maikang.

Kopongo raginio indagu sangulun intor ra saujor no riso, “Akai ngaangai' kalo boo makalulu' ra naitilan. Kaa' nopololob i ama' muno ramon am minindagu, ‘Kaulas noyo ulun ondo' mangakan ra atan pana ra orou raiti'.’ ”
Taam i Jonatan, “Mapara' boo najanjayan binaal ru ama' kuno ra bansa' takati! Ilai' noyo, baal ku raino ti moonsoi poyo nalupus ra aku nangakan ra sanganu ruu' maningot.
Amon ru pinaakan mamagun ra akanon ondo' ginaau paat nangala ra pantula' ra orou raiti', maaru' masuang poyo ulun ru Palistin mapatoi nilo.”
Paat orou raginio ulun ru Israil nangala ra ulun ru Palistin nalupus nangayou ra galur ru ralan intor ra Mikmas saboi ra Ayalon. Paat raginio malawo ilo kaga' sabap ra naitilan,

saboi nagagaau ilo nangalap ra kuliamos ondo' bagu tinalingaau intor ra pantula'; nangalap ilo ra domba am sapi', am niayuk nanimbalui ra ngaangai' no ra intok raginio niayuk, am rayus nanginta' ra kual ondo' lakat poyo makararaa'.
Kopongo raginio binalaan Raja' Saul ra baal raginio, “Raja' mai, makatula mamagun ra
Golok Raja' Saul, “Totopot kano ra najanjayan! Luiro' kon rondo' batu maayo ragiti!”

Kopongo raginio rondo' poyo susuban ru Raja' Saul, “Ongoi kano ra mamagun am susubo' noyo ilo magibit ra ngaangai' sapi' am domba ragiti. Moonsoi simbaluyon nilo bibiag no ra tampak ru batu ti am mangakan raginio ragiti. Ilo kalo sotopot no makatula ra
Raja' Saul pana nambaal boo ra rondo' altar ra tayar ru
Indagu boo Raja' Saul ra ulun-ulun nano, “Ibok ongoi takau bulunsaro' ulun ru Palistin ra rondom no, am takawin ilo saboi matawangan, am niayuk mamatoi risilo ngaangai'.”
Ginio ra nangkuot Raja' Saul ri Aki Kapuuno', “Ongoyon ku kia bulunsaro' ulun ru Palistin? Mangani' Kou kia ra ulun ru Israil ra kamanangan?” Kaa' kalo timinaam i Aki Kapuuno' ra orou raginio.
Raja' Saul pana mindagu boo ra tingganai-tingganai ru mamagun, “Ibok kau ragiti am tutuno' min noyo atan ra tula ondo' binaal ra orou raiti'.
Nambantu' aku ralalom inggalan ru
Raja' Saul pana mindagu boo risilo ngaangai', “Akau ngaangai' no bigor kau tampilon ra giu' no; i Jonatan am aku migor tampilon ragiti.”
Taam ilo, “Baalo' noyo atan ayuk ondo' moonsoi kaga' sumugut ra karaan muno, raja' mai.”
Kon boo ru Raja' Saul, “Raino tuluo', ru i Jonatan kapoam aku ondo' makasala.” I Jonatan tinulu' ra makasala.
Nangkuot Raja' Saul ri Jonatan, “Atan kia boo binaal muni?”
Taam i Jonatan, “Inakan ku sanganu ruu' maningot ondo' inalap ku ra pompor ru jujuga' kuni. Nakatampos aku ra matoi.”
Kon ru Raja' Saul riso, “Polosoo' noyo ra aku ukumin ri Aki Kapuuno' amon ru okou kalo ukumin ra matoi, Jonatan!”
Kaa' indagu mamagun ra Raja' Saul, “Musiti' kia ukumin i Jonatan ra matoi? Sala' ka kia io nokoowot ra kamanangan ondo' maayo ti? Binantu' mai ralalom inggalan ru
Kopongo raginio, Raja' Saul liminonggo' nangilou ra ulun ru Palistin. Ulun ru Palistin pana minuli' ra namagunan nilono.

Kopongo raginio Raja' Saul nasauk ra raja' ru ulun ru Israil, nangayou io ra ngaangai' pantula' nano ra ati-ati intok: Ulun ru Moab, Amon am Idom; raja' ru pagun Joba am ulun ru Palistin. Ati ayuk intok ru Raja' Saul mangayou, masalok io mamanang.
Nangayou Raja' Saul ra baani toojo, ulun ru Amalik pana kinala no; napalabus Raja' Saul ra Israil intor ra ulun mantakou.
Anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Saul iono i Jonatan, i Jiswi am i Malkisua. Anak ruandu' ra katuaan ru Raja' Saul makainggalan ri Mirab, am anak ruandu' ra karuo no makainggalan ri Mikgal.
Andu' ru Raja' Saul iono i Aginoam anak ri Agimaas; panglima saujor ru Raja' Saul iono pantukir nano, i Abnir anak ri Nir. I Nir no kamaman ru Raja' Saul.
I Kis, ama' ru Raja' Saul am i Nir, ama' ri Abnir, iono anak ilo ri Abiil.
Buoi ra bayag ru Raja' Saul, nangayou io toojo ra ulun ru Palistin. Ginio ra paat ayuk makakito io ra ulun ondo' maikang kapoam baani, pulali' no mapasauk ra ulun no ra saujor nano.
Mangukum Io ra ulun ru Amalik sabap ra kinamatuaan nilai minanggal ra ulun ru Israil paat ra ulun ru Israil minatong intor ra Misir.

Ongoyo' min bulunsaro' ulun ru Amalik, pusoo' min ilo am umoko' min ngaangai' ondo' soroi risilo no. Pai' min tatango' rondo' pana. Potoyo' min ngaangai' ungkuyon, ruandu', lalaing borok, lalagang, sapi', domba, unta am kaladai.”
Raja' Saul pana nanimung boo ra saujor nano am inuntob no ilo giu' ra Tilaim; mokoondo' ruo ngaatus ngaribu ngaulun saujor intor ra Israil am mopor ngaribu ngaulun saujor intor ra Jiuda.
Kopongo raginio nagibit Raja' Saul ra saujor no minongoi ra bandar ru ulun ru Amalik, am nagawang ra pantula' giu' ra lonor ru sungoi ondo' mapua'.

Nangirim Raja' Saul ra ragu papakaraan ra ulun ru Kini, “Ugar kano am iruani' min ulun ru Amalik, maa' raginio kalo mapatoi kau mababaya' risilo. Ragili kinamatuaan mini moonsoi ra ulun ru Israil, paat ra ulun ru Israil minatong intor ra Misir.” Ulun ru Kini pana nangiruan boo ra intok raginio.
Kopongo raginio nangayou Raja' Saul ra ulun ru Amalik am nangala risilo. Nangayou io giu' ra galur ru ralan, intor ra Gawila saboi ra Syur giu' ra tampilon sirangon ru Misir.
Rinakop ru Raja' Saul no Raja' Agag, raja' ru ulun ru Amalik, am namatoi ra ngaangai' ulun ru Amalik,

kaa' Raja' Saul am ulun nano kalo namatoi ra Raja' Agag. Kalo niayuk pinatoi nilo domba am sapi' ondo' molomok kaga', anak ru sapi' am anak ru domba ondo' molomok kaga', am ngaangai' ru ondo' mokologo; pinuso nilo ayuk ondo' kolondo' onong am kolondo' logo.
Indagu
“Pansagulian aku nampili' ri Saul nasauk ra raja'. Tinalikuran no Aku am kalo boo gumagaya' ra susuban Kuno.” Siminangit i Samuil, am nosorondom io nakimasi' ra

Katawang ra suabon no ra iosusuab ayuk poyo, inuyum ri Samuil no Raja' Saul. Norongog ri Samuil ra minugar noyo Raja' Saul minongoi ra bandar Karmil koson manirong ra batu pangkaraan ra tayar nano galama' ra giu' no. Kopongo raginio narampus Raja' Saul minongoi ra Gilgal.
Pakatuum i Samuil ra Raja' Saul, kon ru Raja' Saul riso, “Gama' ru mambarakat
Nangkuot i Samuil riso, “Amon ru kon raginio, kua norongog ku bolos ru sapi' mampangaa' am domba mampagala'?”

Taam Raja' Saul, “Ulun-ulun kuno nanalingaau ra bibiag tinambiag no intor ra ulun ru Amalik. Domba am sapi' ondo' molomok kaga' inalap noyo ru ulun-ulun kuno koson pataakon ra tayar ru taak simbalui ra
Korongog baal raginio indagu i Samuil, “Pai' poyo, rongogo' noyo ragu ru
Taam i Samuil, “Raguo' noyo.”
Kon ri Samuil, “Sala' ka kia okou no nasauk ra tingganai ru ngaangai' bansa' ru Israil, kabalu' pana mangkara' kou ra kalo maatang kou? Nampili' noyo
am nanusub Io noyo rirun koson namatoi ra ulun ru Amalik ondo' malaat. Okou sinusub No mangayou manggal risilo saboi pinatoi ilo ngaangai'.
Kua kia boo rirun ti kalo giminagaya' Riso? Kua kia agou-agou kou nanalingaau ra rapu' nilono am nambaal ra ondo' kalo kasagain ru
Taam Raja' Saul, “Ginagaya' ku noyo susuban ru

Kaa' ulun-ulun kuno kalo namatoi ra ngaangai' bibiag tinambiag; pinili' nilo noyo domba am sapi' ondo' molomok kaga', am nagibit ra ngaangai' no giu' ra Gilgal koson pataakon ra tayar ru taak simbalui ra
Indagu i Samuil, “Ati kia ondo' kasagain poyo ru
Gumuor ra
Korongog ragu-ragu no indagu Raja' Saul ri Samuil, “Topot makatula aku noyo ra maayo. Minanggal aku noyo ra susuban ru
Kaa' raino makitaak aku ra ampunon tula kuno, am baya' no raki' sumaguli' ra Gilgal, maa' raginio makasambayang aku ra
Kaa' taam i Samuil, “Kalo masaga' aku maya' rirun. Nangimpai kou noyo ra susuban ru
Ginio ra kon ri Samuil ra Raja' Saul, “Paat ra orou raiti' niayuk rinilak noyo ru
I Aki Kapuuno' ondo' matulai, i Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil no kalo nagabau am kalo nangulau ra ginuang Nano, sabap ra Io sala' ka ulun.”
Taam Raja' Saul, “Makatula aku noyo. Kaa' pangindangan no, baya' no raki' sumaguli' maa' raginio makasambayang aku ra
Ginio ra i Samuil minaya' ra Raja' Saul siminaguli' ra Gilgal, am Raja' Saul no siminambayang ra
Kopongo raginio nanaak i Samuil ra susuban, “Ibito' min Raja' Agag no ragiti.” Raja' Agag no pinauma' riso, am nonontol Raja' Agag ra nalaa' sabap indoson no, “Mapara' boo kinapait ru kapatayan.”

Kon boo ri Samuil, “Koson ra ilang muno nangkinibit noyo ra masuang ina' naluusan ra anak, kon raginio niayuk ra ina' muno maluusan ra anak nano.” Puputulo' boo ri Samuil no Raja' Agag giu' ra saang ru altar giu' ra Gilgal.
I Samuil pana minuli' boo ra Rama am Raja' Saul minuli' ra baloi nano giu' ra Gibia.
Polos ra pupus ru bayag nano, kalo boo igondo' i Samuil timinuum ra Raja' Saul, kaa' nangiluk guang ri Samuil sabap ra pansagulian
Nangkuot i Samuil, “Ati kulaan nua' aku mambaal raginio? Amon ru nokorongog Raja' Saul ra baal ragitio, maaru' mamatoi io raki'!”
Taam
Piawo' i Isai mongoi ra upacara mapataak ra taak simbalui no. Balain Tokou ra atan ondo' musiti' baalon muno. Ulun ondo' tuluon Kuno rirun musiti' pilion mu masauk ra raja'.”
Binaal ri Samuil atan ondo' rinagu ru
Taam i Samuil, “Iou. Aku minatong ti koson mapataak ra taak simbalui ra
Pakatimung ilo noyo, nakito ri Samuil no i Iliab, anak ri Isai no. Nangkara' io, “Ulun ondo' minigor ra saang ru
Kaa' indagu
Kopongo raginio nampiau i Isai ra anak nano i Abinadab, am nanusub riso muma' ri Samuil. Kaa' kon ri Samuil, “Io niayuk kalo pinili' ru
Kopongo raginio nanusub i Isai ri Syama mongoi uma'. Kon ri Samuil, “Io niayuk kalo pinili' ru
Kon raginio noyo i Isai nanusub ra tulu' ngaulun anak nano minuma' ri Samuil. Kaa' kon ri Samuil, “Kolondo' sangulun pana risilo no pinili' ru
I Samuil pana nangkuot boo ri Isai, “Ginilo ayuk kia anak ungkuyon muno?”
Taam i Isai, “Lakat poyo mokoondo' sangulun poyo, ondo' pupusan, kaa' tatanga' io magalung ra domba.”
Kon ri Samuil, “Panusub ra ulun mongoi pampiau riso, sabap ra kalo mababaya' takau mangakan ra io kalo poyo makaratong.”
Ginio ra nanusub i Isai ra ulun minongoi pampiau ra anak pupusan nano. Io ti sangulun buayoi ondo' maindon, maligag am mato nano makasinda. Indagu
Nangalap i Samuil ra umau jaitun, am nampili' ri Daut no am nangumau ra ulu ri Daut no ra umau giu' ra saang ru ngaangai' maayo ri Daut. Paat raginio niayuk Ambiluo ru
Ambiluo ru
Indagu boo ulipon-ulipon ru Raja' Saul no riso, “Napandayan mai ra ambiluo malaat ondo' sinusub ru

Amon ru mangiou kou, nakatampos akai no maguyum ra sangulun ondo' mapandai mangkuli ra jitor. Paat ra okou imboloon ru ambiluo malaat no, ulun no makapangkuli ra jitor nano am okou makaliman ra moonsoi poyo.”
Ginio ra nanusub Raja' Saul, “Paguyum kau ra sangulun ondo' mapandai mangkuli ra miujik, am ibito' min io ragiti.”

Nokorongog ra baal raginio indagu sangulun intor ra ulipon ru raja' no, “I Isai, ulun ru Bitligim no mokoondo' sangulun anak ungkuyon ondo' mapandai mangkuli ra miujik. Io niayuk sangulun ondo' baani am saujor ondo' moonsoi. Io ti poyo maindon am mapandai mindagu.
Raja' Saul pana nanusub boo ra ulun mongoi ri Isai nabaya' ra bilin, “Susubo' noyo anak muno i Daut, ondo' magalung ra domba no paumaan raki'.”

I Isai pana nanampos boo ra sanginan kaladai, sinakayan ra ruti' am kantungan kungkung ondo' nototop ra wain; nanampos io niayuk ra sanginan kambing. Ngaangai' no tinaakan no ri Daut koson pataakon ra Raja' Saul.
Kon raginio noyo i Daut minatong ra Raja' Saul am nangandoi riso. Naansayan kaga' Raja' Saul ri Daut, am nampili' riso nasauk ra magibit ra kinandoi mangayou nano.
Raja' Saul pana nangator boo ri Isai ra tanou, “Maansayan aku ri Daut. Iowo' noyo io magulayun ayan ragiti am mangandoi raki'.”
Intor raginio, moonong ra Raja' Saul no subolon ru ambiluo malaat, kulion ri Daut jitor nano. Ambiluo malaat no pana mangiruan boo ra Raja' Saul, am Raja' Saul no pana matagulian am moonsoi saguli'.
Paat ra ulun ru Palistin nanimung ra saujor nilono koson jumalai mangayou, am timinimung giu' ra bandar Sokgo, giu' ra wilayah Jiuda. Nangkim ilo ra lolot ru Sokgo am Ajika, mamaar ra Ipis-Damim.
Raja' Saul am ulun ru Israil timinimung niayuk am nangkim giu' ra Limayak Ila; timinampos ilo koson manguma' ra bulunsar ru ulun ru Palistin.
Timininting ulun ru Palistin giu' ra sambuluran, am ulun ru Israil timininting giu' ra sambuluran ra bokon, am tatanga' no mokoondo' ra limayak.
Sangulun ungkuyon ondo' makainggalan ri Goliat, intor ra bandar Gat, miningkual intor ra pangkiman ru Palistin koson gumula' ra ulun ru Israil. Sawat ru ulun no olo'-olo' talu ngamito.
Nambayang io ra gangsa' ra bagat no olo'-olo' 57 ngakilogram, am nantupi' ra gangsa'.
Kalayam nano sinilian ra panili intor ra gangsa' am limbawo nano pinasangut rondo' tanggulan gangsa'.

Pagung ru tutura' nano koson ra kinaayo ru tataun ra kuliamos ru mambaal ra konoon am mato ru tutura' no ra kinaagat no olo'-olo' tulu' ngakilogram. Sangulun saujor magibit ra perisai minugar ra saang nano.

Minigor i Goliat am pompogolok ra ulun ru Israil, “Atan kia tatanga' min baalon ra giu' no? Makimangayou kau kia? Aku ti ulun ru Palistin, akau ulipon ru Raja' Saul! Pilio' noyo sangulun ra akau ngai' no koson gumula' raki'.
Amon ru mamanang io am mamatoi raki', akai masauk ra ulipon min. Kaa' amon ru mamanang aku am mamatoi riso, akau masauk ra ulipon mai.
Raino niayuk, anggalon ku saujor ru Israil; pilio' noyo sangulun ra akau ngai' no koson gumula' raki'!”
Pokorongog Raja' Saul am saujor nano ra anggal no, magalabo ilo am nalaa' kaga'.
I Daut anak ri Isai, ulun ru Iprata intor ra Bitligim giu' ra Jiuda. I Isai mokoondo' ra balu' ngaulun anak ungkuyon am paat ra pamarintaan ru Raja' Saul, i Isai ti matutuo noyo kaga'.

Katatalu ngaulun anak ungkuyon ri Isai ondo' matuo toojo minaya' noyo ra Raja' Saul minongoi pangayou. Anak ri Isai ondo' katuaan makainggalan ri Iliab, ondo' karuo i Abinadab, am ondo' katalu i Syama.
I Daut ti anak pupusan ri Isai. Paat ra katatalu maayo nano minayan simpung ra Raja' Saul,
masalok i Daut mangiruan ra Raja' Saul, am minuli' ra Bitligim koson magalung ra domba ru ama' nano.
Buoi apat ngoopor ngoorou, moonong susuab ti am mamai' ti, minggaar i Goliat ra barisan ru saujor Israil am manggal risilo.
Paat ra sangarawan indagu i Isai ri Daut, “Ibito' mopor ngakilogram unor-unor ondo' sininggala' am mopor ruti', am atari' ngaangai' no ra maayo-maayo muno giu' ra pangkiman ru saujor no.
Ibito' niayuk mopor kiju ra tayar ru komandan ru pulalai. Kuati' noyo ra ati kulaan boo ra maayo-maayo muno. Ibito' noyo rorondo' koson mapainono' ra okou nakatuum noyo risilo, am ilo no naayag.
Soroi ilo giu' ra Limayak Ila nababaya' ra Raja' Saul am ngaangai' ulun ru Israil ra bokon, ondo' tatanga' gumula' ra ulun ru Palistin.”

Suabon no ra iosusuab ayuk poyo, timinirong i Daut am timinampos. Nanusub io ra ulun bokon magalung ra domba. Io pana nagibit ra akanon no am minugar koson ra nanusuban ri Isai. Nakasaboi io ra pangkiman nakainamot ra ulun ru Israil tatanga' baris liliwa' mompogolok ra pulanu ru pangayawan.
Saujor ru Palistin am saujor ru Israil nantaluma' am timinampos koson mangayou.
Patatango' ri Daut akanon no ra ulun magalung ra kuliamos ru saujor, am pasimbul minongoi ra intok pangayawan koson mongoi uma' ra maayo-maayo nano, am nangkuot ra tanou nilo.
Kaa' paat ra io magindagu risilo, ujak i Goliat am anggal ra saujor ru Israil koson ra ondo' maindalom nano baalon; norongog ri Daut ragu-ragu manggal nano.
Pakakito saujor-saujor ru Israil ri Goliat, nagigiru' ilo ra nalaa'.

Konilo ra rondo' am bokon, “Ilai' ga boo io! Rongogo' anggal nano! Nambantu' noyo Raja' Saul ra ulun ondo' makapamatoi ri Goliat aniin ra taak ondo' maayo. Paanduin niayuk ru Raja' no anak ruandu' nano ra ulun raginio, am sasambaloi ru ulun raginio kalo boo pana mambayar ra cukai.”

Nangkuot i Daut ra saujor ondo' soroi ra mamaar riso, “Atan kia ondo' taakin ra ulun ondo' makapamatoi ra ulun ru Palistin no am mapalabus ra Israil intor ra pagasaban? Makakau' kaga' ulun ru Palistin no, ulun ondo' kalo makaulig ri Aki Kapuuno', manggal ra saujor ri Aki Kapuuno' ondo' naayag!”
Nambala' ilo ri Daut ra tangguang ondo' taakin ra ulun ondo' makapamatoi ri Goliat.

I Iliab, maayo kasaa' ri Daut, nokorongog ra pansunuran ri Daut am saujor-saujor no. Siminangit io ri Daut, am indagu, “Kua ongoi kou ragiti? Osoi ondo' sinusub muno magalung ra domba-domba muno giu' ra tana' kaagisan no? Nakapandai aku, okou ti lalaing malaat, ikakanuo' ra baani; minatong kou ragiti koson milong ayuk ra pangayawan ti, kalo kia?”
Taam i Daut, “Atan kia sala kuno? Mangkuot aku ayuk.”
Io pana minugar am nangkuot ra baal ra nogondo' ra saujor-saujor ra bokon no, am nogondo' ondo' pinataam riso no.
Kaa' kukula' ngaulun ondo' nokorongog ra ragu ri Daut no, nampasaboi raginio ra Raja' Saul, am nampiau Raja' Saul ri Daut ra muma'.
Kon ri Daut ra Raja' Saul, “Raja' mai, osoi pana pai' kalaa' ra ulun ru Palistin no. Nakatampos aku no gumula' riso.”
Taam Raja' Saul, “Pai'. Ati kulaan kou makagula' riso? Okou ti mamulok ayuk poyo kaga', am io no naindalom noyo mangayou intor ra io mamulok.”
Kaa' indagu i Daut, “Raja' kuno, aku ti maindalom magalung ra domba ru ama' kuno. Paat ra mokoondo' ra singa' kapoam baawang matong mansaam ra domba,
ilowon ku am gabuon ku bibiag masigo no, am bayagon ku domba no. Amon ru singa' kapoam baawang no manggal, guuton ku liog nano, am lambaan ku io saboi matoi.

Namatoi aku noyo ra singa' am baawang, am ulun ru Palistin ondo' kalo nakaulig ri Aki Kapuuno' no, niayuk nogondo' pamakuan kuno koson ra bibiag raginio, sabap ra makakau' io manggal ra saujor ri Aki Kapuuno' ondo' naayag.
Namayag noyo
Indagu i Saul, “Iou noyo. Ongoi no, gama' ru
Tinaakan ru Raja' Saul bayang mangayou nano ri Daut ra bayangon no: Rondo' tupi' gangsa' ondo' pinatupi' ra ulu ri Daut, am bayang basi'.

I Daut pana napaabil ra ilang ru Raja' Saul no ra bayang basi' no am kuminam mugar. Kaa' kalo makaugar i Daut, sabap ra kalo maindalom io mambayang ra bayang mangayou. Indagu io ra Raja' Saul, “Kalo makaugar aku ra bayang ragitio. Kalo maindalom aku mambayang raginio.” Aluso' boo ri Daut ngaangai' bayang mangayou no.
