Kopongo raginio nagibit io ra jujuga' ru magalung nano, am nangalap ra limo batu ondo' tapungol intor ra sungoi, am batu no pinasuang ra ralalom ru kantungan nano. Nabaya' ra pamalastik ra kalindu' nano minongoi io tingkuang ri Goliat.
Kopongo raginio tumalimpuun i Goliat mugar mongoi ri Daut, siniguluan ru ulun magibit ra kinandoi mangayou nano. Rayus io mininggaar ri Daut,
kaa' paat ra io nakakito ri Daut am inimansaan no, nakakurit i Goliat ra magasab sabap ra lakat poyo kaga' mamulok i Daut am maindon.
Indagu i Goliat ri Daut, “Atan pakuan ra jujuga' no? Mangkara' kou kia ra aku ti uku'?” Nagulas i Goliat ri Daut ralalom inggalan ru dewa-dewa nano.
Indagu io poyo koson manggal ri Daut, “Ibok, pataakin ku inan muno ra susuit kapoam bibiag maa' raginio akanon!”
Kon ri Daut, “Okou matong manggal raki' ra ilang, tutura' am tanggulan. Kaa' aku matong manggal rirun ralalom inggalan ru
Orou raiti' niayuk
Ngaangai' ulun ragiti makakito ra
Tumalimpuun i Goliat mugar minggaar ri Daut, am pasimbul i Daut ra mataki' mongoi ra tampilon ra barisan ru ulun ru Palistin koson manggal riso.

Pinokokog ri Daut kalindu' nano ra ralalom ru kantungan nano, am nangalap ra rondo' batu am pinalastik batu no ra tampilon ri Goliat. Nakatiu' batu no ra rabas ri Goliat saboi kuapak nano nopopol. Paat raginio niayuk naaba' i Goliat am bulos no nakatukop ra tana'.
Kon raginio noyo ra kalo nanangilang, kinala ri Daut no i Goliat am namatoi riso ra pamalastik am batu.
Nasimbul i Daut minongoi ri Goliat am bigor ra sapapa' ru inan nano. Binutus no ilang ri Goliat intor ra angkap no am inggului' ulu ri Goliat; koson raginio noyo i Daut namatoi ri Goliat.
Paat ra ulun ru Palistin nakakito ra ulun maikang nilono minatoi noyo, nagigiru' ilo.
Gogolos ulun ru Israil am ulun ru Jiuda, am nangilou risilo saboi ra Gat
Pakasaguli' intor ra nangilou ra ulun ru Palistin, ulun ru Israil nanalingaau ra pangkiman ru ulun ru Palistin.
Inalap ri Daut ulu ri Goliat am inibit no ra Jirusalim, kaa' binulian no kinandoi ri Goliat giu' ra kim nano.
Pakakito Raja' Saul ri Daut giminula' ri Goliat, nangkuot io ri Abnir, panglima saujor nano, “Abnir, osoi ra anak kia buayoi raginio?”
Taam i Abnir, “Raja' kuno, kalo nakapandai aku.”
Susuban ru Raja' Saul, “Ongoyo' imumuyi' baal raginio.”
Ginio ra paat ri Daut siminaguli' ra pangkiman nalupus namatoi ri Goliat, inibit io ri Abnir minuma' ra Raja' Saul. Lakat poyo i Daut nananggal ra ulu ri Goliat.
Nangkuot Raja' Saul no riso, “Okou buayoi, osoi kia ra anak okou ti?”
Taam i Daut, “Aku ti anak ri Isai, intor ra Bitligim.”

Nopongo noyo Raja' Saul am i Daut nagindagu. Kopongo raginio, anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Saul ondo' makainggalan ri Jonatan maansayan kaga' ri Daut, am tumalimpuun motogom riso koson ra io motogom ra inan nano galama'.
Intor ra orou raginio, nanusub Raja' Saul no ri Daut mayan simpung riso, am kalo mataak no io muli' ra baloi ru ama' nali.
Nagibot i Jonatan koson rumangan ri Daut ra mantilayun, sabap ra motogom io kaga' ri Daut.
Inalus ri Jonatan sukub nano am pabayango' no ri Daut. Tinaakan no niayuk bayang mangayou nano, ilang nano, panah nano am abot nano ri Daut.

Binaal ri Daut ra matanda' ngaangai' kandoi ondo' nanusuban ru Raja' Saul. Raja' Saul pana nampili' boo riso nasauk ra pagawai saujor. Baal raginio napakaansuk ra guang ru ngaangai' pagawai saujor am ulun ru Raja' Saul.

Pakasaguli' i Daut, kalupus nangala ri Goliat ulun ru Palistin no, am baris saujor-saujor minumpos ra ralalom ru bandar, bala ru ruandu' miningkual intor ra ngaangai' bandar giu' ra Israil koson manguma' ra Raja' Saul. Naririmbai ilo ra rimbai kaansukan liliwa' nansasayau am nangkuli ra tamburing am jitor.
Liliwa' nansasayau ruandu'-ruandu' narimbai koson ragitio,
“Raja' Saul namatoi ra riribu ngaulun pantula',
kaa' i Daut namatoi ra opor-opor ngaribu ngaulun pantula'.”

Kalo naansayan Raja' Saul nangkirongog ra rimbai no, am sangit io boo. Indagu Raja' Saul, “I Daut no kinara' namatoi ra opor-opor ngaribu ngaulun pantula', am aku ti kinara' ayuk namatoi ra riribu ngaulun pantula'. Kalo boo mabuoi saukon nilo io ra raja'!”
Intor ra orou raginio nangusolon Raja' Saul ri Daut.

Suabon no, soroi Raja' Saul giu' ra ralalom baloi am tatanga' nampaguut ra tutura'. Pulali' ru Raja' Saul no sinubol ru ambiluo malaat ondo' sinusub ri Aki Kapuuno', saboi giminabu' io koson ra ulun mantuyang. Paat raginio tatanga' i Daut mangkuli ra jitor koson ra kaindalaman.
Nangkara' Raja' Saul, “Potonsokon ku io ra timbok no.” Pinapatir no tutura' no ri Daut saboi induo, kaa' nailiwan ri Daut ginio.
Nalaa' Raja' Saul ri Daut sabap ra
Raja' Saul pana napabanding boo ri Daut intor ra ralalom ru istana am pinili' no nasauk ra tingganai ru pulalai ra saribu ngaulun saujor. Naningganai i Daut ra pulalai nano ralalom pangayawan,
am nakasugut io nambaal ra ngaangai' kandoi nano sabap ra
Inimansaan ru Raja' Saul nasugutan ri Daut, am baal raginio naparuang poyo ra laa' nano ri Daut.
Kaa' ngaangai' mamagun ru Israil am Jiuda motogom ri Daut, sabap ra io sangulun tingganai ondo' masuang indangan nano.
Naguot i Daut ra anak ruandu' ru Raja' Saul

Nangatang Raja' Saul maa' raginio potoyon i Daut no ru ulun ru Palistin ralalom ru pangayawan maa' raginio sala' ka Raja' Saul galama' ondo' mamatoi riso. Ginio ra, sangarawan raginio indagu Raja' Saul ri Daut, “I Mirab, anak ruandu' ra katuaan kuno, pawatin ku rirun, ginio ayuk ra mangandoi kou raki' masauk ra saujor ondo' baani am gumagaya', am niayuk mangayou ra tayar ru
Taam i Daut, “Osoi boo kia aku ti, am osoi boo kia sasambaloi ru ama' kuli giu' ra Israil saboi aku ti masauk ra anak mangiwan ru raja'?”
Kaa' nasaboi paat ri Mirab paganduon ri Daut, pinataak i Mirab no ra sangulun ungkuyon ra bokon ondo' makainggalan ri Adriil intor ra bandar Migola.
Kaa' i Mikgal, anak ruandu' ru Raja' Saul ra bokon no, malaai ri Daut. Pokorongog Raja' Saul ra baal raginio, Raja' Saul pana naansayan.

Nangkara' Raja' Saul, “Pataakin ku i Mikgal no ri Daut maa' raginio malandak i Daut am potoyon ru ulun ru Palistin.” Kainduo no boo, indagu Raja' Saul ri Daut, “Raino masauk kou ra anak mangiwan kuno.”

Nanusub Raja' Saul no ra pagawai-pagawai nano maa' raginio suminok mambala' ri Daut koson ragitio, “Maansayan Raja' no rirun, am ngaangai' ru pagawai nano masaga' rirun; ginio ra raino noyo paat ondo' motopot rirun koson manangandu' ra anak ruandu' ru raja'.”
Baal raginio pinasaboi nilo ri Daut, am taam io, “Karaan min kia ra matasu' masauk ra anak mangiwan ru raja'? Aku ti ulun musikin am kalo maatang!”
Pagawai-pagawai no nampasaboi ra taaman ri Daut no ra Raja' Saul,

am nanusub Raja' Saul ra pagawai-pagawai mambala' ri Daut ra bilin ragitio, “Rondo' ayuk toojo kitaakon ru raja' no intor rirun koson ra mulo iono maatus kungkung ru khatan ru ulun ru Palistin, koson mansuli' ra pantula' nano.” (Gitio noyo ralan inatang ru Raja' Saul maa' raginio potoyon i Daut no ru ulun ru Palistin.)
Pagawai-pagawai ru Raja' Saul nampasaboi ra ragu ru Raja' Saul no ri Daut, am naansukan i Daut ra naambi' masauk ra anak mangiwan ru raja'. Ginio ra kalo poyo nasaboi orou paguatan ondo' inaru' noyo,

nababaya' i Daut ra ulun-ulun nano namatoi ra ruo ngaatus ngaulun Palistin; inalap ri Daut kungkung khatan nilono. Kopongo raginio pinataak ri Daut ngaangai' no ra raja' ra kalo natutusan ra rondo' pana maa' raginio masauk io ra anak mangiwan ru raja'. Ginio ra musiti' pawatin ru Raja' Saul no anak ruandu' nano i Mikgal no ri Daut.
Nalimanan ru Raja' Saul ra
Gumaai boo laa' ru Raja' Saul no ri Daut. Nantula' Raja' Saul no ri Daut buoi ru bayag nano.
Pogonong ra saujor ru Palistin mamulunsar, makasugut poyo i Daut nangala risilo intor ra pagawai ru Raja' Saul ra bokon no. Kon raginio noyo i Daut nasauk ra nauligan kaga'.
Nambala' Raja' Saul ri Jonatan, anak ungkuyon nano am ngaangai' ru pagawai nano ra nangatang io koson mamatoi
am indagu io ri Daut, “Ama' kuno mirot mamatoi rirun. Ilalain ra susuab no. Pansibuni no ra rondo' intok moopot am ayan no ra giu' no.
Mongoi aku ra padang mabaya' ra ama' kuno am migor mamaar ra intok pansibunian muno. Raguin ku boo io intor ra kuayan nano rirun. Amon ru mapandayan ku, mambala' aku rirun.”
Rinagu ri Jonatan baal ri Daut ra mongoonsoi no ra Raja' Saul, kono, “Ama', pai' jamari' i Daut, ulipon muno. Kalo nambaal io ra kasalaan ru atan pana rirun; kaa' masuang noyo indangan nano rirun.
Pinataak no painawo nano paat io namatoi ri Goliat, am nanaak
Nalimanan ru Raja' Saul no nalupus nokorongog ra ragu ri Jonatan no, am nagibot io ralalom inggalan ru
Kopongo raginio nampiau i Jonatan ri Daut am nambala' riso ra ngaangai' sinunur ra raitii' ni. Ibito' boo ri Jonatan i Daut ra Raja' Saul, am nangandoi i Daut ra Raja' Saul koson ragili.
Kopongo raginio nasauk saguli' pangayawan ra ulun ru Palistin. Binulunsar am kinala ri Daut ulun ru Palistin liningon saboi ra ilo nagigiru'.
Sangarawan raginio tatanga' Raja' Saul nanturung liliwa' nampaguut ra tutura' giu' ra baloi. Pulali' ru Raja' Saul no sinubol poyo ru ambiluo malaat ondo' sinusub ru
Nangkinam Raja' Saul mapatura' ra tutura' nano ri Daut ondo' soroi mamaar ra rinding, kaa' nailiu ri Daut, saboi tutura' no nakatujok ra rinding. Nagiru' i Daut koson mamayag ra inan.
I Mikgal nampatuun ri Daut intor ra gigimpalan am nagiru' i Daut intor ra intok raginio.

I Mikgal pana nangalap ra sinungkalalaing ru baloi nano am pinabanta' no ra intok pambalangan ri Daut. Pinabanta' no niayuk bantal ondo' binaal intor ra bulu ru kambing ra ragana' ru ulu ru sinungkalalaing no, am kinuluput no ra bajang.
Paat ra ulun-ulun ri Raja' Saul minatong koson mamparakop ri Daut, indagu i Mikgal, “Marualan i Daut no.”

Kaa' nanusub Raja' Saul no risilo mongoi poyo ra giu' no koson magilong ri Daut ra mato nilo galama'. Nanusub io, “Ibito' min io ragiti pabayaan ra intok pambalangan nano, maa' raginio mapatoi ku io.”
Minumpos ilo ra lamin am kakito nilo sinungkalalaing ondo' pinabanta' ra intok pambalangan am bantal intor ra bulu ru kambing giu' ra ragana' ru ulu nano.
Pangkuot Raja' Saul ri Mikgal, “Kua ruungo' mu aku koson ragitio? Nangindangan kou ra pantula' kuno nagiru'!”
Taam i Mikgal, “Linolob no aku koson mamatoi raki' amon ru kalo inindangan ku io nagiru'.”

Nagiru' i Daut am minongoi ri Samuil giu' ra Rama. Nambala' i Daut ri Samuil ra ngaangai' ondo' pinamakuan ru Raja' Saul no riso. Kopongo raginio i Daut am i Samuil minongoi ra Nayot am minayan ra giu'.
Raja' Saul binalaan ra soroi i Daut giu' ra Nayot mamaar ra Rama.
Ginio ra nanusub Raja' Saul ra kukula' ngaulun minongoi ra giu' no koson mamparakop ri Daut. Giu' no nakito nilo

Pokorongog Raja' Saul ra tanou raginio, nangator io ra masuang poyo ulun-ulun ra bokon. Kaa' ilo pana tumalimpuun lumigo' am gumolok. Koson ra kaintalu no Raja' Saul nangator ra ulun, kaa' ilo pana koson niayuk raginio nasauk.

Ginio ra Raja' Saul galama' minongoi ra Rama. Pakasaboi io ra tulubong ondo' maayo giu' ra Siku, nangkuot io ra ati intok ri Samuil am i Daut. Ulun ra giu' no nambala' riso ra soroi ilo giu' ra Nayot.
Paat ra Raja' Saul mongoi ra giu' no, io niayuk kinuasa' ru Ambiluo ri Aki Kapuuno', saboi io lumigo' am gumolok ra galur ru pangkiralanan mongoi ra Nayot.

Pakasaboi ra giu' no, nangalus Raja' Saul ra bayang nano am liminigo' am giminolok ra saang ri Samuil. Kopongo raginio Raja' Saul liminuya' am nagibabaang ra nonsongorou am nosorondom. (Ginio noyo talimpuun no ra ulun mindagu, “Nabi niayuk kia i Saul no?”)

I Daut pana nagiru' boo intor ra Nayot mamaar ra Rama, am minongoi uma' ri Jonatan. Pangkuot io ri Jonatan, “Atan kinua' binaal kutu? Atan kinua' kasalaan kutu? Atan kinua' tula kutu ra ama' muno saboi ra ama' muno masaga' mamatoi raki'?”

Taam i Jonatan, “Pai' indagu koson raginio! Sabap ri Aki Kapuuno' no, kalo potoyon kou! Masalok ama' kuno mambala' raki' ra ngaangai' ru inatangan nano, ondo' maatang kapoam ondo' kalo maatang. Kalo igondo' io pambuni ra atan pana raki'. Kalo motopot baal raginio!”
Taam i Daut,
Kon ri Jonatan, “Suguton ku atan ayuk kitaakon muno.”

Amon ru mangkuot ama' muno ra kua kalo siminaang aku, balai' io ra nakitaak aku noyo rirun koson mataki' muli' ra Bitligim, sabap ra giu' no paugaron upacara mapataak ra taak simbalui ru kabilaran ra tayar ru ngaangai' sasambaloi kuno.
Amon ru mindagu raja' no, ‘Iou noyo,’ aku ti am mamaa', kaa' amon ru sumangit raja' no, kapandayi' noyo ra namatas noyo raja' no koson mapajamar raki'.
Makiindangan aku rirun sabap ra naigot tano ru nabantuan ra saang ru
Taam i Jonatan, “Pai' kaimamang! Amon ru makapandai aku toojo ra ama' kuno totopot noyo mapajamar rirun, maaru' balain tokou.”
I Daut pana nangkuot boo, “Osoi kia ondo' mambala' raki' amon ru sumangit ama' muno?”
Kon ri Jonatan, “Ibok ongoi to ra padang.” Minongoi ilo ruo ra padang,
am indagu boo i Jonatan ri Daut, “Gama' ru
Kaa' amon ru makaguang io koson mapajamar rirun, polosoon noyo
Amon ru lakat aku poyo maayag, karaa' noyo ra nabantuan tali giu' ra saang ru
pakitono' gagaya' muno ra papag kuno ra sabuoi-buoi no. Mopongo
gama' ru nabantuan tano ruo mantilayun. Amon ru masulang nabantuan no, mangukum
Ginio noyo kainduo ri Jonatan nakitaak ri Daut mabantu' koson motogom riso, sabap ra io galama' motogom ri Daut koson ra inan nano galama'.
I Jonatan pana mindagu boo riso, “Susuab no Pangiantakan ra Sila' Bagu. Amon ru kalo makasaang kou, maaru' mapandayan ru ulun sabap ra intok muno kolondo' manturung giu' ra mija' pagakanan.
Amon ru malaas no pana kalo makasaang kou, maaru' uyumon kou. Ginio ra ongoi no ra intok pansibunian muno galing, am pansibuni no ra tinaulian ru batu pinupug
Malaas no mamanah aku intalu ra tampilon ru batu pinupug no, ilain ayuk koson nampupugan no intok tiwon.

Mopongo raginio manusub aku ra ulipon kuno maguyum ra anak panah no. Amon ru mindagu aku riso, ‘Ilai' noyo, anak panah no mamaar poyo ragiti, alapo' noyo,’ arati' no ra maayag kou am makaingkual. Magibot aku ralalom inggalan ru
Kaa' amon ru mindagu aku ra ulipon kuno, ‘Anak panah no maalur poyo ra giu' no,’ arati' no ra manusub
Gama' ru manutun
I Daut pana ongoi boo pansibuni giu' ra padang. Paat ra Pangiantakan ra Sila' Bagu, minatong Raja' Saul ra bunsag no.
Koson ra kaindalaman no manturung Raja' Saul mamaar ra rinding; i Jonatan manturung mantaluma' riso,
Paat ra orou raginio, kalo naguta' Raja' Saul ra baal raginio sabap ra nangkara' io, “Maaru' mokoondo' nasauk ri Daut, saboi nangkinibit riso majamol.”

Suabon raginio, songorou malupus Pangiantakan ra Sila' Bagu, kurisi' ri Daut no lakat poyo kolondo' nanturung. Kopongo raginio pangkuot Raja' Saul ri Jonatan, “Kua kinua' ri Daut kalo siminaang ra bunsag, ra mai' i am ra orou raiti'?”
Taam i Jonatan, “Nakitaak io noyo raki' koson mongoi ra Bitligim.

Kono, ‘Paugaro' aku no, sabap ra sasambaloi kuno tatanga' mangiantak ra karamayan mapataak ra taak simbalui giu' ra Bitligim, am sinusub aku ru maayo kuno matong. Ginio ra amon ru mataak mu aku, masaga' aku mongoi tuum ra pabukat-pabukat kuno.’ Ginio sabap ra io kalo siminaang ra bunsag ti, ama'.”
Pokorongog raginio Raja' Saul siminangit kaga' ri Jonatan. Indagu Raja' no, “Tinimor ti! Raino nakapandai aku ra manaung kou ri Daut. Napakauyu' kou ra ina' muno am inan muno galama'.
Kalo kia nakapandai kou ra buoi ri Daut no maayag, kalo noyo masauk kou ra raja' ru pagun ragitio? Raino panusub no ra ulun maguyum riso am magibit riso ragiti, sabap ra musiti' io matoi!”
Taam i Jonatan, “Kua musiti' io matoi? Atan kia tula nano?”
Paat raginio niayuk Raja' Saul no napatura' ra tutura' ra tampilon ri Jonatan koson mamatoi riso. Ginio ra nakaliman i Jonatan ra totopot ama' nano mamatoi ri Daut.

Ra siminangit kaga' i Jonatan nangiruan ra mija' pagakanan no am kalo nangakan io ra atan pana paat ra panangarawan ru Pangiantakan ra Sila' Bagu no. Magalabo io kaga' mangkara' ri Daut ondo' inasaban noyo ru Raja' Saul, ama' nano.
Suabon no ra iosusuab i Jonatan minongoi ra padang koson tumuum ri Daut koson ra ondo' inatang nilo noyo ruo. Nagibit io ra sangulun lalaing ungkuyon, iono ulipon nano, nabaya' riso.
Indagu i Jonatan riso, “Pasimbul no, uyumo' anak-anak panah ondo' pinapanah kuno.” Tatanga' lalaing no nasimbul, pinapanah ri Jonatan rondo' anak panah no nansail ra lalaing no.
Paat ra lalaing no nakasaboi ra intok naratuan ru anak panah no, golok i Jonatan riso, “Anak panah no maalur poyo ra giu' no!
Ribaki' noyo! Pai' pangintairoi ayuk!” Inanam no anak panah no am saguli' ra tuan nano.
Totopot io kalo nakarati' ra ragu ri Jonatan no, i Jonatan am i Daut ayuk ondo' nakarati'.
Pinataak ri Jonatan kuliamos panah nano ra lalaing no am nanusub riso magibit raginio sumaguli' ra bandar.
Pakaugar lalaing no, miningkual i Daut intor ra tinaulian ru batu pinupug
Kopongo raginio indagu i Jonatan ri Daut, “Gama' ru i Aki Kapuuno' no mabaya' rirun.
Taam i Daut, “Kandoi pinataakan raki' ru raja' am nanginggalar mambala' ra osoi pana intor ra kandoi no. Ginio ra nanusub aku ra ulun kuno maginaa ra rondo' intok.
Masaga' aku mangkuot, atan akanon soroi rirun raino? Pataako' raki' limo ruti' kapoam atan ayuk ondo' soroi.”
Taam imam no, “Kolondo' ruti' ku ra bokon, ruti' ra pataakon ayuk ondo' soroi. Alapo' min ginio, amon ru ulun-ulun muno kalo nakimarulug ra ruandu' ra babagu ti.”
Taam i Daut, “Totopot kalo! Ulun-ulun kuno magail mapasau, kabalu' pana mapaugar ra kandoi kaindalaman ayuk; atan poyo ra raino ti paat ra akai mapaugar ra kandoi timpokon ti!”
Nakainamot ra i Doig ulun ru Idom, tingganai ru magagalung ra bibiag tinambiag ru Raja' Saul, soroi ra giu' no paat ra orou raginio koson manugut ra pabaalin ru ugama.)

Nangkuot i Daut ri Agimilik, “Binulian mu kia tutura' kapoam ilang ondo' mapakai kuno? Susuban ru raja' no namulali' kaga' saboi naagou-agou aku minugar am kalo boo nakasimbat nangalap ra ilang kapoam kinandoi ra bokon.”
Indagu i Daut, “Ilang raginio noyo ondo' moonsoi kaga' ra titikop ru pagun; pataaki' noyo ilang no raki'!”
Paat ra orou raginio niayuk, nagiru' i Daut intor ra Raja' Saul, am minongoi ra Raja' Akis giu' ra bandar Gat.

Indagu pagawai-pagawai ru Raja' Akis riso, “Sala' ka kia io ti i Daut, raja' ru giu' ra pagun nano? Io noyo ondo' kon ru ruandu'-ruandu' ondo' paat ragili liminigo'-ligo' liliwa' narimbai koson ragitio, ‘I Saul namatoi ra riribu ngaulun pantula', kaa' i Daut namatoi ra opor-opor ngaribu ngaulun pantula'.’ ”
Ginio ra, giu' ra saang nilo i Daut no minitutuyang. Paat ra ilo kuminam mamparakop riso, ilain ayuk ra io kalo matanda'; binalis-balis no kulobon ru bandar no
Kopongo raginio indagu Raja' Akis no ra pagawai-pagawai nano, “Kalo kia nakito min ra mantuyang ulun no? Kua ibito' min io ragiti?
Lakat poyo kia natutusan libung kutu ra ulun mantuyang, saboi inibit min sangulun mantuyang poyo ra istana kutu?”
Ngaangai' ulun ondo' naimbolo', kapoam ondo' makautang, kapoam ondo' manguang, niayuk minamung ri Daut, am nasauk i Daut ra tingganai nilo. Suang ru mamaya' ri Daut no olo'-olo' apat ngaatus ngaulun.
Intor ra luang batu no minongoi i Daut ra Mijpa giu' ra pagun Moab. Indagu io ra raja' Moab no, “Paayano' noyo matuo kuno rirun saboi ra aku makapandai ra kasagaan ri Aki Kapuuno' no raki'.”
Ginio ra inibit ri Daut no matuo nano ra raja' ru pagun Moab, am minayan ilo ra giu' no buoi ri Daut nansibuni giu' ra luang batu.

Kopongo raginio, sangarawan raginio sangulun nabi ondo' makainggalan ri Gad minatong ri Daut am indagu, “Pai' ayan ra luang batu ti. Ongoi noyo mataki' ra tana' Jiuda.” Iruani' boo ri Daut intok raginio am ongoi ra kataunan ru Kirit.

Sangarawan raginio tatanga' Raja' Saul nanturung ra ragana' ru puun tamariska giu' ra rasawat ru bulur giu' ra Gibia; tatanga' io nampaguut ra tutura' am ngaangai' pagawai minigor ra liput nano. Paat ra io nokorongog ra intok ri Daut am ulun-ulun nano natuum noyo,

indagu io ra pagawai-pagawai nano, “Rongogo', akau ngaangai' ulun ru Binjamin! Mangkara' kau kia ra i Daut no mangani' ramuyun ra umo am umo ru anggur? Saukon kau kia ngaangai' ra pagawai ralalom ru saujor nano?

Ginio kia boo ra akau nampakat gumula' raki' am kolondo' sangulun pana nambala' raki' ra anak kuno galama' nanaung noyo ri Daut no? Kolondo' sangulun pana ramuyun nangkara' raki'. Kolondo' sangulun pana ramuyun nambala' raki' ra i Daut, ulun kuno galama', paat ra raino ti tatanga' maginaa ra kaluagan koson mamatoi raki', am i Jonatan, anak kuno nangunsu' noyo riso!”
Nakitulu' i Agimilik intor ra
Ginio ra nanusub Raja' Saul no ra ulun mambala' ra Imam Agimilik am ngaangai' ru sasambaloi nano ondo' nasauk ra imam giu' ra Nob maa' raginio matong uma' riso.
Pakasaboi ilo, indagu Raja' Saul ri Agimilik, “Rongogo', okou anak ri Agitub!”
Taam io, “Iou, raja' kuno.”

Pangkuot Raja' Saul riso, “Kua pampakat kou am i Daut mamatoi raki'? Kua anii' mu io ra akanon am ilang? Kua pakitulu' kou ri Aki Kapuuno' ra tayar nano? Raino giminuor io raki', am tatanga' maginaa ra kaluagan koson mamatoi raki'!”
Taam i Agimilik, “Kaa' sala' ka i Daut no alia pagawai muno ondo' gumagaya' kaga'? Io anak mangiwan muno galama', tingganai
Topot ra nangkuot aku noyo ra
Indagu Raja', “Agimilik, okou am ngaangai' sasambaloi muno musiti' matoi.”
Kopongo raginio nangani' Raja' Saul ra susuban ra magagalung-magagalung ondo' minigor ra sapapa' nano, “Potoyo' min imam-imam ru

Ginio ra indagu Raja' Saul ri Doig, “Okou noyo mamatoi risilo!” Pinatoi boo ri Doig no ngaangai' ru imam no. Paat ra orou raginio namatoi io ra balu' ngoopor am limo ngaulun imam ondo' iniou mambayang ra efod.
Nanusub niayuk Raja' Saul maa' raginio ngaangai' ru mamagun ru Nob, bandar ru imam no, potoyon ngaangai' no, nakaaya' ungkuyon, ruandu', lalaing, lalagang, am niayuk sapi', kaladai am niayuk domba.
Kaa' i Abiatar, sangulun intor ra anak ri Agimilik, nakapagiru'. Minongoi io ri Daut,
am nambala' ri Daut ra Raja' Saul namatoi noyo ra imam-imam ru
Indagu i Daut riso, “Paat ra aku nakakito ri Doig ra orou raginio, nakapandai aku ra maaru' mambala' io ra Raja' Saul. Ginio ra aku noyo ondo' mansaan
Ayan no raki' am pai' kalaa'. Moogot Raja' Saul no mamatoi rirun, kaa' moogot io mamatoi raki' niayuk. Ginio ra mamimio kou ra intok kutu.”
Paat ra sangarawan binalaan i Daut ra namulunsar ulun ru Palistin ra bandar Kigila am nanalingaau ra unor-unaran ondo' bagu kinumos.
Ginio ra nangkuot io ra
Taam
Kaa' indagu ulun-ulun ri Daut riso, “Ali ka giti ra Jiuda ti mangalaa' takano, mulu' piboo amon ru mongoi takau ra Kigila am mamulunsar ra ulun ru Palistin!”
Ginio ra nangkuot poyo i Daut ra

I Daut am ulun-ulun nano pana minongoi boo ra Kigila am namulunsar ra ulun ru Palistin. Namatoi ilo ra masuang ulun ru Palistin am nanalingaau ra bibiag tinambiag nilono. Kon raginio noyo i Daut namayag ra mamagun ru bandar no.
Paat ri Abiatar anak ri Agimilik nagiru' minongoi ri Daut, am minaya' ri Daut minongoi ra Kigila, io niayuk nagibit ra efod.

Raja' Saul no binalaan ra minongoi noyo i Daut ra Kigila, indagu boo Raja' Saul ralalom ru guang, “Raino napataak noyo i Aki Kapuuno' ri Daut no ra kalindu' kutu. Nalandak noyo i Daut sabap ra minumpos ra ralalom ru bandar ondo' makatimbok am mokoondo' ra kulobon garabang ondo' makaumpok.”
Ginio ra nanimung Raja' Saul ra saujor-saujor nano am minongoi ra Kigila koson magawang ra Raja' Daut mabaya' ra ngaangai' ru ulun nano.
Pokorongog i Daut ra malaat ginuang ru Raja' Saul koson mamulunsar riso, indagu io ra Imam Abiatar, “Ibito' efod no ragiti.”
I Daut pana makiasi', “Iou
Pataakon kinua' aku ti ru mamagun Kigila ti ra Raja' Saul? Motopot kia ra matong Raja' Saul koson ra ondo' norongog kutu? Iou
Taam
Nangkuot poyo i Daut, “Pataakon kinua' aku ti am ulun-ulun kuti ru mamagun Kigila ti ra Raja' Saul?”
Taam

Ginio ra i Daut am ulun-ulun nano, olo'-olo' onom ngaatus ngaulun, nagindibok nangiruan ra Kigila am timinanggau intor ra rondo' intok minongoi ra intok ra bokon. Pokorongog Raja' Saul ra minugar noyo i Daut intor ra Kigila, kalo sinugut no inatangan nano.
Nansibuni i Daut giu' ra intok-intok panindungan giu' ra kabuluran, giu' ra tana' kaagisan Jiip. Masalok io ilolowon ru Raja' Saul, kaa'
Nalaa' i Daut no sabap ra Raja' Saul no totopot masaga' koson mamatoi riso.
Rondo' paat ra i Daut soroi giu' ra Oris, giu' ra tana' kaagisan Jiip.
Minongoi i Jonatan tuum riso ra giu' no am napaikang riso ra i Aki Kapuuno' no manindung riso.
Kon ri Jonatan riso, “Pai' kalaa', kalo marakop kou ru ama' kuno. Nakapandai io toojo ra okou noyo masauk ra raja' ru Israil am ra aku ti makaintok ra ragana' muno.”
I Daut am i Jonatan pana nabantu' ra tutun giu' ra saang ru
Nakapandai akai ra masaga' kou mamparakop riso. Ginio ra ratong noyo ra wilayah maino. Tutunon mai toojo ra marakop mu io.”
Indagu Raja' Saul, “Gama' ru barakaton kau ru
Ugar kano am tutuno' min igondo' poyo. Imumuyi' min toojo intok sinarayan ri Daut am osoi nakakito noyo riso ra giu' no. Norongog ku ra mapintar io kaga'.

Ilai' min toojo intok-intok ondo' nasauk ra pansibunian nano, am kataki' kau saguli' mambala' raginio raki'. Ongoyon ku boo mabaya' ramuyun. Amon ru lakat io poyo soroi ra intok raginio, maaru' sunuon ku io kabalu' pana ra musiti' aku lumiput ra titikop ru Jiuda.”

Ilo pana minuli boo ra Jiip siminigulu ra Raja' Saul. Paat raginio i Daut am ulun-ulun nano soroi giu' ra intok masiluk Maon, giu' ra limayak ondo' masiluk ra tampilon rabugus ru tana' kaagisan Jiuda.

Raja' Saul am ulun-ulun nano minatong koson maguyum ri Daut, kaa' ulun minongoi pambala' ri Daut ra baal raginio. Ongoi boo i Daut ra rondo' bulur makabatu giu' ra tana' kaagisan Maon am ayan ra giu' no. Pakapandai Raja' Saul raginio, nataki' io nangilou ri Daut.

Raja' Saul am ulun-ulun nano minugar giu' ra sisil ru rondo' sapapa' ru gunung am i Daut am ulun-ulun nano giu' ra sisil ru sapapa' ra bokon no. Nagindibok i Daut nagiru' intor ra Raja' Saul ondo' tumalimpuun noyo magawang risilo am maar mamparakop risilo.
Nainamot paat raginio sangulun sinusub minatong uma' ra Raja' Saul am indagu, “Raja' mai, ribaki' uli' no! Ulun-ulun ru Palistin tatanga' mamulunsar ra pagun takau!”
Ginio sabap ra linanggaan ru Raja' Saul nangilou ri Daut, am ongoi boo pangayou manggal ra ulun ru Palistin. Ginio sabap ra intok raginio ininggalanan ra Bulur Pantuliaran.
Kopongo raginio minongoi i Daut ra In-Gidi am nansibuni ra giu' no.
Paat ra Raja' Saul siminaguli' intor ra pangayawan minanggal ra ulun ru Palistin, nokorongog io ra soroi i Daut giu' ra tana' kaagisan mamaar ra In-Gidi.
Nampili' Raja' Saul ra talu ngaulun saujor ondo' moonsoi kaga' intor ra titikop ru Israil, am minugar naguyum ri Daut am ulun-ulun nano giu' ra tampilon sirangon ru Bulur Batu Kambing Kataunan.

Nakasaboi Raja' Saul giu' ra rondo' intok mamaar ra kukula' kandang ru domba ra kiing ru ralan. Siminubol Raja' Saul no ra ralalom ru luang batu ra giu' no ra mampangara'. Nakainamot toojo ri Daut am ulun-ulun nano tatanga' nansibuni ra luang batu raginio niayuk, giu' ra ujok poyo.
Indagu ulun ri Daut no riso, “Gitio noyo kaluagan muno. Sala' ka nakaindagu alia
Kaa' kalupus raginio, malimanan ri Daut ra makasala sabap ra binaal no ginio.
Indagu io ra ulun-ulun nano, “Gama' ru manginggalar
Kon raginio noyo i Daut nanimayo ra ulun-ulun nano, am kalo nangiou risilo ra mamulunsar ra Raja' Saul.
Ingkakat Raja' Saul no am iruani' luang batu no, am naparayus ra pangkiralanan.
Kaa' sinunu' ri Daut no Raja' Saul giu' ra liwar ru luang batu am nampiau intor ra bakulung nano, “Raja' kuno!” Nangkaili Raja' Saul, am kuku' i Daut ra sumamba
am indagu, “Kua rongogo' mu ragu ru ulun ondo' mansunur ra masaga' aku mapajamar rirun?
Raino nakaili' kou galama' ra giu' ra ralalom ru luang batu ni, pinataak kou noyo ru

Ilai' noyo ama'! Ilai' noyo putul ru sukub mutu ondo' ginuut kutu! Sotopot no mapatoi tokou, kaa' pinutul ku ayuk koborok kiing ru sukub muno. Baal ragitio napainono' ra aku ti kalo nampaguang ra malaat kapoam manggal. Nangingilou kou raki' koson mamatoi raki', kabalu' pana kolondo' sala kuno ra sanganu pana rirun.
Gama' ru mamatas
Nakapandai kou ra pagabigan lair ti, ‘Kalaatan no baalon ayuk ru ulun malaat.’ Ginio sabap ra kalo rualin tokou.
Imansaa' aku ti ondo' masaga' potoyon ru raja' ru Israil! Ilai' noyo aku ti ondo' ilolowon mutu! Aku ti sanginan uku' minatoi ayuk, rondo' kutu ayuk!
no mangakim rirun am aku, am mangaru' ra osoi ondo' makasala. Gama' ru Io manutun ra baal ragitio, am manaung raki' am niayuk mamayag raki' intor rirun.”
Kopongo i Daut minindagu raginio, indagu Raja' Saul, “Motopot kia ra okou i Daut, anak kuno?” Nantangi' boo Raja' Saul.
Kopongo raginio indagu Raja' Saul ri Daut, “Topot ra okou noyo ondo' motopot am aku ondo' makasala. Moonsoi kou kaga' raki', kabalu' pana malaat aku rirun.
Orou raiti' napainono' kou noyo ra moonsoi kou raki'. Kalo pinatoi mu aku kabalu' pana
Sanganuan ayuk toojo ulun mapalabus ra pantula' ra kalo rualin no ra malupus tuumon no pantula' raginio.
Raino mangintopot aku ra okou noyo masauk ra raja' ru Israil, am ra pamarintaan ru Israil maulian ralalom ru pamarintaan muno.
Kaa' pakimabantu' no ralalom inggalan ru
Ginio boo ra nagibot i Daut koson manugut ra kitaakon raginio.
Kopongo raginio Raja' Saul minuli' ra baloi, am i Daut am ulun-ulun nano siminaguli' ra intok nansibunian nilono.
Kopongo raginio i Samuil minatoi. Ngaangai' ulun ru Israil timinimung am nanulaboi riso. Linobong nilo baangkai ri Samuil ra baloi nano giu' ra Rama.
Kopongo raginio minongoi i Daut ra tana' kaagisan Paran.

Giu' ra bandar Maon mokoondo' sangulun ungkuyon makainggalan ri Nabal, intor ra bansa' Kalib. Io ti mokoondo' ra tana' mamaar ra bandar Karmil. Io ti langkaya' kaga' am mokoondo' ra talu ngaribu ngainan domba am saribu ngainan kambing. I Abigail andu' nano, maligag am mantalur, kaa' i Nabal ti makuliga' am makapaliso ra malaat.
Rondo paat raginio tatanga' i Nabal mopolompor ra bulu ru domba nano giu' ra Karmil.
Paat raginio, soroi i Daut giu' ra tana' kaagisan, nokorongog ra baal raginio.
Kopongo raginio nanusub i Daut ra mopor ngaulun buayoi minongoi ra Karmil. Nanusub io risilo tumuum ri Nabal am mampasaboi ra ragu kaansayan ri Daut no riso.
Nanusub i Daut no risilo mindagu koson ragitio, “Nangator i Daut ra ragu kaansayan nano rirun am sasambaloi muno am niayuk ra ngaangai' longgom muno.

Norongog ri Daut ra tatanga' kou mopolompor ra bulu ru domba muno. Kaala' no ra magagalung-magagalung muno ondo' soroi ra intok maino kalo igondo' mai taliojowo', am kalo igondo' ilo natatakan ra atan pana buoi soroi giu' ra Karmil.

Kinami' noyo kuati' ilo ra baal raginio. Maaru' iowon nilo ginio. Ginio sabap ra malansan i Daut maa' raginio akai ti ulun nano apuon ra matanda' ra baloi muno, sabap ra minatong akai ra orou maayo ti. Pataaki' noyo atan ayuk maya' ra kasagaan muno ra ulipon-ulipon muti am niayuk ri Daut, rangan moonsoi muno.”
Pakasaboi ulun-ulun ri Daut ra Karmil, pinasaboi nilo bilin ri Daut no ri Nabal, am naginaa ilo ra giu' no.

Taam i Nabal, “I Daut? Osoi kia io? Osoi kia anak ri Isai no? Kalo poyo igondo' aku pakaining intor riso? Pupupus ti, mokoondo' masuang ulipon nagigiru' intor ra tingganai nangandayan nilono giti ra pagun ti!
Ati kulaan ku alapon ruti' am inumon kuno, am niayuk kual ondo' tinampos kuno ra tayar ru ulun mopolompor ra bulu ru domba-domba kuno, am pataakin ngaangai' no ra ulun ondo' tawa ati intor!”
Ginio ra ulun-ulun ri Daut siminaguli' ri Daut am nambala' ra rinagu ri Nabal no riso.

Nanusub i Daut, “Abilo' ilang mino ra awak min sigagama'!” Nataki' ulun-ulun ri Daut giminagaya' ra susuban nano. Inabil niayuk ri Daut ilang nano ra awak nano am minugar nabaya' ra olo'-olo' apat ngaatus ngaulun, am ruo ngaatus ngaulun ra bokon timinatang koson magalung ra kuliamos-kuliamos.

Liliwa' raginio sangulun ra mangngandoi ri Nabal minindagu ri Abigail, andu' ri Nabal, “Nokorongog kono kia ra baal ondo' nasauk? Nanusub i Daut ra kukula' ngaulun intor ra tana' kaagisan koson mampasaboi ra ragu kaansayan ra tuan takano. Kaa' tuan takano nagasab risilo,
ali ka moonsoi ilo kaga' ramon am kalo igondo' panaliajou ramon. Paat ra akai nababaya' risilo giu' ra tana' kaagisan, kolondo' rondo' pana ra longgom maino tinakou.
Nangampin ilo ramon ra matawang am rondom ti buoi akai nagalung ra domba mamaar risilo.

Ginio ra karaa' toojo atan ondo' musiti' baalon! Baal ragitio maaru' maparatong ra baal makalalaa' ra tuan takano am ngaangai' ru sasambaloi nano. Tuan takano bambalingatan kaga' saboi marara' mangkirongog ra bilin ru osoi pana!”

Nataki' i Abigail nangalap ra 200 ruti', ruo ngakantungan ru kungkung ondo' napanu' ra wain, limo ngainan domba pinanggang, 17 ngakilogram unor-unor ondo' sininggala', 100 ngantiis kismis am 200 kuui ara. Pinasakoi no ngaangai' no ra kukula' ngainan kaladai.
Io pana mindagu boo ra ulipon-ulipon nano, “Ugar kano pagulu. Sumunu' aku.” Kaa' kalo nambala' io ra baal raginio ra ralaki nano.
Kopongo raginio nangura' i Abigail ra kaladai nano. Pakasaboi io ra lilikowon giu' ra igig ru gunung, nakapaguma' io ri Daut am ulun-ulun nano ondo' tatanga' mambusul sumuku' riso.

Paat raginio tatanga' i Daut nangkara', “Banangan ku nanindung ra longgom ru ulun no giu' ra tana' kaagisan! Kolondo' rondo' pana ra longgom nano tinakou ru ulun, am raino nambalos io ra kinoonsoi kuno ra kalaatan.
Polosoon noyo i Aki Kapuuno' no mamatoi raki'
Pakakito i Abigail ri Daut, nagindibok io tuun intor ra kaladai nano am samba
ra kalayam ri Daut. Kon ri Abigail, “Tuan, kasaga' noyo mangkirongog ra ragu kutu. Polosoon noyo kasalaan no saanin ku galama'!
Pai' noyo lioo' i Nabal no, ulun ondo' kolondo' onong no. Sala ka kia inggalan nano galama' arati' no sasambungon?
nanginggalar noyo rirun ra mansuli' am mamatoi ra pantula' muno. Raino magibot aku ralalom inggalan ru
Apuo' noyo tinaakan ondo' inibit kutu rirun am ulun-ulun muno.
Ampuno' noyo kasalaan kutu. Maaru'
Amon ru mokoondo' sasangulun ondo' mamulunsar rirun am kuminam mamatoi rirun, maaru'
Mambaal
Paat raginio makara' mu ra kalo namatoi kou ra kolondo' sasaban kapoam mansuli'. Ginio ra okou kalo pana mangiluk guang kapoam pansagulian guang. Paat ra
I Daut pana mindagu boo riso, “Koompor noyo
Maringkuanang aku sabap ra kapintaran muno. Binaal muno ra orou raiti' nanginggalar raki' ra mamatoi koson mansuli'.
Nanginga' noyo
Inapu ri Daut tinaakan ri Abigail, am kono boo riso, “Uli' no am pai' kaimamang. Suguton ku kitaakon muno.”

Paat ri Abigail minuli' ri Nabal, mokoondo' bunsag maayo giu' ra baloi nano, koson ra bunsag ru raja'. Sabap ra nagauk i Nabal am maansukan, kalo nambala' i Abigail ra atan pana riso saboi ra suabon no.
Suabon no ra iosusuab, paat ra natabinaasan i Nabal, nantunung i Abigail ra ngaangai' no ri Nabal. Namulali' i Nabal no narualan ra pusu' saboi ngaangai' ru inan nano minatoi.
Olo'-olo' mopor ngoorou buoi no, binutus ru
Pokorongog i Daut ra minatoi noyo i Nabal, indagu io, “Koompor noyo
Kopongo raginio nangator i Daut ra ulun mongoi ri Abigail koson manambili' riso masauk ra andu' nano.
Ulun-ulun sinusub ri Daut timinuum ra ruandu' no giu' ra Karmil, am indagu riso, “Sinusub akai ri Daut tumuum rirun, sabap ra makaguang io manangandu' rirun.”
Ingkakat i Abigail am igulatur am indagu, “Aku ti ulipon ri Daut. Nakatampos aku no mambagu' ra kalayam ru ulipon-ulipon nano.”

Kopongo raginio tampos io ra mataki', am nangura' ra kaladai nano. Binaya' io ru limo ngaulun ulipon nano, ugar io nabaya' ra ulun-ulun sinusub ri Daut. Kon raginio noyo i Abigail nasauk ra andu' ri Daut.
Ra buoi ti i Daut nanangandu' ri Aginoam intor ra Jijriil. Raino ti i Abigail niayuk nasauk ra andu' ri Daut.
Liliwa' raginio pinaanduan ru Raja' Saul i Mikgal anak ruandu' nano, iono andu' ri Daut, ri Palti anak ri Lais intor ra bandar Galim.
Nagindibok Raja' Saul minugar minongoi ra tana' kaagisan Jiip nabaya' ra talu ngaribu ngaulun saujor ondo' moonsoi kaga' koson maguyum ri Daut.

Raja' Saul am pulalai nano nangkim ra kiing ru ralan giu' ra Bulur Gakila. Paat raginio i Daut no lakat poyo soroi giu' ra tana' kaagisan no, am norongog no ra nakaratong noyo Raja' Saul naguyum riso giu' ra tana' kaagisan.
Ginio ra nangator io ra kukula' ngaulun pansigo. Binalaan io boo ra motopot Raja' Saul soroi ra giu' no.

Nagindibok i Daut minongoi ra pangkiman ru Raja' Saul, am kakito no ra kim kaalangan ru Raja' Saul no mamaar ri Abnir anak ri Nir, panglima ru saujor. Kim ru Raja' Saul no nakaayan tatanga' am saujor-saujor nano nangkim ra liput no.
I Daut pana nangkuot boo ri Agimilik ulun ru Git no, am ri Abisai pabukat ri Joab, (ina' nilono iono i Jiruya), “Osoi ondo' baani mumpos ra pangkiman ru Raja' Saul no mabaya' raki'?”
Taam i Abisai, “Aku.”

Paat ra rondom raginio i Daut am i Abisai simininok umpos ra pangkiman ru Raja' Saul, am nakakito ra Raja' Saul tatanga' nombolong giu' ra tanga' ru pangkiman. Tutura' ru Raja' Saul no paritansok ra tana' mamaar ra ulu nano. I Abnir am pulalai nano nombolong giu' ra liput ru Raja' Saul.

Kon ri Abisai no ri Daut, “Pinataak noyo ri Aki Kapuuno' no pantula' muno rirun ra rondom raiti'. Iowo' aku ti mapatura' ra tutura' nano galama' ra inan nano saboi makaujak ra tana'. Aku ondo' mamatoi riso ra igondo' tura' ayuk, kalo pana saboi induo!”
Kaa' indagu i Daut, “Pai' mu jamari' io! Maaru'
Ralalom inggalan ru
Gama' ayuk ru manginggalar

Ginio ra inalap ri Daut tutura' am rarapu' ru Raja' Saul ondo' pinabanta' ra sapapa' ru ulu nano, am ugar ilo. Kolondo' sangulun pana nakakito ra baal raginio kapoam nakapandai ra atan ondo' nasauk no, kapoam nakarat, sabap ra
Kopongo raginio simindaup i Daut ra limayak no minongoi ra igig ra bokon am nagaloi ra tampak ru bulur, saboi sama' galur intor ra pangkiman ru Raja' Saul.
Kopongo raginio giminolok i Daut no ri Abnir am saujor ru Raja' Saul, “Okou Abnir, mokorongog kou kia ra bolos kutu?”
Nangkuot i Abnir, “Osoi kia okou ondo' gumolok-golok no am mapakarat ra raja'?”

Taam i Daut, “Okou Abnir, sala' ka kia okou alia ulun ondo' kauligan kaga' giu' ra titikop ru Israil? Kua kalo inampin mu raja' muno? Bagu ayuk mokoondo' ulun minumpos ra pangkiman koson mamatoi ra tuan muno.
Kaa' kalo pinaugar mu kandoi. Magibot aku ralalom inggalan ru
Nauligan ru Raja' Saul bolos ri Daut, am nangkuot io, “Daut, okou kia ginio, alii ra anak kuno?”
Taam i Daut, “Iou, raja' kuno.”
Indagu poyo i Daut, “Kua kia lakat kou poyo mangilou ra ulipon muti? Atan kia boo binaal kutu? Atan kia boo kasalaan kutu?
Raja' kuno, rongogo' ragu kutu. Amon ru
Pai' polosoo' ra aku ti matoi giu' ra pagun ru ulun, maalur intor ra
Taam Raja' Saul, “Sotopot no makatula noyo aku ti. Saguli' no, alii ri Daut anak kuno! Kalo boo lumaat aku rirun. Rondom i pinoloso mu aku naayag. Sasambungon aku kaga'! Binaal kuti jajajou kaga'!”
Indagu i Daut, “Gitio noyo tutura' mutu. Susubo' noyo sangulun ra saujor muno matong pangalap ragitio.
masalok mambarakat ra ulun ondo' gumagaya' am mabanis guang. Kabalu' pana ra orou raiti' okou pinataak No noyo raki', kaa' kalo lumaat aku rirun, raja' ondo' pinili' noyo ru
Koson ra aku nopoloso rirun naayag, gama' ru
Indagu Raja' Saul no ri Daut, “I Aki Kapuuno' mambarakat rirun, alii ra anak kuno! Makasugut kou ra ralalom ru ngaangai' pirot muno!”
Kopongo raginio rinayus ri Daut pangkiralanan nano, am Raja' Saul minuli' ra baloi.

Nangkara' i Daut, “Atan pana kulaan niayuk, rondo' orou no Raja' Saul no mamatoi raki'. Moonsoi poyo magiru' aku giu' ra pagun ru ulun ru Palistin. Mopongo raginio Raja' Saul no kalo boo maguyum raki' giu' ra Israil, am aku pana mamimio.”
Ginio ra i Daut am onom ngaatus ngaulun ulun nano nagindibok minugar koson tumuum ra Raja' Akis anak ri Maok, raja' ru bandar Gat.

I Daut am ulun-ulun nano minayan giu' ra Gat nababaya' ra sasambaloi ru sigagama'. Karuruo ngaulun andu' ri Daut, i Aginoam intor ra bandar Jijriil, am i Abigail, napuor ri Nabal intor ra Karmil, niayuk minaya' riso.
Pokorongog Raja' Saul ra nagiru' noyo i Daut ra Gat, kalo boo minirot io mamparakop riso.

Kopongo raginio rinagu ri Daut ginuang nano ra Raja' Akis, “Amon ru maansayan kou raki', anii' aku ra rondo' bandar boborok giu' ra asak koson intok ayanan, maa' raginio aku ti kalo sumimpung rirun ra pusor bandar ti.”
Ginio ra pinataak ru Raja' Akis no bandar Jiklag ri Daut. Intor raginio noyo Jiklag no nasauk ra longgom ru raja'-raja' ru Jiuda.
Minayan i Daut ra pagun ru ulun ru Palistin buoi sambilor am apat ngansila'.

Buoi raginio, i Daut am ulun-ulun nano naindalom mamulunsar ra ulun ru Gisur, Girji am Amalik; nabuoi ilo noyo minayan ra intok raginio. Sinubol ri Daut intok nilono saboi ra Sur, am rayus ra Misir tampilon ra rabugus.
Pinatoi ri Daut ngaangai' ungkuyon am ruandu', am niayuk nanalingaau ra ngaangai' domba, sapi', kaladai, unta am bayang niayuk. Kopongo raginio minuli' io am minuma' ra Raja' Akis.

Paat ra Raja' Akis nangkuot riso, “Ati intok sinubol mu ra raino ti?” Taamon ri Daut ra minongoi io noyo ra tampilon rabugus ru Jiuda kapoam giu' ra wilayah ru ulun ru Jiragmiil kapoam giu' ra wilayah intok inayanan ru ulun ru Kiin.

Pinatoi ri Daut no ngaangai' ulun, ungkuyon am ruandu', maa' raginio kolondo' sangulun pana makasaguli' ra Gat koson mambala' ra atan ondo' sotopot no binaal ri Daut am ulun-ulun nano. Kon raginio noyo binaal ri Daut buoi io minayan giu' ra pagun ru ulun ru Palistin.
Kaa' nangintopot toojo Raja' Akis ri Daut. Nangkara' Raja' Akis, “Kasisangin toojo i Daut ti ru bansa' nano galama', saboi nasauk io kalalaat ra ulipon kuno ra buoi ru bayag nano.”
Kopongo kukula' buoi, nanimung ulun ru Palistin ra saujor nilono koson mamulunsar ra Israil. Indagu Raja' Akis ri Daut, “Maaru' nakarati' kou ra okou am ulun-ulun muno musiti' sumaung raki'.”
Taam i Daut, “Maaru', maagu no makito mu galama' ra atan ondo' baalon ru ulipon mutu.”
Indagu Raja' Akis, “Iou noyo, pasaukon tokou ra magagalung raki' galama' ondo' mantilayun.”
Saujor ru Palistin timinimung am nangkim mamaar ra bandar Sunim. Nanimung Raja' Saul ra saujor ru Israil, am nangkim ilo giu' ra Gunung Gilboa.
Pakakito Raja' Saul ra pulalai ru mangayou ru Palistin, nalaa' io kaga'.
Nangkuot io ra
Ginio ra indagu Raja' Saul ra pagawai-pagawai nano, “Paguyum kano ra sangulun ruandu' mampiau ra ambiluo ru ulun minatoi. Masaga' aku tumuum riso koson makitulu'.”
Taam ilo, “Giu' ra In-Dor mokoondo' sangulun mampiau ra ambiluo ru ulun minatoi.”

Ginio ra siminalu Raja' Saul maa' raginio kalo mauligan ru ulun. Nambayang io ra bayang ra bokon. Binaya' ru ruo ngaulun ungkuyon, minugar Raja' Saul tampilon ra rondom. Nakasaboi ilo ra baloi ru ulun mampiau ra ambiluo ru ulun minatoi no, am indagu Raja' Saul, “Piawo' noyo ambiluo ru ulun ondo' sabiton ku inggalan nano, am kitaako' noyo maa' raginio manala' io ra atan boo ondo' masauk.”
Taam ruandu' no, “Maaru' okou pana nakapandai ra jinajalan noyo ru Raja' Saul no ngaangai' mangngilong am mampiau ra ambiluo ru ulun minatoi koson mangiruan ra Israil.
Kopongo raginio nagibot Raja' Saul, “Ralalom inggalan ru
Pangkuot ruandu' no, “Osoi ra ambiluo ondo' musiti' piawon ku ra tayar muno?”
Taam Raja' Saul, “Ambiluo ri Samuil.”
Pakakito ruandu' no ri Samuil, golok am indagu io ra Raja' Saul, “Kua ruungo' mu aku? Okou ti Raja' Saul!”
Kon ru Raja' Saul riso, “Pai' kalaa'! Pambala' noyo ra atan ondo' nakito muno!”
Kon ru ruandu' no, “Nakito ku ambiluo siminalula' intor ra tana' ti.”
Kon poyo ru Raja' Saul, “Ati kulaan baal nano?”
Taam ruandu' no, “Baal nano koson ra sangulun ungkuyon matutuo. Nansukub io.”
Nalimanan ru Raja' Saul ra ginio noyo ambiluo ri Samuil, am samba io boo koson mangurumat riso.
Kon ri Samuil ra Raja' Saul, “Kua ulisoo' mu aku am nampiau saguli' raki'?”

Taam Raja' Saul, “Aku ti ralalom ru kapaganan maayo! Ulun-ulun ru Palistin mamulunsar raki', am i Aki Kapuuno' no nangiruan noyo raki'. Kalo boo tumaam Io raki', iou kia pinabala' galing ra nabi kapoam inupi. Ginio sabap ra aku nampiau rirun, maa' raginio mambala' kou raki' ra atan musiti' kuno baalon.”
Kon ri Samuil, “Atan onong no ra okou mampiau raki' amon ru nangiruan noyo
Nambaal noyo
Kalo giminagaya' kou ra susuban ru
Okou am ulun ru Israil pataakon No ra ulun ru Palistin. Susuab no okou am anak-anak ungkuyon muno maya' raki'; am niayuk saujor ru Israil pana pataakon ru
Paat raginio niayuk Raja' Saul nakaranga' ra tana' sabap ra nalaa' kaga' nokorongog ra ragu ri Samuil. Mulu' poyo ra malawo io kaga' sabap ra kalo nangakan ra atan pana songorou am sorondom.
Mininggaar ruandu' no ra Raja' Saul am nakapandai ra magalabo io kaga'. Ginio ra kon ru ruandu' no riso, “Raja' kuno, pinataak ku noyo painawo koson manugut ra kitaakon muno.
Raino suguto' noyo kitaakon kutu. Akan no sanganu ra akanon ondo' pinasulung kutu maa' raginio marayusan mu pangkiralanan.”

Marara' Raja' Saul am minindagu ra marara' io mangakan. Kaa' pagawai-pagawai ru Raja' Saul pana nampajajal riso ra mangakan. Pupus no ginagaya' ru Raja' Saul; sukal io intor ra tana' am panturung ra intok pambalangan.
Nagindibok ruandu' no nanimbalui ra sanginan anak sapi' ondo' molomok. Io niayuk nangalap ra tapung am pongoono' ginio, am nangansak ra ruti' kalo linatakan ra ragi.
Nampasulung io ra akanon no ra Raja' Saul am pagawai-pagawai nano, am akan ilo boo. Kopongo raginio minugar ilo ra rondom raginio niayuk.
Nanimung ulun ru Palistin ra ngaangai' saujor nilono giu' ra Apik, am ulun ru Israil nangkim mamaar ra taur ru timug giu' ra Limayak Jijriil.
Limo ngaulun raja' ru Palistin baris ra minugar nababaya' ra pulalai-pulalai intor ra maatus ngaribu am saribu ngaulun. I Daut am ulun-ulun nano baris ra tinaulian nababaya' ra Raja' Akis.
Pakakito panglima ru ulun ru Palistin ri Daut am ulun-ulun nano, pangkuot ilo, “Kua ra ngaangai' ru ulun ru Ibrani ti soroi ragiti?”

Taam Raja' Akis, “Gitio i Daut, ondo' ragili pagawai ru Raja' Saul intor ra Israil. Lalair io noyo minayan raki'. Intor ra io minatong raki' saboi ra orou raiti', kalo igondo' ku io karampati' ra makasala.”

Kaa' panglima-panglima ru Palistin siminangit ra Raja' Akis. Konilo riso, “Susubo' io muli' ra bandar ondo' tinaakan muno riso. Pai' io paayaa' ritakau mongoi pangayou. Kolondo' makapandai ra paat ra pangayawan ra maagu no, manumbalik io ritakau. Sala' ka kia ginio kaluagan ra moonsoi kaga' riso koson mangambi' ra guang ru raja' nano ra mamatoi ra ulun takati?
Io no i Daut, am ra tayar nano noyo ruandu'-ruandu' ragili liminigo liliwa' narimbai ragitio,
‘Raja' Saul namatoi ra riribu ngaulun pantula',
kaa' i Daut namatoi ra opor-opor ngaribu ngaulun pantula'.’ ”
Nampiau Raja' Akis ri Daut am indagu riso, “Nagibot aku ra sabap ra
Ginio ra uli' no ra kaansayan am pai' pambaal ra rondo' ondo' makatabual ra sangit ru raja'-raja' no.”

Taam i Daut, “Atan kia kasalaan kutu? Rinagu mu ra intor ra aku minatong rirun, kalo igondo' aku ti makasala rirun. Amon ru koson raginio, kua kia kalo mokoongoi aku pangayou manggal ra pantula'-pantula' muno?”
Taam Raja' Akis, “Nakapandai kou ra aku ti mangkara' rirun ra gumagaya' koson ra malaikat ri Aki Kapuuno'. Kaa' raja'-raja' ra bokon no namatas noyo ra kalo makaaya' kou ramon mongoi pangayou.
Ginio ra susuab no, akau ngaangai' no ondo' nangiruan noyo ra Raja' Saul am minatong raki', moonsoi rumondom kau kumarat ra susuab ti am mataki' mugar ra kalo poyo sumirang mato ru orou.”
Ginio ra i Daut am ulun-ulun nano riminondom minugar ra suabon no, am minuli' ra pagun ru Palistin. Saujor-saujor ru Palistin naparayus ra pangkiralanan nilo minongoi ra Jijriil.
Kopongo ruo ngoorou, i Daut am ulun-ulun nano nakasaboi giu' ra Jiklag. Ulun ru Amalik nantakou noyo ra tampilon rabugus ru pagun Jiuda am namulunsar ra Jiklag. Sinolob nilo bandar Jiklag,
am namparakop ra ngaangai' ruandu'. Kalo poyo namatoi ilo ra osoi pana, kaa' binundus nilo noyo moonong ulun paat ra ilo nangiruan ra bandar no.
Paat ri Daut am ulun-ulun nano nakasaboi ra giu' no, ilai' nilo bandar no sinolob noyo am anak andu' nilono binundus noyo ru pantula'.
I Daut am ulun-ulun nano nantatangi' ra mangiluk guang ra kalo timinulou saboi ra ilo kalo boo makatangi'.
Karuruo andu' ri Daut, i Aginoam am i Abigail, binundus niayuk.
Raino i Daut ralalom ru kapaganan maayo. Ulun-ulun nano siminangit riso sabap ra kalio noyo boo anak andu' nilono. Nompololob ilo koson momobol ri Daut, kaa'
Kon ri Daut ra Imam Abiatar anak ri Agimilik, “Ibito' noyo efod no raki'.” I Abiatar pana nagibit ra efod no ri Daut.
Kopongo raginio pangkuot i Daut ra
Taam
Ginio ra nabaya' i Daut am onom ngaatus ngaulun ulun nano minugar. Paat ra ilo nakasaboi ra Sungoi Bisor, santayaran risilo no minuog ra giu' no.
Nabaya' i Daut am apat ngaatus ngaulun ulun nano naparayus ra pangkiralanan. Ruo ngaatus ngaulun ra bokon no naagui kaga' koson sumandaup ra sungoi, am uog ilo boo ra giu' no.

Ralalom pangkiralanan raginio ulun-ulun ri Daut nakatuum ra sangulun lalaing ungkuyon ru bansa' Misir giu' ra intok malimparang, am ibito' nilo boo lalaing no ri Daut. Inanian nilo io ra akanon am inumon,
am niayuk kukula' kuui ru ara am ruo ngantiis kismis. Pakaakan io, maikang io boo saguli'; napandayan ra talu ngoorou noyo io kalo nakaakan am nakainum!
I Daut pana nangkuot boo riso, “Osoi kia tuan muno? Ati kia intor mutu?”
Taam lalaing no, “Aku ti ulun ru Misir, ulipon ru sangulun Amalik. Iniruanan aku ru tuan kuli ra talu ngoorou ra nakasail i sabap ra narualan aku.
Sinubol mai noyo intok ru ulun Kriti giu' ra tampilon rabugus ru Jiuda am intok ru bansa' ru Kalib, am niayuk nonolob ngai' ra bandar Jiklag.”
Pangkuot i Daut riso, “Masaga' kou kia magibit ramon ra intok ru ulun raginilo?”
Taam io, “Masaga' aku. Kaa' musiti' kou magibot ralalom inggalan ri Aki Kapuuno' ra kalo mamatoi kou raki' kapoam mapataak raki' ra tuan kuli.”
Io pana nangator ri Daut ra intok ru ulun raginilo.

Ulun raginilo nakatabual ra giu' am giti, giu' ra titikop ru intok raginio. Tatanga' ilo mangakan manginum am maansukan sabap ra masuang rapu' ondo' ginaau nilo intor ra pagun ru ulun ru Palistin am Jiuda.

Paat ra tumawang ra suabon no, binulunsar ilo ri Daut am pangayawan no nasauk saboi ra rondom. Suai ra apat ngaatus ngaulun mamulok ondo' nagigiru' ra nangura' ra unta, kolondo' sangulun pana ra popolos ru pantula' ondo' nakapagiru'.
Nakasugut i Daut nangalap saguli' ra ngaangai' ondo' ginaau ru ulun ru Amalik, nakaaya' karuruo ngaulun andu' nano;
kolondo' sangulun pana natatak. Naalap saguli' ri Daut ngaangai' anak ungkuyon am anak ruandu' ru ulun-ulun nano, am niayuk ngaangai' no ondo' tinalingaau ru ulun ru Amalik.

Niayuk poyo i Daut nampagaau niayuk ra ngaangai' domba am bibiag tinambiag ra bokon. Bibiag tinambiag no inuyung ru ulun-ulun ri Daut ra pagulu no, nakapansuai intor ra kuliamos ginaau ra bokon. Ilo pana mindagu boo, “Gitio tayar ri Daut!”

Kopongo raginio siminaguli' i Daut ra ruo ngaatus ngaulun ondo' naagui kaga' koson maya' riso, am ondo' tinatang giu' ra igig ru Sungoi Bisor. Inuma' nilo i Daut am niayuk ulun-ulun nano am mininggaar i Daut risilo am nanabi' risilo.

Kaa' gino ngai' ru ulun-ulun ri Daut ondo' minaya' riso, mokoondo' malaat am mangangkum. Konilo, “Ngaangai' ru ulun ti kalo nakaaya', ginio sabap ra kalo makaapu ilo ra atan pana intor ra kuliamos tinalingaau. Makaalap ilo ayuk ra anak andu' nilono, am mugar.”
Kaa' kon ri Daut, “Akau pabukat ku ngai', pai' kano pambaal koson raginio ra atan ondo' tinaakan noyo ru

Kolondo' sangulun pana makapangiou ra ginuang mino. Ngaangai' ru ulun musiti' makaalap ra tayar ondo' nogondo' suang no: ulun ondo' timinatang koson magalung ra kuliamos musiti' makaalap ra tayar ondo' nogondo' koson ra ulun ondo' minongoi ra pangayawan.”
Sinauk ri Daut nangaruan raginio koson ra rondo' aturan, am intor raginio aturan raginio ginagaya' ru ulun ru Israil saboi raino.

Paat ri Daut minuli' giu' ra Jiklag, inataran no santayaran intor ra kuliamos ginaau no ra rangan-rangan nano, iono tingganai-tingganai ru Jiuda, pinabaya' ra bilin, “Apuo' min noyo tangguang ti intor ra kuliamos ginaau ondo' inalap mai intor ra pantula' ru

Ilono intor ra bandar ragitilo: Bitil am Rama giu' ra tampilon rabugus ru Jiuda, Jatir, Aroir, Sipmot, Istimoa, Rakal am niayuk bandar ru ulun Jiragmiil, bandar-bandar ru ulun Kini, Orma, Bor-Asan, Atak am Gibron. Nangator i Daut ra tangguang no ra ngaangai' bandar intok natanggawan ri Daut am ulun-ulun nano ragili.

Liliwa' raginio ulun ru Palistin mangayou ra ulun ru Israil giu' ra Gunung Gilboa. Masuang ulun ru Israil pinatoi ra giu' no. Ulun ru Israil ra bokon, nakaaya' Raja' Saul am anak-anak ungkuyon nano nagigiru'.
Kaa' ulun ru Palistin nangilou risilo am namatoi ra talu ngaulun anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Saul, iono i Jonatan, Abinadab am i Malkisua.
Pangayawan paat raginio moporos kaga' giu' ra libung ru Raja' Saul saboi io galama' napilatan ra masaran natiu' ra panah ru pantula'.

Kon ru Raja' Saul ra ulun nagibit ra kinandoi nano, “Butuso' ilang muno am potoyo' aku no, maa' raginio pai' ru ulun ru Palistin ondo' kalo nakaulig ri Aki Kapuuno' ti mangkukuli raki', am mamatoi raki'.” Kaa' ulun magibit ra kinandoi no kalo makakau' mambaal raginio. Ginio ra butuso' ru Raja' Saul ilang nano am tobok io galama'.
Pakakito ulun magibit ra kinandoi no ra Raja' Saul no minatoi noyo, io niayuk timinobok galama' am minatoi narumar ra Raja' Saul.
Kon raginio noyo Raja' Saul am talu ngaulun anak ungkuyon nano minatoi, am niayuk ulun magibit ra kinandoi no, am ngaangai' ulun ru Raja' Saul minatoi ra orou raginio.

Pokorongog ulun ru Israil ondo' giu' ra sandaup ru Limayak Jijriil am giu' ra tampilon ru Sungoi Jordan ra nagigiru' noyo saujor ru Israil, am ra Raja' Saul am anak-anak ungkuyon nano minatoi noyo, ilo pana nangiruan ra bandar nilono am nagigiru'. Kopongo raginio minatong ulun ru Palistin am ayan ra bandar-bandar no.

Suabon raginio, ulun ru Palistin nanalingaau ra kuliamos ondo' soroi ra baangkai ru ulun ru Israil. Kopongo raginio natuum nilo baangkai ru Raja' Saul am talu ngaulun anak ungkuyon nano giu' ra Gunung Gilboa.

Nanginggulu' ilo ra ulu ru Raja' Saul am nangalap ra bayang pangayawan nano. Kopongo raginio nangator ulun ru Palistin ra ulun sinusub mongoi ra titikop pagun ru Palistin koson mampasaboi ra tanou moonsoi no ra ngaangai' sinungkalalaing nilono am mamagun nilono.
Kopongo raginio bayang pangayawan ru Raja' Saul no binulian ra ralalom ru Kuil Dewi Asyitorit, am inan nano pinakuan ra timbok ru bandar Bit-Sian.
Pokorongog mamagun ru Jabis giu' ra Giliad ra baal ondo' binaal ru ulun ru Palistin ra Raja' Saul,

kukula' ngaulun ondo' baani kaga' minugar am nangkiralan ra buoi ru rondom minongoi ra Bit-Sian. Pinatuun nilo baangkai ru Raja' Saul am anak-anak ungkuyon nano intor ra timbok ru bandar, am inibit ginilo saguli' ra Jabis, am sinolob ngaangai' baangkai no ra giu' no.
Kopongo raginio inumung nilo ngaangai' bungul no am linobong ginilo ra saau ru puun tamariska giu' ra bandar Jabis, am nampali ilo ra buoi katuluan.
Kopongo Raja' Saul minatoi, minuli' i Daut nalupus nangala ra ulun ru Amalik. Ruo ngoorou buoi ri Daut minayan giu' ra Jiklag.

Suabon no, minatong sangulun ungkuyon mamulok intor ra pangkiman ru Raja' Saul. Koson tatandu' ru mangulir, rinilak ru ungkuyon mamulok no bayang nano am tinaukan ulu nano ra tana'. Ratong io ri Daut am igulatur koson mangurumat riso.
Pangkuot i Daut riso, “Ati kia intor mutu?”
Taam ungkuyon mamulok no, “Bagu aku nagiru' intor ra pangkiman ru ulun ru Israil.”
Kon ri Daut, “Tunungo' noyo atan ondo' nasauk.”
Taam ungkuyon mamulok no, “Saujor maili nagiru' intor ra pangayawan am masuang saujor minatoi, nakaaya' Raja' Saul am i Jonatan anak nano.”
Kon ri Daut, “Ati kulaan kou nakapandai ra Raja' Saul am i Jonatan minatoi noyo?”
Liminikar Raja' Saul am nakakito raki', am nampiau io raki'. Taam aku, ‘Iou raja' kuno.’
Nangkuot io ra aku ti osoi, am balai' ku io ra aku ti ulun ru Amalik.
Kopongo raginio indagu io, ‘Ibok, potoyo' aku no! Napilatan aku toojo am matikapatoi noyo.’

Inggaar aku riso am potoyo' ku io, sabap ra nakapandai aku ra maratu' io ayuk, maaru' matoi niayuk. Pinuas ku karaun ra ulu nano am paguso' ku golong intor ra longon nano, am ngaangai' no inibit ku rirun.”
Pokorongog raginio, rinilak ri Daut bayang nano ra mangiluk guang. Ngaangai' ru ulun nano nambaal niayuk raginio.
Nanulaboi ilo, nangulir ilo, am nampali ilo buoi songorou ra tayar ru Raja' Saul am i Jonatan, am tayar ru Israil ulun ru
Kopongo raginio nangkuot i Daut ra ungkuyon mamulok ondo' nagibit ra tanou no, “Ati kia intor mutu?”
Taam ungkuyon mamulok no, “Ulun aku ru Amalik, kaa' namagun ra pagun mutu.”
Nangkuot i Daut riso, “Kua kia baani kou namatoi ra raja' ondo' pinili' ru
Kopongo raginio nampiau i Daut ra sangulun intor ra ulun nano am nanusub, “Potoyo' io!” Ulun no nonobok ra ungkuyon mamulok ru Amalik no saboi minatoi.
Kon ri Daut ra ulun ru Amalik no, “Gitio kasalaan muno galama'. Inukum matoi mu okou galama' sabap ra nangiou kou ra okou noyo ondo' namatoi ra raja' ondo' pinili' ru
I Daut pana nanulaboi boo ra Raja' Saul am anak nano i Jonatan.
Nanusub i Daut maa' raginio rimbai
“Tingganai takano pinatoi giu' ra bulur-bulur ru Israil!
Tutumula'-tutumula' takano minatoi noyo!
Pai' potonowo' tanou raginio giu' ra Gat,
kapoam giu' ra ralan mongoborok ru Askilon,
pai' masaboi ruandu' ru Palistin magindii,
kapoam ruandu' ondo' kalo makaulig ri Aki Kapuuno' maansukan.
“Polosoon rasam am bolobou kalo rumatu' giu' ra kabuluran Gilboa,
polosoon umo-umo nano mapuaan,
sabap ra perisai ru tutumula' nakabanta' ra giu' no,
perisai ru Raja' Saul kalo boo inumawan.
Panah ri Jonatan sakti, mamatoi;
ilang ru Raja' Saul kalo makaasi',
nonobok ra saujor ondo' mapanggol,
am namatoi ra pantula'.
“Raja' Saul am i Jonatan, kasagain am tagamin,
kalo nantuliar ralalom ru bayag am matoi;
matasik ilo poyo intor ra kanui,
am maikang poyo intor ra singa'.
“Akau ruandu'-ruandu' ru Israil, pangulir kano ra Raja' Saul.
Pinambayang no akau ra bayang malia' ondo' mologo,
linimpor no akau ra mas am batu mologo.
“Tutumula'-tutumula' namagatoi noyo,
minatoi giu' ra tatanga' ru pangayawan.
I Jonatan minatoi giu' ra kabuluran.
“Mangiluk guang kuno sabap ra okou, i Jonatan, pabukat kuno.
Mapara' bonsoi muno raki'!
Mapara' kinatulai ru togom muno raki',
am matulai poyo intor ra togom ru ruandu'.
“Tutumula' takali namagatoi noyo,
kinandoi nilono nakabanta' am nalubat.”
Kopongo raginio pangkuot i Daut ra
Taam
Pangkuot i Daut, “Ati kia ra bandar?”
Taam
Ginio ra minongoi i Daut giu' ra Gibron am nagibit ra ruo ngaulun andu' nano: I Aginoam intor ra Jijriil, am i Abigail, napuor ri Nabal, ulun ru Karmil no.
Inibit niayuk ri Daut ulun-ulun nano am sasambaloi nilono, am namagun ra bandar Gibron am ra liliut no.
Kopongo raginio minatong ulun ru Jiuda ra Gibron, am ra upacara pangumawan, pinili' nilo i Daut nasauk ra raja' Jiuda.
Pakaining Raja' Daut ra baangkai ru Raja' Saul no linobong noyo ru mamagun Jabis giu' ra Giliad no,
nangator Raja' Daut ra ulun sinusub ra giu' no nabaya' ra bilin, “Gama' ru
Ginio ra, gama' ru
Kaikango' guang mino am baani kano! Raja' Saul, raja' mini minatoi noyo, kaa' ulun ru Jiuda nampili' raki' masauk ra raja' nilo.”
I Abnir anak ri Nir, panglima saujor ru Raja' Saul, nagiru' nabaya' ri Isbosit, anak ru Raja' Saul giu' ra Maganaim, giu' ra sandaup ru Sungoi Jordan.
Giu' no, pinili' ri Abnir i Isbosit nasauk ra raja' tampilon ra Giliad, Asyir,
Umur ru Raja' Isbosit no apat ngoopor ngambilor paat io nasauk ra raja' Israil. Io namarinta buoi ruo ngambilor.
Kaa' bansa' ru Jiuda giminagaya' ra Raja' Daut;
intor ra bandar Gibron, Raja' Daut namarinta ra Jiuda buoi tulu' ngambilor am maintanga'.
Sangarawan raginio i Abnir am pagawai-pagawai ru Raja' Isbosit minugar intor ra Maganaim minongoi ra bandar Gibion.

I Joab (ina' nano makainggalan ri Jiruya), nababaya' ra kukula' ngaulun pagawai ru Raja' Daut, sumuku' ra bandar raginio niayuk. Karuruo pulalai no nakapaguma' giu' ra kolam Gibion; i Abnir am pulalai nano nanturung ra tampilon ragiti, am i Joab am pulalai nano tampilon ra giu' no.
Kopongo raginio indagu i Abnir ri Joab, “Ibok susubo' takau kukula' ngaulun ra ulun takati makimagula' ra manakinandoi.”
Taam i Joab, “Iou.”
Ginio ra mopor am ruo ngaulun ondo' uakil ru Raja' Isbosit am bansa' ru Binjamin, nampapatoi ra mopor am ruo ngaulun ulun ru Raja' Daut.
Rokopon nilo ulu ru rondo' am bokon am monobok ilo ra tinai' ru rondo' am bokon, saboi ngaangai' nilo minatoi. Ginio sabap intok giu' ra Gibion no ininggalanan ra “Umo ru Ilang.”
Kopongo raginio nasauk pangayawan maayo kaga'. I Abnir am saujor ru Israil no kinala ru ulun ri Raja' Daut.
Katalu-talu ngaulun anak ungkuyon ri Jiruya soroi ra giu' no: i Joab, i Abisai am i Asail. I Asail, ondo' masimbul koson ra kinaribok ru paus,
tumalimpuun mangilou ri Abnir ra kalo minuog-uog.
Pangkaili i Abnir ra bakulung am pangkuot, “Okou ginio Asail?”
Taam io, “Iou.”
Kon ri Abnir, “Pai' pangilou raki'! Ilowo' sangulun intor ra saujor no am alapo' kinandoi nano.” Kaa' rinayus ayuk ri Asail nangilou riso.
Igondo' poyo kon ri Abnir riso, “Pai' pangilou raki'! Pai' aku jajali' mamatoi rirun! Ati kulaan ku monontong ra bulos ru maayo muno i Joab?”

Kaa' lakat poyo i Asail no mangilou riso. Paturaa' ri Abnir tutura' nano ra bakulung, am natiu' tinai' ri Asail saboi nansabut tutura' no ra bakulung nano. Naaba' i Asail ra tana' am narayus patoi ra giu' niayuk. Ngaangai' ru ulun ondo' nakasaboi ra intok io naaba' no minuog am minigor ra giu' no.
I Joab am i Abisai narayus nangilou ri Abnir. Paat ra tumolop mato ru orou, nakasaboi ilo ra Bulur Ama, ondo' soor ra tampilon sirangon ru Gia, giu' ra ralan sumuku' ra tana' kaagisan ru Gibion.
Giu' no ulun intor ra bansa' ru Binjamin naguguum poyo nabaya' ri Abnir, am timinampos ilo ra baris giu' ra tampak ru rondo' bulur.

Intor ra giu' no, nampiau i Abnir ri Joab, “Musiti' kia mampapatoi takau ra sabuoi-buoi no? Kalo kia nakaliman kou ra pangayawan ragitio magibit ayuk ra kaimbalaan? Akai ti pabukat rondo' bansa' rirun. Kula' poyo buoi muno maginaa ra kalo poyo manusub ra ulun muno lumonggo' mangilou ramon?”
Taam i Joab, “Magibot aku ralalom inggalan ri Aki Kapuuno' ondo' naayag, amon ru kalo rinagu min koson raginio, maaru' ulun-ulun kuno mangilou ramuyun saboi masuaban.”
I Joab no pana nanamput ra bujung koson ra tatandu' ra ulun-ulun nano lumonggo' mangilou ra ulun ru Israil, am pangayawan no liminonggo'.
I Abnir am ulun-ulun nano minugar nansail ra Limayak Jordan buoi nosorondom. Liminaup ilo ra Sungoi Jordan, am kalupus minugar ra nonsongorou ra sumunu' no, nakasaboi ilo ra Maganaim.
Kopongo i Joab liminonggo' nangilou ri Abnir, tinimung no ngaangai' ulun nano. Katutuni' no ra nailusan io ra mopor am siam ngaulun intor risilo, kalo nakaaya' i Asail.
Ulun ru Raja' Daut namatoi ra 360 ngaulun intor ra ulun ri Abnir ondo' ginilo bansa' ru Binjamin.

Kopongo raginio i Joab am ulun-ulun nano nangkayang ra baangkai ri Asail am linobong ra kalabangan ru sasambaloi nano giu' ra Bitligim. Kopongo raginio minugar ilo ra buoi ru nosorondom, am suabon no paat ra matawang, nakasaboi ilo ra Gibron.
Pangayawan ru ulun minaya' ra sasambaloi ru Raja' Saul am ulun minaya' ra sasambaloi ru Raja' Daut narayus nasauk ra nabuoi. Gumaai ikang ru Raja' Daut, kaa' gumaai lawo ru pantula' nano.
Gitio noyo onom ngaulun anak ungkuyon ri Raja' Daut ondo' inanak giu' ra Gibron maya' ra pansunuan ru naganakan nilono:
I Amnon, ina' nano i Aginoam intor ra Jijriil;
i Kiliab, ina' nano i Abigail, napuor ri Nabal intor ra Karmil;
i Absalom, ina' nano i Maakga, anak ruandu' ru Raja' Talmai intor ra Gisur;
i Adonia, ina' nano i Gagit;
i Sipatia, ina' nano i Abital;
am i Jitriam, ina' nano i Igla. Koonom-onom ngaulun anak ungkuyon no inanak giu' ra Gibron.
Liliwa' pangayawan narayus nasauk ra ulun minaya' ra Raja' Daut am ulun minaya' ra Raja' Saul, mirot i Abnir koson kuasa' nano gumayo poyo ra gino ngai' ru ulun minaya' ra Raja' Saul.
Paat ra sangarawan, Raja' Isbosit anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Saul nanguu' ri Abnir riminulug ra ruandu' parulug ru Raja' Saul ondo' makainggalan ri Rijpa anak ri Aya.

Panguwan raginio nambaal ri Abnir siminangit toojo. Kono, “Indos mu kia ra aku ti nanumbalik ri Saul am minaya' ri Jiuda? Intor ragili gumagaya' aku ra Raja' Saul ama' muno, am pabukat-pabukat nano, am niayuk rangan-rangan nano. Inindangan ku noyo okou intor ra kinala ru Raja' Daut. Kabalu' pana raginio mononsol kou raki' sabap ayuk ru ruandu'!
Moonsoi poyo mangindangan aku ra Raja' Daut, sabap ra binantu' noyo ru
Kalo naguta' i Isbosit sabap ra malaa' io kaga' ri Abnir.
Kopongo raginio nangator i Abnir ra ulun sinusub mongoi ri Daut ondo' paat raginio soroi giu' ra Gibron,
Taam i Raja' Daut, “Moonsoi! Mambaal aku ra nabantuan rirun ondo' rondo' kitaakon: Musiti' ibiton min i Mikgal, anak ruandu' ru Raja' Saul no raki' paat ra okou muma' raki'.”

Nangator niayuk Raja' Daut ra ulun sinusub mongoi ra Raja' Isbosit, ondo' nagibit ra bilin, “Pasagulio' andu' kuli, i Mikgal raki'. Mambayar aku maatus kungkung ru tali' ru ulun ru Palistin koson manangandu' riso.”
Ginio ra nanusub Raja' Isbosit ra ulun sinusub nano nangalap ri Mikgal intor ra ralaki nano, i Paltiil anak ri Lais.
Kaa' sumunu' i Paltiil ri Mikgal liliwa' mantangi'. Paat ra ilo nakasaboi giu' ra bandar Bagurim, indagu i Abnir ri Paltiil, “Sama' noyo, uli' ayuk!” Kopongo raginio minuli' i Paltiil.
Minuma' i Abnir ra tingganai-tingganai ru Israil am indagu risilo, “Nabuoi noyo ra akau moogot koson Raja' Daut masauk ra raja' min.
Gitio noyo kaluagan min. Karaa' noyo ra binantu' noyo ru
Minindagu niayuk i Abnir ra bansa' ru Binjamin, am minongoi io ra Gibron koson mambala' ra Raja' Daut ra atan ondo' iniou noyo ru ulun ru Israil am bansa' ru Binjamin.
Paat i Abnir nabaya' ra ruo ngoopor ngaulun minaya' riso no muma' ra Raja' Daut giu' ra Gibron, nambaal Raja' Daut ra bunsag risilo.

Kopongo raginio kon ri Abnir ra Raja' Daut, “Iowo' aku mugar koson mangkimait ra ngaangai' ru Israil maa' raginio magamung rirun. Mangapu ilo rirun koson ra raja' am kon raginio mamarinta kou ra titikop pagun, sumugut ra kasagaan muno.” Iniou boo ru Raja' Daut i Abnir mugar am minugar io ra matanda'.

Kopongo raginio i Joab mabaya' ra ulun ri Raja' Daut ra bokon, siminaguli' intor ra namulunsaran am nagibit ra masuang kuliamos ginaau, kaa' nakaugar noyo i Abnir intor ra Gibron. Iniou noyo ri Raja' Daut i Abnir mugar am minugar ra matanda'.
Paat i Joab am pulalai nano nakasaboi, binalaan io ra i Abnir minuma' ra Raja' Daut, am iniou no io minugar am niayuk minugar ra matanda'.
Ginio ra uma' i Joab ra raja' am indagu, “Kua baalo' mu kon raginio? Minatong i Abnir minuma' rirun. Kua iowo' mu io minugar ayuk?
Maaru' nakapandai kou ra rinatangan ri Abnir ni mamparuung ayuk rirun, am koson makapandai ra intok angayan muno, am niayuk ra ngaangai' baalon muno.”

Kopongo nangiruan ra Raja' Daut, nanusub i Joab ra ulun sinusub koson mampiau ri Abnir. Sinunu' nilo i Abnir mamaar ra tulubong Sira, am inibit nilo io saguli'. Ngaangai' baal raginio nasauk ra kalo napandayan ri Raja' Daut.

Pakasaboi ayuk i Abnir ra Gibron, nangkimait i Joab riso mongoi ra kiing ru kulobon garabang, ilain ayuk masaga' io mindagu riso sangulun. Pulali' ri Joab nonobok ra tinai' ri Abnir saboi io minatoi. Kon raginio noyo i Abnir minatoi ra pinatoi ri Joab koson mansuli' ra namatayan ri Asail, boborok nano.
Paat ra Raja' Daut nakapandai ra baal raginio, indagu io, “Nakapandai

Polosoon noyo i Joab am sasambaloi nano ukumin sabap ra binaal nano. Polosoon noyo ralalom ru sasambaloi ri Joab ra papag ka papag masalok mokoondo' ulun ondo' marualan ra maruol mologo, kapoam maimbolo' ra maruol ru kungkung ondo' makalalaa', kapoam ungkuyon ondo' kalo maikang, kapoam ondo' matoi ralalom ru pangayawan kapoam matutusan ra akanon!”
Koon raginio noyo i Joab am i Abisai nansuli' ri Abnir sabap ra namatoi io ri Asail, boborok nilai ralalom pangayawan giu' ra Gibion.

Kopongo raginio nanusub Raja' Daut ri Joab am ulun-ulun nano namparilak ra bayang nilo, nambayang ra konoon karung am niayuk nanulaboi ri Abnir. Paat ra nampalabangan, Raja' Daut galama' minugar ra tinaulian ru karanda'.
Linobong i Abnir giu' ra Gibron, am raja' am niayuk ngaangai' mamagun nanulaboi ra mosongou giu' ra saang ru kalabangan no.
Nanulaboi Raja' Daut ri Abnir ra sinulabit ragitio,
“Kua musiti' i Abnir matoi koson ra ulun sasambungon?
Kalindu' nano kalo binangkil,
kalayam nano kalo rinantai.
Minatoi io ra tinobok
ru ulun ondo' malaat am mapuka'.”
Igondo' poyo ngaangai' mamagun nanulaboi ri Abnir.

Nonsongorou ulun nangkinam nanimayo ra Raja' Daut maa' raginio mangakan kasanganu, kaa' nagibot io, “Polosoon noyo i Aki Kapuuno' no mamatoi raki', amon ru mangakan aku ra atan-atan ra kalo poyo mokotolop mato ru orou!”
Nokorongog raginio mamagun matasu' guang. Atan ayuk binaal ru raja', nampatasu' ra guang nilo.
Paat ra orou raginio ngaangai' mamagun ru Raja' Daut am ngaangai' ulun ru Israil nakarati' ra kalo nakalabit raja' no ra namatayan ri Abnir.
Indagu raja' no ra pagawai-pagawai nano, “Kaala' kano ngaangai' ra paat orou raiti' nailusan takau ra sangulun tingganai maatang ra Israil.
Kabalu' pana ra aku ti raja' pinili' ri Aki Kapuuno', kaa' paat orou raiti' makaliman aku ra malawo. Anak-anak ri Jiruya no malaat kaga'. Kalo tumaan aku manguasa' risilo. Polosoon noyo
Paat ra Raja' Isbosit anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Saul, nokorongog ra pinatoi i Abnir giu' ra Gibron, malaa' io, am ngaangai' ulun ru Israil pana nonontol.

Raja' Isbosit mokoondo' ruo ngaulun pagawai ondo' nasauk ra tingganai ru pulalai mamulunsar, iono i Baana am i Rikab, anak ilo ri Rimon intor ra Biirot, intor ra bansa' ru Binjamin. (Biirot no santayaran intor ra wilayah Binjamin.
Mamagun toojo ru intok raginio nagiru' noyo ra Gitaim, am intor raginio noyo ilo namagun ra giu' no.)
I Rikab am i Baana pana minongoi boo ra baloi ru Raja' Isbosit. Ilo nakasaboi ra giu' no paat ra tanga' ru orou nakapaat ra Raja' Isbosit tatanga' tumangus.
Nainamot ra ruandu' ondo' magalung ra kulobon ru baloi nokororot sabap ra matikoolong paat nangimpili' ra gandum. Ginio ra i Rikab am i Baana nakaumpos ra simininok.

Narayus ilo minumpos ra lamin ru Raja' Isbosit liliwa' io tatanga' nakalunus. Toboko' nilo boo io saboi minatoi. Nanginggulu' ilo ra ulu ru Raja' Isbosit am ulu no inibit nilo minugar. Nosorondom ilo minugar nansail ra Limayak Jordan.

Kopongo raginio pinataak nilo ulu no ra Raja' Daut giu' ra Gibron. Konilo, “Gitio noyo ulu ru Raja' Isbosit anak ungkuyon ri Raja' Saul, pantula' muno ondo' mangkinam mamatoi rirun. Paat ra orou raiti' nambalos noyo
Kaa' taam Raja' Daut, “

Paat ra aku giu' ra Jiklag, mokoondo' ra ulun ondo' nambala' raki' ra pinatayan ri Raja' Saul. Mangkara' ulun no ra nagibit io ra tanou moonsoi, kaa' rinakop am pinatoi ku io. Ginio noyo pinangayup kuno riso koson ra ayup ra tanou ondo' inibit nano.

Atan poyo ru akau, mapara' piboo laat ru binaal mino! Namatoi kau noyo ra sangulun ondo' kolondo' tula, am ondo' tatanga' nombolong giu' ra baloi nano galama'! Raino mambalos aku ra kalaatan mino. Luuson takamin intor ra tana' ti!”

Nangani' Raja' Daut ra susuban, potoyo' boo ru saujor-saujor nano i Rikab am i Baana. Kopongo pinatoi, kalindu' am kalayam nilo pinutul am tinair mamaar ra kolam giu' ra Gibron. Kopongo raginio ulu ru Raja' Isbosit inalap am linobong giu' ra lobong ri Abnir ra Gibron.
Kopongo raginio ngaangai' bansa' ru Israil minuma' ra Raja' Daut giu' ra Gibron. Konilo riso, “Akai ti okou poyo ngai'.
Intor ragili, am poyo paat ra Raja' Saul lakat poyo raja' mai, okou noyo naningganai ra saujor ru Israil nangayou. Binantu' niayuk ru
Kon raginio noyo ngaangai' tingganai ru Israil minuma' ra Raja' Daut giu' ra Gibron. Nambaal Raja' Daut ra nabantuan risilo, sauko' nilo boo io ra raja' ru Israil.
Talu ngoopor ngambilor umur ri Raja' Daut paat nasauk ra raja', am namarinta io buoi apat ngoopor ngambilor.
Namarinta io giu' ra Gibron koson ra raja' Jiuda buoi tulu' ngambilor am naintanga', am giu' ra Jirusalim koson ra raja' ru titikop Israil am Jiuda buoi talu ngoopor am talu ngambilor.
Kaa' totopot Raja' Daut nakagaau ra Sion kubu pangampinan nilo. Intor raginio kubu no ininggalanan ra “Bandar Daut.”)

Paat orou raginio indagu Raja' Daut ra ulun-ulun nano, “Mokoondo' kia osoi-osoi ragiti ondo' masisang ra ulun ru Jibusi koson raki' masisang risilo? Sama' kia sisang nano saboi moogot io kaga' mamatoi risilo? Amon ru kon raginio, subol no ra babayaan ru timug am bulunsaro' ulun bolou am ulun kimpo' ondo' kasisangin kuno.” (Ginio sabap ra ulun mindagu, “Ulun bolou am ulun kimpo' inggalarin mumpos ra Baloi ru

Kopongo Raja' Daut nampagaau ra kubu Sion, minayan io ra giu' no am ininggalanan no ra “Bandar Daut”. Nambaal io ra bandar giu' ra liput ru kubu no, inintaran ra tampilon ru sirangon ru bulur ondo' pinumpunan ra tana'.
Buoi ka buoi giminaai ikang ru Raja' Daut sabap ra

Raja' Giram, intor ra pagun Tirus, nangator ra ulun-ulun sinusub nano mongoi ra Raja' Daut. Nangani' Raja' Giram ri Raja' Daut ra tataun sidar, manukang ra tataun am manukang ra batu koson mambaal ra istana.
Ginio ra nakaliman i Raja' Daut ra
Kopongo Raja' Daut nabanding intor ra Gibron minongoi ra Jirusalim, mokoondo' io ra masuang poyo andu' am parulug, am niayuk anak ungkuyon am ruandu'.
Gitilo noyo anak ungkuyon ri Raja' Daut ondo' inanak giu' ra Jirusalim: Syamua, Sobab, Natan, Salomo,
Jibgar, Ilisua, Nipig, Japia,
Ilisama, Ilyada am Ilipilit.

Paat ra ulun ru Palistin nakapandai ra sinauk noyo Raja' Daut ra raja' ru Israil, ingkual saujor nilo koson mamparakop riso. Kaa' paat ra Raja' Daut nokorongog raginio, minongoi io sindung ra rondo' intok ondo' mokoondo' ra kubu.
Nakasaboi ulun ru Palistin giu' ra Limayak Ripaim am ayan ra giu' no.
Pangkuot Raja' Daut ra
Taam
Ginio ra minongoi i Daut giu' ra Baal-Pirasim am nangala ra ulun ru Palistin. Indagu io, “Jinunjung noyo ru
Paat ra ulun ru Palistin nagiru' intor ra giu' no, tinatang nilo sinungkalalaing nilono. Alapo' boo ru Raja' Daut am ulun-ulun nano sinungkalalaing-sinungkalalaing no.
Kalo nabuoi raginio ulun ru Palistin siminaguli' ra Limayak Ripaim am ayan ra intok raginio poyo.
Igondo' poyo nangkuot Raja' Daut ra
Paat ra morongog mu bolos koson ra ngaas-ngaas ru ulun baris giu' ra untu ru puun tataun no, patalimpuuno' noyo bulunsar sabap ra mugar Aku ra saang muno koson mangala ra saujor ru Palistin.”
Sinugut ri Raja' Daut susuban ru
Igondo' poyo Raja' Daut nanimung ra saujor ondo' mongoonsoi kaga' giu' ra Israil, suang talu ngoopor ngaribu ngaulun.
Naningganai io risilo minongoi ra Baali

Inalap nilo Kaban Nabantuan no intor ra baloi ri Abinadab giu' ra rawasat ru bulur, am pinabanta' ginio ra rasawat ru kurita' sapi' ondo' baguon. Karita' sapi' no binaya' ru anak-anak ri Abinadab, i Uja am i Agio. I Uja minugar ra sapapa' ru kurita' sapi' no,
am i Agio minugar ra saang no.
Raja' Daut am ngaangai' ulun ru Israil minugar ra saang ru Kaban Nabantuan liliwa' lumigo'
Paat ra ilo nakasaboi ra intok mangagik ra gandum longgom ri Nakon, nakasunsuyar sapi'-sapi' no, am potoroyo' ri Uja kalindu' nano am guuto' Kaban Nabantuan.
Paat raginio niayuk siminangit
Ginio sabap ra intok raginio ininggalanan ra Piris-Uja.
Kaa' malaa' niayuk Raja' Daut ra
Ginio ra kalo boo masaga' io magibit ra Kaban Nabantuan no ra Jirusalim. Kaa' inibit no Kaban Nabantuan no ra baloi ri Obid-Idom, ulun ondo' intor ra Gat.
Kaban Nabantuan no soroi ra giu' no buoi talu ngansila', am nambarakat
Norongog ru Raja' Daut ra nambarakat
Kopongo ulun ondo' nangkayang ra Kaban Nabantuan minugar onom ngatumpang ra pagulu, panusub Raja' Daut risilo muog. Papataak io boo ra taak simbalui ra
Nansasayau Raja' Daut ra guang maantak kaga' koson mangurumat ra
Koon raginio noyo Raja' Daut am ngaangai' mamagun ru Israil nagibit ra Kaban Nabantuan no ra Jirusalim liliwa' magigindii am sinumbaya' ru samput ra bujung.
Paat ra Kaban Nabantuan inibit siminubol ra bandar, i Mikgal anak ruandu' ru Raja' Saul, minimpal ra gigimpalan am nakakito ra Raja' Daut mansasayau am titindak koson mangurumat ra

Kopongo raginio pabantaa' nilo Kaban Nabantuan ra intok nano giu' ralalom kim ondo' pinatirong ru Raja' Daut koson ra Kaban Nabantuan no. Napataak Raja' Daut ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Kopongo Raja' Daut napataak ra taak simbalui, barakato' no mamagun ru Israil ralalom inggalan ru
am nantayar ra akanon risilo ngaangai'. Nangani' io ra rondo' ruti', sangkinis kual pinanggang,

Kopongo raginio, paat ra Raja' Daut nakauli' koson mamujak ra sasambaloi nano, tuum i Mikgal riso. Kon ri Mikgal, “Paat ra orou raiti' totopot raja' ru Israil nambaal ra inan nano urumaton kaga'! Nagibabaang raja' koson ra ulun sasambungon ondo' kalo mapandai mauyu' ra saang ru ulipon-ulipon ruandu' ru pagawai-pagawai istana!”
Taam Raja' Daut, “Mansayau aku koson mangurumat ra
I Mikgal, anak ruandu' ru Raja' Saul, kolondo' anak saboi ra io minatoi.
Nanindung
Kopongo raginio indagu Raja' Daut ra Nabi Natan, “Ilai', aku minayan ra istana ondo' binaal intor ra tataun sidar, kaa' Kaban Nabantuan ri Aki Kapuuno' pinauli ralalom ru kim!”
Taam i Natan, “Baalo' noyo atan ayuk kasagaan muno, sabap ra mangindangan
Kaa' rondom raginio indagu
“Ongoyo' balai' ulipon kuno i Daut, ragu Kutu, ‘Sala' ka okou ondo' mambaal Raki' ra baloi.
Intor ra Aku namayag ra ulun ru Israil intor ra Misir saboi raino, kalo igondo' Aku ayan ra ralalom ru baloi. Timinanggau Aku am mayan ralalom ru kim.
Buoi ru pangkiralanan Kuno mabaya' ra ulun ru Israil, kalo igondo' aku pangkuot ra osoi pana tingganai
Ginio ra balai' ulipon Kuno Raja' Daut ra gitio noyo ragu Kutu,

Namaya' Aku rirun ra ati ayuk inangayan muno, am nangala Aku noyo ra pantula' muno paat ra okou namulunsar. Raino mapasauk Aku rirun ra mauligan kaga' koson ra tingganai-tingganai ondo' mangauligan kaga' ra tana' ti.

Pinili' Ku noyo rondo' pagun tayar ru ulun Kuno Israil, am pinaayan Ku ilo ra giu' no. Kalo boo uliponon ilo ru osoi pana. Intor ra ilo minayan ra pagun no, binulunsar ilo ru ulun malaat, kaa' intor raino baal raginio kalo boo rumuli'. Mambantu' Aku mangampin rirun intor ra pantula' muno am mangani' rirun ra papag.
Amon ru saboi ra pupus ru bayag muno, am lobongon kou ra kalabangan ru kinamatuaan muno, sangulun intor ra anak ungkuyon muno saukon Ku ra raja', am kapioton Ku pamarintaan nano.
Io noyo ondo' mambaal Raki' ra baloi, am tutunon Ku maa' raginio saboi ra sabuoi-buoi no sangulun papag nano mamarinta koson ra raja'.
Masauk Aku ra ama' nano am masauk io ra anak Kuno. Paat ra io mambaal ra sala, mangukum Aku riso koson ra sangulun ama' mangukum ra anak nano.

Kaa' mantilayun togom Kuno riso nontopot ra bantu' Kuno. Bantu' Kuno riso rayuson Ku guuton, am sala' ka koson binaal Kuno ri Saul ondo' ininggi' Ku intor ra intok nano maa' raginio okou masauk ra raja'.
Magail kou mokoondo' ra papag am patilayunon Ku pamarintaan muno. Pamarintaan muno kolondo' pupus.’ ”
Koon raginio noyo nambalaan ri Natan no ra Raja' Daut ngaangai' ondo' pinabala' ri Aki Kapuuno' riso.
Kopongo raginio umpos Raja' Daut ra ralalom ru kim ru
Kaa' raino binaal Muno nasailan poyo intor ra ngaangai' no, iou
Atan poyo ondo' maalap ku karagu Rirun! Makapandai Kou ra ngaangai' no intor ra ulipon Muti.
Ginio sabap ra bantu' am kasagaan Muno galama', mambaal Kou ra baal mangaayo no koson mangila' ra ulipon Muti.
Matulai Kou kaga', iou

Giti ra titikop ru tana' ti, kolondo' bansa' ra bokon koson ra Israil, ondo' binayag Mu noyo intor ra pangulipanan, am niayuk mapasauk risilo ra ulun Muno galama'. Binaal maayo am makaimuag no, ondo' binaal Muno risilo
Sinauk Mu Israil ra ulun Muno ra sabuoi-buoi no. Okou, iou
Raino, iou
Inggalan Muno matulai am koson ra sabuoi-buoi no ulun mindagu, ‘
Iou
Ginio ra iou
Kitaakon kuno, kasaga' noyo mambarakat ra papag kuno maa' raginio marayus ilo makaliman ra togom Muno ra sabuoi-buoi no. Iou
Kukula' buoi raiti, namulunsar poyo Raja' Daut ra ulun ru Palistin. Nangala io risilo am nampagaau ra tana' nilono.

Kopongo raginio nangala Raja' Daut ra ulun ru Moab. Nanusub io ra ulun inaput nano lumangan ra tana', pamatoi io boo ra ruo ngaulun intor ra moonong talu ngaulun. Ginio ra ulun ru Moab naala ra Raja' Daut am mambayar riso ra cukai.

Kopongo raginio nangala Raja' Daut ri Gadadijir anak ri Rigob, raja' giu' ra Joba giu' ra pagun Siria. Paat raginio tatanga' i Gadadijir ralalom pangkiralanan muli' koson mapatapuli' ra kuasa' nano giu' ra wilayah ralayo ru Sungoi Iprat.
