Namparakop Raja' Daut ra suang 1,700 ngaulun saujor mangkuda am 20,000 ngaulun saujor ondo' mantana'. Ngaangai' ru kuda no binaal no kalo makaugar, ondo' ayuk am inukop koson mamunduk ra maatus kurita' kuda.
Paat ra ulun ru Siria intor ra Damsyik nangator ra saujor mangindangan ra Raja' Gadadijir, bulunsaro' ru Raja' Daut saujor raginio am pamatoi ra 22,000 ngaulun.
Kopongo raginio patirongo' ru Raja' Daut pangkiman ru saujor
Nampagaau Raja' Daut ra perisai-perisai mas ondo' pinakai ru pagawai-pagawai ru Raja' Gadadijir, am inibit ngaangai' no ra Jirusalim.
Nampagaau niayuk Raja' Daut ra masuang tambaga' intor ra Bita am Birotai, bandar-bandar ondo' ragili kinuasa' ru Raja' Gadadijir.
Raja' Tou intor ra pagun Gamat nokorongog ra nangala Raja' Daut ra ngaangai' saujor ru Raja' Gadadijir.

Ginio ra nanusub Raja' Tou ra anak ungkuyon nano i Joram koson mapasaboi ra ragu nano ra Raja' Daut am minindagu ra kaansayan ra kamanangan nano ra Raja' Gadadijir, sabap ra Raja' Tou masalok noyo mangayou ra Raja' Gadadijir. Minatong i Joram ra Raja' Daut am nagibit ra masuang tangguang intor ra mas, pirok am gangsa'.
Pinataak ru Raja' Daut ngaangai' tangguang no ra
iono Idom, Moab, Amon, Palistin am pagun ru ulun ru Amalik. Pinataak niayuk ru Raja' Daut santayaran intor ra kuliamos ondo' ginaau nano intor ra Raja' Gadadijir.
Nanirong Raja' Daut ra pangkiman ru saujor nano
Namarinta Raja' Daut giu' ra titikop ru Israil am nanutun maa' raginio mamagun nano masalok moonsoi am matimpok pamakuan no.
Gitio noyo pagawai-pagawai maatang ondo' linantik ru Raja' Daut:
Panglima ru saujor: i Joab (ina' nano i Jiruya);
Mamamatik ru istana: i Josapat anak ri Agilud;
Imam-imam: i Jadok anak ri Agitub am i Agimilik anak ri Abiatar;
Mamamatik ru pasimpungan pagun: i Siraya;
Tingganai
Imam-imam giu' ra istana: anak-anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Daut.
Paat raginio mokoondo' sangulun ulipon ru sasambaloi ri Raja' Saul ondo' inggalan no i Jiba. Sinusub io muma' ra Raja' Daut. Pangkuot Raja' Daut riso, “Okou kia i Jiba?”
Taam io, “Iou, raja' kuno.”
Taam i Jiba, “Lakat poyo mokoondo' sangulun anak ungkuyon ri Jonatan. Io ti kimpo'.”
Pangkuot Raja' Daut, “Ati io?”
Taam i Jiba, “Giu' ra Lodibar, giu' ra baloi ri Makgir anak ri Amiil.”
Ginio ra panusub Raja' Daut ra ulun mampiau ra anak ri Jonatan no.
Paat ri Mipibosit anak ri Jonatan, akupu ru Raja' Saul no nakasaboi, kuku' io samba koson mangurumat ra Raja' Daut. Nanguma' Raja' Daut riso, am indagu, “Mipibosit,” am taam io, “Iou, raja' kuno.”

Indagu Raja' Daut riso, “Pai' kalaa'. Mataau aku rirun sabap ri Jonatan, ama' muno. Mangani' aku rirun saguli' ra ngaangai' tana' ondo' ragili linonggom ru aki muli Raja' Saul. Magail kou kimaitin mangakan ra mija' kuno.”
Kuku' samba i Mipibosit igondo' poyo am indagu, “Aku ti koson ayuk ra uku' minatoi. Kua kia koonsoi kou kaga' raki'?”
Kopongo raginio pampiau Raja' Daut ri Jiba, ulipon ru Raja' Saul, am indagu riso, “Nakataak ku noyo ngaangai' longgom ru Raja' Saul am sasambaloi nano ri Mipibosit, akupu ru tuan muli.

Okou, anak-anak muno am ulipon-ulipon muno, musiti' kondoyon tana' no tayar ru sasambaloi ru tuan muno, am pangani' ra ampos ru tana' no risilo koson mangukop ra pakuan nilo. Kaa' i Mipibosit magail mangakan ra mija' kuno.” (Mokoondo' i Jiba mopor am limo ngaulun anak ungkuyon am ruo ngoopor ngaulun ulipon.)
Taam i Jiba, “Suguton ku ngaangai' susuban muno.”
Ginio ra i Mipibosit nangakan nagulung ra raja'
I Mipibosit mokoondo' sangulun anak ungkuyon inggalan no i Mika, ondo' lakat poyo mamulok. Ngaangai' ru sasambaloi ri Jiba nasauk ra ulipon ri Mipibosit.
Koon raginio noyo i Mipibosit ondo' kimpo' karuo-ruo kalayam nano minayan ra Jirusalim am magail mangakan ra mija' ru raja'.
Kukula' buoi raginio Raja' Nagas intor ra Amon, minatoi. Namalit riso i Ganun, anak ungkuyon nano.

Kon ru Raja' Daut, “Raja' Nagas no rangan kuno ondo' gumagaya'. Ginio ra aku pana musiti' rumangan ra Raja' Ganun anak ungkuyon nano.” Pangator boo Raja' Daut ra kukula' ngaulun ulun sinusub koson mampasaboi ra ragu mangiluk ra Raja' Ganun.
Paat ra ulun-ulun sinusub no nakasaboi giu' ra Amon,

kon ru tingganai-tingganai ru Amon ra raja' nilo, “Pai' no pangkara' ra Raja' Daut nangator ra ulun-ulun sinusub no koson mampasaboi ra ragu mangiluk sabap ra masaga' io mangurumat ra ama' muli! Nangator Raja' Daut ra ngaangai' ulun ragiti koson ra pansigo koson tumutun ra bandar ragitio, maa' raginio makuasa' no itakau.”
Raja' Ganun pana namparakop boo ra ngaangai' ulun sinusub ru Raja' Daut, nangaur ra sampiruo intor ra jangut nilo, namutul ra konoon nilo polos ra puun ru paa, am panusub risilo minugar.
Ngaangai' ulun sinusub no mauyu' kaga' koson muli'. Paat ra baal raginio pinabala' ra Raja' Daut, pangator io ra bilin koson ulun-ulun sinusub no mayan ra Jiriko saboi ra jangut nilo tumuu' saguli'.

Ulun ru Amon pana nakaliman boo ra pinasauk nilo noyo Raja' Daut no ra pantula' nilo. Ginio ra nampagaji' ilo ra saujor ru ulun ru Siria: 20,000 ngaulun ondo' minayan giu' ra Bit-Rigob am Joba, am 12,000 ngaulun intor ra Tob, am niayuk raja' ru pagun Maakga nababaya' ra 1,000 ngaulun ulun nano.
Paat ra Raja' Daut nokorongog ra baal raginio, panusub io ri Joab am titikop pulalai ru saujor maa' raginio jumalai manggal ra pantula'.

Ulun ru Amon minongoi ra liwar am posoroyo' saujor nilo giu' ra saang ru kulobon garabang Raba, bandar maayo nilo; liliwa' ulun ru Siria, ulun ru Tob, am ulun ru Maakga no poyo noposoroi ra pulalai nilo giu' ra padang.

Malimanan ri Joab ra nalansit io ru pulalai ru pantula' giu' ra saang am giu' ra bakulung. Ginio ra nampili' io ra saujor ru Israil ondo' moonsoi kaga' am noposoroi risilo mantaluma' ra saujor ru Siria.
Napataak i Joab ra pulalai ra bokon no ri Abisai, boborok nano. Noposoroi i Abisai risilo mantaluma' ra pulalai ru ulun ru Amon.
Kon ri Joab ra boborok nano, “Amon ru kalo tumaan aku manggal ra saujor ru Siria, indibok pangindangan raki'; kaa' amon ru kalo tumaan kou manggal ra saujor ru Amon, matong aku mangindangan rirun.
Ikango' guang muno, am pangayou no ra baani tayar ra bansa' takau am tayar ra bandar-bandar ri Aki Kapuuno' takau. Gama' ru
I Joab am pulalai nano jumalai mangayou, saboi nagigiru' saujor ru Siria.
Paat ra saujor ru Amon nakakito ra saujor ru Siria nagigiru', iruani' nilo i Abisai am subol ra ralalom ru bandar. Kopongo nangayou ra ulun ru Amon, uli' i Joab ra Jirusalim.
Nakaliman ulun ru Siria ra kinala ilo ru ulun ru Israil, timungo' nilo boo ngaangai' saujor nilo.
Piawo' ru Raja' Gadadijir no saujor ru Siria ondo' soroi ra tampilon sirangon ru Sungoi Iprat. Ratong ilo ra Ilam ra tiningganai ri Sobak, panglima saujor ru Raja' Gadadijir intor ra Joba.

Paat ra Raja' Daut nokorongog ra baal raginio, timungo' no saujor ru Israil. Ilo pana liminaup boo ra Sungoi Jordan, am ongoi ra Ilam. Giu' no ulun ru Siria nangatur ra saujor nilo am jalai namulunsar ra saujor ru Raja' Daut.

Kaa' saujor ru Israil nangala ra saujor ru Siria. Raja' Daut am saujor nano namatoi ra 700 ngaulun mapaugar ra kurita' kuda am 40,000 ngaulun intor ra pulalai ru mangkuda. Namilat ilo niayuk ri Sobak, panglima saujor ru pantula', am minatoi io giu' ra tatanga' ru pangayawan.

Paat ra raja'-raja' ondo' kinuasa' ru Raja' Gadadijir nakaliman ra kinala ilo noyo ru ulun ru Israil, raja'-raja' nakimansaung ra ulun ru Israil am ralalom ru kuasa' nilo. Intor raginio ulun ru Siria kalo boo baani mangindangan ra ulun ru Amon.

Paat ra samai', kalupus Raja' Daut siminukal ra nombolong, minongoi io ugar-ugar ra taap ru istana ondo' marata'. Intor ra giu' no naimpal no sangulun ruandu' tatanga' mariu', am mantalur kaga' ruandu' no.
Kopongo raginio panusub Raja' Daut ra ulun mangkuot ra osoi ruandu' no. Binalaan Raja' Daut ra ruandu' no i Batsyiba anak ri Iliam, andu' ri Uria ulun ru Git.

Panusub Raja' Daut ra ulun mongoi pangalap ri Batsyiba. Pakasaboi i Batsyiba ra istana, rulug Raja' Daut riso. (Paat raginio i Batsyiba bagu ayuk nopongo nambaal ra upacara mapapasau ra inan nalupus liuran.) Kopongo raginio uli' i Batsyiba ra baloi nano.
Kukula' buoi nalupus raginio kalimani' no ra maapang io, pangator io ra kabar ra baal raginio ra Raja' Daut.
Kopongo raginio nangator Raja' Daut ra susuban ri Joab, “Susubo' i Uria ulun ru Git no matong uma' raki'.” Panusub boo i Joab ri Uria mongoi uma' ra Raja' Daut.
Paat ri Uria nakasaboi, nangkuot Raja' Daut riso intor ra baal ri Joab am saujor ru Israil, am baal ru pangayawan.
Kopongo raginio indagu Raja' Daut ri Uria, “Uli' no ra baloi muno am tangus no sangkinolor.” Kopongo i Uria nangiruan ra istana, pangirim Raja' Daut ra tangguang giu' ra baloi ri Uria.
Kaa' kalo minuli' i Uria ra baloi nano. Rondom raginio nombolong io giu' ra kulobon garabang ru istana nababaya' ra ulun-ulun mantamung ra raja'.
Paat ra Raja' Daut binalaan ra kalo minuli' i Uria ra baloi nano, pangkuot io riso, “Sala' ka bagu kou ayuk minuli' intor ra pangkiralanan ra maalur? Kua kalo minuli' kou ra baloi muno?”
Taam i Uria, “Saujor ru Israil am Jiuda tatanga' mangayou giu' ra pangayawan am Kaban Nabantuan ru
Indagu Raja' Daut riso, “Amon ru ginio noyo, ayan no ragiti ra orou raiti'. Susuab no paulion tokou.” Ginio ra ayan i Uria ra Jirusalim paat ra orou raginio.
Suabon no nangkimait Raja' Daut ri Uria mongoi ra bunsag ra rondom am nampagauk riso. Kaa' rondom raginio niayuk kalo minuli' i Uria ra baloi nano, kaa' nombolong nagapin ra bajang nano
Suabon no ra iosusuab nanulis Raja' Daut ra rondo' surat ri Joab, am pinaibitan no surat no ri Uria.

Koon raginio suang ru surat no, “Susubo' i Uria mongoi ra barisan ru saang, intok pangayawan ondo' moporos kaga', malupus raginio susubo' pulalai muno lumugut ra kalo mapandayan ri Uria maa' raginio matoi io.”
Liliwa' raginio liniputan ri Joab bandar raginio, nanusub io ri Uria mongoi ra intok ondo' napandayan no ra inalungan mapiot ru pantula'.
Paat ra pantula' mingkual intor ra bandar koson mamulunsar ra pulalai ri Joab, kukula' ngaulun pagawai ru saujor ru Raja' Daut minatoi, nakaaya' i Uria.
Kopongo raginio nangator i Joab ra pambalaan ra Raja' Daut koson mambala' riso intor ra baal ru pangayawan.
Gitio noyo susuban ri Joab ra ulun sinusub no, “Mopongo ra okou mantunung ra ngaangai' intor ra pangayawan no,
maaru' lair sumangit raja' am mindagu, ‘Kua ongoi inggaar kaga' ra bandar no paat mangayou? Kalo kia nakapandai kau ra pantula' maaru' mamanah ramuyun intor ra rasawat ru timbok ru bandar?

Kalo kia nakara' min ati kulaan i Abimilik anak ri Gidion minatoi ragili? Io minatoi sabap ra natiu' ra batu gilingan ondo' pinaratu' ru sangulun ruandu' intor ra timbok ru bandar giu' ra bandar Tibis. Kua ongoi kau inggaar kaga' ra timbok ru bandar?’ Amon ru mangkuot raja' koon raginio, indagu ra i Uria, pagawai ru saujor ru raja' niayuk minatoi.”
Ulun sinusub no minongoi uma' ra Raja' Daut am nambala' ra ngaangai' ondo' nanusuban ri Joab.
Indagu io, “Maikang poyo pantula' intor ritakau. Ingkual ilo intor ra bandar am nantula' ramon giu' ra padang, kaa' nagula' mai ilo saboi ilo siminaguli' ra kulobon garabang ru bandar.
Kopongo raginio namanah ilo ramon intor ra rasawat ru timbok ru bandar. Koon raginio noyo ra kukula' ngaulun pagawai ru saujor muno minatoi. I Uria, pagawai ru saujor muno, niayuk minatoi.”

Indagu Raja' Daut ra ulun sinusub no, “Kaikango' guang ri Joab. Ragui' io, ‘Pai' kalawo guang, sabap ra topot kalo maaruan ra osoi matoi ra pangayawan.’ Susubo' io mambaal ra pamulunsaran ra maayo poyo ra bandar no saboi bandar no makuasa'.”
Paat ri Batsyiba naala' ra ralaki nano minatoi noyo, pangulir io riso.
Kopongo panguliran, pinoongoi ru Raja' Daut i Batsyiba ra istana, am nasauk io ra andu' ru Raja' Daut. Kukula' ngansila' raginio, naganak i Batsyiba ra sangulun anak ungkuyon, kaa' kalo maansukan
Sangulun langkaya' no mokoondo' ra masuang sapi' am domba,

kaa' sangulun musikin no mokoondo' ayuk ra sanginan anak domba ondo' binali nano. Inalungan no anak domba no ra ralalom ru baloi nano mababaya' ra anak-anak nano. Anak domba no pinakan intor ra akanon ru ulun no, manginum intor ra sangkir nano, am mombolong ra paa nano. Ontoson ragu, anak domba no koson ra anak ruandu' nano galama'.

Paat ra sangarawan, mokoondo' tambului nakasaboi ra baloi ru ulun langkaya' no. Marara' ulun langkaya' no manimbalui ra domba kapoam sapi' nano galama' koson ansakon pasulungon ra tambului no. Kaa' inalap no anak domba ru ulun musikin no maa' raginio ansakon koson tambului nano.”
Pokorongog ra baal raginio, siminangit kaga' Raja' Daut ra binaal ru ulun langkaya' no, saboi mindagu Raja' Daut, “Magibot aku ralalom inggalan ru
Ulun no musiti' mamalit ra anak domba no inggapat, sabap ra binaal nano malaat kaga'.”
Kon ri Natan ra Raja' Daut, “Okou noyo ulun no! Gitio noyo rinagu ru

Nangani' aku noyo rirun ra pamarintaan ri Saul am andu'-andu' nano. Napasauk Aku niayuk rirun ra raja' ru Israil am Jiuda. Amon ru ngaangai' ti lakat poyo kalo maukop, maaru' mangani' Aku rirun ra kinasuang induo ruli' poyo.

Kaa' kua anggal kou ra susuban Kuno? Kua pambaal kou ra baal malaat no? Siningon mu nompoloso ri Uria minatoi ra tatanga' ru pangayawan. Nompoloso kou ra ulun ru Amon namatoi riso, am namundus ra andu' nano!
Ginio sabap ra okou kalo gumagaya' Raki' am namundus kou ra andu' ri Uria, ginio ra ralalom ru moonong ra papag muno mokoondo' matoi ra potoyon.

Magibot Aku ra mampalumpa' rirun ra kapaganan ondo' makinibitan ru gino ngai' akau sasambaloi. Alapon Ku andu'-andu' muno ra talupak ru mato muno galama', am pataakon ku ilo ra ulun bokon ondo' parumakon ilo ra makito-kito.
Nambaal kou ra tula ra sinokon, kaa' mompoloso Aku ra baal mogondo' no masauk ra makito-kito ra saang ru ngaangai' ulun ru Israil.’ ”
Kon ru Raja' Daut ri Natan, “Sotopot no natulaan aku noyo ra
Taam i Natan, “Nangampun noyo
Kaa' sabap ra nagasab kou ra
Kopongo raginio uli' i Natan ra baloi nano.
Anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Daut ondo' inanak ri Batsyiba, napuor ri Uria, pinoloso ru
Pakiasi' Raja' Daut ri Aki Kapuuno' koson mababas anak raginio. Nampali Raja' Daut am moonong rondom lumuya' io ra sulig ru lamin nano sorondom.
Pagawai ru istana kuminam manimayo ri Raja' Daut maa' raginio sumukal, kaa' marara' io, am marara' io mangakan mabaya' risilo.

Saminggu' raginio minatoi anak no, am pagawai ri Raja' Daut malaa' koson mambala' riso ra baal raginio. Konilo, “Paat ra anak no lakat poyo maayag, marara' raja' no mangkirongog ritakau paat mindagu ra raja'. Atan poyo raino malupus anak ungkuyon ru raja' no minatoi! Maaru' lair ru raja' no mangaru', am maninduol ra inan nano galama'!”
Paat ra nakito ru Raja' Daut ra ilo nongkokonos, nalimanan no ra anak no minatoi noyo. Ginio ra pangkuot io risilo, “Minatoi noyo kia anak no?”
Taam ilo, “Iou.”
Kopongo raginio sukal Raja' Daut intor ra sulig, pariu', nansurai ra abuk, ralin ra bayang am ongoi sambayang giu' ra Baloi ru
Kon ru pagawai-pagawai nano riso, “Raja' mai, akai ngaangai' kalo makarati'. Paat ra anak ungkuyon muli lakat poyo maayag, nampali am tinangian mu io. Kaa' kalupus io minatoi, sukal kou am pangakan!”
Taam Raja' Daut, “Iou, topot ra nampali am nantangi' aku paat ra anak no lakat poyo maayag sabap ra mangkara' aku, maaru'
Kaa' raino, kalupus io minatoi, atan kia onong no ra aku rumayus mampali? Mabayag ku kia io saguli'? Maagu no mokoongoi aku niayuk ra intok nano, kaa' raino kalo sumaguli' io raki'.”
Manimayo Raja' Daut ra guang ri Batsyiba andu' nano, am narulug riso. Kopongo raginio naganak i Batsyiba ra sangulun anak ungkuyon ondo' ininggalanan ru Raja' Daut ri Salomo. Motogom
am nanusub ra Nabi Natan manginggalan ra anak no ri Jidija,
Liliwa' raginio lakat poyo i Joab mangayou koson mampagaau ra Raba, bandar maayo ru pagun Amon, am maar io noyo makagaau ra bandar no.
Ginio ra nangator io ra bilin ra Raja' Daut am nambala', “Namulunsar aku ra Raba am nampagaau ra lutu' ru timug no.
Raino, kasaga' kou no manimung ra saujor takau ra bokon, am maningganai ra pamulunsaran koson mampagaau ra bandar no. Kon boo raginio kalo boo raguon ru ulun ra aku ondo' nampagaau ra bandar no.”
Kopongo raginio panimung Raja' Daut ra ngaangai' ru saujor nano am pamulunsar ra Raba. Sinubol nilo am kinala nilo bandar no.
Inalap ru Raja' Daut karaun ru raja' nilo

Suai raginio mamagun inibit am sinusub magibit ra gargaji, sangkul basi', kapak basi', am jinajalan ilo mangandoi ra intok pambaalan ra batu bata. Baal raginio binaal niayuk ra mamagun ru bandar-bandar ru ulun ru Amon ra bokon. Kopongo raginio Raja' Daut am ngaangai' ru saujor nano siminaguli' ra Jirusalim.

I Absalom, anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Daut mokoondo' sangulun boborok ra ruandu' makainggalan ri Tamar ondo' mantalur am ralaa poyo kaga'. I Amnon, anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Daut intor ra andu' ra bokon lumaai ri Tamar.
Malaai kaga' i Amnon ri Tamar saboi narualan i Amnon. Kaa' i Amnon kalo makapambaal ra atan-atan sabap ra i Tamar ralaa poyo kaga' am kalo iowon makatuum ra ungkuyon.
Kaa' i Amnon mokoondo' ra sangulun rangan ondo' mapintar, inggalan nano i Jonadab anak ri Simia; i Simia ti maayo ra ungkuyon ru Raja' Daut.
Indagu i Jonadab ri Amnon, “Okou anak ru raja', kaa' moonong orou mangiluk kou! Kua?”
Taam i Amnon, “Malaai aku ri Tamar, boborok ri Absalom pabukat kuno.”

Indagu i Jonadab riso, “Baal raginio kalo mapagon! Baalo' ra ilain koson ayuk ra marualan am luya' ra intok kaalangan. Paat ra ama' muno matong pagilong rirun, raguo' gitio, ‘Ama', iowo' noyo i Tamar matong mangani' raki' ra akanon. Masaga' aku ra io mangansak ra akanon ragiti maa' raginio makito ku io, am io galama' mansulung ra akanon no raki'.’ ”
Kopongo raginio baalo' ri Amnon ra ilain koson ayuk ra marualan am luya' ra intok kaalangan nano.

Paat ra Raja' Daut matong pagilong ri Amnon, indagu io riso, “Ama', iowo' noyo i Tamar matong koson mangansak ra kuui ragiti, maa' raginio makakito aku riso, am io galama' mansulung ra kuui no raki'.”
Kopongo raginio nangator Raja' Daut ra bilin ri Tamar giu' ra istana, “Ongoi no ra baloi ru maayo muno i Amnon am ansaki' io ra akanon.”
Ongoi i Tamar ra giu' no am ilai' ra i Amnon liminuya' ra intok kaalangan. Alap i Tamar koborok ra tapung, am ra saang ri Amnon nomongo io ra kuui ondo' panggangon.
Kopongo raginio ingkualo' no kuui intor ra pamanggangan am pasulungo' no, kaa' marara' i Amnon mangakan. Kono, “Susubo' ngaangai' ulun mingkual!” Ingkual ilo boo ngaangai' intor ra lamin no.
Kopongo raginio indagu i Amnon ri Tamar, “Ibito' kuui no ra intok kaalangan kuno am suui' aku.” Binaya' ri Tamar kitaak ru maayo nano.
Kaa' paat ri Tamar mampatutui ra kuui no riso, guuto' ri Amnon ralaa no am indagu, “Ibok rulug raki'!”
Indagu i Tamar, “Pai'! Pai' aku jajali' mambaal ra baal makauyuyu' no. Baal koson raginio kalo igondo' nasauk ra Israil.
Amon ru masauk koson raginio, kalio bulos kuno. Okou pana tauyuon ru ulun ra Israil. Moonsoi mansunur kou am raja', am maaru' mangiou raja' ra aku ti masauk ra andu' muno.”
Kaa' marara' i Amnon maya' ra ragu nano. Sabap ra maikang poyo i Amnon intor ri Tamar, jajali' no toojo io, am rulug riso.
Kopongo raginio masisang kaga' i Amnon ri Tamar. Sisang nano maayo poyo intor ra laai nali ra talimpuun. Indagu io ra boborok nano, “Ingkual!”
Taam i Tamar, “Pai' aku pagiruo'. Amon ru pagiruon mu aku, binaal raginio malaat poyo intor ra binaal mu ra raitii' ni!”
Kaa' marara' i Amnon rumongog ri Tamar.
Pampiau io ra ulipon nano am indagu, “Ibito' ruandu' ti mingkual am kaputi' kulobon!”
Ulipon no pana nagibit ri Tamar mingkual am nangaput ra kulobon.
Nambayang i Tamar ra sukub maawar ondo' maawar longon.
Patauko' ri Tamar kaau ra rasawat ru ulu nano, namparilak ra bayang nano, am ugar liliwa' nanili ra bulos nano ra karuruo kalindu' am niayuk pantangi' ra mangiluk.

Paat ri Absalom nakakito ri Tamar, pangkuot io, “Rinulug kou kia ri Amnon? Sama' noyo boborok kuno, pai' pangiluk kaga' sabap ra baal raginio. Io no maayo muno, sabap raginio pai' pambala' ra baal raginio ra osoi pana.” Ayan i Tamar ra baloi ri Absalom; i Tamar mangiluk kaga' am masilukan.
Pokorongog ra baal raginio, siminangit kaga' Raja' Daut.
Mansuli' kaga' i Absalom ri Amnon am marara' boo mindagu riso, sabap ra rinulug noyo ri Amnon i Tamar, boborok nano.

Kopongo ruo ngambilor, paat ra pamaguntingan ra bulu ru domba longgom ri Absalom baalon giu' ra Baal-Gajor ondo' mamaar ra bandar Ipraim, nampiau i Absalom ra ngaangai' anak ungkuyon ru raja' matong ra giu' no.
Uma' i Absalom ra raja' am indagu, “Ama', mambaal aku ra bunsag paat ra pamaguntingan ra bulu ru domba kuno. Gama' ru matong kou ra bunsag no mabaya' ra pagawai-pagawai muno.”
Kaa' taam raja' no, “Pai' anak ku. Amon ru akai ngaangai' matong, mantipagon akai rirun.” Gino kikimait i Absalom, kaa' marara' toojo ama' nano matong. Nangani' io ayuk riso ra barakat.
Kopongo raginio indagu i Absalom, “Amon koon poyo raginio, iowo' pabukat kuno i Amnon maya' ramon.”
Indagu raja' no, “Kalo pana maya' io.”
Kaa' narayus i Absalom nangkimait saboi pupus no nangiou Raja' Daut ri Amnon am ngaangai' anak ungkuyon nano ra bokon maya' ri Absalom.
Pampasulung i Absalom ra akanon ondo' mangaamis kaga'.

Nanusub i Absalom ra ulipon-ulipon nano, “Ilai' min toojo, amon ru nagauk noyo i Amnon sabap ra manginum ra wain, mangani' aku ra pulanu, am potoyo' io. Pai' kalaa'. Aku mansaan ra baal raginio. Baalo' noyo ra baani am pai' pagantangan!”
Ulipon-ulipon ri Absalom nambaal ra susuban no am namatoi ri Amnon. Anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Daut ra bokon no nangura' ra baghal ru sigagama' am pagigiru'.
Tatanga' ilo mangkiralan muli', binalaan Raja' Daut ra namatoi i Absalom ra ngaangai' anak ungkuyon nano, am kolondo' sangulun pana pinoloso maayag.
Tirong Raja' Daut, pamparilak-rilak ra bayang nano sabap ra mangiluk guang, am langan ra sulig. Ngaangai' ru pagawai nano minaya' pamparilak ra bayang.

Kaa' i Jonadab anak ri Simia maayo ra ungkuyon ru Raja' Daut mindagu, “Raja' kuno, kalo namatoi ilo ra ngaangai' ru anak ungkuyon muno. I Amnon ayuk pinatoi, sabap ra nakito noyo ra ginio noyo kasagaan ri Absalom intor ra boborok nano i Tamar rinulug ri Amnon.
Pai' pangintopot ra ngaangai' anak ungkuyon muno pinatoi, sabap ra ondo' pinatoi no i Amnon ayuk”
Liliwa' raginio nagiru' i Absalom.
Ulun mantamung ra istana nakakito ra masuang ulun matong mambusul ra gunung intor ra tampilon ru Oronaim.
Kon ri Jonadab ra Raja' Daut, “Ginilo noyo anak-anak ungkuyon muno! Topot koson ra rinagu ku ra raitii' ni.”
Kopongo ayuk io mindagu, anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Daut nakasaboi. Tumalimpuun ilo mantangi', am Raja' Daut am niayuk ulipon-ulipon nano pana mantangi' ra mangiluk.
kaa' paat ra Raja' Daut kalo boo mangiluk guang, moondom io kaga' ri Absalom.
Nakapandai i Joab ra moondom kaga' Raja' Daut ri Absalom,

ginio ra panusub io ra ulun magalap ra ruandu' mapintar ondo' minayan giu' ra Tikoa. Paat ra ruandu' no nakasaboi, indagu i Joab riso, “Baalo' ra ilain koson ayuk ra mangulir; pambayang ra bayang mangulir am pai' surayo' abuk. Baalo' koson ra ruandu' ondo' lair noyo mangulir.
Mopongo raginio ongoi no uma' ra raja', am raguo' riso atan ondo' rinagu ku rirun.” Nambala' i Joab ra ruandu' no atan ondo' musiti' raguon nano.
Ongoi ruandu' no uma' ra raja', am kuku' samba am indagu, “Raja' kuno, indangano' aku!”
Pangkuot raja' no riso, “Atan kitaakon muno?”
Taam ruandu' no, “Aku ti napuor ondo' musikin. Ralaki kuli minatoi noyo.
Mokoondo' aku ra ruo ngaulun anak ungkuyon, am paat ra rondo' orou nansangor ilo giu' ra umo. Sabap ra kolondo' ulun nampatuliar risilo, ondo' sangulun no namatoi ra sangulun no.

Raino, ngaangai' ru sasambaloi kuno mantula' raki', am mansika' maa' raginio pataakon ku anak kuli ondo' namatoi no risilo. Masaga' ilo mangukum riso ra ukuman matoi sabap ra namatoi io noyo ra pabukat nano. Amon ru pataakon ku anak raginio, aku kolondo' boo anak. Mamuso ilo ra kalansanan kuno ra rondo' no ayuk am kalo manatang ra sangulun anak ungkuyon ra ralaki kuli koson manunggul ra papag nano.”
Taam raja' no, “Uli' no. Salingapuon ku baal raginio.”
Kon ru ruandu' no, “Raja' kuno, atan ayuk baalon muno, aku am sasambaloi kuno mansaan ra kinibit no; okou am sasambaloi muno kolondo' sala.”
Taam raja' no, “Amon ru mokoondo' ra ulun ondo' mompololob rirun, ibito' io raki', magu' io kalo boo manguliso rirun.”
Kon ru ruandu' no, “Gama' ru makiasi' kou ra
Taam Raja' Daut, “Ralalom inggalan ru
Ruandu' no pana mindagu boo, “Raja' kuno, iowo' aku mindagu santaun poyo.”
Taam raja', “Iou noyo.”

Kon ru ruandu' no, “Sabap ra ragu muni, nangiou kou noyo ra okou galama' makasala sabap ra kalo nangiou ra anak ungkuyon muno muli' intor ra pamatiran. Kua baalo' mu kasalaan koson raginio ra ulun ri Aki Kapuuno'?

Matoi takau ngaangai'; itakau ti koson ra timug ondo' nasasar ra tana' am kalo maalap boo katimung. I Aki Kapuuno' pana kalo boo mamayag saguli' ra ulun ondo' minatoi, kaa' kalo ra kalo mapiratan mu maa' raginio ulun inimpayan no makauli' poyo.
Minuma' aku rirun sabap ra linolob aku ru ulun. Ginio ra mangkara' aku ra moonsoi mindagu aku rirun am malansan ra iowon kitaakon kutu.
Mangkara' aku ra mangkirongog kou am mamayag raki' intor ra ulun ondo' mirot mamatoi raki' am anak kuno. Kuayan nilo manginggi' ramon intor ra tana' ondo' tinaakan ri Aki Kapuuno' ra ulun Nano.
Mangintopot aku ra bantu' muno jamin ru pamayagan kuno sabap ra okou koson ra malaikat ri Aki Kapuuno', ondo' makapandai ra atan ondo' moonsoi am atan ondo' malaat.
Taam raja', “Masaga' aku mangkuot rondo' rirun, am taamo' ra motopot.”
Taam ruandu' no, “Indagu no.”
Kon ru raja', “Sinusub kou kia ri Joab?”
Taam ruandu' no, “Magibot aku sabap ra okou kalo noyo makapagiliu aku intor ra pangkuatan muno. Motopot ra i Joab nambala' noyo ra atan musiti' kuno baalon am raguon.
Kaa' nambaal io raginio koson manalasai ra baal raginio ra moonsoi. Okou mapintar koson ra malaikat ri Aki Kapuuno' saboi makapandai ra ngaangai' ondo' masauk.”
Kopongo raginio pampiau raja' no ri Joab am indagu riso, “Gogoton muno suguton ku. Ongoi no uma' ri Absalom am ibito' io saguli'.”
Igugulatur i Joab ra saang ru Raja' Daut, am indagu, “Gama' ru i Aki Kapuuno' mambarakat rirun! Raino nakapandai aku ra maansayan kou raki' sabap ra nangiou kou noyo ra kitaakon kuno.”
Ongoi i Joab ra Gisur koson mangkimait ri Absalom sumaguli' ra Jirusalim.
Kaa' kalo nangiou raja' no ri Absalom mayan ra istana. Kon ru raja', “Marara' aku magilong riso.” Ginio ra narampus i Absalom minuli' ra baloi nano galama' am kalo minuma' ra raja'.

Inompor i Absalom koson ra ulun ondo' maindon kaga' ra titikop ru Israil. Kolondo' sangulun pana ondo' maindon poyo intor riso. Intor ra pampalar ru kalayam saboi ra pompor ru abuk nano, kolondo' pipilat nano.

Abuk nano masampung kaga', am musiti' io mopolompor igondo' sambilor sabap ra malimanan no maagat kaga'. Abuk ondo' linompor no bagat no nasailan intor ra ruo ngakilogram sumugut ra timbangan ru raja'.
Mokoondo' i Absalom ra talu ngaulun anak ungkuyon am sangulun anak ruandu' ondo' mantalur kaga', makainggalan ri Tamar.
Minayan i Absalom ra Jirusalim buoi ruo ngambilor, kaa' kalo niayuk poyo minuma' ra raja'.
Ginio ra paat ra rondo' orou pampiau i Absalom ri Joab koson manusub riso muma' ra raja', kaa' marara' i Joab matong. Pampiau i Absalom riso igondo' poyo, kaa' marara' niayuk i Joab matong.
Kopongo raginio indagu i Absalom ra ulipon-ulipon nano, “Ilai' min, umo ri Joab ondo' tinanaman ra barli nansapapa' ra umo kuno. Solobo' min umo no.” Ilo pana minongoi ponolob ra umo no.
Ratong i Joab ra baloi ri Absalom am pangkuot, “Kua solobo' ru ulipon-ulipon muno umo kuno?”

Taam i Absalom, “Sabap ra marara' kou matong paat ra aku mampiau. Masaga' aku mompoongoi rirun uma' ra raja' am mampasaboi ra pangkuatan kutu, ‘Atan onong kuno nangiruan ra Gisur am saguli' ragiti? Moonsoi poyo minayan aku ra giu' ayuk.’ ” Kon poyo ri Absalom, “Piroto' noyo koson makauma' aku ra raja', am amon ru aku ti lakat poyo karaan ra makasala, nakatampos aku no ukumin ra matoi.”

Kopongo raginio minuma' i Joab ra Raja' Daut am nampasaboi ra ragu-ragu ri Absalom. Kopongo raginio pampiau raja' ri Absalom, am ratong i Absalom igugulatur ra saang ru raja'. Nanguma' raja' no riso ra alok.
Kopongo raginio napatampos i Absalom ra rondo' kuda am kukula' ngainan kuda ra tayar nano, am niayuk ra limo ngoopor ngaulun magalung riso.

Kaindalaman ri Absalom sumukal ra susuab ti am migor ra kiing ru ralan mamaar ra kulobon garabang ru bandar. Moonong ulun ondo' masaga' mambala' ra baal nano ra raja', piawon am kuatin ri Absalom. Kono, “Akau ti intor ra ati bansa'?” Amon ru taamon ru ulun no, “Intor ra bansa' ragitio kapoam ginio,”
mindagu boo i Absalom, “Sumugut ra ukum, motopot kau, kaa' malubat kolondo' uakil ru raja' ondo' masaga' mangkirongog ra raguon muno.”
Kon poyo ri Absalom, “Amon ru aku ti akim, moonong ulun ondo' mokoondo' ra pansangaran kapoam sikaan matong raki', am matimpok pamakuan kuno.”
Amon ru mokoondo' ondo' minggaar ri Absalom koson igulatur ra saang nano, pakaangon ri Absalom kalindu', am gumanggol ra ulun no am mangalok riso.
Binaal ginio ri Absalom ra moonong ulun ru Israil ondo' masaga' mambala' ra baal no ra raja'. Koon raginio noyo i Absalom nangambi' ra guang ru ulun ru Israil.
Kopongo apat ngambilor,
Paat ra aku minayan ra Gisur, giu' ra pagun Siria, nambantu' aku mongoi sambayang ra
Taam raja', “Ongoi no am tumoojo.” I Absalom pana minongoi boo ra Gibron.

Kaa' kalo poyo raginio nangator io ra ulun-ulun sinusub ra ngaangai' bansa' ru Israil, am nagibit ra bilin, “Amon ru morongog min bolos ru bujung, golok kano ‘I Absalom nasauk noyo ra raja' giu' ra Gibron!’ ”

Suang ruo ngaatus ngaulun intor ra Jirusalim kinimaitan ri Absalom koson mamaya' riso mongoi ra Gibron. Kalo nakapandai ilo ra atan-atan intor ra baal nampakatan no am ilo ngaangai' minaya' ra kalo manantam.

Liliwa' ri Absalom mampataak ra taak simbalui, nangator io niayuk ra ulun sinusub ra bandar Gilo koson mampiau ri Agitopil, sangulun intor ra maminson ra Raja' Daut. Koon raginio noyo baal nampakatan koson manggal ra Raja' Daut lumanja' ikang, am maamaya' ri Absalom lumanja' suang.
Kopongo raginio sangulun sinusub nambala' ra baal raginio ra Raja' Daut, “Minaya' noyo ulun ru Israil ri Absalom.”

Ginio ra indagu Raja' Daut ra ngaangai' ru pagawai nano ondo' soroi ra Jirusalim, “Musiti' takau magiru' raino niayuk, amon ru masaga' takau makalabus intor ri Absalom! Ribaki' min! Amon ru kalo, mataki' io makasaboi am mampaala ritakau, am niayuk mamatoi ra ngaangai' ulun giu' ra bandar!”
Taam ilo, “Iou, raja' mai. Akai ngaangai' nakatampos mambaal ra atan ayuk kasagaan muno.”
Ginio ra ugar raja' no, binaya' ru ngaangai' sasambaloi nano am pagawai nano, ondo' ak am mopor ngaulun ruandu' parulug nano ondo' tinatang koson mayan ra istana.
Paat ra raja' am ngaangai' maamaya' nano mugar mangiruan ra bandar, uog ilo mamaar ra baloi ondo' pompor toojo.
Ngaangai' pagawai ru raja' minigor

Paat ra raja' nakakito risilo, indagu io ri Itai, tingganai ru onom ngaatus ngaulun saujor no, “Kua baya' kou niayuk ramon? Moonsoi poyo muli' kou am mayan ra raja' ondo' bagu no. Ulun bansa' ru bokon kou ragiti, ulun nagiru' ondo' maalur intor ra pagun galama'.
Kalo poyo nabuoi kou minayan ragiti, am marara' aku ra okou maya' raki' tumanggau. Aku galama' kalo nakapandai ra ati angayan kutu. Uli' no am ibito' niayuk rangan sabansa' muno. Gama' ru motogom
Kaa' taam i Itai, “Raja' kuno, magibot aku rirun, ralalom inggalan ru
Taam Raja' Daut, “Iou noyo! Ugar no!” Itai pana minugar nabaya' ra ngaangai' ru pulalai nano am sasambaloi nilo.

Ngaangai' ulun nantangi' ra mosongou paat ra ngaangai' minaya' ra Raja' Daut no nangiruan ra istana. Kopongo raginio liminaup raja' ra Sungoi Kidron, sunu' ngaangai' pulalai nano, am ugar sumuku' ra tana' kaagisan.
Imam Jadok am Imam Abiatar
Kopongo raginio kon ru raja' no ri Jadok, “Pasagulio' Kaban Nabantuan no ra bandar. Amon ru maansayan
Kaa' amon ru kalo maansayan
Tungguli' poyo ru raja' ragu nano ri Jadok, “Kimaiti' noyo i Agimaas anak muno am i Jonatan anak ri Abiatar, am saguli' no ra bandar ra mamimio.
Liliwa' raginio maginaa aku mamaar ra intok laupan ru sungoi giu' ra tana' kaagisan saboi makaapu ra tanou intor rirun.”
I Jadok am i Abiatar pana nagibit ra Kaban Nabantuan siminaguli' ra Jirusalim am ayan ilo ra giu' no.
Kalo nangkasut i Daut, am nababaya' ra ngaangai' ulun minaya' riso no, nagaloi ilo ra Bulur Jaitun liliwa' mantangi' am ulu rinundung koson tatandu' mangiluk guang.
Paat ra Raja' Daut binalaan

Paat ra Raja' Daut nakasaboi ra tampak ru bulur, giu' ra intok sambayangan ra giu' no, umaa' io ru rangan nano ondo' gumagaya', i Gusai ulun ru Arki. Rinilak noyo ri Gusai bayang nano am rasawat ru ulu nano tinaukan ra kaau.
Kon ru Raja' Daut riso, “Amon ru maya' kou raki', kalo makapangindangan kou raki'.

Kaa' makapangindangan kou raki' amon ru sumaguli' kou ra bandar. Kopongo raginio ragui' i Absalom ra raino masaga' kou mangandoi ra gumagaya' riso, koson ra okou nangandoi ra ama' nano ragili. Koon raginio noyo ra okou makasulang ra ngaangai' bilin ri Agitopil.
Imam Jadok am Imam Abiatar niayuk soroi ra giu' no. Balai' ilo ra ngaangai' ondo' morongog mu giu' ra istana.
I Agimaas anak ri Jadok am i Jonatan anak ri Abiatar niayuk maya' ra ama' nilo. Pangator no raki' ra ngaangai' tanou pabalaan galing ri Agimaas am i Jonatan.”
Ginio ra i Gusai, rangan ru Raja' Daut siminaguli' ra Jirusalim, nakapaat ri Absalom nakasaboi ra giu' no.
Pangkuot Raja' Daut riso, “Atan pakuan ru ngaangai' ru gitio?”
Taam i Jiba, “Kaladai-kaladai ti pakurain ra sasambaloi muno; ruti' am kikinawa' ti pataakon ra ulipon-ulipon muno, am wain ti painumin risilo paat maagui giu' ra tana' kaagisan ra maagu no.”
Taam i Jiba, “Timinatang io ra Jirusalim, sabap ra mangintopot io ra ulun ru Israil mapasaguli' ra pamarintaan ru aki nali Raja' Saul riso.”
Kon ru raja' ri Jiba, “Intor raino ngaangai' longgom ri Mipibosit masauk ra longgom muno.”
Taam i Jiba, “Paringkuanangan raja' kuno, gama' ru masalok kou maansayan raki'.”

Paat ra Raja' Daut nakasaboi ra Bagurim, sangulun intor ra intok raginio minatong inggaar ra pulalai ru raja' liliwa' nagulas ra Raja' Daut. Inggalan ru ulun no i Simii anak ri Gira, sangulun intor ra pabukat ru Raja' Saul.
Nomobol i Simii ra Raja' Daut am pagawai-pagawai nano ra batu, kabalu' pana Raja' Daut no liniputan ru ulun-ulun nano am ulun-ulun mantamung nano.
Nagulas i Simii riso am indagu, “Ugar! Ugar! Mamamatoi! Ulun malaat!
Nampagaau kou ra pamarintaan ru Raja' Saul! Raino inukum kou ru
I Abisai, ina' nano iono i Jiruya, mindagu ra raja', “Kua polosoo' mu uku' ti magulas rirun? Iowo' aku manginggulu' ra ulu nano!”
Kaa' indagu raja' no ri Abisai am maayo nano i Joab, “Pai' sombot. Polosoon ayuk io magulas raki'. Amon ru manusub
Kon ru Raja' Daut ri Abisai am ra ngaangai' ru pagawai nano, “Anak kuno galama' mirot mamatoi raki'; kua piboo pangimuag kou magilong ra paliso ru ulun ru Binjamin ti?
Maaru' lair ra ilain ru
Ginio ra Raja' Daut am ulun-ulun nano namparayus ra pangkiralanan, liliwa' i Simii nangkiralan ra maribok maya' risilo giu' ra igig ru bulur liliwa' magulas am momobol risilo ra batu am tana'.
Raja' am ngaangai' ru ulun nano naagui kaga' paat nakasaboi ra Sungoi Jordan, am tangus ilo ra giu' no.
Liliwa' raginio i Absalom am ngaangai' ulun ru Israil ondo' namaya' riso sumubol ra bandar Jirusalim, am i Agitopil pana soroi nabaya' risilo.
Paat ri Gusai, rangan ru Raja' Daut ondo' gumagaya' no nakauma' ri Absalom, golok i Gusai, “Maawar bayag ru raja'! Maawar bayag ru raja'!”
Kaa' pangkuot i Absalom riso, “Ati kia gagaya' muli ra Raja' Daut, rangan muno? Kua kalo minaya' kou riso?”
Taam i Gusai, “Kalo lair! Sumaung aku ra ulun ondo' pinili' ru
Mulu' piboo ri osoi kia poyo aku mangandoi ayuk, amon ru sala' ka anak ungkuyon ru tuan kuno? Koson ra aku mangandoi ra ama' muli, koson raginio niayuk aku mangandoi rirun raino.”
Kopongo raginio indagu i Absalom ri Agitopil, “Raguo' noyo atan musiti' takau baalon.”

Taam i Agitopil, “Ongoi no rulug ra ruandu' parulug ru ama' muno, ondo' tinatang koson mayan ra istana. Koon ra baal raginio, ngaangai' ulun ru Israil makapandai ra okou kinara' noyo ra pantula' ru ama' muno, am ngaangai' ru minaya' rirun no lumanja' baani.”

Rondo' kim boo biningkal koson ri Absalom giu' ra rasawat ru taap ru istana ondo' marata' no. Kopongo raginio ra saang ru ngaangai' ulun, umpos i Absalom ra ralalom ru kim no am rulug ra ruandu' parulug ru ama' nano.
Paat raginio moonong bilin ri Agitopil inapu toojo, koson ayuk ra ngaangai' no ragu ri Aki Kapuuno' galama'; ra Raja' Daut am niayuk i Absalom manugut ra bilin ri Agitopil.
Kalo nabuoi raginio, indagu i Agitopil ri Absalom, “Iowo' aku mampili' ra mopor am ruo ngaribu ngaulun. Rondom no mugar aku koson mangilou ra Raja' Daut.
Bulunsaron ku io paat ra io lakat poyo maagui am malawo guang. Malaa' io saboi ngaangai' ulun nano magigiru'. Raja' Daut ayuk ondo' potoyon kuno.
Ngaangai' ru ulun nano pasagulion ku rirun koson ra ruandu' uoton sumaguli' ra ralaki. Sala' ka kia okou ayuk mompogogot ra rondo' painawo ru ulun?
Bilin raginio kinara' ra moonsoi ri Absalom am ru ngaangai' tingganai ru ulun ru Israil.
Kabalu' pana koson raginio indagu i Abaslom, “Piawo' i Gusai. Rongogo' takau guangon nano.”
Paat ri Gusai muma', pambala' i Absalom ra inatangan ri Agitopil, am indagu, “Ginio noyo bilin ri Agitopil. Moonsoi kia ru suguton takau bilin raginio? Amon ru kalo, pangani' ra inatangan ra bokon.”
Taam i Gusai, “Bilin ri Agitopil ra raino ti kalo moonsoi.

Okou nakapandai ra Raja' Daut am ulun-ulun nano tutumula' ondo' maikang ra baani. Ilo no koson ra kinasangit ru baawang ruandu' ondo' natatakan ra anak nano. Raja' Daut ti niayuk sangulun saujor makanailian, ondo' kalo igondo' pombolong ra rondom ti mabaya' ra ulun-ulun nano.

Maaru' lair paat ra raino ti pana tatanga' io nansibuni giu' ra ralalom ru rondo' luang batu kapoam intok ra bokon. Paat ayuk ra ulun-ulun muno bulunsaron ru Raja' Daut, am mokoondo' ra matoi, maaru' ra osoi ayuk ondo' mokorongog ra baal raginio mindagu ra ulun-ulun muno kinala noyo.

Kinibit ru ginio, ulun ondo' baani kaga' am maikang toojo koson ra singa' pana malaa'. Ngaangai' ulun giu' ra Israil makapandai ra ama' muno sangulun tutumula', am ra ulun-ulun nano tutumula' ondo' maikang ra baani.

Sabap raginio, bilin kutu koson ragitio: Timungo' ngaangai' ulun ru Israil intor ra titikop ru pagun, saboi ra kinasuang no koson ra kinasuang ru agis giu' ra nagas. Kopongo raginio okou galama' maningganai risilo jumalai ra mampatoi.
Uyumon takau Raja' Daut ra ati ayuk intok nano, am bulunsaron takau io ra kalo poyo makaliman io ra atan ondo' masauk. Kolondo' sangulun pana ondo' makalabus, ioupana io am niayuk ulun-ulun nano.
Amon ru magiru' io ra ralalom ru rondo' bandar, ngaangai' ru mamagun takau mangalap ra kalat-kalat am mamparalaat ra bandar no
Kopongo i Absalom am ngaangai' ulun ru Israil nokorongog ra inatangan raginio, konilo, “Moonsoi poyo bilin ri Gusai intor ra bilin ri Agitopil.” Inaru' noyo ru
Kopongo raginio nambala' i Gusai ra Imam Jadok am Imam Abiatar intor ra bilin ri Agitopil am bilin nano galama' ri Absalom am ra ngaangai' tingganai ru Israil.

Kon ri Gusai, “Ribaki'! Balai' Raja' Daut maa' raginio kalo mombolong ra rondom giu' ra intok laupan ra sungoi giu' ra tana' kaagisan. Musiti' io mataki' lumaup ra Sungoi Jordan. Amon ru kalo, io am ngaangai' ru ulun nano rokopon am potoyon.”

Liliwa' raginio i Jonatan anak ri Abiatar am i Agimaas anak ri Jadok tatanga' maginaa mamaar ra taur ru timug In-Rogil, giu' ra kiing ru bandar Jirusalim. Kalo baani ilo mumpos ra bandar sabap ra malaa' ilain ru ulun. Koson ra kaindalaman, makaalap ilo ra tanou intor ra sangulun ulipon ruandu' ondo' mampasaboi ra tanou ondo' musiti' pabalaan ra Raja' Daut.

Kaa' raino ti sangulun lalaing ungkuyon nakainamot ra nakakito risilo, am pabalaa' baal raginio ri Absalom. Ginio ra i Jonatan am i Agimaas nagindibok minugar am pansibuni giu' ra baloi ru sangulun mamagun ru kampung Bagurim. Giu' ra liliut ru baloi no mokoondo' rondo' tulubong, ilo pana siminubol ra ralalom ru tulubong no.
Andu' ru tatangan ra baloi no napabingkal ra panaub ra rasawat ru luang ru tulubong no am pasasaro' gandum ra rasawat no, saboi tulubong no kalo makito.
Ulun sinusub ri Absalom minatong ra baloi no am pangkuot ra ruandu' no, “Ati kia i Agimaas am i Jonatan?”
Taam io, “Bagu ilo ayuk liminaup ra sungoi.”
Ulun sinusub no naguyum ra karuruo ngaulun buayoi no, kaa' kalo natuum nilo. Kopongo raginio uli' ulun sinusub no ra Jirusalim.

Ingkual i Agimaas am i Jonatan intor ra tulubong no, am mataki' minugar tumuum ra Raja' Daut. Nambala' ilo ra ngaangai' ondo' nasauk. Konilo, “Nambilin i Agitopil koson mamulunsar rirun. Ginio ra ugar no raino niayuk am laup ra sungoi ti.”
Ginio ra Raja' Daut am ulun-ulun nano liminaup ra Sungoi Jordan, am nakasaboi ra sandaup paat ra tumawang.

Paat ri Agitopil nakapandai ra bilin nano kalo binaya', patampako' no palana ra kaladai nano am uli' ra bandar nano galama'. Kopongo nanalasai ra ngaangai' baalon nano, tair io galama'. Kopongo raginio linobong io ra kalabangan ru sasambaloi nano.
Nakasaboi noyo Raja' Daut ra bandar Maganaim paat ri Absalom liminaup ra Sungoi Jordan am binaya' ru ulun ru Israil. (
Napalantik noyo i Absalom ri Amasa masauk ra panglima saujor koson mamalit ri Joab. I Amasa anak ri Jitra, ulun ru Ismail;
Nangkim i Absalom am ulun-ulun nano giu' ra libung Giliad.
Paat ra Raja' Daut nakasaboi giu' ra Maganaim, inuma' io ri Sobi anak ri Nagas intor ra bandar Raba giu' ra Amon, am i Makgir anak ri Amiil intor ra Lodibar, am i Barjilai intor ra Rogilim ra Giliad.

Nagibit ilo ra mangkuk, paliuk tana', am bajang ra Raja' Daut am ulun-ulun nano. Nagibit ilo niayuk ra gandum, barli, tapung, gandum sininggala', kasang malia', kasang malia' ra masalag, ruu' maningot, kiju, krim, am kukula' ngainan domba. Nakapandai ilo ra Raja' Daut am ulun-ulun nano naitilan, pinaason, am naagui sabap ra pangkiralanan giu' ra tana' kaagisan.

Nanimung Raja' Daut ra ngaangai' ulun nano, am tinayar no ilo nasauk ra kukula' pulalai ondo' suang intor ra saribu am maatus ngaulun. Kopongo raginio nampalantik io ra kukula' ngaulun tutumula' koson maningganai ra moonong pulalai.

Kopongo raginio panusub io risilo jumalai koson mongoi pangayou ralalom talu pulalai, sigagama' tiningganai ri Joab, i Abisai boborok ri Joab, am i Itai intor ra Gat. Kon ru raja' ra ulun-ulun nano, “Aku pana maya' ramuyun.”

Kaa' taam ilo, “Pai' raja' mai. Amon ru magigiru' akai kalalaat, kapoam sampiruo intor ra suang mai matoi, kalo poyo masamaan pantula', sabap ra okou noyo ondo' uyumon nilo. Okou nogondo' logo no ra mopor ngaribu ngaulun intor ramon. Ginio ra moonsoi poyo mangator kou ra indangan ramon intor ra ralalom ru bandar.”

Raja' pana mindagu boo, “Iou noyo, maya' ramuyun.” Kopongo raginio bigor raja' giu' ra kiing ru kulobon garabang ru bandar, liliwa' saujor baris mingkual ralalom ru pulalai ra suang no intor ra saribu am maatus ngaulun.
Panusub raja' ri Joab, i Abisai am i Itai, kono, “Sabap ra aku, pai' gabuo' i Absalom, ulun mamulok no.” Ngaangai' ru saujor nokorongog ra Raja' Daut nanusub ra ngaangai' ru tingganai ru pulalai.
Kopongo raginio ugar saujor ru Raja' Daut minongoi ra liwar bandar koson mamulunsar ra saujor ru Israil, am nampapatoi ilo giu' ra kataunan ru Ipraim.
Saujor ru Israil kinala ru ulun ru Raja' Daut. Nakalaan raginio masaran kaga'; suang ruo ngoopor ngaribu ngaulun minatoi paat ra orou raginio.
Pangayawan no nakaralat ra titikop ru intok raginio, am masuang poyo ulun ondo' minatoi naaput giu' ra ralalom ru kataunan intor ra minatoi ra tatanga' ru pangayawan.

Paat ri Absalom nangura' ra baghal nano, pulali' io nakatuum ra ulun ru Raja' Daut. Baghal nano nansail ra ragana' ru puun oak ondo' makalu, saboi nakasangut ulu ri Absalom ra raan ru tataun no. Narayus baghal nano nagiru' am i Absalom natatang am nakatair ra giu' no.
Sangulun intor ra ulun ru Raja' Daut nakakito ri Absalom am nambala' ra baal raginio ri Joab, “Tuan, raitii' ni nakakito aku ri Absalom nakatair ra puun ru oak!”
Taam i Joab, “Atan? Nakito mu io? Kua pai' mu indapati' namatoi riso? Maaru' aniin tokou ra mopor ngampila' ruit pirok am rondo' abot.”

Kaa' taam ulun no, “Kabalu' pana aniin mu aku ra saribu ngampila' ruit pirok, marara' aku mamilat ra anak ungkuyon ru raja'. Akai ngaangai' nokorongog ra atan ondo' nanusuban ru raja' rirun am i Abisai, am niayuk i Itai, maa' raginio kalo mampagabu' ri Absalom, ulun mamulok no sabap ra raja'.

Kaa' amon ru manggal aku ra susuban ru raja' am pamatoi ri Absalom ra raitii' ni, maaru' baal raginio mapandayan ru raja', sabap ra mokorongog raja' ra ngaangai' no, am okou pana maaru' kalo manaung raki'.”

Indagu i Joab, “Sama' noyo! Kolondo' onong mindagu rirun.” Kopongo raginio pangalap i Joab ra talu ngantaun tutura' am potoboko' ra kubab ri Absalom. Paat raginio lakat poyo i Absalom naayag am nakatair ra puun ru oak.
Kopongo raginio mopor ngaulun ulun ri Joab nanguup ri Absalom am namatoi riso.
Panusub i Joab ra ulun manamput ra bujung maa' raginio ulun-ulun nano lumonggo' mangilou ra pulalai ru Israil.

Kopongo raginio alapo' nilo baangkai ri Absalom am papatiro' ra ralalom ru tulubong ondo' malandom giu' ra kataunan. Pinumpunan nilo tulubong no ra batu saboi masawat. Ngaangai' ulun ru Israil nagiru', am uli' ra baloi ru sigagama'.

Buoi ri Absalom naayag, nanirong io ra rondo' batu pangkaraan nano galama' giu' ra Limayak Raja', sabap ra kolondo' io ra anak ungkuyon koson manungkus ra papag nano. Ininggalanan no batu pangkaraan no sumugut ra inggalan nano galama'. Saboi ra orou raiti' batu pangkaraan no nauligan ra Batu Pangkaraan ri Absalom.
Kopongo raginio indagu i Agimaas anak ri Jadok ri Joab, “Iowo' aku mongoi uma' ra raja' am mampasaboi ra tanou moonsoi ra namayag noyo
Indagu i Joab, “Pai', orou raiti' kalo iowon kou mampasaboi ra tanou moonsoi. Posoboyon mu ginio ra orou ra bokon, kaa' sala' ka orou raiti', sabap ra anak ungkuyon ru raja' minatoi noyo.”
I Joab pana mindagu boo ra ulipon nano, ulun ru Itiopia, “Ongoi noyo balai' raja' ra atan ondo' nakito mu noyo.” Igulatur ulipon no am ongoi ra nasimbul.
Kaa' gino jajajal i Agimaas ri Joab, “Kabalu' ra atan pana ondo' masauk, iowo' aku niayuk mongoi pampasaboi ra tanou.”
Pangkuot i Joab, “Kua jajal kou mongoi, anak kuno? Kolondo' maapu muno ra tangguang koson ra baal raginio.”
Kon poyo ri Agimaas, “Kalo pana. Mongoi aku niayuk.”
Kon ri Joab, “Amon koon poyo raginio, ongoi no.” I Agimaas pana nasimbul nansusug ra ralan ondo' mansail ra Limayak Jordan, am kalo nabuoi raginio nakasigulu io ra ulipon no.

Tatanga' Raja' Daut manturung ra guang ru pangkilolot ru kulobon garabang tampilon ralalom am kulobon garabang tampilon ra liwar ru bandar no. Pagaloi mantamung no ra rasawat ru timbok am bigor giu' ra rasawat ru taap ru kulobon garabang. Paat ra io nampulolou, nakito no sangulun matong nasimbul.
Golok mantamung no ra ragana' mambala' ra baal raginio ra raja', am indagu raja', “Amon ru misangulun io, maaru' tanou moonsoi ibiton nano.”
Paat ra ulun no mamaar makasaboi,
kakito ru mantamung no sangulun poyo matong nasimbul, am golok io, “Ilai'! Mokoondo' sangulun poyo ondo' nasimbul mongoi ragiti misangulun.”
Taam raja', “Maaru' nagibit io ra tanou moonsoi niayuk.”
Taam mantamung no, “Ulun ondo' kasaa' no i Agimaas. Nakapandai aku intor ra simbul nano.”
Indagu raja', “Io ulun moonsoi, maaru' nagibit io ra tanou moonsoi.”
Golok i Agimaas koson manabi' ra raja', am igulatur am indagu, “Koompor noyo
Pangkuot raja', “Naayag kia i Absalom, ulun mamulok no?”
Taam i Agimaas, “Raja' kuno, raitii' ni paat ra aku sinusub ri Joab, panglima muno, nakito ku kumuliasou-asou ra maayo, kaa' kalo nakapandai aku ra atan nasauk.”
Kon ru raja' no, “Bigor tampilon ra giu' no.” I Agimaas pana minongoi ra sapapa' am minigor ra giu' no.
Kopongo raginio ulipon ra bansa' Itiopia no nakasaboi, am indagu ra raja', “Nagibit aku ra tanou moonsoi rirun! Paat ra orou raiti'
Pangkuot raja' no riso, “Naayag kia i Absalom, ulun mamulok no?”
Kopongo raginio taam ulipon no, “Polosoon ngaangai' pantula' muno, ngaangai' ulun giminuor rirun makaili' ra nasip ondo' nogondo' koson ra ungkuyon mamulok no.”

Kopongo nokorongog ra tanou raginio mangiluk kaga' raja', am pagaloi ra guang giu' ra rasawat ru kulobon garabang liliwa' nanulaboi, “Alii ra anak kuli! Alii ra anak kuli i Absalom! I Absalom, anak kuli! Moonsoi poyo ra aku ondo' minatoi namalit rirun, anak kuno! I Absalom, anak kuno!”
Binalaan i Joab ra Raja' Daut tatanga' manulaboi am mangulir ri Absalom.
Ginio ra kaansukan ra namanangan paat ra orou raginio nakulau nasauk ra panguliran ra ngaangai' saujor ru Raja' Daut, sabap ra nokorongog ilo ra mangulir raja' ra anak nano.
Minuli' ilo ra bandar ra nongkoror, koson ra saujor ondo' mauyu' sabap ra nagiru' noyo intor ra pangayawan.
Sinilian ru raja' bulos nano am nanulaboi ra mosongou, “Alii ra anak kuli! Anak kuli i Absalom! I Absalom, anak kuli!”

Ongoi i Joab uma' ra raja' giu' ra baloi nano am indagu, “Orou raiti' nampakauyu' kou ra ulun-ulun muno, ondo' sotopot no ilo noyo namayag ra painawo muno, ngaangai' ru anak ungkuyon am ruandu' muno, am andu'-andu' muno, am niayuk ruandu'-ruandu' parulug muno.

Inanggal mu ulun ondo' motogom rirun kaa' motogom ra ulun ondo' masisang rirun. Napainono' kou noyo ra pagawai-pagawai muno am saujor-saujor muno kolondo' toojo arati' no rirun. Ilain ra masaga' kou poyo amon ru i Absalom lakat poyo maayag am akai ngaangai' matoi.
Ginio ra ingkakat no am ongoi ra liwar am indagu koson manimayo ra guang ru ulun-ulun muno. Magibot aku ralalom inggalan ru
Kopongo raginio ingkakat raja' no am ongoi ra liwar, am panturung mamaar ra kulobon garabang. Ulun ru raja' nokorongog ra soroi raja' ra giu' no, ratong ilo ngaangai' mongoi uma'.
Liliwa' raginio ngaangai' ru ulun ru Israil nagigiru', am sigagama' minuli' ra baloi.

Ngaangai' ulun ru Israil ra titikop pagun nansasangor ra ilo po ngai'. Konilo ra rondo' am bokon, “Namayag noyo Raja' Daut ritakau intor ra pantula'. Namayag io ritakau intor ra ulun ru Palistin. Kaa' raino nagiru' io intor ri Absalom am nangiruan ra pagun ti.
Nampalantik takau ri Absalom masauk ra raja' takau, kaa' minatoi io noyo ralalom pangayawan. Ginio ra kua kolondo' sangulun pana ondo' mirot koson magibit ra Raja' Daut sumaguli'?”
Ragu raginio nakasaboi ra Raja' Daut.
Sala' ka kia akau no pabukat am aku pi ngai'? Kua akau ondo' pupus toojo makitaak maa' raginio muli' aku?”

Panusub niayuk Raja' Daut risilo mindagu ri Amasa, “Okou pabukat kuno. Intor raino lantikon tokou masauk ra panglima saujor koson malit ri Joab. Polosoon noyo i Aki Kapuuno' mamatoi raki' amon ru baal raginio kalo baalon ku!”
Ragu-ragu ru Raja' Daut no nakabunduk ra guang ru ngaangai' ulun ru Jiuda saboi nangator ilo ra bilin ra raja' maa' raginio sumaguli' ra istana mababaya' ra ngaangai' pagawai nano.
Kopongo raginio ugar raja' am pakasaboi ra Sungoi Jordan. Liliwa' raginio ulun ru Jiuda nakasaboi noyo giu' ra Gilgal koson manguma' ra raja' am magalung riso lumaup ra sungoi no.
I Siimi anak ri Gira, ulun ru Binjamin intor ra Bagurim naringkaagou minatong ra sungoi no koson tumuum ra Raja' Daut.

Nagibit io ra saribu ngaulun intor ra bansa' ru Binjamin nababaya' riso. I Jiba, ulipon ru sasambaloi ru Raja' Saul, niayuk minatong nababaya' ra mopor am limo ngaulun anak ungkuyon nano am ruo ngoopor ngaulun ulipon. Nakasaboi ilo ra Sungoi Jordan nakapagulu intor ra raja'.
Nangindangan ilo ra sasambaloi ru raja' lumaup
Paat ra raja' nakatampos koson lumaup ra sungoi, igulatur i Simii ra saang nano

am indagu, “Makiampun ra raja' kuno, makitaak aku amon ru lilianin mu kasalaan ondo' binaal kuno paat ra okou nangiruan ra Jirusalim. Pai' noyo karaa' ra lakat aku poyo makasala, am pai' noyo karaa' baal raginio.
Nakapandai aku ra natulaan aku noyo; ginio sabap ra siminigulu aku ra ngaangai' bansa' intor ra ralayo koson muma' rirun ra orou raiti'.”
Pokorongog ra ragu raginio indagu i Abisai anak ri Jiruya, “Sotopot no i Simii ukumin ra matoi sabap ra nagulas io ra raja' ondo' pinili' ru
Kaa' indagu Raja' Daut ri Abisai am maayo nano i Joab, “Pai' sombot. Kua pantipagon kau raki'? Paat ra orou raiti' nasauk aku ra raja' ru Israil poyo am kolondo' sangulun pana ukumin ra matoi.”
Kopongo raginio pagibot raja' ri Simii, “Magibot aku ra okou kalo ukumin ra matoi.”
Paat ri Mipibosit minatong intor
Taam i Mipibosit, “Raja' kuno, nakapandai kou ra aku ti kimpo'. Nanusub aku ra ulipon kuno koson mampabingkal ra palana ra kaladai maa' raginio makaaya' aku rirun. Kaa' nanumbalik io raki'.
Sinimbaalan no aku ra ragu malaat rirun. Kaa' okou koson ra malaikat ri Aki Kapuuno'. Ginio ra baalo' noyo raki' atan ayuk kasagaan muno.
Ngaangai' ru sasambaloi ru ama' kuli musiti' ukumin mu ra matoi, kaa' iniou mu aku mangakan giu' ra istana. Raino kalo baani aku makitaak ra atan-atan pana boo intor rirun.”
Kon ru raja', “Sama' noyo! Namatas aku no ra okou am i Jiba manungkus ra ngaangai' rapu' ru Raja' Saul.”
Kaa' kon ri Mipibosit, “Polosoon noyo i Jiba mangalap ra ngaangai' no. Aku ti naansayan noyo sabap ra siminaguli' kou no ra matanda'.”
I Barjilai ti matutuo noyo kaga'. Io ti balu' ngoopor ngambilor noyo. Langkaya' io kaga', am buoi ru raja' minayan giu' ra Maganaim ragili, i Barjilai ondo' manaak ra akanon ra raja'.
Kaa' kon ru raja' riso, “Baya' no raki' mongoi ra Jirusalim. Mangani' aku rirun ra ngaangai' pakuan muno ra giu'.”
Kaa' taam i Barjilai, “Aku ti kalo boo mabuoi maayag. Atan kia onong no ra aku maya' rirun mongoi ra Jirusalim?

Balu' ngoopor ngambilor aku noyo am kolondo' boo mangani' ra kasagaan raki'. Kalo boo makasia' aku ra atan ondo' akanon kapoam inumon kuno, am kalo boo mokorongog ra bolos ru ulun marimbai. Aku ti masauk ayuk ra kapaganan rirun.
Kalo maaya' aku mangapu ra bayaran ra kinaayo ru ginio. Polosoon noyo aku mangator rirun kukula' ngatumpang ayuk giu' sandaup ru Sungoi Jordan.
Mopongo raginio, polosoo' aku muli' ra baloi am matoi mamaar ra kalabangan ru matuo kuno. Gitio i Kimgam, anak kutu. Iowo' noyo io mamaya' rirun am baalo' atan ondo' karaan mu ra moonsoi riso.”
Kon ru raja', “Iou noyo, ibiton ku i Kimgam am mambaal ra atan ayuk riso sumugut ra kasagaan muno. Suai raginio, suguton ku ngaangai' kitaakon muno.”
Kopongo raginio Raja' Daut am ngaangai' ru ulun nano liminaup ra Sungoi Jordan. Pangalok Raja' Daut ri Barjilai am pambarakat riso. Kopongo raginio uli' i Barjilai ra baloi nano.
Kopongo raja' liminaup ra sungoi no, am binaya' ru ngaangai' pulalai ru Jiuda am sampiruo ra pulalai ru Israil, ongoi raja' ra Gilgal. Minaya' i Kimgam ra Raja' Daut.

Kopongo raginio ngaangai' ulun ru Israil minuma' ra raja' am pangkuot riso, “Raja' mai, kua ra pabukat mai ulun ru Jiuda mangkara' ra ilo no ondo' maaya' mangkimait am mamaya' rirun, sasambaloi muno am ngaangai' ru ulun muno lumaup ra Sungoi Jordan?”
Taam ulun ru Jiuda, “Nambaal akai koon raginio sabap ra raja' no akai po ngai'. Kua sangit kau? Raja' no kalo mambayar ra akanon mai, kapoam mangani' ramon ra tangguang.”

Indagu ulun ru Israil, “Akai ti inggopor poyo gayo ru pagapuan mai intor ramuyun ra Raja' Daut. Kabalu' pana raja' no akau po ngai', kua kataman kou ramon? Pai' liliani' ra akai no ondo' kasaa' ondo' mangatang koson magibit ra raja' muli'!”
Kaa' ulun ru Jiuda mingkotog poyo mampasalula' ra pagapuan nilo intor ra ulun ru Israil.
Ginio ra nanatang ulun ru Israil ra Raja' Daut am baya' ri Siba. Kaa' ulun ru Jiuda gumagaya' ra Raja' Daut am namaya' riso intor ra Sungoi Jordan saboi ra Jirusalim.
Nanusub raja' ri Amasa, “Timungo' ulun ru Jiuda am saguli' no ragiti mabaya' risilo ra buoi ru talu ngoorou.”
Minongoi i Amasa panimung ra ulun ru Jiuda kaa' kalo siminaguli' io ra paat ondo' inaru' ru raja'.

Kon ru raja' ri Abisai, “I Siba no mantipagon poyo ritakau intor ri Absalom. Ginio ra ibito' noyo ulun-ulun kuno am ilowo' io. Amon ru kalo, maaru' makuasa' no kukula' bandar mokoondo' ra kubu, am magiru' intor ritakau.”
Kopongo raginio ondo' tiningganai ri Abisai, ulun ri Joab am pulalai ru mantamung ra raja', am niayuk ngaangai' ru saujor ra bokon minugar intor ra Jirusalim koson mangilou ri Siba.

Paat ra ilo nakasaboi giu' ra batu maayo giu' ra Gibion, timinuum i Amasa risilo. Paat raginio nambayang i Joab ra bayang pangayawan, am ilang nano makaangkap am niayuk pinaabil ra awak nano. Paat ri Joab jiminalai ugar, nautus ilang nano.
Indagu i Joab ri Amasa, “Atan tanou, pabukat?” Liliwa' raginio guguuton ri Joab jangut ri Amasa ra kalindu' pamiris nano koson mangalok riso.

Kalo nakito ri Amasa ilang ra kalindu' pamiris ri Joab. Pulali' ri Joab nopotobok ra ilang no ra tinai' ti Amasa saboi suang ru tinai' no nayayar ra tana'. I Joab kalo pana monobok riso poyo sabap ra minatoi i Amasa ra nagaras.
Kopongo raginio i Joab am boborok nano i Abisai narayus nangilou ri Siba.
Sangulun intor ra saujor ri Joab minigor mamaar ra baangkai ri Amasa am golok, “Osoi ondo' maya' ri Joab am Raja' Daut, musiti' maya' ri Joab!”

Baangkai ri Amasa ondo' notomok ra raraa' nakabanta' giu' ra tanga' ru ralan. Paat ra saujor ri Joab nakakito ra ngaangai' ru ulun ondo' mansail muog ra giu' no, ralaato' no baangkai no ra padang am taubi' no ra konoon.
Pakabanding baangkai no intor ra ralan, ngaangai' ru ulun namparayus ra pangkiralanan minaya' ri Joab koson mangilou ri Siba.
Nansail i Siba ra titikop intok ru bansa' ru Israil. Kopongo raginio nakasaboi io giu' ra bandar Abil-Bit-Maakga, am ngaangai' ru bansa' ru Bikri

Ulun ri Joab nokorongog ra soroi i Siba ra giu' am nampaliput ilo ra bandar no. Nambaal ilo ra punsu masawat tampilon ra liwar ru timbok, am tumalimpuun mangkali ra tana' ra ragana' ru timbok koson mampatuan raginio.
Giu' ra bandar no mokoondo' sangulun ruandu' ondo' mapintar. Intor ra ralalom ru bandar no golok io, “Rongog no! Rongog no! Susubo' i Joab matong ragiti. Masaga' aku mindagu riso.”
Ratong i Joab, am pangkuot ruandu' no, “Okou kia i Joab?”
Taam i Joab, “Iou.”
Kon ru ruandu' no, “Rongogo' raguon kutu.”
Kon ri Joab, “Iou noyo, rongogon ku.”
Kon ru ruandu' no, “Ragili ulun maindalom mindagu, ‘Ongoi no ra bandar Abil ra makitulu'!’ – am ginio noyo baalon nilo.
Bandar maiti maayo, rondo' ra bandar ondo' namimio toojo am gumagaya' toojo ra pagun ru Israil. Kua kia masaga' kou mapalunsai raginio? Masaga' kou kia mapalunsai ra longgom ru
Taam i Joab, “Totopot kalo! Kuayan kuno kalo mapalunsai kapoam mamuso ra bandar min ti!

Ginio sala' ka inatang mai. Sangulun ondo' makainggalan ri Siba anak ri Bikri, intor ra intok kabuluran ru Ipraim, nanalimpuun ra gumuor ra Raja' Daut. Pataako' ulun no, am lumugut aku intor ra bandar ti.”
Kon ru ruandu' no, “Iou noyo. Papatiron mai ulu nano rirun intor ra rasawat ru timbok ti.”

Kopongo raginio nansusunur ruandu' no am mamagun ru bandar no liliwa' nambala' ra inatangan nano. Kopongo raginio iningguluan nilo ulu ri Siba am papatiro' ginio ri Joab intor ra rasawat ru timbok. Kopongo raginio nanamput i Joab ra bujung koson ra tatandu' ra ulun-ulun nano mangiruan ra bandar no. Ulun-ulun ri Joab minuli', am io pana minuli' ra Jirusalim muma' ra raja'.
Gitilo noyo pagawai maatang ondo' linantik ru Raja' Daut:
Panglima ru titikop saujor ru Israil: I Joab
Tingganai mantamung ra Raja' Daut: I Binaya anak ri Joyada
Tingganai ru ulun inulipon: I Adoram
Ulun manutun ra rapu' ru pagun: I Josapat anak ri Agilud
Mamamatik ru pagun: I Siya
Imam: I Jadok am i Abiatar
Imam giu' ra Istana: I Ira intor ra bandar Jair.
Paat ra pamarintaan ru Raja' Daut, bitilan ra mapaja' kaga' igondo' nasauk buoi talu ngambilor. Ginio ra pangkuot Raja' Daut ra

Ulun ru Gibion sala' ka ulun ru Israil; ilo no santimungan boborok bansa' ru Amori. Ulun ru Israil nambantu' koson manindung risilo, kaa' Raja' Saul minirot koson mamuso risilo sabap ra magalung io ra kaatangan ru ulun ru Israil am Jiuda.)
Ginio ra pampiau Raja' Daut ra ulun ru Gibion am pangkuot risilo, “Atan kia maalap ku kabaal ramuyun? Masaga' aku mamuli' ra kasalaan ondo' binaal ramuyun, maa' raginio barakaton min ulun ru
Konilo, “Pansangaran mai ra Raja' Saul am sasambaloi nano kalo maalap kasalasai ra pirok kapoam mas. Kaa' marara' akai mamatoi ra sangulun pana ulun ru Israil.”
Indagu boo Raja' Daut, “Amon koon poyo raginio, atan kasagaan min baalon ku?”
Taam ilo, “Masaga' Raja' Saul mamuso ramon ngaangai' maa' raginio maliom intor ra titikop ru Israil.
Ginio ra, pataako' tulu' ngaulun ungkuyon intor ra papag nano maa' raginio matair mai ilo ra saang ru
Taam raja', “Iou noyo, pataakon ku ilo ramuyun.”

Kaa' Raja' Daut napataak ri Armoni am Mipibosit risilo, iono ruo ngaulun anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Saul ondo' inanak ri Rijpa anak ri Aya. Pinataak niayuk ri Raja' Daut limo ngaulun anak ungkuyon ri Mirab anak ruandu' ru Raja' Saul, iono anak-anak ri Mirab am ralaki nano i Adriil anak ri Barjilai, ondo' intor ra Migola.
Raja' Daut napataak risilo ra ulun ru Gibion. Tinair ilo ru ulun ru Gibion giu' ra rasawat ru gunung ra saang ru

Kopongo raginio i Rijpa, ruandu' parulug ru Raja' Saul, napaapin ra konoon karung ra io galama' giu' ra rasawat ru batu intok ru baangkai-baangkai no nakabanta'. Minayan io ra giu' no intor ra talimpuun ru bulintok mangkumos saboi ra rasam riminatu' ra bulintok ru tumutu' raun. Paat ra matawang mangunjau io ra susuit intor ra morop ra baangkai, am paat ra rondom, manindung io ra baangkai no intor ra bibiag masigo.
Paat ra Raja' Daut nokorongog ra atan ondo' binaal ri Rijpa,

Raja' Daut minongoi pangalap ra bungul-bungul ru Raja' Saul am anak ungkuyon nano i Jonatan, intor ra mamagun ru bandar Jabis giu' ra Giliad. (Mamagun ru Jabis nantakou ra bungul-bungul no intor ra padang ru bandar giu' ra Bit-San, intok napatairan ru ulun ru Palistin ra baangkai-baangkai no paat ra orou ilo namatoi ra Raja' Saul giu' ra Gunung Gilboa.)
Inalap ru Raja' Daut bungul-bungul ru Raja' Saul am i Jonatan, am nanimung niayuk ra bungul-bungul ru tulu' ngaulun ondo' tinair no.

Kopongo raginio bungul-bungul ru Raja' Saul am i Jonatan, am niayuk bungul-bungul ru tulu' ngaulun no linobong giu' ra kalabangan ri Kis, ama' ru Raja' Saul, giu' ra Jila ralalom ru wilayah Binjamin, koson ra ondo' nanusuban ru raja'. Kopongo raginio bagu no nangiou i Aki Kapuuno' ra pakiasian nilo tayar ru pagun no.

Rondo' pangayawan nasauk poyo ra ulun ru Palistin am ulun ru Israil, Raja' Daut am ulun-ulun nano pana minongoi pangayou manggal ra ulun ru Palistin. Ralalom ru rondo' pangayawan no naagui Raja' Daut.

Paat raginio sangulun maayo ulun makainggalan ri Jisbi-Binob mangkara' ra mapatoi no Raja' Daut. Maayo ulun no nagibit ra rondo' tutura' tambaga' ondo' bagat no olo'-olo' 3.5 ngakilogram, am inabil no rondo' ilang ondo' baguon.

Kaa' i Abisai anak ri Jiruya, minatong nangindangan ra Raja' Daut. Binulunsar ri Abisai maayo ulun no am namatoi riso. Kopongo raginio ulun ru Raja' Daut nakitaak maa' raginio Raja' Daut mambantu' ra kalo boo mongoi pangayou mabaya' risilo. Konilo, “Okou kalansanan ru Israil. Marara' akai matatakan rirun.”
Kopongo raginio nasauk rondo' poyo pangayawan ru ulun ru Israil am ulun ru Palistin giu' ra Gob. I Sibkai, ulun intor ra Gusa, namatoi ra sangulun maayo ulun makainggalan ri Sap.
Ralalom ru pangayawan ra bokon ra ulun ru Palistin giu' ra Gob, i Ilganan anak ri Jair,

Kopongo raginio mokoondo' rondo' poyo pangayawan giu' ra Gat. Giu' no mokoondo' sangulun maayo ulun ondo' masaga' kaga' mangayou. Mokoondo' io ra onom bubua' ru kalindu' ra moonong kalindu' am kalayam nano.
Magasab io ra ulun ru Israil, am i Jonatan anak ri Simia, namatoi riso. I Simia iono maayo ungkuyon ru Raja' Saul.
Kaapat-apat ngaulun no papag ru maayo ulun intor ra Gat am ngaangai' no pinatoi ru Raja' Daut am ulun-ulun nano.
Kopongo
Io koson ra kubu mapiot raki'.
I Aki Kapuuno' kuno intok sindungan kuno,
maayag aku mabaya' Riso.
Manindung Io raki' koson ra perisai;
manaung am magalung Io raki' maa' raginio maayag aku.
Io mamamayag kuno;
Io manindung raki' am mamayag raki' intor ra kalaatan.
Mampiau aku ra
am mamayag Io raki' intor ra pantula' kuno.
Kinulun ru kapatayan nampaliput raki',
liur ru kapusaan nampalinjob raki'.
Poros ru kapatayan nampaliput raki',
am lobong mapaawang ra landak raki'.
Ralalom ru kapaganan mampiau aku ra
mampiau aku ri Aki Kapuuno' kuno ra makiindangan.
Ralalom ru Baloi Nano mangkirongog Io ra bolos kuno;
mampalio Io ra piau kuno.
Tana' ti pana monontol am mogonggon boo;
lonor ru limbowon monontol am mauyog,
sabap ra sumangit i Aki Kapuuno'!
Lisun mingkual intor ra arung Nano,
apui am baa mingkual intor ra kabang Nano.
Lapako' No limbowon am tuun
mabaya' ra gaun molondom ra ragana' ru kalayam Nano.
Malibok Io mansiab ra siminakoi ra kirub;
mansiab Io giu' ra rasawat ru kawo ru angin.
Sinakubung No inan Nano ra kalandaman;
gaun majuut ondo' makapal liminiput Riso;
baa ru apui mapaang intor ra ganit giu' ra saang Nano.
Kopongo raginio naningkalur
am Ondo' Masawat Kaga' noporongog ra bolos Nano.
Nampalabus Io ra anak panah Nano,
am nampatutuliar ra pantula' Nano.
Napapiat io ra ganit saboi nangkinibit risilo nagiru'.
Lonor ru raat nasukab,
am sonor ru tana' ti nasukiap,
paat ra
am nompogolok ra siminangit risilo.
Intor ra rasawat
nampaguut Io raki',
am namunduk raki' miningkual intor ra timug ondo' malandom.
Namayag Io raki' intor ra pantula' kuno ondo' maikang,
am intor risilo ondo' masisang raki',
sabap ra maikang ilo kaga' raki'.
Paat ra aku makakapaganan, mamulunsar ilo raki',
kaa'
Nampalabus Io raki' intor ra karaat;
Namayag Io raki' sabap ra maansayan Io raki'.
Nambalos
Nambarakat Io raki' sabap ra kolondo' sala kuno.
Gumagaya' aku ra ukum ru
kalo mangiruan aku ri Aki Kapuuno' kuno.
Giminagaya' aku ra ngaangai' ru ukum Nano;
kalo igondo' aku anggal ra susuban Nano.
Nakapandai Io ra kolondo' ruruko kuno,
am minggalur aku intor ra kasalaan.
Ginio ra nambalos Io raki' sabap ra nambaal aku ra motopot,
sabap nakapandai Io ra kolondo' sala kuno.
Iou
am moonsoi Kou kaga' ra ulun
Mampakito Kou ra matulai Kou ra ulun ondo' mapasau,
kaa' tumula' Kou ra ulun ondo' malaat.
Mamayag Kou ra ulun ondo' minggana' guang,
kaa' mampainggana' Kou ra ulun malilimbau.
Iou
Okou mampatawang ra kalandaman kuno.
Mangani' Kou raki' ra kaikangan koson mamulunsar ra pantula' kuno,
am kuasa' koson mamasut ra timbok nilo.
Mapara' kinaindon ru binaal ri Aki Kapuuno' ti,
ragu ru
Io koson ra perisai
ra tayar ru ngaangai' ulun ondo' sumindung Riso.
i Aki Kapuuno' ayuk manaung ritakau.
Io noyo i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' manindung raki';
napasauk Io ra ralan kuno matanda'.
nagalung Io ra pamayagan kuno giu' ra kagunungan.
Nangila' Io raki' koson mangayou,
maa' raginio makapambakur aku ra busur ondo' maikang kaga'.
Iou
pangindanganan Muno nakasauk raki' ra maayo.
Magalung Kou raki' maa' raginio kalo marakop aku,
am kalo igondo' aku karatu'.
Mangilou aku ra pantula' kuno am mampaala risilo;
kalo lumonggo' aku ru kalo poyo mapuso ku ilo.
Mampalamba' aku risilo saboi ra ilo kalo makasukal;
maaba' ilo sabap ra naala ra saang kuno.
Mangani' Kou raki' ra ikang koson tumula',
am kamanangan ra pantula' kuno.
Okou mangkinibit ra pantula' magiru' intor raki';
mamuso aku ra ulun ondo' masisang raki'.
Maguyum ilo ra pangindanganan,
kaa' kolondo' osoi pana mamayag risilo;
mampiau ilo ra
Mangumok aku risilo, saboi ilo masauk koson ra kaau;
kikinjangin ku ilo koson ra losok ra ralan.
Namayag Kou raki' intor ra ulun ondo' gumuor,
am nampasauk raki' ra manguasa' ra bansa'-bansa';
bansa' ondo' kalo mauligan kuno raino nasauk ra mamagun kuno.
Bansa' ru bokon kumuku' raki',
am gumagaya' paat ra ilo mokorongog ra susuban kuno.
Nariu' kinabaani nilono;
monontol ilo am ingkual
Naayag
Potonowo' noyo katulayan ri Aki Kapuuno' Mamamayag kuno!
Mangani' Io raki' ra kamanangan ra pantula' kuno;
nanguasa' Io ra bansa'-bansa' ra saang kuno,
am mamayag raki' intor ra pantula' kuno.
Iou
am manindung raki' intor ra ulun malaat.
marimbai aku ra rimbai mongompor Rirun.
Nangani' i Aki Kapuuno' ra kamanangan maayo ra raja' pinili' Nano;
masalok Io motogom ra ulun pinili' Nano,
iono i Daut am papag nano, koson ra sabubuoi no.

Raja' Daut anak ri Isai iono ulun ondo' sinauk ri Aki Kapuuno' ra ulun maayo, am pinili' ri Aki Kapuuno' ri Jakub nasauk ra raja'. Nanulis Raja' Daut ra masuang rimbai ondo' moonsoi ra Israil, am gitio noyo ragu pupus nano:
Ambiluo ru
ragu Nano soroi ra bibil kuno.
Minindagu noyo i Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil;
indagu manindung ru Israil no raki',
“Raja' ondo' mamarinta ra matimpok,
ondo' mamarinta ra pampagagayaan ri Aki Kapuuno',
raja' no koson ra sirang ru mato ru orou ra susuab ti
paat ra susuab toojo bulintok ru matawang limbowon no.
Io koson ra sirang ru mato ru orou malupus rumasam,
ondo' mambaal ra sakot moonsoi kinasansam ra manguliat.”
Koon raginio noyo i Aki Kapuuno' mambarakat ra papag kuno,
sabap ra Io nambaal ra nabantuan ondo' mantilayun raki',
nabantuan ondo' kalo masulang,
bantu' ondo' kalo makulau.
Ginio noyo guangon ayuk ru guang kuno;
ginio noyo ondo' masauk ra kamanangan kuno,
am maaru' i Aki Kapuuno' manugut raginio.
Kaa' ulun ondo' kalo gumagaya' ri Aki Kapuuno'
koson ra ruui ondo' pinapatir.
Kalindu' ru ulun kalo makaguut raginio;
kolondo' sangulun pana masaga' mangambong raginio
ra kalo mamakai ra basi' kapoam tutura'.
Ulun koson raginio solobon koyoo'.
Gitio noyo inggalan ru ngaangai' saujor ru Raja' Daut ondo' mauligan kaga': Ondo' kasaa' i Isbaal, ulun ru Gakmoni, tingganai ru “Pulalai Katalu”.

Ulun karuo ralalom ru “Pulalai Katalu” i Iliajar anak ri Dodo, intor ra bansa' ru Agogi. Sangarawan raginio, i Iliajar am Raja' Daut nangayou ra ulun ru Palistin ondo' natitimung noyo koson mangayou. Paat raginio pulalai ru Israil liminugut noyo,
kaa' narayus i Iliajar nangayou ra ulun ru Palistin saboi kalindu' nano kiminotog, am kalo malabusan no ilang nano. Paat ra orou raginio

Ulun katalu ralalom ru “Pulalai Katalu” i Sama anak ri Agi, intor ra Garar. Paat raginio ulun ru Palistin natimung giu' ra Ligi, giu' ra rondo' umo ru kasang malia'. Saujor ru Israil nagiru' intor ra ulun ru Palistin,
kaa' narayus i Sama soroi am nangayou giu' ra umo no. Namatoi io am nangala ra ulun ru Palistin saboi nasugut no nampaguut ra umo no. Koon raginio noyo

Paat ra tatakip noyo bulintok mangkumos, talu ngaulun intor ra “Pulalai Talu Ngoopor” timinuun ra Luang Batu Adulam. Paat raginio soroi Raja' Daut ra ralalom ru luang batu no. Sampulalai ulun ru Palistin nangkim giu' ra Limayak Ripaim.
Paat raginio Raja' Daut soroi ra sambuluran ondo' mokoondo' ra kubu, am sampulalai ulun ru Palistin nanguasa' noyo ra Bitligim.
Moondom Raja' Daut ra kampung nano galama', am kono, “Mapara' piboo bonsoi no amon ru mokoondo' ulun mangani' raki' ra timug inumon intor ra tulubong mamaar ra kulobon garabang giu' ra Bitligim!”

Nokorongog ra ragu raginii, talu ngaulun saujor ondo' mauligan kaga' no nanubol ra nangkiman ru ulun ru Palistin giu' ra Bitligim. Nansagou ilo ra timug intor ra tulubong no am ibito' ra Raja' Daut. Kaa' marara' Raja' Daut manginum ra timug no, sasari' no timug no koson ra taak ra
Kon ru Raja' Daut, “Iou
Koon raginio noyo kinabaani ru talu ngaulun saujor ondo' mauligan kaga' no.

Boborok ri Joab, iono i Abisai (ina' nilo iono i Jiruya) tingganai ru “Pulalai Talu Ngoopor”. Nakaili' i Abisai mangayou ra talu ngaatus ngaulun am namatoi risilo ngaangai' ra tutura' nano. Ginio ra nauligan io kaga' ra gino ngai' ru “Pulalai Talu Ngoopor”.
Io noyo ondo' sasabiton toojo ra gino ngai' ru “Pulalai Talu Ngoopor” am nasauk io ra tingganai nilo, kaa' io ti kalo maayo poyo intor ra “Pulalai Katalu”.

Sangulun saujor ra bokon ondo' mauligan kaga' iono i Binaya anak ri Joyada intor ra Kabjiil. Io ti baani kaga', am nakapamatoi ra ruo ngaulun tutumula' mapanggol intor ra Moab. Sangarawan raiti, paat ra salji rumatu', siminubol io ra luang batu am pamatoi ra sanginan singa'.
Nakapamatoi io niayuk ra sangulun Misir, ondo' makainan ra maayo am nantutura'. Namulunsar io ra ulun no ra balantan nano. Nampagaau io poyo ra tutura' ru maayo ulun no am namatoi riso ra tutura' no.
Koon raginio noyo binaal moonsoi ri Binaya, sangulun intor ra “Pulalai Talu Ngoopor”.
Ralalom ru pulalai raginio i Binaya ondo' mauligan kaga', kaa' io kalo maayo poyo intor ra “Pulalai Katalu”. Raja' Daut nampalantik riso masauk ra tingganai mantamung nano.
Ulun ra bokon intor ra “Pulalai Talu Ngoopor” no iono:
I Asail, boborok ri Joab
I Ilganan anak ri Dodo ulun ru Bitligim
I Sama am i Ilika ulun ru Garod
I Gilis ulun ru Palti
I Ira anak ri Ikis ulun ru Tikoa
I Abiijir ulun ru Anatot
I Mibunai ulun ru Gusa
I Jalmon ulun ru Agogi
I Magarai ulun ru Nitopa
I Gilib anak ri Baana ulun ru Nitopa
I Itai anak ri Ribai ulun ru Gibia giu' ra wilayah ru bansa' ru Binjamin
I Binaya ulun ru Piraton
I Gidai intor ra limayak-limayak ru Gaas
I Abialbon ulun ru Araba
I Ajmawit ulun Bagurim
I Ilyaba ulun ru Saalbon
Anak-anak ri Jasyin
I Jonatan
I Sama ulun ru Garari
I Agiam anak ri Sarar ulun ru Garari
I Ilipilit anak ri Agasbai ulun ru Maakga
I Iliam anak ri Agitopil ulun ru Gilo
I Gijro
I Pairai ulun ru Arbi
I Jigal anak ri Natan ulun ru Joba
I Bani ulun ru Gad
I Jilik ulun ru Amon
I Nagarai ulun ru Biirot, magibit ra kinandoi mangayou ri Joab
I Ira am i Garib ulun ru Jitri
I Uria ulun ru Git.
Ngaangai' nilo 37 ngaulun saujor ondo' mauligan kaga'.
Siminangit poyo

Kopongo raginio panusub Raja' Daut ri Joab, panglima mangayou nano, “Ongoi no mabaya' ra ulun-ulun tutumula' muno ra ngaangai' bansa' ru Israil giu' ra titikop pagun koson mampaugar ra panguntaban. Moogot aku makapandai ra suang nilo.”
Kaa' kon ri Joab ra raja', “Gama' ru
Kaa' gumogot raja' ra baalon panusuban nano. Ginio ra i Joab am ulun-ulun tutumula' nano minongoi panguntob ra ulun ru Israil.

Kopongo nakalaup ra Sungoi Jordan, i Joab am ulun-ulun nano nangkim giu' ra tampilon rabugus ru Aroir rondo' bandar giu' ra tatanga' ru limayak Gad. Intor ra giu' no minongoi ilo ra ralayo, minongoi ra Jaijir,

am narayus minongoi ra Giliad am minongoi ra Kadis giu' ra wilayah ru ulun ru Git. Kopongo raginio minongoi ilo ra Dan, am intor ra Dan liminikou ilo minongoi ra tampilon kalasaan, minongoi ra bandar Saida.

Intor ra giu' no minongoi ilo ra rabugus, minongoi ra Tirus, bandar ondo' mokoondo' ra kubu no. Tunggul no minongoi ilo ra ngaangai' bandar ru ulun ru Giwi am ulun ru Kanaan, am pupus no minongoi ra Birsyiba, giu' ra tampilon ra rabugus ru Jiuda.
Inongoi nilo titikop pagun ralalom ru buoi siam ngansila' am ruo ngoopor ngoorou, am saguli' ilo ra Jirusalim.
Nambala' ilo ra raja' intor ra suang ru ungkuyon ondo' maaya' masauk ra saujor: 800,000 ngaulun ra Israil am 500,000 ngaulun giu' ra Jiuda.
Kaa' kalupus nanguntob ra ulun no, makaliman Raja' Daut ra makasala. Kono boo ra
Indagu
ratong i Gad minuma' riso am nampasaboi ra ragu ru
Taam Raja' Daut, “Aku ti magalabo kaga'! Kaa' marara' aku ukumin ru ulun. Polosoon noyo
Ginio ra pinaratong ru
Malaikat ru
Nakito ru Raja' Daut malaikat ondo' tatanga' mamatoi ra mamagun no, kono boo ra
Paat orou raginio niayuk minatong i Gad minuma' ra Raja' Daut am indagu riso, “Ongoi pagaloi ra intok pangagikan ra gandum longgom ri Arauna, am baali'
Raja' Daut pana minugar boo, sumugut ra nanusuban ru
Pagilong i Arauna ra ragana', am pakakito ra raja' am niayuk pagawai-pagawai nano magaloi sumuku' ra intok nano. I Arauna pana igulatur ra saang ru Raja' Daut,
am pangkuot, “Atan kuayan ru ratangan mutu raja'?”
Taam Raja' Daut, “Koson mambali ra intok pangagikan ra gandum mutu, am koson mambaal ra altar ra tayar ru
Indagu i Arauna, “Raja' kuno, alapo' ayuk am papataak no ra atan ayuk ondo' kasagaan muno ra
Tinaakan ri Arauna ngaangai' no ra raja',
Kaa' taam raja', “Kalo! Masaga' aku mambali raginio. Marara' aku mapataak ra
Kopongo raginio nambaal Raja' Daut ra altar ra giu' no ra tayar ru
Raino ti Raja' Daut matutuo noyo kaga'. Kabalu' pana ulipon-ulipon nano mangusib riso ra bajang, lakat io poyo masimuan.
Ginio ra indagu pagawai-pagawai nano riso, “Iowo' akai no maguyum ra sangulun ralaa koson masimpung rirun am magalung rirun. Rumulug io rirun am mampalasu' ra inan muno.”

Kopongo raginio naguyum pagawai-pagawai ra sangulun ralaa ondo' mantalur giu' ra titikop ru pagun Israil. Nakatuum ilo ra sangulun ralaa ondo' ininggalanan i Abisag giu' ra Sunim, am inibit io ra raja'.
Mantalur kaga' ralaa no. Mangandoi am magalung io ra raja', kaa' raja' no kalo namparulug riso.
Nansunur i Adonia ri Joab (ina' ri Joab inggalan no i Jiruya) am Imam Abiatar. Karuo-ruo nilo nangiou koson manungka' ri Adonia.
Kaa' Imam Jadok, i Binaya anak ri Joyada, Nabi Natan, i Simii, i Rii, am magalung galama' ru Raja' Daut kalo manungka' ri Adonia.

Paat ra sangarawan nampataak i Adonia ra taak simbalui domba, sapi' gawayan, am anak ru sapi' ondo' molomok. Ngaangai' ru taak simbalui no pinataak giu' ra Batu Kukuo, mamaar ra taur ru timug In-Rogil. Nampiau i Adonia ra anak-anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Daut ra bokon no, am pagawai-pagawai ru raja' intor ra Jiuda mongoi ra bunsag no,
kaa' kalo nampiau io ri Salomo boborok pansukapu nano, Nabi Natan, i Binaya, am magalung galama' ru raja'.
Amon ru masaga' kou mamayag ra painawo muno galama' am painawo ri Salomo, anak ungkuyon muno, rongogo' noyo bilin kutu.
Ongoi no ra mataki' uma' ra Raja' Daut, am kuati' io, ‘Sala' ka kia okou nambantu' ra i Salomo, anak ungkuyon muno malit rirun koson ra raja'? Kua kia raino i Adonia no boo nasauk ra raja'?’ ”
Kon poyo ru Nabi Natan, “Tatanga' ra okou mindagu ra Raja' Daut ra maagu no, matong aku am mangiou ra ragu-ragu muno.”
Ginio ra uma' i Batsyiba ra raja' giu' ra lamin kaalangan nano. Matutuo noyo kaga' raja' no am i Abisag, ralaa intor ra Sunim no tatanga' magalung riso.
Igulatur i Batsyiba ra saang ru raja', am pangkuot raja' no riso, “Atan kia kitaakon muno?”
Taam i Batsyiba, “Okou raja' nambantu' noyo ralalom inggalan ru
Kaa' raino i Adonia noyo nasauk ra raja', am okou no kalo nakapandai ra baal raginio.

Nampataak io noyo ra masuang sapi' gawayan, domba, am anak ru sapi' ondo' molomok koson ra taak simbalui, am niayuk nampiau ra anak-anak ungkuyon muno, Imam Abiatar, am i Joab, panglima saujor muno, mongoi ra bunsag no, kaa' i Adonia no kalo nampiau ri Salomo ti, anak ungkuyon mutu.
Raino ngaangai' ru mamagun tatanga' maginaa ra ragu muno intor ra osoi ondo' malit rirun koson ra raja'.
Amon ru kalo mamatas kou raginio, maaru' ra okou kakapatoi no, i Salomo, anak ungkuyon muno am aku ti uwin ra manumbalik.”
Liliwa' i Batsyiba mindagu, Nabi Natan nakasaboi ra istana.
Binalaan Raja' Daut ra ratangan ru Nabi Natan, am umpos Nabi Natan am igulatur ra saang ru raja'.
Indagu Nabi Natan ra raja', “Nakaindagu kou kia raja' ra i Adonia malit rirun koson ra raja'?

Paat ra orou raiti' nampataak i Adonia ra masuang sapi' gawayan, domba am anak ru sapi' ondo' kinolomok koson ra taak simbalui. Nampiau io ra ngaangai' ru anak ungkuyon muno, i Joab panglima ru saujor muno
Kaa' kalo nampiau i Adonia raki', Imam Jadok, i Binaya anak ri Joyada am i Salomo.
Nangiou kou kia ri Adonia mambaal ra ngaangai' no ra kalo nambala' ra pagawai-pagawai muno ra osoi ondo' malit rirun koson ra raja'?”
Indagu Raja' Daut, “Susubo' kon i Batsyiba mumpos am muma' saguli'.” Umpos i Batsyiba am bigor ra saang ru raja'.
Kon ru raja' no riso, “Nambantu' aku ralalom inggalan ru
ra orou raiti' suguton ku bantu' kuli rirun ralalom inggalan ru
Igulatur i Batsyiba am indagu, “Naayag kou, raja' kuno!”
Kopongo raginio pampiau Raja' Daut ri Jadok, i Natan am i Binaya. Paat ra ilo minuma',
kon ru Raja' Daut risilo, “Ibito' i Salomo, anak ungkuyon kuno, mongoi ra taur ru timug giu' ra Gigon. Polosoon io mangura' ra baghal kuno am ibito' min pagawai-pagawai ru istana mababaya' ramuyun.
Giu' no musiti' i Jadok am i Natan mapalantik ri Salomo masauk ra raja' ru Israil. Mopongo raginio musiti' kau manamput ra bujung am gumolok, ‘Naayag Raja' Salomo!’
Sumbayaa' io sumaguli' ragiti maa' raginio manturung ra kurisi' ru raja' kutu. Malit io raki' koson ra raja' sabap ra io noyo pinili' kuno koson masauk ra panguasa' ra Israil am Jiuda.”
Taam i Binaya, “Iou, raja' kuno. Gama' ru baal ragitio iniou ru
Koson ra
Kopongo raginio i Jadok, i Natan, i Binaya am ulun magalung galama' ru raja' nangkimait ri Salomo nangura' ra baghal ru Raja' Daut, am namaya' riso mongoi ra taur ru timug giu' ra Gigon.
