Paat ra sangarawan no, Raja' Bingadad, raja' ru pagun Siria nanimung ra ngaangai' pulalai ru saujor nano. Raja' Bingadad no inindangan ru talu ngoopor am ruo ngaulun raja' ra bokon nababaya' ra kuda am kurita' kuda nilo. Kopongo raginio Raja' Bingadad jiminalai am nagawang, am niayuk namulunsar ra bandar Samaria.
Pangator Raja' Bingadad ra kukula' ngaulun sinusub mongoi ra Raja' Agab, raja' ru Israil, giu' ra bandar no nabaya' ra bilin, “Raja' Bingadad mangitaak
maa' raginio pataakon mu pirok am mas ru raja', andu'-andu', am niayuk anak-anak muno ondo' mapanggol kaga' riso.”
Taam Raja' Agab, “Balai' Raja' Bingadad no ra mangiou aku. Iowon io mangalap raki' am ngaangai' rapu' kuno.”

Kopongo raginio ulun-ulun sinusub no siminaguli' ra Raja' Agab am napasaboi ra rondo' poyo pangitaakan intor ra Raja' Bingadad, “Ragili Raja' Bingadad no nangitaak maa' raginio mapataak kou ra pirok am mas muno, andu'-andu' am niayuk anak-anak muno.
Kaa' raino manusub io ra ulun-ulun tutumula' nano manguliat ra istana muno am baloi ru pagawai-pagawai muno. Mangalap ilo ra ngaangai' ondo' karaan ra mologo risilo.

Pampiau Raja' Agab ra ngaangai' tingganai ru pagun nano am indagu, “Ilai', ulun no masaga' mamuso ritakau. Nangator ulun no ra tanou raki' am mangitaak maa' raginio andu'-andu' am anak-anak kuno, pirok am mas kuno pataakon riso, am nangiou aku.”
Kaa' taam tingganai-tingganai am mamagun, “Pai' lioo' ulun raginio, pai' gagayaa' pangitaakan nano!”
Ginio ra indagu Raja' Agab ra ulun-ulun sinusub no, “Balai' raja' no ra mangiou aku ra pangitaakan no ra kasaa' no, kaa' kalo mangiou aku ra pangitaakan no ra karuo no.”
Ugar ulun-ulun sinusub no, am saguli' poyo am papasaboi ra ragu

intor ra Raja' Bingadad, “Raja' maino matong ra masuang kaga' saujor koson mamuso ra bandar mutu, saboi makapagibit ilo ra kaau intor ra nangaurus ru bandar ralalom ru kalindu' nilo. Nagibot ilo maa' raginio dewa-dewa mamatoi riso amon ru kalo mambaal io raginio!”
Taam Raja' Agab, “Balai' Raja' Bingadad ra sangulun saujor toojo maansayan ra kinaayo nano malupus pampatayan, sala' ka kalo poyo raginio!”

Nakaapu Raja' Bingadad ra taaman ru Raja' Agab no paat ra io am raja'-raja' nangindangan riso no tatanga' manginum giu' ra pangkiman nilono. Nanusub Raja' Bingadad ra saujor nano tumampos koson mangayou, am ilo pana timinampos.
Liliwa' raginio, sangulun nabi minuma' ra Raja' Agab am indagu, “Koon raginio ragu ru
Pangkuot Raja' Agab, “Osoi kia maningganai ra pamulunsaran?”
Taam nabi no, “Sumugut ra ragu ru
Pangkuot raja', “Kaa' osoi kia ondo' mamuun ra pamulunsaran?”
Taam nabi no, “Okou no raja'!”

Ginio ra pampiau raja' no ra ngaangai' saujor mamulok ondo' tiningganai ru pagawai-pagawai ru libung, suang no 232 ngaulun saujor. Kopongo raginio pampiau io poyo ra saujor ru Israil am suang no 7,000 ngaulun.
Pamulunsaran raginio pinuunan paat ra tanga' ru orou paat ra Raja' Bingadad am talu ngoopor am ruo ngaulun raja' ra paguum nano tatanga' nangagauk giu' ra pangkiman nilono.
Saujor-saujor ra mamulok no nagulu namulunsar. Paat ra ulun pansigo ondo' sinusub ru Raja' Bingadad nambala' ra mokoondo' rondo' pulalai ru saujor matong intor ra Samaria,
indagu Raja' Bingadad, “Rokopo' ilo ra biag-biag, ilo ondo' matong koson mangayou kapoam matong koson mobonsoi!”
Saujor-saujor ra mamulok no naningganai ra pamulunsaran, sunuo' ru saujor ru Israil,

am sigagama' namatoi ra pantula' ondo' tinula' nilo. Saujor ru pagun Siria nagiru' liliwa' inilou ru saujor ru Israil. Kaa' Raja' Bingadad nakapagiru' intor ra pamulunsaran raginio. Nagiru' io nangura' ra sanginan kuda, binaya' ru kukula' ngaulun saujor nangkuda.
Raja' Agab niayuk minongoi pamulunsar am pamuso

Kopongo raginio minongoi uma' nabi no ra Raja' Agab am indagu, “Uli' no am kaikango' noyo saguli' saujor muno. Pambaal no ra pangatangan ondo' moonsoi, sabap ra bulintok mambusak ra bilor sumunu', raja' ru pagun Siria mamulunsar poyo rirun.”

Ngaangai' pagawai ru Raja' Bingadad mindagu riso, “Tuhan-tuhan ru Israil no tuhan-tuhan ru gunung. Ginio sabap ra makapangala ilo ritakau. Kaa' maaru' makapangala takau risilo amon ru mampapatoi takau giu' ra tana' marata'.
Raino aligi' talu ngoopor am ruo ngaulun raja' no ra panglima.

Mopongo raginio timungo' pulalai ru saujor koson ra gayo ru pulalai ondo' nangiruan rirun ragili. Tomposo' kuda am kurita' kuda ondo' suang no nogondo' koson ragili. Anggalon takau saujor ru Israil giu' ra tana' marata', am maaru' makapangala takau risilo.”
Nangiou Raja' Bingadad am nanugut ra pinson nilo.
Bulintok ra mambusak ra sumunu' no, nanimung Raja' Bingadad ra saujor nano am nababaya' jumalai risilo mongoi ra Apik koson mamulunsar ra Israil.

Saujor ru Israil niayuk tinimung am inukapan ra kinandoi mangayou. Jalai ilo, am pangkim ralalom ru ruo pulalai ondo' nantaluma' ra ulun ru Siria. Saujor ru Israil no ilain boborok, koson ayuk ra ruo ngampulalai kambing amon ru pinogondo' ra saujor ru Siria ondo' namapak ra intok raginio.
Sangulun nabi minuma' ra Raja' Agab am indagu, “Koon raginio ragu ru

Buoi tulu' ngoorou saujor ru Siria am saujor ru Israil soroi giu' ra pangkiman nilono, nantaluma' ra rondo' am bokon. Paat ra orou katulu' no, tumalimpuun ilo mangayou am saujor ru Israil namatoi ra 100,000 ngaulun saujor ru Siria.
Saujor ondo' nakapagiru' intor ra giu' no minongoi ra bandar Apik, am giu' ra bandar no suang 27,000 ngaulun poyo naabaan ru timbok ru bandar no.
Raja' Bingadad niayuk nagiru' minongoi ra ralalom ru bandar am siminindung giu' ra lamin talikuron ru rondo' baloi.

Pagawai-pagawai ru Raja' Bingadad minuma' riso am indagu, “Nokorongog akai ra raja'-raja' ru Israil makaasi'. Iowo' akai no mongoi uma' ra raja' ru Israil ra mapatapi' ra karung ra awak mai koson tatandu' ru pansagulian guang, am kalat ra liog mai koson tatandu' ru naala. Gama' ru mamayag raja' no rirun raja'.”
Ginio ra pinatapi' nilo konoon karung ra awak am kalat ra liog nilo am ongoi uma' ra Raja' Agab. Konilo, “Ulipon muli, Raja' Bingadad nakitaak maa' raginio bayagon mu io.”
Indagu Raja' Agab, “Lakat poyo kia naayag io? Iou noyo! Io no koson ra pabukat kuno galama'!”

Pagawai-pagawai ru Raja' Bingadad tatanga' noyo maginaa ra tatandu' moonsoi. Ginio ra paat ra Raja' Agab nanabit “pabukat”, nangalap ilo ra kaluagan am indagu, “Koson ra rinagu muno, Raja' Bingadad no pabukat muno!”
Panusub Raja' Agab, “Ibito' io raki'.” Pakasaboi Raja' Bingadad, kimaiti' ru Raja' Agab no Raja' Bingadad sumakoi ra kurita' kuda nano.

Indagu Raja' Bingadad riso, “Bandar-bandar ragili ondo' ginaau ru ama' kuli intor ra ama' muli, pasagulion ku rirun. Patirongon mu pusor pantalanan giu' ra Damsyik koson ragili ondo' pinatirong ru ama' kuli giu' ra Samaria.”
Taam Raja' Agab, “Ra kitaakon ti palabuson ku raja'.” Nambaal ilo ra pangiawan, Raja' Agab pana nangiou ra Raja' Bingadad minugar.
Ralalom susuban ru
Ginio ra nabi ondo' kasaa' ra raitii' ni mindagu ra nabi raginio, “Sabap ra kalo gumagaya' kou ra susuban ru
Kopongo raginio nabi ondo' kasaa' no minugar am ongoi ra ulun bokon am indagu, “Lambaa' aku!” Ulun ti napalamba' riso ra mapuor kaga' saboi napilat nabi no.
Bongkoso' ru nabi no bulos nano ra konoon am salu ra ulun bokon. Nanturung io ra kiing ru ralan am mangkuliman ra raja' ru Israil mansail ra giu' no.

Paat ra raja' sumail, pampiau nabi no riso am indagu, “Raja' kuno, paat ra aku mangayou, mokoondo' ulun nagibit ra sangulun rinakop raki'. Kon ru ulun no, ‘Ilai' ulun ti! Amon ru magiru' io, musiti' kou mambayar riso ra painawo muno, kapoam tagion ra suang talu ngaribu ngampila' ruit pirok.’
Kaa' kumantisuk aku ra baal ra bokon, saboi nagiru' ulun no.”
Taam raja' no, “Inukum mu inan muno galama'. Ginio ra musiti' kou mambayar raginio.”
Rilako' ru nabi no bangkos ra bulos nano, am paat raginio niayuk raja' no nakaulig riso sangulun nabi.
Nabi no pana mindagu boo ra raja', “Koon raginio ragu ru
Kopongo raginio uli' Raja' Agab giu' ra Samaria ra guang ondo' pansagulian am siminangit.
Maar ra istana ru Raja' Agab giu' ra Jijriil mokoondo' sampila' umo ru anggur longgom ru sangulun makainggalan ri Nabot.

Paat ra sangarawan indagu Raja' Agab ri Nabot, “Pataako' raki' umo ru anggur muno, sabap ra umo no maar ra istana kuno. Alapon ku ginio ra umo ru sayur. Aligin ku ginio ra umo ru anggur ondo' moonsoi poyo. Kapoam amon ru masaga' kou, bayarin ku ginio ra logo ra matanda'.”
Kaa' taam i Nabot, “Umo ru anggur ti pinatungkus ru kinamatuaan kuli. Ralalom inggalan ru
Uli' Raja' Agab ra guang pansagulian am siminangit sabap ra ragu ri Nabot no. Luya' Raja' Agab ra intok kaalangan, tumingkuang ra timbok am marara' mangakan.
Inggaar andu' nano i Ijibil am pangkuot, “Kua rirun raja' pansagulian kaga' am marara' mangakan?”

Taam Raja' Agab, “Kalo maansayan aku ri Nabot. Masaga' aku mambali ra umo ru anggur nano am pataako' ku ruit riso, kapoam umo no aligin ra umo ru anggur ra bokon, kaa' marara' i Nabot mapataak raki'!”
Kon ri Ijibil, “Sala' ka kia raja' kou? Sukal no, bansuko' guang muno am akan no. Alapon ku rirun umo ri Nabot no!”

Kopongo raginio panulis i Ijibil ra kukula' surat, saini' no ralalom inggalan ru Raja' Agab am sinaapan ra saap ru raja', am paatari' no ginio ra kukula' ngaulun pagawai am tingganai ru bandar ru Jijriil.
Gitio noyo suang ru surat no: “Potonowo' noyo mampali, timungo' noyo mamagun am anii' rondo' panturungan ondo' maurumat kaga' ri Nabot.

Mopongo raginio susubo' ruo ngaulun malaat manturung mantaluma' ri Nabot am manguu' riso ra nagulas io ri Aki Kapuuno' am raja'. Mopongo raginio ibito' io mingkual ra bandar am bobolo' io saboi matoi.”
Pagawai-pagawai am tingganai ru mamagun ru Jijriil napaugar ra susuban ri Ijibil.
Napatanou ilo ra mampali, am nanimung ra mamagun am nangani' ri Nabot rondo' panturungan ondo' maurumat kaga'.

Ratong ruo ngaulun malaat no am turung ra taluma' ri Nabot. Nanguu' ilo ri Nabot ra saang ru ulun masuang ra nagulas io ri Aki Kapuuno' am raja'. Ginio ra inibit i Nabot miningkual ra bandar am binobol saboi minatoi.
Tanou ri Nabot binobol saboi minatoi pinasaboi ri Ijibil.
Kaapu ayuk ri Ijibil tanou raginio, Kono ra Raja' Agab, “Minatoi noyo i Nabot. Raino ongoi no am alapo' noyo umo ru anggur ondo' marara' no talanon rirun.”
Paat raginio niayuk Raja' Agab minongoi koson mompolonggom ra umo ru anggur no.
Kopongo raginio indagu
“Ongoi no ra Raja' Agab giu' ra Samaria. Makatuum kou riso giu' ra umo ru anggur ri Nabot. Soroi io ra giu' no koson sumuali ra umo no.
Ragui' io ra Aku,
Paat ra Raja' Agab nakatuum ri Ilia, indagu io, “Okou pantula', pupus ti nakasugut kou nakatuum raki'!”
Taam i Ilia, “Topot. Binaal muno malaat ra pagilangan ru
Ginio ra indagu

Sasambaloi muno masauk koson ra sasambaloi ru Raja' Jirobiam anak ri Nibat, am koson ra sasambaloi ru Raja' Baisa anak ri Agia, sabap ra napaingkual kou ra sangit Kuno am niayuk nangkinibit ra ulun ru Israil makatula.’
Intor ri Ijibil, mindagu
Osoi ayuk pana ulun ru sasambaloi muno raja' ondo' matoi ralalom ru bandar akanon ru uku', am osoi ayuk pana matoi giu' ra padang akanon ru susuit.”
Kolondo' osoi pana ondo' igondo' nambaal ra malaat ra pagilangan ru
Nambaal Raja' Agab ra tula ondo' malaat kaga', sabap ra siminamba io ra sinungkalalaing koson ra binaal ru ulun ru Amori, ondo' pinagiru' ru

Kopongo i Ilia minindagu, rilako' ru Raja' Agab bayang nano. Inalus no bayang nano am sulungi' konoon karung koson tatandu' ru pansagulian guang. Nampali Raja' Agab, am pombolong io ra mambayang ra konoon karung. Mugar Raja' Agab mongoi ra giu' giti ra bulos malaut am mangiluk guang.
Indagu

“Nakito mu kia ra Raja' Agab minggana' guang ra saang Kuno? Sabap ra nambaal io koon raginio, kalo maparatong Aku ra karaat no riso paat ra io maayag no. Maparatong Aku ra karaat no ra sasambaloi nano paat ra anak nano maayag.”
Ruo ngambilor buoi kolondo' pangayawan ru Israil am Siria.
Kaa' paat ra bilor katalu, Raja' Josapat intor ra Jiuda timinuum ra Raja' Agab intor ra Israil.
Pangkuot Raja' Agab ra pagawai-pagawai nano, “Kua kia itakau lakat poyo kolondo' binaal koson mampagaau saguli' ra bandar Ramot giu' ra Giliad intor ra raja' ru pagun Siria? Itakau tangan ra Ramot!”
Pangkuot Raja' Agab ra Raja' Josapat, “Masaga' kou kia maya' raki' koson mamulunsar ra Ramot?”
Taam Raja' Josapat, “Nakatampos aku no maya' rirun. Koon niayuk ra saujor am pulalai mangkuda kuno.
Kaa' pangkuot tapo galing ra
Ginio ra pampiau Raja' Agab ra nabi-nabi ondo' suang no olo'-olo' apat ngaatus ngaulun. Pangkuot Raja' Agab risilo, “Suguton takau kia mamulunsar ra Ramot kapoam kalo?”
Taam ilo, “Bulunsaro' noyo. Manaak
Kaa' pangkuot poyo Raja' Josapat, “Kolondo' kia nabi ra bokon ondo' makapangkuot ra baal ragitio ra
Taam Raja' Agab, “Mokoondo' sangulun poyo, i Mika anak ri Jimla. Kaa' masisang aku riso, sabap ra kalo igondo' io panala' ra baal moonsoi raki'; masalok io manala' ra baal malaat.”
Taam Raja' Josapat, “Okou raja' kalo musiti' no mindagu koon raginio.”
Ginio ra pampiau Raja' Agab ra sangulun pagawai ru istana am panusub riso mampiau ri Mika ra mataki'.

Karuo-ruo ngaulun raja' no, ondo' nambayang ra bayang ru raja', nanturung ra kurisi' raja' giu' ra intok pangagikan ra gandum, giu' ra liwar ru kulobon garabang ru Samaria. Ngaangai' ru nabi manala' giu' ra saang nilo ruo.
I Jidikia anak ri Kinaana, sangulun intor ra nabi no, nambaal ra kukula' sangau ru basi' am indagu ra Raja' Agab, “Koon raginio ragu ru
Ngaangai' nabi ra bokon niayuk mindagu koon raginio. Konilo, “Jalai no mamulunsar ra Ramot. Maaru' mamanang kou raja'. Manaak
Liliwa' raginio pagawai ondo' minongoi pampiau ri Mika no mindagu riso, “Ngaangai' nabi ra bokon nanala' noyo ra mamanang raja' no. Moonsoi okou pana manala' koon raginio.”
Kaa' taam i Mika, “Ralalom inggalan ru
Paat ri Mika muma' ra Raja' Agab, pangkuot io riso, “Mika, maalap kia kabulunsar mai ri Raja' Josapat kapoam kalo Ramot no?”
Taam i Mika, “Bulunsaro' noyo. Maaru' mamanang kou raja'. Manaak
Kaa' indagu Raja' Agab, “Amon ru mindagu kou raki' ralalom inggalan ru
Indagu Raja' Agab ra Raja' Josapat, “Nambala' aku noyo rirun raja' ra io kalo igondo' panala' ra baal ondo' moonsoi raki'! Masalok io manala' ra baal ondo' malaat!”
Pangkuot
Kopongo raginio rondo' ambiluo minongoi ra saang am uma' ra
‘Ati kulaan?’ Taam ambiluo no, ‘Mangkinibit aku ra ngaangai' nabi ri Agab no magabau.’ Indagu
Kon poyo ri Mika, “Gitio noyo ondo' masauk. Nambaal noyo
Inggaar Nabi Jidikia ri Mika, nampalapis ra pingas nano, am pangkuot, “Intor ra sanggilan kia Ambiluo ru
Taam i Mika, “Makapandai kou ra baal ragitio paat ra okou mansibuni giu' ra rondo' ra lamin ra talikuron no.”
Kopongo raginio indagu Raja' Agab ra sangulun pagawai nano, “Rokopo' i Mika am ibito' io ri Amon, gabenor ru bandar no, am ra Anak ungkuyon ru raja' i Joas.
Susubo' ilo mangaput riso ra pangaputan, am paaniin io ra ruti' am timug ayuk saboi ra aku makasaguli' ra maayag.”
Kon ri Mika, “Amon ru makasaguli' kou raja' ra maayag, maaru'
Kopongo raginio Raja' Agab, raja' ru Israil am Raja' Josapat, raja' ru Jiuda minongoi pamulunsar ra bandar Ramot giu' ra Giliad.
Indagu Raja' Agab ra Raja' Josapat, “Paat ra itakau mangayou, sumalu aku, kaa' okou raja' mambayang ra bayang ru raja'.” Ginio ra raja' ru Israil no siminalu paat minongoi pangayou.
Raja' ru pagun ru Siria nanusub ra talu ngoopor am ruo ngaulun panglima ru pulalai ru mangkurita' kuda nano maa' raginio kalo mamulunsar ra osoi ayuk pana ondo' ayuk am raja' ru Israil no.
Paat ra ilo nakakito ra Raja' Josapat, indoson nilo ra io raja' ru Israil. Ginio ra lukiat ilo am pamulunsar riso. Kaa' paat ra Raja' Josapat gumolok,
kalimani' nilo ra io sala' ka raja' ru Israil, ilo pana liminonggo' mamulunsar riso.

Nakainamot ra sangulun saujor ru pagun ru Siria napalabus ra anak panah nano ondo' nakatiu' ra Raja' Agab ginio ra patunggulan ru bayang mantula' nano. Golok Raja' Agab ra ulun mampaugar ra kurita' kuda nano, “Napilat aku! Palimpuongo' kurita' kuda ti am ingkual intor ra pampatayan ti!”

Liliwa' pangayawan no lakat poyo masauk, Raja' Agab no siminungka' ra rasawat ru kurita' kuda nano ondo' mantaluma' ra saujor ru Siria. Raraa' tumilis intor ra pilat nano, saboi namasa' ra sulig ru kurita' kuda nano. Paat ra mamai' minatoi io.
Tatakip tumolop mato ru orou, ngaangai' saujor ru Israil sinusub minuli' ra bandar am libung ru sigagama'.
Koon raginio noyo Raja' Agab minatoi. Baangkai nano inibit ra Siria am linobong.
Kurita' kuda nano binaguan giu' ra Kolam ru Samaria, intok ru uku'-uku' nantila' ra raraa' nano am ruandu'-ruandu' mantatalan ra inan mariu', nontopot koson ra rinagu ru
Ngaangai' binaal ru Raja' Agab, nakaaya' tunung ru istana ondo' binungaan ra gading am bandar-bandar ondo' binaal nano, tinulisan ralalom ru buuk
Kopongo Raja' Agab no minatoi, anak ungkuyon nano i Agajia, minalit riso koson ra raja'.
Paat ra bilor kaapat ru pamarintaan ru Raja' Agab giu' ra Israil, Raja' Josapat, anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Asa nasauk ra raja' ru Jiuda.
Paat raginio umur ru Raja' Josapat 35 ngambilor, am 25 ngambilor buoi nano namarinta giu' ra Jirusalim. Ina' nano i Ajuba anak ri Silgi.
Koson ra ama' nali ragili, Raja' Josapat no nambaal ra atan ondo' motopot ra saang ru
Paat raginio Raja' Josapat moonsoi pabukatan no ra raja' ru Israil.
Ngaangai' binaal ru Raja' Josapat, nakaaya' ikang tumula' nano am ngaangai' ru pangayawan nano tinulisan ralalom ru buuk

Pinuso ru Raja' Josapat no ngaangai' ulun mantalan ra inan ungkuyon am ruandu' ondo' mangandoi ra intok-intok sambaan ra dewa. Ulun-ulun mantalan ra inan no pinatoi paat ra pamarintaan ru Raja' Asa, ama' ru Raja' Josapat.
Paat raginio pagun ru Idom kolondo' raja'. Pagun ru Idom pinarinta ru sangulun uakil ru raja' ondo' linantik ru raja' ru Jiuda.
Nambaal Raja' Josapat ra kapal-kapal ru raat koson masundoi mongoi ra Opir maa' raginio mangalap ra mas, kaa' kapal-kapal raginio nalunsai giu' ra Ijion-Gibir, am kalo nakapasundoi mongoi ra giu' no.
Raja' Agajia napaindangan ra ulun ru kapal nano maa' raginio masundoi mabaya' ra ulun ru kapal ru Raja' Josapat, kaa' marara' Raja' Josapat mangapu ra indangan raginio.
Kopongo raginio Raja' Josapat minatoi am linobong giu' ra tana' kalabangan ru raja' giu' ra Bandar Daut. I Jigoram, anak ungkuyon nano, namalit riso koson raja'.

Paat ra bilor koopor am tulu' ru pamarintaan ru Raja' Josapat giu' ra Jiuda, i Agajia, anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Agab nasauk ra raja' giu' ra Israil. Ruo ngambilor buoi ru Raja' Agajia namarinta giu' ra Samaria.
Makatula Raja' Agajia ra
Sumambayang Raja' Agajia ra Baal, nangandoi riso ayuk. Nogondo' koson ra ama' nali ragili, napaingkual io ra sangit ru
Kopongo minatoi Raja' Agab intor ra Israil no, pagun ru Moab no giminuor ra Israil.

Paat ra sangarawan, Raja' Agajia intor ra Israil no naratu' intor ra langgar giu' ra tingkat rasawat ru istana nano giu' ra Samaria saboi napilatan raja' no ra masaran. Ginio ra nangator io ra kukula' ngaulun sinusub koson mangkuot ra Baal-Jibub, dewa ru ulun ru Palistin giu' ra bandar Ikron, mangimumui ru mapali' io kia kapoam kalo.
Kaa' panusub malaikat ru
Balai' raja' no ra koon raginio ragu ru
Kopongo i Ilia nampasaboi ra ragu ru
saguli' ulun-ulun sinusub no ra raja'. Pangkuot raja' no, “Kua saguli' kau?”
Taam ulun-ulun sinusub no, “Tinuum akai ru sangulun ungkuyon ondo' nanusub ramon sumaguli' am mambala' rirun ra minindagu
Pangkuot raja' no, “Ati kulaan baal ru ulun i?”
Golok raja' no, “Ulun no i Ilia!”

Kopongo raginio panusub raja' no ra sangulun pagawai ru saujor nano mabaya' ra limo ngoopor ngaulun mongoi pamparakop ri Ilia. Natuum ru pagawai no i Ilia ondo' tatanga' manturung giu' ra rasawat ru bulur, am kono riso, “Okou ulipon ri Aki Kapuuno', nanusub raja' no rirun tumuun.”
Panusub raja' no ra sangulun pagawai ru saujor ra bokon mabaya' ra limo ngoopor ngaulun. Ongoi ilo am indagu ri Ilia, “Okou ulipon ri Aki Kapuuno', nanusub raja' no rirun tumuun raino niayuk!”

Taam i Ilia, “Amon ru aku ti ulipon ri Aki Kapuuno', polosoon noyo apui rumatu' intor ra limbowon am mamatoi rirun am niayuk ulun-ulun muno!” Paat raginio niayuk nampatuun i Aki Kapuuno' ra apui am namatoi ra pagawai no am niayuk ulun-ulun nano.

Igondo' poyo panusub raja' no ra sangulun pagawai ru saujor mabaya' ra limo ngoopor ngaulun. Pagawai no nagaloi ra rasawat ru bulur am kuku' samba ra saang ri Ilia liliwa' mikikimasi', “Okou ulipon ri Aki Kapuuno', pakaasi' no raki' am ulun-ulun kuno. Pai' pamatoi ramon!
Ruo ngaulun pagawai ru saujor ra bokon am ulun-ulun nilo pinatoi ru apui intor ra limbowon, kaa' pakaasi' no raki'!”
Paat raginio niayuk malaikat ru
Kon ri Ilia ra raja', “Koon raginio noyo ragu ru
Raja' Agajia pana minatoi boo nontopot koson ra ragu ru
Ngaangai' binaal ru Raja' Agajia tinulisan ralalom ru buuk
Paat no nasaboi ra
Giu' ra tanga' ralan indagu i Ilia ri Ilisa, “Soroi ayuk ragiti;
Kaa' taam i Ilisa, “Magibot aku sabap ra gagaya' kuno ra
Santimungan ru nabi ondo' minayan giu' ra Bitil mininggaar ri Ilisa am pangkuot riso, “Nakapandai kono kia ra
Taam i Ilisa, “Nakapandai aku, kaa' pai' takano raguo' baal raginio.”
I Ilia pana mindagu boo ri Ilisa, “Soroi ayuk ragiti;
Kaa' taam i Ilisa, “Magibot aku sabap ra gagaya' kuno ra
Santimungan ru nabi ondo' minayan giu' ra Jiriko mininggaar ri Ilisa am pangkuot riso, “Nakapandai kono kia ra
Taam i Ilisa, “Nakapandai aku, kaa' pai' takano raguo' baal raginio.”
I Ilia pana mindagu boo ri Ilisa, “Soroi ayuk ragiti;
Kaa' taam i Ilisa, “Magibot aku sabap ra gagaya' kuno ra

Limo ngoopor ngaulun intor ra santimungan ru nabi minaya' risilo mongoi ra Sungoi Jordan. I Ilia am i Ilisa minuog ra kiing ru sungoi, am limo ngoopor ngaulun nabi no minigor kalo maalur intor ra giu' no.
Kopongo raginio aluso' ri Ilia sukub nano, ruluno' no, am palambaa' ra timug ru sungoi no. Kalapak timug ru sungoi no napiruo saboi i Ilia am i Ilisa nakalaup ra sungoi minugar ra lonor ondo' mapua'.
Giu' no indagu i Ilia ri Ilisa, “Raguo' noyo atan kasagaan muno baalon ku rirun ra aku kalo poyo ibiton mugar.”
Taam i Ilisa, “Iowo' aku no manungkus ra kuasa' muno maa' raginio makapalit aku rirun.”
Kon ri Ilia, “Kitaakon muno mapagon iowon. Kaa' amon ru makito mu aku paat ra aku ibiton mugar, makaapu kou ra kitaakon muno. Amon ru kalo, kalo makaapu kou raginio.”

Narayus ilo nagindagu liliwa' namparayus ra pangkiralanan. Pulusat ru rondo' kurita' kuda makaapui ondo' binunduk ru kukula' ngainan kuda makaapui napatuliar risilo, am i Ilia kinayang ra suruga' ru bagiu' mapuor kaga'.
Kakito ri Ilisa baal raginio, am i pana mompogolok ri Ilia, “Ama' ku, ama' ku! Manaung maikang ru Israil! Minugar noyo i ama'!” Ginio ra liot ri Ilia intor ra pagilangan ri Ilisa.
Nabaya' ra kangilukan rilako' ri Ilisa sukub nano nasauk ra ruo rilak.
Kopongo raginio alapo' no sukub ri Ilia ondo' naratu'. Saguli' boo i Ilisa am bigor ra kiing ru Sungoi Jordan.
Lambaa' no timug ru sungoi no ra sukub ri Ilia, am indagu, “Ati nua'
Limo ngoopor ngaulun nabi intor ra Jiriko no nakakito ri Ilisa am indagu, “Kuasa' ri Ilia soroi ri Ilisa!” Inggaar ilo riso, am kubu samba ra saang nano,
am indagu, “Akai limo ngoopor ngaulun ragiti, am ngaangai' mai maikang. Polosoon noyo akai maguyum ri Ilia, tuan muli. Maaru' Ambiluo ru
Indagu i Ilisa, “Pai', kalo pana mugar!”
Kaa' jumajal ilo saboi nangiou i Ilisa risilo mugar. Buoi talu ngoorou, limo ngoopor ngaulun no naguyum ri Ilia ra ati-ati, kaa' kalo natuum nilo io.
Kopongo raginio saguli' ilo ri Ilisa ondo' tatanga' maginaa giu' ra Jiriko. Kon ri Ilisa risilo, “Nanginga' aku no alia ramuyun mugar?”
Kukula' ngaulun intor ra Jiriko mindagu ri Ilisa, “Koson ra napandayan muno, moonsoi bandar ti, kaa' timug nano kalo moonsoi am mangkinibit ra masuang ruandu' maapang mairuan.”
Kon ri Ilisa, “Suangi' ra usi' rondo' mangkuk baguon am ibito' mangkuk no raki'.” Ilo pana nagibit raginio ri Ilisa.
Ongoi i Ilisa ra taur ru timug, am patiaso' usi' no ralalom ru timug, am indagu, “Koon raginio ragu ru
Intor raginio moonsoi timug no koson ra ondo' rinagu ri Ilisa.
Nangiruan i Ilisa ra Jiriko am ongoi ra Bitil. Giu' ra tanga' ralan, kukula' ngaulun lalaing ungkuyon ondo' minatong intor ra bandar no nagasab riso. Konilo, “Okou naampakan, pagiru' intor ragiti!”
Likar i Ilisa, ponontong ra lalaing-lalaing no, am pagulas risilo ralalom inggalan ru
Rinayus ri Ilisa pangkiralanan nano mongoi ra Gunung Karmil, kalupus raginio minuli' io ra Samaria.

Paat ra bilor koopor am balu' ru pamarintaan ru Raja' Josapat giu' ra Jiuda, Raja' Joram ti anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Agab nasauk ra raja' ru Israil. Raja' Joram namarinta ra Samaria buoi mopor am ruo ngambilor.
Makatula Raja' Joram ra
Kaa' koson ra Raja' Jirobiam anak ri Nibat ragili, Raja' Joram niayuk nangkinibit ra Israil makatula am kalo masaga' io tumalikur intor ra tula.
Raja' Misa intor ra Moab, mokoondo' ra tinambiag ra domba. Moonong bilor mangani' io ra raja' ru Israil ra cukai suang no 100,000 ngainan anak domba, am bulu domba intor ra 100,000 ngainan domba.
Kaa' paat ra Raja' Agab intor ra Israil no minatoi, giminuor Raja' Misa no ra Israil.
Ginio ra nataki' Raja' Joram nangiruan ra Samaria am nanimung ra ngaangai' saujor nano.
Nampakirim io ra tanou ragitio ra Raja' Josapat giu' ra Jiuda, “Raja' ru Moab no giminuor raki'. Masaga' kou kia mangayou mabaya' raki' koson gumula' ra raja' ru Moab?”
Taam Raja' Josapat, “Iou, nakatampos aku no mangindangan rirun. Koon niayuk ra ulun-ulun am pulalai mangkuda kuno.
Ati kia ra ralan musiti' takau bayaan koson mamulunsar risilo?”
Indagu Raja' Joram, “Moonsoi maya' takau ra ralan maalur, ondo' mansail ra tana' kaagisan ru Idom.”

Koon raginio noyo Raja' Joram nabaya' ra raja' ru Jiuda am raja' ru Idom minongoi ra pangayawan. Kopongo tulu' ngoorou pangkiralanan, nakayaan ilo ra timug inumon, saboi pinaason saujor nilo am bibiag pangaut ra kuliamos nilo.
Golok Raja' Joram, “Aibui boo ritakau, sabap ra
Pangkuot Raja' Josapat, “Mokoondo' kia ra sangulun nabi ragiti, maa' raginio makitulu' takau intor ra
Taam sangulun pagawai ru saujor ru Raja' Joram no, “I Ilisa anak ri Sapat soroi ragiti. Ragili io mangindangan ri Ilia.”
Kon ru Raja' Josapat, “Topot! Totopot mindagu
Indagu i Ilisa ra raja' ru Israil, “Kua musiti' aku mangindangan rirun? Ongoi no pangkuot ra nabi-nabi ru ama' am ina' muno ragili!”
Taam Raja' Joram, “Kalo, sabap ra
Kon ri Ilisa, “Magibot aku ralalom inggalan ru
Raino piawo' sangulun mangkuli ra jitor.”
Liliwa' ulun no mangkuli ra jitor nano, kuasa' ru
am kono, “Koon raginio ragu ru
Kabalu' pana kolondo' rasam kapoam angin, lonor ru sungoi boborok ti mototop ra timug. Okou pana am niayuk bibiag ra tinambiag am bibiag pagaut ra kuliamos muno maukapan ra timug inumon.’ ”
Rayuso' poyo ri Ilisa, “Baal ragitio maluoi ra

Kalaan mu ngaangai' bandar nilo ondo' mokoondo' ra kubu am ondo' moonsoi. Tagaron mu ngaangai' puun kikinawa' nilo, mongompong ra ngaangai' taur ru timug am ngaangai' ru umo nilo ondo' malabung no bobolon ra batu saboi maluluyak kalingon.”
Suabon no, paat ra taak simbalui ra susuab ti kaindalaman pataakon, timug tumilis intor ra tampilon ru Idom am mamanu' ra lonor ru sungoi ondo' mapua' no.

Paat ra ulun ru Moab nokorongog ra talu ngaulun raja' no nakasaboi noyo koson mamulunsar risilo, ngaangai' ru ungkuyon ondo' makaandar mangayou, intor ra ondo' matutuo noyo kaga' saboi ra ondo' mamulok poyo kaga', piniau am pinosoroi giu' ra balitan ru pagun.
Paat ra ilo timinirong ra suabon no, mato ru orou nakasinda ra ralimbou ru timug saboi makito malia' koson ra raraa'.
Golok ilo, “Ilai' nong, raraa'! Katalu-talu ru saujor ru pantula' takau maaru' nagagabu' am nampapatoi ra rondo' am bokon! Ibok takau ongoi pantakou ra pangkiman nilono!”
Kaa' paat ra ulun ru Moab nakasaboi giu' ra intok pangkiman, saujor ru Israil namulunsar am nangala risilo. Narayus ulun ru Israil nangilou liliwa' namatoi ra ulun ru Moab

am niayuk nampalunsai ra bandar-bandar nilo. Paat ra ilo nansail ra umo ondo' malabung, moonong ulun ru Israil nompobobol ra batu ra giu' no, saboi ngaangai' ru umo no natauban ru batu. Ilo niayuk nongompong ra ngaangai' taur ru timug ra giu' no am nantagar ra ngaangai' puun ru kikinawa'. Pupus no Pusor bandar Kir-Garisit ayuk soroi. Bandar raginio niayuk inawangan am binobol ra batu ru ulun momobol.
Paat ra raja' ru Moab nakaliman ra naala io noyo, pagibit io ra 700 ngaulun saujor ondo' nanangilang nababaya' riso, am kuminam sumubol ra tampilon ra raja' ru Idom,
Ginio ra nagibit raja' ru Moab no ra anak ungkuyon ra katuaan nano minongoi ra rasawat ru timbok ru bandar no am pataako' no io koson ra taak simbalui no ra dewa ru pagun ru Moab. Nangalaa'

Paat ra sangarawan, napuor ru sangulun nabi minatong ri Ilisa am indagu, “Tuan, minatoi noyo ralaki kuli! Nakapandai kou ra io sangulun ondo' gumagaya' ri Aki Kapuuno' kaa' nagutang io ra sasangulun. Raino ulun no minatong koson mampagaau ra ruo ngaulun anak ungkuyon kuno am saukon ilo ra ulun inulipon koson mambayar ra utang ru ralaki kuli.”
Pangkuot i Ilisa, “Atan nua' mabaal kutu? Atan kuliamos ondo' soroi ra baloi muno?”
Taam napuor no, “Kolondo' atan-atan, ondo' ayuk am umau jaitun ralalom ru rondo' rarapu' boborok.”
Kon ri Ilisa, “Ongoi no ra pasambalayan muno am pagira' ra kula' ayuk suang ru rarapu' kolondo' suang ondo' soroi no.
Mopongo raginio okou am anak-anak muno musiti' mumpos ra baloi am angabin kulobon. Pasasaro' umau intor ra rarapu' boborok no ra rarapu'-rarapu' ra bokon. Timungo' rarapu' ondo' nototop no.”

Kopongo raginio uli' napuor no am umpos ralalom ru baloi nabaya' ra anak-anak nano, am angabi' kulobon. Pangalap io ra umau jaitun intor ra rarapu' boborok no am pasasaro' no ra ralalom ru rarapu'-rarapu' ra bokon nalupus ayuk anak-anak nano nagibit ra rarapu'-rarapu' no riso.
Paat ra ilo namanu' ra ngaangai' rarapu' no, pangkuot io, “Mokoondo' poyo kia?” Taam sangulun intor ra anak nano, “Kolondo' boo.” Paat raginio niayuk umau no liminonggo' tumilis.
Kopongo raginio saguli' napuor no ra Nabi Ilisa. I Ilisa pana mindagu boo riso, “Talano' umau jaitun no am bayari' ngaangai' utang muno, am suwo ru ruit no koson pakuan muno am anak-anak muno.”

Paat ra sangarawan minongoi i Ilisa giu' ra bandar Sunim. Giu' no mokoondo' sangulun ruandu' langkaya'. Nampiau ruandu' no ri Ilisa mongoi akan ra baloi nano. Intor raginio moonong i Ilisa mongoi ra Sunim, mangakan io giu' ra baloi ru ruandu' langkaya' no.
Kon ru ruandu' no ra ralaki nano, “Mangintopot aku ra ulun ondo' masalok matong ragiti no topot-topot ulipon ri Aki Kapuuno'.

Pambaal to ra rondo' lamin boborok giu' ra pinuusan ru baloi ti, am ukopon ra rondo' pambalangan, rondo' mija', rondo' panturungan am rondo' lampung maa' raginio mokoondo' io ra kaalangan ra giu' no paat ra io matong ragiti.”
Paat ra sangarawan, minongoi i Ilisa ra Sunim am umpos ra lamin nano ra tumangus.
Panusub io ri Gigaji, ulipon nano mongoi pampiau ra ruandu' no. Pakaratong ruandu' no,

indagu i Ilisa ri Gigaji, “Kuati' io ra atan nua' mabaal kuno riso. Minirot io noyo nagula' ra kaukapan tati. Maaru' lair ru masaga' io ra aku mindagu rondo' ra kaatangan nano giu' ra saang ru raja' kapoam panglima ru saujor.”
Taam ruandu' no, “Minayan aku ra popolos ru sasambaloi kuno galama' am kalo natutusan ra atan pana.”
Indagu i Ilisa ri Gigaji, “Amon ru ginio poyo, atan kia nua' mabaal kuno riso?”
Taam i Gigaji, “Io kolondo' anak ungkuyon. Inambai poyo ra matutuo noyo ralaki nano.”
Kon ri Ilisa, “Susubo' ruandu' no matong ragiti.” Ratong ruandu' no am bigor ra kulobon.
Indagu i Ilisa riso, “Paat koson ra raino ti ra bilor sumunu' ti, mangubibil kou ra sangulun anak ungkuyon.”
Kon ru ruandu' no, “Tuan, pai' ga pagabau raki'. Okou no ulipon ri Aki Kapuuno'!”
Kaa' koson ra ondo' rinagu ri Ilisa, olo'-olo' paat ra nogondo' ra bilor sumunu' no, naganak ruandu' no ra sangulun anak ungkuyon.
Pakasail kukula' ngambilor raiti, bulintok mangkumos, minongoi anak no ra umo sumunu' ra ama' nano ondo' soroi ra giu' no nababaya' ra ulun-ulun mangkumos.
Pulali' ru anak no mindagu ra ama' nano, “Maruol ulu kutu! Maruol ulu kutu!”
Indagu ama' nano ra sangulun intor ra ulipon nano, “Ibito' io ra ina' nano.”
Ibito' ru ulipon no anak raginio ra ina' nano, am pinasapau ru ina' nano io saboi ra tanga' ru orou. Paat ra tanga' ru orou anak raginio minatoi.
Ibito' ru ruandu' no io ra lamin ri Ilisa am palangano' io ra kaalangan no. Kopongo raginio angabi' no kulobon am patatango' no anak no ra giu' no.
Pampiau io ra ralaki nano am indagu, “Susubo' sangulun ulipon magibit ra sanginan kaladai ragiti. Masaga' aku tumuum ra Nabi Ilisa. Muli' aku ra mataki'.”
Pangkuot ralaki nano, “Kua kia musiti' mongoi ra orou raiti'? Orou raiti' sala' ka orou Sabat kapoam Pangiantakan ra Sila' Bagu.”
Taam io, “Kalo pana.”
Pabingkalo' no palana ra kaladai no am panusub ra ulipon nano, “Pasimbulo' kaladai ti ra maribok. Pai' irurui' ribok no ondo' ayuk am manusub aku.”
Koon raginio noyo ruandu' no minintor am ongoi ra Gunung Karmil, giu' ra intok ri Ilisa.
Intor ra maalur nakakito i Ilisa ra ruandu' no matong. Indagu i Ilisa ri Gigaji, ulipon nano, “Ilai' nong ruandu' intor ra Sunim no matong!
Ribaki' ongoi tuumo' io am kuati' ati kulaan io, ralaki nano am niayuk anak nano.”
Nambala' ruandu' no ri Gigaji ra ngaangai' no moonsoi.

Kaa' pakasaboi ruandu' no ra saang ri Ilisa, igulatur samba io am guut ra kalayam ri Ilisa. Masaga' i Gigaji mangail riso, kaa' indagu i Ilisa, “Polosoo' ayuk io. Kalo kia nakapandai kou ra tatanga' io mangiluk guang? Kaa'
Kon ru ruandu' no ri Ilisa, “Tuan, kalo nakitaak aku ra sangulun anak intor rirun! Kalo kia rinaguan tokou no maa' raginio pai' simbuluko' kalansanan kuno?”

Ponontong i Ilisa ri Gigaji am indagu, “Ribaki'! Ibito' jujuga' kuli am ugar no. Pai' uog manabi' ra osoi ayuk pana. Amon ru mokoondo' ulun manabi' rirun, kalo pana balasin. Ongoi rampus ra baloi nano am pabantaa' jujuga' kuno ra inan ru anak no.”
Kon ru ruandu' no ri Ilisa, “Magibot aku sabap ra gagaya' kuno ra
Nagulu i Gigaji. Pabantaa' no jujuga' ri Ilisa ra inan ru anak no, kaa' kalo nokorongog ra atan-atan am kolondo' tatandu' ra maayag anak no. Saguli' io ri Ilisa am indagu, “Kalo tumirong lalaing no.”
Pakasaboi i Ilisa, umpos io sangulun ra lamin pambalangan no. Nakito no baangkai ru anak no parilangan ra intok pambalangan no.
Angabi' ri Ilisa kulobon am pakiasi' ra
Laub io ra inan ru anak no am painggaaro' kabang nano, mato nano am kalindu' nano ra kabang, mato am kalindu' ru anak no. Liliwa' i Ilisa nambaal raginio, inan ru anak no lumasu' galing noyo.
Tirong i Ilisa am ugar mansaguli' ralalom ru lamin no, am laub igondo' poyo ra inan ru anak no. Pantarisu' anak no intulu' am singkarato' mato nano.
Panusub i Ilisa ri Gigaji nampiau ra ina' ru anak no. Pakasubol io, kon ri Ilisa riso, “Gitio anak mutu.”
Igulatur samba ruandu' no ra saang ri Ilisa am ibito' anak no mingkual.

Paat ra sanganuan, paat ra bitilan nasauk giu' ra titikop ru pagun no, minuli' i Ilisa ra Gilgal. Liliwa' ra io mangila' ra sampulalai nabi, panusub io ra ulipon nano mangansak ra akanon ra ralalom ru sampagangan ra maayo risilo.

Sangulun intor risilo miningkual mongoi pakisansam, am nakatuum ra tinanom ra labu' lumayau. Nangupu' io kasuang-suang ra kawa' ru labu' ondo' makayang nano, am pagibit raginio muli'. Pinutul-putul no kawa' no am pasuboo' no ralalom ru pagangan ra kalo natutunan atan sotopot no kawa' raginio.
Akanon no pana pinasulung boo. Kaa' paat ra ilo tumalimpuun mangakan, indagu ilo ri Ilisa, “Makaanit akanon ti!” Kalo masaga' ilo mangakan raginio.
Ginio ra pakitaak i Ilisa ra sanganu tapung, am pasuboo' ra ralalom ru pagangan no. Kopongo raginio indagu io, “Pasulungo' poyo akanon no.” Atika kalo makaanit akanon no.

Paat ra sangarawan ra bokon, sangulun ungkuyon minatong intor ra Baal-Salisa. Nagibit io ra ruo ngoopor ruti' ondo' binaal intor ra barli ondo' kinumos galing paat ra bilor raginio, tayar ri Ilisa. Nagibit niayuk ungkuyon no ra gandum ondo' baguon. Panusub i Ilisa ra kambo nano mantayar-tayar ra ruti' no ra nabi-nabi.
Kaa' kon ru kambo nano, “Kalo lair mosonong ra maatus ngaulun!”
Kon ri Ilisa, “Tatayaro' akanon ti, sabap ra sumugut ra ragu ru
Tatayaro' ru kambo no akanon no risilo, am ngaangai' nilo mangakan. Kopongo nangakan, lakat poyo makasuwo ru akanon koson ra ondo' rinagu ru

Rondo' paat ra ulun ru Siria namulunsar ra pagun ru Israil. Ralalom ru pamulunsaran no karakop sangulun lalaing ruandu' ru Israil, am inibit koson ulun rinakop. Kopongo raginio lalaing ruandu' no nasauk ra ulipon ru andu' ri Naaman.
Paat ra sangarawan indagu lalaing no ra andu' ri Naaman, “Mapara' bonsoi no amon ru tuan kuno mokoongoi ra nabi ondo' minayan giu' ra Samaria! Makababas io ra maruol ru tuan kuno.”
Paat ri Naaman nokorongog ra baal raginio, uma' io ra raja' am pambala' ra atan ondo' rinagu ru lalaing ruandu' no.
Indagu raja' ru Siria no, “Ongoi no ra raja' ru Israil, am ibito' surat ti riso.”
Kopongo raginio ugar i Naaman liliwa' nagibit ra 30,000 ngampila' pirok, 6,000 ngampila' mas am mopor konoon ondo' moonsoi.
Surat ondo' inibit no rinagu koson ragitio, “Ulun nagibit ra surat ti am i Naaman, panglima kuno. Kitaakon ku babaso' io intor ra maruol nano.”

Pakabasa' raja' ru Israil ra surat no, rilako' no bayang nano sabap ra mangiluk guang. Kono, “Ati kulaan raja' ru Siria no makitaak raki' mamabas ra ulun ti? Mangkara' io nua' ra aku ti i Aki Kapuuno'
Pokorongog Nabi Ilisa ra atan ondo' nasauk no, pangator io ra tanou ra raja'. Kono, “Kua kia pagalabo kou raja'? Susubo' ulun no matong raki'. Tuluin ku io ra mokoondo' sangulun nabi ra Israil!”
Ginio ra ugar i Naaman ra kurita' kuda am ngaangai' ru kuda nano, am uog ra kulobon ru baloi ri Ilisa.
Panusub i Ilisa ra sangulun ulipon mingkual koson mambala' ri Naaman maa' raginio mariu' intulu' giu' ra Sungoi Jordan, maruol nano pana mababas boo.
Kaa' sangit i Naaman paat nokorongog ra ragu-ragu raginio am iruani' intok raginio. Kono, “Indos kuli ru mingkual io am tumuum raki', makiasi' ra
Suai raginio, sala' ka kia Sungoi Abana am Sungoi Parpar giu' ra Damsyik no moonsoi poyo intor ra sungoi ru ati pana ra Israil? Aku pana makapariu' ra sungoi-sungoi raginio am mababas!”
Kaa' indagu ulipon-ulipon ri Naaman no riso, “Tuan, amon ru manusub nabi no rirun mambaal ra baal mapagon, maaru' baalon mu ginio. Moonsoi mariu' kou koson ra nanusuban nano maa' raginio mababas.”

Ginio ra tuun i Naaman ra Sungoi Jordan am linjob io intulu' koson ra ondo' nanusuban ru Nabi Ilisa. Kopongo raginio napali' maruol nano kalingon. Inan nano maligag saguli' koson ra inan ru sangulun lalaing boborok.

I Naaman nabaya' ra ngaangai' ru namaya' riso no siminaguli' ri Ilisa. Kon ri Naaman, “Raino nakapandai aku ra rondo' ayuk i Aki Kapuuno' ra titikop ru tana' ti, iono i Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil. Kasaga' no mangapu ra taak kutu.”
Kaa' kon ri Ilisa, “Ralalom inggalan ru
Nampajajal i Naaman ri Ilisa maa' raginio apuon no, kaa' marara' i Ilisa.
Ginio ra kon ri Naaman, “Amon ru marara' kou mangapu ra pataakon kutu, anii' aku ra tana' kasuang-suang ondo' maibit ru santuop baghal, maa' raginio maibit ku tana' no muli'.
Malansan aku maa' raginio
Kon ri Ilisa, “Ugar no ra kaansayan.” I Naaman pana nangiruan ra intok raginio.
Kalo nabuoi ra kalupus i Naaman minugar,
i Gigaji, ulipon ri Ilisa mindagu ralalom ru guang, “Kua paugaro' ri Ilisa no i Naaman ra kalo nambayar kasanganu pana? Musiti' io mangapu ra pinataak ru ulun ru Siria no. Ralalom inggalan ru
Ginio ra pangilou i Gigaji ri Naaman. Paat ri Naaman nakakito ra sangulun mangilou riso, tuun io intor ra kurita' kuda nano am pangkuot, “Kua?”

Taam i Gigaji, “Kolondo', kaa' sinusub aku mambala' rirun ra bagu ayuk ruo ngaulun nabi intor ra pulalai ru nabi minatong intor ra kabuluran Ipraim. Tuan kuno makitaak maa' raginio mangani' kou talu ngaribu ngampila' ruit pirok am ruo konoon moonsoi ra ruo ngaulun nabi no.”

Kon ri Naaman, “Kua pai'!” Nampajajal io ri Gigaji maa' raginio mangapu 6,000 ngampila' ruit pirok. Lopoto' ri Naaman ruit no ra ralalom ru ruo kantungan, am pangalap ra ruo konoon moonsoi no. Ngaangai' no tinaakan ri Naaman ra ruo ngaulun ulipon nano, ondo' sinusub no mugar sumigulu ri Gigaji.
Paat ra ilo nakasaboi giu' ra bulur intok inayanan ri Ilisa, inalap i Gigaji ruo kantungan no am ibito' no minumpos ra baloi. Kopongo raginio panusub io ra ulipon-ulipon ri Naaman no minuli'.
Paat ri Gigaji minumpos ra baloi, pangkuot i Ilisa riso, “Ati inongoi muni?”
Taam i Gigaji, “Kalo minongoi ra ati-ati.”

Kaa' kon ri Ilisa, “Sala' ka kia ambiluo kutu soroi ra giu' no paat ra ulun no tumuun intor ra kurita' kuda nano koson tumuum rirun? Raino sala' ka paat no koson mangapu ra ruit am konoon, umo ru jaitun am umo ru anggur, sapi' am domba, kapoam ulipon-ulipon!
Sabap no ra nangapu kou ra pinataak no, okou am papag muno makaalap ra maruol ri Naaman ra sabuoi-buoi no!”
Paat ri Gigaji nangiruan ra intok raginio, natiu' io ra maruol ru kungkung; kungkung nano nasauk ra mapulak kaga'.
Paat ra sangarawan, pulalai ru nabi ondo' inila' ri Ilisa mindagu ri Ilisa, “Intok inayanan takati mapisok kaga'!
Iowo' akai mongoi pantagar ra tataun mamaar ra Sungoi Jordan, maa' raginio makapanambaloi akai ra intok ayanan ra giu' no.”
Taam i Ilisa, “Iou noyo.”
Sangulun intor risilo nampajajal ri Ilisa maa' raginio maya' risilo; nangiou i Ilisa.
Ginio ra nababaya' ilo minugar. Paat ra ilo nakasaboi mamaar ra Sungoi Jordan, tumalimpuun ilo mangandoi.

Bulintok ra sangulun intor risilo mantagar ra sampuun tataun, pulali' ru ulu ru panaa' nano naratu' ra timug. Golok ulun no ri Ilisa, “Atan kia musiti' kuno baalon? Panaa' no iniraan ku intor ra ulun bokon!”
Pangkuot i Ilisa, “Ati kia naratuan ru ulu ru panaa' no?”
Panulu' ulun no ra intok no. Putulo' ri Ilisa rondo' tataun am papatiro' no ra intok no. Pulali' ru ulu ru panaa' intor ra basi' no liminabui ra ralimbou ru timug.
Kon ri Ilisa, “Alapo'.” Tauro' ru ulun no ra kalindu' nano am alapo' ulu ru panaa' no.
Rondo' paat ra raja' ru pagun ru Siria tatanga' mangayou ra Israil. Kopongo nansusunur ra panglima-panglima nano, pampili' raja' ru Siria no ra rondo' intok, am pangkim io ra giu' no.
Kaa' panusub i Ilisa ra ulun mambala' ra baal raginio ra raja' ru Israil, am niayuk nampakara' maa' raginio kalo minggaar ra intok raginio, sabap ra ulun ru Siria tatanga' mawang ra giu' no.
Nampakara' raja' ru Israil ra ulun ondo' minayan ra giu' no maa' raginio pagilalain nilo. Koson raginio noyo ra ingkukula' i Ilisa nampakara' ra raja'.
Raja' ru pagun ru Siria malasu' guang sabap ra baal raginio. Pampiau io ra panglima-panglima nano am pangkuot risilo, “Osoi kia intor ramuyun ondo' sumaung ra raja' ru Israil?”
Taam sangulun intor risilo, “Kolondo' osoi pana, raja' kuno. Nabi Ilisa ondo' nambala' ra raja' ru Israil ra baal raginio, am niayuk ondo' rinagu muno giu' ra lamin pambalangan.”
Kon ru raja', “Uyumo' io, am rokopon ku io.”
Kabalai' raja' no ra soroi i Ilisa giu' ra Dotan,
pangator io ra sampulalai maayo mongoi ra giu' no nabaya' ra kuda am kurita' kuda. Pulalai ru saujor no nakasaboi giu' ra bandar iorondom, am pinagawangan nilo bandar no.

Suabon ra iosusuab tirong ulipon ri Ilisa, am ingkual intor ra baloi am nakakito ra saujor ru Siria nabaya' ra kuda am kurita' kuda nilo nampaliput ra bandar no. Saguli' io ri Ilisa am golok, “Alii boo ritakau ti, tuan! Atan kinua' musiti' baalon takau?”
Kon ri Ilisa, “Pai' kalaa', ondo' bala takau masuang poyo intor risilo no.”
I Ilisa pana pakiasi' boo, “Iou
Paat ra saujor ru Siria namulunsar risilo, pakiasi' i Ilisa, “Iou
Ratong i Ilisa risilo am indagu, “Nakalayau kau ra ralan! Gitio sala' ka bandar uyumon min. Sunu' kau raki'. Ibiton takamin ra ulun ondo' uyumon min.” Io pana nangaak risilo mongoi ra Samaria.
Pakasubol ilo ra bandar no, pakiasi' i Ilisa, “Ukabo' mato nilo ti, iou
Pakakito raja' ru Israil ra saujor ru Samaria, pangkuot io ri Ilisa, “Tuan, musiti' kia potoyon ku ilo?”
Taam i Ilisa, “Pai'. Saujor-saujor pana ondo' rinakop muno ralalom ru pangayawan pana kalo pinatoi mu. Anii' ilo ra akanon am inumon, am polosoon ilo muli' ra raja' nilo.”

Ginio ra nambaal raja' ru Israil no ra bunsag maayo risilo. Pakaakan am pakainum ilo, panusub raja' no risilo muli' ra raja' ru Siria. Intor ragili ulun ru Siria kalo boo namulunsar ra pagun ru Israil.
Kalo nabuoi raiti, Raja' Bingadad intor ra pagun ru Siria naningganai ra ngaangai' ru saujor nano minanggal ra Israil am nagawang ra bandar Samaria.
Kinibit nano, bitilan ra makalalaa' nasauk giu' ra bandar raginio saboi rondo' ulu ru kaladai logo no 80 ngampila' ruit pirok am 200 ngagram tatai' ru susuit asang
Tatanga' raja' ru Israil no mangkiralan giu' ra rasawat ru timbok ru bandar paat ra sangulun ruandu' giminolok riso, “Raja' kuno, indangano' aku!”
Taam raja' no, “Amon ru kalo mangindangan
Atan kapaganan muno?”
Kon ru ruandu' no, “Ruandu' ti nangatang maa' raginio akai ruo mangakan ra anak kuno galing, am orou sumunu' no mangakan ra anak nano.
Ginio ra mangansak akai ra anak kuno am akanon mai ginio. Susuab no mambala' aku riso ra musiti' mai akanon anak nano boo, kaa' sinibuni no anak nano!”
Pokorongog raja' raginio, rilako' no bayang nano sabap ra mangiluk guang. Ngaangai' ru ulun ondo' mamaar ra timbok no nakakito ra raja' no nambayang ra karung pinaralalom ra bayang nano.
Golok raja' no, “Gama' ru i Aki Kapuuno' mamatoi raki' amon ru ulu ri Ilisa kalo ingguluin ra orou raiti'!”
Ginio ra panusub raja' ra ulun mamparakop ri Ilisa.

Paat raginio soroi i Ilisa giu' ra baloi nababaya' ra kukula' ngaulun tingganai ru mamagun ondo' nanambului riso. Kalo poyo nakasaboi ulun sinusub ru raja', indagu i Ilisa ra tingganai-tingganai no, “Ulun mamatoi no tatanga' manusub ra ulun mamatoi raki'! Paat ra ulun no makasaboi, kaputi' kulobon am pai' io pasubolo'. Raja' galama' matong sumunu' riso.”
Kalo poyo nakai' ragu-ragu ri Ilisa, raja'
Indagu i Ilisa, “Rongogo' noyo ragu ru
Kaa' indagu pagawai saujor ru raja' no ri Ilisa, “Bai-bai boo! Kabalu' pana
Taam i Ilisa, “Makainono' kou raginio, kaa' kalo makaakan kou ra akanon no.”
Apat ngaulun ondo' makamaruol ru kungkung ondo' makalalaa' tatanga' soroi giu' ra liwar ru bandar Samaria. Pasakuot ilo ra rondo' am bokon, “Atan onong takau maginaa ra matoi ragiti?

Kolondo' onong takau mumpos ra bandar, sabap ra matoi takau ra maitilan ra giu' no. Amon ru mayan takau ragiti, matoi takau niayuk. Ibok ongoi takau ra pangkiman ru ulun ru Siria; ondo' mabaal nilo mamatoi ritakau, kaa' osoi makapandai ra maaru' lair kalo mampajamar ilo ritakau.”
Ginio ra paat ra orou tumalimpuun palunggai', ongoi ilo ra pangkiman ru ulun ru Siria. Kaa' paat ra ilo nakasaboi ra intok no, kolondo' ulun ra giu' no.

noyo nangkinibit ra saujor ru Siria nokorongog ra bolos koson ayuk ra rondo' pulalai ru saujor maayo ondo' minatong pamulunsar risilo ra kuda am kurita' kuda. Indoson ru saujor ru Siria ra raja' ru Israil nagakut ra raja' ru ulun ru Git am raja' ru ulun ru Misir am ngaangai' saujor nilo koson mamulunsar ra saujor ru Siria.
Ginio ra, paat ra mamai' no saujor ru Siria nagigiru' am niayuk nanatang ra kim, kuda, kaladai nilo koon raginio ayuk giu' ra pangkiman.

Pakasaboi apat ngaulun no giu' ra kiing ru pangkiman, umpos ilo ra rondo' ra kim no. Akano' am inumo' nilo atan ayuk ondo' soroi ra giu' no. Nangalap ilo ra pirok, mas am bayang ondo' nauliat nilo. Binuni nilo kuliamos-kuliamos raginio, am umpos poyo ra kim ra bokon no; binaal nilo baal ra nogondo'.

Kopongo raginio indagu ilo ra rondo' am bokon, “Itakau kalo musiti' mambaal ragitio! Mokoondo' takau ra tanou moonsoi, am ginio kalo moopot takau. Amon ru maginaa takau saboi ra susuab no, maaru' ukumin takau. Ibok ugar takau ra mataki' am pambala' ra pagawai-pagawai ru raja'!”

Ginio ra iruani' nilo pangkiman ru ulun ru Siria am saguli' ra Samaria. Golok ilo ra ulun magalung ra kulobon ru bandar, “Minongoi akai ra pangkiman ru ulun ru Siria, kaa' kolondo' nakito kapoam norongog mai ra osoi pana. Kuda am kaladai nilo lakat poyo narukugan ra intok no, am pangkiman no iniruanan koon raginio ayuk.”
Ulun magalung ra kulobon no nampatanou raginio, saboi ulun nampasaboi raginio ra istana.

Orou lakat poyo molondom, kaa' tirong raja' am indagu ra pagawai-pagawai nano, “Balain takamin ra atan arati' ru ulun ru Siria no! Nakapandai ilo ra itakau nangaitilan. Ginio ra nangiruan ilo ra pangkiman am pansibuni giu' ra limayak. Malansan ilo ritakau mingkual maguyum ra akanon, am ilo pana mamparakop ritakau ra maayag ti am mampagaau ra bandar takau.”

Sangulun intor ra pagawai ru raja' no mindagu, “Kabalu' pana raginio mamagun ru bandar ti matoi koson risilo ondo' minatoi noyo. Moonsoi poyo mangator takau ra kukula' ngaulun mangkuda ra limo ngainan ondo' lakat poyo soroi, maa' raginio makapandai takau ra atan ondo' nasauk.”
Nampili' ilo ra kukula' ngaulun, am raja' pana nanusub risilo sumakoi ra ruo kurita' kuda. Sinusub ilo mangimumui ra atan ondo' nasauk ra saujor ru Siria no.

Minugar ilo saboi ra Sungoi Jordan, am giu' ra galur ru ralan nakakito ilo ra bayang am kuliamos-kuliamos ondo' tinatang ru ulun ru Siria paat ra ilo nagigiru'. Kopongo raginio ulun-ulun sinusub no siminaguli' am pambala' ra raja' ra baal raginio.
Ingkual boo mamagun ru Samaria am nanalingaau ra pangkiman ru ulun ru Siria. Koson ra ragu ru

Nakainamot paat raginio, pagawai saujor ru raja' pinangandoi magalung ra kulobon garabang ru bandar. Minatoi io ra giu' no sabap ra nakinjangan ru ulun masuang. Koon raginio noyo ondo' rinagu ri Ilisa paat raja' timinuum riso.
Nambala' noyo i Ilisa ra raja' ra paat raginio ra suabon no, 3 ngakilogram gandum ondo' moonsoi kaga' kapoam 6 ngakilogram barli ondo' talanon giu' ra Samaria ra logo sampila' ruit pirok.
Paat raginio indagu pagawai saujor ru raja' no, “Bai-bai boo! Kabalu' pana
Ginio noyo ondo' nasauk riso – minatoi io nakinjangan ru mamagun ru bandar giu' ra kulobon garabang.
Sinugut ru ruandu' no bilin ri Ilisa am nabaya' ra sasambaloi nano minongoi ra pagun ru ulun ru Palistin am minayan ra giu' no buoi tulu' ngambilor.
Kopongo tulu' ngambilor, saguli' ruandu' no ra Israil am uma' ra raja' koson mangitaak maa' raginio baloi am tana' nano pasagulion riso.
Paat raginio tatanga' raja' no mindagu ri Gigaji, ulipon ri Ilisa. Masaga' raja' no makapandai intor ra kaimuagan-kaimuagan ondo' binaal ri Ilisa.

Tatanga' i Gigaji mantunung ra ati kulaan ri Ilisa namayag ra sangulun ondo' minatoi noyo, uma' ruandu' no ra raja'. Ginio ra indagu i Gigaji ra raja', “Raja' kuno, gitio noyo ruandu' i, am gitio noyo anak nati ondo' binayag saguli' ri Ilisa!”

Paat ra kinuatan ru raja', nangiou ruandu' no ra ragu ri Gigaji. Ginio ra pampiau raja' no ra pagawai nano am panusub riso mapasaguli' ra ngaangai' rapu' ondo' linonggom ru ruandu' no riso, nakaaya' logo ru ngaangai' ampos ru tinanom giu' ra umo nano buoi io tulu' ngambilor giu' ra liwar pagun.
Paat ra sanganuan, minongoi i Ilisa ra Damsyik paat ra raja' ru pagun Siria tatanga' marualan. Kabalai' raja' ra soroi i Ilisa ra giu',
indagu raja' no ri Gajail, sangulun intor ra pagawai nano, “Ibito' ayup no ra nabi no, am susubo' io mangkuot ra

Ginio ra pagibit i Gajail ra ngaangai' salinut ru ampos ondo' moonsoi kaga' intor ra Damsyik am posokoyo' ngaangai' no ra apat ngoopor ngainan unta, am ongoi tuum ri Ilisa. Pakauma' i Gajail ri Ilisa, indagu i Gajail, “Raja' Bingadad, ulipon muno, nanusub raki' mangkuot rirun ru mapali' io intor ra maruol nano kapoam kalo.”
Taam i Ilisa, “
Kopongo raginio pongoror i Ilisa ri Gajail saboi nagalabo i Gajail. Pulali' i Ilisa pantangi'.
Pangkuot i Gajail riso, “Kua kia pantangi' kou?”

Taam i Ilisa, “Sabap ra makapandai aku ra baal malaat kaga' baalon muno ra ulun ru Israil. Solobon mu kubu-kubu nilo, mamatoi ra ulun mangamulok nilo ondo' moonsoi kaga', mampalamba' ra anak-anak nilo saboi matoi, am niayuk mangabu' ra tinai' ru ruandu'-ruandu' nilo ondo' maapang.”
Kaa' taam i Ilisa, “
Uli' i Gajail ra Raja' Bingadad, am pangkuot Raja' Bingadad no riso, “Atan kia ragu ri Ilisa?”
Kon ri Gajail, “Nambala' io raki' ra mapali' kou.”
Kaa' suabon no, alap i Gajail ra rondo' bajang, pososopo' ra ralalom ru timug, am pojojoko' bajang no ra bulos ru raja' saboi raja' no minatoi.
Kopongo raginio minalit i Gajail ra Raja' Bingadad koson ra raja' ru pagun ru Siria.
Paat ra bilor kalimo ru pamarintaan ru Raja' Joram anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Agab giu' ra Israil, i Jigoram anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Josapat nasauk ra raja' ru Jiuda.
Paat raginio umur ru Raja' Jigoram talu ngoopor am ruo ngambilor, am namarinta io ra Jirusalim buoi balu' ngambilor.
Andu' nano iono anak ruandu' ru Raja' Agab, am koson ra sasambaloi ru Raja' Agab, minaya' Raja' Jigoram ra binaal malaat ru raja'-raja' ru Israil. Makatula io ra
kaa' kalo masaga'

Ginio ra ugar Raja' Jigoram nabaya' ra ngaangai' kurita' kuda nano minongoi ra Jair. Giu' no liniputan ilo ru saujor ru Idom, kaa' paat ra rondom no Raja' Jigoram am panglima-panglima ru pulalai ru kurita' kuda nano nakapagiru'. Saujor-saujor nano nantutuliar am sigagama' minuli' ra baloi.
Intor raginio Idom kalo boo kinuasa'
Ngaangai' binaal ru Raja' Jigoram tinulisan ralalom ru buuk
Raja' Jigoram minatoi am linobong giu' ra kalabangan ru raja' giu' ra Bandar Daut. Anak ungkuyon nano i Agajia minalit riso koson ra raja'.
Paat ra bilor koopor am ruo ra pamarintaan ru Raja' Jigoram anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Agab giu' ra Israil, i Agajia anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Jigoram nasauk ra raja' ru Jiuda.

Paat raginio umur ru Raja' Agajia no ruo ngoopor am ruo ngambilor. Raja' Agajia namarinta ra Jirusalim buoi sambilor. Ina' nano iono i Atalya anak ruandu' ru Raja' Agab, am akupu ru Raja' Omri intor ra Israil.
Raja' Agajia makapabukatan ra sasambaloi ru Raja' Agab sabap ra paguatan no. Makatula niayuk Raja' Agajia ra
Raja' Agajia naguum ra Raja' Joram intor ra Israil koson manggal ra Raja' Gajail intor ra Siria. Pangayawan nasauk giu' ra Ramot, giu' ra Giliad, am napilatan Raja' Joram ralalom ru pangayawan no.
Raja' Joram minuli' ra bandar Jijriil maa' raginio pilat-pilat nano mababas, am Raja' Agajia minongoi pagilong ra Raja' Joram.

Paat raginio Nabi Ilisa nampiau ra sangulun intor ra nabi ondo' inila' nano intor ra pulalai ru nabi, am indagu io riso, “Tampos no am ongoi no ra Ramot giu' ra Giliad. Ibito' rarapu' makasuang ra umau jaitun.
Paat ra okou makasaboi ra giu' no uyumo' i Jigu anak ri Josapat, akupu ri Nimsi. Ibito' io misangulun ra rondo' lamin, makatuliar intor ra rangan-rangan nano.
Pasasaro' boo umau jaitun ti ra tampak ru ulu nano am indagu ra, ‘Koon ragitio
Minongoi nabi mamulok no ra Ramot.
Giu' no natuum no i Jigu am panglima-panglima ru saujor no tatanga' mansusunur. Kono, “Tuan mokoondo' aku ra tanou moonsoi rirun.”
Pangkuot i Jigu, “Ra osoi kia papasabayan mu ra tanou no?”
Taam io, “Okou.”
Kopongo raginio minumpos ilo ruo ra rondo' lamin, am pasasaro' ru nabi mamulok no umau jaitun no ra ulu ri Jigu liliwa' mindagu, “
Potoyon mu sasambaloi ru tuan muno, anak ri Agab no, maa' raginio makapangukum Aku ri Ijibil ondo' namatoi ra nabi-nabi Kuli am ulipon-ulipon Ku ra bokon i.
Ngaangai' ulun ru sasambaloi ri Agab am papag nano musiti' matoi. Mamatoi Aku ra ngaangai' ungkuyon ru sasambaloi nano, ondo' mamulok am niayuk ondo' matutuo.
Nogondo' pamakuan Kuno ra sasambaloi nano koson ra sasambaloi ri Jirobiam am Baisa, raja'-raja' ru Israil.
Kalo molobong i Ijibil no. Baangkai nano akanon ru uku' giu' ra Jijriil.’ ” Karagu ginio ngaangai', iruani' ru nabi mamulok no lamin am pagindibok minugar.
Saguli' i Jigu ra panglima-panglima ra bokon no. Pangkuot ilo riso, “Atan kia tanou ondo' inibit nani? Kua ratong ulun mantuyang ni rirun?”
Pangkuot i Jigu, “Kalo kia nakapandai kau?”
Taam ilo, “Kalo. Pambala' no atan rinagu nani.”
Taam io, “Nambala' io raki' ra
Paat raginio niayuk, rangan-rangan ri Jigu nampabanta' ra sukub nilo giu' ra tampilon rasawat ru tukar no ri Jigu. Nanamput ilo ra bujung am golok, “I Jigu raja'!”

Kopongo raginio nagagakut Raja' Jigu manggal ra Raja' Joram. Paat raginio soroi Raja' Joram giu' ra Jijriil. Ongoi Raja' Joram ra giu' no koson makibabas ra pilat nano kinibit ru pangayawan giu' ra Ramot manggal ra Raja' Gajail, raja' ru pagun Siria. Indagu Raja' Jigu ra rangan-rangan nano, “Amon ru mangiou kau raki' masauk ra raja', tamungi' min maa' raginio pai' sangulun pana mingkual intor ra Ramot koson mambala' ra baal noopot ti ra mamagun ru Jijriil.”
Sakoi Raja' Jigu ra kurita' kuda nano, am ongoi ra Jijriil. Paat raginio Raja' Joram lakat poyo kalo napali', am Raja' Agajia intor ra Jiuda soroi ra giu' no koson mongoi pagilong ra Raja' Joram.
Sangulun magalung ondo' mangandoi ra manara giu' ra Jijriil nakakito ra Raja' Jigu am ulun-ulun nano matong. Kono, “Nakakito aku ra kukula' ngaulun matong!”
Taam Raja' Joram, “Susubo' sangulun saujor mangkuda mongoi pangimumui risilo no ru rangan kapoam pantula'.”
Inggaar saujor no ra Raja' Jigu am indagu riso, “Masaga' Raja' Joram makapandai ra okou matong ti koson ra rangan.”
Taam Raja' Jigu, “Ginio sala' ka maatang rirun. Sunu' raki'.”
Ulun magalung giu' ra manara no nambala' ra saujor no nakasaboi ra pulalai ru ulun no, kaa' kalio io siminaguli'.
Sangulun saujor ra bokon sinusub minongoi, am nangkuot ra baal ra nogondo' no ra Raja' Jigu. Igondo' poyo timinaam Raja' Jigu ra, “Ginio sala' ka maatang rirun! Sunu' raki'.”

Igondo' poyo ulun magalung no nambala' ra saujor no nakasaboi ra pulalai ru ulun no, kaa' kalio io siminaguli'. Kono poyo, “Tingganai ru pulalai no nampaugar ra kurita' kuda nano koson ra ulun mantuyang, koson io ri Jigu!”

Kon ru Raja' Joram, “Paatango' kurita' kuda kuno.” Pakaatang kurita' kuda nano, io am Raja' Agajia minongoi nabaya' ra kurita' kuda ru sigagama' koson muma' ra Raja' Jigu. Nakatuum ilo ra Raja' Jigu giu' ra umo ragili longgom ri Nabot.
Pangkuot Raja' Joram ra Raja' Jigu, “Okou matong ti koson ra rangan kia?”
Kon ru Raja' Jigu, “Sala' ka lair koson ra rangan buoi ragiti lakat poyo masauk ragiti ilimu' sihir am sumamba ra sinungkalalaing ondo' pinuunan ri Ijibil, ina' muno raja'?”
“Pamparuungan!” Golok ru Raja' Joram ra Raja' Agajia, liliwa' nampalisang ra kurita' kuda nano am pagiru' intor ra giu' no.

Kaa' alapo' ri Raja' Jigu busur nano, am kinai' no ikang namanah ra Raja' Joram intor ra bakulung. Anak panah no nakatujok ra pusu' ru Raja' Joram am karatu' io am patoi giu' ra ralalom ru kurita' kuda nano.

Kon ru Raja' Jigu ri Bidkar, pagawai saujor nano, “Alapo' baangkai no am patiri' giu' ra tana' longgom ri Nabot no. Karaa' paat okou am aku nangura' ra kuda giu' ra tinaulian ru Raja' Agab, ama' ru Raja' Joram ragili, nakaindagu

‘Rondom i nakakito Aku ra namatayan ri Nabot am anak-anak nano. Raino bantuon Ku ra mangukum Aku rirun ragiti, ra tana' ragitio niayuk.’ Ginio ra alapo' baangkai ru Raja' Joram, am patiri' ra tana' ondo' ragili longgom ri Nabot, maa' raginio masugut ukuman ri Aki Kapuuno' no riso.”

Nakakito Raja' Agajia ra atan ondo' nasauk no. Ginio ra pagiru' io ra kurita' kuda nano minongoi ra tampilon ru bandar Bit-Gagan. Nangilou Raja' Jigu ra Raja' Agajia. “Potoyo' raja' raginio niayuk!” nanusub Raja' Jigu ra ulun nano. Namanah ilo ra Raja' Agajia
Pagawai-pagawai ru Raja' Agajia nagibit ra baangkai nano siminaguli' ra Jirusalim ra rondo' kurita' kuda am linobong io giu' ra kalabangan ru raja' giu' ra Bandar Daut.
Raja' Agajia nasauk ra raja' ru Jiuda ra bilor koopor am rondo' ru pamarintaan ru Raja' Joram anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Agab giu' ra Israil.

Kopongo raginio nakasaboi Raja' Jigu giu' ra Jijriil. Paat ri Ijibil nokorongog ra atan ondo' nasauk no, saiti' no bingkolot ru mato nano, am busaki' abuk nano, am pagilong ra ragana' intor ra gigimpalan ru istana.
Paat ra Raja' Jigu nansail giu' ra kulobon garabang, golok i Ijibil, “Okou Jimri,
Pantingaa' Raja' Jigu am indagu, “Mokoondo' kia osoi-osoi ondo' sumaung raki'?” Mokoondo' ruo kapoam talu ngaulun pagawai ru istana nagilong ra ragana' intor ra rondo' gigimpalan.

Raja' Jigu pana mindagu risilo, “Papatiro' ruandu' no ra ragana'!” Ilo pana nampapatir ra ruandu' no ra ragana' saboi raraa' nano nakatakis ra timbok am ra kukula' ngainan kuda ra giu' no. Jinanjang ru Raja' Jigu no baangkai ri Ijibil ra kuda am kurita' kuda nano,
am umpos ra istana am pangakan. Kopongo raginio kon ru Raja' Jigu, “Nausung ruandu' no. Kabalu' pana koson raginio, lobongo' baangkai nano sabap ra io no anak ruandu' ru raja'.”
Kaa' ulun ondo' mongoi pompolobong ra baangkai ri Ijibil no kalo nakatuum ra atan-atan pana ondo' ayuk am kuapak am bungul-bungul ru kalayam am niayuk kalindu' nano.
Paat ra ilo nambala' ra baal raginio ra Raja' Jigu, kono, “Baal ragitio nasauk koson ra rinagu noyo ru
Suwo-suwo ru baangkai nano makulipatak koson ra ampangara' ru bibiag, saboi kalo boo mauligan.’ ”
Tulu' ngoopor ngaulun papag ru Raja' Agab minayan giu' ra bandar Samaria. Raja' Jigu pana nanulis ra rondo' surat am nangator ra surat no ra panguasa'-panguasa' ru bandar no,
“Akau uakil ru papag ru raja', am mokoondo' kau ra ngaangai' kurita' kuda, kuda, kinandoi mangayou, am niayuk bandar-bandar mokoondo' ra kubu. Ginio ra maapu min ayuk surat ti,
pilio' noyo ondo' maaya' kaga' ra gino ngai' papag ru raja', am lantiko' io masauk ra raja', am mangayou kau manaung riso.”
Ulun-ulun mangunguasa' ra Samaria nangalaa'. Konilo, “Ati kulaan takau makaanggal ra Raja' Jigu, alika Raja' Joram am Raja' Agajia pana kalo makaanggal riso?”

Ginio ra tingganai ru pagawai ru istana am tingganai ru pagawai ru bandar, nababaya' ra tingganai-tingganai ru mamagun am uakil-uakil, nangator ra taaman ragitio ra Raja' Jigu. Konilo, “Akai ti ulipon mu raja'. Nakatampos akai noyo gumagaya' ra ragu muno. Marara' akai mampalantik ra osoi pana masauk ra raja'. Baalo' noyo atan ayuk ondo' moonsoi ra pagilangan muno raja'.”

Nanulis Raja' Jigu ra rondo' surat poyo risilo. Suang nano koon raginio, “Amon ru akau ra bala kuno, am nakatampos gumagaya' ra ragu kuno, ibito' ulu ru ngaangai' papag ru Raja' Agab raki' giu' ra Jijriil paat koson ragitio ra susuab no.”
Paat raginio, tulu' ngoopor ngaulun papag ru Raja' Agab inalungan am pinasukor ru tingganai-tingganai ru mamagun ru bandar Samaria.

Kopongo ra ilo nakaapu ra surat ru Raja' Jigu, potoyo' nilo ngaangai' papag ru Raja' Agab, ondo' suang no tulu' ngoopor ngaulun. Pasuango' nilo ulu-ulu no ra kukula' bakul, am atari' ngaangai' no ra Raja' Jigu giu' ra Jijriil.
Paat ra Raja' Jigu binalaan ra ulu-ulu no nakasaboi noyo, panusub io koson manuntur ra ulu-ulu no masauk ra ruo ngatuntur giu' ra kulobon garabang, am polosoon ra giu' no saboi ra suabon no.

Suabon no, ongoi Raja' Jigu ra kulobon garabang am kono ra ngaangai' ulun ra giu' no, “Topot ra aku ra sala ralalom guor ra Raja' Joram, am aku no namatoi riso. Akau kolondo' sala. Kaa' osoi kia ondo' namatoi ra ulun ti ngaangai'?
Raino napandayan ra ngaangai' ondo' rinagu ru
Kopongo raginio Raja' Jigu namatoi poyo ra ngaangai' pabukat ru Raja' Agab ondo' minayan giu' ra Jijriil am niayuk ngaangai' pagawai, rangan moonsoi, am imam nano; sangulun pana kalo pinoloso naayag.
Raja' Jigu nangiruan ra Jijriil am ongoi ra Samaria. Giu' ra tanga' ralan, giu' ra rondo' intok ondo' makainggalan ra “Pangkiman ru Magagalung”,
nakauma' io ra kukula' ngaulun pabukat ru Raja' Agajia, raja' Jiuda. Pangkuot io risilo, “Osoi kia akau ti?”
Taam ilo, “Akai ti pabukat ru Raja' Agajia. Tatanga' akai mangkiralan mongoi ra Jijriil koson mongoi pagilong ra anak-anak ru Raja' ruandu' Ijibil, am pabukat ru raja' ra bokon no.”

Panusub Raja' Jigu ra ulun-ulun nano, “Rokopo' min ilo!” Ulun-ulun nano pana namparakop risilo, am Raja' Jigu namatoi risilo mamaar ra rondo' tulubong. Ngaangai' no olo'-olo' 42 ngaulun, am sangulun pana kalo pinoloso naayag.

Namparayus poyo Raja' Jigu ra pangkiralanan nano. Giu' ra tanga' ralan, tinuum io ri Jonadab anak ri Rikab. Liliwa' nanabi' riso, kono, “Sala' ka kia ito ti rondo' guang? Masaga' kou kia manungka' raki'?”
Taam i Jonadab, “Masaga' aku.” Kon ru Raja' Jigu, “Amon ru koon poyo raginio, pansikin to.” Pansikin ilo, am pangindangan Raja' Jigu ri Jonadab sumakoi ra kurita' kuda nano.
Kon ru Raja' Jigu, “Baya' no raki' am ilai' galama' ra mapara' pirot kuno mangandoi ayuk ra
Pakasaboi ilo ra giu' no, namatoi Raja' Jigu ra ngaangai' pabukat ru Raja' Agab; sangulun pana kalo pinoloso naayag. Baal ragitio nasauk nontopot ra ragu ru
Panimung Raja' Jigu ra ngaangai' mamagun ru Samaria am indagu, “Raja' Agab kalo kukula' mapirot mangandoi ayuk ra Baal, kaa' aku mangandoi ayuk riso ra mapirot.

Timungo' ngaangai' nabi ru Baal, ngaangai' ulun ondo' sumamba riso am ngaangai' ru imam nano. Sangulun pana kalo pinasuai. Mampataak aku ra taak simbalui ra maayo no ra Baal, am osoi kalo mongoi saang no ukumin ra matoi.” (Gitio noyo ruung ru Raja' Jigu koson mamatoi ra ngaangai' ru ulun ondo' sumamba ra Baal.)
Kopongo raginio indagu Raja' Jigu, “Potonowo' noyo rondo' orou ru pangiantakan koson sumamba ra Baal!” Papatanawan raginio pinaugar,

am Raja' Jigu galama' nampatanou ra tanou raginio giu' ra titikop pagun ru Israil. Ngaangai' ulun ondo' sumamba ra Baal minatong paat ra orou raginio; kolondo' sangulun pana natatang. Ilo ngaangai' minumpos ra kuil Baal am nompososok ra intok no intor ra saang polos ra talikuron.
Raja' Jigu pana nanusub ra imam-imam ondo' manalingapu ra sukub ru sambayang maa' raginio mangingkual ra sukub-sukub no am mapataak raginio ra ulun ondo' matong sumamba ra Baal.

Kopongo raginio Raja' Jigu galama' minumpos ra kuil nabaya' ri Jonadab anak ri Rikab. Kono ra ngaangai' ulun ra giu' no, “Tutuno' min ulun ondo' sumamba ra Baal ayuk sumaang ragiti, am kolondo' ulun ondo' sumambayang ra

Kopongo raginio umpos Raja' Jigu am i Jonadab am pampataak ra taak-taak simbalui am taak simbalui ondo' solobon ra Baal. Giu' ra liwar ru kuil, pinosoroi ru Raja' Jigu balu' ngoopor ngaulun, am panusub risilo, “Potoyo' ngaangai' ulun ti! Osoi ayuk ondo' mompoloso risilo magiru' ukumin ra potoyon!”

Kopongo ayuk Raja' Jigu nampataak ra taak simbalui, indagu io ra ulun-ulun magagalung am saujor nano, “Umpos no am potoyo' ilo ngaangai'. Pai' polosoo' sangulun pana magiru'!” Minumpos ulun-ulun magagalung am pagawai-pagawai no ra giu' no ra nanangilang. Namatoi ilo ra ngaangai' ulun am namparalaat ra baangkai-baangkai no miningkual. Kopongo raginio umpos ilo ra ralalom ru kuil
am napaingkual ra lugu' sambaan ondo' soroi ra giu' no am nonolob raginio.
Ilo pana namuut ra lugu' sambaan am kuil, am sauko' nilo kuil no ra jamban saboi ra orou raiti'.
Ginio noyo ralan ru Raja' Jigu namuso ra sumamba ra Baal giu' ra Israil.
Kaa' io niayuk minaya' ra tula ru Raja' Jirobiam ondo' nangkinibit ra Israil makatula sabap sumamba ra sapi' mas ondo' binaal no giu' ra Bitil am giu' ra Dan.
Indagu
Kaa' kalo giminagaya' Raja' Jigu ra Ukum ru
Paat raginio

giu' ra tampilon sirangon ru Sungoi Jordan saboi ra bandar Aroir giu' ra tampilon rabugus, giu' ra kiing ru Sungoi Arnon. Wilayah no nakasimpung tana' ru Giliad am Basan, intok inayanan ru ulun bansa' ru Gad, Rubin, am Manasi Sirangon.
Ngaangai' binaal ru Raja' Jigu, nakasimpung kinapanggol nano tumula', tinulisan ralalom ru buuk
Raja' Jigu minatoi am linobong giu' ra Samaria. Anak ungkuyon nano, i Jigoagas namalit riso koson ra raja'.
Raja' Jigu namarinta giu' ra Samaria koson ra raja' ru Israil buoi ruo ngoopor am balu' ngambilor.
Paat ri Atalya, ina' ru Raja' Agajia, nokorongog ra namatayan ra anak ungkuyon nano, ina' ru raja' no nanusub maa' raginio ngaangai' pabukat ru raja' potoyon.

I Joas ayuk, anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Agajia ondo' nakapagiru' intor ra pamatayan no. Maar noyo mapatoi i Joas mababaya' ra anak ungkuyon ru raja' ra bokon, kaa' i Joas binayag ru kaminan nano, i Josiba anak ruandu' ru Raja' Jigoram; i Josiba pabukat ru Raja' Agajia, rondo' ama' nansuai ra ina'. I Josiba nagibit ri Joas am magagalung ri Joas ra rondo' lamin giu' ra Baloi ru
Onom ngambilor buoi ri Josiba nagalung ri Joas am niayuk nampasibuni riso giu' ra Baloi ru
Kaa' paat ra bilor katulu', Imam Joyada nanusub ra tingganai-tingganai ru pulalai magagalung ra raja' am magagalung ra istana koson muma' riso giu' ra Baloi ru
am nanusub ragitio, “Paat ra akau mangandoi ra orou Sabat, sampitalu intor ramuyun musiti' magalung ra istana;
sampitalu poyo musiti' magalung giu' ra Kulobon Garabang Sur am ondo' bokon no magalung giu' ra talikuron ru magagalung-magagalung ra bokon.
Ruo pulalai ondo' tumangus paat ra orou Sabat musiti' magalung giu' ra Baloi ru
Akau musiti' magalung ri Joas ra ilang ondo' paakangon am mamaya' riso ra ati ayuk angayan nano. Osoi ayuk pana ondo' minggaar no musiti' min potoyon.”
Ginagaya' ru tingganai-tingganai no susuban ri Joyada am nagibit ra pulalai nilo riso, iono ulun ondo' timinangus paat ra orou Sabat am ilo ondo' mangandoi paat ra orou Sabat.
Nangani' i Joyada ra tingganai-tingganai no ra tutura' am perisai longgom ru Raja' Daut, ondo' binulian giu' ra Baloi ru
Nanusub i Joyada ra ulun-ulun magagalung ondo' nagibit ra ilang paakangon maa' raginio magalung giu' ra liput tampilon ra saang ru Baloi ru

Kopongo raginio nagibit i Joyada ri Joas miningkual, am nampakaraun ri Joas am nangani' riso ra rondo' ralin ru ukum intor ra pamarintaan ru raja'. I Joas pana linantik boo ra raja' am baal raginio pinatanou ra mamagun. Mamagun nagilakup liliwa' giminolok, “Kaayag no raja'!”
Raja' Ruandu' Atalya nokorongog ra ginia' ru ulun-ulun magagalung am mamagun, Raja' Ruandu' Atalya pana nagindibok minongoi giu' ra Baloi ru
Nakito ru Raja' Ruandu' Atalya no raja' bagu no minigor ra sapapa' ru lugu', maar ra kulobon ru Baloi ru
Kalo mangiou i Joyada ra Raja' Ruandu' Atalya potoyon giu' ra liliut ru Baloi ru
Namparakop ilo ra Raja' Ruandu' Atalya, am ibito' io giu' ra istana, am namatoi ra raja' ruandu' no giu' ra Kulobon Garabang ru Kuda.
Panusub Imam Joyada ra Raja' Joas am mamagun mambaal ra rondo' nabantuan ra

Kopongo raginio umpos mamagun ra ralalom ru kuil Baal am nampalunsai ra kuil no. Inumok nilo ngaangai' altar am sinungkalalaing sambaan ra giu' no. Namatoi ilo ri Matan, imam ru Baal, giu' ra saang ru altar-altar no.
Panusub i Joyada ra ulun-ulun magagalung ra magalung giu' ra Baloi ru
am i Joyada galama', pagawai-pagawai nano, ulun magalung ra raja', am ulun magalung ra istana, magalung ra raja' intor ra Baloi ru
Ngaangai' ulun maansukan am bandar pana nasauk ra mamimio sabap i Atalya pinatoi noyo giu' ra istana.
Tulu' ngambilor umur ru Raja' Joas paat io nasauk ra raja' ru Jiuda.

Paat ra bilor katulu' ru pamarintaan ru Raja' Jigu giu' ra Israil, Raja' Joas nasauk ra raja' ru Jiuda. Raja' Joas namarinta giu' ra Jirusalim ra apat ngoopor ngambilor buoi no. Ina' nano makainggalan ri Jibya intor ra bandar Birsyiba.
Buoi ru bayag nano nambaal Raja' Joas ra baal-baal ondo' kaansayin ru
Kabalu' pana raginio, intok sambaan ra dewa kalo pinuso, am mamagun lakat poyo mampataak ra taak simbalui am niayuk monolob ra kaminyan ra giu' no.
Moonong imam pinalansan ra ruit ondo' apuon intor ra ulun manaak, am ruit no pakayon koson mamuna' ra Baloi ru
Kaa' saboi ra bilor karuo ngoopor am talu ru pamarintaan ru Raja' Joas, imam-imam no lakat poyo kalo namuna' ra nangalunsai giu' ra Baloi ru
Ginio ra pampiau Raja' Joas ri Joyada am imam-imam ra bokon, am pangkuot risilo, “Kua kia kalo poyo namuna' kau ra Baloi ru
Imam-imam no nangiou koson kalo manimung ra ruit ru mamagun am niayuk nangiou koson kalo manalingapu ra pamunaan ra Baloi ru
Kopongo raginio pangalap i Joyada rondo' kaban am luangi' no tataub no, am pabantaa' ra sapapa' ru altar, giu' ra tampilon pamiris ru kulobon umpasan ra Baloi ru

Pogonong raginio, paat ra ruit ralalom ru kaban no masuang noyo, mamamatik ru raja' am Tingganai Maayo Imam matong koson manguntob ra ruit ondo' soroi ra giu' no, am pasubolon ginilo ra ralalom ru kantungan.
Kopongo nanulis ra suang ru ruit ra motopot, pataako' nilo ruit no ra pagawai-pagawai ondo' magalung ra pamunaan ra Baloi ru
ulun mangimbatu am ulun manuyu' ra batu. Ilo niayuk nambali ra tataun am batu koson mamuna' ra Baloi ru
Ruit no kalo pinakai koson mambayar ra mambaal ra sangkir pirok, mangkuk, bujung kapoam kuliamos ru lampung, kapoam kuliamos ra bokon ondo' binaal intor ra pirok kapoam mas.
Ngaangai' ru ruit no pinakai koson mambayar ra gaji' ru ulun manukang am koson mambali ra kuliamos-kuliamos ondo' makapakuan.
Pagawai-pagawai ondo' mantamung ra kandoi no mabanis toojo guang. Ginio ra kalo kitaakon ilo mambaal ra laporan ru ruit.
Ruit ondo' apuon ra tayar ru taak simbalui no koson mambayar ra kalubatan am taak simbalui koson mangampun ra tula kalo pasubolon ra kaban no. Ruit raginio pataakon ra imam-imam.
Paat raginio Raja' Gajail, raja' ru Siria namulunsar ra bandar Gat am kinala no. Kopongo raginio makaguang io mamulunsar ra Jirusalim.
Raja' Joas, panguasa' ru Jiuda, nanimung ra ngaangai' taak ondo' patimpokon noyo ra
Ngaangai' binaal ru Raja' Joas tinulisan ra ralalom ru buuk

Pagawai-pagawai ru Raja' Joas naguguum manggal riso. Ruo ngaulun intor risilo, iono i Jojakar anak ri Simiat am i anak ri Somir, namatoi ra Raja' Joas giu' ra baloi ondo' binaal ra rasawat ru namumpunan ra tana' giu' ra tampilon sirangon ru Jirusalim, iono giu' ra ralan mongoi ra bandar Sila. Raja' Joas linobong giu' ra kalabangan ru raja' giu' ra Bandar Daut, am i Amajia, anak ungkuyon nano minalit riso koson raja'.

Paat ra bilor karuo ngoopor am talu ru pamarintaan ru Raja' Joas anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Agajia giu' ra Jiuda, Raja' Jigoagas anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Jigu nasauk ra raja' giu' ra Israil, am namarinta io giu' ra Samaria buoi mopor am tulu' ngambilor.
Koson ra Raja' Jirobiam ondo' namarinta ra nakapagulu riso, Raja' Jigoagas niayuk makatula ra
Ginio ra siminangit
Kopongo raginio Raja' Jigoagas nakiasi' ra
Nangator
Kaa' ilo lakat poyo kalo timinalikur intor ra tula ondo' nakinibitan ru Raja' Jirobiam. Kalo liminonggo' ilo ra nambaal ra tula, am sinungkalalaing ru Dewi Asyira lakat poyo soroi ra Samaria.

Kolondo' boo ra Raja' Jigoagas no pulalai mangayou ondo' ak am limo ngoopor ngaulun saujor mangkuda, mopor kurita' kuda, am mopor ngaribu ngaulun saujor mantana'. Raja' ru Siria namuso ra pulalai mangayou ru Raja' Jigoagas am kikinjangi' no ilo koson ra kaau.
Ngaangai' binaal ru Raja' Jigoagas, nakaaya' kinapanggol nano, tinulisan ra ralalom ru buuk
Raja' Jigoagas minatoi am linobong giu' ra Samaria. I Jigoas, anak ungkuyon nano minalit riso koson ra raja'.

Paat ra bilor katalu ngoopor am tulu' ru pamarintaan ru Raja' Joas giu' ra Jiuda, Raja' Jigoas anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Jigoagas nasauk ra raja' giu' ra Israil, am namarinta io giu' ra Samaria buoi no mopor am onom ngambilor.
Raja' Jigoas niayuk makatula ra
Ngaangai' binaal ru Raja' Jigoas, nakaaya' kinapanggol tumula' nano ralalom pangayawan manggal ra Raja' Amajia intor ra Jiuda, tinulisan ra ralalom ru buuk
Raja' Jigoas minatoi am linobong giu' ra kalabangan ru raja' giu' ra Samaria, am i Jirobiam II, anak ungkuyon nano minalit riso koson ra raja'.
Kon ri Ilisa riso, “Alapo' panah ti am kukula' ngantaun pamanah no.” Raja' Jigoas pana nangalap raginio.
Panusub i Ilisa ra Raja' Jigoas tumampos koson mamanah, am io pana timinampos. Patampako' ri Ilisa kalindu' nano ra kalindu' ru raja'.

Kopongo raginio, nabaya' ra susuban ru nabi no, ukabo' ru Raja' Jigoas gigimpalan ondo' tumingkuang ra pagun ru Siria. Kon ri Ilisa, “Palabuso' pamanah no!” Pakalabus ayuk ru raja' pamanah no, kon ru nabi no, “Okou raja' noyo pamanah ru
Kopongo raginio panusub i Ilisa ra raja' mangalap ra pamanah ra bokon am mapalamba' ra tana' ra pamanah no. Lambaa' ru raja' no tana' saboi intalu am langgai'.
Sangit i Ilisa am kono ra raja', “Kua kalo linamba' mu inlimo kapoam inggonom maa' raginio malingon mu maala ulun ru Siria? Kaa' raino intalu kou ayuk makapangala ra ulun ru Siria.”
Kalo nabuoi raginio i Ilisa minatoi am linobong.
Moonong bilor, santimungan ulun malaat ru Moab maindalom mamulunsar ra pagun ru Israil.

Paat ra sangarawan no, bulintok ra ulun ru Israil tatanga' mompolobong ra ulun minatoi, nakito nilo santimungan ulun malaat ru Moab. Sabap ra nangalaa', pinapatir nilo baangkai no ra ralalom ru lobong ri Ilisa am pagigiru'.
Buoi ra pamarintaan ru Raja' Jigoagas, Raja' Gajail intor ra Siria nangimbolo' ra ulun ru Israil.
Kaa' moonsoi guang ru
Paat ra Raja' Gajail intor ra Siria no minatoi, i Bingadad anak ungkuyon nano nasauk ra raja'.

Paat raginio Raja' Jigoas intor ra Israil, intalu nangala ra Raja' Bingadad. Raja' Jigoas nampagaau saguli' ra bandar-bandar ondo' pinarinta ru Raja' Bingadad paat ra pamarintaan ru Raja' Jigoagas, ama' ru Raja' Jigoas.
Paat ra bilor karuo pamarintaan ru Raja' Jigoas anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Jigoagas giu' ra Israil, Raja' Amajia anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Joas nasauk ra raja' giu' ra Jiuda.
Paat raginio umur ru Raja' Amajia ruo ngoopor am limo ngambilor. Namarinta io giu' ra Jirusalim buoi ruo ngoopor am siam ngambilor. Ina' nano makainggalan ri Jigoadin intor ra Jirusalim.
Nambaal Raja' Amajia ra atan ondo' mapabansuk ra guang ru
Kalo linunsai ru Raja' Amajia intok-intok sambaan ra sinungkalalaing am mamagun kalo lumonggo' mampataak ra taak simbalui am niayuk monolob ra kaminyan ra giu' no.
Paat ra pamarintaan ru Raja' Amajia maikang noyo, namatoi io ra pagawai-pagawai ondo' namatoi ra ama' nali, raja' ondo' nagulu namarinta intor riso.
Raja' Amajia kalo namatoi ra anak-anak nilo sabap ra siminugut io ra susuban ru
Raja' Amajia namatoi ra mopor ngaribu ngaulun saujor giu' ra Limayak Asin, am nampagaau ra bandar Sila. Ininggalanan no bandar no ra Joktiil. Saboi raino bandar no lakat poyo makainggalan ra Joktiil.
Kopongo raginio nanusub Raja' Amajia ra kukula' ngaulun mongoi ra Raja' Jigoas giu' ra Israil koson magangat riso makimangayou.

Kaa' taam Raja' Jigoas ra pagangatan no koon raginio, “Rondo' paat no ra bulungkut makaruui giu' ra Gunung Libanon mangator ra tanou ra puun sidar, ‘Iowo' noyo anak ruandu' muno magandu' ra anak ungkuyon kuno.’ Kaa' sanginan bibiag masigo nansail ra giu' no am nanginjang ra bulungkut makaruui no.

Okou Raja' Amajia, malupus nangala ra ulun ru Idom, Raja' Amajia nasauk ra malilimbau! Mamanggo ra kamanangan raino am porondon no ra baloi. Kua paguguyum ra panguyatan ondo' pupus no maparatong ra karaat ra inan ru Raja' Amajia am mamagun?”
Kaa' Raja' Amajia kalo nampalio ra bilin raginio. Raja' Jigoas pana am saujor-saujor nano miningkual minanggal ra Raja' Amajia giu' ra Bit-Simis giu' ra Jiuda.
Saujor ru Raja' Amajia kinala, am ngaangai' saujor nano nagigiru' minuli' ra baloi ru sigagama'.

Rinakop ru Raja' Jigoas no Raja' Amajia, am namparayus ra pamulunsaran nano giu' ra Jirusalim. Tinuyas no timbok ru bandar ra kinagalur ru 200 ngamito, intor ra Kulobon Garabang Ipraim saboi ra Kulobon Garabang Pisuk.
Inalap ru Raja' Jigoas ngaangai' pirok am mas ondo' natuum nano, ngaangai' kakamot ru Baloi ru
Ngaangai' binaal ru Raja' Jigoas, nakaaya' kinapanggol nano tumula' ralalom ru pangayawan minanggal ra Raja' Amajia intor ra Jiuda tinulisan ra ralalom ru buuk
Raja' Jigoas minatoi am linobong giu' ra kalabangan ru raja' giu' ra Samaria. Kopongo raginio i Jirobiam II, anak ungkuyon nano minalit riso koson ra raja'.
Raja' Amajia, raja' ru Jiuda, naayag mopor am limo ngambilor poyo nalupus pinatayan ru Raja' Jigoas, raja' ru Israil.
Ngaangai' binaal ru Raja' Amajia tinulisan ra ralalom ru buuk
Kukula' ngaulun giu' ra Jirusalim naguguum koson mamatoi ra Raja' Amajia. Ginio ra nagiru' io minongoi ra bandar Lakgis, kaa' inilou io ru pantula'-pantula' nano ra giu' no am namatoi riso.
Kopongo raginio baangkai ru Raja' Amajia inaut ra kuda minongoi ra Jirusalim, am linobong giu' ra kalabangan ru raja' giu' ra Bandar Daut.
Mamagun ru Jiuda nampalantik ri Ujia,
Kopongo pinatayan ru ama' nano, Raja' Ujia nampagaau saguli' ra bandar Ilat, am nanirong raginio saguli'.

Paat ra bilor koopor am limo ra pamarintaan ru Raja' Amajia anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Joas giu' ra Jiuda, Raja' Jirobiam anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Jigoas nasauk ra raja' giu' ra Israil. Namarinta Raja' Jirobiam giu' ra Samaria buoi apat ngoopor am rondo' ngambilor.
Makatula Raja' Jirobiam ra

Raja' Jirobiam nampagaau saguli' ra ngaangai' wilayah ondo' ragili linonggom ru Israil, intor ra Ginting Gamat giu' ra ralayo saboi ra Raat Matoi giu' ra rabugus. Koon raginio noyo ondo' binantu' ragili ru
Nakito ru
Kolondo' guang ru
