Lakat poyo mokoondo' kalansanan ra puun tataun ondo' tagaron;
puun tataun no maayag saguli' am makapango.
Kabalu' pana bakat nano tumuo,
am tuor nano matoi giu' ra ralalom ru tana',
kaa' paat mokoowot ra timug, puun tataun no tumuu' poyo;
koson ra puun tataun mamulok, talantar-talantar no mujak saguli'.
Kaa' matoi poyo ulun, ginio noyo pupus nilo.
Ati kia angayan nilo malupus matoi?
Koson ra sungoi ondo' liminonggo' tumilis,
am tasik ondo' nakai' noyo timug,
koon raginio noyo ulun ondo' minatoi noyo,
kalo boo sumaguli' kaayag.
Kalo sumukal ilo buoi limbowon soroi,
am kalo makarat intor ra bolong nilo.
Moogot aku maa' raginio pasibunion Mu aku giu' ra intok ru ulun minatoi.
Polosoon aku pasibunion saboi ra Okou kalo boo sumangit.
Mopongo raginio aruo' orou koson mangkara' raki' saguli'.
Amon ru matoi ulun,
maayag ilo poyo kia?
Kaa' marayus aku maginaa,
saboi ra paat ru kapaganan kuno makasail.
Okou pana mampiau raki', am tumaam aku,
am motogom Kou raki', ondo' maayag ra binaal Muno.
Kopongo raginio ilayin Mu moonong tumpang kuno,
kaa' kalo tulisin Mu tula kuno.
Mangampun Kou am mapainggalur ra tula kuno;
pusoon Mu ngaangai' kasalaan kuno ragili.
Masaboi paat no ra gunung matuan am malapak-lapak,
am gunung batu minsir intor ra intok nano.
Batu mauru' ru timug ondo' tumilis ra maaug,
am tana' abason ru rasam ondo' maawas;
koon raginio noyo Okou mangumok ra kalansanan ru ulun koson maayag.
Nangala Kou am nanginggi' ra ulun ra sabubuoi no;
paat ra ilo manguma' ra kapatayan, nangulau Kou ra bulos nilo.
Anak-anak nilo nasauk ra ulun nauligan kaga',
kaa' kalo nakapandai ilo.
Ilo niayuk kalo binalaan
paat ra anak-anak nilo nauyu'.
Makaliman ilo ayuk ra maruol inan galama',
am naimbolo' ra kapilatan ru guang.
Kopongo raginio taam i Ialipas,
“Ragu kolondo' onong, Ayup! Kolondo' onong ru raguon muno!
Kolondo' ulun mapintar mindagu koson rirun,
kapoam manaung ra inan nano ra ragu-ragu ondo' kolondo' arati'.
Kinapalo mu guang ru ulun ondo' malaa' ri Aki kapuuno';
inompong mu ilo makiasi' Riso.
Ragu-ragu muno mapainono' ra makasala kou,
kaa' kalaatan muno tinauban mu ra ragu-ragu mamparuung.
Kalo pana mononsol aku rirun;
sinonsol kou noyo ru moonong ragu muno galama'.
Nangkara' kou kia ra okou ulun ondo' kasaa' inanak?
Nakasaang kou kia paat ra gunung inangun?
Nokorongog kou kia ra inatangan ondo' binaal ri Aki Kapuuno'?
Okou ayuk kia ondo' mokoondo' ra kapintaran ru ulun?
Ngaangai' ondo' napandayan muno, napandayan mai niayuk;
ngaangai' ondo' naratian muno, nakito toojo ramon.
Nokoowot akai ra kapintaran intor ra ulun ondo' inuanon,
soroi ilo no ra kalo poyo ama' muno inanak.
Kua kia kalo apuon mu panimayo ri Aki Kapuuno'?
Mindagu akai ra maamis am molomoi ra bala Nano.
Kua kia naibibit kou ru guang galama',
am kua kia ra mato muno bibilak,
saboi sumangit kou ri Aki Kapuuno' am manggal Riso?
Maalap kia ulun iowon giu' ra saang ri Aki Kapuuno'?
Malaikat Nano pana i Aki Kapuuno' kalo mangintopot;
malaikat-malaikat pana kalo mapasau ra pagilangan Nano.
Atan poyo ulun ondo' majamol am kolondo' onong,
ondo' manginum ra kalaatan koson ra timug ayuk.
Raino rongogo' noyo Ayup,
ondo' napandayan kuno.
Ulun mapintar nangila' noyo raki' ra baal raginio,
ondo' inapu nilo intor ra kinamatuaan ragili.
Nakapaat ragili kolondo' ulun bansa' ru bokon giu' ra tana' nilo,
kolondo' sangulun pana ondo' nangkinibit risilo nangiruan ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Ulun malaat nalumpa' ru kaimbalaan ra kalo lumonggo',
ulun mampagabu' maayag ra maimbolo' buoi ru painawo nilo.
Mokorongog ilo ra bolos ondo' makalalaa',
am ulun mantakou mamulunsar risilo paat ra mamimio.
Kalo makapangiliu ilo ra kalandaman,
sabap ra pampatayan ondo' manangilang mangilou risilo ra moonong kaluagan.
Susuit nasar
nakapandai ilo ra mapuso ilo.
Magalabo ilo am maimbolo' kaga'
koson bulunsaron ru raja' mapanggol kaga'.
Ginio noyo pupus ru ulun ondo' baani manggal ri Aki Kapuuno',
am manggal ri Io Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa'.
Lumimbau ilo am masaga' gumuor;
mabaya' ra bambalingatan mangkayang ilo ra perisai
am maagou-agou manggal ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Ginio noyo ulun ondo' nanguasa' ra bandar-bandar,
am nampagaau ra baloi-baloi ondo' iniruanan noyo.
Bandar-bandar inaru' noyo koson magulayun masauk ra nangalunsai.
Ilo kalo marayus langkaya' koson ra mabuoi;
ngaangai' longgom nilo kalo mantilayun.
Babara' nilo pana lumiot,
am ilo kalo makalabus intor ra kalandaman.
Masauk ilo koson ra puun tataun
ondo' raan nano solobon ra apui;
pusoon ilo ru paminawo ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Amon ru mangintopot ilo ra ondo' kolondo' onong,
ondo' apuon nilo kolondo' onong niayuk.
Kalo poyo paat nano, matoi ilo,
koson ra raan lumonot ondo' kalo boo masansam.
Ilo koson ra puun ru anggur ondo' naulung kawa' nano,
am koson ra puun jaitun ondo' natutu' busak nano.
Ulun ondo' kalo nakaulig ri Aki Kapuuno' kolondo' noyo papag,
am apui mamuso ra baloi ondo' binaal intor ra ampos ru inangkuman.
Ginio noyo ulun ondo' nangatang am niayuk nambaal ra kalaatan;
guang nilo magail natikop ra pamparuungan.”
Kopongo raginio taam i Ayup,
“Igondo' aku pokorongog ra ragu-ragu raginio;
pangansukan ondo' taakin mino mangimbolo' ayuk.
Mindagu kau kia ra sabubuoi no?
Atan kia nangunsu' ramuyun koson marayus mindagu?
Amon ru akau ti aku, am aku ti boo akau,
aku pana makaindagu koson raginio.
Mampaliur aku ramuyun ra ragu;
am mamisik ra ulu.
Paikangon takamin ra bilin kuno,
am marayus mindagu koson mangansuk ramuyun.
Amon ru mindagu aku, kolondo' onong nano;
amon mongkoror aku, imbolo' kuno kalo mamaan.
Nampabagui i Aki Kapuuno' raki',
pinatoi no sasambaloi kuno.
Io noyo pantula' kuno am namparakop raki'.
Raino patakalag boo inan kutu,
am ra tayar ru masuang ulun ginio noyo inono' no
ra aku makatula noyo.
Ra sangit Nano, bininsang ri Aki Kapuuno' inan kuno;
am nabaya' ra sisang, nonontong Io raki'.
Magasab ulun raki';
manguup ilo raki' am mampalapis ra bulos kuno.
Pinataak aku ri Aki Kapuuno' ra ulun malaat;
pinaratu' No aku ralalom ru kalindu' ru ulun malaat.
Ragili kaayagan kuno moonsoi am mamimio,
kaa' i Aki Kapuuno' namulunsar raki' ra namulali'.
Sinikak No liog kuno am pinapatir aku;
sinauk No aku ra puongon koson igilaan.
Kolondo' guang makaasi' Nano namanah raki' intor ra ngaangai' intok,
saboi napilat am natagu' aku.
Mamilat Io raki' ra rurulion;
mamulunsar Io koson ra sangulun tutumula'.
Mambayang aku ra konoon karung tatandu' kangilukan,
manturung aku ralimbou ru kaau sabap ra kinala.
Mantangi' aku saboi malia' bulos kuno,
am minangkut mato kuno am maitom.
Kaa' kalo nambaal aku ra baal makapatoi,
am pakiasian kuno magulayun motopot.
Okou tana' ti, kalaatan raki' pai' sibunio'.
Pai' pongkororo' golok kuno makitaak ra katimpakan.
ondo' mangani' ra sasi' ra kolondo' tula kuno.
Rangan-rangan kuno magasab raki',
mantangi' aku ra saang ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Gogoton kuno maa' raginio mokoondo' ulun makimasi' ri Aki Kapuuno' ra tayar kuno,
koson ra ulun makimasi' ra tayar ru rangan nano.
Bilor-bilor kuno kalo boo masuang,
mugar aku am kalo boo sumaguli'.”
Patayan kuno maar noyo, maar maukat painawo kuno;
kolondo' boo atan-atan ondo' ak am lobong kuno.
Saukon aku ru ulun ra pagasaban.
Nakito kuno ra mapara' piboo laat ra ilo mindagu ra pangiisan.
Aku ti mabanis guang, iou Aki Kapuuno'. Pangintopot no raki'.
Kolondo' osoi pana boo ondo' mangiou ra ragu kuno.
Tinauban Mu guang nilo saboi kalo mangarati';
pai' polosoo' ilo mangala raki'.
Sumugut ra ragu amsal, osoi ayuk manumbalik ra rangan sabap ra makimauli',
anak nano galama' makaapu ra pambalos.
Raino iniis aku ra ragu amsal no;
minatong ilo am nantiwog ra bulos kuno.
Mato kuno majapul sabap ra mangiluk guang;
ngaangai' ru inan kuno matukal ra mangkagas.
Ulun ondo' mapasau guang, makatigog am mangimuag;
mangkara' ilo raki' koson ra ulun ondo' kalo mangintopot ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Ulun ondo' moonsoi am kolondo' sala,
gumaai mangintopot ra i Aki Kapuuno' mangiou risilo.
Kaa' amon ru akau ngaangai' matong ragiti,
kolondo' sangulun mapintar pana matuum kuno.
Orou-orou kuno nakasail noyo, kalo nakasugut ngaangai' inatangan kuno;
kalio noyo boo ngaangai' kalansanan kuno.
Kaa' rangan-rangan kuno mindagu,
‘Rondom no matawang am sinda maar makasaboi.’
Kaa' nakapandai aku ralalom ru guang kuno
ra magulayun aku ra intok molondom.
Intok ru ulun minatoi ayuk kalansanan kuno,
giu' no mombolong aku ralalom kalandaman.
Inggalanin ku lobong ra ‘ama' kuno’,
am lingguang ondo' mangakan ra inan kuno
sabiton ku ra ‘ina' kuno’ am ‘pabukat ku ra ruandu'’.
Ati kia kalansanan ra tayar kuno?
Osoi kia ondo' makakito ra kalansanan ra tayar kuno?
Kolondo' boo kalansanan kuno
paat ra aku mongoi ra intok ru ulun minatoi.
Kopongo raginio taam i Bildad,
“Ayup, kalo kia lumonggo' kou mindagu?
Amon ru mongkoror kou am mangkirongog, mindagu akai.
Kua kia pangkara' kou ra sasambungon akai,
am pogondoon akai ra sapi'?
Sangit mamparuol ayuk ra inan muno.
Matatakan kia tana' ti ra mamagun nano sabap ra okou sumangit?
Pabandingon kia gunung-gunung intor ra intok nano koson mampatasu' ra guang muno?
ilo koson ra apui ondo' kalo boo mapaang.
Ilo koson ra kim ondo' lampung nano nalasa' noyo;
lampung pansilau nilo kalo boo suminda.
Tumpang nilo ra maikang raino kakasiling;
inatangan nilo galama' nangkinibit risilo maratu'.
Mugar io mongoi ra ralalom ru pamalandak am kalayam nilo makasaru;
tunob nilo nakasulor saboi ilo narakop.
Pamalandak nakasibuni giu' ra ralimbou ru tana';
am jajaling pinaatang ra ralan nilo.
Makalalaa' mampatigog ra ulun malaat intor ra ngaangai' intok,
am maya' risilo ra moonong tumpang.
Ragili langkaya' ilo, kaa' raino maitilan ilo;
karaat masalok maya' risilo.
Kungkung nilo inakan ru maruol ondo' maaja',
longon am kalayam nilo mootong.
Pinaingkual ilo intor ra kim intok inayanan ondo' moonsoi,
am rinalaat koson manguma' ra patayan.
Raino osoi pana makaayan ra ralalom ru kim nilo,
mopongo taukin ra bilirang koson mangiru' ra maruol!
Bakat nilo mapua' am kumulionjot,
raan nilo lumonot am kumukus.
Kalo boo mauligan ilo ra tana' ti;
kolondo' boo sangulun pana ondo' mangkara' risilo.
Intor ra tana' ru ulun ondo' maayag, pagiruon ilo,
pagiruon intor ra sinda mongoi ralalom kalandaman.
Kolondo' pabukat kapoam anak akupu nilo,
am kolondo' boo ondo' maayag giu' ra intok nilo ragili.
Mangkirongog ra baal nakatiu' risilo, mamagun giu' ra kalasaan nakatigog,
am mamagun giu' ra sirangon monontol sabap malaa'.
Ginio noyo pupus ru ulun malaat,
ilo ondo' kalo mampalio ri Aki Kapuuno'.”
Kopongo raginio taam i Ayup,
“Kua rayuson min mansawai raki',
am mangimbolo' raki' ra ragu min?
Ruruli' kau magasab raki',
am mononsol raki' ra kolondo' guang mauyu'.
Amon ru nasala binaal kutu,
baal raginio kalo mantilubat ramuyun.
Mangkara' kau ra akau moonsoi intor poyo raki',
am karaan min kapaganan kutu koson ra sasi' ru sala kuno.
Katutuni' min ra i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' nononsol raki'.
Pinaatang No pamalandak koson mamparakop raki'.
Golok aku, ‘Mapuka'!’
kaa' kolondo' noyo mangkirongog;
gumolok aku makiindangan,
kaa' kolondo' katimpakan.
Inompong noyo ri Aki Kapuuno' ralan kuno saboi kalo makasail aku;
kinolondom No kaga' ralan kuno.
Ginaau No ngaangai' kalangkayaan kuno,
am nampalaat ra inggalan moonsoi kuno.
Ginabu' No aku intor ra ngaangai' intok.
Binubul No kalansanan kuno koson ra ulun namubul ra puun tataun.
Sangit ri Aki Kapuuno' raki' bibilak ayuk,
am aku kinara' No koson ra pantula' Nano.
Nangator Io ra saujor Nano koson mamulunsar raki';
nongompong ilo ra ralan kuno am nagawang ra kim kuno.
Pinainggalur ri Aki Kapuuno' pabukat-pabukat kuno intor raki';
nasauk aku ra ulun bansa' ru bokon ra ulun nakaulig raki'.
Nangiruan pabukat-pabukat kuno raki',
am rangan-rangan kuno kalo nakakara' raki'.
Ulun ondo' igondo' minayan ra baloi kuno nakalilian noyo raki';
aku kinara' koson ra ulun bansa' ru bokon ru ulipon ruandu' kuno.
Piawon ku ulipon kuno, kalo tumaam io
kabalu' pana makiindangan aku riso.
Kalo mokoorot andu' kuno ra owou ru paminawo kuno,
pongkotob kuno marara' minggaar raki'.
Lalaing-lalaing pana magasab raki',
am makakurit paat ra makakito raki'.
Rangan toojo kuno mataman magilong raki',
ilo ondo' tagamin ku kaga' nangiruan raki'.
Inan kuno kungkung ayuk soroi manili ra bungul;
painawo kuno maar mugar.
Rangan kau ngai'! Pakaasi' no raki'!
Nampalamba' noyo kalindu' ri Aki Kapuuno' raki'.
Kua pagibaya' kau ri Aki Kapuuno' mangimbolo' raki'?
Kalo kia sama' ra akau nangimbolo' raki'?
Mapara' bonsoi no amon ragu-ragu kuno tulisin,
am tulisin ra ralalom ru kitab maa' raginio makara';
kapoam patulison ra batu,
maa' raginio mantilayun ra sabubuoi no.
Kaa' nakapandai aku ra giu' ra suruga' mokoondo' Mamamayag raki';
pupus nano matong Io mangindangan raki'.
Kabalu' pana kungkung kuno nakai' akano' ru maruol,
kaa' makakito aku ri Aki Kapuuno' buoi ra aku makainan.
Makakito aku Riso ra mato kuno galama',
am Io sala' ka boo bokon raki'.
Guang kuno natutuk sabap ra mindagu kau,
‘Ati kulaan akai makapangimbolo' riso?’
Maguyum kau ra sasaban koson mamulunsar raki'.
Kaa' raino, kalaa' no ra ilang,
sabap ra sumangit i Aki Kapuuno' am mangukum ra ulun makatula;
am makapandai kau boo ra i Aki Kapuuno' mangakim ra ulun.”
Kopongo raginio taam i Jopar,
“Ayup, nangkaus aku ra ragu muno;
raino moogot aku mataki' tumaam.
Ragu-ragu muno totopot magasab,
kaa' makapandai aku ra taam no.
Maaru' makapandai kou ra intor poyo ra galing i,
intor ra ulun pinaayan galing ra tana' ti,
kaansukan ru ulun malaat kalo mabuoi;
katasuan ru ulun malaat sangkuliop ayuk.
Kabalu' pana kinaayo nilo makasaboi ra limbowon,
saboi ra ulun nilo makasaboi ra gaun,
kaa' lumiot ilo ra sabubuoi no,
kalio intor ra tana' ti ra ralan makauyuyu'.
Ulun ondo' nakaulig risilo mangkuot,
‘Ati angayan nilo?’
Kalio ilo koson ra inupi,
lumiot koson ra pagilangan paat ra rondom.
Kalo boo makito ilo;
kolondo' boo intok ayanan nilo.
Anak-anak nilo mangalig ra atan ayuk
ondo' tinakou nilo intor ra sangulun musikin.
Ragili inan nilo mamulok am mapanggol,
kaa' masauk ilo ra kaau.
Kalaatan totopot matamis ra tayar nilo,
saboi buliin ra ralalom ru kabang koson kasiaan nilo.
Kaa' ralalom ru tinai' masauk akanon no ra mapait,
koson ra tuuwo ondo' makapatoi.
Luaan nilo kalangkayaan ondo' tinakou nilo;
iningkual ri Aki Kapuuno' ginilo am intor pinai ra ralalom ru tinai' nilo.
Atan ondo' tolonon ru ulun malaat koson ra tuuwo ondo' magibit ra karaat;
matoi ilo koson tindukon ru kukuo makapatoi.
Kalo makasia' ilo ra umau jaitun ondo' malabaan,
kapoam gatas am ruu' maningot ondo' luluab.
Musiti' ilo mampataak ra ngaangai' ondo' nakandoi nilo;
kalo makasia' ilo ra kalangkayaan nilo,
sabap ra nangimbolo' ilo am nompoloso ra ulun musikin,
am nampagaau ra baloi ondo' binaal ru ulun bokon.
Ingkaut nilo kalo makaulig ra polos,
ilo pana kalo igondo' kajala'.
Paat ra ilo mangakan, kalo igondo' mokoondo' ra suwo,
kaa', raino napupusan noyo kalangkayaan nilo.
Paat ra pangayaan ru kasugutan nilo,
kangilukan am kaimbalaan matong lumumpa' risilo.
Paat ra ilo mangakan ra ngaangai' ondo' kasagaan nilo,
sumangit i Aki Kapuuno' am mangukum risilo.
Paat ra ilo kuminam miliu intor ra ilang basi',
panah gangsa' mamilat risilo.
Anak panah mansabut ra inan nilo;
pompor ru panah ondo' manguliat mopoposok ra raraa' nilo,
am malaa' rumondon ra guang nilo.
Ngaangai' ondo' tinimung nilo mapuso;
apui ondo' kalo pinaangan ru kalindu' ru ulun
sumolob risilo am niayuk ngaangai' sasambaloi nilo.
Limbowon mapatalang ra tula nilo,
am tana' ti lumuat manggal risilo.
Ngaangai' kalangkayaan nilo mapuso
sabap nalumpa' ru sangit ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Ginio noyo pupus ru ulun malaat,
pupus ondo' inaru' ri Aki Kapuuno' risilo.”
Kopongo raginio taam i Ayup,
“Rongogo' atan ondo' raguon kuno;
ginio ayuk kitaakon kuno koson ra panimayo.
Oroto' poyo paat ra aku mindagu;
malupus raginio, guguang min magasab raki'.
Laa kuno kalo muli' ra ulun;
kalo pana ra aku kalo kukula' mokoorot.
Ilai' aku, akau pana makasioro',
makatigog kau am mongkoror.
Paat ra aku mangkara' ra baal kutu,
monontol aku sabap ra malaa'.
Kua ra ulun malaat maawar umur,
am masauk ra langkaya'?
Mokoowot ilo ra anak am akupu,
am makakito ra ilo masukor.
Kalo mamparatong i Aki Kapuuno' ra karaat ra sasambaloi nilo;
maayag ilo am makakaansayan.
Tinambiag nilo sumayat
am maganak ra kolondo' kapaganan.
Anak nilo masisimbul ra maansukan,
am mangkukuli koson ra anak domba.
Anak nilo marimbai am mansasayau,
sumbayaan ra bolos ru tamburing, suling am jitor.
Maayag ilo ralalom kalangkayaan,
am matoi ra makakaansayan.
Ulun malaat manusub ri Aki Kapuuno' minggalur risilo;
marara' ilo makapandai ra kasagaan Nano ra tayar ru bayag nilo.
Mangkara' ilo ra kolondo' onong mangandoi ayuk ri Aki Kapuuno'
am kolondo' onong makiasi' Riso.
Mindagu ilo ra nakasugut ilo sabap ra mapirot ilo;
kaa' ginuang nilono kalo maapu ku.
Igondo' kia kaayagan ru ulun malaat linasaan koson ra lampung?
Igondo' kia nalumpa' ilo ru karaat?
Igondo' kia i Aki Kapuuno' sangit risilo
saboi mangukum Io risilo?
Igondo' kia ilo nasauk koson ra rami ondo' nasiab ru angin,
kapoam koson ra kulapa' ru bilor ondo' nasiab ru bagiu' mapuor?
Kamin, ‘I Aki Kapuuno' mangukum ra anak sabap ra kasalaan ru ama' nano.’
Kaa' kaku, polosoon noyo i Aki Kapuuno' mangukum ra ulun ondo' makasala,
maa' raginio makaliman ilo ra inukum ilo ri Aki Kapuuno'
sabap ra kasalaan nilo.
Polosoon noyo ulun ondo' makasala mansaan ra ukuman nilo;
polosoon noyo ilo makaliman ra sangit ru Io Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa'.
Mopongo ra ulun matoi,
lakat poyo kia lioon nilo kaansukan ru sasambaloi nilo?
Makapangila' kia ulun ri Aki Kapuuno'?
Sala' ka kia i Aki Kapuuno' niayuk ondo' mangakim ra ilo ondo' maayag giu' ra suruga'?
Mokoondo' ulun ondo' maligag am lakat poyo maikang kaga'
saboi ra jam ru patayan nilo.
Minatoi ilo ra mamimio am moonsoi,
am inan nilo lakat poyo maikang.
Mokoondo' poyo ulun ondo' kolondo' kaansukan;
maayag ilo am matoi ra maruol kaga' guang.
Kaa' giu' ra ralalom ru lobong ilo ngaangai' nababaya' nakalangan;
linibungan ru ulor am lingguang.
Nakapandai aku atan karaan min,
am kalaatan raki' ondo' inatang min.
Mangkuot kau, ‘Ati kia baloi ru ulun makakuasa',
ulun ondo' nambaal ra kalaatan?’
Kalo igondo' kau kia pagindagu ra ulun timinanggau?
Kalo kia mangintopot kau ra pambalaan nilo?
Konilo ra ulun malaat noyo ondo' masalok makalabus
paat ra orou ri Aki Kapuuno' sumangit am mangukum.
Kolondo' sangulun pana ondo' manguu' risilo,
kapoam mambalos ra binaal nilo.
Paat ra ilo ibiton ra kalabangan,
batu tatandu' nilo alungin,
riribu ulun mugar mangator ra baangkai nilo,
am molomoi tana' no mamumpun ra baangkai nilo.
Kaa' kuminam kau manimayo raki' ra ragu kolondo' onong,
am ngaangai' pataamon min no magabau!”
Kopongo raginio indagu i Ialipas,
Ulun ondo' mapintar pana kaga' kolondo' onong ra tayar Nano.
Atan kia onong no ra tayar ru Io Ondo' Maayo Kaga' kuasa',
amon ru mambaal kou ra kasagaan Nano?
Mokoondo' kia ampos no Riso
amon ru bayag muno moonsoi kaga'?
Sala' ka sabap no malaa' kou am mangurumat ri Aki Kapuuno',
am Io pana mansawai am mangakim rirun,
sabap ayuk ra tula muno masuang,
am malaat kou kaga'.
Koson mampajajal ra pabukat muno mambayar ra utang nano,
ginaau mu bayang nano am pinoloso io nagibabaang.
Marara' kou mangani' ra timug risilo ondo' naagui,
am marara' mangani' ra akanon risilo ondo' naitilan.
Pinakai mu kuasa' am pangkat muno
koson mampagaau ra ngaangai' tana'.
Sala' ka ayuk marara' kou mangindangan ra ruandu' napuor,
kaa' okou niayuk nangimbolo' ra anak nailusan ra matuo.
Ginio ra raino mokoondo' pamalandak ra liput muno,
am pulali' ru malaa' malimanan muno.
Matawang masauk ra molondom saboi okou kalo makakito,
am sinakob kou ru liur ondo' makalalaa'.
Kalo kia minayan i Aki Kapuuno' giu' ra suruga' ondo' masawat kaga',
am maginduku' ra ragana', ra butitin-butitin ondo' masawat kaga'?
Kaa' mangkuot kou, ‘Nakapandai kia i Aki Kapuuno'?
Giu' Io ra sapapa' ru gaun am kalo makapangakim ritakau.’
Indoson mu ra pagilayan Nano sinilian ru gaun,
paat Io mugar giu' ra balitan ru limbowon am tana' ti.
Maya' kou kia rayus ra ralan
ondo' masalok bayaan ru ulun malaat?
Kabalu' pana kalo poyo nasaboi paat nilo,
inabas ilo ru liur ondo' matong.
Ginio noyo ulun ondo' nangimpai ri Aki Kapuuno',
am mangkara' ra Io Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa' kalo mambaal ra atan-atan risilo.
Kaa' i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' nampasauk risilo ra langkaya'.
Kalo makarati' aku ra pangkaraan ru ulun malaat.
Ulun moonsoi am ondo' kolondo' sala makakurit ra maansukan,
paat makakito ra ulun malaat mangapu ra ukuman.
Ngaangai' longgom ru ulun malaat napuso,
am apui monolob ra ngaangai' ondo' natatang.
Raino, Ayup, pobonsoi no ri Aki Kapuuno',
am langgai' noyo mangkara' Riso koson ra pantula'.
Amon ru mambaal kou koon raginio,
barakaton No okou.
Apuo' noyo susuban ondo' tinaakan Nano;
bulii' noyo ragu Nano ralalom ru guang muno.
Musiti' kou sumaguli' ri Aki Kapuuno' ra guang minggana',
am ngaangai' kalaatan giu' ra baloi muno musiti' pupusin mu.
Patiri' mas muno ondo' kopoyo toojo;
patiri' mas muno ra lonor ru sungoi ondo' kolondo' boo timug.
Musiti' i Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Maayo Kaga' kuasa' noyo mas muno,
am pirok ondo' moonsoi kaga'.
Bagu no mangintopot kou ri Aki Kapuuno' ra masalok,
am makapandai ra Io noyo puun ru kaansukan muno.
Paat ra okou makiasi', tumaam Io,
am masugut mu ngaangai' bantu' muno.
Pirot muno masalok masugut,
am sinda mampatawang ra bayag muno.
Ulun ondo' lumimbau paingganaan ri Aki Kapuuno',
kaa' ondo' minggana' guang bayagon No.
Mamayag Io Rirun amon ru kolondo' sala muno,
am amon ru mambaal kou ra kasagaan Nano.”
Kaa' taam i Ayup,
“Giminuor aku am manggal ri Aki Kapuuno';
kalo moorot ku mampalaa.
Mapara' kinoonsoi no amon ru makapandai aku ati sinarayan ri Aki Kapuuno',
am mokoongoi ra intok Nano.
Pabalaan ku baal kuno Riso,
am magisaung toojo.
Masaga' aku makapandai ra atan ondo' raguon Nano,
am ati kulaan Io tumaam.
Ngaangai' kinua' ru ikang ri Aki Kapuuno' mampagula' raki'?
Kalo, rumongog Io ra ragu-ragu kuno.
Aku ti mabanis guang am makaindagu ri Aki Kapuuno',
am pabalaan ra kolondo' sala kuno
Inuyum ku i Aki Kapuuno' giu' ra sirangon, kaa' kalio Io ra giu';
paat aku maguyum Riso giu' ra kalasaan, kalio Io niayuk ra giu'.
Minimbuor i Aki Kapuuno' giu' ra rabugus am ralayo,
kaa' lakat aku poyo kalo nakatuum Riso.
Kaa' nakapandai i Aki Kapuuno' ra moonong tumpang kuno;
amon ru kinamin aku, mainono' kinapasau ru guang kuno.
Maya' aku ra ralan Nano ra totopot,
kalo lumisang aku intor ra ralan ondo' inaru' Nano.
Susuban-susuban ri Aki Kapuuno' masalok gagayaan ku,
sumugut aku ra kasagaan Nano, sala' ka kasagaan kuno galama'.
Kalo igondo' kulau i Aki Kapuuno' am kolondo' makaanggal Riso.
Nambaal Io ra atan ondo' kasagaan Nano.
Paugaron No inatangan Nano ra tayar ru inan kuno,
am masuang poyo inatangan Nano ra bokon.
Sabap ra malaa' Riso, monontol aku;
gumaai kara' kuno ra ngaangai' no, gumaai boo laa' kuno.
I Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa' namandak ra kinabaani kuno.
Malaa' aku sabap ri Aki Kapuuno' am sala' ka sabap ru kalandaman,
kabalu' pana kalandaman nampaliput raki' am natauban bulos kuno.
Kua kia kalo inaru' ri Aki Kapuuno' orou pangakiman,
maa' raginio ulun ondo' makaulig Riso mokoowot ra katimpakan?
Mokoondo' ra ulun mapabanding ra batu balitan koson mapalangka' ra tana';
nantakou ilo ra domba am inaput pinasimpung ra bibiag tinambiag nilo.
Ginaau nilo kaladai longgom ru anak nailusan ra matuo,
am koson ra jaminan, inalap nilo sapi' gawayan intor ra ruandu' napuor.
Nongompong kau ra ulun musikin mokoowot ra kuasa' nilo galama',
ulun musikin pana nansibuni kalalaat.
Ginio ra koson ra kaladai masigo, ulun musikin maguyum ra akanon giu' ra tana' kaagisan;
giu' no ayuk mokoondo' ra akanon ra anak-anak nilo.
Manganam ilo kalalaat ra gandum giu' ra umo ru ulun ra bokon
am mangkatu' ra kawa' ru anggur giu' ra umo ru ulun malaat.
Mombolong ilo ra kolondo' bajang paat ra rondom,
ra kolondo' rondo' pana koson mampalasu' ra inan.
Naasa' ilo kaga' sabap ra rasam ondo' riminatu' giu' ra rasawat ru gunung,
Nampipisi' ilo ra bulur batu koson sindungan.
Ulun malaat mangulipon ra anak-anak ondo' nailusan ra ama',
am nangalap ra lalagang ru ulun musikin koson ra jaminan.
Ulun musikin miningkual kalalaat ra kolondo' bayang;
paat mangkumos ra gandum naitilan ilo.
Intor ra kawa' ru jaitun nambaal ilo ra umau,
am intor ra kawa' ru anggur, nambaal ilo ra inumon,
kaa' ilo galama' pinaason.
Giu' ra bandar morongog tangi' ru ulun ondo' napilatan,
am ulun ondo' matipamukat,
kaa' kalo rinongog ri Aki Kapuuno' pakiasian nilo.
Mokoondo' ulun ondo' mangimpai ra sinda,
kalo nakaulig ilo am kalo minaya' ra ralan no.
Paat ra maar matawang, ulun mamatoi mingkual mamatoi ra ulun musikin;
am paat ra rondom, mingkual ilo mantakou.
Ulun ondo' mansawa' maginaa ra mamai',
maa' raginio kalo mauligan, taubin nilo bulos.
Paat ra rondom ulun mantakou manubol ra baloi ru ulun,
kaa' paat ra matawang mansibuni ilo am sumili intor ra sinda.
Ra tayar nilo, tampilon ra susuab ti makalalaa',
kaa' kalandaman ondo' makalalaa', mampaansuk.”
“Ulun malaat inabas ru liur,
am tana' ondo' linonggom nilo inulas ri Aki Kapuuno';
kalo boo mangandoi ilo giu' ra umo ru anggur nilo.
Koson ra ais lumiot matiu' ru tampio am mato ru orou,
ulun makatula pana lumiot, tolonon ru intok ru ulun minatoi.
Ina' nilo galama' nakalilian risilo,
am lingguang nangakan ra inan nilo.
Inggalan nilo kalo boo karaan;
pinuso ilo koson ra puun tataun ondo' naaba'.
Baal raginio nasauk sabap ra nangimbolo' ilo ra ruandu' napuor,
am kalo makaasi' ra ruandu' tabanang.
I Aki Kapuuno' am kuasa' Nano, namuso ra ulun mapanggol kaga';
mimbuor ri Aki Kapuuno', matoi boo ulun malaat.
Maaru' i Aki Kapuuno' mompoloso risilo maayag ra moonsoi,
kaa' tainuin No ilo ra kalo lalanggain.
Sangkinolor ayuk ulun malaat makasugut,
am lumiot ra sabubuoi no.
Lumonot ilo koson ra sakot,
koson ra gandum ondo' lontobon intor ra tanggayan.
Maimbuali kia ru osoi ayuk baal raginio?
Makaanggal kia osoi pana ra kinotopot ru ragu-ragu kutu?”
Kopongo raginio taam i Bildad,
“I Aki Kapuuno' totopot makakuasa'; ngaangai' ulun musiti' malaa' Riso;
Magalung io ra kaansayan ralalom ru pamarintaan Nano giu' ra suruga'.
Mauntob kia ru osoi pana malaikat ondo' mangandoi Riso?
Mokoondo' kia ra intok ondo' kalo nasilau ru sinda Nano?
Maaru' lair ra mapasau ulun ra pagilangan ri Aki Kapuuno'?
Maaru' lair ra malunau ulun ra pagilangan Nano?
Koson Riso, sila' pana kalo mapaang,
am butitin-butitin karaan No ra moboot;
atan piboo ra ulun, lingguang, am ulor.
Pagilangan ri Aki Kapuuno', kolondo' onong ru ulun.”
Kaa' indagu i Ayup,
“Indangan min kolondo' sonor moonsoi
raki' ulun ondo' malawo am naagui kaga'!
Mapara' kinoonsoi ru bilin am nangilaan no,
ondo' pataakon min ra ulun sasambungon koson raki'!
Osoi kia ondo' mangindangan rirun mindagu koson raginio?
Osoi kia ondo' nangunsu' rirun mindagu koson raginio?”
“Ulun minayan ra intok ru ulun minatoi;
giu' ra intok ru ulun namagatoi, giu' ra ragana' ru raat.
Intok ru ulun namagatoi naukab ra saang ri Aki Kapuuno'
kalo inangaban saboi makito No.
Biningkal ri Aki Kapuuno' limbowon ru ralayo,
am nampatair ra tana' ti ra intok ra maluag.
Sinuangan ri Aki Kapuuno' gaun no ra timug,
kaa' kalo narilak gaun kabalu' pana maagat timug no.
Pinasibuni No ngai' bulos ru sila' mapaang kaga',
ra talikuron ru gaun ondo' biningkal Nano.
Pinatuliar No sinda intor ra kalandaman
am mapungol ra linukis giu' ra ralimbou ru raat.
Paat ra Io mindagu ra malasang,
lugu'-lugu' panungka' ra limbowon mapuyu'.
Kuasa' ri Aki Kapuuno' manguasa' ra raat;
Ragab,
Paminawo Nano nampatawang ra limbowon,
am kalindu' Nano mamatoi ra tambuakal ondo' nagiru'.
Kaa' ginio tatandu' ayuk ru kuasa' Nano,
mongkonos ayuk morongog takau.
Kolondo' osoi pana makapandai ra mapara' piboo kinatulai ri Aki Kapuuno'.”
Indagu i Ayup,
“Ralalom inggalan ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa', i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' maayag,
ondo' marara' mangani' raki' ra katimpakan am ondo' nampakapait ra kaayagan kuno,
magibot aku: Buoi ri Aki Kapuuno' mangani' raki' ra paminawo,
buoi ru painawo kuno soroi ra inan kuno,
bibil kuno kalo noyo igondo' manabit ra ragu magabau,
am rila' kuno kalo mindagu ra ragu mamparuung.
Kalo mindagu aku ra motopot kau;
saboi pana matoi magulayun aku mindagu ra kolondo' sala.
Kalo langgain ku mindagu ra motopot aku;
guang kuno kalo mononsol raki'.
Polosoon pantula' kuno ukumin koson ra ulun malaat,
am ulun ondo' manggal raki' ukumin koson ra ulun minanggal.
Atan kia kalansanan ru ulun malaat
paat ri Aki Kapuuno' mangalap ra painawo nilo?
Paat ra masaboi kapupusan,
masaga' kia i Aki Kapuuno' mangkirongog ra golok nilo?
Musiti' ilo gumogot ra katasuan intor ri Aki Kapuuno',
am musiti' ilo masalok makiasi' Riso.
Polosoo' aku mangila' ramuyun mapara' kinaayo ru kuasa' ri Aki Kapuuno',
am sailon ku toojo ragu ra inatangan ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa'.
Nakito min galama' ngaangai' no ra mato min galama'.
Ginio ra, kua kia indagu kau ra jajajou ti?”
“Ilai' ati kulaan i Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa'
mangukum ra ulun ondo' malaat am mamatoi.
Amon ru anak ungkuyon nilo masuang, ngaangai' no matoi ralalom pangayawan;
anak-anak nilo kalo igondo' kaukop ra akanon.
Ilo ondo' maayag matoi sabap ra maruol tumapik,
am ruandu' napuor nilo kalo mantangi' risilo.
Pirok ru ulun malaat bubujuk,
am bayang nilo pinatuntur,
kaa' ulun moonsoi mambayang raginio,
am ulun mabanis guang makaalap ra pirok no.
Baloi ondo' binaal ru ulun malaat matapu koson ra tambaloi ru lawa',
baloi sangkinolor ayuk koson ra pusangag ru ulun magalung ra umo.
Koson ra pamupusan toojo,
paat ra ilo sumukal, lumiot boo ngaangai' kalangkayaan nilo.
Koson ra liur ondo' mamulali' matong, makalalaa' lumumpa' risilo;
angin paat ra rondom ti manampui risilo.
Angin sirangon mangkayang risilo,
am magalus risilo intor ra baloi.
Kalo makaulig ra makaasi', linumpa' ilo ru angin,
am nagiru' ilo kalalaat naguyum ra sindungan.
Babatut angin koson ra ragu-ragu magasab risilo,
giu' ra ati pana asabin ilo.”
Mokoondo' lombong-lombong intok natuuman ra pirok,
mokoondo' intok-intok pamasawan ra mas.
Basi' kalion intor ra ralalom ru tana',
am batu tunangon koson mokoowot ra tambaga'.
Molondom kaga' subolon,
intok ondo' malandom kaga' imumuyin.
Giu' no, giu' ra ralalom ru kalandaman,
maguyum ulun ra masuang batu.
Maalur giu' ra intok ondo' kolondo' namagun,
ondo' kalo igondo' kininjangan am nansailan,
ulun mangandoi liliwa' tumayung ra tali,
giu' ra ralalom ru luang tana' ondo' masiluk kaga'.
Tana' manangampos ra akanon tayar ru ulun,
kaa' giu' ra ragana' ru tana' no, ngaangai' no nopopol-popol.
Batu-batu ru tana' mokoondo' ra nilam,
am kaau ru tana' ti mokoondo' ra mas.
Kalo makito ru susuit kanui ralan mongoi ra lombong no,
susuit nasar kalo igondo' ongoi ra giu' no.
Bibiag masigo kalo igondo' baya' ra ralan no.
Singa' pana kalo igondo' pansail ra ralan masiluk no.
Ulun mangkali ra masuang batu ondo' mokotog kaga',
lonor ru gunung pana kalion.
Tatanga' ilo sumubol ra gunung batu,
nakatuum ilo ra intan ondo' mologo kaga'.
Saboi ra puun ru sungoi kalion nilo,
am mambala' ra atan ondo' nakasibuni.
Kaa' ati kia kauyuman ra kapintaran?
Ati kia intok takau makaigigila' maa' raginio makarati'?
Kapintaran kalo matuum ra gino ngai' ru ulun;
kolondo' osoi pana nakapandai ra logo ra sotopot no.
Raat mamaar am raat ondo' malandom am malangka'
mindagu ra kapintaran kolondo' ra giu'.
Kapintaran kalo maaligan ra mas kopoyo,
am kalo niayuk mabali ra pirok pana.
Mas am intan ondo' mologo kaga'
kalo mokogondo' ra logo nano.
Io no mologo poyo intor ra mas,
am intor ra pasu' mas kapoam kristal.
Kapintaran masawat poyo logo no
intor ra batu karang, hablur kapoam mutiara.
Batu topaj am mas kopoyo
kalo mokogondo' ra logo ru kapintaran.
Ati kia puun ru kapintaran?
Ati kia kaalapan takau ra karatian?
Kolondo' ondo' maayag igondo' pakakito raginio,
susuit giu' ra rasawat pana kalo igondo' pakakito raginio.
Kapatayan am kapusaan pana mindagu
ra ondo' norongog tanou kalo naaruan ayuk.
I Aki Kapuuno' ayuk ondo' nakapandai ra ralan mongoi ra giu',
ra intok ru kapintaran soroi,
sabap ra makakito Io saboi ra pompor ru tana' ti,
makakito ra ngaangai' ondo' soroi giu' ra ragana' ru limbowon.
Paat ra Io mangani' ra angin ru kaikangan,
am langka' ru raat inaru' Nano;
paat ri Aki Kapuuno' mangaru' ra intok ratuan ru rasam,
am ralan ondo' sailan ru timpalak tingkalur;
paat raginio noyo kakitanan Nano ra kapintaran
am logo ru kapintaran kinamin No,
am mangani' Io ra barakat Nano.
“Koson makaalap ra kapintaran, musiti' kau malaa' am mangurumat ra Tuhan.
Koson makaalap ra karatian, musiti' kau mangiruan ra kalaatan.”
Tumalimpuun poyo i Ayup mindagu,
“Amon ru kaayagan kuno makasaguli' koson ragili,
paat ri Aki Kapuuno' manindung raki'.
Masalok Io mangani' raki' ra indangan,
am mansilau Io raki' paat mansail ra kalandaman.
Ginio noyo paat ra aku makakaansayan,
paat ri Aki Kapuuno' masauk ra rangan kuno am niayuk manindung ra baloi kuno.
Paat raginio i Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa' mabaya' raki',
am linimpuan aku ru ngaangai' anak kuno.
Bibiag tinambiag kuno manangampos ra masuang gatas,
am puun ru jaitun tumuu' kabalu' pana giu' ra tana' kabatuan.
Paat ra tingganai-tingganai ru bandar mansusunur,
manturung aku mababaya' risilo.
Ulun mamulok mangani' ra ralan paat ilo makakito raki',
am ulun matutuo migor mangurumat raki';
tingganai-tingganai ru mamagun lumonggo' mindagu;
ulun maatang pana maya' mongkoror.
Moonong ulun ondo' makakito raki' kapoam mokorongog ra baal kuno,
mindagu ra mongompor ra binaal moonsoi kuno.
Ra ulun musikin, inindangan ku;
ra lalaing nailusan ra matuo ondo' kolondo' intok lansanan, inindangan ku.
Inompor aku ru ulun ondo' mapagon kaga',
am inindangan ku ruandu' napuor nakaalap ra sindungan.
Timbalos kutu mabanis ra kolondo' jamar;
masalok ku paundukon katimpakan.
Ra ulun bolou, masauk aku ra mato;
ra ulun kalo makaugar, masauk aku ra kalayam nilo.
Ra ulun musikin, masauk aku ra ama';
ra ulun bansa' ru bokon, masauk aku ra manaung.
Kuasa' ru ulun malaat pandakon ku,
am ulun ra jinamaran nilo binayag ku.
Masalok aku malansan maa' raginio maawar umur kuno,
am matoi ra kaansayan giu' ra baloi.
Aku koson ra puun tataun ondo' tumuu' ra malabung,
bakat nano naukop ra timug am bolobou namasa' ra raan nano.
Masalok aku omporon ru ulun,
am kaikangan kuno kalo igondo' kairurui'.
Ulun mongkoror paat aku mambilin,
ragu-ragu kuno rongogon nilo ra matalinaasan.
Kakai' ragu kuno, kolondo' boo ondo' paruangon.
Ragu kuno sumosop koson ra posok ru rasam;
moonong ulun mangapu ra ragu-ragu kuno ra maansukan,
koson ra ulun magitanom mangapu ra rasam bulintok mambusak.
Nampajingit aku risilo paat ra ilo nangkaus guang;
bulos kuno ondo' matakau makabansuk risilo.
Aku noyo nampaguut ra paningganayan
am mamatas ra ngaangai';
maningganai aku risilo koson ra raja' manusub ra pulalai;
manimayo aku risilo paat ra mangiluk guang.
Kaa' raino ulun ondo' mamulok poyo intor raki'
magasab raki'.
Ragili ama' nilo totopot asabin ku
koson magalung ra domba kuno mabaya' ra uku' ra magalung.
Kolondo' onong nilo raki',
sabap ra nakai' noyo ikang.
Musikin ilo am naitilan kaga',
saboi mangakan ilo ra bakat mapua' giu' ra tana' kaagisan ondo' masiluk.
Namubul ilo ra bulungkut giu' ra tana' kaagisan,
am mangakan ra raun am bakat nano.
Ngaangai' ulun nampagiru' risilo ra ginalakan,
koson ra ulun mampagiru' ra ulun mantakou.
Minayan ilo kalalaat giu' ra ralalom ru luang batu,
luang-luang giu' ra tobo ru gunung nasauk ra baloi nilo.
Giu' ra kataunan mompoloong ilo koson ra bibiag,
am nampipisi' giu' ra ragana' ru bulungkut.
Ilo santimungan ulun ondo' totopot kolondo' onong!
Pinagiru' ilo intor ra pagun ti.
Kaa' raino ilo matong am makakurit raki';
aku sinauk ra kukuritin nilo.
Masisang ilo am magasab raki',
bulos kuno pana am tiniwagan nilo.
Sabap no ra i Aki Kapuuno' nampalawo noyo raki' am kalo maikang,
ginabu' nilo aku ra ngaangai' kalaatan.
Ulun-ulun mangalaat no namulunsar raki' intor ra talupak;
am naratuan kuno inatang nilo.
Inampangan nilo ralan kuno am namparatu' raki';
am kolondo' sangulun pana nanginggalar risilo.
Pinopol nilo timbok silian kuno;
masuang ilo siminubol ra nampajanjang.
Malaa' nampalibung raki';
natatak kaurumatan kuli koson ra siob ru angin
am kalansanan kuno koson mamanang, lumiot koson ra gaun.
Raino maar aku no matoi;
kaimbalaan mamijak raki'.
Paat ra rondom ngaangai' ru bungul kuno maruol kaga',
am kinaruol no ondo' sumusuk ra kalo lumonggo'.
Rinakop aku ri Aki Kapuuno' ra liog ru bayang kuno
am nangumpol ra bayang kuno.
Pinampasan No aku ra ralalom ru losok,
am nasauk aku koson ra jamol.
Nampiau aku Rirun, iou Aki Kapuuno', kaa' kalo tumaam Kou;
am paat aku makiasi', kalo lioon Mu.
Liminaat Kou raki',
nangimbolo' Kou raki' ra ngaangai' ru ikang Muno.
Nompoloso Kou ra angin nangayat raki',
am bagiu' nanguyog raki'.
Nakapandai aku ra nagibit Kou raki' ra intok ru kapatayan,
ra pamupusan ondo' musiti' umaan ru moonong ulun.
Kua pamulunsar Kou ra ulun kolondo' kaikangan,
ondo' kalo boo makapambaal ra atan ayuk ondo' ak am makimasi'?
Kalo kia mababaya' aku mantangi' ra ulun ralalom kapaganan,
am makaasi' ra ulun ondo' musikin?
Malansan aku ra kaansukan am sinda,
kaa' kapaganan am kalandaman ondo' matong.
Inumok aku ru pagalabaan am marualan;
orou-orou umaan kuno kaimbalaan.
Ralalom kalandaman, ra kolondo' sinda magijawot aku;
migor aku ra saang ru ulun masuang am makiindangan.
Bolos kuno mangiluk am totopot makaasi'-asi',
koson ra loong ru taani kapoam bolos ru susuit unta.
Kungkung kuno lumitom;
inan kuno mosolob ru salom.
Ragili mangkirongog aku ra miujik ru kaansukan,
kaa' raino tangi' ra suloboyon ayuk boo.
Nabaya' ra ibot aku nabantu',
kalo suminto ra ralaa mamulok.
Atan kia baalon ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa' ritakau?
Ati kulaan kia Io mambalos ra baalon ru ulun?
Mamparatong Io ra karaat am kapusaan
risilo ondo' nambaal ra kasalaan.
Nakapandai i Aki Kapuuno' ra ngaangai' binaal kuno;
Makakito Io ra moonong tumpang kuno.
Magibot aku ra kalo igondo' aku pambaal ra malaat,
am kalo igondo' aku pamparuung ra ulun.
Polosoon noyo i Aki Kapuuno' manimbang raki' ra timbangan motopot,
am makapandai Io ra kolondo' sala kuno.
Amon liminisang aku intor ra ralan ondo' motopot,
kapoam guang kuno nabunduk ra baal ondo' malaat,
amon ru kalindu' kuno majamol sabap ra tula,
polosoon ayuk pana ulun ra bokon mangakan ra atan ondo' tiniasan kuno,
am polosoon titikop ru tinanom kuno matutuk.
Amon ru suminto aku ra andu' ru sambalayan kuno,
am mangkuliman riso liliwa' mansibuni ra talikuron ru kulobon,
polosoon ayuk andu' kuno mangansak ra akanon ru ungkuyon ra bokon,
am mombolong ra intok pambalangan ru ungkuyon ra bokon.
Tula koson raginio malaat kaga',
am ulun ondo' nambaal raginio musiti' ukumin ra matoi.
Tula no mamuso koson ra apui ru naraka,
monolob ra ngaangai' ondo' longgom kuno.
Paat ulipon kuno mampalaa sabap ra longgom nano ra kalo linio kuno,
mangkirongog aku am pamakuan kuno riso matimpok.
Amon ru kalo, ati kulaan aku muma' ri Aki Kapuuno'?
Atan kia ondo' maragu kuno paat ra aku akimin ri Aki Kapuuno'?
I Aki Kapuuno' namangun raki',
am niayuk namangun ra ulipon-ulipon kuno.
Kalo igondo' aku marara' mangindangan ra ulun musikin,
am kalo igondo' nompoloso ra ruandu' napuor maayag ra mangkaus.
Kalo igondo' aku pompoloso ra anak nailusan ra matuo no maitilan,
alika aku galama' maukop akanon.
Aku koson pinangkaama' ra anak nailusan ra matuo,
masalok aku manaung ra ruandu' napuor.
Paat ra aku makatuum ra ulun ondo' natutusan,
ondo' musikin kaga' koson mambali ra bayang,
aniin ku io ra bayang intor ra bulu ru domba kuno galama',
am io pana totopot mongompor raki'.
Amon ru igondo' aku pamparuung ra anak nailusan ra matuo
sabap ra nakapandai aku ra mamanang aku ra baal kuno,
polosoon longon kuno pandakon,
saboi intor ra limbawo kuno pantuliaron.
Sabap no ra malaa' aku ra ukuman ri Aki Kapuuno',
totopot kalo baani aku mambaal raginio.
Kalo igondo' aku malansan ra kalangkayaan kuno,
kapoam lumimbau ra rapu' kuno.
Kalo igondo' aku samba ra mato ru orou ondo' makasinda ra mapaang,
kapoam sila' ondo' makasinda ra moonsoi.
Kalo igondo' aku kalaai ra ngaangai' no,
am kalo igondo' mangalok ra kalindu' kuno koson mangurumat ra ngaangai' no.
Tula no musiti' ukumin ra matoi,
sabap i Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa' inanggal.
Kalo igondo' aku maansukan paat ra pantula' kuno maimbolo',
am kalo igondo' maansayan paat ra ilo malumpa' ru karaat.
Kalo igondo' aku pakiasi' ra patayan nilo;
kalo igondo' aku makatula koson raginio.
Ngaangai' ulun ondo' mangandoi ra tayar kuno makapandai
ra ulun ondo' kalo nauligan kuno, paakanon ku giu' ra baloi kuno.
Baloi kuno ukabin ra ulun tumanggau,
am kalo igondo' aku mompoloso risilo mombolong giu' ra ralan maayo.
Ulun ra bokon kuminam mampasibuni ra tula,
kaa' kalo tumilu aku koson risilo.
Ragu ru kasuangan kalo malaa' aku,
am pagasaban ru ulun kalo lioon ku;
kalo igondo' aku soroi ra baloi kapoam mongkoror ayuk,
sabap malaa' ra ilo magasab.
Kolondo' kia osoi pana ondo' masaga' mangkirongog ra ragu-ragu kuno?
Magibot aku ra moonong ragu kuno motopot.
Polosoon i Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa' tumaam raki'.
Amon ngaangai' panguwan ru pantula' kuno tulisin
maa' raginio makakito aku raginio,
am aku pana pasulompoyon ginio ra limbawo,
am pasampakon ginio ra ulu kuno koson ra karaun.
Balain ku i Aki Kapuuno' ra ngaangai' ondo' baalon kuno,
am muma' Riso ra mangintopot am ulu ra tumungar.
Amon ru nantakou aku ra tana' ondo' raduon kuno,
am ginaau ku ginio intor ra ulun tatangan toojo no,
amon mangakan aku ra ampos ru tana' nano
am mompoloso ra ulun magitanom ondo' mantanom no maitilan am tumukal,
polosoon noyo ondo' tumuu' ra giu' no, alab am ruui,
am sala' ka gandum kapoam barli.”
Gini noyo ragu-ragu ri Ayup.
Sabap ra mangintopot i Ayup ra kolondo' sala nano, talu ngaulun rangan nano kalo boo tumaam.

Kaa' giu' no mokoondo' sangulun ondo' kalo nokoorot ra lasu' ru guang nano, sabap ra sinonsol ri Ayup i Aki Kapuuno' am migiangku ra kolondo' sala nano. Inggalan nano i Iligu anak ri Barakil, sangulun papag ri Bus, intor ra bansa' ru Ram.
Siminangit io niayuk ra talu ngaulun rangan ri Ayup no sabap kalo nakataam ilo ri Ayup, kabalu' pana sinonsol nilo io.
I Iligu mamulok poyo kaga' intor risilo. Ginio ra naginaa io ra ngaangai' ulun mopongo mindagu.
Kakito no talu ngaulun no kalo nakataam ri Ayup, sangit io
am indagu koon ragitio,
“Aku ti lakat poyo mamulok, alika akau matutuo noyo,
ginio ra malaa' aku am pagantangan mindagu ra pamaguangan kuno.
Pangkaraan kuno, polosoon noyo ondo' matuo umur mindagu,
am ondo' matutuo poyo mantayar ra kapintaran.
Kaa' sotopot no Ambiluo ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Maayo Kaga' kuasa'
ondo' mangani' ra kapintaran ra ulun.
Ulun ondo' mapintar, sala' ka matuo umur nano;
ulun makarati' ra ondo' motopot, sala' ka masawat umur nano.
Ginio ra rongog kano raki';
iowo' aku no mambala' ramuyun ra pampaguangan kuno.
Tumaan guang kuno mangkirongog paat akau mindagu,
am manginaa paat akau maguyum ra ragu-ragu mapintar.
Ilain ku toojo am mangkirongog ra akau kalo nakasugut.
Kasalaan ralalom ru ragu-ragu ri Ayup kalo maalap min katapatan nano.
Ati kulaan kau mindagu ra nokoowot kano ra kapintaran?
Musiti' i Aki Kapuuno' tumaam ri Ayup, sabap ra kalo nakasugut kau.
Minindagu i Ayup ramuyun, sala' ka aku,
kaa' totopot aku kalo tumaam koson ramuyun.
Ayup, naubong ilo am kalo makataam;
kolondo' boo makaragu nilo.
Musiti' aku kia marayus maginaa, paat ra ilo mongkoror?
Minigor ilo ra giu' no am kalo minindagu ra atan pana.
Kalo, raino masaga' aku mangani' ra pampaguangan kuno,
am mambala' ramuyun ra pangkaraan kuno.
Kalo boo makapaginaa aku.
Kalo moorot ku ragu-ragu kuno.
Amon ru kalo mindagu aku, lumaput aku,
koson ra kantungan kungkung ondo' makasuang ra wain baguon.
Musiti' aku mindagu maa' raginio matasu' guang kuno;
musiti' aku mampagaal ra kabang am tumaam.
Kalo manaung aku ra osoi pana;
kalo mongompor aku ra osoi pana.
Kalo makapandai aku ati kulaan mongompor.
Amon ru baalon ku koson raginio, mataki' i Aki Kapuuno' mangukum raki'.
Raino okou Ayup, rongogo' toojo,
ngaangai' ondo' raguon kutu.
Nakatampos aku no
koson mambala' ra pampaguangan kuno.
Mabaya' ra kabanisan ru guang mindagu aku;
ondo' raguon kuno am ondo' sotopot no.
Ambiluo ri Aki Kapuuno' namangun raki',
am paminawo ru Io Ondo' Maayo kaga' Kuasa' mampakaayag raki'.
Amon ru maalap, taamo' aku.
Tampos no ra mindagu.
Ra tayar ri Aki Kapuuno', akau am aku kalo nansusuai;
intor ra tana' lia' itakau binaal No.
Ginio ra, kalo pana malaa' kau raki';
kolondo' ra guang kuno mangala ramuyun.
Gitio noyo norongog kuno ra akau mindagu,
‘Kolondo' pilat kuno, am kalo nambaal ra kasalaan.
Kolondo' sala kuno, am kalo minanggal.
Kaa' naguyum i Aki Kapuuno' ra sasaban koson mamulunsar raki',
am kinara' aku koson ra pantula'.
tainuin No ngaangai' kisol kuno.’
Okou Ayup, pampaguangan muno totopot sala.
I Aki Kapuuno' maayo poyo intor ra ulun.
Kua panguu' kou ri Aki Kapuuno'
am mindagu ra kalo igondo' Io taam ra paraguon ru ulun?
Kabalu' pana mindagu i Aki Kapuuno' ra masuang ralan,
kolondo' osoi pana ondo' totopot mampalio ra ragu Nano.
paat ra ulun mombolong ra rondom ti.
Binuir ilo ri Aki Kapuuno' maa' raginio rumongog Riso,
am nampakalalaa' risilo ra pampakaraan Nano.
Mindagu i Aki Kapuuno' maa' raginio lumonggo' ilo mambaal ra tula,
am mangiruan ra kalimbawan nilo.
Kalo mompoloso Io risilo pusoon;
mamayag Io risilo intor ra kapatayan.
Mansawai i Aki Kapuuno' ra ulun paayaan ra maruol
saboi inan nilo maruol kaga'.
Ulun ondo' marualan kalo matiakan;
akanon ondo' maamis pana maninggol.
Inan nilo tumukal;
makito ngai' bungul nilo.
Mamaar ilo no makasaboi ra intok ru ulun minatoi;
mamaar ilo noyo ra tana' ru ulun minatoi.
Maaru' lair rondo' intor ra saribu malaikat ri Aki Kapuuno',
malaikat ondo' mampakara' ra sasangulun ra kandoi nano,
matong mangindangan riso.
Malaikat no ra makaasi' mindagu ra,
‘Palabuso' io maa' raginio kalo mongoi io ra tana' ru ulun minatoi.
Gitio noyo pamumuli' koson mampalabus riso.’
Inan nano masauk ra maikang kaga',
maikang koson ra ulun mamulok.
Iowon ri Aki Kapuuno' kitaakon nano paat ra io makiasi';
sambaan no i Aki Kapuuno' ra maansukan,
am tapulion ri Aki Kapuuno' baal nano.
Giu' boo ra saang ru ulun masuang mindagu io, ‘Makatula aku noyo.
Makasala aku noyo, kaa' mangampun i Aki Kapuuno' raki'.
Kalo mompoloso Io raki' mongoi ra tana' ru ulun minatoi,
am lakat aku poyo maayag saboi raino.’
Ruruli' noyo,
i Aki Kapuuno' nambaal ra ngaangai' ti
maa' raginio makapamayag Io ra ulun,
am mangani' ra kaansukan ralalom ru kaayagan nilo.
Raino, okou Ayup, talinaasi' toojo,
roro' no am polosoo' aku mindagu.
Kaa' amon ru mokoondo' ondo' masaga' muno raguon, indagu ayuk.
Masaga' aku mangkirongog am mangiou ra okou motopot.
Kaa' amon ru kalo, roro' no am rongog no raki';
masaga' aku mangila' ra kapintaran rirun.
Akau ngaangai' totopot mapintar, totopot mapandai;
raino rongogo' ragu kutu.
am ragu-ragu ondo' mapintar paat mokorongog.
Guangon raino ti musiti' takau intutunon,
am itakau ngaangai' mamatas.
Indagu i Ayup, ‘Kolondo' sala kuno,
kaa' kalo nangani' i Aki Kapuuno' raki' ra katimpakan.
Kinara' aku ra magabau, sabap ra mindagu aku ra motopot.
Malandom pilat kuno, kaa' kolondo' sala kuno.’
Igondo' kau kia pakakito ra ulun koson ri Ayup ti?
Ruruli' io magasab ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Masaga' io rumangan ra ulun malaat,
am magibaya' ra ulun jajajou.
Mindagu io ra kolondo' onong
mambaal ra kasagaan ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Akau ulun mapandai, rongog kano!
Nambaal kia i Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa' ra baal ondo' nasala?
am pamakuan no risilo matanda'.
I Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa' kalo nambaal ra kalaatan;
ngaangai' ulun aniin No ra katimpakan.
Nakaalap kia i Aki Kapuuno' ra kuasa' Nano intor ra osoi pana?
Mokoondo' kia osoi pana ondo' nangani' ra kandoi Riso koson manguasa' ra tana' ti?
Amon ru bunduson ri Aki Kapuuno' painawo ru ulun,
am pasagulion paminawo nilo,
matoi boo ngaangai' ulun ondo' maminawo,
am ulun masauk saguli' ra kaau.
Amon ru mapintar kou, pangkirongog no,
pangintalingo am talinaasi'.
Amon masisang i Aki Kapuuno' ra katimpakan, kalo maaya' Io mamarinta.
Sonsolon min kia i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' matimpok am maikang kaga'?
Sonsolon ri Aki Kapuuno' ulun mamarinta am raja',
paat ra ilo lumaat am manggal.
Namangun i Aki Kapuuno' ra moonong ulun;
kalo saungon No raja',
kapoam kaansayin ondo' langkaya' intor ra musikin.
Maaru' lair ulun matoi paat ra rondom ra mamulali'.
Ukumin ri Aki Kapuuno' ulun am ilo pana mapuso;
Potoyon No ondo' maikang kaga' ra maluoi ayuk.
Mangimansa' Io ra paliso ru ulun,
am urioon toojo ngaangai' tumpang nilo.
Kolondo' kalandaman ondo' totopot molondom
koson mambuni ra ulun makatula.
Kalo pana aruon ri Aki Kapuuno' orou
koson mangakim ra ulun.
Io kalo pana manutun am mangimumui ra ulun manguasa'
ra kalo poyo mopolonggo' risilo, am mampatalison ra ulun malit risilo.
Sabap ra makapandai Io ra atan ondo' baalon nilo,
linuir No ilo paat ra rondom am namuso risilo.
Mangukum Io ra ulun makatula giu' ra saang ru ulun masuang,
sabap ra kalo boo maya' ilo Riso;
am kalo linio nilo ngaangai' susuban Nano.
Nangkinibit ilo ra ulun musikin mampalaa ri Aki Kapuuno',
am morongog ri Aki Kapuuno' laa nilo.
Amon ru mamatas i Aki Kapuuno' koson ra mongkoror ayuk,
kolondo' osoi pana mokololob Riso.
Amon ru pasibunion No bulos Nano,
kolondo' osoi pana makatuum Riso.
Bansa'-bansa' pana kalo maikang
koson manginga' ra ulun mangimbolo' intor ra manguasa' risilo.
Ayup, nangiou kono kia ra kasalaan muno ri Aki Kapuuno'?
Nabantu' kono kia kalo mambaal saguli' ra tula?
Nakitaak kono kia ri Aki Kapuuno' manulu' ra kasalaan ondo' kalo napandayan muno?
Nangiou kono kia mopolonggo' ra kalaatan raginio?
Ginio sabap ra kalo nangiou kou ra binaal ri Aki Kapuuno',
Sabap ra kalo nangiou kou ra binaal ri Aki Kapuuno',
Kalo makalansan kou Riso mangiou ra kasagaan muno.
Okou no ondo' mamatas, sala' ka aku;
balai' akai ra pampaguangan muno.
Moonong ulun ondo' makautok maaru' mangiou;
moonong ulun mapintar ondo' rumongog raki' no mindagu
ra i Ayup mindagu ra kalo makarati',
am ra ragu-ragu nano kolondo' arati'.
Amon ru ragu ri Ayup talinaasin toojo,
makito toojo ra io mindagu koson ra ulun malaat.
Sala' ka ayuk makatula io, kaa' gumuor io;
am magagasab io ri Aki Kapuuno' ra saang takau.
Ayup, kalo motopot ra okou mindagu
ra kolondo' sala muno ra saang ri Aki Kapuuno',
kapoam mindagu ri Aki Kapuuno', ‘Atan sonor ru tula kuno Rirun?
Kolondo' ampos maalap kuno kabalu' pana kolondo' tula kuno.’
Ayup, taamon tokou
am rangan-rangan muno.
Pagilong ra limbowon am imansaa'
mapara' kinasawat ru gaun.
Amon ru masuang kasalaan binaal muno, baal raginio kolondo' atan-atan ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Mangindangan kou kia ri Aki Kapuuno' ra binaal moonsoi muno?
Kolondo' atan-atan pakuan ri Aki Kapuuno' intor ramuyun.
Rangan-rangan rondo' guang rirun ondo' maimbolo' kinibit ru kalaatan muno,
am ilo niayuk ondo' maulian sabap ra kinoonsoi muno.
Paat ra ulun imboloon, mampalaa ilo;
gumolok ilo makiindangan.
Kaa' kalo mampiau ilo ri Aki Kapuuno', Namangun risilo,
ondo' mangani' ra kalansanan paat ra ilo mangiluk guang,
am nampasauk risilo ra mapintar poyo
intor ra bibiag ra lantur kapoam susuit ra mansiab.
Ulun naimbolo' no mampiau, kaa' kalo tumaam i Aki Kapuuno',
sabap ra malilimbau ilo am malaat.
Kolondo' onong ilo gumolok ra makai' ikang;
i Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa' kalo magilong kapoam mangkirongog risilo.
Ayup, kamu kalo makito mu Io;
kaa' inaani' ra guang mokoorot – baal muno soroi giu' ra saang Nano.
Pangkaraan muno ra kalo mangukum i Aki Kapuuno',
am kalo mampalio Io ra kaanggalan.
Kolondo' onong ra okou marayus mindagu;
nakito toojo raino ra kalo nakapandai kou ra rinagu muno.
Rongogo' ra sangkinolor poyo am oroto' guang,
lakat poyo mokoondo' paraguon kuno ralalom inggalan ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Napandayan kuno malandom; pakayon ku ginio
koson manulu' ra Namangun raki' matimpok.
Raguon kuno kolondo' ondo' kalo motopot;
ulun ondo' totopot mapintar soroi ra saang muno.
Maikang kaga' i Aki Kapuuno', am kalo magasab ra osoi pana;
ngaangai' no naratian No.
Kalo polosoon No ulun makatula maayag ra mabuoi,
am mangani' Io ra katimpakan ra ulun ondo' maimbolo'.
Sindungin No ulun ondo' mabanis guang;
polosoon No ilo mamarinta koson ra raja'
saboi urumaton ilo ra sabubuoi no.
Kaa' amon ru ulun bangkilon ra rantai basi',
am maimbolo' sabap ra binaal nilo galama',
tula am kalimbawan nilo pana,
pakitonon ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Binuir No ilo maa' raginio rumongog ra pampakaraan Nano,
am maa' raginio mangiruan ra kalaatan nilo.
Amon kalo gumagaya' kau ri Aki Kapuuno' am mangandoi ayuk Riso,
maayag ilo ra moonsoi am langkaya' saboi ra pupus ru kaayagan nilo.
Kaa' amon kalo gumagaya' ilo ri Aki Kapuuno', mapuso ilo;
matoi ilo ralalom ru sambung nilo.
Ulun ondo' kalo makaulig ri Aki Kapuuno', mambuli ra sangit;
kabalu' pana ukumin, kalo makiasi' ilo ra makiindangan.
Matoi ilo ra lakat poyo mamulok,
sabap ra kaayagan nilo makauyuyu' kaga'.
Kaa' mangila' i Aki Kapuuno' ra ulun pabayaan ralalom ru kaimbalaan
am mampaliman risilo pabayaan ralalom ru kapaganan.
Pinalabus kou ri Aki Kapuuno' intor ra kapaganan,
am pinoloso kou makasia' ra kaansayan,
am mija' muno nososok ra akanon.
Kaa' raino, nontopot ra kalaatan muno,
mangapu kou ra ukuman muno.
Ilalai', pai' polosoo' rasua mamparuung rirun,
am pai' polosoo' kalangkayaan mampalayau rirun.
Kolondo' onong okou gumolok makiindangan;
ngaangai' ikang muno kalo makapangindangan.
Pai' koondom ra rondom ondo' molondom,
paat ra bansa'-bansa' mapuso am maliom.
Ilalain, pai' ongoi ra kalaatan;
kaimbalaan porotongon koson mapainggalur rirun intor ra kalaatan.
Karaa' noyo, kuasa' ri Aki Kapuuno' totopot maayo.
Io noyo mangingila' ondo' maayo kaga'.
Kolondo' osoi pana makapambala' ri Aki Kapuuno' ra atan ondo' musiti' baalon,
kapoam manguu' Riso mambaal ra kalaatan.
Magail i Aki Kapuuno' omporon sabap ra binaal Nano;
okou niayuk musiti' mongompor Riso.
Ngaangai' ulun nakakito ra binaal Nano;
kaa' makito takau intor ra maalur ayuk.
Kalo makapandai takau ra katulayan ri Aki Kapuuno' ra sotopot no,
kapoam manguntob ra suang ru bilor Nano.
I Aki Kapuuno' ondo' namunduk ra timug intor ra tana' ti poongoyon ra limbowon,
am nangulau raginio nasauk ra posok ru timug ru rasam.
Nompoloso Io ra timug rumatu' intor ra gaun,
nasauk ra rasam ondo' rumatu' ra ngaangai' ulun.
Kolondo' osoi pana nakapandai ra kinaugar ru gaun,
kapoam tingkalur monggolon giu' ra limbowon intok inayanan ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Tinampulau No titikop ru limbowon ra ganit,
kaa' lonor ru raat magulayun molondom kaga'.
Ginio noyo ralan Nano mangani' ra akanon
am manampos ra akanon ondo' masuang kaga'.
Namparakop Io ra ganit ra kalindu',
am nanusub riso tumiu' ra intok kasagaan.
Bolos ru tingkalur tatandu' ra maawas rasam sumaboi,
am bibiag tinambiag pana makapandai ra rasam am angin sumaboi ra mataki'.
Angin mapuor kaga' mokotontol raki';
pusu' kuno mimbuor ra maribok.
Akau ngaangai' no, rongogo' bolos ri Aki Kapuuno',
rongogo' tingkalur ondo' mingkual intor ra kabang Nano.
Giu' ra titikop ru limbowon, pinatangkus No ganit;
giu' ra pompor-pompor ru tana', inataran No timpalak.
Kopongo raginio morongog bolos Nano ngongoos,
am ra bolos mosongou maningkalur ra matutunggul;
am liliwa' bolos Nano morongog
ganit ra matutunggul ra kolondo' makaputat.
Nabaya' ra susuban ri Aki Kapuuno', baal makaimuag nasauk,
baal ra maayo ondo' kalo maratian takau.
Ais rumatu' ra tana' ti sumugut ra susuban Nano,
am rasam maawas rumatu' sumugut ra susuban Nano.
Nompolonggo' Io ra kandoi ru ulun,
maa' raginio makapandai ilo ra atan ondo' baalon Nano.
Bibiag masigo sumubol ra ralalom ru luang batu,
am sumindung giu' ra luang intok nano.
Bagiu' mapuor matong intor ra rabugus,
am angin masimu' kaga' matong intor ra ralayo.
Paminawo ri Aki Kapuuno' mompokotog ra ralimbou ru timug ondo' malangka',
am kulawon ginio masauk ra ais ondo' mokotog.
Sinuangan No gaun ra timug,
am makasinda gaun sabap ra natampulau ru ganit.
Gaun minsir-insir ra titikop ru tana' ti,
am mambaal ra ngaangai' susuban ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Namparatu' i Aki Kapuuno' ra rasam koson mamasa' ra tana' ti,
kapoam koson mangukum ra ulun,
kapoam koson manulu' ra taak Nano.
Okou Ayup, pongkoror no, am rongog no,
urioo' toojo baal-baal maayo ondo' binaal ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Nakapandai kou kia ati kulaan i Aki Kapuuno' nanusub
am nambaal ra ganit mapaang intor ra gaun?
Nakapandai kou kia ati kulaan ru gaun minsir,
ampos ru binaal ri Aki Kapuuno' ondo' makapandai kaga'?
Kalo, mampalaa kou ayuk ra malasuan
paat ra tana' ti malumpa' ra angin ru rabugus.
Maindangan mu kia i Aki Kapuuno' mamingkal ra limbowon,
am mampasauk riso ra mokotog koson ra acuan ru basi'?
Pangila' no ramon atan ondo' musiti' mai paraguon ri Aki Kapuuno';
kolondo' atan-atan ra pangkaraan mai am kolondo' atan-atan maragu mai.
Marara' aku makitaak koson mindagu ri Aki Kapuuno';
tawa ru Io lair ondo' mangalap ra kaluagan koson mamuso raki'.
Raino sinda giu' ra limbowon mapaang kaga' saboi mobolou mato,
am limbowon pana mapasau ru angin mansiob.
Sinda kinasilou ru mas makito intor ra ralayo,
am katulayan ri Aki Kapuuno' makaansuk ra guang takau.
Totopot maayo kuasa' ri Aki Kapuuno' saboi itakau kalo makainggaar Riso;
Io mabanis guang am matimpok ra ulun.
Ginio sabap ra moonong ulun mangurumat ri Aki Kapuuno',
am ulun ondo' mangiou ra io no mapintar kalo lioon No.”
Intor ra ralalom ru bagiu', indagu
“Osoi kia okou saboi baani pagantangan guang ra kapintaran Kuno
ra ragu-ragu ondo' sasambungon am kolondo' onong no?
Raino, tampos no muma' Raki',
am taamo' pangkuatan-pangkuatan Kutu.
Soroi kono kia paat ra Aku nambaal ra tana' ti?
Amon ru mapandai kou kaga', taam no.
Osoi kia mangaru' ra kinalangka' ru tana' ti?
Osoi kia mampabawar ra tali panuku' koson manuku' raginio?
Nakapandai kou kia ra taaman no?
Atan kia ondo' manungka' ra lugu'-lugu'
Osoi kia ondo' mampabanta' ra batu pisuk ru tana' ti,
paat ra butitin-butitin ru susuab ti mababaya' marimbai,
am ilo ondo' maayag giu' ra suruga'
paat ra timug tumampulak mingkual intor ra binunakan ru tana'?
Aku no ondo' nanaub ra raat ra gaun
am nangusib riso ra kalandaman.
Inaru' Ku balitan ru raat malangka'
am ra kulobon inalor, inampangan Ku ginio.
Nambala' Aku riso, ‘Polos ragiti ayuk, am kalo boo kaaluron poyo!
Giti noyo kinulun muno ondo' maikang musiti' lumonggo'.’
Okou Ayup, igondo' kia kaayagan muno namparatong ra orou susuab ti,
am manusub ra orou tumawang?
Igondo' kou kia panusub ra orou tumawang manguasa' ra tana' ti
am kabulon ulun malaat intor ra intok pansibunian nilo?
Sinda mato ru orou mampakito ra bulur am limayak
totopot makito koson ra sap ra tana' lia' am liningkom ra sukub.
Sinda mato ru orou mapaang kaga' ra ulun ondo' mambaal ra kalaatan,
am mongompong risilo intor ra mambaal ra kalaatan.
Igondo' kou kia tuun ra puun ru mato ru raat?
Igondo' kou kia pantana' giu' ra lonor ru raat?
Igondo' kia osoi pana manulu' ra kulobon garabang kapatayan ramuyun,
kulobon ondo' nanili ra intok kapatayan ondo' molondom kaga' no?
Nakapandai kou kia ra kinalangka' ru tana' ti?
Taamo' noyo, amon ru makapandai kou ra ngaangai' no.
Nakapandai kou kia ra intor ru sinda?
Nakapandai kou kia ra intok ru kalandaman?
Maalap mu kia mangaru' ra polos ru kalandaman am sinda,
kapoam karuruo no atarin muli' malupus matong?
Indoson mu ra nakapandai kou ra taam ru ngaangai' no,
ilain ayuk koson nakasaang kou paat ra Aku nambaal ra tana' ti;
maaru' ra matutuo kono kaga'!
Igondo' kou kia ongoi ilong ra gudang-gudang Kuno,
intok nambulian Ku ra ais am rasam batu?
Inula' ku ginio koson paat ra kapaganan,
koson ra orou pamulunsaran am pangayawan.
Igondo' kono kia ongoi ra intok ru mato ru orou sumirang,
kapoam minongoi ra intor toojo ru angin sirangon?
Osoi kia ondo' mangkali ra parit tayar ru rasam maawas,
am manampos ra ralan ra tayar ru tingkalur am ganit?
Osoi kia ondo' mamparatu' ra rasam
giu' ra intok ondo' kalo ayanin ru ulun?
Osoi kia ondo' mamasa' ra tana' ondo' mapua' am kolondo' tutuu',
saboi sakot ra giu' no tumuu'?
Mokoondo' kia rasam no ra ama' toojo?
Osoi kia ondo' naganak ra bolobou?
Mokoondo' kia ais no ra ina'?
Osoi kia naganak ra bolobou mokotog?
Osoi kia ondo' nangulau ra timug nasauk ra batu
am nompokotog ra ralimbou ru raat?
kapoam mamugal ra bangkos ru Butitin Orion?
Matingganai mu kia butitin-butitin ra pogonong ru bulintok,
am mangaak ra Biduk Maayo am Biduk Boborok?
Nakapandai kou kia ra ukum-ukum giu' ra limbowon,
am makapangaru' kou kia raginio ra tana' ti?
Magalakan mu kia gaun,
am manusub riso mamasa' rirun ra rasam?
Amon ru manusub kou ra ganit maa' raginio mararayus kukurilop,
matong kia ganit rirun am mindagu, “Iou aku, tuan!”?
Osoi kia mambala' ra susuit ibis
Osoi kia ondo' mambala' ra manuk tandaa' ra rumasam?
Osoi kia ondo' totopot mapintar koson manguntob ra gaun,
am mampalapiat riso saboi rumatu' rasam,
rasam ondo' mompokotog ra kaau masauk ra takunul,
am tana' masauk ra monsosokot?
Makapagasu kou kia ra ondo' akanon ru singa',
am mamasug ra anak ru singa',
paat ra singa' mansibuni giu' ra ralalom ru luang batu,
kapoam maginaa ra ondo' saamon giu' ra intok pagupuan nano?
Osoi kia mampakan ra bangkaak maitom
paat ra susuit no kakatisuk maguyum ra akanon,
paat ra gogol-gogol ru susuit pasapios Raki' makipakan?
Nakapandai kou kia ra jam ru kambing gunung anakon ru indung nano?
Igondo' kou kia pakakito ra tambang masigo maganak ra anak nano?
Nakapandai kou kia ra buoi ru kambing am tambang makatinai'?
Nakapandai kou kia ra jam ru anak nano anakon?
Nakapandai kou kia ra jam ru bibiag no magupu',
am maganak ra anak?
Anak ru bibiag gumayo am masauk maikang giu' ra kataunan;
am mugar ra maalur am kalo sumaguli' ra indung nano.
Osoi kia ondo' mampalabus ra kaladai masigo?
Osoi kia ondo' mampalabus am mompoloso ra kaladai masigo masisimbul?
Aku noyo ondo' mangani' ra tana' kaagisan ra kaladai masigo koson intok randanan nano,
am padang ru usi' koson intok ayanan nano.
Kaladai masigo minggalur ra bandar ondo' masuang ginia',
am kalo babaya' makaup koson mambaal ra kandoi.
Padang ru sakot giu' ra gunung iono intok ru akanon nano,
giu' no tutuu' masansam uyumon nano.
Masaga' kia sapi' masigo mangandoi rirun,
kapoam masaga' mombolong ra rondom giu' ra ralalom ru kandang panambiagan muno?
Mabangkil kia sapi' masigo am jajalin mamparadu' ra tayar muno,
kapoam pakayon koson manisir ra umo muno?
Malansanan mu kia ikang ru sapi' masigo ondo' maikang
am lumansan riso mambaal ra kandoi muno ra maagat?
Malansan kou kia ra sapi' masigo koson manimung ra kumoson,
am magibit ra ampos ru tinanom muno mongoi ra intok pangagikan?
Maribok kaga' kulatab ru kawo ru susuit unta!
Kaa' susuit unta kalo makasiab koson ra susuit kanawai.
Susuit unta mantalu' giu' ra tana' am iruanin no,
am agis mampalasu' ra talu' nano.
Susuit unta kalo makaliman ra maaru' lair ulun makakinjang ra talu' nano,
kapoam bibiag masigo mamabak ra talu' nano.
Susuit unta mitambingai koson ra talu' nano sala' ka io tangan,
am kalo mampalio ra pirot nano totopot kolondo' onong.
Aku noyo ondo' nambaal ra susuit unta sasambungon am kolondo' karatian,
am kalo nangani' Aku riso ra kapintaran am malarom utok.
Kaa' paat ra susuit unta masimbul ra maribok kaga',
kuda am ulun mangura' nano pana maala.
Okou Ayup, okou noyo kia nangani' ra kaikangan ra kuda,
am nampasauk ra bulu maawar ondo' lalamboi ra impus nano?
Okou kia ondo' manusub ra kuda tumindak koson ra gapu'
am ra angus ru paminawo nano mangilaa' ra ulun?
Insokon ru kuda tana' giu' ra limayak ra maansukan,
am jumanjang mongoi ra intok ru pamulunsaran ra makai' ikang.
Kuda kalo makarati' ra malaa',
am kalo makalugut ra ilang.
Kinandoi ondo' inibit ru ulun nangura' nano
mangurinsil am manguliat natiu' ru sinda.
Mabaya' ra ikang ondo' sumimbuluk masimbul kuda,
am kalo migor ra mororo' paat mokobolos ru bujung.
Angus-angus kuda moonong samputin bujung;
intor ra maalur maalok no owou ru pangayawan,
am morongog no ulun tutumula' gumolok ra manusub.
Intor kia rirun susuit kanui minigigila' ra mansiab,
paat sumuku' ra rabugus ra kawo nakambal?
Maginaa kia susuit kanui ra susuban muno
koson mambaal ra bunsut nano giu' ra gunung ondo' masawat?
Giu' ra rasawat ru gunung batu ondo' masawat kaga' nambaal susuit kanui ra intok ayanan nano,
am nampasauk ra ondo' manius koson ra kubu nano.
Intor ra giu' no susuit kanui magalung ra ngaangai' intok,
mato nano magilong maguyum ra ondo' potoyon.
am anak-anak ru kanui manginum ra raraa' ru ondo' pinatoi no.
Ayup, manggal kou ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa';
masaga' kou kia makiala,
kapoam masaga' kou kia mansang?
Taam boo i Ayup ra
“Minindagu aku koson ra ulun sasambungon, iou
Taam ra atan kia ondo' pataakon kuno?
Kolondo' boo ondo' masaga' kuno paraguon.
Minindagu aku nasailan intor ra sotopot no.”
Kopongo raginio intor ra bagiu', indagu poyo
“Raino imbuor no koson ra ungkuyon,
am taamo' noyo kuatin-kuatin Kutu.
Kuminam kou kia mapainono' ra Aku kalo matimpok,
am mononsol Raki' ra mangiou rirun?
Maikang kou kia koson Raki'?
Maalap kia bolos muno maningkalur koson ra kinapuor ru bolos Kuno?
Amon ru koon raginio, luat no ra matanda' am maligag kaga';
pasulungo' ra inan muno urumat am katulayan.
Ilai' toojo ulun ondo' lumimbau;
paabuso' sangit muno am pagasab no risilo.
Iou, tantangi' noyo ulun ondo' lumimbau am pakukuo' ilo;
umoko' noyo ulun malaat raino niayuk.
Lobongo' ilo ngaangai' giu' ra ralalom ru tana';
aputo' ilo giu' ra tana' ru ulun minatoi.
Okou pana omporon Ku boo,
sabap ra namanang kono ra pirot muno galama'.
Ilai' toojo i Bigimot,
ondo' niayuk inangun Kuno, koson rirun.
I Bigimot mongkotop ra sakot koson ra sapi',
kaa' ilai' noyo toojo ikang ru inan nano,
am kaikangan ru kual nano.
Iku' nano tolorog koson ra puun ru sidar,
am kual ra kalayam nano malanut kaga'.
Bungul nano maikang koson ra tambaga',
am kalayam nano koson ra batang ru basi'.
Ginio noyo ondo' maayag ondo' makaimuag kaga' ra gino ngai' ru inangun ri Aki Kapuuno'.
I Bigimot maalap ayuk kaala ru Namangun riso no.
Giu' ra gunung intok ru bibiag masigo mangkuli,
sakot tumuu' koson mangani' riso ra akanon.
Io ondo' maayag no lumuya' giu' ra saau ru bulungkut makaruui,
am mansibuni giu' ra masuang galaga giu' ra intok makatimug.
Bulungkut makaruui am puun gandarusa giu' ra kiing ru sungoi boborok
am mangani' riso ra sindungan.
Aug ru Sungoi Jordan ondo' maaug kalo malaa' io,
timug ondo' makatiu' ra bulos nano umaan no ra guang mamaan.
Osoi kia mokobolou ra mato nano,
am mamparakop riso ra landakon jujubak nano?
Mabangkos mu kia rila' nano ra kalat?
Makalatan mu kia jujubak nano,
kapoam mampatujok ra pamata' ra bungul ru salura nano?
Maaru' lair Liwiatan makilabus
kapoam mangambi' rirun, makimasi'?
Maaru' lair Liwiatan nakimagiou rirun,
am nabantu' ra mangandoi rirun ra masalok?
Maaru' lair binangkil mu Liwiatan koson ra susuit tagamin,
ondo' mapabansuk ra guang ru ulipon-ulipon ra ruandu'?
Maaru' lair ulun mangimpait mantalan riso,
kapoam ulun mantatalan nantayar-tayar riso ra gino ngai' ilo?
Matujok mu kia kungkung nano ra tutura' talu mato,
kapoam monobok ra ulu nano ra tanggulan?
Guut ra Liwiatan kaigondo' ayuk am kalo boo mangkinam kou;
kalo malilianan mu pagugulaan raginio!
Osoi ayuk nakakito ra Liwiatan
magiru' ambiluo am malausan.
Masangit Liwiatan paat karaton intor ra bolong nano;
kolondo' sangulun pana baani migor ra saang nano.
Kolondo' osoi pana ra tana' ti makakau' mambaal raginio.
Mambala' Aku rirun intor ra kalayam ru maayo ulun no,
am intor ra kaikangan nano am babaal ru inan nano ondo' maindon no.
Kolondo' osoi pana ondo' makarilak ra bayang no ra pinaralimbou no,
kapoam makatagu' ra bayang basi'
Osoi kia makaukab ra jujubak nano ondo' maikang,
ondo' mokoondo' ra ripon ondo' makalalaa'?
Bakulung nano
ondo' nonsokot ra narikit am mokotog koson ra batu.
Nagigintun, binangkos ra naigot
saboi angin pana kalo makasisip.
Ngaangai' no nonsokot ra mapiot
saboi kalo maalap ra lungkab.
Sinda ra kukuliat paat mantarisu' Liwiatan no,
am mato nano mapaang koson ra mato ru orou sumirang.
Apui mingkual intor ra kabang nano,
am rila' ru apui mansisiab.
Lisun kukulampun mingkual intor ra arung nano,
koson ra pagangan ondo' palasuon saboi suang nano rumiri'.
Paminawo nano makapaang ra baa;
apui mingkual intor ra kabang nano.
Liog nano maikang kaga',
saboi ulun makauma' riso no malaa'.
Kolondo' tayar ondo' malawo ra kungkung nano;
kungkung nano mokotog am kalo noyo lair mapilang.
Guang nano mokotog koson ra batu, kalo makaulig ra malaa',
am mokotog koson ra batu gilingan.
Paat ra makarat Liwiatan, ulun ra maikang kaga'
lumami' ilo sabap ra malaa' kaga'.
Kolondo' ilang ondo' makapilat riso;
kolondo' tutura', panah kapoam tanggulan ondo' mamilat riso.
Basi' kinara' no koson ra rami,
am gangsa' koson ra tataun napasa'.
Kolondo' panah ondo' makapampagiru' riso;
batu ondo' pinobobol riso, koson ra puputul ru rami.
Tataun pamalamba' kinara' no koson ra sakot mapua',
am Liwiatan nakakurit paat ulun mopobobol ra tanggulan.
Sisi' ra tinai' nano koson ra rarapu' ondo' makalas am malarom,
koson ra kuliamos pangagik ondo' manguol ra losok.
Raat kinuyau no saboi natilu ra timug rumiri',
am koson ra umau ondo' makaputa'-puta' giu' ra ralalom ru pagangan.
Nampatatang io ra babaya' ondo' makasinda,
raat kinulau no nasauk ra puta' ondo' mapulak batik nano.
Giu' ra ralimbou ru tana', kolondo' mokogondo' ra Liwiatan;
ginio noyo ondo' maayag ondo' kalo malaa'.
Bibiag ondo' malilimbau kaga' pana asabin no;
ra gino ngai' ru bibiag masigo, Liwiatan noyo raja'.”
I Ayup pana timinaam boo ra
“Nakapandai aku, iou
makapambaal Kou ra atan ayuk.
alika kolondo' atan pana napandayan kuno.
Mindagu aku intor ra baal ondo' kalo naratian kuno,
intor ra baal-baal ondo' makaimuag kaga' raki' ti.
am tumaam paat ra Okou mangkuot.
Ragili aku mokorongog ayuk ra intor Rirun,

mamarinta Io koson ra raja' ra sabuoi-buoi no.

Mongompor aku Rirun, iou

am Okou namabas raki'.

akau ulun Nano ondo' gumagaya'!

“Kalo maala aku risilo.”

Rongogo' aku no, iou
Pantangian ru guang kuno kinulau Mu masauk ra ligo' kaansukan;
inalap Mu ulir kuno am pinasuali Mu kaansukan.

Kasisangin Mu ulun sumamba ra sinungkalalaing,

Maansukan am magitapap aku ra longon,

Makito Mu imbolo' kuno;

Pakaasi' no raki', iou
sabap ra aku ti makakapaganan;

Ngaangai' pantula' kuno mangiis raki';
ilo ondo' pasambalayan kuno magasab raki';
ilo ondo' makaulig raki' malaa' raki';

Linilianan aku no koson ra minatoi aku no;

Masuang maining ku ra ragu intor ra pantula' kuno;

Kaa' malansan aku Rirun, iou
Okou noyo i Aki Kapuuno' kuno.

Mampiau aku Rirun, iou
pai' aku polosoo' tauyuon.
Polosoo' ayuk ulun malaat tauyuon,

Polosoo' noyo ulun-ulun maabau-abau tumambungangang,
