Omporo'
Omporo' noyo
Kuayan no mangindangan ra ulun atan koson masauk ra mapintar, am makapandai ra ugar ru kaayagan am niayuk makarati' ra ragu-ragu ondo' malandom arati' nano.
Amsal ragitio mangila' ati kulaan ulun maayag ra mapintar, mabanis guang, matimpok am motopot.
Ulun kolondo' kailian ilaan no saboi makaalap ra pangkaraan malarom, am ulun mamulok ilaan no masauk ra ulun mapandai am makapangkara' koson ra matutuo.
Intor ra amsal ragitio ulun mapintar pana rumuang katutunan nano, am ulun makainigilaan mokoowot ra pangilaan.
Baal raginio maratian nilo ondo' nakasibuni arati' no ralalom ru amsal am aration nilo ragu-ragu ru ulun mapintar am niayuk sundait ondo' pasalulaan nilo.
Karaa' noyo atan rinagu ru matuo muno rirun, anak kuno,
sabap ra pangilaan nilono mamparuang ra kaansayan muno koson ra sapak ru ulu am sisigot koson mamparuang ra kinantalur muno.
Amon ru ulun makatula mangambi' rirun, anak kuno, pai' gagayaa' pangambian nilono.
Amon ru mindagu ilo, “Ibok, uyumo' takau ulun namatoi risilo. Ongoyo' takau gabuo' ulun ra kolondo' sala koson ra kukuli ayuk!
Raino kaayagan nilo matasu' am kolondo' maruol, kaa' pupus no masauk ilo koson ra ulun matikapatoi.
Alapon takau kuliamos nilo ra mologo, maa' raginio baloi takano napanu' ra kuliamos ondo' ginaau!
Baya' no ramon, tatayaron takau ampos ru tinakou takano!”
Anak kuno, pai' kau baya' ra ulun koson raginio. Inggalur kau risilo.
Kalo moorot nilo guang mambaal ra kalaatan, gogolong ka mampatoi ilo mataki'.
Kolondo' onong mapataan ra pukot ondo' malimparang makito ru susuit rokopon no,
kaa' ulun malaat mapataan ra landak ondo' masulungan nilo galama' – landak ra makapatoi risilo galama'.
Ulun ondo' maguyum ra akanon ralalom kalaatan bayarin niayuk ra painawo nilo galama'.
Rongogo' noyo! Kapintaran no mampipiau giu' ra ralan-ralan am pasar,
mampiau ra ulun ralalom bolos matangil giu' ra kulobon ru garabang am ati-ati ayuk ulun mantitimung:
“Alii ra ulun budu! Kula' poyo buoi ra akau masauk ra budu? Kula' poyo buoi ra akau magasab ra katutunan? Sanggilan akau migigila'?
Iningo' min aku mangila' ramuyun. Pinsanin takamin, am mantayar ramuyun ra katutunan kuno.
Piawon takamin rumatong kaa' kalo mangkirongog kau. Kalo lioon min aku.
Ngaangai' pinson kuno kalo suguton min am kalo mangapu ra pangilaan kuno.
Ginio ra, bulintok ra akau makauma' ra kapaganan ra tauli no, kuritin takamin. Bulintok ra akau malumpa' ra makalalaa' asabin takamin.
Makalalaa' no rumatong koson ra bagiu' magibit ra asab am mangkinibit ramuyun marualan am maimbolo'.
Bulintok raginio mampiau kau raki', kaa' kalo taamon takamin. Maguyum kau raki' ra ati-ati ayuk kaa' kalo matuum min aku.
Akau masisang mintutun ra kapintaran am kalo masaga' gumagaya' ra
Kalo igondo' kau gagaya' ra bilin kuno kapoam mampalio ra sawai am ila' kuno.
Intor raginio, malimanan min kinibit ru binaal am ginuang min ra mangalaat.
Ulun ra kolondo' katutunan matoi sabap ra mampalilian raki', am ulun budu mapuso sabap ra kalo mampalio raki'.
Kaa' osoi mangkirongog raki' io maayag. Kaayagan nano moonsoi am kalo pana malaa'.”
Alii ra anak kuno, apuo' atan ondo' inila' kuno am pai' mu liliani' panusuban kuno.
Rongogo' min atan ondo' kapintaran am kinami' min aratio'.
Iou, pakiasi' kano toojo maa' raginio makaalap ra katutunan am pakiarati' no.
Uyumo' min baal raginio koson maguyum ra pirok am rapu' nasibuni.
Bagu matutunan mu arati' ru malaa' ra
noyo manaak ra kapintaran. Katutunan am karatian Io namuun.
Manaak Io ra pangindanganan am panindungan ra ulun ondo' mabanis guang.
Ampinin No ulun ondo' mabanis guang, mangampin ra ulun ondo' gumagaya' Riso.
Amon ru rongogon min bilin kutu, mapandayan min atan ondo' motopot, matimpok, kalo maagat ra sapapa'. Mapandayan min atan sotopot no baalon min.
Masauk kau ra mapintar, am katutunan mino mapabansuk ra guang muno.
Karatian am kapintaran muno mangampin rirun,
am niayuk mansawai ramuyun maya' ra kaayagan ra kalo moonsoi, am mapainggalur ramuyun intor ra ulun maabau-abau.
Ulun koson raginio nanatang ra ralan kaayagan ra moonsoi, am ralan molondom binaya' no ondo' napanu' ra tula.
Makaalap ilo ra kaansukan intor ra binaal nilo ra kalo matanda' am malaat.
Ilo kalo lansanin am kolondo' mangintopot risilo.
Marara' kau gumagaya' ra pagambian ru ruandu' mantalan ra inan ondo' gumogot koson mangalap ra guang am mantaligamis ramuyun.
Ruandu' no kalo gumagaya' ra ralaki nano, am nampalilian ra bantu' nano ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Amon ru mongoi kau ra baloi nano, makatingkuang kau ra patayan. Mongoi ra giu' nogondo' ayuk mongoi ra tana' ru ulun minatoi.
Ulun ondo' minongoi riso iono kalo igondo' sumaguli' ra ralan tumingkuang ra kaayagan.
Intor raginio, musiti' tiluon min kaayagan ru ulun moonsoi, am musiti' no kaayagan mino sumugut ra kasagaan ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Ulun ondo' sumugut ra kasagaan ri Aki Kapuuno', ioginio ulun ondo' mabanis guang maayag geu'ra ondo' binantu' ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Kaa' ulun malaat am makatula paingkualon ri Aki Kapuuno' intor ra pagun raginio, koson ra sakot binubul intor ra tana'.
Alii ra anak kuno, pai' liliani' pangilaan kuno. Masalok kou mangkara' ra panusuban kuno,
maa' raginio maawar painawo muno am kaayagan muno langkaya'.
Pangintopot kono am gagaya' ri Aki Kapuuno' am niayuk ulun. Karaa' noyo am bulii' noyo baal raginio ra guang muno.
Amon ru mambaal kou koson raginio, i Aki Kapuuno' am ulun masaga' mangapu rirun.
Pangintopot kono ra
Karaa' noyo
Pai' kou pangkara' ra okou mapintar poyo intor ra sotopot no. Gagaya' no ra
Binaal muno masauk koson ra tatapis ondo' makapali' ra pipilat muno am mapaligag ra inan muno.
Urumato' noyo
Amon ru mambaal kou koson raginio, lamin pambulian muno mapanu' ra gandum, am wain muno lumuab saboi kolondo' boo papaulian.
Alii ra anak kuno, bulintok ra
mangila' ra ulun tagamin Nano, koson ra sangulun ama' mangila' ra anak ondo' tagamin Nano.
Pakaansuk noyo ulun ondo' nasauk ra mapintar am nakarati'.
Ampos nano maayo poyo ka pirok, am logo nano nakasail poyo ra mas.
Kapintaran mologo poyo ka intan. Ngaangai' gogoton muno kalo mokogondo' ra kapintaran!
Kapintaran manaak rirun ra maawar painawo, am niayuk langkaya' am uramaton.
Kapintaran manaak rirun ra kaayagan moonsoi am katasuan.
Ulun ondo' masauk mapintar pamalimanan nano makaansuk, am makaalap ra kaayagan motopot.
biningkal No limbowon ralalom ru katutunan Nano.
Kapintaran Nano nangkinibit ra timug ru sungoi tumilis,
am gaun maparatu' ra rasam ra tana' ti.
Alii ra anak kuno, guuto' kapintaran am pangaratian, pai' igogondo' labusi',
kaayagan muno pana maalungan – moonsoi am maansukan.
Moonsoi ugar muno, kalo makasaru kou.
Kolondo' kalaa' muno ra okou mombolong, am makalunus kou mombolong saboi tumawang.
Kalo pana magalabo kou ra karaat rumatong ra sangkuliop ayuk, koson ra rosob lumumpa' ra ulun malaat.
magalung rirun. Kalo polosoon No okou mabangkil.
Amon ru maalap ayuk, mambaal kau ra pangindangan ra ulun ondo' maaya' indanganon.
Amon ru mokoondo' kau ra kaluagan mangindangan ra raino ti, pai' min susubo' pasambalayan mino maginaa saboi ra susuab no.
Pai' kau pangatang ra baal ondo' mantipagon ra pasambalayan mino, minayan io ra sambalayan mino am mangintopot io ramuyun.
Pai' kau pakimansangor ra kolondo' sasaban ra ulun ondo' kalo poyo igondo' kalaat ramuyun.
Pai' kau solon ra ulun malaat am pai' tiluo' paliso nilo.
Masisang
Ulason ru
Asabin No ulun ra minsawat guang, kaa' apuon No ulun ra minggana' guang.
Ulun ra mapintar urumaton, kaa' ulun budu makaalap ra uyu'.
Alii ra anak kau ngai', rongogo' pangilaan ri ama' mino. Rongogo' min toojo maa' raginio masauk kau ra mapintar.
Pangilaan kutu ramuyun ti moonsoi, ginio ra karaa' min pangilaan kuno.
Bulintok ra lakat aku poyo lalaing, koson ra sangulun buayoi langkuir,
i ama' masalok mangila' raki'. Kono, “Karaa' noyo pangilaan kuno am pai' noyo liliani'. Baalo' noyo atan nanusuban kuli, maa' raginio kaayagan muno makaansuk.
Sauk no ra mapintar am malaga'. Pai' liliani' kapoam impayi' bilin kuno.
Gonggomo' mu kapintaran, am kapintaran pana mangampin rirun; tagami' noyo kapintaran, am kapintaran pana magalung rirun maa' raginio moonsoi kaayagan muno.
Baal ra maatang kaga' ondo' musiti' muno baalon ioginio mompogogot ra kapintaran. Atan pana ilowon muno, ondo' maatang kaga' no mompogogot ra pangaratian.
Tagami' noyo kapintaran, am okou pana painsawaton. Gapuso' noyo
Kapintaran manaak ra karaun koson pasampakon rirun.”
Alii ra anak kuno, rongogo' noyo ragu kutu. Imansain mu toojo bilin kutu maa' raginio maawar painawo muno.
Inila' tokono ra kapintaran am ralan kaayagan ra motopot.
Amon ru maayag kou koson raginio, kolondo' mokoompong rirun bulintok ra okou mangkiralan, am kalo makasaru kou bulintok ra okou masimbul.
Kasalok no mangkara' ra pangilaan ondo' pinataak kuno rirun. Tagami' pangilaan kuno sabap ra pangilaan raginio magibit ra ampos ru kaayagan muno.
Pai' bayaa' ralan ru ulun malaat, am pai' tiluo' binaal nilono.
Polosoo' ilo ayuk. Inggalur intor risilo am rayusi' ugar muno.
Ulun malaat kalo mokororot amon ru kalo poyo makapambaal ilo ra malaat. Kalo matikoolong ilo amon ru kalo poyo maninduol ilo ra ulun bokon.
Kalaatan am mampatoi pangkaraan nilo koson ayuk mangakan am manginum.
Kaayagan ru ulun moonsoi koson ayuk ra sirang ru mato ru orou, buoi kabuoi matawang kaga' saboi mamai'.
Kaa' kaayagan ru ulun malaat molondom koson ra rondom. Makasaru ilo am maratu', kaa' kalo mapandayan nilo atan sabap no.
Alii ra anak kuno, guango' noyo bilin kutu. Rongogo' noyo ragu-ragu kutu.
Pai' min impayi'. Karaa' noyo am bulii' ralalom ru guang mino.
Ulun ondo' makarati' ra bilin kutu, maayag ilo am masauk ra maligag.
Totomolo' noyo atan karaan mino, sabap ra pangkaraan mino mangatang ra kaayagan mino.
Pai' raguo' atan kalo motopot. Pai' pagabau am mindagu ondo' mangkinibit ra ulun makalayau.
Ilai' noyo saang mabaya' ra guang mangintopot ra sotopot-topot no, am pai' pakukuo' ulu mino sabap ra mauyu'.
Ilalai' noyo atan ondo' atangon mino maa' raginio atan ayuk pana baalon mino makaampos ra moonsoi.
Painggaluro' noyo inan mino intor ra kalaatan am kaayag no ra guang mabanis. Pai' lisang intor ra ralan motopot.
Alii ra anak kuno, rongogo' aku no. Urioo' kapintaran kuno am arati' ru pangilaan kuno rirun,
maa' raginio mapandayan mu am mindagu koson ra ulun ondo' mapintar.
Kabang ru ruandu' lulumapau
kaa' amon ru ngaangai' no nakasail, kapaganan ayuk boo nakatilayun am imbolo'.
Mangitang io rirun ra pagun ru ulun matoi. Ralan ra binayaan nano tumingkuang ra kapatayan.
Kalo mokosoloro' io mugar tumingkuang ra kaayagan, kaa' lumisang io intor ra ralan no ondo' kalo matutunan nano.
Ginio ra, anak kau ngai', rongogo' noyo raguon kutu am pai' min impayi'.
Inggaluri' noyo ruandu' koson raginio! Baloi nano pana pai' inggaari'.
Amon ru lumampit kou ra ruandu' raginio, kolondo' ulun mangurumat rirun, am bulintok ra kinamuloko' muno, painawo muno potoyon ru ulun ondo' kalo makaasi'.
Ngaangai' rapu' mino gaawon ru ulun ondo' kalo mauligan mino, am ampos ru kandoi mino longgomon ru ulun ra bokon.
Pompor ru kaayagan mino, mampalaa kau sabap ra inan mino napaja' ra maruol.
Akau pana mindagu boo, “Kua kasisangi' ku pambilinan? Kua kia pai' aku kasaga' sawayon?
Kalo mangkirongog aku ra pangilaan ru ngaangai' mangingila' kuli am kalo gumagaya' risilo.
Raino aku
Gagayaa' noyo andu' muno am tagami' iono sangulun.
Kolondo' onong maguyum ra kaansukan ra ulun ondo' sala' ka andu' muno.
Kaansukan raginio akau ayuk mansawo tatangan, sala' ka ulun ra bokon.
Intor raginio, pakaansuk no ra andu' muno am uyumo' noyo kaansukan ra ralaa inandu' muli.
Ralaa mantalur am maligag koson ra paus. Polosoo' batang ru inan nano makabunduk toojo ra guang muno am laya' nano makakara' mu ayuk.
Atan pakuan muno lumaai ra ruandu' bokon, alii ra anak kuno? Atan pakuan lumampit ra ruandu' ra lumapau?
Makito ru
Tula ru ulun malaat koson ayuk ra landak ondo' mampajaling riso galama'.
Matoi io sabap ra kalo nangkirongog ra bilin. Kabuduan nano mangkimait riso ra lobong.
Anak kuno, amon ru mokoondo' bantu' min manampilon ra utang ru ulun bokon,
ragu-ragu kapoam bantu' mino lumumpa' ramuyun saguli'.
Koon poyo raginio anak kuno, ulun no nanguasa' noyo ramuyun. Kaa' gitio noyo ralan magibit ramuyun lumabus: Umaa' io ribaki' am kitaako' toojo ra labusin kau.
Pai' poyo pombolong kapoam tangus ra kalo poyo nakilabus kau.
Labus no intor ra jajaling no koson ra susuit kapoam paus nakalabus intor ra ulun magagasu.
Ulun matiar musiti' migigila' koson ra kaayagan ru kilau.
Kilau kolondo' tingganai, kapoam mangunguasa',
kaa' bulintok mangkumos mangula' ilo ra akanon koson tumampos mangiima' ra orou bitilan.
Kula' poyo buoi ru ulun matiar mombolong? Sanggilan io sumukal?
Kono, “Mombolong aku po sangkinolor. Mangkusimog aku po am tumangus sangkinolor.”
Kaa' liliwa' io mombolong, malumpa' io ru kapaganan am musikin ondo' matong koson ra mantatakou ondo' makatanggalon ra malarom.
Ulun malaat am kolondo' onong magagabau ra ati-ati ayuk intok.
Kulioromon nilo mato koson pulanu ra ilo mamparuung ramuyun,
liliwa' ra ilo mangatang ra kalaatan am karaan nilono nakalayau. Mambaal ilo ra sasou ra ati-ati intok.
Sabap ra binaal nilono, malumpa' ilo ru karaat saboi ilo nalingon natutuk.
Mokoondo' tulu' baal kasisangin ru
paliso ra malilimbau,
kabang ra magabau,
kalindu' ra namatoi ra ulun ondo' kolondo' sala,
Pangkaraan ondo' mangatang ra baal-baal malaat,
kalayam maringkaagou mongoi ra kalaatan,
sasi' ondo' rayusin no abau
am ulun ondo' mangkinibit ra pansasangaran ru rangan.
Alii ra anak kuno, baalo' panusuban ri ama' mino, am pai' liliani' pangilaan ru ina' mino.
Karaa' noyo am bulii' noyo rinagu nilo ralalom ru guang mino.
Pangilaan nilono manulu' ra pangkiralanan mino, mangampin ramuyun bulintok ra molondom, maminson ra bilin ramuyun bulintok ra matawang.
Panuluan nilono koson ra sisilau ondo' mapaang, am pansawayan nilono manulu' ra ralan kaayagan ondo' moonsoi ramuyun.
Ginio noyo ralan ra akau painggaluron intor ra ruandu' lumapau am intor ra taligamis ru andu' ru ulun bokon.
Pai' kau kabunduk ra kinantalur nilo, kapoam mabunduk ra kulurat ru mato nilo.
Pambabayar ra ruandu' mantalan ra inan koson ayuk ra logo ru sampiring akanon, kaa' lumapau ra andu' ru ulun io no musiti' bayarin ra painawo.
Amon ru pasapawon min apui, bayang mino mosolob.
Amon ru kuminjang kau ra baa ru apui, kalayam mino malinsu.
Koon raginio niayuk kalaa' ra sangulun ungkuyon rumulug ra andu' ru ulun. Osoi mambaal ra baal raginio io makaliman ra ukuman nano.
Ulun kalo magasab ra mantatakou ondo' mantakou ra akanon sabap ru bitil,
kabalu' pana koon raginio, amon ru mantatakou no marakop, musiti' io mapasaguli' intulu' poyo ruli' am ngaangai' ru rapu' nano pataakon no.
Kaa' sangulun ungkuyon lumapau io no sasambungon. Ungkuyon raginio mangimbolo' ra inan nano galama'.
Asasabin io am lambaan ru ulun. Sabuoi-buoi no io tauyuon.
Sangulun ralaki sumangit kaga' bulintok ra io maingot. Ruol ru guang nano kalo mairu'-iru'.
Kalo masaga' io bayarin ra tagi'; kula' ayuk pana suang ru taak kalo makasalui ra sangit ru guang nano.
Alii ra anak kuno, karaa' bilin kutu, am pai' liliani' panusuban kuno.
Gagayaa' noyo panusuban kuno, maa' raginio maayag kau. Pagigilai' min sumugut ra pangilaan kuno koson niayuk ra akau magalung ra mato min galama'.
Guuto' noyo pangilaan kuno ra moonong bulintok am bulii' ralalom ru guang muno.
Kapintaran karaa' min koson ra pabukat min am kapandayan koson ra rangan molongkot min.
Kapintaran mapainggalur ramuyun intor ra andu' ru ulun bokon, am intor ra ruandu' ondo' mantaligamis.
Sangarawan ragili nampulolou aku intor ra pagimpalan ru baloi kuno,
am makito ku masuang kamulakan ungkuyon kolondo' poyo katutunan, kaa' mulu' ra sangulun ayuk ulun kalo matanda' urioon ku intor ra risilo.
Minugar io ra rondo' linsuk ru ralan, mamaar ra baloi ru sangulun ruandu'. Minugar io inggaar ra baloi ru ruandu' no
bulintok mamai', am lumondom galing noyo.
Ruandu' no minuma' riso. Nambayang ruandu' no ra bayang koson ra babayangon ru sangulun ruandu' mantalan ra inan am mangatang ra gogot ru guang nano.
Kalo totomolon no ra io mindagu am kalo mauyu'. Kalo mokosoloro' io migor,
kapoam maginaa io ra linsuk ru ralan; sanganuan giu' ra ralan, sanganuan giu' ra pasar.
Gapuson no buayoi no am alakin no. Kalo maringkauyu' io mindagu,
“Orou raiti' napataak aku ra taak simbalui, am ragino mokoondo' poyo suwo intor ra taak simbalui no.
Ginio ra aku miningkual maguyum rirun, am ragino natuum tokou.
Kaalangan kuno inapinan ku ra konoon linon ondo' babatikan intor ra Misir.
Kinupilan ku kaalangan no ra owou maamis ru mur, gaharu am kaningau.
Ragino, parulug to liliwa' mangundasa' ra bansuk saboi matawang.
Ralaki kuno kalio ra baloi. Minongoi io ra intok maalur
am nagibit ra ruit masuang. Kalo muli' io buoi ruo ngaminggu'.”
Ginio noyo pantaligamis ru ruandu' no ra buayoi no saboi nasinggayawan guang ru buayoi no.
Kalo nakapangkara' io, tuluisuot no ayuk minaya' ra ruandu' no; buayoi no koson ra sapi' ondo' simbaluyon am koson ra tambang ondo' siminulung ra jajaling;
sangkinolor poyo anak ru panah mansabut ra pusu' nano. Buayoi no koson ra susuit mansiab jumuung ra landak. Kalo natutunan no ra painawo nano ralalom kapaganan.
Ginio ra, alii ra anak kau, rongogo' aku no am karaa' min bilin kuli.
Pai' polosoo' ruandu' koson raginio makabunduk ra guang mino. Pai' min io uyumo',
sabap ra masuang ungkuyon pinatibusu nano, am ondo' naimbolo' kalo mauntob suang no.
Amon ru mongoi kau ra baloi nano, arati' no mongoi kau ra pagun ru ulun matoi. Ginio noyo ralan magantos sumuku' ra kapatayan.
Rongogo' noyo! Mapintar
kapintaran mapaining ra bolos.
Mapintar migor ra munung ru bulur, ra kiing ru ralan,
am niayuk lisangon ru ralan.
Giu' ra kulobon garabang, subalan mongoi ra bandar,
giu' no maining bolos nano.
“Alii ra ulun kau, mikikimasi' aku ramuyun;
moonong ulun ra tana' urioo' pampiawan kuno.
Akau ra kolondo' poyo katutunan, igigila' kau sumauk ra mapintar;
akau ondo' kalo matanda', igigila' noyo maa' raginio makapangkara'.
Rongogo' noyo ragu-ragu kutu,
sabap ra ngaangai' no motopot am mokoonong.
Atan ondo' raguon kutu, ngaangai' no motopot,
sabap ra masisang aku ra abau.
Ngaangai' ondo' raguon kuno motopot,
kolondo' rondo' pana mampalayau kapoam nasala.
Pangkaraan ru ulun mapintar, rinagu kuno motopot,
pangkaraan ru ulun masuang katutunan, ngaangai' no matanda'.
Guango' min pangilaan kuno makasail poyo intor ra pirok;
kaatango' min noyo katutunan makasail poyo ra mas kopoyo.
Aku noyo mapintar. Mokologo aku po ka intan,
am aku kalo maalap pogondoon ra atan ayuk gogoton mino.
Aku noyo kapintaran; mokoondo' aku ra pangaratian,
katutunan, am mapintar.
Mangurumat ra
masisang aku ra malilimbau am masawat ragu,
paliso ra malaat am ragu-ragu ra mamparuung.
Aku noyo manaak ra pambalaan ra moonsoi,
am niayuk namuun no.
Mapintar aku am maikang.
Mangindangan aku ra raja'-raja' mapaugar ra pamarintaan nano,
ngaangai' mangunguasa' indanganon ku mapaundok ra katimpakan.
Sabap ra nangindanganan kuli, ngaangai' mangangandoi ru parinta am ulun bangsawan
namarinta am mapaugar ra katimpakan.
Tagamin ku ulun ra motogom raki',
ondo' totopot maguyum raki', makatuum raki'.
Kalangkayaan am urumat,
am kalo igondo' mailusan am makasugut intor noyo raki'.
Ondo' maalap intor raki' makasail poyo ra mas kopoyo;
mologo poyo intor ra pirok kopoyo.
Mugar aku ra ralan kabanisan ru guang,
am maya' ra ralan katimpakan.
Ulun ra monogom raki', pasaukon ku langkaya';
baloi nano sosokon ku ra rapu'.
Aku pinagulu sauko' ru
aku noyo ampos ru kandoi Nano ondo' pinagulu bulintok ra galing i poyo.
Aku pagulu binangun,
ra kalo poyo binangun tana' ti.
Naanak aku no ra kalo poyo binangun raat,
ra kalo poyo siminalula' taur-taur ru timug.
Aku inanak ra kalo poyo nakabigor ngaangai' gunung
am ra kalo poyo nakabigor ngaangai' bulur,
ra kalo poyo binangun ru
am niayuk ra kolondo' poyo kunol ru tana' ra kasaa'.
Bulintok ra Io namingkal ra limbowon, nakatainono' aku,
am bulintok ra limbowon pinaatang No ralimbou ru raat,
bulintok ra
bulintok inukab No taur ru timug ra raat,
bulintok ra Io manusub ra timug ru raat
maa' raginio kalo boo makasail ra polos ondo' inaru' Nano.
Soroi aku noyo
paat ra lonor ru tana' ti pinabanta' No.
Soroi aku minumbir Riso koson ra anak tagamin Nano,
moonong orou aku noyo puun ru kaansukan Nano,
masalok aku maansukan ra saang Nano.
Maansukan aku ra tana' Nano,
am niayuk kinoonsoi ru ulun namagun no.
Raino, rongogo' min aku, alii ra ulun mamulok!
Gagayaa' min nanuluan kuli, akau pana makakaansayan.
Apuo' min pangilaan kuno am kasauk no ra mapintar;
pai' min polosoo' ginio.
Pakaansuk noyo ulun ondo' mangkirongog raki',
ondo' moonong orou manturung maginaa ra kulobon ru baloi kuno,
am ondo' maginaa ra garabang ru baloi kuno.
Osoi ondo' makatuum raki' makaalap io ra kaayagan,
am
Osoi kalo makatuum raki' mamungawo io,
am ulun masisang raki', gumogot ra kapatayan.”
Mapintar mambaal ra baloi nano, mapatansok tulu' ngantaun lugu' ru baloi no.
Sanginan bibiag sinimbalui no bulintok mangiantak ra orou maayo, mangkutou io ra wain, am mapasulung ra akanon.
Susubon no ngaangai' kambo ruandu' mampipiau giu' ra intok masawat kaga' ra bandar no,
“Ibok no, alii ra ulun ondo' kalo masuang katutunan. Ibok no ragiti!” Mindagu io ra ulun sasambungon,
“Pangakan takau ra akanon pinasulung kutu am panginum takau ra wain ondo' kinutou kutu.
Tatango' noyo sasambungon maa' raginio kaayagan muno makaansuk. Bayaa' noyo kaayagan ru ulun mapintar.”
Amon ru mansawai kau ra ulun malilimbau, magasab io rirun. Amon ru mansawai kau ra ulun malaat, magulas io rirun.
Pai' min sawayo' ulun malilimbau, masisang io ramuyun. Kaa' amon ru mansawai kau ra ulun mapintar, mangurumat io ramuyun.
Amon ru mambilin kau ra ulun mapintar, ulun no rumuang pintar nano. Atan ayuk pana pangilaan min ra ulun ondo' gumagaya' ri Aki Kapuuno' katutunan nano rumuang.
Amon ru sumauk kau ra ulun mapintar, pagulu musiti' no mangurumat am malaa' kau ra
Mapintar mapakaawar ra umur muno.
Okou galama' mokoonong amon ru mapintar kou. Kaa' amon ru mapintar no tuliarin mu, okou galama' niayuk kolondo' onong.
Sasambungon koson ayuk ra sangulun ruandu' mabaji' ondo' kolondo' katutunan, am kalo mauyu'.
Manturung io ra kulobon ru baloi nano kapoam panturungan giu' ra intokon masawat kaga' giu' ra bandar,
am mampiau io ra ulun ondo' mansail ra giu' no,
“Subol kau ra baloi kutu, alii ra akau ondo' kalo kukula' katutunan!” Mindagu io ra ulun sasambungon,
“Inumon ra tinakou maamis toojo, am mansibuni ra mangakan malanging toojo.”
Ulun ondo' nakatibusu minumpos ra baloi nano kalo nakapandai ra ilo matoi ra giu' no am ilo ondo' minumpos ra baloi nano, raino giu' ra pagun ru ulun minatoi.
Gitio noyo ragu-ragu mapintar ru Raja' Salomo:
Anak ra mapintar mapabansuk ra ama' nano; anak ra sasambungon mamilat ra guang ru ina' nano.
Amon ru langkaya' kaa' intor ra guang kalo mabanis io kalo magibit ra kaansayan, kaa' kabanisan ru guang mangampin ra kaayagan.
Kalo polosoon ru
Ulun matiar ampos nano musikin, kaa' ulun marajin ampos nano langkaya'.
Ulun mapintar manimung ra ampos ru kandoi no bulintok mangkumos; ulun mombolong bulintok raginio mapakauyu' ra inan galama'.
Ulun moonsoi makaalap ra barakat. Ulun malaat alion no kalaatan intor ra ragu-ragu nilo.
Ulun moonsoi masalok karaan, kaa' ulun malaat mataki' lilianin.
Ulun mapintar masaga' mangapu ra bilin. Ulun ra jajajou ragu io no makalayau.
Ulun mabanis guang, kaayagan nano kalinuos ayuk; ulun ra mamparuung pupus no mapandayan niayuk.
Ulun ondo' mapasibuni ra motopot mangkinibit ra kapaganan, kaa' ulun ondo' mansawai ra sailon no magibit ra kaansayan.
Ragu-ragu ru ulun moonsoi magibit ra kaayagan moonsoi, ragu-ragu ru ulun malaat masibuni kalaatan.
Kasisangan mangkinibit ra pansasangaran; togom mangampun ra ngaangai' kasalaan.
Ulun mapandai mindagu ra mapintar, ulun sasambungon maaya' ukumin.
Ulun mapintar manimung ra katutunan; kaa' ulun sasambungon mapatabual ra kajajawan ralalom ru ragu jajajou nilo.
Kalangkayaan manindung ra ulun langkaya', kaa' kamusikinan mapakapagon ra ulun musikin.
Binaal ra moonsoi magibit ra kaansukan ru kaayagan, kaa' tula mangkinibit ra masuang poyo tula.
Ulun mangkirongog ra sawai kaayagan nano makaansuk, kaa' ulun ondo' kalo mangiou ra sala nano soroi io ralalom kaayagan makalalaa'.
Ulun ondo' mambuni ra kasisangan iono mamparuung. Ulun ondo' mangalimut iono sasambungon.
Masuang poyo raguon, maaru' mangkinibit ra masuang tula. Ulun mapintar totomolon ayuk ra mindagu.
Raguon ru ulun moonsoi koson ayuk ra pirok kopoyo, kaa' pangkaraan ru ulun malaat kolondo' onong.
Raguon ru ulun moonsoi, io rondo' barakat ru nasuangan ulun, kaa' ulun sasambungon matoi intor ra sambung nilo galama'.
Sabap ra ulun lumangkaya' intor ra barakat ru
Ulun sasambungon maansayan ra kalaatan; ulun mapintar maansayan ra kapintaran.
Ulun moonsoi mokoowot ra atan gogoton nilo, kaa' ulun malaat mokoowot ra atan kalaanan nano kaga'.
Ulun malaat mapuso bulintok ra rosob matong, kaa' ulun mabanis guang kalo makulau ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Pai' panusub ra ulun matiar, iono mapakapagon ayuk, koson ra suka' makaangil ra ripon kapoam lisun makapari' ra mato.
Urumato' noyo
Kalansanan ru ulun malaat mapakasauk ra io makaansuk, kaa' lansanin ru ulun malaat kolondo' toojo.
Ulun mabanis guang, kaayagan nano matanda', kaa' ulun malaat kalo makaayan ra tana' tungkuson nano.
Ulun mabanis mindagu ra ragu-ragu mapintar, kaa' kabang ru ulun malaat pakimuton.
Ragu-ragu ru ulun mabanis guang mapabansuk ra guang, kaa' ragu-ragu ru ulun malaat masalok maninduol.
Masisang
Ulun ra malilimbau tauyuon. Ulun ra minggana' guang iono mapintar.
Ulun moonsoi inaak ru kabanisan ru guang nano. Ulun ra kalo maintopot usungon ru kalaatan ru guang nano.
Kolondo' onong ru linangkaya' ru ulun no bulintok tumingkuang ra kapatayan, kaa' kabanisan ru guang mamayag ra ulun.
Ralan kaayagan ru ulun moonsoi guang tandaan ru kabanisan ru guang, kaa' ulun malaat mangkinibit ra inan magagai.
Ulun mabanis guang maayag sabap ra bonsoi ru guang nano; ulun ra kalo sama' intopoton, paliso nilono mulas risilo.
Bulintok ra ulun malaat matoi, kalansanan nilono pana mapuso; lumansan ra ikang galama' kolondo' onong.
Ulun ra kolondo' tula makainggalur ra kapaganan, kaa' ulun malaat mokoowot ra kapaganan.
Raguon ru ulun malaat makaimbolo' ra ulun; kapintaran ru ulun moonsoi mapakaayag.
Titikop libung ru bandar makaansuk bulintok ra ulun mabanis guang makaalap ra akanon; mamagun magilakup bulintok ra ulun malaat matoi.
Barakat ru ulun mabanis guang mapalangkaya' ra bandar; raguon ru ulun malaat mampalunsai ra bandar.
Magasab ra ulun bokon ioginio sasambungon. Ulun ra mapintar masaga' poyo mongkoror.
Ulun ra mangalimut kalo mokoopot ra ragu, kaa' ulun ra maintopot maubas mokoopot ra ragu.
Bansa' kalo makabigor amon ru kolondo' tingganai ra mapintar, kaa' maayag amon ru masuang manaak ra bilin.
Bantuon ra bayarin utang ru ulun bokon arati' no maparatong ra karaat; moonsoi poyo ru kalo kululiwin ra baal koson raginio.
Ruandu' ra matanda' urumaton ru ulun; kaa' ruandu' kalo matanda' tauyuon.
Ulun matiar kalo mokoowot ra ruit;
Ulun ra moonsoi guang maulian inan nano galama'; ulun ra mapuka' mampalubat ra inan nano galama'.
Ulun malaat kalo makaalap ra kaulian ra sotopot no; kaa' ulun mambaal ra moonsoi kaulian nano motopot.
Osoi ayuk mampaguang ra moonsoi, kaayagan nano makaansuk, kaa' osoi ayuk mingkotog mambaal ra malaat io makatingkuang ra patayan.
Masisang
Ulun malaat aruon ra ukumin, kaa' ulun moonsoi bayagon.
Kinantalur ru ralaa ra kalo matanda' koson ayuk ra sinsing mas ra jujubak ru bauwi.
Kasagaan ru ulun moonsoi masalok ampos nano moonsoi, kaa' lansanin ru ulun malaat kasangitan.
Mokoondo' ulun mataau, ka rumuang kinalangkaya' nano. Mokoondo' ulun makalit, kaa' rumuang kinamusikin nano.
Ulun ra mataau kasaukan nano langkaya'. Ulun ra masaga' mangindangan iono indanganon niayuk.
Osoi mampabujuk ra gandum ulason ru ulun, kaa' osoi mantalan ra gandum omporon ru ulun.
Osoi masalok mambaal ra moonsoi kaansayin ru ulun; osoi maguyum ra kalaatan, io malumpa' ru kapaganan.
Osoi lumansan ra rapu' maratu' io koson ra raun mapua', kaa' ulun ra kolondo' tula tumuu' koson ra sakot malabung.
Ulun ondo' mangkinibit ra kapaganan ru sasambaloi nano, kolondo' atan-atan maalap no.
Ulun sasambungon sabubuoi no mangandoi ra ulun mapintar.
Ulun ra motopot kaayagan
Amon ru ulun moonsoi pana balasin ra tana' ti, maaru' noyo ra ulun malaat am ulun ra makatula ukumin.
Ulun ondo' motogom ra katutunan matasu' makaalap ra sawai, kaa' ondo' kalo masaga' sawayon iono ulun sasambungon.
Ulun moonsoi kaansayin ru
Kolondo' sangulun pana bayagon intor ra kalaatan, kaa' ulun mabanis guang mantilayun am kalo mauyog.
Andu' ra moonsoi masauk ra kaansukan ru ralaki nano, kaa' andu' ra mapakauyu' ra ralaki nano koson ayuk ra maruol kinso ondo' mapasauk ra bungul mopopol.
Ulun mabanis guang mangkara' ra baal-baal moonsoi, kaa' pinson ru ulun malaat ruung ayuk.
Ragu-ragu ru ulun malaat makapatoi, kaa' ragu-ragu ru ulun mabanis guang mapakaayag.
Ulun malaat matoi am kalo makapanatang ra papag, kaa' ulun moonsoi masalok makapapag.
Ulun mapintar makaapu ra ompor; ulun sasambungon makaapu ra pagasaban.
Moonsoi poyo masauk ra ulun nasuangan ondo' mokoondo' ra pangandayan, kaa' migiangku ra ulun maayo kaa' maitilan.
Ulun moonsoi magalung ra tinambiag nilono, kaa' ulun malaat mangimbolo' ra tinambiag nilono.
Magitatanom ra mamaan kalindu' makaalap ra akanon masuang, kaa' ulun mangilou ra baal ondo' kolondo' onong iono sasambungon.
Ulun malaat mampaguang ra kalaatan ayuk, kaa' ulun moonsoi koson ayuk ra puun ondo' maikang am mangkawa'.
Ulun malaat masulungan ru ragu nilo galama', kaa' ulun moonsoi makalabus intor ra kapaganan.
Balos ru sasangulun maya' ra ragu am binaal nano galama'; makaalap io ra balos ra maaya'.
Ulun sasambungon masalok mangkara' ra io motopot, kaa' ulun mapintar mangkirongog ra bilin.
Ulun sasambungon mataki' sumangit bulintok maabigan, kaa' ulun mapintar kalo lioon no pagasaban.
Mindagu ra motopot mapabigor ra katimpakan, kaa' mindagu ra magabau makakinibit ra kalo matimpok.
Ragu-ragu ra moporos makapilat ra guang koson motobok ru ilang, kaa' ragu ra mapintar koson ra tatapis makapali'.
Abau kalo mantilayun, kaa' katapatan mantilayun ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Ulun mangatang ra kalaatan napanu' ra ruung; ulun mampaguang ra pangindanganan iono makakaansukan.
Ulun moonsoi kalo malumpa' ru karaat, kaa' ulun malaat masalok malumpa' ru kapaganan.
Masisang
Ulun mapintar kalo mapatalang ra katutunan nilo, kaa' ulun sasambungon mapakito ra kinasambung nilono.
Mapirot mangandoi mapasauk ra ulun makakuasa', kaa' matiar mangkinibit ra ulun masauk ra ulipon.
Pagalabaan mangkinibit ra ulun mangiluk guang, kaa' ragu-ragu ra moonsoi makaansuk ra guang.
Ulun moonsoi mangitang ra rangan nano, kaa' ulun malaat mapalayau ra ulun.
Ulun matiar kalo igogondo' kasaboi gogoton nilono, kaa' ulun mamaan kalindu' mokoowot ra rapu' masuang.
Ulun ondo' maya' ra ralan motopot kaayagan nano napanu' ra bansuk, ulun ondo' maya' ra ralan malaat makatingkuang ra kapatayan.
Anak ra mapintar, manugut ra pangilaan ru ama' nano, kaa' ulun malilimbau kalo masaga' manugut ra pangilaan.
Ragu-ragu ru ulun moonsoi magibit ra balos moonsoi, kaa' ulun ra kalo mabanis guang masaga' ra kalaatan.
Ulun mindagu ra totomolon ayuk, mangampin ra inan galama'. Ulun mindagu ra jajajou, maninduol ra inan galama'.
Ulun matiar ondo' masuang gogoton, kalo masugut no. Ulun mamaan kalindu' makaalap ra atan ayuk gogoton no.
Ulun mabanis guang masisang ra abau, kaa' ragu-ragu ru ulun malaat mapakauyu' am magibit ra pagasaban.
Kabanisan ru guang mangampin ra ulun kolondo' sala, kaa' kalaatan mamuso ra ulun makatula.
Mokoondo' ulun sumalu ra langkaya', sotopot no kolondo' atan-atan linonggom no. Mokoondo' niayuk sumalu ra ulun musikin, sotopot no langkaya' io.
Ulun langkaya' mamakai ra ruit maa' raginio kaayagan nano moonsoi ayuk, kaa' ulun musikin makalabus intor ra kaayagan makalalaa'.
Ulun motopot koson ra lampung makasinda, kaa' ulun malaat koson ra lampung matikalasa'.
Limbau magibit ra kapaganan; ulun mapintar mangapu ra pangilaan.
Linangkayaan noowot ra ralan maluoi, makai' mataki', kaa' rapu' ra tinimung-timung rumuang poyo.
Bulintok kalansanan matutuk, guang pana matutuk; bulintok ra gogoton masugut, guang maansukan.
Ulun ondo' kalo mampagagaya' ra ragu ri Aki Kapuuno' maninduol ra inan galama', kaa' ulun ondo' gumagaya' ra susuban ri Aki Kapuuno' makaalap ra balos moonsoi.
Pangilaan ru ulun mapintar koson ra uur ru kaayagan; bulintok ilaanon, pangilaan raginio mamayag ra painawo.
Ulun mapintar makaalap ra urumat, kaa' ulun ra kalo maintopot tumingkuang ra kapatayan.
Ulun mapintar masalok mangkara' pagulu ra kalo poyo mamatas, kaa' ulun sasambungon mapatalang ra sambung nilo.
Ulun sinusub ra kolondo' guang maparatong ra kapaganan, kaa' ulun sinusub ra maintopot maparatong ra kaansayan.
Ulun ra kalo masaga' ilaan maaru' masauk musikin am maasaban, kaa' ulun ondo' mampalio ra bilin maaru' urumaton.
Mapara' piboo bobonsoi makaalap ra atan gogoton! Ulun sasambungon kalo masaga' manalikur ra kalaatan.
Ulun ondo' lumatok ra ulun mapintar masauk io mapintar; ulun makimangkubayau ra ulun sasambungon maaru' io makakapaganan.
Kapaganan milou ra ulun makatula, kaa' ulun moonsoi makaapu ra kaansayan.
Ulun moonsoi patungkuson no rapu' nano ra anak am akupu, kaa' rapu' ru ulun makatula patungkuson ra ulun ondo' mabanis guang.
Tana' ra kolondo' tatanom mabuli mapaingkual ra ampos am akanon ru ulun musikin, kaa' ulun ra kalo matimpok manginga' ra tana' no kondoyon.
Ulun ra kalo mapalamba' ra anak nano, kalo motogom ra anak no. Ulun motogom ra anak no io musiti' mangubas ra anak no.
Ulun moonsoi masalok maukop ra akanon, kaa' ulun malaat masalok maitilan.
Ruandu' mapintar mambaal ra baloi nano matanda', kaa' ruandu' sasambungon mamalunsai ra baloi nano galama'.
Ulun mabanis guang malaa' am mangurumat ra
Ulun sasambungon ondo' malilimbau masulungan ru ragu-ragu nilo, kaa' ragu-ragu ru ulun mapintar mangampin risilo.
Amon ru kolondo' sapi' mamparadu' ra lanau, kalukub kolondo' suang; kaa' ra kinaikang ru sapi', kalukub no mososok.
Sasi' ra mabanis guang masalok mindagu ra motopot, kaa' sasi' ra kalo mabanis guang masalok magabau.
Ulun malilimbau kalo masauk ra mapintar, kaa' ulun mapintar matasu' migigila'.
Pai' pakimangkubayau ra ulun sasambungon; kolondo' atan-atan pailaan nilo.
Ulun mapintar makapandai ra atan baalon nilo; ulun sasambungon maruung ru kabuduan nilo galama'.
Ulun sasambungon kalo lioon nilo tula nilo inampun kapoam kalo, kaa' ulun moonsoi masaga' ra tula nilono ampunon.
Moonsoi kapoam malaat ru sasangulun mailian ayuk ru guang nano galama', kolondo' sangulun pana maya' makaili'.
Baloi ru ulun moonsoi maaru' mapiot, kaa' baloi ru ulun malaat mapuut.
Ralan ondo' kinara' ra moonsoi no pupus nano tumingkuang ra kapatayan.
Kurit makasibuni ra guang mangiluk, kaa' bulintok ra kaansukan malupus, guang mangiluk soroi poyo.
Ulun malaat makaapu ra kinibit ru kalaatan nilo, kaa' ulun moonsoi makaapu ra balos intor ra kinoonsoi nilo.
Ulun sasambungon mangintopot ra atan-atan ayuk, kaa' ulun mapintar totomolon ra tumumpang.
Ulun mapintar kalo maajag-ajag am minggalur ra kalaatan, kaa' ulun sasambungon maajag-ajag am mamatas ra kalo mangkara' pagulu.
Ulun ondo' mataki' sumangit namatasan nano sasambungon; ulun mapintar masalok kalinuos ayuk.
Ulun ra kolondo' katutunan makaliman ra kinibit ru paliso sasambungon, kaa' ulun mapandai rumuang katutunan.
Ulun malaat rumuku' ilo ra ulun mabanis guang koson mikiasi'.
Ulun musikin kalo kasagain mulu' ra paginggaar nilo galama', kaa' ulun langkaya' masuang rangan.
Ulun ondo' monogom ra ulun musikin makakaansukan; ulun magasab ra bokon io mambaal ra tula.
Ulun ondo' mambaal ra moonsoi maintopot am urumaton, kaa' ulun ondo' mambaal ra malaat mambaal ra kasalaan.
Moonong kandoi makaampos ra mauli'; mindagu ra babanyou mangkinibit ra ulun masauk musikin.
Ulun mapintar omporon sabap ra kapintaran nilo, kaa' ulun sasambungon mauligan kaga' sabap ra sasambungon ilo.
Sasi' ra mabanis guang mamayag ra ulun, kaa' sasi' ra magabau mangurana' ra ulun.
Urumat am malaa' ra
Amon ru minggalur ra kapatayan, urumato' noyo am kalaa' no ra
Kuasa' ru raja' maya' ra kinasuang ru mamagun nano; amon ru kolondo' mamagun, kuasa' nano pana kolondo'.
Ulun ra kalinuos ayuk iono mapintar, kaa' ulun ra mataki' sumangit iono sasambungon.
Guang ra kalinuos inan maligag, kaa' sumolon koson ayuk ra maruol kinso ondo' mapasauk ra bungul mopopol.
Osoi mangimpai ra ulun musikin, magasab ra Namangun risilo; osoi moonsoi ra ulun musikin, mangurumat ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Ulun malaat matoi sabap ra kalaatan nilo galama'; ulun moonsoi masindungan sabap ra kabanisan ru guang nilo.
Mapintar maalap intor ra pangkaraan ru ulun mapintar, ulun sasambungon kalo igogondo' pakaulig ra mapintar.
Katimpakan magibit ra kasingkatan ru bansa', kaa' tula maparatong ra pagasaban ra bansa'.
Raja' maansukan ra pagawai ondo' mapandai, kaa' ukumin no pagawai ra kalo mapandai mapaugar ra kandoi.
Taam ra molomoi mapalinos ra sangit, kaa' ragu-ragu ra moporos mapasingkual ra sangit.
Ragu-ragu ru ulun mapintar mambaal ra katutunan mamunduk ra guang, kaa' ragu-ragu ru ulun sasambungon jajajou ayuk.
Makito ru
Ragu-ragu ra moonsoi mangunsu' ra guang, kaa' ragu-ragu masangit mampalawo ra guang.
Ulun sasambungon mangimpai ra ilaan ru ama', kaa' ulun mapintar mampalio ra sawai.
Kinalangkayaan ru ulun moonsoi mantilayun, kaa' kinalangkayaan ru ulun malaat mapuso bulintok makakapaganan.
Katutunan pinatanou ru ulun mapintar, sala' ka ulun sasambungon.
Iowon ru
Masisang
Ulun mambaal ra kalaatan ukuman no maagat; ulun marara' mangapu ra pansawayan matoi.
Amon ru makapandai
Ulun ra malilimbau kalo masaga' sawayon; kalo igogondo' io pakibilin intor ra ulun mapintar.
Guang ra maansukan mambaal ra bulos matakau; guang ra mangiluk mapakapalo ra guang.
Ulun ra mapintar masaga' migigila', kaa' ulun sasambungon maansayan ra sambung.
Kaayagan ru ulun musikin masalok mapagon, kaa' ulun ra makaansuk masalok makaliman ra bayag.
Moonsoi poyo musikin am malaa' ra
Moonsoi poyo mangakan ra sansam ondo' sumbayaan ru katagaman, ka mangakan ra kual malanging ondo' sumbayaan ru kasisangan.
Ulun mataki' sumangit mapalabui ra pansangaran, kaa' ulun ra mosorot guang maparatong ra pababansayan.
Ulun matiar masalok makaliman ra kapaganan, kaa' ulun mabanis guang kalo mokoowot ra kapaganan.
Anak ra mapintar mapabansuk ra guang ru ama' nano; anak ra sasambungon magasab ra ina' nano.
Ulun sasambungon maansayan ra sambung, kaa' ulun mapintar mambaal ra atan ondo' motopot.
Inatangan masauk amon ru sumbayanin ra masuang bilin; inatangan kalo masauk amon ru kalo sumbayanin ra kamaanan ru guang.
Ragu-ragu ra pinasalula' nakatuma' ra bulintok no maparatong ra kaansukan.
Ulun mapintar maya' ra ralan magaloi mongoi ra kaayagan, sala' ka ralan tumuun ra kapatayan.
Lunsayon ru
Masisang
Ulun maguyum ra mauli' kaa' ralalom ralan kalo matanda', mapakapagon risilo sambaloi. Ulun ra kalo maambi' maawar painawo.
Ulun moonsoi mangkara' galing ra kalo poyo tumaam. Ulun malaat tumaam ra kalo mangkara' saboi maparatong ra kapaganan.
Rongogon ru
Bulos ra maansukan mapabansuk ra guang, am tanou ra moonsoi makaansuk ra guang.
Ulun ondo' mampalio ra pansawayan, makasimpung ra ulun mapintar.
Ulun ra marara' migigila', kalo mangurumat ra inan nilono. Ulun mangkirongog ra pansawayan, masauk ra mapintar poyo.
Urumat am malaa' ra
Ulun mambaal ra inatangan, kaa' i Aki Kapuuno' mamatas.

Ngaangai' kandoi muno pataako' noyo ra

Masisang
Ulun ondo' gumagaya' ri Aki Kapuuno' ampunon No. Ulun ondo' mangurumat am malaa' ra
Amon ru mangansuk kau ra guang ru
Ralalom kandoi matanda' moonsoi poyo kalo kukula' maalap, ka masuang maalap kaa' kandoi ra kalo matanda'.
Ulun mambaal ra inatangan, kaa' i Aki Kapuuno' mangaru' ra ralan kaayagan ru ulun.
Raja' mangapu ra kuasa' intor ri Aki Kapuuno'; am ginio ra pamatasan ru raja' masalok motopot.
Kasaga' ru
Raja' inggalarin mopoloso ra kalaatan,
Raja' masaga' mangkirongog ra atan ondo' motopot; raja' maansukan ra ulun mindagu ralalom kabanisan ru guang no.
Amon ru raja' sumangit, magu' mokoondo' ulun potoyon; ulun ra mapintar gogoton no mampalinos ra sangit ru raja'.
Taak ru raja' koson ayuk ra gaun maparatu' ra rasam bulintok tampio; taak nano manaak ra kaansukan ru bayag.
Moonsoi poyo makaalap ra kapintaran am katutunan ka makaalap ra mas am pirok.
Ulun moonsoi tumuliar ra ralan kalaatan; ulun magalung ra ralan ru kaayagan nano, mangampin ra inan nano galama'.
Lumimbau mangkinibit ra kapusaan am karatuan.

Ulun mapintar omporon sabap ra kapintaran nano. Gumaai lomoi ru raguon nano, gumaai poyo intopoton ru ulun ragu nano.
Kapintaran iono uur ru kaansukan ra bayag ru ulun mataau; ulun sasambungon naimbolo' ru sambung nilo galama'.
Ulun mapintar mangkara' galing ra kalo poyo mindagu; ginio ra ragu-ragu nano makasubol ra guang.
Ragu-ragu ra molomoi koson ra ruu' maningot – matamis am niayuk makaligag ra inan.
Ralan ondo' kinara' ra moonsoi no pupus nali tumingkuang ra kapatayan.
Tiakanon magibit ra sasangulun no mangandoi toojo, sabap ra masaga' io mampajala' ra suung nano.
Ulun malaat masalok gumogot mangimbolo' ra ulun bokon; ragu-ragu nilo malaat koson ra apui monolob.
Ulun malaat mangalimut; susukon nilo rangan saboi mantataam am mapatuliar ra gino ngai' mangkubayau.
Ulun malaat mamparuung ra rangan-rangan nano, am magibit risilo ra makalalaa'.
Ilalai' min ilo ondo' mampajingit am manguliorom ramuyun ra mato; ginilo mangatang ra kalaatan.
Ulun mabanis guang aniin ra umur maawar; uan nano koson ra karaun ondo' pangansukan.
Moonsoi poyo oroton guang ka mangunguasa'. Moonsoi poyo matutunan ru ulun mongorot ra guang ka manguasa' ra titikop ru bandar.
Ulun magugundi' koson mangulig ra kasagaan ri Aki Kapuuno', kaa' i Aki Kapuuno' galama' mangaru' ra taam nano.
Moonsoi poyo mangakan sapunjut ayuk akanon ra kalinuos ayuk, ka mangakan kasuang giu' ra baloi ra kumuliasou-asou mansasangor.
Ulipon ra mapintar kuasaan no anak ru tuan nano ra mapakauyu', am tungkuson no santayaran ra rapu' no.
Mas am pirok kinamin ru apui, kaa' guang ru ulun kinamin ru
Ulun malaat mangapu ra pamaguangan malaat, am ulun maabau-abau masaga' mangkirongog ra ragu-ragu abau.
Osoi-osoi magasab ra ulun musikin, magasab ri Aki Kapuuno' ondo' namangun risilo. Osoi-osoi maansukan ra ulun ondo' najamaran io ukumin.
Ulun matutuo maansukan ra akupu koson ra anak maansukan ra matuo.
Ulun ra urumaton moonsoi kalo magabau, am ulun sasambungon kalo makaindagu ra atan ondo' mokoonong.
Sanganuan ulun mindagu rasua makabaal ra kaimuagan; mangintopot ilo ra ngaangai' no mabaal ru rasua.
Amon ru kasagain ru ulun, ampuno' noyo kasalaan binaal nilo. Mapasingkual ra kasalaan makaukat ra pangkubayawan.
Rondo' pansawayan maayo toojo arati' nano ra ulun mapintar, ka saratus ruli' lapos ra ulun sasambungon.
Kapatayan matong koson ra ulun sinusub ondo' malaat kaga' mongoi ra ulun malaat ondo' masalok mapalabui ra kaayatan.
Moonsoi poyo maguma' ra ina' ru baawang ondo' natatakan ra anak nano, ka maguma' ra ulun sasambungon ondo' masalok mambaal ra sambung nano.
Ulun ondo' mambalos ra kaansayan no ra kalaatan, kalo makapagiru' kalaatan ru baloi nano.
Talimpuun ru pansangaran koson ra sansag lumata'; ampangi' min pansangaran ra kalo poyo makatalimpuun.
Masisang
Papalo ayuk ru ulun sasambungon mangai' ra ruit maguyum ra kapintaran, sabap ra iono kolondo' guang.
Kubayau masalok montotogom ra rondo' am bokon, am pongkotob masalok mansaan ra kapaganan ra rondo' am bokon.
Ulun ra kolondo' guang ayuk masaga' mansaan ra utang ru ulun bokon.
Ulun ondo' masaga' ra tula masaga' mansasangor. Ulun ondo' masalok masawat ragu
Ulun ra mamparuung kolondo' kaansukan; ulun ra majamol kabang makaalap ra kajamaran.
Anak ondo' mambaal ra kalo matanda' mantipagon am mampangiluk ra guang ru matuo nano.
Guang ondo' makaansuk mapaligag ra inan; guang ra mangiluk mapakapalo ra guang.
Akim ra kalo mabanis guang suminok mangapu ra rasua am kalo nampaugar ra katimpakan.
Kuayan ru ulun mapintar ioginio mompogogot ra kapintaran, kaa' kuayan ru ulun sasambungon kolondo' onong.
Anak ra sasambungon mantipagon ra guang ru ama' nano am mapangiluk ra guang ru ina' nano.
Kalo matimpok mangukum ra ulun kolondo' sala, am kalo matimpok mangukum ra ulun moonsoi.
Ulun masuang katutunan kalo masuang ragu. Ulun mapintar kalinuos ayuk.
Ulun sasambungon pana magu' karaan ra mapintar am mapandai amon ru ilo mongkoror am kalo mindagu.
Ulun ondo' tumuliar intor ra ulun ra bokon iono mangkara' ayuk ra inan nano galama'; guangon moonsoi ru ulun ra bokon kalo rongogon nilo.
Ulun sasambungon kalo lioon nilo ru makarati' ilo kapoam kalo. Paingkualon nilo ayuk atan makara' nilo galama'.
Tula am pagasaban masalok mabaya'; ulun ra najamaran tauyuon.
Ragu ru ulun maalap kasauk ra puun ru kapintaran, malandom koson ra raat am timug maniol tumuluk.
Kalo moonsoi sumaung ra ulun malaat, am mangimbolo' ra ulun kolondo' sala.
Amon ru ulun sasambungon mapatabual ra pantataaman, ilo no makilamba'.
Ragu ru ulun sasambungon makasulung risilo galama' am mamuso risilo.
Ragu simbaalon maamis kaga'; masaga' ulun monolon.
Ulun matiar nogondo' laat nano ra ulun masaga' mangkinibit ra kalaatan.
Kaa' pangkaraan ru ulun langkaya' rapu' no manindung risilo koson ra timbok masawat am mapiot ra libung ru bandar.
Ulun ondo' minggana' guang urumaton; ulun malilimbau maaru' iono mapuso.
Ulun ra tumaam ra kalo poyo mangkirongog, sala' ka sasambungon ayuk kaa' mampakauyu' ra inan nano galama'.
Gogot ra maayag makasaan ra imbolo' ru maruol kaa' amon ru maliom gogot no, matatak noyo ngaangai' kalansanan.
Ulun mapintar masalok tumampos am masaga' migigila'.
Bubua' mangukab ra ralan saboi matasu' makatuum ra ulun maayo.
Ulun kasaa' mindagu ra makama masalok ilain ra motopot, kaa' raguon nano kinamin paat ra ngaangai' no naimansaan.
Amon ru masauk pagagansangan giu' ra makama ru ruo ngaulun ondo' makakuasa', undion koson manalasai raginio.
Maguguyu mangirot ra pabukatan koson ra timbok ru bandar ondo' mapiot, kaa' pantataaman mangukat ra pabukatan.
Ragu-ragu ra paabuson sumonor ondo' musiti' no matutunan.
Ragu-ragu ra paabuson makakuasa' koson mamayag kapoam mamuso. Ulun musiti' makatutun sumonor ragu-ragu nilo.
Ulun ondo' makaandu', makaalap ra ondo' moonsoi. Baal koson ragitio arati' no kasagain io ru
Ulun musikin makiasi' ra matanda', kaa' ulun langkaya' malaat taam nano.
Mokoondo' rangan ra kalo gumagaya', mokoondo' niayuk rangan ra moonsoi toojo ka pongkotob.
Moonsoi poyo ulun musikin ra mabanis guang, kaa' ulun sasambungon ondo' malilimbau.
Maayo guang ra kolondo' katutunan kalo moonsoi; ulun ra maajag-ajag makabaal ra sala.
Mokoondo' ulun mangimbolo' ra inan galama' sabap ra sambung galama', am mononsol piboo ra
Ulun langkaya' magail makaalap ra rangan bagu, kaa' ulun musikin iruanin ru rangan.
Ulun ondo' magabau giu' ra makama' am ulun ondo' magambut musiti' ukumin.
Moonong ulun gumogot koson mangalap ra guang ru ulun maayo, am masaga' kumubayau ra ulun mataau.
Ulun musikin kalo kasagain ru pabukat nano, mulu' poyo ru rangan nano. Kabalu' pana gumogot io mangambi' risilo, kalo mabunduk no guang nilono.
Osoi-osoi mangilou ra katutunan, motogom ra inan nano galama'; osoi-osoi mangkara' ra atan inigilaan nali, makasugut io.
Osoi-osoi magabau giu' ra makama kalo makalabus io ra ukumin am musiti' io mapuso.
Ulun sasambungon kalo maaya' maayag koson ra langkaya'; ulipon kalo maaya' manusub ra mangunguasa'.
Ulun mapintar mokoorot ra sangit. Omporon ilo sabap ra mangampun ra sala ru ulun bokon no risilo.
Sangit ru raja' koson ra sangal ru singa', kaa' kinoonsoi nano koson ra bolobou mamasa' ra tatanom.
Anak ra sasambungon makapatoi ra ama' nano. Andu' ra mambutok koson ra posok ru timug ondo' kalo tumaru'-taru'.
Baloi am rapu' matungkus intor ra matuo, kaa' andu' ondo' mapintar ioginio taak intor ra
Ulun ra magail mombolong am matiar musiti' no maitilan.
Ulun ondo' gumagaya' ra ukum ri Aki Kapuuno' makaumur maawar. Kaa' ulun ondo' kalo gumagaya' ra susuban Nano matoi.
Mangindangan ra ulun musikin nogondo' koson mapaira' ra
Ubason anak ra lakat poyo mamulok. Amon ru kalo, mangkinibit kau ra ilo matutuk.
Polosoon noyo ulun ondo' mataki' sumangit makaliman ra kinibit nano. Amon ru mangindangan kau ra ulun no igondo', musiti' indanganon min poyo.
Ulun ondo' masaga' mangkirongog ra bilin am masaga' migigila', masauk io ra mapintar ra tauli no.
Masuang atangon ru ulun, kaa' kasagaan ru
Kalansanan ra sasangulun ioginio gumagaya'.
Urumato' noyo
Mokoondo' ulun matiar kaga' saboi kalo masaga' mangakan galama'.
Amon ru ulun malilimbau ukumin, ulun sasambungon makaalap ra pangilaan. Amon ru ulun ra mapintar sawayon, masauk io ra mapintar toojo.
Anak ra makauyuyu' am najamaran no ayuk mangimbolo' ra ama' nano am manginggalar ra ina' nano.
Alii ra anak kuno, amon ru lumonggo' kau migigila', malilianan min mataki' ngaangai' inigigilaan mini.
Amon ru sasangulun masaga' mindagu ra kalo motopot, arati' no katimpakan kalo pinaugar. Ulun malaat masaga' ra kalaatan.
Ulun sasambungon ondo' malilimbau musiti' io ukumin.
Inumon ra mampagauk mambaal ra ulun magauk am mambutok. Sasambungon noyo ulun manginum saboi magauk.
Malaa' ra raja' sumangit nogondo' niayuk laa' bulintok singa' mansangal. Ulun mangkinibit ra raja' sumangit iono mamuso ra inan galama'.
Ulun sasambungon ayuk masaga' mantataam; paliso ra omporon ioginio minggalur ra pantataaman.
Ulun ondo' matiar mantagumo ra bulintok nano, kolondo' ampos ru tana' no ra bulintok mangkumos.
Pangkaraan ru ulun koson ra timug ru tulubong ondo' malandom, kaa' ulun mapintar makapansagou.
Masuang ulun mangku ra ilo gumagaya', kaa' ulun topot-topot gumagaya', mapagon matuum.
Pakaansuk noyo anak-anak ondo' mokoondo' ra ama' ondo' mabanis guang am matimpok.
Bulintok ra raja' mangakim, makito ru raja' atan ondo' malaat.
Makakau' kia ulun mindagu ra sotopot-topot no ra guang nilono mapasau, am tula nilono inampun?
Masisang
Intor ra binaal ru sangulun anak paliso nano maimansaan; mapandayan min paliso nano moonsoi kapoam malaat.
Inanian takau ru
Ulun ra mobobolong masauk ra musikin. Ulun ra mapirot mangandoi makaalap masuang akanon.
Ulun mambali masalok magalabo ra kuliamos talanon no mologo, kaa' kalupus nambali, naansukan io ra logo no.
Ragu-ragu ra mapintar mologo atang nano ka mas kapoam intan.
Sasambungon ga ulun ondo' mansaan ra utang ru ulun bokon; longgom nano musiti' alapon koson jamin ru bantu' nano.
Ampos intor ra namparuungan talimpuun nano moonsoi, kaa' pupus nano malimanan koson toojo ra agis.
Pakitaak ra bilin maa' raginio makaampos. Pai' ongoi pangayou amon ru kolondo' inatangan.
Ulun masalok mangalimut kalo makapampauli ra inopot, pai' pakimangkubayau ra ulun ondo' masuang ragu.
Osoi-osoi magulas ra matuo nano, bayag nano maliom koson ra lampung malasa' ra intok molondom.
Kinalangkayaan ra matasu' moowot, kolondo' barakat.
Kalaatan pai' balasi' ra kalaatan; pangintopot no ra
Timbangan ra kalo matimpok, kasisangin ru
Ralan kaayagan ru ulun inaru' ru
Karaa' noyo toojo ra kalo poyo mangiou kau ra bantu' ri Aki Kapuuno' ra taak simbalui maa' raginio kalo pansagulian guang min.
Raja' ra mapintar makaulig ra ulun malaat; kalo makaasi' raja' no mangukum risilo.
Inanian takau ru
Amon ru raja' mamarinta ralalom guang mabanis, katagaman am katimpakan, am io pana magulayun makakuasa'.
Ulun mamulok ansukon sabap ra kaikangan nano, am ulun matutuo urumaton sabap ra uan.
Sanganuan kaintutunan ra mapait mampaliom ra kalaatan am mamasau ra guang ru ulun.
Pangkaraan ru raja'
Pangkaraan ru ulun nansalinut binaal nilono moonsoi; kaa' karaa' noyo, mapandayan ru
Binaal ra moonsoi am matimpok mapabansuk ra guang ru
Ulun malaat makatula sabap ra kinuasa' ru limbau ru guang am mamanggo.
Inatangan ru ulun marajin makaampos ra lumuab-luab kaa' pamatasan ra maajag-ajag mangkinibit ra kalubatan.
Kinalangkayaan ra naalap intor ra ralan kalo mabanis guang, sala' ka ayuk kalo mantilayun kaa' maaru' magibit ra kapatayan.
Ulun malaat kalo masaga' mambaal ra baal matimpok; kalaatan nilono makapatoi risilo galama'.
Ulun ondo' makasala makaaya' ra ralan pagigisuk; ulun ra moonsoi maya' ra ralan mabanis.
Moonsoi poyo mayan ra pinuusan ru baloi ka mayan ra ralalom ru baloi masimpung ra andu' ondo' magail ayuk makimansangor.
Ulun malaat guangon nilono kalaatan ayuk; kalo makaasi' ilo ra osoi-osoi ayuk pana.
Ukuman ra ulun ondo' magusun ra tinaulian masauk ra pangilaan ru ulun sasambungon. Ulun mapintar mokoowot ra katutunan bulintok ilaan.
I Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa' makapandai ra atan nasauk ra baloi ru ulun malaat am ukumin No ilo suku' mapuso.
Ulun ra kalo masaga' mangkirongog ra laa ru ulun musikin, kalo lioon bulintok ra io galama' makiindangan.
Tangguang ra pinataak ralalom kalinuos ra ulun sumangit, mapakasalui ra guang nano.
Bulintok katimpakan paugaron, ulun moonsoi maansukan, kaa' ulun malaat malaa'.
Ulun ra kalo maya' ra ralan kaayagan ra mataau, maaru' sumuku' ra patayan.
Ulun ondo' magitambingai am mainum-inum am niayuk mangakan ra akanon malanging kalo lumangkaya'.
Ulun malaat makatutun ra imbolo' pinalumpa' nilo ra ulun moonsoi.
Moonsoi poyo mayan ra kaagisan ka mayan masimpung ra andu' ondo' masaga' makimansangor am masasangit.
Ulun mapintar magulayun langkaya', kaa' ulun sasambungon anduson no rapu' nilono.
Ulun mabanis guang am moonsoi guang makaumur maawar. Urumaton io am matimpok pamakuan nilo riso.
Ulun mapintar makagaau ra bandar ondo' inalungan ru saujor-saujor ra maikang, am lunsayon nilo timbok ru bandar ondo' masauk ra kalansanan nilo.
Ilalain ra mindagu maa' raginio kalo malumpa' ru kapaganan.
Ulun malilimbau am minsawat guang, masaga' mapakaruol ra guang am kolondo' guguang.
Ulun matiar kalo masaga' mangandoi; potoyon io ru gogoton nano.
Karaan nano kasagaan nano ayuk; kaa' ulun gumagaya' ri Aki Kapuuno' makapanaak saboi malabaan.
Masisang
Paraguon ru ulun maabau-abau kalo maintopot, kaa' paraguon ru ulun ondo' maintopot no apuon.
Ulun mabanis guang malansan ra inan nilo galama', kaa' ulun malaat magakal ayuk.
Kapintaran, katasikan am kapandayan ru ulun kolondo' onong amon ru
Potomposon nilo kuda koson mongoi pangayou, kaa'
Inggalan ra moonsoi mokologo poyo ka rapu' ra masuang; tagamin ru ulun moonsoi poyo ka aniin ra pirok kapoam mas.
Ulun langkaya' am ulun musikin mokoondo' rondo' pogondo': Karuruo no binangun ru
Ulun mapintar miliu ra makalalaa' amon ru makito no, kaa' ulun budu polosoon no inan nano malumpa' ru karaat am pansagulian guang nano ra tauli no.
Ulun mangurumat am malaa' ra
Ulun ondo' malubatan ra painawo nano musiti' io minggalur intor ra jajaling am landak ondo' pinataan ra ralan ru ulun malaat.
Ilaa' noyo anak no ra ralan kaayagan ondo' motopot, am saboi matutuo pana kaayagan nano kon raginio.
Ulun musikin kuasaan ru ulun langkaya'. Ulun ondo' magira' kuasaan ru ulun nampaira' no.
Ulun mapatias ra kalo matimpok mangkumos ra karaat, am kuasa' nano koson mangimbolo' ra ulun bokon pupusin.
Ulun mataau am mantayar ra akanon no ra ulun musikin, barakaton io ru
Inggalari' ulun ra magasab, bagu no kolondo' pansangaran, pagansangan, am magulas.
Ulun ra mabanis guang am molomoi ra mindagu masauk ra rangan ru raja'.
Kasaga' ru
Ulun matiar masaga' morondon ra baloi. Mindagu io saamon io kunu' ru singa' amon ru mingkual io.
Pangambian ru ruandu' mantalan ra inan koson ra luang malandom: ulun ondo' sangitin ru
Lalaing maubas mambaal ra baal ra saasala', kaa' lalapos makaila' risilo mangulau ra paliso.
Osoi mangimbolo' ra ulun musikin koson ra ralan no sumauk langkaya' kapoam manaak ra tangguang ra ulun langkaya', pupus nano tumamusikin.
Rongogo' noyo, ilaan takamin ra pinson ru ulun mapintar. Guango' pangilaan nilo.
Pakaansuk noyo ulun ondo' makakara' ra pangilaan no am alapon no bulintok makapakuan.
Kasaga' kuno mangintopot kau ra
Tinulisan ku talu ngoopor pinson ondo' mokoondo' ra katutunan am bilin moonsoi,
ondo' topot-topot mangila' ramuyun ra motopot. Maagu no, amon ru kuatin kau, makataam kau ra motopot.
Pai' ruungo' ulun musikin sabap ra kinamusikin nilo, pai' ilo ruungo' giu' ra makama.
Saungon ilo ru
Pai' pangkimangkubayau ra ulun mataki' sumangit am mataki' angitan.
Pai' kau baya' ra paliso nilono, am kalo makakulau ra kaindalaman raginio.
Pai' bantuo' koson manampilon ra utang ru ulun bokon.
Amon ru kalo makabayar kau ra utang, kaalangan mino pana gaawon.
Pai' pabandingo' bait ru tana' ondo' inaru' ru kinamatuaan mini.
Ulun maturasik mangandoi pongondoyon ru raja'-raja' am sala' ka ulun kasuangan.
Bulintok ra akau paakanon ru ulun makapangkat, karaa' noyo osoi ulun no.
Amon ru masuung patiakan muno, oroto' noyo suung muno.
Pai' kaajag-ajag mangakan ra akanon malanging no. Ati lair ru pantaligamis ayuk.
Ilalai' min noyo! Kalo sukuin ra inan maimbolo' sabap ra sumauk ra langkaya'.
Ruit mataki' makai' koson kinataki' ru ganit, koson ayuk ra ruit no makakawo am mansiab ra limbowon koson ra kanui.
Pai' kau pababaya' mangakan ra ulun makalit, kapoam matiakan ra akanon malanging pinasulung nilo.
“Pangakan poyo,” kono, kaa' ragu nano kalo mabanis guang. Kabang nano maamis kaa' guang nano sala'.
Malua' atan tinolon mini, am ngaangai' ragu maamis kolondo' noyo onong.
Pai' kinam pambilin ra ulun sasambungon; kalo maringkuanang ilo ra bilin mino.
Pai' pabandingo' bait ru tana' ondo' nakalair am pai' gaawo' tana' ru anak nailusan ra matuo.
, manunungka' ondo' maikang, manungka' risilo am manggal ramuyun.
Guango' noyo pangilaan ru mangingila' mino am igigila' no kasuang.
Pai' panangguang mangubas ra anak. Kalo matoi ilo kabalu' pana loposon.
Kuayan nano mamayag risilo.
Alii ra anak kuno, maansukan aku amon ru mapintar kau.
Makaansuk aku toojo amon ru makaining aku ra akau mindagu ralalom kabanisan ru guang.
Pai' solon ra ulun ondo' makatula, urumato' noyo am kalaa' no ra
maa' raginio orou matong mino makaampos am kalansanan mino kalo matatak.
Rongogo' noyo, alii ra anak kuno! Kasauk no mapintar am bayaa' ralan ra motopot.
Pai' latok ra ulun gagaukon am ulun maajag-ajag,
sabap ra masauk ilo ra musikin. Amon ru mangakan am mombolong kau ayuk, kalo mabuoi mambayang kau ra bayang nangarilak.
Rongogo' noyo pinson ri ama' muno, sabap ra amon ru kalio io, akau kolondo'. Bulintok ra ina' muno matutuo, patalango' noyo guang maringkuanang muno riso.
Pangilaan ra motopot, mapintar, ubason, am pangaratian – ngaangai' no sotopot no balion kaa' mologo toojo ra talanon.
Sangulun ama' makaansuk amon ru anak nano makaguang. Makaansuk io sabap ra anak nano mapintar.
Gama' ru matuo muno maansukan rirun. Gama' ru ina' ondo' naganak ramuyun no maansukan.
Alii ra anak kuno, imansai' toojo am bayaa' bayag kuno.
Ruandu' mantalan ra inan am andu' ra lumapau iono jajaling magibit ra matoi.
Maginaa ilo ramuyun koson ra mantatakou am mangkinibit ra masuang ungkuyon lumapau.

Nakapandai kau kia atan kasaukan ra ulun masuang inum ra wain am inumon ra mampagauk ra bokon? Ulun no maimbolo' toojo. Masalok io makimantaam am mambutok. Mato nano malia' am inan nano nangapilat, alika baal raginio sotopot no mailiwan no.
Pai' polosoo' wain mangambi' ramuyun, kabalu' pana batik nano makabunduk, am makito makapiniat ralalom ru sangkir, am maamis ra inumon.
Susuab no malimanan min koson ra tininduk ru kukuo mabisa'.
Mato mino mamuutinan, pangkaraan mino kalo maaru'-aru' am akau mambutok.
Malimanan min koson magauk ra raat am kasiling-kasiling ra lugu' ru kapal.
Mindagu kau, “Linamba' aku. Linapis aku! Kaa' kalo makara' ku atan-atan. Kua kia matikoolong aku kaga'? Moonsoi manginum aku poyo!”
Pai' solon ra ulun malaat, am pai' pakimangkubayau risilo.
Lumaat ayuk kakaraan am mampajamar raraguon nilono.
Sambaloi binangun intor ra kapintaran am karatian.
Amon mokoondo' katutunan, lamin-lamin nano sinuangan ra kuliamos ondo' mokologo am makaantak.
Mapintar moonsoi poyo ka kaikangan. Sotopot no katutunan moonsoi poyo ka kaikangan,
sabap ra musiti' no mambaal kau ra inatangan ra moonsoi ra kalo poyo mongoi kau pangayou. Sumuang pinson maapu min, gumayo piboo kalansanan min koson mamanang.
Ulun sasambungon kalo makarati' ra ragu-ragu mapintar. Kalo makaindagu ilo ra atan-atan bulintok ra baal-baal maatang sunuron.
Amon ru masalok kau mangatang ra kalaatan, mauligan kau koson ra gagaukon.
Guangon ru ulun sasambungon ioginio tula ayuk. Ulun ondo' masalok maninduol ra bokon kasisangin ru osoi ayuk pana.
Ulun malawo bulintok ra sasou, sotopot no io ulun lamumu'.
Pai' paginduoo' guang mamayag ra ulun inukuman matoi ra kalo matimpok.
Magu' lair mindagu kau ra babaal raginio sala' ka kandoi min, kaa' i Aki Kapuuno' makapandai am balasin no akau maya' ra binaal mino.
Alii ra anak kuno, akan kau ra ruu' maningot sabap ra ruu' no moonsoi. Koson ra ruu' intor ra tambaloi ru maningot matamis ra akanon,
koson raginio niayuk ra mapintar moonsoi ra salibuor muno. Amon ru mapintar kou, matawang bayag muno.
Pai' koson ra ulun malaat ondo' maguguum mongoi pantakou ra ulun mabanis guang am mampagaau ra baloi nilono.
Kabalu' pana ulun mabanis guang ruruli' maratu', tumirong ilo saguli'. Kaa' ulun malaat matutuk ru karaat.
Pai' pakaansuk bulintok ra pantula' muno matiu' ra karaat, am pai' pakakurit amon maratu' io.
Mapandayan ru
Pai' kalikokot kapoam solon ra ulun malaat.
Ulun malaat kolondo' orou matong am kolondo' kalansanan.
Alii ra anak kuno, urumato' noyo am kalaa' no ra
ulun koson raginio matutuk ra sangkuliop ayuk. Karaa' noyo karaat ondo' palumpaan ramuyun ri Aki Kapuuno' kapoam raja'!
Ulun mapintar pana mindagu koson ragitio:
Sangulun akim kalo iowon mambaal ra pagimbason.
Amon ru ulun makasala kaa' namatasan nano kolondo' sala, akim no ulason am kasisangin ru ngaangai' ulun.
Kaa' akim nangukum ra ulun makasala, maansukan io am urumaton.
Taam ra motopot no tatandu' ru pangkubayawan ra motopot.
Pai' panambaloi ra kalo poyo nopongo umo. Pai' paguot ra kalo poyo nakatampos mangindapu'.
Pai' sauk mantalinono' ra sasangulun amon kolondo' panguyatan ra motopot, kapoam manimbaal riso.
Pai' indagu, “Balasin ku io atan ondo' binaal nali raki'!”
Nansail aku ra umo am kaumaan ru anggur ru sangulun matiar am sasambungon.
Intok raginio kataunan am kaalaban. Insor ru timbok nano naaba' noyo.
Bulintok ra aku mangimansa' am mangurio ra baal raginio, nakaalap aku ra pangilaan ragitio:
Tangus po am pombolong po sangkinolor, am pai' pambaal ra atan-atan;
am kamusikinan pana matong am lumumpa' ramuyun koson ra mantatakou makakinandoi.
Gitio noyo ragu amsal ra bokon intor ra Raja' Salomo ondo' pinaralin ru pagawai-pagawai ra istana ru Raja' Ijkia, raja' Jiuda.
Mongompor takau ri Aki Kapuuno' sabap ra ondo' inopot Nano, mangurumat takau ra raja' sabap ra atan ondo' pinabala' nano.
Kalo mapandayan min pangkaraan ru raja'. Pangkaraan ru raja' masawat poyo ka pangkaraan takau, koson ra kinasawat ru limbowon am kinalandom ru raat.
Isasi' noyo pirok intor ra najajaingat no, bagu no matasu' kondoyon ru ulun manukang ra pirok.
Painggaluro' noyo ulun maminson ra malaat no intor ra raja', bagu raja' no mamarinta ra matimpok.
Bulintok tumuum ra raja', pai' tiluo' paliso ru ulun mangaayo am ikakanuo' mapandai.
Moonsoi poyo piawon paturungo' ra intok ru ulun mangaayo ka susubon intok muno pataakon ra ulun makapangkat.
Pai' kaajag-ajag mongoi pantagi' ra makama, sabap ra amon ru pupus no akau makasala, atan poyo maalap min kabaal?
Amon ru mokoondo' pansangaran min ra pinasambalayan, pandururumis kau, am pai' min pabalaa' inopot ru sasangulun.
Amon ru pabalaan min inopot ru sasangulun, karaan kau ra lawasan kabang, am inggalan mino malaat buoi ru painawo.
Ragu-ragu ondo' pinabala' ra bulintok nano koson ayuk ra mas ralalom ru pinggan pirok.
Sawai ru ulun mapintar no ra ulun masaga' mangkirongog iono mokologo poyo ka sinsing mas kapoam kuliamos ru limpor.
Ulun sinusub ra maintopot, kaansayin ru ulun manusub no, koson ra inumon masalui bulintok malasu'.
Ulun ondo' kalo manugut ra bantu' nano koson ayuk ra gaun am angin ondo' kalo magibit ra rasam.
Orot ondo' masumbaya' ra ragu-ragu molomoi maalap kaintopot ru mangunguasa' am manutuk ra nansalinut pagagansangan.
Pai' pangakan kasuang ra ruu' maningot, mampalua' kau ra pupus no.
Pai' kasalok magayam ra pasambalayan, masuraan io ra pupus no am masisang ramuyun.
Manimbaal ra ragu koson ayuk ra mampiris mananggal ra ilang, jujuga', kapoam anak ru panah ondo' malarom.
Malansan ra sangulun ondo' kalo maintopot bulintok ra kapaganan koson ayuk mongokot kaa' ripon maunga' kapoam mugar kaa' kimpo'.
Rimbayin ulun ra mangiluk guang, koson ayuk ra magalus ra bayang nano bulintok masimu' kapoam pilat uasin ra suka'.
Amon ru pantula' mino maitilan, paakano' ilo; amon ru pinaason, painumo' ilo.
Binaal mino mapakauyu' risilo, am kinoonsoi mino balasin ru
Mangalimut maparatong ra sangit koson ra angin ralayo magibit ra rasam.
Mayan ra pinuusan ru baloi moonsoi poyo ka mayan ra ralalom ru baloi masimpung ra andu' ondo' masaga' makimansangor.
Makaapu ra tanou moonsoi intor ra intok maalur koson ayuk ra manginum ra timug masalui bulintok pinaason.
Ulun moonsoi ondo' nangala ra ulun malaat koson ayuk ra taur ru timug ondo' inangkuyau kapoam tulubong ra jinamalan.
Masuang akan ra ruu' maningot kalo moonsoi; ianga' makiunsu' pana kalo moonsoi.
Ulun ra kalo mokoorot ra guang koson ayuk ra bandar ra kolondo' kubu am matasu' bulunsaron ru pantula'.
Koson ra ais batu ondo' sotopot no kalo rumatu' bulintok ra tampio kapoam rasam bulintok ra mangkumos, koon niayuk ra pangamparan ondo' sotopot no kalo pataakon ra ulun sasambungon.
Koson ra susuit mansiab am sasoyob-soyob giu' ra limbowon, koon niayuk ra pagulasan kalo makatiu' ra ulun kolondo' sala.
Kuda musiti' loposon, kaladai musiti' kakangin, am ulun sasambungon musiti' lambaan.
Ulun ondo' tumaam ra pangkuatan jajajou, masauk io koson ra kinasambung ru ulun mangkuot.
Pangkuatan ra jajajou taamon niayuk ra jajajou, maa' raginio ulun mangkuot no makatutun ra iono sotopot no kalo mapandai.
Manusub ra ulun sasambungon koson mapasaboi ra bilin mogondo' ayuk ra mamandak ra kalayam galama' am maguyum ra kajamaran.
Koson ra ulun lamumu' kalo makaugar, koson niayuk ra ulun sasambungon kalo mapandai mindagu ra abig.
Mangunsu' ra ulun sasambungon kolondo' onong, koson ra batu binangkos ra lasitik.
Ulun sasambungon ondo' kuminam mindagu ra abig koson ra ulun magauk ondo' kuminam mansula' ra ruui ra kalindu' nano.
Osoi-osoi mapakandoi ra ulun sasambungon mantipagon ra ngaangai' ulun.
Ulun sasambungon ondo' mambaal saguli' ra kinasambung nilo koson ayuk ra uku' ondo' mantila' saguli' ra lua' nano.
Sasambungon pana ulun, sala' ka koson ra kinasambung ru ulun ondo' mangkara' ra io mapintar, sotopot no kalo.
Ulun matiar kalo masaga' mingkual ra baloi. Mindagu io ra saamon io kunu' ru singa' amon ru mingkual io.
Koson ra kulobon minsur ra guutan nano, koson niayuk ra ulun matiar miluluir ra intok pambalangan.
Mokoondo' ulun ra matiar kaga' saboi kalo masaga' mangakan galama'.
Ulun matiar no mangkara' io mapandai poyo ka tulu' ngaulun ondo' nakataam ra natimpok.
Lumatok ra pansangaran ru ulun bokon koson ayuk mamparakop ra uku' ondo' talingo nano guuton.
Ulun ondo' mamparuung ra ulun bokon, am mindagu ra mangkuli io ayuk koson ra ulun mantuyang ondo' mangkuli ra sinapang.
Kolondo' luton, apui malasa'; kolondo' mangalimut, pansangaran pana lumonggo'.
Koson ra baa am luton mapasimbula' ra apui, koson niayuk ra ulun ondo' masaga' mansangor mangkinibit ra mantataam.
Mangalimut moonsoi ra limanin, ulun masaga' monolon.
Koson ra paliuk binaal intor ra tana' ondo' linakatan ra pirok, koson raginio noyo ulun maamis kabang kaa' malaat guang.
Ulun masisang no maamis ra mindagu, kaa' guang nano napanu' ra ruung.
Kabalu' pana io masamba, pai' pangintopot riso, sabap ra guang nano napanu' ra kasisangan.
Kabalu' pana masibuni no kasisangan nano, kaa' makito niayuk kalaatan nano.
Ulun mapataan ra jajaling ru ulun bokon, io galama' sumulung ra jajaling no. Ulun mapaluir ra batu maintupan ilo niayuk ru batu no.
Magabau ra ulun nogondo' niayuk masisang riso. Kabang maamis ra kalo motopot mangkinibit ra kapatayan.
Pai' pamanggo atan kasaukan ra susuab, sabap ra kalo poyo natutunan min atan kasaukan no.
Polosoon ulun ra bokon mongompor ramuyun – kapoam ulun suai. Pai' pagiompor ra inan galama'.
Batu am agis lakat mamaan, amon ru pogondoon ra kapaganan intor ra sasambungon.
Sangit no malaat kaga' am niayuk makatutuk, kaa' kolondo' sangulun pana makatingkuang ra kaingatan.
Moonsoi poyo sailon ragu ra mansawai ka togom ra masibuni.
Sangulun rangan mamalamba' ralalom katagaman, kaa' ilalai' min amon ru sangulun pantula' gumanggol ramuyun.
Amon ru maasug, ruu' ru maningot pana kararain; amon ru maitilan, mapait pana maamis ayuk pamalimanan.
Ulun ondo' maalur intor ra baloi, koson ra susuit kolondo' bunsut.
Umau ra maamis owou makaansuk ra guang, kaa' kapaganan makaimamang.
Pai' liliani' pangkubayau muno kapoam pangkubayau ru ama' muno. Bulintok ra akau makakapaganan, pai' ongoi ra baloi ru pabukat mino; pinasambalayan poyo makapangindangan ka pabukat ra maalur.
Alii ra anak kuno, kapintar kano, maa' raginio maansukan aku am makataam bulintok ra aku sindualin.
Ulun ra mapintar iliwin no kalaanan amon ru makito no, kaa' ulun sasambungon polosoon no io malumpa' ra karaat am tauli no pansagulian guang nano.
Sasambungon nai ulun ondo' masaga' manampilon ra utang ru ulun bokon;
Tabi' ra gumolok bulintok ra kakatawang ra susuab nogondo' ayuk ra pagulasan.
Andu' ondo' mabaji' koson ayuk ra posok ru timug ondo' kalo tumaru'-taru' bulintok rumasam.
Mailo io susubon mongkoror, nogondo' ra angin mailo ingain, am umau mailo gonggomon.
Koson ra basi' asaan ra basi', ginio niayuk ra ulun migigila' ra rondo' am bokon.
Ulun magalung ra puun ru nunuk makaakan ra kawa' nano; ulun magalung ra tuan nano tagamin io.
Koson ra timug mampakito ra bulos, koson niayuk ra guang mampakito ra ulun ra sotopot no.
Pagun ru ulun minatoi, masalok makaintok; ginio niayuk ra gogot ru guang galama' ru ulun kolondo' palasan nano.
Mas am pirok kinamin ra apui; ulun urioon maya' ra paliso nano ra omporon.
Kabalu' pana ulun sasambungon lambaan saboi malausan, sambung nano kalo matatak.
Alungi' noyo toojo bibiag mino,
sabap ra kinalangkayaan ti kalo mantilayun. Kuasa' koson mamarinta pana kalo lumayun ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Tatason min sakot am timungon koson pamamakan ra bibiag mino, kaa' liliwa' raginio sakot ra nakabagu tumuu'.
Makapambaal kau ra bayang intor ra bulu ru domba. Makapambali kau ra tana' intor ra logo ru kambing.
Kambing ra bokon no makagatas ra pagaan koson rirun, akau sambaloi, am niayuk ruandu'-ruandu' mangandoi rirun no.
Ulun malaat masimbul kabalu' pana kolondo' ulun mangilou risilo, kaa' ulun mabanis guang baani koson ra singa'.
Amon ru bansa' gumuor, mangunguasa' nano masalok pagalig-galig; amon ru tingganai no mapandai am mapintar, pamarintaan nano maikang am mapanggol.
Mangunguasa' ondo' mangimpai ra ulun musikin koson ra rasam maawas ondo' mapakapasa' ra kumoson.
Osoi-osoi ondo' mampalilian ra ukum, sumaung io ra ulun malaat; osoi-osoi gumagaya' ra ukum, makimantula' io ra ulun malaat.
Ulun malaat kalo makaulig ra katimpakan; ulun ondo' sumamba ra
Moonsoi poyo musikin am mabanis guang ka langkaya' am tumalansiang guang.
Ulun mamulok ondo' gumagaya' ra ukum io no mapintar. Ulun makimangkubayau ra mangangandus mapakauyu' ra ama' nano.
Osoi-osoi masauk ra langkaya' ondo' kologoon no bunga' ru ruit am niayuk mamparuung ra ulun bokon, rapu' nano masauk ra longgom ru ulun bokon ondo' makaasi' ra ulun musikin.
Amon ru kalo gumagaya' kau ra ukum, i Aki kapuuno' pana mataman ra pakiasian muno.
Osoi-osoi mapalayau ra ulun mabanis guang, masulungan ru kalaatan nano galama'.
Ulun ra kolondo' sala barakaton saboi maansukan.
Ulun langkaya' masalok mamanggo ra io mapintar, kaa' ulun musikin ra mapintar makapandai toojo ra paliso ru ulun langkaya' no.
Amon ru ulun moonsoi masauk ra mangunguasa', ngaangai' ulun maansukan, kaa' amon ru ulun malaat mamarinta, ngaangai' ulun mansibuni.
Osoi mangali' ra tula nano kolondo' ampos ru kaayagan nano. Osoi mangakun am mangiruan ra tula nano, tagamin ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Pakaansuk noyo ulun ondo' gumagaya' ra
Mangunguasa' ra malaat ondo' mangulipon ra ulun musikin koson ra singa' ondo' mansangal kapoam baawang ondo' mansaam.
Mangunguasa' ra sasambungon no malaat kaga', kaa' mangunguasa' ondo' masisang ra kalo mabanis guang pamarintaan nano mabuoi.
Sangulun mamamatoi pampaguangan nano koson ra ilolowon saboi io matoi. Pai' kinam pangindangan riso.
Ulun mabanis guang bayagon, kaa' ulun ra namparuung iono pusoon ra sangkuliop ayuk.
Ulun magitatanom ra mapirot kaga' makaalap ra masuang akanon, kaa' ulun magitambingai ayuk masauk ra musikin.
Ulun mabanis guang barakaton io ru
Ulun ra maagat sapapa' iono rondo' baal ra nasala, kaa' mokoondo' niayuk akim mambaal koson raginio koson mangapu ayuk ra rasua kabalu' pana kalo masuang.
Ulun makalit mampaguang ra mataki' lumangkaya'. Kalo malimanan no ra kamusikinan mataki' makalumpa' riso.
Ulun mansawai pupus nano urumaton poyo ka ulun mongompor.
Osoi mantakou ra matuo nano am guangon no baal koson raginio kolondo' tula, io no nogondo' ayuk ra mantatakou.
Paliso ra mangangkum maparatong ra kapaganan. Osoi sumingkayut ra
Ulun ondo' maya' ra pampaguangan galama' iono ulun sasambungon. Ulun ondo' maya' ra pangilaan ru ulun mapintar iono bayagon.
Osoi mataau ra ulun musikin kalo matutusan. Osoi ondo' kalo mampalio ra ulun musikin iono ulason.
Amon ru ulun malaat masauk ra mangunguasa', mamagun mansibuni; kaa' amon ru ulun malaat mapuso, ulun matimpok mamarinta poyo ra ati-ati ayuk intok.
Amon ru sangulun gumaai mokotog guang ra moonong sawayon, sangarawan matutuk io ondo' kalo boo makatapuli'.
Amon ru ulun matimpok no mamarinta, mamagun maansukan. Amon ru ulun malaat no mamarinta, mamagun maimbolo'.
Osoi maringkuanang ra mapintar, mapabansuk ra ama' nano. Osoi masalok lumatok ra ruandu' mantalan ra inan mampalubat ra ruit.
Amon ru raja' mapaundok ra katimpakan, karajaan nano maikang, kaa' amon ru raja' mangangkum ra ruit, karajaan nano maaba'.
Ulun ondo' mongompor ra rangan nano, mapataan ra pampajaling ra inan nano galama'.
Ulun malaat masulungan ru tula nilo galama', kaa' ulun mabanis guang maansayan am maansukan.
Ulun moonsoi makapandai ra pagapuan ru ulun musikin, kaa' ulun malaat kalo makarati' ra baal koson raginio.
Ulun ondo' masaga' magagasab makajajou ra titikop ru bandar, kaa' ulun mapintar makasimayo ra baal koson raginio.
Amon ru ulun mapintar mantagi' ra ulun sasambungon giu' ra makama, ulun sasambungon no gumabu' am mampalakak ayuk saboi mapatabual ra kajajawan.
Ulun malaat kaga' masisang ra ulun mabanis guang, kaa' ulun moonsoi mangampin
Ulun sasambungon pasalulaan no ngai' sangit nano, kaa' ulun mapintar mosorot am oroton no sangit nano.
Amon ru sangulun mangunguasa' mampaguang ra tanou kalo motopot, ngaangai' mangngandoi nano masauk ra malaat.
Ulun musikin am ulun ondo' mangimpai riso no nogondo' ayuk:
Amon ru raja' manungka' ra pagapuan ru ulun musikin, pamarintaan nano maikang ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Pangubasan am pansawayan mapasauk ra ulun mapintar. Anak ra masalok gagayaan kitaakon nano mapakauyu' ra ina' nano.
Amon ru ulun malaat makakuasa', kalaatan sumingkot, kaa' ulun mabanis guang makakito ra ilo matutuk.
Ubaso' noyo ngaangai' anak mino; am manimayo ilo ramuyun am bansukon kau.
Bansa' ra kolondo' indangan ri Aki Kapuuno' masauk ra bansa' kumuliasou-asou. Pakaansuk noyo ulun ondo' gumagaya' ru ukum ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Sangulun ulipon kalo maila' ru ragu-ragu ayuk. Magu' makarati' io, kaa' kalo lioon no.
Maayo poyo kalansanan ru ulun sasambungon ka ulun ondo' mindagu ra kalo mangkara' galing.
Ulipon ra layaan intor ra boborok, pupus no masauk ra ulun mokotog ulu.
Ulun ra mataki' sumangit mapatabual ra masuang pansangaran am kapaganan.
Malilimbau mangkinibit ra karatuan, kaa' sangulun ondo' minggana' guang urumaton io.
Ulun ondo' kumubayau ra mantatakou arati' no masisang io ra inan galama'. Amon ru akunin no giu' ra makama, ukumin io; amon ru kalo akunin no, ulason io ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Malaa' ra guangon ru ulun bokon mangkinibit ra kapaganan. Pangintopot no ra
Masuang ulun lumansan ra sungka' ru mangunguasa', kaa'
Ulun moonsoi masisang ra ulun malaat; ulun malaat pana masisang ra ulun moonsoi.
Gitio noyo ragu-ragu ondo' pinabala' ri Agur anak ri Jaki intor ra Masa:
“Naagui aku, iou Aki Kapuuno'. Naagui aku!
Kolondo' lulu' kutu.
Sasambungon aku koson ra bibiag;
kolondo' atan-atan karatian.
Kalo igondo' aku pokoowot ra kapintaran,
am totopot kalo igondo' aku pakaulig ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Osoi kia nakaili' nagaloi am timinuun ra suruga'?
Osoi kia nakaili' nompogonggom ra angin,
kapoam mompolopot ra timug no ra konoon,
kapoam mangaru' ra balitan-balitan ru tana' ti?
Osoi kia inggalan nano, am osoi kia anak nano?
Maaru' nakapandai kou.
Sinugut ri Aki Kapuuno' ngaangai' bantu' Nano. Io koson ra gagampin ru ngaangai' ulun ondo' makiampin Riso.
Amon ru ruangin min atan rinagu Nano, mansawai Io ramuyun am pabalaan No ra akau no magabau.”
Iou Aki Kapuuno', kitaakon ku ruo baal ra aku kalo poyo matoi:
indangano' aku no maa' raginio kalo magabau aku, am indangano' aku no maa' raginio ra aku ti kalo lumangkaya' am kalo musikin. Intor raginio, anii' aku ra atan ondo' kasagaan kuno ayuk.
Amon ru langkaya' aku, magu' mindagu aku ra kolondo' pakuan kuno Rirun. Kaa' amon ru musikin aku, magu' mantakou aku, am mapakauyu' ri Aki Kapuuno' kuno.
Pai' susunuro' sangulun ulipon no ra tuan nano. Ulason kau, am maimbolo' kau.
Mokoondo' ulun magulas ra ama' am kalo maringkuanang ra ina' nano.
Mokoondo' ulun mindagu ra ilo no matulai, sotopot no majamol kaga'.
Mokoondo' ulun mindagu ra ilo no moonsoi kaga' – kalo namimii' bonsoi no!
Mokoondo' ulun mamparuung ra ulun musikin am mapagon. Ginio noyo ralan nilo maguyum ra akanon.
Ulun mamparuung mokoondo' ruo ngaulun anak ruandu'; karuruo no makainggalan ri “Anii' aku”!
Mokoondo' apat baal ra kalo igondo' kajala':
Tana' ru ulun minatoi,
ruandu' ra kalo igondo' paganak,
tana' napua' ondo' pinaason ra rasam,
am apui ondo' riminalat ra ati-ati intok.
Sangulun ondo' magasab ra ama' nano, kapoam ina' nano ondo' matutuo noyo,
Mokoondo' apat baal ondo' mapagon kaga' aration kuno:
Kanui ondo' mansiab ra limbowon,
kukuo ondo' mundus ra rasawat ru batu,
kapal ondo' masundoi ra tatanga' ru raat,
am ungkuyon am niayuk ruandu' ondo' mangkubayau.
Gitio noyo binaal ru sangulun andu' ondo' kalo gumagaya': Lumapau io, am mariu'. Kopongo raginio mindagu io, “Kolondo' atan-atan binaal kuno ondo' makasala!”
Mokoondo' apat baal ondo' mapagon apuon ra titikop ru tana' ti:
Sangulun ulipon ondo' masauk ra raja',
sangulun sasambungon ondo' makaalap ra nansalinut akanon ra kasagaan no,
sangulun ruandu' nawot kabalu' pana kalo kasagain io ru ulun,
am sangulun ulipon ruandu' ondo' nampagaau ra intok ru puan nano.
Mokoondo' apat salinut ru bibiag ra tana' ti ondo' boborok kaa' mapintar kaga':
Kilau no kalo maikang, kaa' mapauli ra akanon bulintok tampio.
Karuui batu kalo maikang, kaa' mambaal ra baloi giu' ra bulur kabatuan.
Gapu' kolondo' raja', kaa' matanda' bulintok ra ilo tuminting ra baris.
Totok marakop ra kalindu', kaa' mokoondo' niayuk ra istana ru raja'.
Mokoondo' apat salinut bibiag makito ra maikang bulintok ra mugar:
Singa', bibiag ondo' maikang kaga' am kalo malaa' ra atan pana;
kambing gawayan;
manuk tandaa' mugar ra sumugal bulu;
am raja' ra saang ru mamagun.
Amon ru liminimbau kau am niayuk mangatang ra kalaatan, pangkara' kau saguli'!
Amon ru mangangkuyau kau ra gatas, kasaukan nano mentega. Amon ru manumbuk kau ra arung ru ulun, raraa' lumabuk. Amon ru mangkinibit kau ra kasangitan, makaalap kau ra kapaganan.
Gitio noyo bilin ru ina' ru Raja' Limuil intor ra Masa ondo' posoboyon ra raja':
“Okou anak tagamin ku, taam ru pakiasian kuno ondo' iniou ru
Pai' koyoo' ikang muno ra ruandu', am pai' awayo' ruit muno ra ruandu'; masuang noyo raja' rinatuan nilo.
Rongogo' noyo, alii ri Limuil. Raja' sotopot no kalo manginum ra wain, kapoam masuolok ra inumon mampagauk.
Bulintok ra raja' no manginum raginio, koson mampalilian ra ukum am mangimpai ra pagapuan ru ilo ondo' kolondo' lulu'.
Inumon mampagauk no inumon koson ulun matikapatoi am ondo' naimbolo'.
Polosoon noyo ilo manginum koson mampalilian ra kamusikinan am kaimbalaan.
