am mapalabus ra ulun Kuno ondo' rinakop,
kolondo' rasua am kalo kibayarin.”
Mindagu
“Gogoto' min kalangkayaan ru tana' ru Misir am Itiopia,
Ulun-ulun ru Siba ondo' mangaikang masauk ra longgom muno;
nabangkil ilo am mugar ra talikuron muno.
Migulatur ilo am mangiou,
‘I Aki Kapuuno' totopot minunor ramuyun;
Io no i Aki Kapuuno' rondo'-rondo' ayuk!
Namayag i Aki Kapuuno' ra ulun ru Israil
ioginio i Aki Kapuuno' ra nansibuni.
Ngaangai' ulun ondo' nambaal ra sinungkalalaing ra sambaan
tauyuon am asabin.
Kaa' Israil bayagon ru
pamayagan riso no mantilayun.
Kalo tauyuon kau am asabin
saboi ra sabuoi-buoi no.’ ”
Io noyo i Aki Kapuuno'!
Io noyo namangun am nambaal ra tana' ti,
am tana' ti masauk ra mokotog.
Kalo polosoon no intok raginio masiluk,
kaa' intok raginio ayanin.
Io noyo minindagu,
“Aku noyo
Kalo alion Ku ra Aku mindagu,
kapoam opoton.
Kalo susubon Ku ulun Kuno Israil
maguyum Raki' ra kolondo' logo.
Aku,
am mambala' ra motopot.”
Mindagu
akau noyo naayag ra ralalom ru nasuangan bansa'!
Sasambungon noyo ulun-ulun ondo' saguguluyur mugar magibit ra sinungkalalaing ondo' binaal intor ra tataun,
am makiasi' ra dewa-dewa no
ondo' kalo makapamayag no.
Pabalaa' atan suang ru guang muno am niayuk inono'-inono' no,
iou, polosoo' ilo mansunur.
Osoi kia napatanou ra baal raginio
am napabala' intor ra galing i?
Sala' kia ka Aku,
Kolondo' tuhan-tuhan ra bokon, ondo' ak am Aku.
Aku noyo i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' matimpok am mamamayag,
kolondo' noyo bokon ondo' ak am Aku!
“Akau ngaangai' namagun ru tana' ti,
saguli' kano Raki' maa' raginio bayagon kau,
sabap ra Aku ayuk i Aki Kapuuno', kolondo' bokon!
am kalo masulang.
Aku galama' mipapator ralalom ru inggalan Kuno:
Moonong ulun migulatur ra saang Kuno,
am ralalom ragu nilo sigagama' mambaal ra bantu' koson gumagaya' Raki'.
“Ulun-ulun mindagu,
‘Katimpakan am kaikangan intor ayuk ra
Ngaangai ulun ondo' masisang Raki'
matong ilo Raki' am tauyuon.
Kaa' papag ri Jakub bayagon,
am mongompor ilo Raki',
“Gitio noyo pupus ru dewa-dewa Babil;
galing i sinungkalalaing Bel am Nibo sambaan,
kaa' ragino pinakura' ra bakulung ru tambiag,
masauk ra kapaganan ru tambiag ondo' kalo maligag.
Sinungkalalaing no kalo makakau' mangindangan ra nangkayang riso,
ilo galama' kinayang koson ra rinakop.
Ginio noyo pupus nilono.
“Rongogo' Aku no, akau papag ri Jakub,
akau ngaangai' ondo' ulun Kuno ra naayag.
Aku nagalung ramuyun
intor poyo ra akau inanak.
Aku magulayun i Aki Kapuuno' min saboi akau matutuo;
am magulayun magalung ramuyun saboi akau makauan.
Aku napasauk ramuyun am magulayun magalung ramuyun,
indanganon am bayagon Takamin.
“Osoi kia pogondoon min Raki'?
Mokoondo' kia osoi mokogondo' Raki'?
Ulun mapaingkual ra mas intor ra katia' nano,
am manimbang ra pirok ra timbangan.
Mampagaji' io sangulun manukang ra mas koson mambaal ra sinungkalalaing,
am sambaan no sinungkalalaing binaal nano.
Sinungkalalaing no pinakuan am pinauli ra intok no,
minigor io ra giu' no, kalo makabanding.
Amon ru makiasi' ulun riso, kalo tumaam io,
am kalo makapamayag ra ulun intor ra kapaganan nano.
Karaa' noyo baal ragitio, akau ulun makatula;
karaa' noyo nansalinut ondo' binaal Kuno.
Karaa' noyo kasaukan-kasaukan ra galing i;
Iowo' noyo ra Aku i Aki Kapuuno', am kolondo' bokon,
Aku i Aki Kapuuno' am kolondo' mokogondo' Raki'.
Intor ra talimpuun pabalaan Ku baal ra orou matong,
intor ra galing i maguang Ku atan kasaukan.
Ragu Ku: Pamatasan Kuno maaru' masauk,
kasagaan Kuno musiti' Ku baalon!
Piawon Ku sangulun mangunguasa' intor ra sirangon;
matong io koson ra sanginan susuit kanui
koson mapaugar ra pamatasan Kuno.
Atan paraguon Kuno musiti' Ku baalon,
atan ondo' inatang Kuno musiti' Ku baalon.
Rongogo' Aku no, akau ulun-ulun bambalingatan,
indoson min kamanangan maalur poyo.
Painggaaron Ku orou papalabusan,
pamayagan ondo' pataakon Kuno kalo boo kulawon.
Bayagon Ku Jirusalim,
am manaak ra urumat ri Israil.”
“Okou Babil, tuun intor ra turungan muno,
am panturung noyo ra rasawat ru kaau,
Okou kalo boo mantalur am makabunduk ra guang koson ra galing i.
Kinsaro' noyo tapung no ra kinsaran batu;
puaso' noyo rundung muno,
kungkuno' tapi' muno saboi makito tonok muno
am laupo' sungoi-sungoi!
Ulun makakito ramuyun magibaang,
asabin am tauyuon.
Mansuli' Aku,
am kolondo' sangulun pana polosoon Ku makalabus.”
I Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil, i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' matulai, mapalabus ritakau,
inggalan Nano
“Pongkoror, am subol no ra kalandaman!
Kalo boo sasabiton kou
‘Ralaa mantalur ru ngaangai' bansa'.’
Sumangit Aku ra ulun Kuno,
kalo boo karaan Ku ilo koson ra ulun Kuno:
Pataakon Ku ilo ralalom ru kuasa' muno,
am kalo makaasi' kou risilo;
ulun matutuo pana talalaingon min.
Indoson muno mantilayun kou masauk ra ralaa mantalur,
am kalo makatutun kapoam mangkara' ra pupus no.
okou ondo' masaga' mangilou ra katasuan!
Indoson mu kaayagan muno moonsoi,
am kolondo' koson rirun.
Indoson mu kalo masauk kou ra mapuor,
kapoam mailusan ra anak-anak muno.
Kaa' sangkuliop ayuk, ralalom songorou,
karuruo baal raginio masauk.
Inda' pana mamakai kou ra guguno am kuasa' ru sihir muno,
mailusan kou ra ralaki am anak-anak muno.
Malimanan muno moonsoi ralalom ru kalaatan muno;
indoson muno kolondo' sangulun pana makapandai.
Kapintaran am kaintutunan muno mapalayau rirun.
Indoson muno kolondo' mokogondo' rirun.
Kaa' malumpa' kou ru karaat,
ilimu' ru sihir muno kalo mokopongompong.
Patayan sangkuliop ayuk matong,
patayan ondo' kalo maguang muno.
Rayusi' noyo pakuan ra nansalinut sihir muno,
ondo' pinakai mu intor poyo ra kinamuloko' muno.
Magu' nansalinut sasampui muno makaindangan rirun,
am mampakalalaa' ra pantula' muno.
Kalo boo manguasa' kou
kabalu' pana masuang pinson naapu muno.
Polosoon noyo ulun mapandai mangilong mamayag rirun;
migigila' ilo ra butitin-butitin,
mangurio ra linsuk-linsuk ru limbowon
ra moonong bulan,
manala' ra atan
Ilo koson ra rami ondo' nakai' kosolob ru apui;
kalo makapamayag ilo ra inan nilo galama'!
Simbula' ru apui no malasu' kaga' limanin nilo,
sala ka apui malasu' pandarangan.
Ginio ayuk pakuan ra ulun mangingilong no ramuyun;
intor poyo ra kinamuloko' muno makipinson kono riso.
Ilo ngaangai' no magiru' am manatang rirun,
Kolondo' sangulun pana namagun no koson mamayag rirun.”
Rongogo' noyo baal ragitio, akau ulun ru Israil,
papag ri Jiuda,
nampator kau ralalom inggalan ru
am mangiou sumamba ri Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil,
kaa' ragu-ragu mino kalo motopot.
Kaa' mangiou am maansukan kau
ra akau namagun ra bandar ondo' mapasau,
am akau sumingkayut ayuk ri Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil,
ondo' sabiton ra
Indagu
“Intor poyo ra galing i Aku nambala' intor ra baal ondo' masauk,
am pulaliin Ku mambaal raginio.
Makapandai aku ra akau bambalingatan,
mokotog guang am makaulu batu.
Ginio ra intor ra galing i Aku minindagu intor ra orou matong mino,
pabalaan Ku baal ondo' kalo poyo nasauk;
maa' raginio kalo makaindagu kau
ra baal raginio binaal ru sinungkalalaing sambaan mino.
Nansalinut panalaan Kuno nasauk noyo ragino,
musiti' no iowon min ra panalaan Kuno motopot.
Ragino manala' Aku ra baal-baal nakabagu,
inopot-inopot ra kalo poyo napandayan min.
Ragino ayuk ra Aku mambaal raginio,
kalo poyo igondo' Aku pokorongog ra baal raginio,
maa' raginio kalo makaindagu kau
ra nakapandai kano ra ngaangai' no.
Makapandai Aku ra akau no kalo malansanan,
nauligan kau ra maanggal-anggal.
Ginio ra akau kalo makapandai no,
am kalo sambangis pana ragu makasuku' ra talingo mino.
Oroton Ku ayuk sangit Kuno,
maa' raginio ulun mongompor ra inggalan Kuno.
Oroton Ku ayuk sangit Kuno,
maa' raginio kalo potoyon kau.
Kininaman Takamin noyo ra apui kaimbalaan,
koson ra pirok pinalunau ra apui.
Binaal Ku gitio koson kaatangan Kuno galama',
kalo polosoon Ku inggalan Kuno jamalin,
kapoam mantayar ra katulayan Kuno ra osoi-osoi ayuk.”
ulun ondo' piniau Kuno.
Aku noyo i Aki Kapuuno', rondo'-rondo' ayuk i Aki Kapuuno',
ondo' kasaa' am pamupusan!
Kalindu' Kuno mapabanta' ra sonor ru tana',
am mamingkal ra limbowon.
Bulintok ra Aku manusub ra limbowon am tana' muma',
karuruo no mataki' matong.
Timung am rongog kano ngaangai'!
Kolondo' rondo' pana dewa makapampaguang
ra ulun pinili' Kuno mongoi pamulunsar ra Babil;
bayaan no panusuban Kuno.
Aku noyo minindagu am niayuk nampiau riso;
maningganai Aku riso am manaak riso ra ampos.
Ratong inggaar no Raki' am rongogo' ragu Kuno.
Intor ra galing i kalo opoton ku ragu Kuno,
am moonong ragu Kuno motopot.”
Ragino
am manaak raki' ra kuasa' Nano.
Ragu ri Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil, i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' matulai,
“Aku noyo
mangila' Aku ra atan ondo' moonsoi ramuyun,
maningganai Aku ramuyun ra ralan ondo' sotopot bayain min.
Amon ru ilain min ukuman Kuno,
makaapu kau ra barakat ondo' kalo maukat-ukat
koson ra sungoi ra kalo igondo' kalasak.
Kolondo' pupus ru ampos mino
koson ra kinulun ru raat ondo' kalo igondo' longgo'.
Papag mino masauk masuang koson ra agis
am tutunon Ku maa' raginio kalo mapuso ilo.”
Pabalaa' noyo tanou raginio ralalom guang maantak.
Pabalaa' noyo tanou raginio ra ati-ati ayuk,
Bulintok ra
kalo paason ilo.
Paingkualon No timug intor ra bulur batu no risilo;
lapakon No bulur batu, am timug pana tumampusis.
ginio noyo ragu ru
lioo' min ragu-ragu kutu.
Piniau aku ru
pinili' No aku intor poyo ra aku tininai'.
am ra kalindu' Nano galama' nanindung Io aku.
Sinauk No aku koson ra anak ru panah inasa',
am pinauli No ra kobon koson tumampos pakayon.
Ragu No raki', “Okou noyo ulipon Kuno;
katulayon Aku sabap ra okou.”
Kaa' mindagu aku, “Bagui kuno kolondo' ampos;
kinai' ku ikang kuno ra namuta' ayuk!”
Kaa' mangintopot aku ra saungon aku ru
balasin aku ri Aki Kapuuno' sumugut ra binaal kuno.
Ra kalo poyo naanak, piniau aku noyo ru
koson mapalulur ra ulun ru Israil,
maa' raginio sumaguli' ilo Riso.
I Aki Kapuuno' noyo kaikangan kuno.
“Kandoi ra maayo kaga' maginaa rirun, okou ulipon Kuno;
okou sala' ka mapasaguli' ayuk ra suwo ru papag ri Jakub
am mapatapuli' ra kinaayo ru bansa'-bansa' ru Israil,
kaa' saukon Ku poyo okou ra sinda ru bansa'-bansa'
maa' raginio titikop ru tana' ti bayagon.”
I Aki Kapuuno' matulai Mamamayag ru Israil mindagu
ra ulun ondo' asasabin toojo,
am ondo' kasisangin ru bansa'-bansa'
am niayuk masauk ra ulipon ru nasuangan mangunguasa',
“Raja'-raja' makakito ra binaal Kuno,
am sumukal ilo am mangurumat Raki'.
Nasuangan ru mangunguasa' magilong niayuk riso,
am migulatur sumamba.”
Ginio masauk sabap ra
i Aki Kapuuno' matulai ru Israil manugut ra bantu' Nano.
“Bulintok ra Aku mangiou, tumaam Aku;
orou ra Aku mamayag, indanganon Takamin.
Sindungin am alungin Takamin,
am saukon Ku nabantuan ra bansa'-bansa'.
Tapulion Ku pagun ra masiluk
masauk ra tana' tungkuson ondo' ayanin.
Ulun ra inaput susubon Ku mingkual;
ondo' soroi ra intok molondom ibiton Ku ra intok matawang.
Giu' ra bulur nabugasan pana kolondo' kapaganan nilo,
gagawar ru ralan pinaatang akanon.
am kalo malasuan ilo giu' ra tana' kaagisan.
Sabap ra Aku, motogom risilo, mangaak risilo,
am mangitang risilo ra taur-taur ru timug.
Mambaal Aku ra ralan maya' ra kagunungan,
ngaangai' ralan rataan Ku.
Intor ra maalur ulun Kuno sararatong,
intor ra ralayo, kalasaan am Sinim
Parimbai no, okou limbowon, pagilakup noyo okou tana',
akau gunung-gunung, pagilakup noyo maansukan!
Sabap ra
makaasi' Io ra ulun Nano ondo' inimpayan.
Kaa' namagun ru Jirusalim mindagu,
“Makalilian kia sangulun ina' ra anak nano?
Kabalu' pana malilianan no,
Kalo lilianin Tokou!
Jirusalim, masalok Aku mangkara' rirun;
inggalan muno tinulisan Ku ra palar ru kalindu' Kuno.
Ulun-ulun ondo' mambaal rirun saguli' rumatong mataki',
am ondo' manutuk rirun no magiru'.
Ilai' noyo am tantangi' noyo libung muno,
ulun muno timinimung am matong rirun.
Sabap ra Aku, i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' maayag, mindagu Aku,
maansukan kou kaga' sabap namagun muno,
koson ra ruandu' inuot maantak guang ra io pinampakai.
Pagun muno ondo' mapua' am masiluk,
ragino nasauk mapisok kaga'
ra ilo ondo' makaguang mayan no.
Am ulun-ulun ondo' makaguang mamatoi rirun,
minugar noyo maalur intor rirun.
Anak-anak ondo' inanak giu' ra pamatiran
mindagu ilo rirun,
‘Pagun ragitio boborok guat kaga' raki',
anii' aku ra intok maa' raginio makaayan aku ragiti.’
Pansunuron mu boo guang,
‘Osoi kia naganak ra anak-anak no raki'?
Sala' kia ka natatakan aku ra anak,
am kalo boo maganak?
Inibit aku ralalom pamatiran am ininggi'
am tinatang misasangulun.
Sabap raginio ati intor ru anak-anak no,
am osoi kia mampasukor risilo no?’ ”
“Aniin Ku ra pulanu ra bansa'-bansa'
am pasagulion nilo anak-anak muno;
anak-anak muno ra ungkuyon no kubibilon,
am anak-anak muno ra ruandu' saanin.
Raja'-raja' koson ayuk ra pinakaama' mu ayuk,
am andu'-andu' raja' pinakaina' mu ayuk.
Migulatur ilo mangurumat rirun
am kalo lumimbau ilo rirun.
Okou pana makapandai ra Aku ti
ulun ondo' lumansan raki' kalo sindualin guang.”
Mangkuot kau,
“Gaawon kia nua' kuliamos ondo' inalap ru sangulun tutumula',
kapoam ulun narakop gaawon intor ra kalindu' ru ulun malaat kaga'?”
Tumaam
Ulun narakop ru nasuangan saujor ginaau saguli'.
Ginaau ru ulun malaat kaga' gaawon poyo.
Sabap ra Aku galama' manggal ra pantula' muno;
bayagon Ku anak-anak muno.
Saukon Ku pantula' muno magauk ra raraa',
saboi ilo galama' mampapatoi.
Ngaangai' ulun pana makapandai,
ra Aku,
Ondo' Maikang kaga', i Aki Kapuuno' ri Jakub, Mamumuli' muno.”
“Okou ulun Kuno, indos mu inggalarin Tokou
koson ra sangulun ralaki mangali ra andu' nano?
Koon poyo raginio, ati surat pangalian nano?
Indoson muno tinalan Tokou,
koson ra sangulun ama' nantalan ra anak nano ra mansisika' ra utang?
Sala'! Okou rinakop am pinatiran,
sabap ra tula am kalaatan muno galama'!
Kua kolondo' sangulun pana ulun Kuno tumaam,
Paat ra Aku matong mampiau risilo?
Mongkoror ilo ayuk kia sabap ra mampaguang
kalo makakau' Aku mapalabus am mamayag risilo?
Sotopot no, maya' ra panusuban Kuno raat masauk mapua',
sungoi-sungoi saukon Ku ra tana' kaagisan
saboi papait matoi am mongootong.
Limbowon saukon Ku mapiot londom,
Taubin Ku koson ra konoon panguliran.”
maa' raginio ragu kuno mapaikang ra ulun maagui.
Moonong susuab patirongon No gogoton kuno
koson mangkirongog ra pangilaan Nano koson raki'.
kalo manggal aku kapoam mugar intor Riso.
am pingas kuno ra ulun ondo' mamubul ra jangut kuno.
Kalo patalikuron ku bulos kuno
bulintok ra aku asabin am tiwagin.
Sabap ra
aku pana kalo tauyuon.
Ikangon ku guang kuno koson mongorot;
makapandai aku ra kalo tauyuon aku.
mambala' Io ra aku kolondo' sala.
Osoi masaga' mansang raki'?
Mabaya' to mongoi ra makama.
Osoi kia manggal raki'?
Susubo' io minggaar raki'.
Sotopot no,
osoi makakau' mindagu ra aku makasala?
Ngaangai' ulun ondo' manguu' raki' no mapuso
koson ra konoon narilak kinokot ru kilau.
Akau ondo' mangurumat ra
am mangkirongog ra ragu ru ulipon Nano,
ralan ra bayain mino magu' molondom,
am kolondo' sinda makatampulau ramuyun;
kaa' pangintopot noyo ra
am lansang no ri Aki Kapuuno' mino.
Akau ondo' masaga' mangimbolo' ra ulun bokon,
pusoon kau ru atang min galama'.
imboloon kau noyo toojo.
“Rongogo' Aku no, akau ondo' masaga' bayagon
am ratong kano Raki' makiindangan.
Karaan noyo gunung batu intor min natulisan,
am pangkalian ra batu intor min nakali.
Karaa' noyo kinamatuaan min, i Abragam
am i Sara ondo' naganak ramuyun.
Paat ra Aku nampiau ri Abragam, kolondo' anak nano,
nambarakat Aku riso am nangani' riso ra papag ondo' masuang kaga'.
“Jirusalim, bansukon Tokou,
am ngaangai' ondo' minayan ra napuutan Muno.
Padang-padang muno ra mapua' saukon Ku ra taman,
koson ra Idin, taman Kuno ra malabung.
Giu' no ulun maantak am maansukan,
am maringkuanang ra marimbai-rimbai.
“Rongogo' noyo bolos Kuno, akau bansa' Kuno,
Rongogo' noyo ragu-ragu Kuno, akau ulun Kuno.
Mangila' Aku ra bansa'-bansa',
ngaangai' ukum Kuno manaak risilo ra sinda.
Pamayagan ondo' pataakon Kuno mamaar noyo,
bulintok ra Aku mamanang mamaar noyo rumatong.
Aku galama' mamarinta ra bansa'-bansa'.
Pagun-pagun ondo' maalur magiginaa Raki'
am malansan ra baalon Kuno ondo' makaimuag.
Tingaano' noyo limbowon am indukui' noyo tana';
limbowon lumiot koson ra lisun
am tana' maapu' koson ra bayang lairon,
ngaangai' namagun no matoi koson ra namuk.
Kaa' pamayagan ra pinataak Kuno mantilayun ra sabuoi-buoi no,
am namanangan Kuno marayus-rayus.
“Rongogo' Aku, akau bansa' Kuno,
makapandai kau ra atan motopot,
pangilaan Kuno nakauli ra ralalom ru guang mino.
Pai' kalaa' amon asabin kau ru ulun,
pai' pagalabo amon magasab ilo ramuyun.
Mapuso ilo am matatak,
koson ra konoon inakan ru kilau
am konoon bulu kambing inakan ru anai.
Kaa' pamayagan ra pinataak Kuno mantilayun ra sabuoi-buoi no,
namanangan Kuno saboi ra papag am papag.”
Luat noyo
bayago' akaino ra kuasa' Muno.
Luat noyo koson ra galing i
bulintok ra Okou nanutuk ra Ragab,
am nonobok ra tambuakal ru raat no saboi minatoi.
Okou niayuk nampalasak ra raat,
timug ru raat ondo' malandom.
Binaal Mu ralan giu' ra tatanga' ru timug no,
maa' raginio ulun-ulun bayagon makasandaup.
Ulun-ulun ondo' pinalabus ru
sumubol ilo ra Jirusalim ralalom guang maantak liliwa' marimbai.
Matakau bulos nilo sabap maansukan sabuoi-buoi no,
sabuoi-buoi no ilo nakalabus intor ra kapaganan am mangiluk guang.
Mindagu
“Aku noyo ondo' napabansuk ramuyun.
Kua kalaa' kau ra ulun ondo' mapandai matoi,
am ulun ondo' pinatiran koson ra sakot?
Makalilian kau kia ra
ondo' namingkal ra limbowon am napabanta' lonor ru tana'?
Kua monsongorou kau malaa'
ra gabu' ru ulun mangimbolo' ramuyun
ondo' nakatampos mamuso?
Sotopot no, gabu' nilono
kalo makasaboi ramuyun.
Nasuangan ulun rinakop palabuson mataki';
kalo maawayan ilo ra akanon,
am kalo matoi am lobongon.
Sabap ra Aku noyo
ondo' nanguyau ra raat saboi kinulun nano makanginoos.
Aku noyo namingkal
am napabanta' ra lonor ru tana'.
Mindagu aku ra Sion, ‘Akau noyo ulun Kuno;
pataakon Ku pangilaan Kuno ramuyun
am mangampin ramuyun ra kuasa' Kuno.’ ”
Ukuman ondo' pinatasan ru
nailian mu noyo saboi nalupus.
Intor ra namagun muno kolondo' maningganai rirun,
intor ra minayan rirun kolondo' mangitang rirun.
Nalumpa' kou ru ruo karaat;
kinibit ru pangayawan pagun muno natutuk am napuso
am ulun muno matoi ra naitilan.
Kolondo' makaasi' am mapabansuk rirun.
Moonong pompor ru ralan
ulun-ulun muno maratu' kolondo' lulu'
koson ra tambang nakasulung ra jajaling.
Nalumpa' ilo ra sangit ru
am matiu' ra sangit ri Aki Kapuuno' Muno.
Rongogo' noyo akau ulun-ulun ondo' inimbolo',
ondo' kasiling-kasiling koson ra ulun nagauk!
Gitio noyo ragu ru
“Kaimbalaan ondo' pinataak Kuno ralalom sangit Kuno,
alapon Ku sagulio' intor ramuyun.
Guang kuno sumalui,
am kalo pana boo saanin min.
Kaimbalaan no pataakon Ku ra ulun ondo' mangimbolo' ramuyun,
ondo' nanusub ramuyun lumuya' ra tana'
am nanginjang-nginjang ramuyun,
koson ayuk ra ralan ondo' bayain ru ulun.”
Ikango' guang muno! Sulungi' bayang moonsoi kaga' muno!
Okou Jirusalim, bandar ondo' matulai,
ulun majamol kalo boo sumubol ra kulobon garabang muno.
Luat no intor ra kaau, okou Jirusalim,
kabuli' kaau ondo' siminokot rirun.
Bugali' rantai ondo' siminigot ra liog muno,
akau namagun ru Sion ondo' narakop!
Mindagu
Galing i minayan kau giu' ra Misir koson ulun bansa' ru bokon. I Asyur pana nangimbolo' ramuyun ra kolondo' sasaban.
Ragino atan kondoyon Ku ragiti? Mamparakop ulun ru Babil ramuyun ra kolondo' sasaban. Ilo ondo' mangimbolo' ramuyun malilimbau am rayusin nilo magasab Raki'.
Ginio sabap ra akau mangiou ra Aku i Aki Kapuuno', am bulintok raginio makapandai kau ra Aku noyo minindagu ramuyun.”
mugar io mansail ra kagunungan
am magibit ra tanou moonsoi, tanou pababansayan,
tanou pamayagan ra tayar Sion;
kono, “I Aki Kapuuno' muno Raja'!”
Rongogo' noyo noloos ayuk kaantakan ru mantatamung ra bandar,
ngaangai' ilo magilakup!
Sabap mato nilo galama' magilong
Pagitapap kano, akau napuutan ru Jirusalim,
sabap ra
am mapalabus ra Jirusalim.
ra saang ru mato ru nansalinut bansa'.
Titikop ru tana' pana makainono' ra
pamayagan intor ri Aki Kapuuno' takau.
akau ondo' nagibit ra kuliamos ru baloi ri Aki Kapuuno'!
Pai' kau kambong ra kuliamos ondo' majamol no,
tulayo' min inan mino ra kalo poyo mintor kau.
Kalo maajag-ajag kau mugar,
am sala' ka koson ra ulun ondo' tumangkus ayuk pagiru'.
Sabap ra
i Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil manindung ramuyun intor ra nansalinut pisuk.
Indagu
“Sotopot no, ulipon Kuno makaampos;
omporon io am urumaton.
Galing i masuang ulun makatigog magilong riso,
bulos nano pinilatan saboi koson sala' boo ka ulun.
raja'-raja' kalo makaindagu sabap ra mangimuag.
Magilong am makarati' ilo,
ondo' buoi ti kalo makapandai ilo.”
“Osoi kia mangintopot ra atan ondo' norongog mai?
Osoi kia papasabayan ra kuasa' ru
Kasaga' ru
ondo' tumuu' giu' ra tana' mapua'.
Kolondo' makaantak paat ra ilain;
kolondo' makabunduk koson ra kasagain.
Asabin am minggalur takau riso,
ulun ondo' nototop ra imbolo' am maubas magiba' ra karualan.
Kolondo' sangulun pana masaga' magilong riso,
am kalo lioon takau io.
kapaganan takano mangkinibit ra io maimbolo',
indoson takau
kaimbalaan nano ukuman ri Aki Kapuuno' riso.
am sinindualan sabap ra kalaatan takau.
Inukuman io maa' raginio itakau bayagon,
sabap ra ulitomo' nano nababas takau.
sigagama' ayuk ra ugar,
am pinalumpa' ru
ngaangai' kalaatan takano.
kaa' inorot no ayuk.
Kalo sambangis pana ragu nano
koson ra anak ru domba inibit ra panimbaluyan
kapoam indung ru domba sinukur bulu nano.
Rinakop io am inakim,
am binuntayang am inukuman ra matoi.
Kolondo' mampalio riso;
io minatoi sabap ra tula ru bansa' takau.
Lobong nano nakaunor ra ulun langkaya',
kabalu' pana kalo igondo' io pambaal ra kalaatan,
am kalo igondo' pamparuung.”
Mindagu
“Kaimbalaan nano topot sumugut ra kasagaan Kuno;
am pasubakon no painawo nano koson taak simbalui ra pangampun ra tula.
Ginio ra io maawar umur;
makakito io ra papag nano,
am ralalom riso gogoton Kuno nasugut.
Mopongo maimbolo', maansukan io saguli';
makapandai io ra kaimbalaan nano mokoonong toojo.
Ulipon Kuno, ondo' gumagaya' am ondo' iowon Kuno,
Magiba' ra ukuman ru ulun masuang;
am sabap io, Aku mangampun risilo.
intok no giu' ra gino ngai' ru ulun antung am ulun makapangkat.
Nampataak io ra painawo nano,
am kinara' io koson ra ulun malaat.
Nansaan io ra tula ru ulun masuang,
am makiasi' maa' raginio tula nilo ampunon.
ondo' kalo igondo' maganak.
Kaa' ragino pagilakup no,
am parimbai no maansukan!
Sabap ra anak-anak muno masuang kaga',
nakasail poyo intor ra anak ru ruandu' ondo' kalo tinatang ru ralaki.
Kalangkaa' min kim-kim;
kaawaro' min tali no am popoko' min paparukugan no!
Rumuang langka' muno mongoi ra pamiris am kait,
namagun muno mayan ra tana' ru bansa'-bansa'
am mayan ra bandar-bandar ondo' ragino ti masiluk kaga'.
Pai' kalaa', kalo tauyuon kou;
kalo asabin am maringkauyu'.
Lilianin mu kalo gagayaan muli bulintok ra kinamuloko' muli;
am kalo makakara' ra kasilukan muno koson sangulun napuor.
Namangun rirun no koson ra ralaki muno,
i Aki Kapuuno' matulai ru Israil ioginio mamamayag rirun.
Io Aki Kapuuno' mangunguasa' ra titikop ru tana' ti.
Israil, okou koson ra sangulun andu' mamulok
ondo' mangiluk guang sabap ra tinatang ru ralaki nano.
Kaa' i Aki Kapuuno' mampiau rirun saguli'
am mindagu,
“Sangkinolor ayuk buoi Aku nanatang rirun;
ralalom ru togom maayo okou alapon Ku saguli'.
Sangkinolor ayuk Aku timinalikur rirun
sabap ra sangit Kuno ra lumuab-luab.
Kaa' ralalom ru togom makaasi' Aku rirun.”
Gini noyo ragu ri Aki Kapuuno' Mamamayag rirun.
tana' ti kolondo' boo rosob,
koon niayuk ragino ti Aku mambantu'
ra kalo boo sumangit Aku am mangilalaa' ramuyun.
Kabalu' pana gunung-gunung am bulur-bulur mauyog,
kalo langgain Ku monogom rirun.
Nabantuan pababansayan Kuno masalok Ku guuton,”
kon ru
“Okou Jirusalim, bandar ondo' majamaran,
kolondo' lulu' muno am kolondo' mangansuk.
Lonor-lonor muno pabantaan Ku saguli',
ra batu-batu mokologo.
Manara-manara baalon Ku intor ra batu dalima',
kulobon-kulobon garabang muno intor ra batu intan,
timbok-timbok muno intor ra ratna mutu manikam.
lumangkaya' ilo.
Pinotolorog kou intor ra katimpakan,
pinainggalur intor ra kajamaran am pangimpayan.
Paat ra okou bulunsaron, sala' ka Aku nanusub,
osoi ayuk mamulunsar rirun maratu' io.
“Aku noyo namangun ra ulun manukang ra basi'
ondo' manampui ra apui koson manitip ra kinandoi.
Aku noyo napasauk ra saujor
ondo' mampaguut ra kinandoi mangayou no koson mampatoi.
Kaa' moonong kinandoi mangayou ondo' tinitip koson gumula' rirun,
kalo masauk.
Ra am moonong panguwan ralalom pangakiman
mampainono' kou ra kalo motopot.
Pataakon Ku kamanangan koson tangguang
ra ulipon-ulipon Kuno.”
Ginio noyo ragu ru
“Ibok kano ngaangai' ondo' pinaason,
inum kano ra timug pinasulung.
Ratong kano ondo' kolondo' ruit,
apuo' noyo gandum kalo kilagain, am akano' noyo!
Anggur am gatas pinasulung,
apuo' ayuk ra kalo kilagain.
Atan pakuan manimpulus ra ruit amon kolondo' pakuan,
am atan pakuan mangandoi amon kalo makaasug
Gagayaa' noyo panusuban Kutu, am mangakan kau ra moonsoi,
am makaakan ra pasulungon ra mangaamis.
aniin Takamin ra kaayagan moonsoi.
Sabap ra togom am gagaya' ondo' binantu' Ku ri Daut,
Timbakasanin Ku bantu' mantilayun Kuno ramuyun.
Sotopot no, sinauk Ku io ra tingganai am panglima,
sasi' intor ra kuasa' Kuno ra bansa'-bansa'.
Piawon min bansa'-bansa' suai,
am magindibok ilo matong ramuyun,
sabap ra Aku,
sabap ra Aku manulai ramuyun.”
Saguli' noyo ra
piawo' noyo Io buoi ra Io mamaar ayuk poyo.
Musiti' ulun malaat mapatanda' ra bayag nano,
am mangulau ra ralan ru pangkaraan nano.
Polosoon io sumaguli' ra
maa' raginio makaalap io ra kaasian Nano.
Musiti' io tumingkuang ri Aki Kapuuno' takau,
sabap ra
Mindagu
am ralan Kuno sala' ka ralan muno.
Koson ra kinasawat ru limbowon intor ra tana',
ginio niayuk kinasawat ru pangkaraan Kuno ka pangkaraan muno,
am ralan Kuno ka ralan muno.
am kalo sumaguli', kaa' mamasa' ra tana',
mapalabung am mapatuu' ra tatanom-tatanom,
manaak ra ampos koson palabukon am akanon,
ginio niayuk ra ragu ondo' paraguon Kuno
kalo sumaguli' Raki' ra kolondo' ampos,
kaa' makasugut mapaugar ra atan kasagaan Kuno,
am makasugut ra nansalinut maguang Kuno.
Tatangon min Babil ra guang maantak,
am inataran paingkualo' ra maayag.
Gunung am bulur maansukan am magilakup,
tatanom giu' ra umo magilakup.
Puun ru sipris sumuali ra karuuyan,
tatanom ru bunga' sumuali ra bulungkut makaruui.
Ginio masauk maa' raginio anggakon Aku;
koson tatandu' mantilayun ra kalo matatak.”
Mindagu
“Baalo' min atan ondo' matimpok
am maaya' ra ukuman Kuno.
Sabap ra sangkinolor poyo matong Aku mamayag ramuyun
am katimpakan Kuno pabalaan.
Barakatin Ku ulun ondo' gumagaya' ra orou Sabat
kalo lumaat ra orou raginio.
Ulun ondo' kalo mambaal ra kalaatan
moonsoi pamakuan Kuno riso.”
Ulun bansa' ru bokon ondo' sumimpung ra ulun ru
kalo makaindagu,
sumamba Riso mababaya' ra ulun Nano.”
Ulun ra kinambiri' kalo mangkara'
“Kalo masauk aku ra ulun ru
sabap ra kolondo' papag Kutu.”
“Amon ru mangurumat kau ra orou Sabat,
amon ru gumagaya' kau ra nabantuan Kuno
am mambaal ra atan ayuk mapabansuk ra guang Kuno,
inggalan muno pana karaan ra ralalom ru Baloi Kuno
am ginio ngai' ru bansa' Kuno.
Ginio moonsoi poyo ka makaanak
ra ungkuyon am ruandu'.
Inggalanin Takamin ra mantilayun
ondo' kalo lilianin.”
ondo' siminubol ra ulun ru
ondo' monogom ra
ondo' mangurumat ra orou Sabat am gumagaya' ra nabantuan Nano,
am bansukon Ku baloi sambayangan Kuno.
Taak-taak simbalui ondo' pataakon min ra altar Kuno apuon Ku.
Baloi Kuno sabiton ra baloi pakiasian ru nansalinut bansa'.”
Gitio noyo ragu ru
ondo' nangator ra Israil muli' intor ra namatiran,
“Ibiton Ku ulun-ulun ra bokon
koson sumimpung risilo ondo' nakatampos noyo timung.”
Nanusub
Kon ru
Koson ilo ra uku' moroot ondo' kalo maasug-asug. Tingganai-tingganai raginio kalo makarati'. Sigagama' mambaal ra kasagaan ru guang am maguyum ra kalabaan nano galama'.
Mindagu ilo gagaukon no, ‘Pagiginum takau ra wain ra kasuang-suang! Susuab no moonsoi poyo ka raiti'.’ ”
Paat ra ulun moonsoi matoi, kolondo' osoi pana makarati' kapoam mampalio riso. Kaa' paat ra ilo matoi, makalabus ilo ra karaat.
Makaalap ilo ra kaansayan am tumangus ra ralalom ru lobong.
Ibok kano, akau ulun makatula. Polosoon akau akimin! Laat mini koson ra ulun mangurana', ulun ondo' masaga' mansawa', am ulun mantalan ra inan.
Osoi kia kulion mino? Akau ulun maabau-abau, osoi kia kakuritan mino?
Sumamba kau ra dewa-dewa kalabungan am mansawa' ra saau ru puun-puun keramat. Pataakon min anak-anak mino koson ra taak simbalui giu' ra lapak ru bulur batu, giu' ra limayak sungoi.
Alapon min batu-batu malamog intor ra sungoi, am sambaan io koson ra sinungkalalaing. Wain am gandum saukon min ra taak ra sinungkalalaing no. Indoson min kia ra kasagain Ku ngaangai' no?
Mongoi kau ra tampak ru gunung ondo' mangasawat koson mapataak ra taak simbalui am mangimong ra saga' ru guang mino.

Sinungkalalaing pabantaan min ra talikur ru kulobon mino. Tatangon min Aku. Lumabas kau am tumampak ra kaalangan ondo' maayo mababaya' ra kubayau mino: ulun ondo' binayaran maa' raginio marulug kau. Ginio noyo ralan mangimong ra saga' ru guang mino.
Mampakai kau ra umau ondo' maamis owou am sumamba ra Dewa Molok. Manusub kau ra ulun mongoi ra pagun-pagun maalur, am niayuk giu' ra pagun ru ulun matoi.
Maagui kau maguyum ra sinungkalalaing ra bokon, kalo masaga' kau tumangus. Indoson min sinungkalalaing mino makapangikang ramuyun saboi akau kalo maagui.
Mindagu
Indoson min binaal mino motopot, kaa' pasalulaan Ku kalaatan toojo mino, am sinungkalalaing mino kalo makapangindangan ramuyun.

Paat ra akau mampiau makiindangan, polosoon sinungkalalaing mino mamayag ramuyun! Sinungkalalaing no mangatatak masiob ru angin! Kaa' ulun ondo' mangintopot Raki' makatungkus ra pagun ti. Sumamba ilo Raki' ralalom ru Baloi Kuno.”
Mindagu

Aku noyo i Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga' am Matulai Kaga', ondo' maayag ra sabuoi-buoi no. Mayan Aku ra intok masawat am matulai, kaa' mayan Aku niayuk mababaya' ra ulun ondo' minggana' guang am ondo' timinalikur intor ra tula, koson mapatapuli' ra ambiluo am kalansanan nilono.
Aku noyo napaayag ra ulun Kuno. Kalo rayusin Ku manguu' risilo, am kalo masalok sumangit risilo.
Sumangit Aku risilo sabap ra tula nilo am luung nilo. Ginio sabap no ra Aku nangukum am nangiruan risilo. Kaa' mokotog ulu nilono am maya' noyo ra ralan galama'.
Nakito Ku noyo paliso nilono, kaa' mamali' Aku risilo. Kitangon Ku ilo am mangindangan risilo. Bansukon Ku guang ru ulun ondo' mangulir.
Pababansayan pataakon Ku ra ngaangai' ulun, io pana mamaar kapoam maalur! Babason Ku ulun Kuno.
Kaa' ulun malaat koson ra raat ondo' makakinulun am kalo igondo' kaliuk; aug no magibit ra ginsamol am losok.
Ulun makatula kalo maayag.”
Mindagu

Moonong orou ilo sumamba Raki', am makibala' ilo ra atan kasagaan Kuno, koson ayuk ilo no mambaal ra moonsoi, am gumagaya' ra ukum Kuno. Mindagu ilo ra matasu' ilo sumamba Raki' am kitaakon nilo ukum Kuno ondo' matimpok.”
Mangkuot bansa' raginio, “Atan pakuan mampali amon ru
Mindagu
Liliwa' mampali, magagansang kau am magagabu' am lumaat. Indoson mino ralan ra mampali mino manguyog Raki' koson mangkirongog ra pakiasian mino?

Paat ra akau mampali, imboloon min inan mino; ulu pakukuon min koson ra raun ru sakot liminakut. Pabingkalon min konoon karung am manatak ra kaau, am mombolong ra rasawat nano. Ginio kia inggalanin min ra pali? Indoson min kasagain Kuno baal min raginio?
Gitio noyo pali ra kasagaan Kuno: Iruo' noyo bangkil kaimbalaan am saanin ra kolondo' katimpakan, am palabuso' noyo ulun-ulun ondo' inimbolo'.

Pataako' noyo akanon muno ra ulun naitilan, apuo' noyo ulun-ulun musikin ondo' kolondo' ayanan ra baloi muno. Ulun nagibaang anii' ra saluar am bayang, am pai' inggio' pabukat muno ondo' maaya' indanganon.
Sinda pana sumila' rirun koson ra susuab ti, am pipilat muno mapali' mataki'. Masalok Aku mabaya' ramuyun koson mamayag ramuyun. Ratangan Kuno manindung ramuyun intor ra nansalinut linsuk.
Bulintok ra akau makiasi', iowon Ku. Bulintok ra akau mampiau, tumaam Aku.
Pai' boo pangimpai ra akau ngai', langgai' noyo pantutulaan am manimbaal ra ragu.
Paakano' noyo ulun naitilan am indangano' noyo ulun-ulun ondo' inimpayan. Amon ru makapambaal kau koson raginio, kalandaman pana giu' ra liliut mino masauk matawang koson ra orou ti.

Masalok Aku maningganai ramuyun am mamasug ramuyun giu' ra tana' mapua'; Aku magalung ramuyun maa' raginio maligag kau am maikang. Akau koson ra taman ondo' maulian ra timug no, koson ra taur ru timug ondo' kalo igondo' mapua'.

Bandar ondo' lair noyo nasauk ra tuntur ru napuutan baalon min sagulio' ra nambaalan lair. Piawon kau ra ‘Bansa' ondo' nambaal saguli' ra timbok-timbok am nambaal saguli' ra baloi-baloi ondo' natutuk.’ ”
Mindagu
Akau pana maansukan sabap ra mangurumat Raki'. Saukon Takamin ra urumaton ra titikop ru tana'. Bayag mino mototop ra bansuk intor ra tana' longgom ri Jakub, kinamatuaan min. Aku,
Pai' karaa' ra
Sabap ra kalaatan mino ra Io pana kalo mangkirongog bulintok ra akau makiasi' Riso. Tula-tula mino napatuliar ramuyun intor ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Nakasala kau sabap ra magabau am sumaindang, malaat am mamatoi.

Minongoi kau pantagi' ra makama kabalu' pana kolondo' sasaban am pinatasan ra kalo matimpok. Magabau kau am ingain min ondo' kolondo' onong; mampaguang kau koson mampajamar ra ulun bokon am mambaal ra kalaatan.

Inatangan min ondo' malaat magibit ra kapatayan koson ra talu' ru kukuo mabisa'. Amon talu' no babakon, mingkual noyo kukuo no. Guangon raginio kolondo' noyo toojo onong no ramuyun, koson ra konoon binaal intor ra tambaloi ru lawa'!
Rayusin min mangatang ra malaat, am intakiin min mambaal. Kalo pansagulian guang mampatoi kau ra ulun ondo' kolondo' sala. Ati ayuk sukuan min, mapatatang kau ra napuutan am kapusaan.
Kalo mompogogot kau ra pababansayan, am ngaangai' binaal mino kalo matimpok. Ralan mino mampipitol, am ulun maya' ra ralan raginio kolondo' kaansukan.
Mindagu bansa' raginio ri Aki Kapuuno',
“Ragino nakapandai akai
kua Okou kalo namayag ramon
intor ra ulun-ulun ondo' mangimbolo' ramon.
Maginaa akai ra matawang,
kaa' kalandaman ayuk mokoondo'.
Akai sakangkam-kangkam koson ra ulun bolou;
ra bulintok mampayung orou makasaru akai koson ra mampayung rondom;
ra tatanga' ru ulun naayag akai koson ayuk ra ulun minatoi.
Malaa' akai am mangiluk guang;
maguyum akai ra katimpakan, kaa' kolondo';
lumansan akai ra pamayagan, kaa' banangan ayuk.
Masuang kaga' kalaatan mai Rirun;
tula-tula mai manguu' ramon.
Topot-topot mai malimanan kalaatan mai,
am makapandai ra tula-tula mai.
Lumungkang akai am gumuor ra
am kalo masaga' maya' ri Aki Kapuuno' mai.
Nangimbolo' akai ra ulun bokon am liminayau;
pangkaraan mai nakalayau, am ragu-ragu mai abau ayuk.
Ukum ra matimpok pinatiran,
am katimpakan pinainggalur.
Kabanisan ru guang kalo lioon ra intok nasuangan,
kaansayan paingkiingon.
Kolondo' boo ulun mabanis guang,
saboi osoi minggalur ra kalaatan,
io galama' masauk ra mausung ru kalaatan.”
Mangimuag Io sabap ra kolondo' ulun rumatong am kolondo' ulun manungka'. Ginio ra mamakai Io ra kuasa' Nano galama' koson mamayag am mapamanang risilo.
Katimpakan pakayon Nano koson ra bayang basi' am pamayagan koson ra tupi' basi'. Gogoton Nano koson manapuli' ra baal raginio am balasin kalo katimpakan.
Ukumin Nano pantula' Nano sumugut ra binaal nilo, makaaya' niayuk ulun ondo' minayan ra pagun-pagun maalur.
Intor ra sirangon suku' ra kalasaan, moonong ulun malaa' ra katulayan am kuasa' Nano. Matong Io koson ra timug ru sungoi ondo' maaug am koson ra bagiu'.
Kon ru

Mambaal Aku ra nabantuan ramuyun: Aniin Takamin ra kuasa' Kuno am pangilaan Kuno ra sabuoi-buoi no. Ilaa' noyo anak-anak mino maa' raginio ilo pana makapangila' raginio saboi papag ka pagag ragino am saboi ra sabuoi-buoi no.”
Tirong no, am kasauk no ra sinda, okou Jirusalim,
sabap ra sinda pamayagan muno minatong noyo;
I Aki Kapuuno' nanaak rirun ra sinda intor ra katulayan Nano.
Tana' ti natikop ra kalandaman,
bansa'-bansa' tinauban ra kalandaman;
kaa' sinda ru
sinda rinatangan Muno masauk motopot ra rasawat muno.
Bansa'-bansa' ra bokon matong saguguluyur ra sinda muno,
raja'-raja' nabunduk ru sinda siminila' koson rirun.
Ilai' noyo atan masauk ra libung muno;
ulun muno timinimung koson muli' rirun.
Anak ungkuyon muno minuli' intor ra pagun maalur,
am anak ruandu' muno kinubibil.
Makito mu baal raginio am bulos muno maamis ra ilain;
maansukan kaga' guang muno am maayo guang.
Rapu' ru bansa'-bansa' poropogon rirun,
kinalangkayaan intor ra sandaup ru raat tumuluk rirun.
Kafilah-kafilah matong intor ra Midian am Ipa.
Matong ilo intor ra Syiba am magibit ilo ra mas am kaminyan.
Potonowon nilo baal ra moonsoi ondo' binaal ru
Sampanon ru domba intor ra Kidar am domba gawayan intor ra Nibayot
ibiton rirun koson ra taak simbalui,
am pataakon ra rasawat ru altar koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Saukon ru
Atan kia mansiab koson ra gaun,
koson ra susuit asang ondo' mansiab muli'?
Ginio noyo kapal-kapal ondo' magibit muli'
ulun ri Aki Kapuuno' intor ra pagun-pagun maalur.
Pirok am mas inibit nilo
koson mapatulai ra inggalan ru
i Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil, i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' matulai
ondo' nangkinibit ra bansa'-bansa' mangurumat ra ulun Nano.
Mindagu
“Ulun bansa' ra suai mambaal saguli' ra timbok muno,
am raja'-raja' nilono magayam rirun.
Ragili nangukum Aku rirun ralalom ru sangit Kuno,
kaa' ragino Aku masaga' makaasi' rirun.
maa' raginio raja'-raja' ru bansa' suai ondo' rinakop
magibit ra okou lumangkaya'.
Kaa' bansa'-bansa' ondo' kalo gumagaya' rirun
iono pusoon lingono'.
Tataun sipris, tataun juniper, am tataun pain,
tataun ra moonsoi kaga' intor ra kataunan Libanon,
ibiton koson manirong rirun, okou Jirusalim,
koson mangindon ra Baloi Kuno am mapatulai ra bandar Kuno.
Ngaangai' ulun ondo' nakaili' nagasab rirun matong migulatur ra kalayam muno.
Manabit ilo rirun ra ‘Bandar ru
‘Sion, Bandar ri Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil, i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' matulai’.
Okou kalo tatangon am kalo boo kasisangin,
am kalo polosoon koson ra bandar ondo' nokoloso am masiluk.
Saukon Tokou ra urumaton am maantak,
intok kaansukan ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Bansa'-bansa' am raja'-raja' magalung rirun,
koson ra sangulun ina' magalung ra anak nano.
Makapandai kou ra Aku,
am ra i Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil, i Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa', Mamumuli' rirun.
Ibitin Tokou ra mas koson suali ru gangsa',
pirok koson suali ru basi',
gangsa' koson suali ru tataun,
am basi' koson suali ru batu.
Ilo mangunguasa' muno kalo boo mangimbolo' rirun;
mangkinibit Aku risilo mamarinta ra matimpok am kalinuos ayuk.
Kalaatan kalo boo maining,
pagun muno kalo boo makaliman ra kapusaan.
Koson ra timbok, manindung Aku am manungka' rirun;
omporon mu Aku sabap ra Aku mamamayag rirun.
bulan kalo boo suminda rirun bulintok molondom,
Aku,
tampulawon Tokou ra katulayan Kuno.
Bulintok ru kapaganan muno maampus.
Aku,
mantilayun poyo intor ra mato ru orou am bulan.
Mamagun muno mambaal ra baal ondo' motopot,
am momolonggom ra pagun ti ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Ilo koson ra tutuu' ondo' tinanom Kuno, ampos ru inangun Kuno,
koson mapaintalang ra kuasa' maayo Kuno.
Io pana pongkotob mino ra kalo masuang am asasabin
masauk ra bansa' maikang.
Bulintok raginio ra tauli no,
Aku,
Io nampili' raki' am nanusub raki'
koson mapatanou ra tanou moonsoi ra ulun musikin,
koson mapatapuli' ra ulun natutuk guang,
koson mapatanou ra ulun rinakop
ra ilo palabuson mataki',
am ra ulun-ulun ralalom ru pangaputan
ra paingkualon ilo.
ra mamaar noyo bulintok ru
koson mangansuk ra ngaangai' ondo' mangiluk guang,
am mambalos ra pantula'-pantula' nilono;
koson mapabansuk ra ulun ondo' mangulir giu' ra Sion,
maansayan am niayuk maansukan, sala' ka pangilukan,
rimbai pangamparan, sala' ka pangilukan.
Masauk ilo koson ra puun
ondo' tinanom galama' ru
Mambaal ilo ra atan ondo' motopot,
am i Aki Kapuuno' omporon sabap binaal Nano.
Baalon nilo saguli'
bandar-bandar ondo' nakalair noyo napuut,
am mapabigor ra intok-intok
ondo' nakalair noyo masiluk.
Akau ulun Kuno, ulun bansa' suai mangandoi ramuyun.
Ilo magalung ra bibiag mino
am mangandoi ra tana' am umo ru anggur mino.
Piawon kau koson ra imam-imam ru
koson ra ulipon ri Aki Kapuuno' takau.
Makasia' kau ra kinalangkayaan ru bansa'-bansa',
am mamanggo makaalap ra kinalangkayaan no.
Kalo boo tauyuon am asabin kau.
Mayan kau ra pagun min galama',
kinalangkayaan mino masauk induo ruang;
bansuk mino mantilayun ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Mindagu
am masisang Aku ra pangimbalaan am kalaatan.
Ralalom ru gagaya' manaak Aku ra tangguang ra ulun Kuno;
mambaal Aku ra nabantuan ondo' mantilayun risilo.
Papag nilono mauligan kaga' ra ati ayuk intok,
anggagakon ra ginio ngai' ru bansa';
moonong ulun ra makakito makapandai ilo
ra ilo noyo bansa' ondo' binarakat Kuno.”
Baal ru Jirusalim koson ra sangulun uoton
ondo' nalimpor ra kuliamos makaantak.
Ginio niayuk ri Aki Kapuuno' mapapakai ra pamayagan am kamanangan ra Jirusalim.
Koson ra unor pinatias
tumuu' am sumawat,
ginio niayuk ra
am ngaangai' bansa' mongompor riso.
Sabap ra Jirusalim mindagu aku;
kalo mongkoror aku saboi ra Jirusalim bayagon,
am kamanangan no makatampulau koson ra pilasut bulintok molondom.
Okou Jirusalim, bansa'-bansa' magilong ra kamanangan muno,
raja'-raja' magilong ra kaantakan muno!
Sabiton kou ra inggalan bagu,
inggalan ondo' tinaakan galama' ru
Masauk kou koson ra karaun makaantak ra kalindu' ru
karaun ru pamarintaan ra kalindu' ri Aki Kapuuno' muno.
Kalo boo sabiton kou “Ondo' Tinatang”,
pagun muno kalo boo sabiton “Ondo' Masilukan”.
Kaa' sabiton kou “Ondo' Tagamin ri Aki Kapuuno'”,
pagun muno sabiton “Ondo' Nakapaguot”
sabap ra
am masauk koson ra ralaki ru pagun muno.
Koson ra buayoi maguot ra sangulun ralaa,
ginio niayuk ri Namangun rirun maguot rirun.
Koson ra ungkuyon maguot maansukan magilong ra ruandu' uoton,
ginio niayuk ri Aki Kapuuno' muno maansukan rirun.
Giu' ra timbok muno, okou Jirusalim, paayanon Ku mantatamung;
orou rondom kalo mokopongkoror ilo,
kaa' musiti' ilo mapakara' ra
maa' raginio kalo malilianan No.
Musiti' ilo marayus mapakara' Riso,
saboi Io mapatapuli' ra Jirusalim,
am saukon ginio ra bandar
ondo' sasabiton ra titikop ra tana' ti.
am suguton ginio maya' ra kuasa' Nano.
“Gandum mino kalo boo akanon ru pantula' mino, am wain binaal min intor ra kapaganan mino,
kalo boo inumon ru ulun bansa' suai.
Kaa' akau ondo' napatias am nangkumos ra gandum
makasia' ra ampos nano am mongompor ra
Akau nangupu' ra kawa' ru anggur
makasia' ra wain giu' ra liliut ru Baloi Kuno.”
Akau namagun ru Jirusalim, ingkual no intor ra bandar,
am pambaal ra ralan ondo' bayaan ru ulun mino ondo' minuli' intor ra pamatiran.
Baalo' noyo santaun sangkul; patiri' noyo batu-batu!
Pabigoro' noyo bandira' maa' raginio bansa'-bansa' makapandai
“Balai' noyo namagun ru Jirusalim,
Ulun ondo' binayag Nano inibit No mababaya' Riso.”
Piawon kau ra “Ulun Ondo' Matulai”,
“Ulun Ondo' Binayag ru
Jirusalim sabiton ra “Bandar Ondo' Tinagaman ri Aki Kapuuno'”,
“Bandar Ondo' Kalo Iniruanan ri Aki Kapuuno'”.
“Io
“Kua kia ra arara' boo ra kinalia' ru bayang Nano, koson ra binayang ru ulun mangagik ra kawa' ru anggur?”
Bulintok no koson mamayag ra ulun Kuno nasaboi noyo; bulintok no koson mangukum ra pantula'-pantula' Kuno nasuku' noyo.
Mangimuag Aku sabap kolondo' sangulun pana paat Aku maguyum ra ulun mangindangan Raki'. Kaa' sangit Kuno ra mapaangan mapasauk ra Aku maikang, am Aku namanang ra kaikangan Kuno galama'.
Ralalom ru sangit kikinjangin Ku ngaangai' bansa' am manutuk risilo. Patulukon Ku raraa' nilono ra tana'.”
Tunungon ku togom ru
omporon ku Io sabap nansalinut binaal Nano.
Binarakat No ulun ru Israil saboi liminuab
sabap ra asi' am togom Nano kolondo' pupus.
Mindagu
intor ra nansalinut kaimbalaan. Sala' ka ulun sinusub kapoam malaikat, kaa'
kaa' ilo gumuor Riso am mangkinibit ra
Kaa' ilo pana nakakara' bulintok ra galing i, ioginio paat ri Musa, ulipon ru
Ati kia
Koson ra kuda masigo kalo makasaru ilo sabap ra
Ati poyo kulaan ra tambiag ibiton giu' ra limayak malabung, ginio niayuk
Iou
Okou noyo Ama' mai. Kinamatuaan maili i Abragam am i Jakub kalo makaulig ramon, kaa' Okou noyo Ama' mai, iou

Kaa' ragino kua polosoo' Mu akai makalayau? Kua polosoo' Mu akai bambalingatan saboi akai kalo malaa' Rirun? Saguli' no ramon, sabap risilo ondo' mangandoi Rirun, am sabap risilo ondo' masalok masauk ra longgom Muno.
Akai ulun Muno ra mapasau ininggalaran ru pantula' mai sangkinolor. Manginjang-nginjang ilo ra Baloi Muno,
am pamakuan Muno ramon koson ra kalo igondo' Kou nanguasa' ramon, am koson ra kalo igondo' akai kasauk ra ulun Muno.
Rilako' noyo limbowon am tuun no, iou
Gunung no monontol koson ra timug rumiri' ondo' pinarakan ra rasawat ru apui. Ibok noyo patalango' noyo kuasa' Muno ra pantula'-pantula' Muno, am sauko' noyo bansa'-bansa' monontol ra saang Muno.
Nambaal Kou ra baal ondo' makalalaa', ondo' kalo maguang mai. Timinuun Kou, am gunung-gunung mauyog sabap ra malaa'.
Kalo igondo' osoi-osoi pana makakito kapoam mangkirongog ra suai intor Rirun, mokoondo' i aki kapuuno' ondo' mambaal ra baal koson raginio ra ulun lumansan riso.
Apuon Mu ulun mabanis guang, ondo' maayag sumugut ra kasagaan Muno. Sumangit Kou ramon, kaa' akai lakat makatula. Ioupana Okou sumangit kaga', rayusin mai mambaal ra sala intor poyo ra galing i.
Akai ngaangai' makatula, baalon mai ra moonsoi no pana majamol kaga'. Sabap ra tula mai, akai mapuso ra tana' ti koson ra saap masiob ru angin.
Kolondo' osoi pana makiasi' Rirun. Kolondo' osoi pana minggaar Rirun koson makiindangan. Nansibuni Kou intor ramon, am mopoloso
Kaa' Okou noyo Ama' mai iou
Ginio ra pai' noyo ianga' sangit ramon, kapoam mangkara' ra tula mai ra sabuoi-buoi no. Akai ulun Muno, pakaasi' noyo ramon.
Bandar-bandar Muno ra matulai masauk koson ra tana' kaagisan. Jirusalim masauk ra naluyuan am nasisiluk ayuk
am Baloi ru
Iou
Masalok Aku tumampos mangapu ra ulun Kuno, kaa' masalok ilo mokotog guang am mambaal ra baal ondo' kalo matanda' am niayuk sumugut ra kasagaan nilo galama'.
Mangkinibit ilo ra tanduusin Ku sangit Kuno. Mapataak ilo ra taak simbalui giu' ra taman ru dewa-dewa
Bulintok ra rondom mongoi ilo ra luang ru batu am kalabangan koson makipinson ra ulun-ulun namagatoi no. Mangakan ilo ra kual ru bauwi am manginum ra ruu' ru kual ondo' pinataak ra sinungkalalaing.

Kopongo raginio mindagu ilo, ‘Inggalur no ramon. Pai' kambong ramon sabap ra akai ti mapasau kaga' ramuyun!’ Masisang Aku ra ulun makapaliso koson raginio. Sangit Kuno risilo koson ra apui ondo' kalo igondo' kalasa'.
Inaru' Ku noyo ukuman tayar nilono. Ukuman no tinulisan Ku noyo. Kalo polosoon Ku binaal nilono. Balasin Ku

tula nilono am tula ru kinamatuaan nilono. Magasab ilo Raki' ra nonolob ra kaminyan tayar ru dewa-dewa giu' ra intok sambaan giu' ra bulur. Ginio ra mangukum Aku risilo nogondo' koson ra binaal nilo ra galing i.”
Mindagu
Barakaton Ku ulun ru Israil intor ra bansa' ru Jiuda. Papag nilo mompolonggom ra tana' kagunungan Kuno. Ulun pinili' Kuno ondo' mangandoi ayuk Raki' no mayan ra giu' no.
Sumamba ilo Raki', am maningganai ra tambiag nilo mongoi ra Dataran Saron tampilon ra kalasaan, am giu' ra Limayak Akor tampilon ra sirangon.
Kaa' sala' ka ginio pupus mino ondo' manatang Raki' am niayuk kalo mampalio ra Sion, bulur Kuno ondo' matulai,
Malarom patayan mino sabap ra akau kalo tumaam bulintok ra Aku mampiau, am kalo mangkirongog kau bulintok ra Aku mindagu. Singonon min kalo gumagaya' Raki' am singonon min mambaal ra malaat.
Sotopot no, ulun ra sumamba Raki' am gumagaya' Raki' makaalap ra masuang akanon am inumon, kaa' maitilan am paason kau. Maansukan ilo kaa' asabin kau.
Maririmbai ilo am maansukan, kaa' akau mantangi' am malawo guang.
Ulun pinili' Kuno mamakai ra inggalan mino koson ra pagulasan, Aku,

Osoi-osoi ondo' mayan ra pagun raginio, am ondo' makibarakat makitaak ra barakat ri Aki Kapuuno' ondo' mampagagaya'. Osoi-osoi magibot, magibot ilo ralalom ru inggalan ri Aki Kapuuno' ondo' mampagagaya'. Sabap no kaimbalaan ra galing i natatak am linilianan.”
Pakaansuk noyo am kaantak noyo ra sabuoi-buoi no sabap ra inangun Kuno. Jirusalim bagu ondo' inangun Kuno mototop ra kaansukan am namagun nano maantak guang.
Aku galama' maantak guang sabap ra Jirusalim am mamagun nano. Giu' no kolondo' boo tinangian kapoam mampiau koson makiindangan.

Anak-anak kalo matoi bulintok lakat lalagang, am ulun maawar painawo. Ilo ondo' makaumur maatus ngambilor karaan ra mamulok. Osoi matoi ra kalo poyo makasuku' maatus ngambilor karaan ra natiu' ra ukuman Kuno.

Ulun ondo' manambaloi ayanin no; baloi-baloi no kalo ayanin ru ulun bokon. Ilo ondo' mantanom ra anggur makasia' ra ampos nano; ampos raginio kalo masiaan ru ulun bokon. Ulun Kuno maawar painawo koson ra puun. Majala' ilo makasia' ra ampos ru kandoi nilono.
Kandoi nilono masugut, am anak nilono kalo malumpa' ru karaat. Barakatin Ku ilo am papag nilono ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Ra kalo poyo mopongo ilo makiasi', iniou Ku noyo pakiasian nilono.
Taani am anak domba masisimpung mangakan, singa' mangakan ra rami koson ra sapi', am kukuo kalo boo makakalalaa'. Giu' ra Sion, bulur Kuno ra matulai,
Aku galama' namangun ra tana' ti. Maansayan Aku ra ulun minggana' guang am tumalikur ra tula, ondo' malaa' am gumagaya' Raki'.

Ulun raginio mambaal maya' ra kasagaan ru guang nilo. Pangkaraan nilo manimbalui ra sapi' gawayan nogondo' ayuk ra mampatoi ra ulun koson pataakon koson ra taak simbalui, mapataak ra anak domba kapoam mamandak ra liog ru uku', mapataak ra gandum kapoam raraa' ru bauwi; monolob ra kaminyan kapoam makiasi' ra sinungkalalaing. Masaga' ilo sumamba maya' ra ralan majamol kaga'.

Ginio ra palumpaan Ku karaat no risilo, ioginio karaat ra kalaanin nilo. Baal raginio masauk sabap ra bulintok ra Aku mampiau, kolondo' sangulun pana tumaam, am bulintok ra Aku mindagu, kolondo' sangulun pana mangkirongog. Masaga' ilo manggal Raki' am mambaal ra malaat.”
Rongogo' noyo ragu ru
Rongogo' noyo posogolos ralalom ru bandar. Bolos intor ra Baloi ru
Nakaili' kia osoi-osoi nakakito kapoam nokorongog ra baal koson raginio? Nakaili' kia rondo' bansa' inanak ra songorou? Sion kalo boo mabuoi maimbolo'; bansa' raginio anakon mataki'.
Indoson min polosoon Ku ulun Kuno tinayon saboi maukop bulan, am kalo mataak anakon.”
Pakaansuk noyo mababaya' ra Jirusalim,
akau ngai' ondo' monogom ra bandar no.
Pakaansuk noyo mababaya' ra Jirusalim ragino,
akau ngai' ondo' nantangi' ra galing i.
Makasia' kau ra kinalangkayaan nano
koson ra lalagang makasia' ra gatas ru ina' nano.
Mindagu
Bansukon Takamin giu' ra Jirusalim, koson ra ina' mapabansuk ra anak nano.
Paat ra akau makakito ra kasaukan raginio, maansukan kau. Maligag kau koson ra sakot malabung. Bagu no makapandai kau ra Aku,
Matong
Mabaya' ra apui am ilang, ukumin No ngaangai' ulun ru tana' ti ondo' mapandayan No makasala; masuang ulun ukumin ra matoi.
Mindagu
Makapandai Aku
am makaliman ra Aku noyo mangukum risilo.

Kaa' santayaran risilo no bayagon Ku, am pootoron Ku ra bansa'-bansa' giu' ra pagun-pagun maalur, ondo' kalo poyo igondo' pokorongog ra katulayan Kuno, kapoam makakito ra kinaayo Kuno am kuasa' Kuno. Pootoron Ku ilo giu' ra Sipanyol, Libia
Ibiton nilo ngaangai' ulun ru bansa' mino muli' intor ra pagun-pagun raginio koson ra taak nilo Raki'. Sumakoi ilo ra kuda, baghal, unta, kurita' kuda am pedati mongoi ra bulur Kuno ra matulai
Santayaran risilo no pasaukon Ku ra imam am ulun ru Liwi.
Paat ra moonong pangiantakan ra Bulan Bagu am orou Sabat, ulun intor ra ngaangai' pagun matong sumamba Raki' giu' ra Jirusalim.

Bulintok ra ilo muli', makito nilo baangkai-baangkai ru ulun ondo' giminuor Raki'. Ulor mangakan ra baangkai nilono kalo matoi, am apui monolob risilo no kalo malasa'. Pagilayan raginio makalalaa' kaga' ra ngaangai' ulun.”
Kitab ti mokoondo' ra ragu-ragu ri Jirimia anak ri Ilkia, sangulun ra imam intor ra bandar Anatot giu' ra wilayah Binjamin.
Mindagu
Kopongo raginio mindagu poyo
Indagu
“Ra Aku kalo poyo nampasauk rirun ra okou tinayon ru ina' muno, am ra kalo poyo inanak, pinili' am linantik Ku noyo okou masauk ra nabi tayar ra bansa'-bansa'.”
Taam aku, “Iou
Kaa' taam
Pai' no kalaa' risilo sabap ra mabaya' Aku rirun koson manindung rirun. Aku,
Kopongo raginio patutuyo' ru
Paat ra orou raiti' mangani' Aku rirun ra kuasa' ra bansa' am pamarintaan koson mampagaba' am mamparatu', koson mamuso am mampaluir, koson manirong am mopotolorog.”
Pangkuot
Taam aku, “Rondo' raan ru badam.”
Indagu
Pangkuot poyo
Taam aku, “Giu' ra tampilon ralayo, nakito ku rondo' pagangan ondo' suang no rumiri', am pagangan no mamaar matingkaung ra tampilon ragiti.”
Indagu

sabap ra mampiau Aku ra ngaangai' bansa' giu' ra tampilon ralayo matong. Raja'-raja' nilo manirong ra panturungan ru raja' giu' ra kulobon-kulobon garabang ru Jirusalim am giu' ra liliut ru timbok no, am niayuk giu' ra liliut ru bandar-bandar ra bokon giu' ra Jiuda.
Mangukum Aku ra ulun Kuno sabap ra tula nilo; mangiruan ilo Raki' am mampataak ra taak simbalui ra tuhan-tuhan ra bokon. Nambaal ilo niayuk am siminamba ra sinungkalalaing no.

Okou Jirimia, tampos no! Ugar no am balai' ilo intor ra ngaangai' ondo' nanusuban Kuno rirun. Pai' no kalaa' risilo maa' raginio kalo mangkinibit Aku rirun malaa' poyo paat ra okou muma' risilo ra maagu no.

Okou Jirimia, rongog no! Anggalon kou ru ngaangai' mamagun ru pagun ti, ioginio raja'-raja' ru Jiuda, pagawai-pagawai ru pamarintaan, imam-imam am mamagun. Kaa' paat ra orou raiti' mangani' Aku rirun ra kaikangan koson manggal risilo. Masauk kou koson ra bandar mokoondo' ra kubu, koson ra lugu' basi', am koson ra timbok tambaga'. Kalo makapangala ilo rirun, sabap mabaya' Aku rirun koson manindung rirun. Aku
Nanusub
mampatanou ra tanou ragitio ra ngaangai' ulun giu' ra Jirusalim,
“Mamagun kau ru Israil, nakara' Ku ra mapara' boo gagaya' min
paat ra akau lakat poyo mamulok,
am mapara' boo gayo ru togom min Raki'
paat ra akau nasauk ra ulun inuot ragili.
Minaya' kau Raki' nansail ra tana' kaagisan,
nansail ra tana' ondo' kolondo' poyo tinanaman.
Mamagun kau ru Israil, akau longgom Kuno galama',
akau longgom Kuno ondo' tinagaman.
Mamparatong Aku ra kapaganan am karaat
ra ngaangai' ulun ondo' mampajamar ramuyun.
Aku,
Rongog no ra bala' ru
Indagu
“Atan kia panguwan ru kinamatuaan min Raki'?
Kua kia talikur ilo Raki'?
Sinamba nilo sinungkalalaing ondo' kolondo' onong,
saboi ilo galama' nasauk ra kolondo' onong.
Kalo mampalio ilo Raki',
kabalu' pana binayag Ku ilo intor ra Misir
am naningganai risilo nansail ra tana' kaagisan:
tana' kolondo' tutuu' am bulur ru agis,
tana' mapua' am makalalaa',
tana' kolondo' ulun namagun
am kolondo' ulun mansail.
Magibit Aku risilo mongoi ra tana' ondo' malabung
koson sumia' ra ampos no am ngaangai' ondo' moonsoi.
Kaa' linumo nilo tana' Kuno;
jinaka' nilo pagun ondo' pinataak Kuno risilo.
Kalo nangkuot imam-imam,
‘Ati boo
Imam-imam Kuno pana kalo nakaulig Raki'.
Panguasa'-panguasa' giminuor Raki';
nabi-nabi minindagu ralalom inggalan ru Baal
am sinamba sinungkalalaing ondo' kolondo' onong.”
Indagu
“Ginio boo ra paraguon Ku baal Kuno poyo ra ulun Kuno.
Paraguon Ku panguwan ra papag nilo.
Ongoi no ra pulu' Siprus giu' ra tampilon kalasaan,
susubo' ulun mongoi ra tampilon sirangon, giu' ra tana' Kidar.
Makakito kou ra baal koson ragitio kalo igondo' kasauk.
Kolondo' bansa' ra ati pana ondo' nakaili' nangalig ra tuhan nano,
kabalu' pana tuhan-tuhan no i aki kapuuno' ondo' kalo motopot.
Kaa' ulun Kuno nangalig Raki',
i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' nangani' risilo ra intok ondo' matulai,
ra rondo' ondo' kalo mambaal ra atan pana.
Sabap raginio, okou limbowon, kogonggon no!
pangimuag am maliangan,
sabap ra ulun Kuno nambaal ra ruo tula:
nangiruan ilo Raki',
puun ru timug ra mapakaayag ra ulun,
am nangkali ilo ra kulam
ondo' lawasan am kalo mototop ra timug.”
“Israil sala' ka ulipon;
kalo inanak io koson ra ulipon.
Kaa' kua ilowo' io ru pantula' nano?
Pantula' nano mansangal koson ra singa',
am nampasauk ra tana' nano kolondo' tutuu' am masiluk;
bandar-bandar nangaurus, am kolondo' ulun minayan.
Ulun ru Mimpis am Tapanis
namabak ra kuapak nano.
Israil, okou galama' nangkinibit
ra baal ragitio nasauk rirun.
Nangiruan kou Raki',
paat ra Aku naningganai rirun ralalom pangkiralanan muno.
Atan kia banang muno minongoi ra Misir
am nanginum ra timug ru Sungoi Nil?
Atan banang muno minongoi ra Asyur
am nanginum ra timug ru Sungoi Iprat?
Kalaatan muno galama' ondo' mangukum rirun;
maimbolo' kou sabap ra nangiruan Raki'.
Makaliman kou ra mapara' boo pait no am sala no
nangiruan Raki',
am kalo boo gumagaya' Raki'.
Aku,
Indagu
“Alii ra Israil, intor ragili marara' kou mangandoi ayuk Raki';
marara' kou gumagaya' Raki' kapoam sumamba Raki'.
Giu' ra rasawat ru moonong bulur ondo' masawat
am giu' ra saau ru moonong puun tataun masansam,
sumamba kou ra dewa-dewa ru kalabungan.
Nantanom Aku rirun koson ra puun ru anggur linili'
intor ra unor ondo' moonsoi kaga'.
Kaa' ilai' boo, nakulau kou!
Nasauk kou ra puun ru anggur lumayau ondo' kolondo' onong.
Kabalu' pana mariu' kou ra mansabun ra masuang,
kaa' lakat Aku poyo makakito ra itom ru kasalaan muno.
Ati kulaan kia okou mindagu ra kalo majamol kou,
am ra okou kalo igondo' samba ra sinungkalalaing Baal?
Ilai' ga binaal muno giu' ra limayak;
makatula kou ra giu' no.
Koson kou ra unta masigo ondo' makipaa',
ondo' nagisimbul ra giu' am giti, kalo mororo',
am nagisimbul minongoi ra tana' kaagisan
Unta ruandu' kalo maalap ra guut paat makipaa'.
Unta gawayan ondo' mampaa' riso no kalo pana maguguyum;
bulintok mampapaa' masalok matuum unta ruandu'.
Alii ra Israil, pai' ilowo' dewa-dewa,
mapilatan kou ra kalayam,
mapuaan tantalanan muno.
Kaa' mindagu kou, ‘Kalo, kalo makasaguli' aku.
Motogom aku ra dewa-dewa
am masaga' aku maya' risilo.’ ”
Indagu

Ngaangai' kau tauyuon. Akau no minindagu ra rondo' puun tataun koson ra ama' min am rondo' bulur koson ra ina' min. Baal ragitio masauk sabap ra nangiruan kau Raki' am kalo minatong Raki'. Kaa' paat ra akau makakapaganan, piawon min Aku koson mamayag ramuyun.

Ati kia sinungkalalaing dewa ondo' binaal min ni? Paat ra akau makakapaganan, pakibayag kau ra dewa-dewa no, amon ru totopot dewa no masaga'! Okou Jiuda, dewa muno masuang koson ra suang ru bandar mino!
Atan kia butokon min? Kua kia anggal kau Raki'?
Banangan Ku ayuk mangukum ramuyun, sabap ra marara' kau mangapu ra pangilaan Kuno. Koson ra singa' ondo' tatanga' masangit, koon raginio niayuk ra akau namatoi ra nabi-nabi min.

Alii ra ulun ru Israil, rongog no ra ragu Kutu. Igondo' Aku kia koson ra tana' kaagisan ramuyun kapoam koson ra tana' ondo' molondom am makalalaa'? Kaa' kua kia indagu kau ra masaga' kau maya' ra kasagaan galama', am marara' boo sumaguli' Raki'?
Mokoondo' kia ralaa ondo' makalilian ra limpor nano, kapoam ruandu' uoton ondo' makalilian ra bayang nano? Kaa' ulun Kuno nakalilian Raki' ra nabuoi kaga' – suang ru orou no kalo boo mauntob.
Mapandai kau toojo maguyum ra ralan koson mangambi' ra guang ru ambai. Ruandu' ra malaat toojo pana lakat poyo makaigila' ra kalaatan intor ramuyun!
Bayang min natatakan ra raraa' ru ulun musikin am ulun kolondo' sala, sala' ka raraa' ru ulun mantakou ondo' narakop.
Kabalu' pana raginio,
lakat poyo mindagu kau, ‘Kolondo' sala kuno; maaru' kalo boo sumangit
Pinainggana' min kaatangan ru inan sabap minongoi ra dewa ru bansa' bokon. Sindualin kau ru Misir, koson ra akau sinindualan ru Asyur.
Nangiruan kau ra Misir ra ulu pinakuku' sabap ra nasindualan am nauyu'. Aku,
Indagu

Kinami' ilai' rasawat no, giu' ra tampak ru bulur! Ati ra intok ondo' kalo poyo igondo' kou ratong koson mantalan ra inan? Nanturung kou giu' ra kiing ru ralan maginaa ra ulun ondo' masaga' mansilar; okou koson ra ulun ru Arab ondo' magawang ra ulun ipaan giu' ra tana' kaagisan. Jinaka' mu pagun ti ra pansasawaan am kalaatan muno.
Ginio sabap ra rasam kalo rumatu', am rasam paat ra mambusak kalo matong. Nansalu kou ra ulun mantalan ra inan; mailo kou ra mauyu'.
Kaa' raino mindagu kou Raki', ‘Okou noyo ama' kuno. Motogom Kou raki' intor ra aku boborok.
Kalo sumangit Kou ayuk raki'; kalo mantilayun sangit Muno raki'.’ Okou Israil, ginio noyo ondo' raguon muno kaa' binaal mu niayuk ngaangai' kalaatan no.”
Paat ra pamarintaan ru Raja' Josia, indagu
Guang Kuli ru mabaal no ngaangai' no, sumaguli' io Raki'. Kaa' kalo siminaguli' io, am i Jiuda, pabukat nano ondo' kalo gumagaya', nakakito ra ngaangai' binaal nano.

Nakakito niayuk ri Jiuda ra inali am pinaugar Ku Israil, sabap ra nangiruan io Raki' am nasauk ra mantalan ra inan. Kaa' i Jiuda ondo' kalo gumagaya', pabukat ri Israil no, kalo malaa'. I Jiuda pana minaya' nasauk ra mantalan ra inan
am kalo toojo mauyu'. Jinaka' no pagun am nansawa' sabap ra sumamba ra batu am puun tataun.
Kabaal ngaangai' no, i Jiuda ondo' kalo gumagaya' no babaalon ayuk siminaguli' Raki', sabap ra guang nano kalo mabanis. Aku,
Nambala' boo
Nanusub
Pangiou ayuk ra okou makasala am giminuor ra

“Ulun kau ra kalo gumagaya', saguli' kano Raki'; akau longgom Kuno. Mangalap Aku ramuyun, sangulun intor ra moonong bandar, am ruo ngaulun intor ra moonong bansa', am Aku pana magibit ramuyun sumaguli' ra Bulur Sion.
Mangani' Aku ramuyun ra tingganai-tingganai ondo' gumagaya' Raki'. Maningganai ilo ramuyun ra kapintaran am pangaratian.

Kopongo raginio paat ra akau lumanja' suang ra pagun ti, ulun kalo boo mindagu intor ra Kaban Nabantuan Kuno. Kalo boo guangon kapoam karaan nilo ginio; ilo pana kalo boo makapakuan raginio kapoam mambaal ra Kaban Nabantuan ra bokon.
Paat raginio bandar Jirusalim sabiton ra ‘Kurisi' ru
Magamung Israil am Jiuda, mabaya' boo matong intor ra pagun namatiran giu' ra tampilon ralayo. Sumaguli' ilo ra pagun ondo' tinaakan Kuno koson ra tana' tungkuson ra kinamatuaan min.”
Indagu
“Israil, moogot Aku mangapu rirun koson ra anak Kuno,
am mangani' rirun ra pagun ondo' makabansuk ra guang,
pagun ondo' moonsoi kaga' ra titikop ru tana'.
Moogot Aku rirun mampiau Raki' ‘Ama' kuno’,
am kalo noyo boo tumalikur intor Raki'.
Kaa' koson ra andu' ondo' kalo gumagaya',
okou pana kalo gumagaya' Raki'.
Aku,
Morongog bolos giu' ra tampak-tampak ru bulur;
bolos ru ulun ru Israil ondo' mantangi' am makimasi',
sabap ra makatula ilo noyo,
am nakalilian ra
Saguli' no, akau ngaangai' ondo' nangiruan noyo ra
mamabas Io ramuyun am mampasauk ramuyun ra gumagaya'.
Kamin, “Raino matong akai ra
Banangan ayuk akai sumamba ra sinungkalalaing giu' ra tampak-tampak ru bulur! Pangindangan ra Israil matong ayuk intor ra

Kaa' sumamba ra Baal, sinungkalalaing ondo' makauyuyu' no, nangkinibit ramon natatakan ra anak, ungkuyon am niayuk ruandu', am niayuk tinambiag ra sapi' am domba, iono ngaangai' no ondo' piniratan ru kinamatuaan maili intor ra galing i.
Ginio ra, polosoon akai mansaan ra uyu' am polosoon akai asasabin. Akai am kinamatuaan maili masalok makatula ra
Indagu
makapagibot kau ra ralalom ru inggalan Kuno. Mopongo raginio
Indagu
Guuto' min nabantuan min am Aku,
Samputi' noyo bujung giu' ra titikop pagun!
Golok no ra mosongou am matalinaasan.
Susubo' noyo mamagun ru Jiuda am Jirusalim
magiru' ra bandar-bandar mokoondo' ra kubu.
Panulu' no ra ralan mongoi ra Sion!
Ribaki' bayago' inan!
Pai' kalibut!
Tatanga'
am kapusaan maayo intor ra ralayo.
Koson ra singa' mingkual intor ra pansibunian nano,
koon raginio noyo ra i mampaluus ra bansa'-bansa' minintor noyo.
Matong io koson mamuso ra Jiuda.
Bandar-bandar Jiuda masauk ra intok nangapuut,
am kalo ayanin ru ulun.
Ginio ra pantangi' no am panulaboi no,
pambayang no ra konoon karung tatandu' ra mangiluk guang,
sabap ra sangit ru
ra Jiuda kalo poyo nakalinos.
Indagu
Kopongo raginio indagu aku, “Iou
Masuku' paat no ra mamagun ru Jirusalim binalaan ra angin malasu' intor ra tana' kaagisan tatanga' sumiob mongoi risilo. Angin no sala' ka angin ondo' mapasiab ra apol,
kaa' bagiu' mapuor ondo' matong ra susuban ru
Ilai' pantula' matong koson ra gaun. Kurita' kuda nano koson ra bagiu' puting beliung, am kuda nano maribok poyo intor ra susuit kanui. Nalumpa' takau ru karaat! Maluus takau!
Okou Jirusalim, kapasawo' guang muno intor ra ngaangai' kalaatan maa' raginio bayagon kou. Saboi sanggilan kou mangkara' ra malaat?
Ulun-ulun sinusub intor ra bandar Dan am niayuk kabuluran Ipraim matong koson mampatanou ra tanou malaat.
Mampakara' ilo ra bansa'-bansa' am mambala' ra mamagun ru Jirusalim ra pantula' tatanga' matong intor ra pagun ondo' maalur. Pantula' gumolok koson manggal ra bandar-bandar Jiuda
am magawang ra Jirusalim koson ra ulun magalung ra umo. Ngaangai' baal raginio masauk sabap ra mamagun ru Jiuda giminuor noyo ra
Okou Jiuda, okou galama' namparatong ra karaat no rirun. Ralan ru kaayagan am binaal muno ondo' makatula nangkinibit ra ngaangai' ru kaimbalaan no, am nanusuk ra guang muno.
Mapara' boo pari' ru guang kuno.
Kalo boo moorot ku imbolo'.
Guang kutu kobol-kobol,
kalo mokororo' aku,
sabap ra nokorongog aku ra bolos ru bujung,
am golok ru pangayawan.
Karaat mansusunu' matong,
titikop pagun mapuso.
Pulali' ru kim mai linunsai,
konoon-konoon no rinilak.
Saboi sanggilan kia musiti' aku magilong ra kinoporos ru pangayawan,
am rumongog ra bolos ru bujung ondo' makalanit ra talingo?
Indagu
kalo makaulig ilo Raki'.
Koson ilo ra lalaing sasambungon,
kolondo' karatian nilo.
Mapandai ilo toojo mambaal ra malaat,
kaa' mailo mambaal ra moonsoi.”
Tantangin ku tana' ti –
makito ra kolondo' atan pana am mapua'.
Tingaanon ku limbowon –
kolondo' noyo sinda.
Tingaanon ku gunung-gunung –
ngaangai' no nonontol,
am bulur-bulur mangauyog.
Kolondo' nakito ku ra ulun;
susuit pana ngaangai' nansiab.
Tana' malabung nasauk noyo ra tana' kaagisan;
bandar-bandar nangapuut,
sabap ra siminangit kaga'
Minindagu
Tana' ti mangulir;
limbowon pana lumondom.
Nakaindagu noyo
kalo kulawon inatangan.
Namatas Io noyo
am kalo kulawon guang.
Posongonsol pulalai mangkuda am mamanah,
mangkinibit ra ulun magiru' intor ra ngaangai' bandar.
Mokoondo' ulun nagiru' ra kataunan,
ondo' bokon nagaloi ra bulur batu.
Ngaangai' bandar iruanin,
kolondo' ulun ondo' masaga' mayan ra giu' no.
Alii ra Jirusalim, malumpa' kou ru karaat!
Kua pambayang kou ra malia'?
Kua palimpor kou ra mas kapoam pirok,
am niayuk manait ra mato?
Banangan mu ayuk mampapakai!
Ngaangai' ru kubayau muno ra galing i magasab rirun
am niayuk masaga' ilo mamatoi rirun.
Morongog ku bolos mampalaa
koson ra ruandu' maganak;
koson ra golok ru ruandu' ondo' naganak ra anak kasaa'.
Koon raginio noyo tangi' ru Jirusalim ondo' inso-inso,
am niayuk mapatunui ra kalindu' am mindagu,
“Aibui boo raki'!
Matong ilo mamatoi raki'!”
Mamagun kau ru Jirusalim,
ugar kano ra ralan-ralan giu' ra bandar min!
Ilai' giu' ra liliut min!
Ilai' galama'!
Uyumo' giu' ra pasar-pasar!
Mokoondo' kau kia nakatuum ra sangulun
ondo' mabanis guang
am ondo' mirot maa' raginio gumagaya' ri Aki Kapuuno'?
Amon ru mokoondo', mangampun
Kabalu' pana kamin sumamba kau ra
sala' ka ginio guangon min.
Sotopot no gogoton ru
Lambaan No akau, kaa' kalo lioon min.
Popolon No akau, kaa' marara' kau mangapu ra pangilaan.
Mokotog guang min am marara' tumalikur intor ra tula.
Aku pana nangkara',
“Ilo no ulun ayuk ondo' kolondo' napandayan ra atan pana.
Sasala' baalon nilo;
kalo makapandai ra gogoton ri Aki Kapuuno' nilo,
am kasagaan ru
Mongoi aku ra tingganai-tingganai
am mindagu risilo.
Maaru' makapandai ilo ra gogoton ri Aki Kapuuno' nilo,
am susuban ru
Kaa' ilo ngaangai' nangimpai ra kakuasaan ru
am marara' gumagaya' Riso.
Ginio sabap ra ilo pinatoi ru singa' intor ra kataunan;
bibinsangon ilo ru taani intor ra tana' kaagisan,
am ampunguon saugar-ugar giu' ra bandar-bandar nilo.
Amon ru mingkual ulun, bibinsangon nilo,
sabap ra tula nilo masuang kaga';
ruruli' ilo no nangiruan ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Indagu
Nangiruan ilo Raki'
am sumamba ra tuhan ondo' kalo motopot.
Aniin Ku ulun Kuno ra akanon saboi ilo maasug,
kaa' nansawa' ilo
am minongoi ra baloi ru ulun mantalan ra inan.
Koson ilo ra kuda gawayan ondo' molomok am maikang mampaa';
sigagama' lumaai ra andu' ru ulun bokon.
Kalo kia matanda' ra Aku mangukum ra bansa' koson raginio
am mambalos ra binaal nilono?
Mangator Aku ra pantula' koson mampaluyak ra umo ru anggur ru ulun Kuno,
kaa' sala' ka koson mamuso ra malingon.
Manusub Aku ra pantula' mangindaan ra bulisang ru puun ru anggur,
sabap ra bulisang-bulisang no sala' ka Aku tatangan.
Mamagun ru Israil am Jiuda totopot nanumbalik Raki'.
Aku,
Ulun ru
Minindagu ilo ra nabi-nabi no magabau ayuk sabap ra kolondo' ilo ra tanou intor ra
Ulun kau ru Israil, tatanga'
Ulun-ulun mamanah nilo saujor ondo' baani; mampatoi ilo ra kalo makaasi'.

Mangai' ilo ra ampos ru tana' am akanon min; mampatoi ilo ra anak min, ungkuyon am niayuk ruandu'. Simbaluyon nilo sapi' am domba min; pusoon nilo puun ru anggur am puun ru ara min. Bandar-bandar ra makakubu ondo' lansanin min puuton ru saujor nilo.
Indagu

Paat ra ilo mangkuot ra sasaban Kuno nambaal raginio ngaangai', balai' ilo Jirimia, ra koson ra ilo nangiruan Raki' giu' ra pagun nilo galama' am nangandoi ayuk ra dewa-dewa ru bansa' bokon, koson raginio niayuk ilo mangandoi ayuk ra bansa' bokon giu' ra tana' ondo' sala' ka pagun nilo.”
Indagu
Rongog no, ulun kau ra sasambungon am iisan! Makamato kau kaa' kalo makakito; makatalingo kaa' kalo rumongog!
Aku no
Kaa' mokotog guang min am maanggal-anggal; timinalansiang kau am nangiruan Raki'.
Kalo igondo' min karaa' koson mangurumat Raki', alika Aku noyo nangator ra rasam bulintok raun matutu' am bulintok mambusak. Nangani' Aku niayuk ramuyun ra bulintok mangkumos ra moonong bilor.
Kaa' tula min nongompong ra ngaangai' baal moonsoi no saboi ra akau kalo makasia' raginio.
Ulun malaat minayan ra gino ngai' ru ulun Kuno. Koson ilo ra ulun ondo' maginaa ra landak pinasaau koson mamparakop ra susuit, sabap ra pinasaau nilo landak koson mamparakop ra ulun.

Koson ilo ra ulun mamparakop ra susuit ondo' nanuang ra bulansat no ra susuit, sabap ra nanuang ilo ra baloi no ra kuliamos ondo' noowot ra namparuung. Koon raginio noyo nasauk ra ilo makakuasa' am liminangkaya',
am niayuk molomok am moonsoi bayag. Kalaatan nilo kolondo' polos. Kalo mangindangan ilo ra anak nailusan ra matuo, am kalo matimpok ra ulun inimbolo'.
Kaa' Aku,
Rondo' baal ondo' makalalaa' am malaat masauk ra pagun ti:
ngaangai' ondo' rinagu ru nabi-nabi abau ayuk; imam-imam mamarinta maya' ra susuban ru nabi-nabi no, am ulun Kuno masaga' ra baal raginio. Kaa' atan kia ondo' baalon nilo ra pupus no?”
Ulun kau ru Binjamin, pagiru' no koson mamayag ra inan! Iruani' Jirusalim! Samputi' bujung giu' ra Tikoa am paangi' apui pulanu giu' ra Bit-Kirim! Karaat am usung maar sumaboi intor ra ralayo.
Moonsoi kaga' Bandar Sion, kaa' maumok bandar no ra tauli no;
raja'-raja' am saujor nilo mangkim ra giu' no. Mambaal ilo ra pangkiman giu' ra liliut ru bandar no, sigagama' giu' ra intok kasagaan.
Konilo, “Tampos no mamulunsar ra Jirusalim! Tampos no! Bulunsaron takau bulintok tanga' ru orou!” Kaa' ilo pana mindagu, “Nakatawos noyo, orou lumondom galing noyo, babara' gumawar noyo.
Bulunsaron takau bulintok ra rondom, am mangumok ra kubu-kubu ru bandar no.”

Koson taur ru timug mangingkual ayuk ra timug, koson niayuk ra bandar no manangampos ayuk ra kalaatan. Nokorongog Aku intor ra pangimbalaan am kapusaan ra bandar ti; nakakito Aku ra maruol am pilat ra giu' no.

Alii ra Mamagun ru Jirusalim, polosoo' noyo kapaganan no masauk ra pampakaraan ramuyun! Amon ru kalo lioon min pampakaraan raginio, iruanin Takamin; kulawon Ku bandar min masauk ra tana' kaagisan ondo' kalo ayanin ru ulun.”
Taam aku, “Osoi kia rumongog amon ru pakaraan ku ilo? Mokotog guang nilo am marara' rumongog ra tanou Muno; kuritin nilo tanou Muno ondo' pinasaboi kuno.
Iou
Baloi nilo pataakin ra ulun bokon, koson niayuk ra umo am andu' nilo. Mangukum Aku ra mamagun ru pagun ti.
Ngaangai' ulun ondo' maayo am niayuk ondo' boborok, magingkaut am kalo mabanis guang. Atan poyo ra nabi am imam pana mamparuung ra ulun.
Karaan nilo pilat-pilat ru ulun Kuno koson ra pilat boborok ayuk. Konilo, ‘Ngaangai' no moonsoi am mamaa'.’ Kaa' sotopot no kalo toojo moonsoi am kalo mamaa'.

Mauyu' ilo kia sabap ra nambaal ra makauyuyu' ti? Kalo, totopot noyo kolondo' kauyuan nilo; nanangkapal bulos nilo. Ginio sabap ra maratu' ilo koson ra ulun bokon; bayag nilo pupusin paat ra Aku mangukum risilo. Aku,
Kaa' konilo, “Kalo, marara' akai maya' ra ralan no!”
Kopongo raginio nampalantik
Ginio ra indagu
Rongog no, okou tana' ti! Ulun Kuno marara' mangapu ra pangilaan Kuno am kalo gumagaya' Raki'. Ginio ra porotongon Ku karaat risilo koson ra ukuman ra ngaangai' inatangan nilo.

Atan kia boo onong ru kaminyan intor ra Syiba ondo' inibit nilo Raki', kapoam apa' pampagamis ra akanon intor ra pagun maalur? Marara' Aku mangapu ra taak nilo. Marara' Aku ra taak-taak simbalui nilo.
Ginio ra mangkinibit Aku risilo makasaru am maratu'. Ama' am anak, rangan am pasambalayan matoi.”
Indagu
Mokoondo' ilo ra panah am ilang; malaat ilo am kalo mangampun. Bolos kinurukup ru kuda nilo ondo' kinuraan koson ra bolos ru raat ondo' mangkinulun. Nakatampos ilo noyo mamulunsar ra Jirusalim.”
Indagu mamagun ru Jirusalim, “Nokorongog akai noyo ra tanou no am malawo boo guang mai. Malaa' akai am marualan koson ra ruandu' ondo' maganak.
Kalo makakau' akai mugar giu' ra ralan maayo kapoam mongoi ra umo, sabap giu' ra ati pana pantula' ondo' manakinandoi mapatabual ra malaa'.”
Indagu
Kopongo raginio indagu
Ilo ngaangai' gugumuor ondo' mokotog guang, koson ra kinokotog ru tambaga' am basi'. Malaat paliso nilo am mugar mongoi ra ati-ati koson mampatanou ra tanou ondo' mampalaat ra ulun bokon.
Malasu' noyo kaga' pampaliou no, kaa' jamol ru basi' kalo niayuk maliou am malulu'. Banangan ayuk boo ulun Kuno rayuson kinamin koson kapasawon, sabap ra ilo ondo' malaat kalo ininggi'.
Inggalanin ilo ra tatai' basi' kolondo' onong, sabap ra Aku,
Nanusub
Pai' pangintopot ra ragu-ragu magabau ti, ‘Moonsoi takau ayuk, sabap ragitio Baloi ru
Kulawo' baal ru kaayagan am paliso min. Katimpok no ra rondo' am bokon.
Pai' imboloo' bansa' ra bokon, anak kolondo' matuo am napuor. Pai' potoyo' ulun ondo' kolondo' sala ra pagun ti. Pai' samba ra tuhan-tuhan ra bokon, sabap binaal raginio mamuso ramuyun.

Amon ru mangulau kau ra baal ru kaayagan am paliso min am niayuk lumonggo' mambaal ra ngaangai' no, mangiou Aku ramuyun magulayun ayan ra pagun ti ondo' tinaakan Kuno ra kinamatuaan min koson ra tana' tungkuson.
Nangintopot kau ra ragu-ragu magabau.
Mantakou kau, mampatoi, mansawa', mangani' ra kaintutunan magabau, mampataak ra taak simbalui ra Baal, am sumamba ra dewa-dewa ondo' kalo igondo' nauligan min.
Mopongo kau mambaal ra ngaangai' no, matong kau ra saang Kuno giu' ra Baloi Kuno galama', am mindagu, ‘Moonsoi akai ayuk!’ Akau pana rumayus mambaal ra malaat no.
Guang min kia ra Baloi Kutu intok pansibunian ru mantatakou? Nakakito Aku ra ngaangai' binaal min no.
Ongoi no ra Silo,
Binaal min ngaangai' tula no; inda' pana ra ruruli' Aku minindagu ramuyun, kaa' marara' kau rumongog. Marara' kau tumaam paat ra Aku mampiau ramuyun.
Ginio ra atan ondo' baalon Kuno ra Silo baalon Ku ra Baloi Kutu, intok ondo' lansanin min. Intok ondo' tinaakan Ku ra kinamatuaan min ni am akau ti baalon Ku koson ra Silo.
Akau pagiruon Ku intor ra saang Kuno koson ra Aku nampagiru' ra pabukat min, ulun ru Israil. Aku,
Indagu
Okou galama' nakakito ra binaal nilo giu' ra bandar-bandar Jiuda am giu' ra ralan-ralan ra Jirusalim!

Lalaing-lalaing nanimung ra luton, ungkuyon nampaang ra apui, am ruandu' nangutou ra tapung koson baalon ra kuui ra dewi ondo' ininggalanan nilo koson ra Raja' Ruandu' ru Suruga'. Nampataak ilo niayuk ra wain ra tuhan-tuhan ra bokon koson mapakaruol ra guang Kuno.
Kaa' sotopot no, pai' ru Aku rinuol nilo, kaa' inan nilo galama' saboi ra tinauyu' ilo.
Ginio ra Aku,
Akau ulun Kuno, nakapandai kau ra mokoondo' kukula' taak simbalui ondo' solobon min ra rasawat ru altar musiti' koyoon solobo', am mokoondo' niayuk taak simbalui ra bokon ondo' akanon min. Kaa' Aku,
Paat ra Aku nagibit ra kinamatuaan min miningkual intor ra Misir, kalo inanian Ku ilo ra kaulayan intor ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang Kuno
Nanusub Aku ayuk risilo koson gumagaya' Raki' maa' raginio Aku masauk ri Aki Kapuuno' nilo, am ilo masauk ra ulun Kuno. Nanusub Aku risilo maayag sumugut ra susuban Kuno maa' raginio maansukan ilo.
Kaa' marara' ilo rumongog raginio am marara' mampalio. Inambai nilo ra sinugut kasagaan ru guang nilo ra mokotog am malaat. Ginio ra nasauk ilo toojo ra malaat poyo am kalo masauk ra moonsoi poyo.
Intor ra kinamatuaan min miningkual intor ra Misir saboi ra orou raiti', magail Aku manusub ra ulipon-ulipon Kuli, nabi-nabi minongoi ramuyun.
Kaa' kolondo' osoi pana ondo' mangkirongog kapoam mampalio risilo. Inambai min ra nasauk ra mokotog poyo guang am masaga' poyo gumuor intor ra kinamatuaan mini.
Ginio sabap ra, alii Jirimia, inda' pana posoboyon mu ngaangai' bala' ti ra ulun Kuno, kalo mangkirongog ilo rirun. Kabalu' pana mampiau kou risilo, kalo tumaam ilo.
Balain mu ilo ra ilo noyo rondo' bansa' ondo' marara' gumagaya' Raki',
Indagu
“Alii ra mamagun ru Jirusalim, panulaboi kano;
lampari' am patiri' abuk mino.
Rimbayo' rimbai panguliran giu' ra tampak ru kabuluran,
sabap ra Aku,
am nangimpai noyo ramuyun.
Mamagun ru Jiuda nambaal noyo ra kalaatan. Pinabanta' nilo sinungkalalaing nilo ondo' kasisangin Kuno giu' ra ralalom Baloi ru

Nambaal ilo rondo' altar ondo' ininggalanan ra Topit giu' ra Limayak Ginom. Giu' ra rasawat ru altar no nonolob ilo ra anak-anak nilo, ungkuyon am ruandu', koson ra taak simbalui. Sotopot no kalo igondo' Aku panusub risilo mambaal raginio, am niayuk kalo igondo' baal raginio miningkual intor ra pangkaraan Kuno.
Ginio ra, masaboi paat no ra intok raginio kalo boo sabiton ra Topit kapoam Limayak Ginom, kaa' Limayak Pamatayan. Lobongon nilo baangkai ra giu' no sabap ra kolondo' boo intok ra bokon.
Baangkai masauk ra akanon ru susuit am bibiag masigo am kolondo' boo ulun mangunjau.
Pagun ti masauk ra intok kolondo' atan pana tutuu'. Bolos maansukan am maansayan, am niayuk maansukan ra paguguatan giu' ra bandar-bandar Jiuda am giu' ra ralan-ralan ru Jirusalim langgain Ku.
Paat raginio bungul-bungul ru raja'-raja' am pagawai pamarintaan giu' ra Jiuda, am niayuk bungul-bungul ru imam-imam, nabi-nabi am niayuk mamagun ru Jirusalim ra bokon kakalon intor ra lobong.

Kuayan no sala' ka timungon am lobongon poyo, kaa' koson polosoon ra tana' koson ra pampalabung. Bungul-bungul nilo makulipatak ra matuug ru sinda mato ru orou, sila' am butitin ondo' tagamin, intok mangandoi ayuk, sambaan am pakituluan nilo.
Ulun intor ra bansa' malaat ti ondo' lakat poyo maayag, ondo' pinantutuliar Ku noyo ra nansalinut intok, masaga' poyo matoi intor ra maayag. Aku,
Nanusub
Kaa' kua ramuyun, ulun Kuno, nararayus nangiruan Raki' am kalo siminaguli' Raki'? Kua mapiot guut min ra sinungkalalaing min am marara' sumaguli' Raki'.

Rinongog ku noyo toojo, kaa' kalo mindagu kau ra motopot. Kolondo' sangulun pana intor ramuyun pansagulian guang ra binaal nano ra malaat. Kolondo' sangulun pana ondo' mindagu, ‘Atan kia kasalaan kuno?’ Akau ngaangai' minaya' ra ralan galama' koson ra kuda nasimbul maribok mongoi ra intok pangayawan.

Susuit kanawai pana makapandai ra paat ulian nano; susuit maningkuluuk, susuit tuntuayan am susuit murai niayuk makapandai ra paat bandingan ra intok. Kaa' akau, ulun Kuno, kalo makapandai ra ukum ondo' pinataak Kuno ramuyun.
Baani kau kaga' mindagu ra mapintar kau am makapandai ra ukum Kuno! Ilai' ga boo, ukum Kuno kinulau noyo ru mangingila' ra ugama ondo' kalo mabanis guang.
Ulun-ulun ondo' mangapintar ra gino min ngai' tauyuon, maubong am marakop ilo. Marara' ilo mangapu ra ragu Kuno; raino, kapintaran ra atan kia ondo' lakat poyo soroi risilo?

Ginio ra pataakin Ku umo nilono ra ulun bagu, am andu' nilo ra ulun bokon. Ngaangai' ulun ondo' maayo am niayuk boborok, maguyum ra kalabaan ra kalo mabanis guang. Niayuk poyo nabi am imam pana mamparuung ra ulun.
Karaan nilo ra pilat-pilat ru ulun Kuno koson ra pilat boborok ayuk. Mindagu ilo, ‘Ngaangai' no moonsoi am mamaa'.’ Kaa' ngaangai' no totopot kalo noyo moonsoi am kalo mamaa'.

Akau ulun Kuno, mauyu' kau kia sabap ra nambaal noyo ra ngaangai' baal ondo' malaat no? Kalo, totopot kalo mauyu' kau; nanangkapal bulos mino! Ginio ra maratu' kau koson ra ulun bokon; bayag mino mapupusan paat ra Aku mangukum ramuyun. Aku,
