Ilo musiti' maindon, masawat inigilaan, maligag am masuang napandayan am niayuk kalo najamaran, maa' raginio makapangandoi ilo ra istana ru raja'. Sinusub i Aspinas maa' raginio mangila' risilo mambasa' am manulis ra ragu ru Babilonia.
Nanusub niayuk raja' maa' raginio moonong orou ilo aniin ra akanon am wain nogondo' koson ra ondo' pataakon ra pabukat ru raja'. Kopongo igilaan buoi talu ngambilor, paumaan ilo ra raja'.
Ilo ondo' pinili' iono i Danil, Gananya, Misail am i Ajaria, ngaangai' no intor ra bansa' ru Jiuda.
Tingganai pagawai ru istana no nangani' risilo ra inggalan-inggalan bagu iono i Biltsajar, Sadrak, Misak am i Abidnigo.
Inaru' toojo ri Danil koson kalo jamalin inan nano ra akanon am wain ondo' inaru' ru raja'. Ginio ra nakiindangan io ri Aspinas,
am i Aki Kapuuno' nangkinibit ri Aspinas makaasi' am motogom ri Danil.
Kaa' indagu i Aspinas ri Danil, “Malaa' aku ra raja' no. Nangaru' io noyo ra akanon am inumon min. Amon ru okou ilain kalo maligag koson ra ungkuyon mamulok ra bokon no, potoyon aku ru raja' no.”
I Danil pana mindagu boo ra ulun magalung ondo' sinusub ri Aspinas koson magalung riso am talu ngaulun rangan nano,
“Pangkinam no ramon buoi mopor ngoorou. Anii' akai sansam am timug ayuk koson akanon am inumon.
Mopongo mopor ngoorou, pogondoon baal mai ra baal ru ungkuyon mamulok ra bokon, ondo' nangakan ra akanon ondo' inaru' ru raja'. Mopongo raginio pamatas mimpuun ra pangurio muno.”
Nangiou ulun magalung no am nangiou risilo mangkinam buoi mopor ngoorou.
Kopongo mopor ngoorou, ilain ilo maligag poyo am maikang poyo intor ra ngaangai' ungkuyon mamulok ondo' nangakan ra akanon ondo' inaru' ru raja'.
Intor ra orou raginio ulun magalung no nangiou risilo mangakan ayuk ra sansam, am kalo mangakan ra akanon kapoam manginum ra wain ondo' inaru' ru raja'.

Nangani' i Aki Kapuuno' ra apat ngaulun ungkuyon mamulok no ra napandayan am katandaan ralalom kasusasteraan am falsafah. Rinuangan poyo, nangani' Io ri Danil ra mapandai koson mambala' ra arati' ru pinaintalang am inupi.
Paat ra pupus ru talu ngambilor buoi igilaan ondo' inaru' ru raja' no, pinauma' ri Aspinas ngaangai' ungkuyon mamulok no ra Raja' Nibukadnijar.

Nangkuot raja' risilo am nakapandai ra i Danil, Gananya, Misail am i Ajaria makasigulu poyo ra ungkuyon mangamulok ra bokon ralalom ru ngaangai' katutunan. Ginio ra inalap ilo koson mangandoi giu' ra istana ru raja'.

Moonong raja' mangkuot ra ondo' pataamon no maawar am karaan toojo, makapandai raja' ra pataamon am guangon ru kaapat ngaulun ungkuyon mamulok no inggopor moonsoi poyo intor ra pataamon am guangon ru ngaangai' ulun mangilong am ulun mapandai kaga' ra sihir giu' ra titikop ru pamarintaan nano.
Narayus i Danil nangandoi giu' ra istana no saboi ra Raja' Koris intor ra Pirsia, tumalimpuun mamarinta.
Paat ra bilor karuo pamarintaan nano, Raja' Nibukadnijar naginupi. Magalabo kaga' raja' intor ra inupi nano saboi kalo mokororot.
Ginio ra nampiau raja' ra ngaangai' mangilong, ulun mapandai kaga' ra sihir, babalian, am ulun makakapandayan koson mambala' ra arati' ru inupi nano. Bulintok ra ngaangai' ulun no muma',
indagu raja' risilo, “Naginupi aku, am magalabo aku sabap ra masaga' aku makapandai ra arati' ru inupi no.”
Tumaam ilo ra ragu ru Aram,
Indagu raja', “Namatas aku ragitio. Musiti' kau mambala' ra inupi no am arati' no raki'. Amon ru kalo maalap min mambala', puputulon kau am baloi min lunsayon am saukon ra tuntur ru malunsai.
Kaa' amon ru maalap min mambala' ra inupi kuno am arati' no, mangani' aku ra tangguang ondo' moonsoi kaga' am pangurumatan ondo' maayo ramuyun. Raino pabalaa' inupi kuno am arati' no.”
Taam ilo poyo, “Amon ru tunungon mu inupi no ramon, makapambala' akai boo ra arati' no.”
Indagu raja', “Motopot toojo kinara' kuno! Masaga' kau ayuk magiliwa' ra jam, sabap ra inaru' ku noyo

masaga' mangukum ra ukuman ra nogondo' ramuyun ngaangai' amon ru kalo makapantunung kau ra inupi no raki'. Naguguum kau koson magabau sabap ra malansan kau ra kulawon ku namatasan kuno. Tunungo' galing inupi kuno, am mangintopot aku boo ra makabala' min arati' no.”

Kon ru ulun-ulun maminson ra raja', “Kolondo' sangulun pana ra titikop ru tana' ti makapambala' rirun atan ondo' kasagaan muno. Iou pana ra raja' ondo' matulai am maikang kalo igondo' mangitaak ra ulun mangilong, ulun mapandai kaga' ra sihir am ulun makakapandayan mambaal koson raginio.
Kitaakon muno mapagon kaga' saboi kolondo' sangulun pana makapangiou raginio, ondo' ak am dewa-dewa; am dewa-dewa no poyo kalo minayan ra gino ngai' ru ulun.”
Korongog ginio, sangit raja' am nanusub maa' raginio ngaangai' ulun maminson ra raja' giu' ra Babil potoyon.
Susuban ru raja' pana pinatanou boo am ngaangai' ulun mapintar kaga', nakaaya' i Danil am rangan-rangan nano uyumon koson potoyon.
Tuum boo i Danil ri Ariok, tingganai ru ulun magalung ra raja'. Io noyo sinusub koson mampaugar ra ukuman matoi no. Ra pagilalain no,
pangkuot i Danil ri Ariok, sabap ru raja' nangani' ra susuban ondo' malaat no. I Ariok pana nantunung ra atan ondo' nasauk.
Mataki' i Danil nakitaak ra mabuoi poyo jam intor ra raja' maa' raginio makabala' arati' ru inupi no ra raja'.
I Danil pana minuli' boo am pambala' ra rangan-rangan nano i Gananya, Misail am i Ajaria, baal ondo' nasauk no.

Nanusub io risilo makiasi' ri Aki Kapuuno' panguasa' giu' ra suruga' maa' raginio makaasi' Io risilo am mampatutun ra ondo' nakasibuni ra inupi no risilo, maa' raginio kalo potoyon ilo mababaya' ra ulun maminson ra bokon giu' ra Babil.
Paat rondom raginio niayuk nampatutun i Aki Kapuuno' ra ondo' nakasibuni ra inupi no ri Danil ralalom rondo' pinaintalang. Pongompor i Danil ri Aki Kapuuno' panguasa' giu' ra suruga' am indagu,
“I Aki Kapuuno' totopot mapintar am makakuasa'!
Omporon Io ra sabubuoi no.
Io no manguasa' ra bulintok am jam;
Io mampasauk am mopolonggo' ra raja';
Io no mangani' ra kapintaran am pangaratian.
Io mampatutun ra ondo' nakasibuni ondo' malandom kaga';
Nakapandai Io ra baal ondo' nakasibuni ralalom kalandaman,
linibungan Io ru sinda.
Mongompor aku am mangurumat Rirun, iou i Aki Kapuuno' ru kinamatuaan kuno.
Nangani' Kou raki' ra kapintaran am kaikangan;
nangiou Kou ra pakiasian kuno,
am nangani' ramon ra pataamon ra raja'.”

Kopongo raginio ongoi i Danil ri Ariok, ulun ondo' sinusub koson mamatoi ra ulun-ulun maminson ra raja'. Kon ri Danil riso, “Pai' potoyo' ulun-ulun maminson no. Ibito' aku muma' ra raja' am mambala' aku ra arati' ru inupi ru raja'.”
Mataki' i Ariok nagibit ri Danil muma' ra Raja' Nibukadnijar. Kono ra raja', “Nakatuum aku ra sangulun ru Jaudi ralalom ru pamatiran, ondo' makapambala' ra arati' ru inupi muno.”
Kopongo raginio pangkuot raja' ri Danil ondo' sabiton niayuk ri Biltsajar, “Makapambala' kou kia raki' ra inupi kuno am arati' no?”
Taam i Danil, “Kolondo' ulun makakapandayan, ulun mapandai kaga' ra sihir, ulun mangilong am ulun mapandai kaga' ra nujum ondo' makapambaal raginio.

Kaa' i Aki Kapuuno' panguasa' giu' ra suruga', nampatutun ra ngaangai' ondo' nakasibuni; nambala' Io rirun intor ra orou matong. Ginio ra iowo' aku mantunung ra inupi muno, iono pinaintalang ondo' nakito muno paat nombolong.
Tatanga' ra okou nombolong, naginupi kou intor ra baal ru orou matong, am nanulu' i Aki Kapuuno' ra ngaangai' ondo' nakasibuni nampakito ra baal ondo' masauk no rirun.

Nambala' noyo toojo i Aki Kapuuno' ra ondo' nakasibuni ra inupi no raki', sala' ka sabap no ra aku mapintar poyo intor ra osoi pana, kaa' maa' raginio maratian mu inupi no am makarati' ra suang ru guang muno.
Ralalom ru pinaintalang no nakito mu rondo' sinungkalalaing ra saang muno. Maayo toojo sinungkalalaing no, kukuliat, am totopot makalalaa'.
Ulu nano binaal intor ra mas kopoyo; kubab am longon nano binaal intor ra pirok; awak am tabing nano intor ra tambaga';
paa am tonok nano intor ra basi', am kalayam nano santayaran intor ra basi' am santayaran poyo intor ra tana' lia'.
Tatanga' ra okou monontong riso, rondo' batu maayo naratu' galama' intor ra tobo, am pakatiu' ra kalayam ru sinungkalalaing ondo' binaal intor ra basi' am tana' lia' no, am nanutuk riso.

Pulali' ru sinungkalalaing no naaba' am nasauk ra tuntur ru basi', tana' lia', tambaga', pirok am mas ondo' naumok koson ra kaau giu' ra intok mangagik ra gandum bulintok ra malasu'. Angin pana nanampui riso ra kalo nanatang ra atan pana babaya'. Kaa' batu no nasauk ra rondo' gunung ondo' namapak ra titikop ru tana' ti.
Ginio noyo inupi muno. Raino ti boo am arati' nano.
Okou raja' ondo' matulai. I Aki Kapuuno' panguasa' giu' ra suruga' nampasauk rirun ra sangulun raja' maayo kaga'. Nangani' Io rirun ra kuasa', kaikangan am urumat.
Nampasauk Io rirun ra panguasa' ra titikop tayar ru tana' ondo' mokoondo' ra mamagun, am poyo panguasa' ra bibiag am susuit no niayuk. Okou no ulu ondo' binaal intor ra mas no.

Mopongo pamarintaan muno mapupusan, sumalula' rondo' pamarintaan ondo' kalo maayo koson ra pamarintaan muno. Mopongo raginio sumalula' pamarintaan ra katalu, ondo' tatandu' no tambaga', ondo' mamarinta ra titikop ru tana'.

Mopongo raginio rondo' pamarintaan ra kaapat ondo' maikang koson ra basi' momopol am manutuk ra ngaangai' no. Koson ra basi' nanutuk ra ngaangai' no, koson niayuk ra pamarintaan no momopol am manutuk ra ngaangai' pamarintaan ra bokon no.

Nakito muno kalayam am bubua' ru kalayam ru sinungkalalaing no binaal intor ra basi' am tana' lia'. Arati' no ra pamarintaan no matayar-tayar. Pamarintaan no niayuk mokoondo' ra kaikangan koson ra basi' sabap ra tana' lia' no naratok ra basi'.
Bubua' ru kalayam nano ondo' santayaran intor ra basi' am santayaran intor ra tana' lia' makaarati' ra santayaran ru pamarintaan no maikang am santayaran poyo malawo.

Nakito mu niayuk basi' naratok ra tana' lia'. Baal raginio makaarati' ra panguasa'-panguasa' ru pamarintaan no kuminam mampasimpung ra pamarintaan nilo ra mambaal ra maguot ra maratok, kaa' koson ra basi' kalo maratok ra tana' lia', koson niayuk risilo kalo makasugut.

Paat ra pamarintaan ru panguasa'-panguasa' no, i Aki Kapuuno' panguasa' giu' ra suruga' manirong rondo' pamarintaan ondo' mantilayun am kalo maalap kaala. Pamarintaan no mamuso ra lingonon ngaangai' pamarintaan ra bokon, am pamarintaan no mamarinta ra sabubuoi no.

Nakito muno batu no naratu' galama' intor ra tobo, am niayuk nakatiu' ra sinungkalalaing ondo' binaal intor ra basi', tambaga', tana' lia', pirok am mas no. I Aki Kapuuno' ondo' maayo tatanga' mambala' rirun ra baal ru orou matong. Ginio noyo inupi muno sotopot no, am arati' nano maalap kaintopot.”
Kopongo raginio Raja' Nibukadnijar pana igulatur ra saang ri Danil am nanusub maa' raginio taak simbalui kaunaran am kaminyan pataakon ri Danil.

Kon ru raja', “Sotopot no i Aki Kapuuno' muno matulai ra gino ngai' ru dewa; Io no Tuhan ru ngaangai' raja', am nanulu' Io ra ngaangai' ondo' nakasibuni. Nakapandai aku ra baal raginio sabap ra makapambala' kou ra sinail ondo' nakasibuni no.”

Kopongo raginio nangani' raja' ri Danil ra intok ondo' masawat, nangani' riso ra tangguang-tangguang ra pinaluntuk, nampasauk riso ra panguasa' ru wilayah Babil am tingganai ru ulun maminson ra raja'.
Kaa' ra kitaak ri Danil, nampataak raja' ra kandoi tadbir ru wilayah Babil ri Sadrak, i Misak am i Abidnigo. Kaa' i Danil minayan giu' ra istana raja' am nangandoi ra giu' no.

Paat ra sanganuan nambaal Raja' Nibukadnijar ra rondo' sinungkalalaing intor ra mas: sawat no 27 ngamito am pila' no maar 3 ngamito. Pinabigor no sinungkalalaing no giu' ra intok marata' Dura ra wilayah Babil.

Raja' pana nanusub boo ra ngaangai' pagawai nano tumimung – raja'-raja' ru wilayah, gabenor, tingganai ru libung, ulun maminson ra pagun, ulun manalingapu ra ruit ru pagun, akim, majistrit, am ngaangai' pagawai ru libung. Musiti' ilo sumaang ra upacara parasmian ra sinungkalalaing ondo' pinabigor ru Raja' Nibukadnijar.
Paat ra ilo ngaangai' tumimung koson ra upacara parasmian am minigor giu' ra saang ru sinungkalalaing no,
korongog boo sangulun susubon ru raja' nampatanou ra bolos matangil, “Akau ulun intor ra ngaangai' bansa', am ragu, rongogo' raguon ru raja' ti:

Mokorongog kau ra bolos ru bujung, sumunu' bolos ru suling, rebab, gambus, jitor am kuliamos miujik ra bokon. Makatalimpuun ayuk miujik, akau musiti' migulatur am sumamba ra sinungkalalaing mas ondo' pinabigor ru Raja' Nibukadnijar.
Osoi ayuk ondo' kalo migulatur am sumamba riso indibakin papatiron ra ralalom ru rapuan ondo' bibilak.”

Ginio ra, pakatalimpuun ilo ayuk nokorongog ra bolos ru kuliamos miujik no, ulun intor ra ngaangai' bansa', bansa' boborok am ragu, migulatur am sumamba ra sinungkalalaing mas ondo' pinabigor ru Raja' Nibukadnijar.
Bulintok raginio noyo kukula' ngaulun Babilonia nangalap ra kaluagan koson maguyum ra kasalaan ru ulun ru Jaudi.
Indagu ilo ra Raja' Nibukadnijar, “Kaayag kono raja' ra sabubuoi no!
Okou raja' minindagu ra makatalimpuun ayuk miujik, moonong ulun musiti' migulatur am sumamba ra sinungkalalaing no.
Osoi ayuk kalo migulatur koson sumamba riso patirin ra rapuan ondo' bibilak.

Kukula' ngaulun ru Jaudi ondo' sinauk muno ra ulun mampaugar ra kandoi tadbir ra wilayah Babil kalo gumagaya' ra susuban muno. Ilo iono i Sadrak, Misak am Abidnigo. Ilo kalo migulatur am sumamba ra dewa muno, ondo' niayuk ra sinungkalalaing ondo' pinabigor muno.”
Pokorongog ra baal raginio sangit raja' am nanusub maa' raginio katalu-talu ngaulun no ibiton muma' riso.
Indagu raja' risilo, “Sadrak, Misak am Abidnigo, motopot kia ra kalo masaga' kau sumamba ra dewa kuno am kalo masaga' migulatur ra saang ru sinungkalalaing mas ondo' pinabigor kuno?

Raino paat ra akau mokorongog ra bolos ru bujung, suling, rebab, gambus, jitor am kuliamos ru miujik ra bokon, migulatur kau am samba ra sinungkalalaing no. Amon ru kalo, indibakin kau papatiron ra rapuan ondo' bibilak. Ati kia ra dewa ondo' makapamayag ramuyun?”
Taam i Sadrak, Misak am i Abidnigo, “Okou raja', kalo kuminam akai magisaung ra inan.
Amon ru i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' sambaan maino masaga' mamayag ramon intor ra rapuan ondo' bibilak am intor ra kuasa' muno, bayagon No akai.
Kaa' amon ru kalo niayuk baalon No, musiti' mu pabalaan ra kalo sumamba akai ra dewa muno am niayuk migulatur samba ra sinungkalalaing mas ondo' pinabigor muno.”

Bulintok raginio Raja' Nibukadnijar siminangit kaga' ri Sadrak, Misak am i Abidnigo saboi malia' bulos nano. Ginio ra nanusub raja' ra ulun-ulun nano mampalasu' ra rapuan intulu' poyo lasu' intor ra kaindalaman.
Nanusub io ra kukula' ngaulun saujor ondo' maikang kaga' koson mamangkil ra katalu ngaulun no am papatiron ilo ra ralalom ru rapuan ondo' bibilak no.

Saujor ru raja' pana namangkil ra talu ngaulun no ondo' lakat poyo nambayang ra naukop – bayang maawar, sukub, serban am ngaangai' bayang ra bokon – am pinapatir ilo ra ralalom ru rapuan ondo' bibilak.

Sabap ra raja' nangani' ra susuban maa' raginio rapuan no kinalasu' nasailan intor ra kaindalaman, apui no nonolob saboi minatoi saujor-saujor ondo' nampapatir ra talu ngaulun no ra ralalom ru rapuan.
I Sadrak, Misak am i Abidnigo ondo' nabangkil no naratu' ra ralalom ru rapuan ondo' bibilak no.
Pulusat ru Raja' Nibukadnijar minigor sabap ra nakatigog am nangkuot ra pagawai-pagawai nano, “Sala' ka kia binangkil takau talu ngaulun am pinapatir ra ralalom ru rapuan ondo' bibilak no?”
Taam ilo, “Motopot, raja' mai.”
Pangkuot raja', “Kaa' kua kia nakito ku apat ngaulun mugar-ugar ra tatanga' ru apui no? Kalo binangkil ilo, am ilain ra kalo napilatan ilo. Ulun kaapat no koson ra malaikat baal nano.”
Inggaari' boo ru Raja' Nibukadnijar kulobon ru rapuan no am indagu, “Sadrak! Misak! Abidnigo! Ulipon-ulipon ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga', ingkual no!” Ilo pana miningkual ra mataki'.

Ngaangai' raja', gabenor, tingganai ru libung am pagawai-pagawai ra bokon timinimung koson magilong ra talu ngaulun ondo' kalo nosolob ru apui no. Abuk nilo kalo nosolob, bayang nilo kalo nosolob, am poyo ilo pana kalo moowou ra lisun.

Indagu boo raja', “Koompor noyo i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' sambaan ri Sadrak, Misak am i Abidnigo! Nanusub Io ra malaikat koson mamayag ra ulun ondo' mangandoi ayuk am mangintopot Riso. Minanggal ilo ra susuban kuno am baani matoi intor ra migulatur samba ra dewa ra bokon ondo' ak am i Aki Kapuuno' nilo.

“Raino rongogo' raguon kutu: Osoi ayuk intor ra bansa', bansa' boborok kapoam ragu ra atan ayuk ondo' magasab ri Aki Kapuuno' ri Sadrak, Misak am niayuk i Abidnigo, puputulon, am baloi nano gabaan am saukon ra tuntur ru nalunsai. Kolondo' dewa ondo' makapambaal ra ondo' binaal ri Aki Kapuuno' nilo.”
Kopongo raginio kinasawat ru raja' pangkat ri Sadrak, Misak am i Abidnigo giu' ra wilayah Babil.
Nangator Raja' Nibukadnijar ra papatanawan ragitio ra ulun intor ra ngaangai' bansa' am ragu ra titikop ru tana' ti:
“Kaansayan!
Rongogo' tanou kuti intor ra kaimuagan-kaimuagan ondo' pinabala' raki' ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga'!
“Mapara' kia gayo ru kaimuagan ondo' pinakito ri Aki Kapuuno'!
Mapara' kia' gayo ru kaimuagan ondo' binaal Nano!
I Aki Kapuuno' noyo raja' ra sabuoi-buoi no;
mamarinta Io ra kolondo' pupus.
“Maayag aku ra moonsoi ra istana kuno, am makasia' ra kalangkayaan.
Kaa' paat ra sangarawan ra aku tatanga' nombolong, naginupi aku am nakaalap ra pinaintalang ondo' makalalaa'.
Nanusub aku ra ngaangai' ulun maminson giu' ra Babil maa' raginio matong muma' am mambala' ra arati' ru inupi kuno.
Ngaangai' ulun mangilong, ulun mapandai kaga' ra sihir, ulun makakapandayan am ulun mapandai kaga' ra nujum ibiton muma'. Nantunung aku ra inupi kuno, kaa' kalo makapambala' ilo ra arati' nano.
Kopongo raginio minatong i Danil uma' raki'. Io niayuk ininggalanan ri Biltsajar, sumugut ra inggalan ru dewa kuno. Nokoowot i Danil ra kuasa' intor ra ambiluo ru dewa-dewa
Okou Biltsajar, tingganai ru ulun ondo' mapandai, nakapandai aku ra ambiluo ru dewa-dewa
“Tatanga' ra aku nombolong, nakakito aku rondo' puun tataun ondo' makalu giu' ra tatanga' ru tana' ti.
Puun tataun no giminayo am maikang saboi untu nano nakasaboi ra limbowon am maalap kakito ru moonong ulun ra tana' ti.

Raun-raun no moonsoi am kawa' no maawas kaga' – maukop koson akanon ru ulun ra titikop ru tana' ti. Bibiag masigo sumindung ra saau nano; susuit mambaal ra bunsut ra raan nano am ngaangai' ondo' maayag mangakan ra kawa' nano.
“Tatanga' ra aku mangkara' ra pinaintalang no, nakito ku rondo' malaikat timinuun intor ra suruga'. Nakatampos am pagilalain ru malaikat no.
Indagu io ra bolos matangil, ‘Tagaro' puun tataun no, am putulo' raan-raan no. Tutuo' raun no am patiaso' kawa' no. Pagiruo' bibiag ra saau no am susuit ondo' nanabunsut ra raan no.
Kaa' patatango' tuor no ra tana', am bongkoso' ra rantai basi' am tambaga'. Patatango' tuor no giu' ra padang sakot.
“ ‘Polosoo' ungkuyon no matiu' ru bolobou am polosoo' io mayan simpung ra bibiag am tutuu' ra bokon.
Buoi tulu' ngambilor utok ru ulun kumulau masauk koson ra utok ru bibiag.

Ginio noyo kapatasan ru malaikat-malaikat ondo' mapintar am pagilalain. Ginio ra, ulun ra ati ayuk makapandai ra i Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga' mokoondo' ra kuasa' ra pamarintaan ru ulun, am Io makakuasa' mangani' ra pamarintaan no ra osoi ayuk kasagaan Nano, am poyo ra ulun ondo' totopot kalo maatang.’

“Ginio noyo inupi kuno. Okou Biltsajar, pambala' ra arati' nano raino. Kolondo' sangulun pana ra ulun maminson kuno makapambala' ra arati' no, kaa' okou makapambala' sabap ra nokoowot kou ra kuasa' intor ra ambiluo ru dewa-dewa
I Danil, ondo' niayuk ininggalanan ri Biltsajar, nakatigog kaga' koson sangkinolor saboi kalo nakaindagu. Kaa' indagu raja', “Okou Biltsajar, pai' pagalabo sabap ra inupi no am arati' no.”
Taam i Biltsajar, “Okou raja' kuno, sotopot no malansan aku ra inupi no am niayuk arati' no intor ra pantula' muno, am sala' ka intor rirun.
Puun tataun no masawat kaga' am untu no nakasaboi ra limbowon, saboi makito ru moonong ulun ra tana' ti.
Raun no moonsoi am kawa' no maawas kaga' saboi maukop ra akanon ru ulun ra titikop ru tana'. Bibiag masigo sumindung ra saau no am susuit mambaal ra bunsut ra raan no.
“Iou raja' kuno, okou no puun tataun ondo' masawat am maikang no. Kinaayo muno gumaai saboi ra limbowon, am kuasa' muno lumangka' ra titikop ru tana'.

Tatanga' ra okou magilong, rondo' malaikat tumuun intor ra suruga' am mindagu, ‘Tagaro' puun tataun no am pusoo', kaa' polosoon tuor nano ra tana'. Bongkoso' tuor no ra rantai basi' am tambaga', am patatango' tuor no mabaya' ra sakot giu' ra padang. Polosoo' ulun no matiu' ru bolobou, am polosoo' io mayan ra giu' masimpung ra bibiag buoi tulu' ngambilor.’
“Raja' kuno, gitio noyo arati' no, am gitio noyo ondo' pinakito ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga' intor ra baal ondo' masauk rirun.

Pagiruon kou intor ra ulun manampagun, am mayan simpung ra bibiag masigo. Buoi tulu' ngambilor okou mangakan ra sakot koson ra sapi', mombolong giu' ra tana' malimparang saboi basaan ru bolobou. Makapandai kou boo ra i Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga' mokoondo' ra kuasa' ra ngaangai' pamarintaan ru ulun, am Io makakuasa' mangani' ra pamarintaan no ra osoi ayuk kasagaan Nano.
Susuban ondo' taakin maa' raginio tuor no patatangon giu' ra tana' makaarati' ra okou masauk ra raja' poyo malupus okou mangiou ri Aki Kapuuno' manguasa' ra titikop ru tana'.
Ginio ra, okou raja', baya' no ra bilin kutu. Pai' boo pambaal ra tula. Baalo' atan ondo' moonsoi am matimpok, pakaasi' no ra ulun ondo' inimbolo'.
Ngaangai' baal raginio nasauk ra Raja' Nibukadnijar.
Kopongo mopor am ruo ngansila', bulintok raja' mugar giu' ra taap
indagu raja', “Ilai', mapara' gayo ru bandar Babil! Binaal ku ginio koson ra pusor bandar kuno koson mapainono' ra kuasa' am kinaayo kuno, katulayan am niayuk kinaikang kuno.”
Kaa' kalo poyo nakai' raja' mindagu, korongog bolos mindagu intor ra limbowon, “Raja' Nibukadnijar, rongogo' ragu-ragu ragitio! Raino kakuasaan muno koson ra raja' alapon intor rirun.

Pagiruon kou intor ra ulun manampagun, am mayan giu' ra tatanga' ru bibiag masigo. Mangakan kou ra sakot koson ra sapi' buoi tulu' ngambilor. Makapandai kou boo ra i Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga' mokoondo' ra kuasa' ra pamarintaan ru ulun, am Io makakuasa' mangani' ra pamarintaan no ra osoi ayuk kasagaan Nano.”

Ragu-ragu raginio totopot nasauk ra namulali'. Raja' Nibukadnijar pinagiru' intor ra ulun manampagun am mangakan ra sakot koson ra sapi'. Inan nano naasa' ra bolobou, abuk nano giminawar koson ra bulu ru susuit kanui, am salindu nano poyo giminawar koson ra salindu ru susuit.

Indagu raja', “Pakasail tulu' ngambilor no magilong aku ra limbowon. Pulali' ru pangkaraan kuno nakaliman saguli'. Nongompor aku ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga' liliwa' mangurumat am mampatulai Riso ondo' naayag ra sabuoi-buoi no.
“Mamarinta i Aki Kapuuno' ra sabuoi-buoi no,
pamarintaan Nano kolondo' pupus.
Ulun ra tana' ti kolondo' arati' Riso;
malaikat giu' ra suruga' am ulun ra tana' ti,
ngaangai' ragana' ru kuasa' Nano.
Kolondo' osoi pana makaanggal ra kasagaan Nano,
kapoam mangkuot ra binaal Nano.

“Paat ra aku nakaliman saguli', kinaayo am kinatulai kuno, am niayuk kauligan ra pamarintaan kuno pasagulion raki'. Pagawai-pagawai am ulun mangaatang kuno manguma' raki', am kakuasaan kuno koson ra raja' pasagulion raki', am kinatulai kuno masauk ra maayo poyo intor ragili.
“Raino aku, i Nibukadnijar, mongompor, mangurumat am mampatulai ra Raja' panguasa' giu' ra suruga'. Ngaangai' binaal Nano motopot am matimpok. Masaga' io mapainggana' ra osoi ayuk ondo' lumimbau.”
Paat ra sangarawan, nampiau Raja' Bilsyajar ra saribu ngaulun ulun mangaatang nano mongoi ra bunsag ondo' maayo am nagiginum ilo wain.
Paat ra nagauk noyo, nanusub Raja' Bilsyajar koson mangalap ra mangkuk-mangkuk ondo' binaal intor ra mas am pirok ondo' ginaau ru ama' nano,
Pulali' ru mangkuk-mangkuk no inibit siminubol, am ilo ngaangai' nanginum ra wain intor ra mangkuk-mangkuk no.
Liliwa' nanginum, nongompor ilo ra dewa-dewa ondo' binaal intor ra mas, pirok, gangsa', basi', tataun am batu.

Pulali' nakito kalindu' ru ulun, am kalindu' no tumalimpuun manulis ra timbok ru istana, giu' ra tampilon ondo' matawang kaga' natiu' ra sinda ru lampung. Nakito ru Raja' Bilsyajar kalindu' ondo' tatanga' manulis no.
Malaa' kaga' raja' saboi mabula' bulos nano am monontol atur nano.

Golok raja' nampiau ra ulun mapandai kaga' ra sihir, ulun makakapandayan, am ulun mapandai kaga' ra nujum. Paat ra ilo muma', indagu raja' risilo, “Osoi ayuk makabasa' ra tulisan no am niayuk mambala' ra arati' no aniin ra bayang ru raja', iono sukub matanggilung am sisigot mas tatandu' maayo. Ulun no pasaukon ra panguasa' katalu
Ulun maminson ra raja' jiminalai, kaa' kolondo' sangulun pana makabasa' ra tulisan no kapoam mambala' ra arati' nano.
Sabap ra nalaa', bulos ru Raja' Bilsyajar mabula' poyo, am ulun-ulun mangaatang nano kalo makapandai atan musiti' baalon.
Ina' ru raja'
Mokoondo' sangulun ralalom ru pamarintaan muti ondo' nokoowot ra kuasa' intor ra ambiluo ru dewa-dewa

Mokoondo' io ra kapintaran intor ra bokon. Mapintar io am mapandai mambala' ra arati' ru inupi, tumaam ra sunggait, am niayuk mambala' ra ondo' noopot. Inggalan ru ulun no i Danil, kaa' raja' nanginggalan riso i Biltsajar. Piawo' io. Mambala' io ra arati' ru tulisan no rirun.”
Nataki' i Danil inibit muma' ra raja'. Pangkuot raja' riso, “Okou kia i Danil, ulun ru Jaudi ra pinatiran ondo' inibit intor ra Jiuda minongoi ragiti ru raja', ama' kuno?
Nokorongog aku ra nokoowot kou ra kuasa' intor ra ambiluo ru dewa-dewa
Ulun maminson ra raja' am ulun mapandai kaga' ra sihir sinusub noyo mambasa' am mambala' ra arati' ru tulisan no kaa' kalo maalap nilo.

Nokorongog aku ra okou makapambala' ra arati' ru ondo' noopot-noopot ondo' malandom am nakasibuni. Amon ru maalap mu kabasa' am pakabala' arati' ru tulisan no, aniin kou ra bayang ru raja', iono sukub matanggilung am sisigot mas tatandu' maayo, am pasaukon kou ra panguasa' katalu
Taam i Danil, “Kitaakon tokou mambuli ra tangguang muno ra tayar muno galama', kapoam pataakin ra ulun bokon. Basaan ku am mambala' ra arati' ru tulisan no rirun.
“I Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga' nampasauk ra ama' muno, Raja' Nibukadnijar ra raja' ondo' maayo, am niayuk nangani' riso ra urumat am katulayan.

Nasauk io ra maayo kaga' saboi ulun intor ra ngaangai' bansa', bansa' boborok am ragu malaa' am monontol riso. Mamatoi io kapoam mompoloso ra sasangulun maayag sumugut ra kasagaan nano. Painsawaton kapoam paingganaan no osoi ayuk sumugut ra kasagaan nano.
Kaa' sabap ra nasauk io ra malilimbau, bambalingatan am malaat, pinatuun io intor ra kurisi' nanturungan am natatakan ra katulayan nano.

Pinagiru' io intor ra ulun manampagun, am utok nano nasauk koson ra utok ru bibiag. Minayan io simpung ra kaladai, nangakan ra sakot koson ra sapi', am nombolong ra tana' malimparang saboi inan nano naasa' ru bolobou. Pupus no nangiou io ra i Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga' mokoondo' ra kuasa' ra ngaangai' pamarintaan ru ulun, am mangani' Io ra pamarintaan no ra osoi ayuk kasagaan Nano.
“Kaa' okou galama', anak ungkuyon nano, kalo minggana' inan, kabalu' pana makapandai kou ra ngaangai' baal raginio.
Minanggal kou ra Tuhan panguasa' giu' ra suruga'. Pinakai mu mangkuk-mangkuk ondo' inalap intor ra Baloi ru
Ginio sabap ri Aki Kapuuno' nanusub ra kalindu' no nanulis ra tulisan ragitio.
“Tulisan no iono ‘Untobon, untobon, timbangon am tayaron.’
arati' no i Aki Kapuuno' nanguntob noyo ra orou ru pamarintaan muno, am pinupusan.
arati' no tinimbang kou noyo am napandayan ra mamaan kaga'.
arati' no pamarintaan muno matatayar am pataakin ra ulun ru Midia am Pirsia.”

Paat raginio niayuk Raja' Bilsyajar nanusub ra ulipon-ulipon nano nampabayang ra bayang ru raja', iono sukub matanggilung ri Danil, am sisigot mas tatandu' maayo pinasisigot ra liog nano. Pinasauk io ru raja' ra panguasa' katalu
Paat rondom raginio niayuk Raja' Bilsyajar, raja' ru Babilonia pinatoi.
Kopongo Raja' Bilsyajar pinatoi, Raja' Darius ulun ru Midia, ondo' bulintok raginio umur no onom ngoopor am ruo ngambilor, nampagaau ra kurisi' pamarintaan ru Babilonia.
Tinayar ru Raja' Darius pamarintaan no ra maatus am ruo ngoopor wilayah, ondo' moonong raginio pinarinta ru sangulun gabenor.
Suai raginio, pinili' no i Danil am ruo ngaulun ra bokon koson magalung ra gabenor-gabenor no am niayuk magalung ra kaatangan ru raja'.
Makito boo ra kandoi ri Danil moonsoi poyo intor ra ulun magalung kapoam gabenor ra bokon no. Sabap ra maturasik kaga' i Danil, moogot raja' mampasauk riso ra panguasa' ru titikop pamarintaan.

Baal raginio nangkinibit ra ulun-ulun magalung am gabenor ra bokon mirot koson maguyum ra kasalaan ri Danil ralalom ru kandoi pamarintaan no, kaa' kalo nakasugut ilo sabap ri Danil gumagaya', mabanis guang am kalo makalilian.
Ilo pana mindagu boo, “Itakau kalo lair maguyum ra kasalaan ri Danil, ondo' ak am ralalom ru baal ondo' makakulawit ra ugama nano.”
Ginio ra uma' ilo ra raja' am indagu, “Kaayag kono ra sabuoi-buoi no, Raja' Darius!

Akai ngaangai' ti mambaal ra kandoi tadbir ru pamarintaan muno – ulun-ulun magalung, gabenor, pagawai masawat, ulun magalung ra libung am pagawai ra bokon – nangiou noyo maa' raginio ingkualon mu rondo' susuban ondo' musiti' gagayaan toojo. Musiti' kou manusub maa' raginio buoi talu ngoopor ngoorou kolondo' sangulun pana makitaak ra atan ayuk intor ra dewa kapoam ulun ondo' ak am intor rirun galama'. Osoi ayuk manggal ra susuban no musiti' patirin ra ralalom ru luang batu ru singa'.
Ginio ra polosoon okou mapaingkual ra susuban no am niayuk sumain raginio. Polosoon susuban no masauk ra undang-undang ru Midia am Pirsia ondo' kalo boo kulawon.”
Koon raginio noyo Raja' Darius siminain ra susuban no.

Pakapandai i Danil ra susuban no sinainan noyo, minuli' io ra baloi. Giu' ra lamin ra tampas rasawat ru baloi nano mokoondo' kukula' gigimpalan ondo' tumingkuang ra Jirusalim. Koson ra kaindalaman no, igulatur i Danil giu' ra tuma' ru gigimpalan ra naukab no, am pakiasi' ri Aki Kapuuno' intalu songorou.
Paat ra pantula'-pantula' ri Danil nakakito riso nakiasi' ri Aki Kapuuno',

ilo ngaangai' minuma' ra raja' koson mambala' intor ri Danil. Konilo, “Okou raja' siminain noyo ra rondo' susuban ondo' manginggalar ra osoi ayuk buoi talu ngoopor ngoorou ra raiti' koson makitaak ra atan ayuk intor ra dewa am ulun, ondo' ak am intor rirun galama'. Osoi ayuk manggal ra susuban no patirin ra ralalom ru luang batu ru singa'.”
Indagu raja', “Motopot. Susuban no nasauk ra undang-undang ru Midia am Pirsia ondo' kalo boo kulawon.”
Konilo boo ra raja', “I Danil, sangulun intor ra ulun pinatiran intor ra Jiuda, kalo mangurumat rirun am kalo gumagaya' ra susuban muno. Nagulayun io nakiasi' intalu songorou.”
Pokorongog ra baal raginio, mangiluk raja' am mirot toojo koson mamayag ri Danil. Narayus raja' minirot saboi mamai'.
Ulun naguguum no pana siminaguli' boo am indagu ra raja', “Nakapandai kou ra sumugut ra undang-undang ru Midia am Pirsia, susuban ondo' iningkual ru raja' kalo boo kulawon.”
Raja' pana nanusub maa' raginio i Danil rokopon am patirin ra ralalom ru luang batu ru singa'. Indagu raja' ri Danil, “Gama' ru i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' sambaan muno toojo no mamayag rirun.”

Kabang ru luang batu pana tinauban boo ra rondo' batu maayo, am sinaapan ru raja' batu no ra meterai nano galama' am meterai ru ulun-ulun mangaatang nano, maa' raginio kolondo' sangulun pana makapamayag ri Danil.
Kopongo raginio saguli' raja' ra istana, kaa' rondom raginio kalo nokororot io. Kalo nangakan io am kalo masaga' simoyoon.
Paat ra maar matawang, sukal raja' am agou-agou minongoi ra luang batu ru singa' no.
Pakasaboi io ra giu' no, pampiau io ra magalabo guang, “Danil, ulipon ri Aki Kapuuno' ondo' naayag! I Aki Kapuuno' ondo' gagayaan muno toojo namayag kia rirun intor ra singa'-singa' no?”
Taam i Danil, “Kaayag kono raja' ra sabuoi-buoi no!

Nangator i Aki Kapuuno' ra malaikat Nano koson mangimut ra kabang ru singa'-singa' no saboi kalo nampajamar raki'. Binaal No koson raginio sabap ra nakapandai Io kolondo' sala kuno, ra Io kapoam ra okou.”

Mapara' boo bansuk ru raja'! Nanusub raja' maa' raginio paingkualon i Danil intor ra luang batu no. I Danil pana pinaingkual, am kalo najamaran io ra sanganu pana, sabap ra mangintopot io ri Aki Kapuuno'.

Kopongo raginio nanusub raja' maa' raginio ngaangai' ulun ondo' nanguu' ri Danil, patirin ra ralalom ru luang batu ru singa' no pabayaan ra anak andu' nilo. Kalo poyo naratu' ilo intor ra lonor ru luang batu no, singa'-singa' no nansaam noyo risilo am namandak-mandak ra bungul nilo.
Kopongo raginio nanulis Raja' Darius ra surat posoboyon ra ulun intor ra ngaangai' bansa', bansa' boborok am ragu ra tana' ti:
“Kaansayan!
Manusub aku maa' raginio ngaangai' ulun ra titikop ru pamarintaan kuno mangurumat am malaa' ri Aki Kapuuno' ondo' sambaan ri Danil.
Io noyo i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' naayag,
Io mamarinta ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Pamarintaan Nano totopot kalo mapuso,
am kuasa' Nano kolondo' pupus.
Io mangindangan am mamayag;
mambaal ra kaimuagan-kaimuagan,
ra tana' ti am poyo giu' ra suruga'.
Io namayag ri Danil intor ra sinaam ru singa'.”
Koson raginio noyo i Danil nagulayun ra intok masawat bulintok ra pamarintaan ru Raja' Darius am Raja' Koris, ulun ru Pirsia no.
Paat ra sarandaman, ra bilor kasaa' ra pamarintaan ru Raja' Bilsyajar koson ra raja' ru Babilonia, naginupi aku am nakaalap rondo' pinaintalang. Tinulisan ku inupi no am gitio noyo
ondo' nakito ku paat ra rondom raginio:
Nagangin ra mapuor intor ra ngaangai' intok am nampalamba' ra ralimbou ru raat.
Pulusat ru apat ngainan bibiag raksasa intor ra raat. Moonong rondo' ra bibiag no nansasala' baal no.

Kasaa' no baal nano koson ra singa', kaa' mokoondo' ra kawo koson ra kawo ru susuit kanui. Tatanga' aku magilong, kawo nano nautus intor riso. Bibiag no nakayang intor ra tana', am pinabigor ra kalayam nano koson ra ulun, am inanian ra utok ru ulun.

Bibiag karuo no baal nano koson ra baawang am minigor ra rasawat ru kalayam ra bakulung nano. Bibiag no tatanga' mongokot ra talu bungul ru tiagang. Korongog boo bolos ondo' mindagu, “Akan no ra kual maya' ra suang ru kasagaan muno!”

Tatanga' aku magilong, sanginan poyo bibiag siminalula'. Baal nano koson ra ampunguon, kaa' bakulung nano mokoondo' apat kawo koson ra kawo ru susuit. Bibiag no mokoondo' apat ulu, am ilain makakuasa'.

Liliwa' ra aku magilong ra sangau-sangau no, nakito ku poyo rondo' sangau ondo' boborok siminalula' ra gino ngai' no. Sangau no nanginggi' ra talu sangau ondo' soroi ra giu' no. Sangau boborok no mokoondo' ra mato koson ra mato ru ulun, am kabang ondo' mindagu ra lumimbau.

am apui tumilis intor ra kurisi' ru raja' Nano. Riribu ulun soroi ra giu' no koson mangandoi ayuk Riso, am jujuta' ulun minigor ra saang Nano. Kopongo raginio makama ru pangakiman manalimpuun ra pamisaraan, am kitab-kitab inukab.

Liliwa' ra aku magilong, lakat aku poyo mokorongog ra bolos ru sangau boborok no mindagu ra lumimbau. Tatanga' ra aku magilong, bibiag kaapat no pinatoi, am baangkai nano pinatiran ra ralalom ru apui saboi napuso.
Bibiag-bibiag ra bokon, binutus kuasa' no kaa' iniou maayag saboi ra orou ondo' inaru'.
Inanian io ra urumat am kuasa' koson ra raja', saboi ulun-ulun intor ra ngaangai' bansa', bansa' boborok am ragu mangandoi ayuk riso. Kuasa' nano mantilayun, am pamarintaan nano kolondo' pupus.
Pinaintalang no makalalaa' raki' am magalabo aku kaga'.
Inggaar aku ra sangulun intor ra ondo' minigor ra giu' no am nakiarati' riso ra pinaintalang no. Io pana nambala' ra arati' nano.
Kon ru ulun no, “Apat bibiag ondo' maayo no iono apat pamarintaan ondo' sumalula' ra tana' ti.
Kaa' ulun ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga' mangapu ra kuasa' koson mamarinta ra sabubuoi no.”

Aku pana masaga' boo makapandai intor ra bibiag ondo' kaapat no, ondo' kalo nogondo' ra bokon-bokon no; bibiag ondo' makalalaa' am manutuk ra ondo' akanon nano ra salindu tambaga' am ripon basi' nano, am kikinjangin no ondo' akanon nano.

Masaga' aku makapandai intor ra mopor sangau ra ulu nano, am intor ra sangau boborok ondo' minujak ra pupus, ondo' nangkinibit ra nabubul talu sangau ra bokon. Sangau boborok no mokoondo' ra mato am kabang ondo' mindagu ra lumimbau. Sangau boborok no makalalaa' poyo intor ra sangau-sangau ra bokon.
Ratong boo Io ondo' maayag ra sabuoi-buoi no am nangani' ra pamatasan ondo' manaung ra

Gitio noyo arati' ondo' pinataak raki': “Bibiag kaapat no iono pamarintaan kaapat ondo' sumalula' ra tana' ti am nansala' ra pamarintaan ra bokon. Pamarintaan no manutuk ra titikop ru tana' am niayuk kikinjangin no.

Mopor sangau no iono mopor ngaulun raja' ondo' mamarinta ra pamarintaan no. Kopongo raginio sangulun raja' ra bokon sumalula'. Io nansuai toojo ra raja'-raja' ondo' nakasigulu, am mampaala ra talu ngaulun raja'.

Manggal io ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga' am mangimbolo' ra ulun ri Aki Kapuuno'. Mangkinam io mangulau ra ukum am pangiantakan ru ugama nilo am ulun ri Aki Kapuuno' kuasaan no buoi talu ngambilor am maintanga'.
Makama pangakiman ru suruga' pana mansusunur am mampagaau boo ra kuasa' nano, am niayuk mamuso raginio saboi malingon kapuso.

Kuasa' am kinaayo ru ngaangai' pamarintaan ra tana' ti pataakin ra ulun ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga'. Kuasa' nilo koson mamarinta kolondo' pupus, am ngaangai' panguasa' ra tana' ti mangandoi ayuk risilo am niayuk gumagaya' risilo.”
Ginio noyo tunung ru inupi no. Malaa' aku kaga' saboi bulos kuno mabula' am binulian ku ngaangai' baal raginio ralalom ru guang kuno.
Paat bilor katalu ra pamarintaan ru Raja' Bilsyajar, nakakito aku ra pinaintalang karuo
Ralalom ru pinaintalang no, pulali' ku nakaliman ra inan ku giu' ra wilayah Ilam, giu' ra Susan, pusor bandar Pirsia. Minigor aku mamaar ra Sungoi Ulai.
Giu' ra igig ru sungoi no nakakito aku ra sanginan domba gawayan ondo' mokoondo' ruo sangau ondo' maawar: ondo' rondo' maawar poyo am baguon poyo intor ra bokon.

Nakakito aku ra domba gawayan no nanangau ra tampilon kalasaan, ralayo am rabugus. Kolondo' bibiag ondo' makainga' riso, kapoam makapagiru intor ra kuasa' nano. Domba gawayan no mambaal maya' ra kasagaan ru guang am giminaai lumimbau.

Tatanga' aku magilong, sanginan kambing gawayan nagisimbul intor ra kalasaan am nansail ra tana' ra maribok kaga' saboi kalayam nano kalo boo nokosonor ra tana'. Kambing gawayan no mokoondo' rondo' sangau ondo' minujak ra lolot ru ruo mato nano.
Kambing gawayan no minongoi ra domba gawayan ondo' nakito ku minigor giu' ra igig ru sungoi no, am pamulunsar ra domba gawayan no ra ngaangai' ru ikang nano.

Nakito ku kambing gawayan namulunsar ra domba gawayan ra masangit kaga' saboi nanangau ra karuo-ruo sangau ru domba gawayan no am pinandak no. Domba gawayan no kalo makagula' migampin ra inan, am karatu' boo ra tana' am kikinjangi'. Kolondo' osoi pana makapamayag riso.

Kambing gawayan no giminaai limbau, kaa' pakasaboi kambing gawayan no ra rasawat toojo ru kakuasaan nano, sangau nano napandak. Koson ra palit nano, salula' poyo apat sangau ondo' nakaujak am manulu' ra intok ondo' nansasala'.
Rondo' intor ra apat sangau no pulali' nampatuu' rondo' sangau ondo' boborok, am kuasa' ru sangau boborok no liminangka' minongoi ra tampilon rabugus, sirangon am tampilon ra tana' ondo' moonsoi.
Sangau no nasauk ra maikang kaga' saboi nakabulunsar ra saujor-saujor ru suruga'. Kukula' ra gino ngai' saujor-saujor ru suruga' am bibiag-bibiag rinatuan no ra tana' ti, am kikinjangi' no.
Sangau boborok no baani kaga' manggal ra Panglima ru saujor-saujor ru suruga', nopolonggo' ra taak simbalui orou-orou ondo' pataakon ra Panglima no, am nampajamol ra Baloi ru

Giu' no ulun mambaal ra tula am kalo boo mampataak ra taak simbalui orou-orou ondo' musiti' baalon. Baal ondo' motopot intor ri Aki Kapuuno' inimpayan. Sangau boborok no nakasugut ralalom ngaangai' pirot binaal nano.

Kopongo raginio nokorongog aku rondo' malaikat nangkuot ra malaikat ra bokon, “Kula' kia buoi ru baal ondo' nakito ralalom pinaintalang no mugar? Kula' kia buoi ru tula maayo malit ra taak simbalui orou-orou no? Kula' kia buoi ru saujor-saujor ru suruga' am Baloi ru
Nokorongog aku ra malaikat ra bokon tumaam, “Baal raginio masauk buoi 1,150 ngoorou, am buoi ru ginio taak simbalui ra susuab ti am taak simbalui ra mamai' ti kalo pataakon. Mopongo raginio Baloi ru
Tatanga' ra aku mirot koson mangarati' ra arati' ru pinaintalang no, pulusat ru sangulun minigor ra saang kuno.
Nokorongog aku ra bolos intor ra Sungoi Ulai mindagu, “Gabriil, pambala' toojo ra arati' ru pinaintalang no riso.”
Mininggaar i Gabriil raki' am bigor ra sapapa' kuni. Malaa' aku kaga' saboi liminaub aku.
Kon ri Gabriil raki', “Okou ulun mapandai matoi, aratio' noyo arati' nano. Pinaintalang no intor ra orou pupus no.”
Tatanga' aku mindagu, naratu' aku ra tana' am nalausan. Kaa' ginuut no aku, am nangindangan raki' migor.
Kono poyo, “Mambala' aku rirun ra baal nano ra tauli no koson ra kinibit ru sangit ri Aki Kapuuno'. Pinaintalang no intor ra orou pupus no.
Domba gawayan ondo' mokoondo' ruo sangau, ondo' nakito muno tatandu' ru pamarintaan Midia am Pirsia.
Kambing gawayan no tatandu' ru pamarintaan Junani, am sangau ondo' minujak nangkilolot ra ruo mato nano tatandu' ru raja' ondo' kasaa'.
Apat sangau ondo' minujak nalupus sangau ondo' kasaa' no napandak, arati' no pamarintaan ru Junani matayar ra apat pamarintaan ondo' kalo maikang koson ra pamarintaan ondo' kasaa' no.
Paat ra karatuan ru kaapat-apat pamarintaan no mamaar noyo saboi musiti' ukumin, am kalaatan ra giu' no liminanja', sumalula' boo sangulun raja' ondo' bambalingatan, malaat am mamparuung.

Masauk io ra maikang kaga', kaa' sala' ka sabap no ra kuasa' nano galama'. Mangkinibit io ra kapusaan ondo' makalalaa', am makasugut ralalom ru pirot baalon nano. Mamuso io ra ulun ondo' maikang kaga', am ulun ri Aki Kapuuno' niayuk.

Sabap ra ruung nano, makasugut io ralalom ru pamparuungan nano. Lumimbau io ra inan nano, am mamuso ra masuang ulun ra kalo mangani' ra pampakaraan. Io no poyo ondo' baani manggal ra Raja' Ondo' Maayo Kaga'. Kaa' pusoon io ra sala' ka ra kuasa' ru ulun.

Pinaintalang intor ra taak simbalui ra susuab ti am taak simbalui ra mamai' ti ondo' pinakito rirun no niayuk masauk. Kaa' pai' raguo' ginio ra osoi ayuk, sabap ra lakat poyo mabuoi ra kalo poyo masauk baal raginilo.”
Malawo aku am narualan buoi kukula' ngoorou. Kopongo raginio sukal aku am saguli' nambaal ra kandoi ondo' pinataak ru raja'. Magalabo aku mangkara' ra pinaintalang no am kalo makarati' raginio.
Raja' Darius ulun ru Midia, anak ungkuyon ru Raja' Agaswiros, nasauk ra raja' ru pamarintaan Babilonia.

Paat ra bilor kasaa' ra pamarintaan nano, nambasa' aku ra buuk kitab. Nampaguang aku toojo ra baal ru bandar Jirusalim ondo' nasauk ra tuntur nalunsai buoi tulu' ngoopor ngambilor, koson ondo' rinagu ru
Aku pana makiasi' toojo ra
Pakiasi' aku ra
Indagu aku, “Iou
“Makatula akai noyo. Nambaal akai noyo ra kalaatan. Nambaal akai noyo ra kasalaan. Minanggal akai noyo ra susuban Muno, am siminiang intor ra aturan Muno.
Kalo nangkirongog akai ra nabi-nabi, ulipon-ulipon Muno, ondo' minindagu sabap ra inggalan Muno ra raja', panguasa', am kinamatuaan mai, am niayuk ngaangai' ru bansa' mai.

Okou, iou Tuhan masalok mambaal ra motopot, liliwa' akai masalok manuyu' ramon galama'. Koon raginio niayuk ra ngaangai' ru bansa' mai ondo' minayan ra Jiuda, Jirusalim, am ngaangai' ulun ru Israil ondo' pinantutuliar Mu giu' ra pagun-pagun mamaar am maalur sabap ra kalo gumagaya' ilo Rirun.
Raja'-raja' mai, panguasa'-panguasa' mai am kinamatuaan mai nambaal noyo ra baal ondo' makauyuyu' am niayuk makatula Rirun, iou Tuhan.
Maayo guang Muno makaasi' am mangampun, kabalu' pana giminuor akai Rirun.
Kalo mangkirongog akai Rirun, iou
Ngaangai' ulun ru Israil minanggal ra ukum Muno am marara' rumongog Rirun. Makatula akai noyo Rirun, ginio ra nangukum Kou ramon ra pagulasan ondo' tinulisan ralalom ru Ukum ri Musa, ulipon Muno.
Sinugut Mu noyo ondo' rinagu Muno ramon am panguasa'-panguasa' mai. Nangukum Kou ra Jirusalim moporos poyo intor ra bandar-bandar ra bokon ra tana' ti.
Nangukum Kou ramon siminugut ra ngaangai' ondo' natulisan ralalom ru Ukum ri Musa. Raino pana, iou
Nakatampos Kono mangukum ramon, iou

“Nanulu' Kou ra kuasa' Muno bulintok ra Okou nagibit ra ulun Muno miningkual intor ra Misir, iou Tuhan, i Aki Kapuuno' mai. Lakat mai poyo makara' kuasa' Muno. Makatula akai noyo am nambaal ra kasalaan.
Sinaung Mu akai ragili. Ginio ra pai' noyo boo sangit ra Jirusalim. Bandar ti bandar Muno, bulur Muno ondo' matulai.
Rongogo' noyo pakiasian am kitaakon kutu, iou Aki Kapuuno'. Tapulio' Baloi Muno ondo' pinuso no maa' raginio moonong ulun makapandai ra Okou noyo Tuhan.

Rongogo' akai no, iou Aki Kapuuno'; tantangi' akai no, am ilai' kapaganan mai. Ilai' kaimbalaan ru bandar ondo' sabiton ra inggalan Muno. Makiasi' akai Rirun sabap ra maayo guang Muno makaasi' am sala' ka sabap ra binaal moonsoi mai.

Rongogo' akai no, iou Tuhan, am ampuno' akai no. Rongogo' akai no, iou Tuhan, am imbuor no! Pai' kototoi maa' raginio moonong ulun makapandai ra Okou noyo i Aki Kapuuno'! Bandar am ulun ti longgom Muno.”
Rinayus ku nakiasi', am nangiou ra tula kuno am niayuk tula ru bansa' kuno Israil. Aku niayuk nakitaak ra
Liliwa' aku makiasi', i Gabriil ondo' nakito kuno ralalom ru pinaintalang kuno ondo' ragili, nansiab minongoi raki'. Paat raginio noyo inaru' koson mampataak ra taak simbalui ra mamai' ti.
Nambala' toojo i Gabriil, “Okou Danil, matong aku koson mangindangan rirun makarati' ra ragu inala' no.

Paat ra okou timinalimpuun nakitaak ri Aki Kapuuno', tinaam No kinitaak muno. Minatong aku nampasaboi ra taaman no sabap ra motogom Io kaga' rirun. Ginio ra rongogo' toojo liliwa' ra aku mambala' toojo ra arati' ru pinaintalang no.

“Intulu' tulu' ngoopor ngambilor iono buoi ondo' inaru' ri Aki Kapuuno' koson mampalabus ra bansa' muno am bandar muno ondo' matulai no intor ra tula am kalaatan. Tula ampunon am katimpakan ondo' mantilayun potolorogon, maa' raginio pinaintalang am ragu inala' no totopot masauk, am maa' raginio Baloi ru

Guango' am aratio' baal ragitio: Intor ra jam ru susuban pinaingkual koson mambaal saguli' ra Jirusalim, saboi ra ratangan ru tingganai ondo' pinili' ri Aki Kapuuno', buoi nano iono intulu' tulu' ngambilor. Jirusalim baalon saguli' ra ralan-ralan maayo am pangampinan ondo' maikang, am tumaan buoi intulu' onom ngoopor am ruo ngambilor, kaa' paat raginio nososok ra kapaganan.
Pompor ru paat raginio, tingganai ondo' pinili' ri Aki Kapuuno' no potoyon kabalu' pana kolondo' sala nano. Bandar Jirusalim am Baloi ru

Mambaal raja' no ra nabantuan ondo' mapiot ra masuang ulun buoi tulu' ngambilor. Malintanga' paat no, langgain ru raja' ngaangai' taak simbalui am pataakon. Rondo' ondo' sabiton ra ‘Karaat Ondo' Moporos’
Paat ra bilor katalu ra pamarintaan ru Raja' Koris koson ra raja' Pirsia, rondo' tanou ondo' pinasaboi ri Danil ondo' niayuk piawon ri Biltsajar. Tanou raginio motopot kaa' mapagon kaga' maratian.
Bulintok raginio tatanga' aku mangulir buoi talu ngaminggu'.
Buoi ru ginio, kalo nangakan aku ra akanon maamis kapoam kual; kalo nanginum aku ra wain kapoam nansurai ra abuk.
Paat ra orou karuo ngoopor am apat ra sila' kasaa' bilor raginio, minigor aku giu' ra igig ru Sungoi Tigris ondo' maayo no.
Tungar aku am nakakito ra sangulun ondo' nambayang ra bayang linon am abot ondo' binaal intor ra mas kopoyo.

Inan nano kukuliat koson ra intan; bulos nano mapaang koson ra paang ru ganit, am mato nano bibilak koson ra apui. Kalindu' am kalayam nano manguliat koson ra tambaga' ondo' bagu inisasan, am bolos nano koson ra ngonsol ru ulun masuang.
Aku sangulun ayuk ondo' nakakito ra pinaintalang no. Ulun ondo' nababaya' raki' kalo nakakito ra atan-atan pana, kaa' nalaa' ilo. Nagiru' ilo am nansibuni.
Tinatang aku sangulun, am magilong ra pinaintalang ondo' makaimuag no. Kalo boo maikang aku, am bulos kuno mabula' kaga'.
Pokorongog aku ra bolos nano, naratu' aku nakalaub ra tana' am nalausan.
Kopongo raginio mokoondo' kalindu' ondo' nampaguut raki' am nangindangan raki' siminukal liliwa' mangikang toojo ra atur am kalindu'.
Kon ru malaikat no raki', “Okou Danil, motogom i Aki Kapuuno' rirun. Sukal no am rongogo' toojo ragu kuti. Sinusub aku mongoi rirun.” Karagu no ginio, sukal aku, am lakat poyo monontol.

Kono poyo, “Okou Danil, pai' kalaa'. Norongog noyo ri Aki Kapuuno' pakiasian muno intor ra orou kasaa' muno namatas koson minggana' inan koson mokoowot ra pangaratian. Minatong aku koson ra taam ru pakiasian muno.

Malaikat manindung ra pamarintaan ru Pirsia minanggal raki' buoi ruo ngoopor am rondo' ngoorou. Kopongo raginio, i Maikol, rondo' intor ra tingganai ru malaikat, minatong nangindangan raki', sabap ra pinatatang aku sangulun giu' ra Pirsia.
Raino matong aku koson mambaal rirun makarati' ra baal ondo' masauk ra bansa' muno. Pinaintalang no intor ra baal ru orou matong.”
Bulintok ra io mindagu ra baal raginio, pinakuku' ku bulos. Kalo nakaindagu aku.

Malaikat ondo' baal nano koson ra ulun no pana nampatutui boo ra kalindu' nano am nangambong ra bibil kuno. Indagu aku riso, “Tuan, pinaintalang ti nampalawo kaga' raki', saboi kalo lumonggo'-longgo' aku monontol.
Aku koson ra sangulun ulipon ondo' muma' ra tuan nano. Ati kulaan kia aku makaindagu rirun? Kalo boo maikang aku am ampusan aku.”
Igondo' poyo io nangambong raki' am malimanan ku maikang poyo.
Kono, “Motogom i Aki Kapuuno' rirun. Ginio ra pai' kalaa' am pai' pagalabo intor ra atan-atan pana.”
Karagu no ginio, giminaai ikang kuno. Indagu aku boo, “Tuan, indagu no. Pinaikang mu aku.”

Kono poyo, “Nakapandai kou kia kua ratong aku rirun? Aku minatong koson mambala' ra suang ru Kitab Motopot rirun. Raino musiti' aku muli' am manggal ra malaikat manindung ru Pirsia. Mopongo raginio malaikat manindung ru Junani poyo sumalula', am kolondo' osoi pana mangindangan raki' ondo' ak am i Maikol, malaikat manindung ru Israil.
Io noyo ondo'
Ngaangai' ondo' raguon kuti motopot.”

Kon ru malaikat no, “Talu ngaulun raja' poyo mamarinta ra Pirsia, sumunu' raja' kaapat ondo' langkaya' poyo intor ra ngaangai' no. Paat ra rasawat ru kuasa' am kalangkayaan nano, manggal io ra pamarintaan ru Junani.
“Sangulun raja' ondo' maikang sumalula'. Mamarinta io ra rondo' pamarintaan ondo' maayo am mambaal ra kasagaan ru guang nano.
Kaa' paat ra rasawat ru kuasa' nano, pamarintaan nano maabak am matayar masauk apat. Raja'-raja' ondo' sala' ka papag nano malit riso koson ra raja', kaa' kalo maikang ilo koson riso.
“Raja' ru Misir masauk ra maikang. Kaa' sangulun intor ra panglima nano masauk ra maikang poyo, am mamarinta ra pamarintaan ondo' maayo poyo.

Kopongo ra kukula' ngambilor, raja' ru Misir mambaal ra nabantuan koson maguum ra raja' ru Siria, am paganduon anak ruandu' nano ra raja' no. Kaa' nabantuan koson maguum no kalo mantilayun. Anak ruandu' no, ralaki nano, anak nano,
Kalo mabuoi raginio, sangulun intor ra sasambaloi nano masauk ra raja'. Mamulunsar io ra saujor ru raja' ru Siria, sumubol ra ralalom ru kubu nano am mangala risilo.

Paat raginio muli' io ra Misir, ibiton no sinungkalalaing-sinungkalalaing ru dewa nilo, am niayuk kuliamos-kuliamos mas am pirok ondo' patimpokon koson ra dewa-dewa no. Buoi kukula' ngambilor kalo mamulunsar io ra Siria.
Raja' ru Siria pana mamulunsar boo ra pagun ru Misir, kaa' raja' no kalaan paluguton am rumuli' ra pagun nano galama'.

“Anak-anak ungkuyon ru raja' ru Siria tumampos koson mamulunsar am manirong ra pulalai ru saujor ondo' maayo. Sangulun intor risilo mampajunjung koson ra liur am mamulunsar ra pangampinan ru pantula'.
Raja' ru Misir sumangit kaga', am mamulunsar ra raja' ru Siria am mangala ra pulalai ru saujor nano ondo' maayo no.
Raja' ru Misir lumimbau sabap ra kamanangan nano, am sabap ra masuang saujor ondo' pinatoi nano, kaa' kalo marayus io mamanang.
“Raja' ru Siria muli' am manirong ra pulalai ru saujor ondo' maayo poyo intor ra kasaa'. Masaboi paat no, sumaguli' io mabaya' ra pulalai ondo' maayo am ondo' naukop ra kinandoi.
Masuang ulun gumuor boo ra raja' ru Misir. Mulu' poyo ra kukula' ngaulun malaat intor ra bansa' muno pana gumuor, okou Danil, sabap ra pinaintalang ondo' nakito nilo, kaa' kalaan ilo.
Raja' ru Siria pana nagawang ra rondo' bandar ondo' mokoondo' ra kubu am kalaan no. Saujor ru Misir kalo boo mamulunsar, am poyo saujor no ondo' maikang kaga' makayaan ra ikang.
Pamakuan ru panguasa' ru Siria risilo maya' ra kasagaan ru guang ra kolondo' manggal. Mayan io ra tana' ondo' moonsoi

“Raja' ru Siria manusub ra ngaangai' pulalai ru saujor nano koson mamulunsar ra pantula'. Koson manguasa' ra pamarintaan ru pantula' nano, raja' no mambaal ra pangiawan ra pantula' nano am paganduon anak ruandu' nano

Mopongo raginio raja' ru Siria mamulunsar ra bansa'-bansa' ondo' minayan giu' ra igig ru raat, manguasa' ra masuang bansa'. Kaa' sangulun tingganai ru bansa' ra bokon mangala ra raja' ru Siria am mopolonggo' ra pagasaban ondo' binaal nano, am mambalos ra pagasaban no riso.
Raja' ru Siria muli' ra kubu-kubu ru pagun nano galama' kaa' kalaan io, am ginio noyo pupus nano.

“Palitin io ru sangulun raja' ra bokon. Manusub raja' no ra sangulun pagawai koson mampajajal ra mamagun mambayar ra cukai ra kuayan mamparuang ra kalangkayaan ru pamarintaan nano. Sangkinolor ayuk paat ru raja' no potoyon, kaa' sala' ka makito ru ulun am sala' ka ralalom ru pampatayan.”
Rayuso' ru malaikat no nambala', “Raja' ru Siria ondo' sumunu' no iono ulun ondo' malaat. Kalo maaya' masauk ra raja', kaa' matong io ra mamulali' am mampagaau ra kuasa' ra namparuung.
Saujor ondo' manggal riso, am poyo Tingganai Maayo Imam pana pusoon am luuson.
Siminain ra masuang nabantuan, mamparuung io ra bansa'-bansa' am gumaai maikang, kabalu' pana mamarinta io ra rondo' pamarintaan ondo' boborok.

Mamulunsar io ra rondo' wilayah ondo' langkaya' am malabung ra kalo mangani' ra pampakaraan am mambaal ra baal-baal ondo' kalo igondo' binaal ru kinamatuaan nano. Ra maamaya'-maamaya' nano boo tayarin no ra kuliamos ginaau am kalangkayaan ondo' noowot no ralalom ru pangayawan. Nambaal io ra inatangan koson mamulunsar ra bandar-bandar ondo' mokoondo' ra kubu, kaa' mataki' maampus jam no.

“Baani io manirong ra pulalai ru saujor ondo' maayo koson mamulunsar ra raja' ru Misir, ondo' nakatampos tumula' ra pulalai ru pantulaan nano ondo' maayo am maikang. Kaa' raja' ru Misir maruung am kalo makasugut.
Ulun-ulun maminson ra raja' ru Misir ondo' mamaar kaga' riso mamparatu' riso. Masuang saujor nano potoyon am saujor nano pusoon.
Ruo ngaulun raja' no pana manturung boo am mabaya' mangakan ra rondo' mija', kaa' guangon nilo malaat. Mamparuung ilo ra rondo' am bokon, kaa' kalo makasugut ilo sabap ra kalo poyo nasaboi jam nilo.
Raja' ru Siria muli' mabaya' ra ngaangai' kuliamos tinakou nano. Namatas io koson mamuso ra ugama ru ulun ri Aki Kapuuno'. Mambaal io maya' ra kasagaan ru guang nano, am muli' ra pagun nano.
“Kalo mabuoi raginio, raja' ru Siria mamulunsar poyo ra Misir, kaa' ragino ti kinibit nano suai intor ra ondo' kasaa'.
Ulun ru Roma matong ra kapal-kapal ru raat am mamulunsar ra raja' ru Siria, am raja' pana malaa'.
Raja' ru Siria pana muli' ra sumangit kaga', am mirot manutuk ra ugama ru ulun ri Aki Kapuuno'. Raja' ru Siria maya' ra bilin ru ulun ondo' nangiruan noyo ra ugama no.
Kukula' ngaulun saujor ru raja' mampajamol ra Baloi ru
Mamparuung raja' am makasugut mangambi' ra guang ru ulun ondo' nangiruan ra ugama no, kaa' ulun maamaya' ri Aki Kapuuno' manggal riso.

Tingganai ru mamagun ondo' mapintar mangindangan ra masuang ulun mokoowot ra pangaratian, kaa' koson kukula' buoi raino ti kukula' ngaulun risilo matoi giu' ra intok pampatayan kapoam solobon saboi matoi. Mokoondo' poyo takawin am saukon ra ulun rinakop.
Paat ra masauk pamatayan no, ulun ri Aki Kapuuno' mokoowot sanganu indangan, kabalu' pana ulun ondo' maya' risilo no mangkara' ayuk ra kaatangan galama'.
Kukula' ngaulun tingganai ondo' mangapintar no potoyon, kaa' kinibit no ulun raginilo masauk ra mapasau. Baal raginio masauk saboi kaampusan ru jam ondo' inaru' ri Aki Kapuuno'.

Raja' kalo mampalio ra dewa ondo' sambaan ru kinamatuaan nano, am niayuk dewa ondo' sambaan ru ruandu'-ruandu'. Sotopot no raja' no kalo mampalio ra ngaangai' dewa sabap ra pangkaraan nano io maayo poyo intor ra ngaangai' no.
Kaa' sumamba raja' no ra dewa ondo' manindung ra kubu-kubu. Nampataak raja' no ra mas, pirok, intan am taak-taak ra bokon ondo' mologo ra dewa ondo' kalo igondo' sinamba ru kinamatuaan nano.

Mamakai raja' no ra ulun ondo' sumamba ra sinungkalalaing ru bansa' ra bokon koson mamiot ra kubu-kubu nano. Aniin ru raja' ra pangkat maayo ra ulun ondo' mangapu riso koson ra panguasa'. Mangani' raja' no risilo ra intok ondo' masawat am tana' koson ra tangguang.

“Paat ra maar noyo masaboi pupus ru kakuasaan raja' ru Siria, raja' ru Misir mamulunsar riso. Kaa' raja' ru Siria mambalos ra pamulunsaran no ra ngaangai' ru ikang nano. Raja' ru Siria mamakai ra kurita' kuda, kuda am masuang kapal ru timug. Koson ra rosob, raja' ru Siria mamulunsar ra masuang pagun,
am poyo mamulunsar ra tana' ondo' moonsoi
Paat ra raja' ru Siria mamulunsar ra ngaangai' pagun no, Misir pana kalo makapagiru'.
Ibiton saguli' ru raja' ru Siria ngaangai' rapu' ru Misir, nakaaya' mas am pirok. Kalaan ru raja' ru Siria no Libia am Itiopia.
Tanou intor ra sirangon am ralayo pana mambaal boo ra raja' ru Siria magalabo, mamulunsar io ra masaran am niayuk mamatoi ra masuang ulun.
Raja' ru Siria mambaal ra kim ru raja' ondo' maayo giu' ra lolot ru raat am gunung intok ru Baloi ru
Masuang ulun ondo' minatoi maayag saguli': mokoondo' ondo' makasia' ra kaayagan mantilayun, mokoondo' poyo ondo' maimbolo' ra mantilayun.
Tingganai-tingganai ondo' mapintar suminda koson ra limbowon ondo' mapaang, am ilo ondo' mangila' ra ulun mambaal ra moonsoi am matimpok suminda koson ra butitin ra sabuoi-buoi no.”
Kopongo raginio kakito ku ruo ngaulun ungkuyon, ondo' sangulun minigor ra igig ru sungoi tampilon ragiti, am sangulun poyo tampilon ra giu'.
Sangulun no nangkuot ra malaikat ondo' minigor giu' ra ralayo ru sungoi, “Kula' kia buoi ru kasaukan-kasaukan ondo' makaimuag no masauk ra kalo poyo pupusin?”
Nokorongog aku ra ragu-ragu nano, kaa' kalo maratian ku. Ginio ra nangkuot aku, “Tuan, kaa' ati kulaan boo ra pupus nano ra tauli no?”
Taam io, “Okou Danil, musiti' kou mongoi raino, sabap ra ragu-ragu raginio musiti' kalo pabalaan saboi ra orou pupus.
Masuang ulun kinamin am kapasawon. Ulun malaat kalo makarati'; rumayus ilo mambaal ra kalaatan nilo. Ulun mapintar ayuk makarati'.
Pakaansuk noyo ulun ondo' magulayun gumagaya' saboi 1,335 ngoorou no nakasail noyo.
Okou Danil, musiti' gumagaya' saboi ra pupus. Matoi kou, kaa' maayag saguli' koson mangapu ra tangguang muno ra orou pupus.”
Paat ra
Ginio ra inandu' ri Gosia i Gomir anak ri Diblaim. Maapang i Gomir, am naganak ra sangulun anak ungkuyon.
Indagu
Paat raginio giu' ra Limayak Jijriil, tutukon Ku kuasa' ru saujor ru Israil.”
I Gomir pana maapang poyo am naganak sangulun anak ruandu'. Indagu
Kaa' makaasi' Aku ra bansa' ru Jiuda. Aku,
Pokolonggo' ra tumiti' anak ondo' ininggalanan “Kalo Tagamin”, maapang poyo i Gomir am naganak sangulun anak ungkuyon.
Indagu boo

Ulun ru Jiuda am ulun ru Israil pasimpungon saguli'. Mampalantik ilo ra sangulun tingganai ra tayar ru bansa' nilo; igondo' poyo masauk ilo ra makasingkot am langkaya' giu' ra pagun nilo. Sotopot no orou ru Jijriil
Ginio ra piawo' akau po ngai' ulun ru Israil, ra inggalan “Ulun Kuno”
Indagu
Amon ru rumayus io mambaal raginio, iruon Ku ngaangai' binayang nano saboi magibaang koson paat ra io inanak. Pasaukon Ku io koson ra tana' ondo' kolondo' tutuu' am mapua', am matoi io boo ra paason.
Kalo makaasi' Aku ramuyun, anak-anak nano; akau inanak intor ra pantalanan ra inan.
Ina' mino mantalan ra inan ondo' kalo mapandai mauyu'. Kono, ‘Mongoi aku ra ambai-ambai kuno ondo' mangani' raki' ra akanon am inumon, bulu domba am linon, umau jaitun am wain.’
Ginio ra manginsur Aku riso ra bulungkut makaruui am ampangin ralan nano ra timbok.
Ilowon no ambai nano, kaa' kalo sumunu' risilo. Maguyum io risilo, kaa' kalo makatuum risilo. Mindagu io boo, ‘Muli' aku ra ralaki kasaa' kuli; baal kuno ragili moonsoi poyo intor raino.’
Kalo mangiou io ra Aku ondo' nangani' riso ra gandum, wain, umau jaitun am ngaangai' mas am pirok ondo' pinakai koson sumamba ra Baal.
Ginio ra, bulintok ra manantab luguton Ku saguli' tinaakan Kuno riso, ioginio gandum am wain. Alapon Ku saguli' bulu domba am linon ondo' tinaakan Kuno riso koson saukon ra bayang.
Iruon Ku bayang nano giu' ra saang ru ambai-ambai nano am kolondo' sangulun pana makapamayag riso intor ra kuasa' Kuno.
Langgain Ku ngaangai' pangiantakan nano – ondo' kia pangiantakan kabilaran am poyo pangiantakan kasilaan am orou Sabat – ngaangai' pangiantakan ru ugama nano.

Pusoon Ku puun-puun ru anggur am puun-puun ru ara nano ondo' sumugut riso iono gaji' ru binaal nano ra ambai-ambai nano. Kulawon Ku umo ru anggur am umo ru ara nano masauk ra kataunan, am ngaangai' no pusoon ru bibiag masigo.
Ukumin Ku io sabap ra nakalilian io Raki'. Monolob io ra kaminyan tayar ru Baal, am malimpor io ra kuliamos mas koson mangilou ra ambai-ambai nano. Aku,
Indagu

Pasagulion Ku umo ru anggur ondo' linonggom no ragili am Limayak Kapaganan pasaukon ra rondo' kulobon kalansanan. Giu' no manguma' io Raki' koson ra paat io mamulok, paat ra io bagu miningkual intor ra Misir.
Sabiton no boo Aku ra ralaki nano, am sala' ka boo Baal nano.
Kalo boo iowon Ku io manabit ra inggalan ru Baal.

Paat raginio mambaal Aku ra nabantuan ra ngaangai' bibiag masigo am susuit, maa' raginio kalo rualin nilo ulun Kuno. Patirin Ku ngaangai' kinandoi ru pamulunsaran intor ra pagun no, ngaangai' ilang am busur, maa' raginio ulun Kuno maayag ra kaansayan.
Okou Israil, saukon Tokou ra andu' Kuno;
mabanis guang Kuno am gumagaya';
pakitonon Ku togom am makaasi' rirun,
am niayuk saukon kou ra longgom Kuno ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Suguton Ku bantu' Kuno am saukon kou ra longgom Kuno,
am mangiou kou ra Aku ti
Paat raginio, taamon Ku pakiasian-pakiasian ru ulun Kuno Israil.
Paratuon Ku rasam ra rasawat ru tana',
am tana' manangampos ra gandum, anggur am jaitun.
Makaasi' Aku risilo ondo' sabiton ‘Kalo Tagamin’;
am risilo ondo' sabiton ‘Sala' ka Ulun Kuno’
am raguon Kuno ‘Akau ulun Kuno’;
am tumaam ilo, ‘Okou noyo i Aki Kapuuno' mai.’ ”
Indagu
Aku pana nambayar mopor am limo ngampila' ruit pirok am 150 ngakilogram barli koson makaalap ra ruandu' no.
Minindagu aku riso ra musiti' io maginaa raki' ra mabuoi. Buoi ru ginio, kalo iowon io mantalan ra inan kapoam mansawa', am paat raginio aku pana kalo lumampit riso.

Koson niayuk ra ulun ru Israil; mabuoi kaga' ilo maayag ra kolondo' raja' kapoam tingganai, am kolondo' taak-taak simbalui, kapoam batu-batu pangkaraan ra sambayangin, kolondo' sinungkalalaing kapoam jimat-jimat ondo' pakayon koson manala' ra orou matong.
Kaa' masaboi paat ra ulun ru Israil sumaguli' ra
Mokoondo'
Nabantu' ilo, kaa' kalo nanugut ra bantu'. Nagabau ilo, namatoi, nantakou am nansawa'. Kalaatan gumaai am pamatayan nasauk mansusunu'.
Ginio ra tana' nilo masauk mapua' am ngaangai' ondo' maayag ra rasawat no matoi. Ngaangai' bibiag am susuit, am papait pana matoi.”
Indagu
Orou rondom akau mambaal ra kasalaan. Nabi-nabi min pana koson raginio. Ginio ra mamuso Aku ra Israil, ina' min.

Ulun Kuno mapuso sabap ra marara' ilo mangiou Raki'. Akau, imam-imam, kalo mampalio Raki' am nangimpai ra pangilaan Kuno. Ginio ra Aku pana mangimpai ramuyun am kalo mangiou ra anak-anak mino koson ra imam Kuno.
Akau lumanja' masuang, lumanja' masuang tula min Raki', imam-imam kau. Kulawon Ku boo baal mino. Kalo boo urumaton kau, kaa' asabin.
Masauk kau ra langkaya' sabap ra tula ru ulun Kuno, am ginio ra akau masaga' risilo rumayus makatula.
Mansaan kau ra ukuman koson risilo. Mangukum Aku ramuyun nogondo' ra kalaatan ondo' binaal min.

Mangakan kau ra tayar intor ra taak-taak simbalui ondo' pinataak, kaa' marayus kau maitilan. Sambaan min dewa-dewa kalabungan, kaa' magulayun kau kalo makaalap ra anak. Ngaangai' no nasauk sabap ra nangiruan kano Raki' koson sumamba ra tuhan-tuhan ra bokon.”
Indagu

Nakitulu' ilo intor ra rondo' tataun. Rondo' jujuga' nambala' risilo ra atan ondo' gumogot ilo makapandai. Nangiruan ilo Raki'. Koson ra sangulun ruandu' ondo' nasauk ra ruandu' mantalan ra inan, timinaak ilo ra inan ra tuhan-tuhan ra bokon.

Nampataak ilo ra taak simbalui giu' ra intok-intok sambaan ra sinungkalalaing giu' ra gunung. Sinolob nilo kaminyan giu' ra bulur, giu' ra saau ru puun-puun tataun makalu ondo' maawas raun sabap ra intok raginio masindungan.
Kinibit nano anak-anak ruandu' min nasauk ra ruandu' mantalan ra inan, am anak-anak mangiwan ra ruandu' min nansasawa'.
Kaa' kalo ukumin Ku ilo koson ra binaal raginio, sabap ra akau galama' pana nansawa' ra ruandu'-ruandu' mantalan ra inan ondo' mangandoi giu' ra baloi ru sinungkalalaing sambaan.
“Kabalu' pana akau, ulun ru Israil kalo gumagaya' Raki', akau no poyo Jiuda pai' pambaal koson raginio. Pai' ongoi sambayang giu' ra Gilgal, kapoam giu' ra Bitil.
Ulun ru Israil mokotog ulu koson ra baghal. Ati kulaan Aku makapagalung risilo koson ra domba giu' ra padang sakot?
Ulun ru Israil nabunduk guang ra sinungkalalaing. Ginio ra polosoon ilo.
Mopongo masuang inum ra wain, mantalan ilo ra inan ra guang maansayan. Masaga' ilo poyo asabin ka urumaton.
Ibiton ilo mugar koson siabin ru angin. Mokoowot ilo ra uyu' sabap ra taak-taak simbalui ondo' pinataak nilo ra dewa-dewa.

Imam kau ngaangai', rongog kano! Akau ulun ru Israil, ilai' toojo! Akau pabukat ru raja', rongog kano! Akau noyo ondo' musiti' mangakim ra matimpok, kaa' akau galama' akimin! Nasauk kano koson ra landak giu' ra Mijpa, koson ra jajaling ondo' pinaatang giu' ra Gunung Tabor,
am koson ra luang malandom giu' ra Sitim. Ginio ra mangukum Aku ramuyun ngaangai'.
Makapandai Aku ramuyun, akau Israil. Kalo makapansibuni kau intor Raki', am ulun mino kalo maaya' sumamba Raki'.”
Kalaatan ondo' binaal ru ulun ru Israil mongompong risilo sumaguli' ri Aki Kapuuno'. Kinapit ilo kaga' ru sumamba ra sinungkalalaing, saboi kalo boo mangiou ilo ra
Kinalimbau ru ulun ru Israil makito kaga' am nasauk ra inono' ru kasalaan nilo. Tula nilo nangkinibit risilo nakasaru am naratu', am bansa' ru Jiuda pana naratu' nakaaya' risilo.
Maguyum ilo ra
Kalo gumagaya' ilo ra
Samputi' bujung giu' ra Gibia! Kosongowo' bolos ru tatandu' mampiau mangayou giu' ra Rama! Golok no ra golok ru pangayawan giu' ra Bitil!
Mapuso Israil paat ra orou ukuman ra maagu no. Rongog kano, akau ulun ru Israil, baal ragitio maaru' masauk!
Indagu
Raino Israil inimbolo'. Natatakan io ra tana' longgom nano sabap ra mokotog guang nano am nakiindangan intor ra ulun ondo' mailo mangindangan riso.
Ginio ra tutukon Ku Israil, am pusoon bansa' ru Jiuda.

Paat ra Israil am Jiuda makaliman ra baal nilo ondo' kalo moonsoi, mongoi Israil ra pagun Asyur koson makiindangan intor ra raja' ondo' matulai, kaa' raja' no kalo makapangindangan kapoam mamuna' ra baal nilo.
Koson ra sanginan singa', mamulunsar Aku ra bansa' ru Israil am bansa' ru Jiuda. Aku galama' maminsang risilo am mangiruan risilo. Ralaaton Ku ilo, am kolondo' sangulun pana makapamayag risilo.
Iruanin Ku ulun Kuno saboi maimbolo' ilo kaga' sabap ra tula nilo, am matong ilo maguyum Raki'. Maaru' lair ra ralalom ru kaimbalaan, mirot ilo maguyum Raki'.”
Indagu ulun ru Israil, “Ibok saguli' takano ra
Mopongo ruo kapoam talu ngoorou babason No itakau am maayag takau giu' ra saang Nano.
Ibok pirot takano koson mulig ra
Kaa' indagu
Ginio ra manusub Aku ra nabi-nabi Kuno koson mampasaboi ra tanou Kuno ramuyun ra akau musiti' ukumin am pusoon. Ondo' gogoton Kuno intor ramuyun nakatalang am makito toojo.
Masaga' Aku poyo ra akau motogom Raki' ka mampataak ra taak simbalui Raki'. Masaga' Aku poyo ra akau makaulig Raki' ka monolob ra taak simbalui Raki'.
Kaa' pakaayan kau ayuk ra tana' giu' ra Adam,
Giliad rondo' bandar ondo' nososok ra ulun malaat am ulun mamatoi.

Imam-imam giu' ra bandar raginio koson ra santimungan ulun mantakou ondo' nambaal ra pamulunsaran sininok ra ulun ondo' mangkiralan. Giu' pana ra ralan ondo' sumuku' ra intok mapasau giu' ra Sikgim pana namatoi ilo. Sumingon ilo mambaal ra ngaangai' baal ra malaat no.
Nakakito Aku ra rondo' ondo' makalalaa' giu' ra Israil: ulun Kuno nampajamol ra inan ra sumamba ra sinungkalalaing.
Koson ramuyun, akau ulun ru Jiuda, inaru' Ku noyo orou koson mangukum ramuyun niayuk sabap ra binaal min.”
Indagu
Kalo igondo' ra pangkaran nilo ra mangkara' Aku ra ngaangai' binaal malaat no. Linibungan ilo ru tula saboi makito Ku toojo.”
Indagu
Ilo ngaangai' malaat am kalo gumagaya'. Sisang nilo koson ra apui giu' ra ralalom ru rapuan ondo' kalo pinaangan ru ulun mambaal ra ruti' ra kalo poyo mopongo kabaal ruti' makata' koson solobon.
Paat ra bunsag maayo ru raja', binaal nilo raja' am niayuk pagawai-pagawai nano nanginum ra wain saboi nagauk am nambaal ra baal-baal sasambungon.

Atang malaat nilo koson ra apui ondo' bibilak giu' ra ralalom ru rapuan. Sangit nilo malasu' giu' ra ralalom ru guang buoi ru rondom, am nasauk ra bilak ru apui ondo' nanimbula' ra maayo paat ra susuab ti.
Ralalom ru sangit, namatoi ilo ra tingganai-tingganai nilo. Raja'-raja' nilo pinatoi rondo' am rondo', kaa' kolondo' sangulun pana nakiasi' Raki' koson makiindangan.”
Indagu
Kalo nakaliman ilo ra binaal ragitio nampalawo risilo. Pupus ru bayag nilo mamaar noyo, kaa' kalo nakapandai ilo.
Kinalimbau ru ulun ru Israil makito toojo am nasauk ra inono' ru kasalaan nilo. Kabalu' pana ngaangai' nasauk noyo, kalo siminaguli' ilo Raki',
Ulun ru Israil koson ra susuit asang ondo' sasambungon. Kasaa' no makiindangan ilo ra Misir, malupus raginio Asyur!
Kaa' paat ra ilo mansail, paatangon Ku jajaling am mamparakop risilo koson ra ulun mamparakop ra susuit. Ukumin Ku ilo sabap ra kalaatan ondo' binaal nilo.
“Nangiruan ilo Raki' am giminuor Raki'. Kapaganan lumumpa' risilo. Mapuso ilo. Masaga' Aku mamayag risilo, kaa' sambayang nilo Raki' kalo motopot.

Kalo makiasi' ilo Raki' ra mabanis guang. Kaa' mampas ilo ra intok kaalangan am manulaboi koson ra binaal ru ulun ondo' kalo makaulig Raki'. Paat ra ilo makiasi' makitaak ra gandum am wain, pilaton nilo inan koson ra binaal ru ulun ondo' sumamba ra sinungkalalaing. Minanggal ilo Raki'!
Kabalu' pana Aku nampasukor am nampaikang risilo, kaa' nangatang ilo ra malaat minanggal Raki'.

Marayus ilo maya' ra dewa ondo' kolondo' atan pana kuasa'. Koson ra busur ondo' nandikong, mailo ilo lansanin. Sabap ra tingganai-tingganai nilo mindagu ra malilimbau, potoyon ilo ra ilang, am ulun ru Misir makakurit risilo.”
Indagu
Kabalu' pana mangiou ilo ra Aku ti i Aki Kapuuno', am mindagu ra ilo ulun Kuno ondo' nakaulig Raki',
kaa' nangimpai ilo ra baal ondo' moonsoi. Ginio ra pantula' mangilou risilo.

“Ulun Kuno nampili' ra raja'-raja' ra kalo nangkuot ra pampaguangan Kuno. Nampili' ilo ra tingganai-tingganai ra kalo nakitaak ra pangiawan Kuno. Nangalap ilo ra mas am pirok am nambaal ra sinungkalalaing ondo' nangkinibit ra kapusaan nilo.
Masisang Aku ra sapi' mas ondo' sambaan ru mamagun ru bandar Samaria. Siminangit Aku kaga' risilo. Saboi sanggilan kia ilo marayus sumamba ra sinungkalalaing?
Sangulun manukang giu' ra Israil nambaal rondo' sinungkalalaing; sinungkalalaing no sala' ka i Aki Kapuuno'! Sinungkalalaing ru sapi' mas ondo' sambaan giu' ra Samaria no tutukon.

Paat ra ulun Kuno mampatias ra angin, mangkumos ilo ra bagiu'. Umo ru gandum ondo' kalo sumilou kolondo' ampos ru akanon. Kaa' amon ru umo no sumilou niayuk, ulun bansa' ra bokon mangai' ra gandum nano.
Ulun ru Israil nasauk noyo koson ra bansa'-bansa' ra bokon ondo' kolondo' boo onong, koson ra pagangan ondo' napilang.
Ulun ru Israil mokotog guang koson ra kaladai masigo, manugut ilo ra kasagaan nilo galama'. Makiindangan ilo intor ra Asyur. Binayaran noyo ru Israil pagun-pagun ra bokon koson makiampin.
Kaa' raino timungon Ku ilo am mangukum risilo. Kalo boo mabuoi maimbolo' ilo paat ra raja' ru Asyur mangimbolo' risilo.
“Sumuang-suang altar ondo' baalon ru ulun ru Israil koson mamuso ra tula, sumuang poyo boo intok nilo mambaal ra tula.
Nanulis Aku noyo ra masuang pangilaan risilo, kaa' inimpayan nilo ngaangai' no sabap ra mangkara' ra pangilaan no sasala' am kalo natutunan.
Masaga' ilo mampataak ra taak simbalui Raki', am mangakan ra kual ru taak simbalui no. Kaa' Aku,

“Ulun ru Israil nambaal ra istana-istana, kaa' nalilianan nilo ondo' Namangun risilo. Ulun ru Jiuda nambaal ra bandar-bandar mokoondo' ra kubu, kaa' paratuon Ku apui koson monolob ra ngaangai' bandar am istana nilo.”

Akau ulun ru Israil, longgo' kano mangiantak ra pangiantakan koson ra bansa'-bansa' ra bokon. Iniruanan min noyo i Aki Kapuuno' min am kalo giminagaya' Riso. Giu' ra moonong intok pangagikan ra gandum,
Kaa' kalo boo mabuoi matutusan kau ra gandum am umau jaitun, am wain mino makai'.
Akau, ulun ru Israil kalo mayan giu' ra pagun ondo' pataakon ru
Giu' ra pagun-pagun no kalo makapampataak kau ra wain kapoam taak simbalui ra bibiag koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Paat ra pangiantakan ru ugama koson mangurumat ra

Paat ra karaat makasaboi am mamagun nantutuliar, ulun ru Misir manimung ramuyun koson potoyon am koson lobongon giu' ra Mimpis! Rapu' mino intor ra pirok am tana' ru baloi min ragili malungkutan ru sakot am bulungkut makaruui.

Nanusub i Aki Kapuuno' raki' koson ra nabi koson mampakara' ra ulun ru Israil, kaa' ati ayuk angayan kuno, mirot kau koson mampalandak raki' koson ra mampalandak ra susuit. Giu' ra pagun longgom ri Aki Kapuuno' galama', nabi-nabi Nano tinula' ru mamagun.
Binaal mino malaat kaga', koson ondo' binaal ru ulun giu' ra Gibia.
Kinaayo ru Israil mansiab lumiot koson ra susuit. Kalo boo makaalap ilo ra anak. Ruandu' nilo pana kalo boo maapang.
Kaa' kabalu' pana anak-anak inanak am pinasukor, alapon Ku anak-anak nilo am kolondo' sangulun pana maayag. Paat ra Aku mangiruan ramuyun, baal-baal makalalaa' lumumpa' ramuyun.”
Iou
Atan kia musiti' ku kitaakon intor Rirun tayar ru ulun ragitio? Sauko' noyo ruandu' nilo ra tabanang! Polosoon ilo kalo mampatiti' ra lalagang.
Indagu
Ulun ru Israil koson ra puun tataun ondo' kalo nangkawa' am bakat nano mapua' noyo. Kalo maganak ilo, potoyon Ku anak-anak ondo' tagamin nilo.”
I Aki Kapuuno' ondo' sambaan Kuno mangimpai ra ulun Nano, sabap kalo riminongog ilo Riso. Masauk ilo ra ulun tumanggau ra gino ngai' ru bansa'- bansa'.

Ulun ru Israil koson ra puun ru anggur ondo' makakawa' ra maawas. Gumaai langkaya' nilo, sumuang poyo altar baalon nilo. Sumuang-suang ampos ru tana' nilo, matuyu' poyo boo batu-batu sambaan ondo' binaal nilo.
Guang nilo natikop ra ruung am raino ilo musiti' maimbolo' kinibit ru tula nilo. Lunsayon ri Aki Kapuuno' altar-altar nilo am mampagaba' ra batu-batu sambaan nilo.
Kalo boo mabuoi mindagu ilo, “Kolondo' raja' takau sabap ra kalo malaa' takau ra

Mindagu ilo ra ragu-ragu kolondo' toojo onong am nambaal ra bantu' magabau am niayuk nangigot ra nabantuan ondo' kolondo' onong. Katimpakan pinatimpurok saboi kolondo' katimpakan no nakasuku' ra titikop pagun koson ra tatanom makaanit giu' ra umo ondo' rinadu' noyo.
Mamagun ru bandar Samaria malaa' am nangulir sabap ra natatakan ra sapi' mas giu' ra Bitil.
Sinungkalalaing no ibiton giu' ra Asyur koson pataakon ra raja' ondo' matulai. Israil asabin am tauyuon sabap ra bilin ondo' binaya' nano.
Raja' ru Samaria mapuso koson ra putul ru tataun ondo' naabas ru timug.
Intok-intok ru ulun ru Israil sumamba ra sinungkalalaing giu' ra tampak ru bulur giu' ra Bitil
Bulunsaron Ku

“Galing i Israil koson ra sapi' mamulok ondo' inila', am magail tumampos mangagik ra gandum. Kalo pana boo paatangon Ku kuk ra impus nano ondo' moonsoi no. Kaa' raino namatas Aku noyo koson jajalin io mangandoi ra maagat. Manusub Aku ri Jiuda mamparadu' am Israil mamunduk ra radu'.
Indagu Aku, ‘Ukabo' tana' bagu ra tayar min galama', tiasi' ra sampug ru katimpakan, am kumoso' barakat ondo' inampos ru kinotopot ru togom min Raki'. Nasaboi paat no ra akau sumaguli' Raki',
Kaa' akau boo nantanom ra kalaatan am nangkumos ra kolondo' katimpakan. Mangakan kau kalalaat ra ampos ru abau min.
“Ginio sabap ra akau malansan ra kurita' kuda

am akau pana malumpa' ru pangayawan am ngaangai' kubu min pusoon. Baal nano masauk koson ra orou ru Raja' Salman namuso ra bandar Bit-Arbil ralalom pangayawan, am nampaluus ra ina'-ina' nababaya' ra anak-anak nilo.
Baal raginio masauk ramuyun, mamagun kau ru Bitil, sabap ra nambaal kau ra kalaatan ondo' maayo. Makatalimpuun ayuk pangayawan, matoi raja' ru Israil.”
“Motogom Aku ri Israil intor ra io lakat poyo boborok;
Piawon Ku anak Kuno mingkual intor ra Misir.
Gino Aku
lumanja' ilo minggalur Raki'.
Ulun Kuno mampataak ra taak simbalui ri Baal;
monolob ilo ra kaminyan ra sinungkalalaing.
Sotopot no Aku noyo ondo' nangila' ri Israil mugar.
Ganggalin Ku ulun Kuno ra togom;
magalung Aku risilo
kaa' marara' ilo mangiou raginio.
Pinainggaar Ku ilo
ra togom maayo.
Ibain Ku am mangalok risilo,
Kumuung Aku am mampaakan risilo.
“Marara' ilo sumaguli' Raki'. Ginio ra musiti' ilo sumaguli' ra Misir, am bansa' ru Asyur mamarinta risilo.
Pangayawan lumumpa' ra bandar-bandar nilo, am kulobon garabang ru bandar lunsayon. Ulun Kuno pusoon sabap ra sinugut nilo kasagaan nilo galama'.
Totopot ilo masaga' mangiruan Raki'. Mampalaa ilo makiindangan sabap ra inimbolo', kaa' kolondo' osoi pana mampalabus risilo.
kalo lair iruanin Tokou.
Maaru' lair pusoon Tokou koson ra Adma,
kapoam mangukum rirun koson ra Jiboim:
Kalo makakau' Aku mambaal koson raginio.
Togom Kuno rirun maayo kaga'.
Kalo mangukum Aku ramuyun paat ra Aku sumangit;
Kalo boo mamuso Aku ra Israil,
sabap Aku ti i Aki Kapuuno' am sala' ka ulun.
Aku, Ondo' Matulai Kaga' mabaya' ramuyun,
kalo boo sumangit Aku ramuyun.”
Indagu
Intor ra Misir mansiab ilo mongoi Raki' koson ra kinataki' ru susuit, am intor ra Asyur koson ra susuit asang. Ibiton Ku ilo muli' ra baloi nilo saguli'. Aku,
Indagu

Ngaangai' ondo' binaal ru ulun ru Israil intor ra susuab ti saboi ra mamai' ngaangai' no kolondo' onong, kaa' niayuk paliso no mamuso koson ra angin sirangon. Abau am kalaatan gumaai-gaai ra gino po ngai' nilo. Nambaal ilo ra nabantuan ra Asyur am niayuk nagibit ra umau giu' ra Misir koson ra tatandu' ru pabukatan.”
Kinamatuaan nilo, i Jakub, namparuung ri Isau, pongkotob ra pongkobon nano paat ra ilo ruo lakat poyo ra ralalom ru binunakan ru ina', am paat nasukor i Jakub giminula' ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Nagabu' i Jakub ra malaikat am namanang. Nantangi' i Jakub ra nakibarakat, am minatong i Aki Kapuuno' riso giu' ra Bitil am minindagu riso.
I Aki Kapuuno' no

Ginio ra, akau papag ri Jakub, pangintopot kano ri Aki Kapuuno', am saguli' kano Riso. Kaayag kano ra matikop ra togom am baalo' ondo' matimpok, am inaani' ra guang tumaan saboi i Aki Kapuuno' min mimbuor.
Indagu
Konilo, ‘Langkaya' akai raino. Masuang rapu' mai. Kolondo' osoi pana makapanguu' ramon nambaal ra malaat.’
Aku noyo
“Minindagu Aku noyo ra nabi-nabi, am niayuk nangani' risilo ra masuang pinaintalang, am pinabala' galing risilo nangani' Aku ra pampakaraan ra ulun Kuno.

Kaa', lakat poyo mokoondo' ondo' siminamba ra sinungkalalaing giu' ra Giliad am nampataak ra sapi' giu' ra rasawat ru altar giu' ra Gilgal. Kaa' matoi ilo ondo' siminamba ra sinungkalalaing no, am altar-altar giu' ra Gilgal masauk ra batu tinuntur giu' ra padang.”
Nanusub
Nambaal ulun ru Israil ra

Paat ra galing i paat ra bansa' ru Ipraim minindagu, bansa'-bansa' ra bokon giu' ra Israil malaa'. Mangurumat ilo kaga' ra Ipraim, kaa' raino bansa' ru Ipraim makatula. Sinamba nilo Baal, ginio ra matoi ilo.

Riminayus-rayus ilo nambaal ra tula am nambaal ra sinungkalalaing ru logam koson sambaan – sinungkalalaing intor ra pirok, ondo' inatang ru utok ru ulun am binaal ru kalindu' ru ulun. Konilo boo, “Pataako' noyo taak simbalui ra sinungkalalaing ti!” Imuagon, mangalok ulun ra sinungkalalaing anak ru sapi'!

Ginio ra lumiot ilo koson ra gaun mapulak kapoam bolobou paat ra susuab ti. Masauk ilo koson ra apol ondo' siabin ru angin intor ra intok pangagikan ra gandum, am koson ra lisun ondo' miningkual intor ra intok no.
Indagu
Nagalung Aku ramuyun giu' ra tana' kaagisan ondo' mapua'.
