Kaa' pakaayan kau boo ra pagun ondo' moonsoi, am naasug kau am niayuk najala', liminimbau kau am nampalilian Raki'.
Ginio ra bulunsaron Takamin koson ra singa'. Koson ra ampunguon mangkuliman Aku koson mamulunsar ramuyun giu' ra ralan.
Bulunsaron Takamin koson ra baawang ondo' natatakan ra anak. Bibinsangon Takamin. Koson ra singa' saamon Takamin ra giu' no, am koson ra bibiag masigo bibinsangon Takamin.
Mamuso Aku ramuyun, ulun ru Israil kau! Osoi kia makapangindangan ramuyun?
Nakiani' kau ra raja' am tingganai, kaa' makapamayag ilo kia ra bansa' ti?
Ralalom ru sangit Kuno inanian Takamin ra raja'-raja', kaa' ra guang malasu' Aku nangalap risilo mugar.
Tula am kasalaan ru Israil tinulisan, am binulian ondo' tinulisan no.

Israil mokoondo' ra kaluagan koson maayag, kaa' Israil sasambungon kaga' saboi kalo pinakai kaluagan raginio. Israil koson ra lalagang ondo' mamaar anakon kaa' marara' mingkual intor ra binunakan ru ina'.
Kalo bayagon Ku ulun ragitio intor ra intok ru ulun namagatoi kapoam intor ra kuasa' ru kapatayan. Okou kapatayan, porotongo' noyo
Kabalu' pana Israil langkaya' koson ra sakot ondo' malabung,
Samaria musiti' ukumin sabap giminuor Raki'. Matoi mamagun nano ralalom pangayawan. Pampasin lalagang saboi matutuk, am tinai' ru ruandu' maapang abuin.”
Saguli' no ra
Saguli' kano ra
Pagun ru Asyur kalo makabayag ramon. Kurita' kuda pana kalo makapanindung ramon. Kalo boo mindagu akai ra sinungkalalaing-sinungkalalaing raginio i Aki Kapuuno' mai. Iou
Indagu
“Ulun Kuno ondo' timinalansiang ibiton Ku saguli'.
Tagamin Ku ilo ra sotopot ru guang,
sabap ra kalo boo sumangit Aku risilo.
Tayar ru ulun ru Israil, koson Aku ra rasam
ondo' mamasa' ra tana' ondo' mapua'.
Mungkalar ilo koson ra busak,
am koson ra puun tataun giu' ra Libanon ondo' malandom bakat nano.
Maayag ilo am sumuang toojo
koson ra tatanom ondo' masuang talantar nano,
am masauk ilo ra moonsoi koson ra puun ru jaitun.
Masauk ilo ra maamis owou
koson ra puun ru sidar giu' ra Libanon.
Sumaguli' ilo Raki'
am maayag ralalom ru panindungan Kuno.
Mataki' ilo gumaai am lumanja' lumangkaya'
koson ra gandum timinuu' giu' ra umo ondo' malabung,
am koson ra umo ru anggur ondo' masuang ampos nano.
Mauligan ilo kaga' koson ra wain intor ra Libanon.
Ulun ru Israil
iowon Ku pakiasian nilo am magalung risilo.
Koson ra puun tataun sumansam ayuk sindungin Ku ilo;
Aku noyo puun ru ngaangai' barakat nilo.”
Gama' ru ulun ondo' mapintar makarati' ra atan ondo' tinulisan ti am niayuk guangon no toojo. Panuluan intor ra
Gitio noyo tanou ru
Rongog kano, akau ulun matutuo;
rongog kano, akau ngaangai' ulun giu' ra Jiuda.
Igondo' kia baal koson ragitio nasauk paat min ragili,
kapoam paat ru kinamatuaan min ragili?
Tunungo' kasaukan ti ra anak-anak muno,
maa' raginio tunungon nilo ra anak-anak nilo,
am anak-anak nilono boo poyo mantunung raginio ra papag ra tauli no.
Sampanon ru gapu' ondo' kalo mauntob suang no
minorop giu' ra umo-umo am nangai' ra ampos no.
Atan ondo' tinatang ru sampanon ra gapu' no,
sinaliir ru sampanon ra bokon poyo.
Akau ondo' nagauk, tirong kano!
Akau ondo' manginum ra wain, pantangi' kano!
Wain ondo' baguon
ginaau noyo intor ra kabang min.
bansa' ondo' maikang am kalo mauntob suang nano;
ripon nilo malarom koson ra ripon ru singa'.
Puun ru anggur takau pinuso noyo,
am puun ru ara takau pinandak.
Kulapa' ru puun tataun inanit,
saboi raan-raan nasauk ra mapulak.
Akau ngaangai' ulun, pantangi' kano,
koson ra ralaa ondo' nanulaboi ra pinatayan ru tamung nano.
Kolondo' boo gandum am wain koson pataakon giu' ra Baloi ru
imam-imam nantangi' sabap ra kolondo' pataakon ra tayar ru
Umo-umo nasaliir;
tana' mangulir
sabap ra gandum napuso noyo,
kawa' ru anggur napua' noyo boo,
am puun jaitun liminonot.
Akau ulun magitanom, pangiluk guang kano;
akau ulun manangumo ra anggur, pantangi' kano,
sabap ra gandum, barli,
am ngaangai' tinanom napuso noyo.
Puun ru kikinawa' giu' ra umo liminonot noyo boo ngaangai';
puun anggur, puun ipol, puun ara, puun kurma am puun dalima',
mamagun pana kalo boo maansukan.
Akau imam-imam ondo' mangandoi giu' ra altar,
pambayang kano ra konoon karung am pantangi' no.
Umpos kano ra ralalom Baloi ru
am panulaboi kano ra mosorondom.
Kolondo' boo gandum am wain
koson pataakon ri Aki Kapuuno' min.
Pangani' no ra susuban koson mampali;
pambaal no rondo' pantimungan.
Susubo' tingganai-tingganai
am ngaangai' mamagun ru Jiuda
matong ra Baloi ru
i Aki Kapuuno' min
am pampiau makiindangan Riso.
paat ra Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa', mamparatong ra katutukan.
Mapara' boo makalalaa' orou raginio!
Tinanom pinuso giu' ra talupak ru mato takau.
Kolondo' boo indii am lalakup giu' ra ralalom Baloi ri Aki Kapuuno' takau.
Sampug minatoi giu' ra tana' ondo' mapua'.
Kolondo' boo gandum koson buliin;
kulapa' pambulian ra bilor kolondo' suang nasauk ra nalunsai.
Bibiag tinambiag mampagala' am magalabo,
sabap kolondo' boo padang sakot risilo ngaangai';
sampanon ru domba pana maimbolo'.
Gumolok aku Rirun, iou
sabap padang sakot am puun tataun mapua' noyo am minatoi,
ilain koson nosolob ru apui.
Mulu' poyo ra bibiag masigo pana gumolok Rirun,
sabap ra sungoi-sungoi napua' noyo,
am padang sakot giu' ra tana' kaagisan nosolob noyo ru apui.
Samputi' bujung, kosongowo' bolos tatandu' makalalaa' giu' ra Sion,
bulur matulai ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Ponontol kano, akau mamagun ru Jiuda,
sabap ra Orou ru
Orou raginio molondom am majuut,
orou maitom am makagaun.
Saujor ru gapu' no matong
koson ra kalandaman ondo' liminibung ra kagunungan.
Kalo poyo igondo' nasauk baal koson ragitio,
am baal ragitio kalo boo masauk saguli'.
Koson ra apui ondo' sumolob am mangumpo,
sampanon ru gapu' mangakan ra ngaangai' tinanom.
Giu' ra saang ru sampanon ru gapu',
padang moonsoi koson ra taman Idin.
Kaa' giu' ra talikuron ru sampanon ru gapu',
padang no nasauk noyo ra tana' mapua'.
Ngaangai' no pinuso ru gapu'.
am masimbul koson ra kuda ru pangayawan.
Paat ra gapu' morop giu' ra tampak ru gunung,
gapu' satulindak koson ra kurita' kuda,
am manguripit koson ra sakot mapua' ra nosolob.
Gapu' timininting koson ra saujor
ondo' nakatampos koson mamulunsar.
Paat ra gapu' sumuku', ngaangai' ulun malaa',
ngaangai' bulos ru ulun malui ra mabula'.
Gapu' mamulunsar koson ra ulun tutumula',
am mangkiwa' ra timbok koson ra saujor.
Ngaangai' gapu' marayus jumalai ra sumuku',
ra kalo mangulau ra sukuan
kapoam makapajunjung.
Gapu' mapajanjang ra ngaangai' ompong,
ra kolondo' makapanginga'.
Gapu' mamulunsar ra bandar,
masimbul giu' ra rasawat ru timbok ru bandar,
mangkiwa' ra baloi-baloi,
am sumubol maya' ra gigimpalan koson ra ulun mantatakou.
am limbowon pana monontol.
Mato ru orou am sila' lumondom,
butitin-butitin kalo boo suminda.
Saujor ondo' gumagaya' Riso masuang am maikang.
Mapara' boo makalalaa' orou ru
Kolondo' sangulun pana tumaan.
Indagu
talikur kano intor ra tula ra totopot am saguli' kano Raki'
am mampali, mantangi' am manulaboi.
Polosoon noyo guang min ra matutuk no mampakito ra guang pansagulian,
pai' ayuk rilako' bayang.”
Saguli' no ra
Io no motogom am napanu' ra asi';
Io no tumaan guang am manugut ra bantu' Nano;
Io no magail makatampos mangampun
am kalo masaga' mangukum.
Maaru' lair
am mambarakat ramuyun ra ampos ru tana' ti ondo' masuang.
Ginio ra makapampataak kau
Riso ra gandum am wain.
Samputi' bujung giu' ra Bulur Sion;
panusub no koson mampali,
am baalo' rondo' pantimungan.
Timungo' ngaangai' mamagun,
potomposo' ilo koson pantimungan ru ulun,
ibito' ulun matutuo,
timungo' anak-anak
am lalagang-lalagang niayuk.
Mansawo ondo' bagu nagandu' pana musiti' mangiruan ra lamin, am matong.
Imam-imam ondo' mangandoi ayuk ra
giu' ra lolot ru altar am langgar ra tingganai Baloi ru
musiti' mantangi' am makiasi' koson ragitio,
“Pakaasi' no ra ulun Muno,
iou
Pai' polosoo' bansa' ra bokon
magasab am mangiis ramon am mindagu,
‘Ati kia i Aki Kapuuno' min?’ ”
mampalio ra tana' Nano;
makaasi' Io ra ulun Nano.
Tumaam Io risilo,
“Raino masaga' Aku mangani' ramuyun ra gandum, wain am umau jaitun,
am basugon kau.
Bansa'-bansa' ra bokon kalo boo magasab ramuyun.
Painggaluron Ku pulalai ru gapu'
ondo' minatong intor ra ralayo.
Pagiruon Ku santayaran intor ra pulalai raginio
giu' ra tana' kaagisan.
Baris ra pagulu ru pulalai no pagiruon
saboi malinjob giu' ra Raat Matoi,
am baris ra tinaulian
malinjob giu' ra Raat Tanga'.
Gapu' ondo' minatoi masauk ra mootong.
Pusoon Ku pulalai raginio
sabap ra ngaangai' binaal nano ramuyun.
“Akau umo, pai' kalaa',
pakaansuk no am pagindii no,
sabap ra baal ra maayo ondo' binaal ru
Akau bibiag, pai' kalaa',
sabap ra padang sakot raino masansam,
puun mangkawa',
am kawa' ru ara am niayuk kawa' ru anggur pana masuang.
“Pakaansuk kano,
akau mamagun ru Sion,
pakaansuk kano sabap ra atan ondo' binaal ru
Nangani' Io ra rasam ondo' maukop bulintok raun tumutu',
Namparatu' Io ra rasam bulintok ra masimu'
am rasam bulintok ra mambusak koson ragili.
Intok pangagikan ra gandum mososok ra gandum,
am intok mamaga' ra kawa' ru anggur malabaan
ra wain am umau jaitun.
Paaligon Ku ngaangai' nangalubat ramuyun
ra bilor-bilor bulintok ra gapu' nangakan ra ampos ru tinanom min.
Aku noyo ondo' nanusub ra
sampanon ru gapu' no nantipagon ramuyun.
Kaa' raino mokoondo' kau
ra akanon naukop saboi naasug.
Mongompor kau ra
nambaal Io ra baal makaimuag ramuyun.
Ulun Kuno totopot kalo boo asabin.
Ginio ra, akau Israil, makapandai kau
ra Aku soroi ra tatanga' min,
am ra Aku,
am kolondo' boo bokon.
Ulun Kuno totopot kalo boo asabin.”
anak ungkuyon am anak ruandu' min
mampatanou ra tanou Kuno;
ulun matutuo min maginupi,
am ulun mamulok min makakito ra napakitanan.
Paat raginio pasasaron Ku Ambiluo Kuno
mulu' poyo ra ulipon-ulipon,
ungkuyon am poyo ruandu'.
“Mangani' Aku ra tatandu' ra orou raginio, giu' ra limbowon am ra tana' ti;
mokoondo' malayak ra raraa',
apui am lisun ra makapal.
mato ru orou masauk ra molondom,
am sila' masauk ra malia' koson ra raraa'.
bayagon.
Koson ra rinagu ru
‘Santayaran ulun giu' ra Jirusalim maayag;
ilo ondo' pilion Kuno maayag.’ ”
Indagu
“Paat raginio patapulion Ku kalangkayaan ru
Jiuda am Jirusalim.
Timungon Ku ngaangai' bansa'
am magibit risilo giu' ra Limayak Pangakiman.
Akimin Ku ilo ra giu' no
sabap ra ngaangai' binaal nilo ra ulun Kuno.
Namatir ilo ra ulun Kuno giu' ra masuang pagun,
am nantayar-tayar ra tana' ru Israil, pagun longgom Kuno.
Nagugundi' ilo koson mangaru'
ra ulun makaalap ra ulun rinakop.
Nantalan ilo ra lalaing ungkuyon
am ruandu' maa' raginio saukon ra ulipon.
Alapon nilo ruit ondo' naapu
koson mambayar ra ulun mantalan ra inan am mambali ra wain.
Nampagaau kau ra mas am pirok Kuno, am niayuk nagibit ra rapu' kalangkayaan Kuno ra ralalom baloi ru sinungkalalaing min.
Inibit min mamagun ru Jiuda am Jirusalim giu' ra intok maalur, am niayuk nantalan risilo ra ulun ru Junani.
Kaa' raino magibit Aku risilo mingkual intor ra intok-intok nantalanan min risilo. Balasin Ku kalaatan min risilo.
Anak-anak ungkuyon am ruandu' min talanon ra ulun ru Jiuda; ulun ru Jiuda poyo mantalan risilo ra Syiba, pagun ondo' maalur kaga'. Aku,
Potonowo' baal ragitio ra bansa'-bansa',
‘Tampos kano koson mantula',
piawo' ulun-ulun tutumula' min;
timungo' ngaangai' saujor, am jalog kano!
am niayuk tantab koson saukon ra tutura'.
Ulun ondo' malawo musiti' maya' mindagu: Aku tutumula'.
Ibok kano ra mataki',
akau bansa'-bansa' giu' ra mamaar,
timung kano giu' ra limayak.’ ”
Iou
Indagu poyo
am mongoi ra Limayak Pangakiman.
Giu' no Aku,
ra ngaangai' bansa' ra mamaar.
Malaat ilo kaga',
putulo' ilo koson ra gandum bulintok ra mangkumos;
pagaa' ilo koson ra kawa' ru anggur giu' ra intok pamagaan ra kawa' ru anggur saboi wain lumimpak.”
Riribu ulun soroi giu' ra Limayak Pangakiman.
Giu' no Orou ru
Mato ru orou am sila' lumondom,
am butitin-butitin kalo boo suminda.
maningkalur Io intor ra Jirusalim;
limbowon am tana' ti malunggun,
kaa' manindung Io ra ulun Nano.
“Ginio ra akau Israil,
makapandai kau boo,
ra Aku noyo
i Aki Kapuuno' min.
Mayan Aku giu' ra Sion,
bulur Kuno ondo' matulai.
Jirusalim masauk ra bandar ondo' matulai;
ulun bansa' ra bokon totopot kalo
boo mampagaau raginio.
Paat raginio gunung libungin ru umo ru anggur;
bibiag tinambiag soroi giu' ra moonong bulur;
ngaangai' sungoi giu' ra Jiuda totopon ra timug.
Rondo' sungoi tumilis intor ra Baloi ru
sungoi no manimug ra Limayak Akasia.
Misir masauk ra tana' kaagisan,
am Idom masauk ra tuntur ru nalunsai,
sabap ra namulunsar ilo ra Jiuda
am namatoi ra mamagun nano ondo' kolondo' sala.
Mansuli'
nilo ondo' pinatoi;
kalo mompoloso Aku ra ulun ondo' makasala no makalabus.
Kaa' Jiuda am Jirusalim ayanin ru ulun ra sabubuoi no,
am Aku,
Gitio noyo ondo' rinagu ri Amos,
bolos Nano nonggolon intor ra Jirusalim.
Padang ru sakot nasauk ra mapua',
sakot giu' ra Gunung Karmil nasauk ra mapua'.”
Ginio ra atarin Ku apui ra istana ondo' binaal ru Raja' Gajail am monolob ra kubu-kubu ru Raja' Bingadad.

Lunsayon Ku kulobon garabang Damsyik, am mangimpai ra mamagun ru Limayak Awin intor ra intok ayanan nilo. Ulun manguasa' ru Bit-Idin patuunon Ku intor ra turungan ru raja', am mamagun ru Siria rokopon am niayuk patirin giu' ra pagun Kir.”
Ginio ra atarin Ku apui giu' ra timbok ru bandar Gaja am mangumpo ra ngaangai' kubu no.
Iruon Ku kuasa' ru ulun-ulun manguasa' ra bandar Asdod am Askilon. Ukumin Ku bandar Ikron am mamuso ra ngaangai' ulun ru Palistin ondo' lakat poyo naayag.”
Ginio ra atarin Ku apui giu' ra timbok ru bandar Tirus am solobon kubu-kubu nano.”
Ginio sabap ra atarin Ku apui giu' ra bandar Timan am solobon kubu-kubu ru Bojra.”
Ginio ra atarin Ku apui giu' ra timbok ru bandar Raba am mangumpo ra ngaangai' kubu no. Paat raginio morongog ginia' ru pampatayan am pangayawan giminaai koson ra bagiu'.
Raja' nilo am pagawai-pagawai ru pamarintaan rokopon am patirin ra pagun.”

Ginio ra atarin Ku apui giu' ra pagun ru Moab am solobon kubu-kubu ru Kiriot. Mamagun ru Moab matoi giu' ra tatanga' ginia' ru pangayawan, liliwa' bujung samputin am ginia' ru pampatayan kosongowon ru saujor.
Potoyon Ku ulun manguasa' ru Moab am ngaangai' pagawai ru pamarinta ra giu' no.”
Indagu
Ginio ra atarin Ku apui giu' ra pagun ru Jiuda am solobon kubu-kubu ru Jirusalim.”
Indagu
Kikinjangin nilo ulun malawo ondo' kalo maikang am manginggi' ra ulun musikin. Ama' am anak ungkuyon nano narulug ra ulipon ra ruandu' ondo' nogondo', saboi nampajamar ra inggalan Kuno ondo' matulai.

Giu' ra moonong intok sambayangan, ulun mombolong ra bayang ondo' inalap intor ra ulun musikin koson ra jamin ru utang. Giu' ra Baloi ri Aki Kapuuno' nilo, manginum ilo ra wain ondo' inalap intor ra ulun ondo' nagutang risilo.

Inibit Takamin noyo miningkual intor ra Misir am naningganai ramuyun nansail ra tana' kaagisan buoi 40 ngambilor. Pinataak Ku noyo pagun ru ulun ru Amori ramuyun maa' raginio masauk ra pagun min galama'.
Nampili' Aku noyo ra kukula' ngaulun intor ra anak ungkuyon min koson masauk ra nabi, am kukula' ngaulun ra mamulok min masauk ra ulun Nazir.
Kaa' nanusub kau ra ulun Nazir nanginum ra wain, saboi liminungkang ilo ra bantu'. Nanginggalar kau niayuk ra nabi-nabi nampasaboi ra tanou Kuno.
Raino jajakin Takamin saboi ra tana', koson ra kurita' ru sapi' ondo' nososok ra inaut ra gandum.
Ulun masimbul ondo' maribok pana kalo makapagiru'; ulun maikang mairuan ra ikang, am ulun tutumula' kalo makabayag ra inan galama'.
Ulun mamanah kalo tumaan, ulun masimbul ra maribok kalo makapagiru', am ulun mangura' ra kuda kalo makabayag ra inan.
Paat orou raginio saujor ondo' baani kaga' pana mangiruan ra kinandoi mangayou, am magiru'.” Gini noyo ragu ru
Akau ulun ru Israil, rongogo' tanou ru
“Intor ra ngaangai' bansa' ra tana' ti, akau noyo rorondo' bansa' ondo' nauligan Kuno am alungin. Ginio sabap ra tula min maayo, am musiti' ukumin Takamin.”
Iowon kia ruo ngaulun mabaya' mugar ra kalo nabantu' koson maguma' galing?
Mansangal kia singa' giu' ra kataunan, amon ru kalo poyo nokoowot ra akanon?
Mansangal kia anak ru singa' giu' ra ralalom ru luang nano, amon kalo poyo nakarakop ra atan-atan?
Makasulung kia susuit ralalom ru landak, amon ru kolondo' upan ru landak?
Kumukum kia galama' landak amon kolondo' nakasulung?
Amon ru bujung tatandu' ru pangayawan samputin, kalo kia ulun giu' ra bandar malaa'?
Makalumpa' kia karaat ra rorondo' bandar, amon
Paat ra singa' mansangal, osoi kia kalo malaa'?
Paat ra
Potonowo' tanou ti ra ulun ondo' minayan giu' ra istana Misir am Asdod, “Timung kano giu' ra bulur-bulur giu' ra liliut ru Samaria, am ilai' kajajawan am niayuk kalaatan ondo' nasauk ra giu'.”
Indagu
Ginio ra magawang pantula' ra pagun nilo, mamuso ra pangampinan, am mantakou ra baloi maayo nilo.”
Indagu
Indagu
Paat ra orou Aku mangukum ra ulun ru Israil sabap ra tula nilo, pusoon Ku altar-altar giu' ra Bitil. Moonong altar pandakon sangau-sangau nano saboi maratu' ra tana'.
Pusoon Ku baloi bulintok masimu' am baloi bulintok malasu'. Baloi ondo' binungaan ra gading puuton; ngaangai' baloi maayo lunsayon.

Rongog kano, akau ruandu' Samaria ondo' liminomok poyo koson ra sapi' molomok giu' ra Basan! Nangimbolo' kau ra ulun malawo, manginjang ra ulun musikin am masaga' kaga' manusub maa' raginio ralaki mino magail mangula' ra inumon makagauk ramuyun!
Aku,
Ralaaton kau giu' ra silot ru timbok ondo' mamaar kaga', am papatiron giu' ra Girmon.”
Indagu
Pampataak no ra ruti' koson ra taak paringkuanangan ri Aki Kapuuno', am ragu minsawat intor ra pataakon ra pinaruang ondo' ibiton min! Binaal koson raginio noyo ondo' masaga' min baalon.
“Aku noyo ondo' namparatong ra bitilan ra ngaangai' ru bandar min, kaa' kalo siminaguli' kau Raki'.

Aku nongompong ra rasam rumatu' paat ra tatanom min musiti' maasa' ra timug. Paratuon Ku rasam giu' ra rondo' bandar kaa' kalo paratuon ra bandar ra bokon. Rondo' umo marasaman, kaa' umo ra bokon mapuaan.

Giu' ra kukula' bandar, mamagun nano ondo' malawo sabap ra nampaas maguyum ra timug giu' ra bandar ra bokon, kaa' timug ra giu' no kalo naukop. Kabalu' pana raginio, kalo niayuk siminaguli' kau Raki'.

“Atarin Ku angin malasu' am pasisang koson mamuso ra tinanom min giu' ra umo am puun ru anggur min. Akanon koyoo' ru gapu' puun ara am puun jaitun. Kabalu' pana raginio kalo niayuk sumaguli' kau Raki'.

“Atarin Ku maruol tumapik ramuyun koson ondo' inataran Ku giu' ra Misir. Potoyon Ku ulun mamulok min ralalom pangayawan am gaawon kuda min. Sosokon Ku pangkiman min ra baangkai ondo' owou no sumusuk ra arung. Kabalu' pana raginio, kalo niayuk sumaguli' kau Raki'.
Ginio ra, akau ulun ru Israil, ukumin Takamin. Tampos kano manguma' ra ukuman ondo' palumpaan Kuno ramuyun!”
Sotopot no, i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' nambaal ra kagunungan;
Io niayuk nampasauk ra angin.
Pinabala' No inatangan Nano ra ulun.
Kinulau No matawang masauk molondom;
giu' ra rasawat ru tampak-tampak ru tana' mugar Io,
Rongog kano, akau ulun ru Israil! Rimbayin Ku akau ra rimbai panguliran:
Israil, anak ralaa no naratu' noyo,
kalo boo makaluat io!
Polosoon io makaluya' ra tana' nano galama',
kolondo' osoi pana mangindangan riso migor.
Indagu
Indagu
Pai' ongoi ra Birsyiba koson sumambayang. Pai' paguyum Raki' giu' ra Bitil sabap ra Bitil lumiot. Pai' ongoi ra Gilgal, sabap ra mamagun ru bandar no patirin ra pagun.”
Saguli' kano ra
Aibui boo ramuyun ondo' manumbalik ra katimpakan am nampagaau ra kuasa' ru ulun!
butitin Orion am butitin Kartika.
Kinulau No kalandaman nasauk ra sinda,
am nangulau ra matawang nasauk ra molondom.
Piniau No timug intor ra raat
am timug no pinasasar ra lantur.
Namuso Io ra ulun maikang,
am namuso ra pangampinan nilo.
Masisang kau ra ulun ondo' manggal ra kolondo' katimpakan am ondo' mindagu ra motopot giu' ra pangakiman.

Inimbolo' min ulun musikin am nampagaau ra gandum nilo. Ginio ra kalo mayan kau giu' ra ralalom ru baloi ondo' moonsoi intor ra batu, ondo' binaal min noyo. Kalo manginum kau ra wain intor ra umo ru anggur min ondo' moonsoi.

Nakapandai Aku mapara' gayo ru tula min am mapara' suang ru kalaatan ondo' binaal min. Nangimbolo' kau ra ulun moonsoi, nangapu ra ruit rasua am nongompong ra ulun musikin intor ra makaalap ra katimpakan giu' ra pangakiman.
Sabap ra binaal mino, ulun mapintar pana mangkara' moonsoi poyo mongkoror ayuk paat ra malaat koson raginio.
Pirot kano mambaal ra moonsoi am pai' pambaal ra malaat, maa' raginio maayag kau.
Kasisang kano ra kalaatan, tagami' noyo moonsoi, am potolorogo' katimpakan giu' ra makama. Maaru' lair
Ginio ra
Ulun manulaboi giu' ra ngaangai' umo ru anggur sabap ra matong Aku koson mangukum ramuyun.” Gini noyo ragu ru
Aibui boo ramuyun ondo' mangkukuliman ra Orou ru
Baal nano koson ra ulun ondo' nagiru' intor ra singa', am nakatuum ra baawang; kapoam koson ra ulun ondo' muli' ra baloi am pabantaan no kalindu' nano ra timbok, am tindukon ru kukuo!
Orou ru
Paat ra akau mampataak ra taak simbalui koson mapabansuk ra guang ru
Langgai' min rimbai mino ondo' makausoso no; marara' Aku rumongog ra pangkulian ru jitor mino.
Kaa', pirot kano maa' raginio katimpakan tumilis koson ra sungoi, am kabanisan ru guang tumilis koson ra timug ondo' kalo igondo' mapua'.
Kaa' raino siminamba kau ri Sakut ondo' karaan min ra raja' am Kiwan, bibiag ondo' kaansayin min kaga' no. Ginio ra akau galama' musiti' magaut ra sinungkalalaing-sinungkalalaing no,
paat ra Aku mamatir ramuyun giu' ra rondo' pagun ondo' maalur poyo intor ra Damsyik.” Gini noyo ragu ru

Aibui boo ramuyun ondo' naayag ra matasu' giu' ra Sion, am akau ondo' maayag ra moonsoi giu' ra Samaria. Akau noyo ulun nauligan kaga' inggalan intor ra Israil, bansa' ondo' maayo; akau noyo ondo' ratangin ru mamagun koson makiindangan.

Kaa' raino ongoi kano ilong ra bandar Kalni. Ugar no ayuk mongoi giu' ra bandar Gamat ondo' maayo, am giu' ra bandar Gat giu' ra Palistin. Indoson min kia ra bandar-bandar no moonsoi poyo intor ra pamarintaan ru Jiuda am Israil? Maayo poyo kia wilayah nilo intor ra wilayah min?
Marara' kau mangiou ra orou ru karaat maar noyo, kaa' binaal min mampataki' ayuk ra ratangan ru orou makalalaa' no.
Aibui boo ramuyun ondo' liminuya' ra intok kaalangan ondo' moonsoi kaga', am munsag ra mangakan ra kual ru anak sapi' am anak domba!
Masaga' kau mambaal ra rimbai koson ondo' binaal ri Daut, am kulion min rimbai no ra jitor.
Manginum kau ra wain intor ra mangkuk ondo' tinotop suangi', am nagumau kau ra umau maamis owou ondo' moonsoi kaga', kaa' kalo nanulaboi kau ra naratuan ru Israil.
Ginio ra akau no kasaa' toojo patirin ra pagun. Bunsag am pagakanan mino pupusin.
Kinalasang ru
Paat ra mokoondo' mopor ngaulun ondo' mayan ra ralalom ru rondo' baloi, matoi ilo niayuk.

Sangulun pabukat no, ondo' pinalansanan manalingapu ra pampalabangan ru ulun ondo' minatoi, matong koson ibiton mingkual baangkai ru pabukat nano. Mampiau io ra ulun ondo' soroi giu' ra ralalom ru baloi no, “Mokoondo' osoi kia poyo ondo' lakat poyo naayag suai ramuyun?”
Taam ondo' morongog, “Kolondo'!”
Pabukat no pana mindagu boo, “Pai' no boo indagu! Kalo iowon takau manabit ra inggalan ru
Paat ra
Masimbul kia kuda giu' ra bulur batu? Maradu' kia raat ra sapi'? Kaa' pinatumbalik min katimpakan saboi nasauk ra tuwo, am baal ondo' motopot nasauk ra nasala.
Masawat ragu min sabap kinala min noyo bandar Lodibar.
Indagu
Nakaalap aku ra rondo' napakitanan intor ra
Sampanon ru gapu' no nangai' pangakan ra ngaangai' tutuu' ra tana'. Aku pana mindagu, “Iou
Nangulau
Nakito ku poyo rondo' napakitanan intor ra
Aku pana mindagu, “Iou
Nangulau
Nakaalap aku rondo' napakitanan ra bokon intor ra
Nangkuot Io raki', “Amos, atan kia nakito muno?”
Taam aku, “Rondo' kalat panuku' ondo' maawar ra mabanis.”
Io pana mindagu boo, “Namakai Aku ra kalat panuku' ondo' maawar ra mabanis ti koson manulu' ra ulun Kuno koson ra timbok ondo' kalo mabanis. Kalo boo kulawon Ku guang Kuno; ukumin Ku ilo.
Intok-intok ondo' pakayon ru papag ri Isak koson sumambayang umokon. Intok-intok mapasau ru ulun ru Israil maangun ra natuyas. Pupusin Ku pamarintaan ru sasambaloi ru Raja' Jirobiam.”

I Amajia, imam giu' ra Bitil, nangator ra pabalaan ti ra Raja' Jirobiam intor ra Israil, “I Amos tatanga' maguguum ra mamagun koson manggal rirun raja'. Ragu-ragu nano ondo' nanusuk ra mamagun mangkinibit ra pagun ti matutuk.
Kono, ‘I Jirobiam matoi ralalom pangayawan, am ulun ru Israil ibiton ra pamatiran, maalur intor ra pagun nilo galama'.’ ”
I Amajia pana mindagu boo ri Amos, “Okou nabi, uli' no ra Jiuda! Raguo' manala' ra giu' no. Polosoon ilo ondo' mangani' ra akanon rirun!
Pai' boo raguo' manala' ragiti ra Bitil. Bandar ti tayar ayuk ru raja' sumambayang, iono intok sambayangan ru pagun.”
Taam i Amos, “Aku sala' ka koson ra nabi-nabi ra bokon ondo' mindagu ra manala' koson makigaji'. Sotopot no aku ti sangulun manambiag am magalung ra puun ara.
Kaa'
Ginio ra rongogo' noyo ragu ru
gitio noyo ragu ru
Nakaalap aku ra rondo' poyo napakitanan intor ra
Nangkuot
Taam aku, “Kikinawa' giu' ra ralalom ru bakul.”
Indagu
Paat ra orou raginio rimbai giu' ra istana masauk ra manulaboi. Baangkai mokoloso ra ngaangai' intok. Baangkai-baangkai no patirin ra sinokon.”
Rongog kano, akau ondo' nangimbolo' ra ulun ondo' natutusan am mamuso ra ulun musikin ra pagun ti.

Kamin, “Sanggilan kia maampus orou pangiantakan maa' raginio makapantalan takau poyo ra gandum? Mabuoi kaga' pangiantakan ti. Sanggilan kia sailan ru orou Sabat maa' raginio makapantalan takapo? Itakau pana makitaak ra masawat toojo logo. Pakayon takau panuku' am timbangan ondo' kalo motopot koson mamparuung ra ulun mambali.

Talanon takau gandum ondo' naapu' ra logo masawat. Uyumon takau sangulun musikin ondo' kalo makatanggang mambayar ra utang, kabalu' pana utang no koson ra logo ru satuop salipar ayuk, am balion takau ulun no koson ra ulipon.”
Ginio ra tana' ti mogonggon am ngaangai' ulun giu' ra pagun no magalabo. Titikop ru pagun mauyog; tana' ti magaloi tumuun koson ra Sungoi Nil.
Masaboi paat ra Aku mangkinibit ra mato ru orou tumolop paat ra tanga' ru orou am tana' ti lumondom paat ra orou matawang. Aku,

Pangiantakan mino saukon Ku ra panguliran, am rimbai maantak min saukon Ku ra manulaboi. Mangkinibit Aku ramuyun mompolompor ra abuk, am mambayang ra konoon karung koson tatandu' mangiluk guang. Masauk kau koson ra ina' ama' ondo' manulaboi ra pinatayan ru anak ungkuyon langkuir. Orou raginio pupusin ra kangilukan ondo' makapari' ra guang.
Masaboi paat ra Aku mamparatong ra bitilan ra pagun ti. Ulun maitilan, kaa' kalo maitilan ra akanon. Ulun paason, kaa' kalo paason ra timug. Ilo maitilan am paason ra tanou intor ra
Ulun tumanggau intor ra Raat Matoi mongoi ra Raat Tanga', am rayus no intor ra ralayo mongoi ra sirangon. Giu' ra ati-ati intok maguyum ilo ra tanou intor ra
Paat ra orou raginio ra tauli no, ungkuyon am ruandu' ondo' mamulok pana malausan sabap ra paason.

Ulun ondo' magibot ralalom inggalan ru sinungkalalaing ru Samaria, am mindagu, ‘Ralalom inggalan ru dewa giu' ra Dan’ kapoam ‘Ralalom inggalan ru dewa giu' ra Birsyiba’, maratu' am kalo boo makatirong.”
Nakito ku
Kabalu' pana mangkali ilo ra luang saboi ra intok ru ulun minatoi, rokopon Ku ilo. Kabalu' pana mangkiwa' ilo saboi ra limbowon, ibiton Ku ilo tumuun.
Amon ru mansibuni ilo giu' ra tampak ru Gunung Karmil, uyumon am rokopon Ku ilo. Amon ru mansibuni ilo giu' ra lonor ru raat, manusub Aku ra tambuakal ru raat
Amon ru ibiton ilo ru pantula' giu' ra pamatiran, manusub Aku maa' raginio potoyon ilo. Totopot Ku potoyon ilo, am kalo mangindangan risilo.”
Paat ra
mogonggon boo tana',
am ngaangai' ru mamagun nano manulaboi.
Titikop ru tana' magaloi tumuun koson ra Sungoi Nil.
Binaal ru
giu' ra rasawat ru tana' pinaatang No limbowon koson ra bakuran.
Piniau No timug intor ra raat,
am pinasasar No ra lantur,
Indagu
Aku,
Manusub Aku, am atapin Ku ulun ru Israil koson ra ulun mangatap ra gandum ra atapan. Atapin Ku ilo ra gino ngai' ru bansa' koson mamatir ra ngaangai' ondo' kolondo' onong.
Ulun makatula ra gino ngai' ru ulun Kuno mindagu, ‘Kalo polosoon takau ri Aki Kapuuno' malumpa' ru karaat.’ Kaa' sotopot no potoyon ilo ralalom ru pangayawan.”
Ulun ru Israil manguasa' ra tayar ru pagun Idom ondo' kalo najajou, am ngaangai' ru pagun ondo' igondo' nasauk ra longgom Kuno.” Gini noyo ragu ru
Indagu
paat gandum tumuu' ra mataki'
saboi bulintok mangkumos kolondo' pupus nano.
Puun ru anggur tumuu' ra mataki' kaga' gumayo
saboi mambaal ra wain kalo lumonggo'.
Wain ra matamis momosok intor ra kagunungan,
am tumilis intor ra kabuluran.
Ibiton Ku ulun Kuno Israil sumaguli' ra pagun nilo.
Baalon nilo saguli'
bandar-bandar ondo' nasauk noyo ra natuyas,
mayan ilo ra giu' no.
Mantanom ilo ra puun ru anggur
am manginum ra wain.
Mantanom ilo
am mangakan ra ampos ru tinanom.
Paayanon Ku ulun Kuno
giu' ra pagun ondo' pinataak Ku noyo risilo.
Kalo boo patirin ilo.”
Nangator
am norongog takau noyo tanou Nano,
“Tampos kano!
Ibok kano mangayou takau ra Idom!”
Indagu
“Pasaukon Takamin ra malawo;
ngaangai' bansa' magasab ramuyun.
Rinuung kau ru limbau mino.
Pusor bandar min noyo kubu ru batu ondo' mapiot;
intok ayanan min giu' ra tampak ru gunung ondo' masawat.
Ginio sabap ra akau mangkara',
‘Osoi kia ondo' masaga' mamparatu' ramon?’
Kabalu' pana mambaal kau ra baloi
giu' ra intok masawat koson ra bunsut ru susuit kanui,
ilain koson soroi ra intok ru butitin-butitin,
ratuin Takamin.
Paat ra ulun mantakou matong paat ra rondom,
mangalap ilo ayuk ra atan ondo' kasagaan.
Paat ra ulun mangupu' ra kawa' ru anggur,
masalok ilo manatang kukula' ngaunor.
Kaa' pantula' mampaluus ramuyun ngaangai' ra malingon.
Akau papag ri Isau,
rapu' min ginaau.
Pagun paguum namparuung ramuyun;
pinagiru' nilo akau intor ra pagun min.
Raino kinala kau ru ulun ondo' ragili nobonsoi ramuyun.
Linandak kau ru ulun ondo' nangakan nababaya' ramuyun.
Mindagu ilo intor ramuyun,
‘Ati kia ngaangai' kapintaran nilo raino?’
Paat ra orou Aku mangukum ra Idom,
pusoon Ku ulun no ondo' mapintar,
am liomon ngaangai' kapintaran nilo.
Ulun tutumula' intor ra Timan malaa',
ngaangai' saujor giu' ra Idom potoyon.”
“Nantakou kau am namatoi ra pabukat min,
Ginio ra pusoon kau
am asabin ru ulun ra kolondo' pupus.
Paat ra pantula' mampalunsai ra kulobon garabang ru Jirusalim am kuasaan bandar no,
kolondo' atan pana mabaal min.
Nogondo' laat min ra ulun bansa' ra bokon ondo' nagaut ra rapu' ru Jirusalim,
am tinayar-tayar ginio ra ilo galama'.
Akau sotopot no kalo maansukan
sabap ra karaat ondo' nakalumpa' ra pabukat min giu' ra Jiuda.
Akau sotopot no kalo maansukan
paat ra orou ilo mapuso.
Akau sotopot no kalo makakurit risilo
paat ra ilo mapagon.
Akau sotopot no kalo sumubol ra ralalom ru bandar ru ulun Kuno
koson maansukan sabap ra mamagun nano maimbolo',
am koson mampagaau ra rapu' nilo paat ilo malumpa' ru karaat.
Akau kalo musiti' migor giu' ra lisangon ru ralan,
koson mongompong ra ulun ondo' tatanga' magiru'.
Akau kalo musiti' mampataak risilo ra pantula'
paat ra orou ilo malumpa' ru kapaganan.”
“Mamaar noyo orou no, paat ra Aku,
Akau ulun ru Idom,
atan ondo' binaal min,
baalon niayuk ramuyun.
Balasin kau nontopot koson ra atan ondo' binaal min.
Giu' ra rasawat ru bulur Kuno ondo' matulai,
ondo' tatandu' ru ukuman nilo.
Kaa' ngaangai' bansa' ra sambalayan
manginum intor ra sangkir ru inumon ondo' mapait poyo kaga'.
Musiti' nilo inumon ginio saboi makai',
am maluus ilo ra kolondo' babaya'.”
“Kaa' giu' ra rasawat ru Bulur Sion,
mokoondo' kukula' ngaulun ondo' maayag,
am bulur no masauk ra intok ondo' matulai.
Papag ri Jakub momolonggom ra tana' tinungkus nilo.
Papag ri Jakub am i Jusup koson ra apui,
pusoon nilo papag ri Isau
koson ra apui monolob ra rami.
Kolondo' sangulun pana intor ra papag ri Isau maayag.
Aku,
Ulun intor ra tampilon rabugus ru Jiuda mayan ra pagun ru Idom;
ulun intor ra gana' ru bulur giu' ra tampilon kalasaan manguasa' ra wilayah ru Palistin.
Ulun ru Israil momolonggom ra wilayah Ipraim am Samaria;
bansa' ru Binjamin manguasa' ra libung Giliad.
Pulalai ru ulun pinatiran intor ra tampilon ralayo sumaguli',
am manguasa' ra Pinisia saboi ra Jarpat giu' ra ralayo.
Ulun intor ra Jirusalim ondo' pinatiran giu' ra Sardis,
sumaguli' am manalingaau ra bandar-bandar giu' ra tampilon rabugus ru Jiuda.
Ulun ru Jirusalim ondo' nakasugut
mamulunsar ra Idom am kuasaan no ginio.
Indagu Io, “Ongoi no ra Niniwi, bandar maayo no, mompololob ra mamagun no, sabap ra nakapandai Aku ra mamagun no malaat kaga'.”
Kaa minongoi i Junus ra intok ru bokon koson minggalur ra
Timinuun i Junus ra intok ondo' magana' kaga' am liminuya' ra giu', am nokororot io toojo.
Kopongo raginio namparatong

Paat ra kaptin ru kapal i timinuun giu' ra ragana', natuum no i Junus nombolong ra giu'. Indagu kaptin i, “Ati koson kou mombolong ra baal ragitio? Karat no! Pakiasi' no makiindangan ra dewa muno. Maaru' lair makaasi' io ritakau, am kalo mapuso takau.”

Kopongo raginio, nagaloi boo i Junus am kaptin ru kapal giu' rasawat, ngaangai' ulun ru kapal nagindagu ilo-ilo galama', “Ibok takau ngai' magugundi' takau maa' raginio makapandai takau osoi makasala, saboi nalumpa' takau ru karaat ti!” Pagugundi' ilo am kaundi' i Junus.
Konilo ri Junus, “Topot kia okou nangkinibit ra karaat ti? Ati intor am atan bansa' muno? Kua guat ragiti kou?”
Taam i Junus, “Ulun aku ru Ibrani. Sumamba aku ra
I Junus pana nantunung boo ra io ti nagiru' intor ra
Korongog ragu raginii, malaa' boo ngaangai' ulun ru kapal, am mindagu riso, “Binaal muno makalalaa' kaga'!”
Liliwa' raginio bagiu' mapuor kaga' liminanja', am ngaangai' anak ru kapal nangkuot ri Junus, “Atan kia musiti' baalon mai rirun koson mampalinos ra bagiu' mapuor kaga' ti?”
Taam i Junus, “Patiri' min aku ralalom ru raat, am maaru' bagiu' mapuor ti luminos. Nakapandai aku no ra aku ti nangkinibit ra bagiu' ondo' mapuor kaga' ondo' liminumpa' ramuyun.”
Kaa' ngaangai' ulun ru kapal lakat poyo mirot toojo koson mangkabil ra kapal i mongoi ra lantur. Kaa' bagiu' mapuor liminanja' niayuk mapuor kaga', saboi pirot nilo kolondo' onong.
Ginio ra golok ilo ra
Kopongo raginio, pinatiran nilo i Junus ra ralalom ru raat, am bagiu' mapuor i limininos ra namulali'.
Ngaangai' ulun ru kapal i malaa' toojo ra
Intor ralalom tinai' ru papait, makiasi' i Junus ra
“Iou
am tumaam Kou raki'.
Intor ra intok ru ulun minatoi makiindangan aku,
norongog am lioon Mu kitaakon kuno.
Pinatiran Mu aku ra intok ondo' malandom,
saboi ra lonor ru raat.
Giu' no aug ru timug liminiput raki',
kinulun lumapos raki'.
Ralalom ru guang kuno mindagu aku:
Nampagiru' noyo
Kalo boo makapagilong aku
ra baloi matulai ondo' inayanan Nano.
Timug ru raat nagaloi suku' ra bibil kuno,
raat malandom liminiput ra inan kuno,
sakot ru raat riminilit ra ulu kuno.
Timinuun aku saboi ra lonor ru kabuluran,
ra intok ondo' garabang kinunsi' suku' ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Paat ra painawo kuno mamaar mutus intor ra inan kuno,
mangkara' aku ra
am mampiau aku Rirun.
Okou, iou
giu' ra Baloi Muno ondo' matulai.
Intor ra raat ondo' malandom,
Okou mamayag raki',
iou
Ilo ondo' sumamba ra sinungkalalaing ondo' kolondo' onong,
mangiruan Rirun am kalo boo gumagaya'.
Kaa' marimbai aku ra rimbai pangamparan Rirun
am pataakon ku taak simbalui kuno Rirun.
Suguton ku ngaangai' bantu' kuno.
Okou no
Kopongo raginio, ra susuban ru
Mindagu
Indagu
Ginio ra i Junus giminagaya' ra
Siminubol i Junus ra bandar no, am kalupus nonsongorou minugar, tumalimpuun io mampatanou ra tanou ti, “Apat ngoopor ngoorou poyo, pusoon noyo Niniwi!”

Mamagun ru Niniwi mangintopot ra tanou ri Aki Kapuuno' no. Ngaangai' mamagun mamatas koson mampali, am ngaangai' ulun, ondo' langkaya' am poyo musikin, nambayang ra konoon karung koson mampakito ilo ra pansagulian guang ra tula nilo.
Pokorongog raja' Niniwi ra tanou no, tuun io intor ra panturungan nano. Inalus no sukub nano am bayango' no konoon karung, am turung io ra rasawat ru kaau.

Raja' pana nampatanou niayuk ra susuban ragitio ra ngaangai' mamagun ru bandar Niniwi, “Gitio noyo ragu pamatasan intor ra raja' am ngaangai' menteri: Ngaangai' ulun, sapi', domba, am bibiag tinambiag ra bokon inggalarin mangakan am manginum.
Ulun am tinambiag musiti' mambayang ra konoon karung. Moonong ulun musiti' totopot makiasi' ri Aki Kapuuno', am lumonggo' mambaal ra kalaatan am binaal nano ondo' napanu' ra tula.
Maaru' lair kulawon ri Aki Kapuuno' ginuang Nano am kalo boo sumangit, am itakau pana kalo mapuso!”
Nakito ri Aki Kapuuno' binaal nilo; nakito No ra ilo kalo boo nambaal ra malaat. Ginio ra nangulau Io ra guang Nano am kalo boo sinugut ukuman ondo' inatang Nano risilo.
Totopot kalo masaga' i Junus ra baal raginio, am io pana siminangit.
Io pana makiasi' boo, “Iou
Raino, iou
Taam
Kopongo raginio minongoi i Junus ra tampilon sirangon ru bandar no, am panturung ra giu' no. Nangkalukub io, am sindung io ra giu', liliwa' maginaa atan masauk ra bandar Niniwi.
Paat raginio
Kaa' suabon no maar matawang, ralalom susuban ri Aki Kapuuno' rondo' ulor sinusub no minongoi pangakan ra tutuu' i saboi nolonot.

Pakasirang mato ru orou, namparatong i Aki Kapuuno' ra angin malasu' ondo' siminiob intor ra sirangon. Maar malausan i Junus sabap orou ondo' mapangit toojo koson ayuk monolob ra ulu nano. Ginio ra malawo boo guang nano am gumogot matoi, kono, “Moonsoi poyo matoi aku ka maayag!”
Kaa' indagu i Aki Kapuuno' riso, “Kalo matanda' ra okou sumangit ra tutuu' no!”
Taam i Junus, “Kua ra kalo? Topot matanda' ra aku sumangit kaga' suku' matoi.”

Maaru' Aku makaasi' poyo ra Niniwi, bandar ondo' maayo no sabap ra giu' no mokoondo' nasailan ra 120,000 ngaulun lalaing ondo' kalo mapandai mampasuai ati moonsoi am ati malaat, am niayuk masuang kaga' bibiag.”
Rongog kano, akau ngaangai' bansa';
ilai' noyo, akau ngaangai' mamagun ru tana' ti!
Rongog kano!
Mindagu Io intor ra intok Nano ondo' matulai giu' ra suruga'.
Mingkual
Timinuun am minugar Io ra tampak ru gunung-gunung ra tana' ti.
Ngaangai' gunung liminuu' ra ragana' ru kalayam Nano
koson ra dian ralalom ru apui ondo' mapaang;
tana' intor ra gunung lumuyu' mongoi ra limayak
koson ra timug giu' ra rasawat ru bulur tumilis mongoi ra ragana'.

Ngaangai' baal no masauk sabap ra ulun ru Israil makatula noyo am giminuor ri Aki Kapuuno'. Osoi nua' pinalansan ra guor ru Israil? Samaria, pusor ru bandar nano galama'! Osoi nua' pinalansan ondo' sumamba ra sinungkalalaing giu' ra Jiuda? Jirusalim!
Ginio ra mindagu

Pusoon Ku ngaangai' sinungkalalaing no, am moonong kuliamos ondo' longgom ru ulun mantalan ra inan giu' ra kuil pusoon ralalom ru apui. Ngaangai' sinungkalalaing nano masauk ra ginsamol. Naalapan ru Samaria ra ngaangai' kuliamos no koson ampos ru sumamba ra dewa kalabungan; raino pantula' nano piboo nagibit ra kuliamos-kuliamos no koson taakin ra ulun-ulun mantalan ra inan giu' ra kuil ru bokon.”

Indagu boo i Mika, “Ginio ra mangulir aku am mantangi'. Koson mampakito ra kangilukan ru guang kuno, mugar aku ra mantilagas am kolondo' kasut. Mampaung aku koson ra taani am mompoloong koson susuit unta.
Pilat ru Samaria kalo mapali', am Jiuda mataki' malumpa' ru kaimbalaan ondo' nogondo'. Kapusaan nakasuku' noyo ra kulobon garabang ru Jirusalim, intok namagunan ru bansa' kuno.”
Pai' pambala' ra pantula' giu' ra Gat ra itakau naala. Pai' polosoo' ilo magilong ritakau mantangi'. Mamagun ru Bit-Li-Apra kau ngai',

Mamagun ru Sapir kau ngai', ongoi no ra pagun namatiran ra magibaang am mauyu'. Mamagun ru Jaanan kalo baani mongoi ra liwar ru bandar. Paat ra akau nakaining ra mamagun ru Bit-Gaijil mantangi', makapandai kau ra kolondo' intok sindungan ra giu' no.
Mamagun ru Marot malaa' paat maginaa ra ulun mongoi pangindangan, sabap karaat ondo' pinaratong ru
Mamagun ru Lakgis, paatango' noyo kuda ra kurita' ru kuda. Tumilu ra tula ru ulun giu' ra Israil, mangkinibit kau ra ulun ru Jirusalim makatula.
Raino mamagun ru Jiuda kau ngai', balai' noyo ra ugaran mino koson mangiruan ra bandar Morisyit-Gat. Raja'-raja' ru Israil kalo makaalap ra indangan intor ra bandar Akjib.
Mamagun ru Marisya kau ngai', pataakon kau ru
Mamagun ru Jiuda kau ngai', lomporo' noyo abuk mino koson tatandu' mangulir ra lalaing-lalaing katagaman mino. Lingono' min buluti' abuk, sabap ra ngaangai' anak min patirin intor ra pagun.

Aibui boo ra ulun-ulun ondo' mangatang ra kalaatan ondo' kalo mantilayun am liminuya' ra intok pambalangan paat ra tanga' ru rondom. Paat ra orou sinumirang baalon nilo kalaatan ondo' inatang no sabap ra maalap nilo mambaal raginio.

Paat ilo mompogogot ra umo, gumaau ilo ra umo ru ulun bokon. Paat ra ilo mompogogot ra baloi, gumaau ilo ra baloi ru ulun bokon. Kolondo' sambaloi ru osoi pana, kapoam rapu' ru osoi pana ondo' mabayag.
Ginio ra mindagu
Paat ra rumatong ginio, alapon ru ulun tunung intor ramuyun no koson ra pangiisan. Maririmbai ilo ra rimbai panguliran ragitio:
Napuso akai noyo ra nalingon!
Ginio ra paat ra tana' no pinasaguli' ra ulun ru
Ulun nampatanou raki' am mindagu, “Pai' potonowo' ramon. Pai' potonowo' intor ra ngaangai' no. Maaru' lair i Aki Kapuuno' kalo mampakauyu' ritakau.
Guang min kia' ra Israil ti inulas? Kalo kia' mokoorot
Taam
Pinagiru' min ngaangai' ruandu' ru ulun Kuno intor ra baloi ondo' kasagaan nilo; ginaau min barakat Kuno ra sabuoi-buoi no intor ra lalaing-lalaing nilo.
Karat no am ugar no intor ragiti. Kolondo' boo intok ondo' mamimio. Tula min naparatong ra karaat ondo' makalalaa' ra intok ti.
Masaga' kau ra nabi ondo' masaga' magabau am mamparuung, am ondo' mindagu, ‘Manala' aku ra makaalap kau ra wain am inumon makagauk ondo' masuang toojo.’

Kaa' mampatimung Aku ramuyun, ulun Kuno Israil kau ngai' ondo' lakat poyo maayag. Manimung Aku ramuyun koson ra domba-domba ondo' muli' ra kandang. Koson ra padang ru sakot ondo' nososok ra domba, igondo' poyo pagun min mososok ra ulun.”
Mangukab i Aki Kapuuno' risilo ra ralan koson magibit risilo mingkual intor ra pamatiran. Jumunjung ilo mingkual intor ra kulobon garabang ru bandar no am magiru'.
Rongog kano, panguasa' ru Israil kau ngai'! Akau musiti' no mampalio ra katimpakan,
kaa' masisang kau ra kaansayan am masaga' ra kalaatan. Ngaangai' bansa' Kuno iningkulitan min, am bininsang kual nilo intor ra bungul.
Tinolon min ngaangai' bansa' Kuno. Iningkulitan min ilo am pinandak min bungul nilo. Kual nilo tinotok min koson ra akau monotok ra kual ondo' ansakon ralalom ru pagangan ru tana'.
Nasaboi noyo paat ra akau mampiau ra
Ulun Kuno rinuung ru nabi-nabi ondo' nambantu' ra kaansayan ra ulun ondo' nangani' risilo ra ruit, kaa' nompololob am nakimantula' ra ulun ondo' kalo nangani' ra atan-atan. Indagu

“Nabi kau ngai', pupus ru kaayagan min mamaar noyo. Orou masauk molondom ramuyun. Ginio sabap ra akau nampalayau ra ulun Kuno, kalo makaapu kau ra pinaintalang kapoam pakitanan. Kalo boo makapanala' kau ra atan-atan ayuk.”
Ulun ondo' nanala' ra orou rumatong tinauyu' sabap nanala' ilo ra kalo motopot. Ngaangai' ilo asabin sabap i Aki Kapuuno' kalo tumaam risilo.
Kaa' ra aku,
Rongogo' noyo ragu-ragu kutu, panguasa' ru Israil kau ngai', akau ondo' masisang ra katimpakan am mangulau ra katapatan masauk ra kasalaan.
Akau nambaal ra Jirusalim, bandar ri Aki Kapuuno', mimpuun ra pamatayan am kolondo' katimpakan.

Ilo panguasa' ru bandar nampaugar ra pamarintaan koson makaalap ra rasua, ngaangai' imam mambala' ra arati' ru Ukum koson makaalap ra gaji', am nabi-nabi niayuk nambala' ra pinaintalang koson makaalap ra ruit; kaa' mindagu ilo ngaangai' ra
Paat ra orou rumatong
gunung intok Baloi ru
masauk ra gunung ondo' masawat kaga',
masawat poyo kaga' intor ra gunung-gunung am bulur-bulur.
Ngaangai' bansa' guguluyur mongoi ra giu' no,
am konilo,
“Ibok no magaloi takau ra bulur ru
mongoi ra Baloi ru
Mangila' Io ra kasagaan Nano ondo' musiti' baalon takau;
maya' takau ra ralan ondo' pinili' Nano,
sabap ra pangilaan ru
intor ra Sion minindagu Io ra ngaangai' ulun Nano.”
ra gino ngai' ru kuasa'-kuasa' maayo ondo' mamaar am ondo' maalur.
Mampalarom ilo ra ilang-ilang nilo masauk ra radu',
am tutura' nilo masauk ra pais pamutul.
Bansa'-bansa' kalo boo makapangayou,
am kalo boo tumampos ra mangayou.
giu' ra umo ru anggur am umo ru ara nilo;
kolondo' sangulun pana mampakalalaa' risilo.
Ginio noyo baal ondo' binantu' ru
Moonong bansa' sumamba am gumagaya' ra dewa nilo galama', kaa' itakau sumamba am gumagaya' ra
Mindagu

Ilo kalo makalulu' am maalur intor ra baloi, kaa' mangani' Aku ra kaluagan bagu risilo ondo' lakat poyo maayag, am masauk ilo ra rondo' bansa' ondo' maayo. Mamarinta Aku risilo intor ra Bulur Sion suku' ra sabuoi-buoi no.”
Okou Jirusalim, intok ri Aki Kapuuno' mantamung ra ulun Nano koson sangulun magagalung, sumaguli' ra pusor bandar ru pamarintaan muno koson ragili.
Kua najanjayan tangi' muno? Kua marualan kou koson ra ruandu' ondo' maganak? Sabap nati nua' okou kolondo' raja', am ulun-ulun mambilin muli minatoi noyo?
Mamagun ru Jirusalim kau ngai', pambilor am pampalaa kano
Masuang noyo bansa' timinimung koson mamulunsar ramuyun. Konilo, “Jirusalim musiti' pusoon! Magilong akai ra bandar no masauk ra malunsai!”
Kaa' bansa'-bansa' no kalo makapandai ra atan inatangan ru
Indagu
Mamagun ru Jirusalim kau ngai', timungo' noyo saujor min! Inawangan takau! Mamulunsar ilo ra tingganai ru Israil!
Ginio ra nompoloso
Pakasuku' panguasa' no, mamarinta io ra mamagun nano mabaya' ra kaikangan am kuasa' intor ra
am mamparatong io ra kaansayan.
Paat ra ulun ru Asyur namulunsar ra pagun takau am namandak ra pangampin takau, nanusub takau ra tingganai-tingganai ondo' maikang kaga' koson gumula' risilo.
Mabaya' ra kaikangan ru kinandoi mangayou, kalaan nilo Asyur, tana' ru Nimrod, am mamayag ilo
Ulun ru Israil ondo' lakat poyo maayag masauk koson ra bolobou masimu' intor ra

Ilo ondo' lakat poyo maayag ra gino ngai' ru bansa'-bansa' ru bokon masauk koson ra singa' ondo' maguyum ra akanon giu' ra kataunan kapoam giu' ra padang ru sakot; siminubol singa' no ra tatanga' ru domba-domba, nansaam am niayuk bibinsango' domba; kolondo' sangulun pana makapamayag ra domba-domba no.
Kalaan ru Israil pantula' nilo am mamuso risilo ngaangai'.
Indagu
Pusoon Ku bandar-bandar ra pagun min am tuyason ku pangampinan min.
Pusoon Ku jimat mino am inggion Ku ngaangai' ulun mapandai mangilong min.
Pusoon Ku sinungkalalaing min am batu pangkaraan ondo' sambaan min. Kalo boo sumamba kau ra kuliamos-kuliamos ondo' binaal min galama'.
Tuyason ku ngaangai' sinungkalalaing Dewi Asyira giu' ra pagun min am pusoon Ku bandar-bandar min.
Ralalom ru sangit Kuno ondo' najanjayan mansuli' Aku ra kalaatan ru ngaangai' bansa' ondo' kalo gumagaya' Raki'.”
Rongogo' noyo atan ondo' panguwan ru
Kakat noyo, iou
Gunung kau ngai', puun ru tana' ondo' mantilayun, rongogo' noyo ondo' pabalaan ru
Indagu
Akau inibit Ku miningkual intor ra Misir. Namayag Aku ramuyun intor ra inulipon. Nanusub Aku ri Musa, i Arun, am i Miriam koson maningganai ramuyun.

Ulun Ku ngai', karaa' noyo atan inatangan ri Balak, raja' ru Moab no ramuyun, am taam ri Biliam anak ri Bior riso. Karaa' noyo kasaukan-kasaukan ondo' nasauk ralalom pangkiralanan intor ra pangkiman giu' ra Sitim saboi ra Gilgal. Karaa' noyo baal-baal raginio, am akau pana makaliman ra atan ondo' binaal Kuno koson mamayag ramuyun.”
Atan nua' pataakon kuno ra
Mangapu kia
Topot-topot kalo! Nambala' noyo
Mapintar noyo ulun ondo' malaa' ra
Giu' ra baloi ru ulun malaat mokoondo' ra rapu' ondo' noowot ra pamparuungan. Nampakai ilo ra tutuku' kalo motopot, rondo' baal ondo' kasisangan Kuno. Ulun ondo' mambaal raginio ukumin Kuno.
Ati kulaan lair Aku makapangampun ra ulun ondo' nampakai ra tutuku' am timbangan kalo motopot?
Ulun langkaya' ra gino ngai' min mangimbolo' ra ulun musikin; akau ngaangai' magabau.
Ginio ra nakatalimpuun aku noyo
Mangakan kau, kaa' kalo maasug; maitilan kau ayuk. Mantakou kau ra kuliamos, kaa' kalo mabulian min. Ngaangai' atan ondo' pinauli min pusoon Ku ralalom ru pangayawan.
Mantanom kou ra gandum, kaa' kalo makumos min. Mambaal kau ra umau intor ra kawa' ru jaitun, kaa' kalo mapakai min umau no. Mambaal kau ra wain, kaa' kalo mainum min ginio.

Baal ragitio masauk sabap minaya' kau ra baal malaat ru Raja' Omri, am anak nano, Raja' Agab. Minaya' kau ra aturan ondo' inaru' nilo. Ginio ra mamuso Aku ramuyun, am ngaangai' ulun magasab ramuyun. Ulun

Kolondo' boo kalansanan! Koson aku ra ulun maitilan ondo' kalo nakatuum ra kawa' ra puun kapoam kawa' ru anggur ra puun nano. Ngaangai' kawa' ru anggur am kawa' ru puun ara ondo' maamis inupu' noyo koyoo'.
Kolondo' boo ulun mabanis guang ralalom ru pagun; kolondo' boo ulun ondo' gumagaya' ri Aki Kapuuno'. Moonong ulun maginaa ra kaluagan no koson mamatoi. Moonong ulun mampatoi ra bansa' nano galama'.

Ngaangai' ilo mapandai mambaal ra kalaatan. Ngaangai' pagawai am akim makitaak ra rasua. Ulun ondo' mauligan toojo mampajajal ra atan gogoton ru guang nilo. Ginio ra maguguum ilo koson mambaal raginio.
Ondo' moonsoi toojo pana am mabanis guang intor risilo pana koson bulungkut ru ruui ondo' kolondo' onong.
Nasuku' noyo bulintok nano ri Aki Kapuuno' mangukum ra ulun ragitio, koson ondo' pinakara' No risilo ondo' pinabala' galing ra nabi-nabi Nano. Raino nasauk noyo kajajawan ralalom nilo.
Pai' no pangintopot ra sambalayan min kapoam rangan min. Ilalain ra mindagu, kabalu' pana ra andu' muno.

Bulintok ragitio lalaing ungkuyon magasab ra ama' nilo; lalaing ruandu' manggal ra ina' nilo. Anak mangiwan ra ruandu' mansangor ra iwan ruandu' nilo. Pantula' ru sasangulun iono intor sasambaloi nilo galama'.
Kaa' maginaa aku ra
Pantula' takau kolondo' sasaban koson makaansuk ra naratuan takau. Kabalu' pana maratu' takau, kaa' tumirong takau saguli'. Raino soroi takau ralalom kalandaman, kaa'
Natulaan takau ra
Paat raginio pantula' takau makakito ra baal ondo' binaal ru
Mamagun ru Jirusalim kau ngai', bulintok koson mambaal saguli' ra timbok-timbok ru bandar nasuku' noyo. Paat raginio intok min kalangkaan.
Mamaguli' ulun min intor ra ati ayuk intok – intor ra sirangon ru Asyur am rabugus ru Misir, intor ra tana' ru Sungoi Iprat, intor ra sandaup ru raat, am intor ra kagunungan ondo' maalur.
Kaa' tana' ti masauk ra tana' mapua' sabap ra kalaatan ru mamagun nano.
Iou
Baalo' noyo ramon kaimuagan-kaimuagan,
Makakito bansa'-bansa' no ra baal raginio am mauyu' sabap malimanan nilo ra kaikangan nilo kolondo' toojo arati'. Ilo kalo boo makaindagu am kalo mokorongog sabap ra kalo makabaal ra atan ayuk.
Mundus ilo koson ra kukuo ra rasawat ru kaau. Mingkual ilo intor ra kubu nilo am monontol, am mabaya' ra laa' matong ilo Rirun,
Iou
Makaasi' Kou poyo ramon. Kikinjangin Mu tula mai am patirin Mu ginio ra lonor ru raat!
Mampakito Kou ra gagaya' Muno am togom Muno ondo' mantilayun ra ngaangai' ulun Muno, papag ri Abragam am Jakub, koson ondo' binantu' Muli ra kinamatuaan mai ra galing i.
ulun ondo' manggal Riso maaru' makaalap ra ukuman.
Ra sumangit kaga',
mansuli' Io ra pantula' Nano.
kaa' Io makakuasa',
am kalo igondo' Io nampalabus
ra ulun ondo' nambaal ra kasalaan intor ra ukuman.
Giu' ra intok ugaran ru
sumalula' puting beliung am taupan;
gaun iono kaau intor ra kalayam Nano.
Ra susuban Nano, raat malasak;
sungoi pana lasakin.
Padang-padang giu' ra Basan mapua',
Gunung Karmil pana mapua',
am lumonot boo bunga'-bunga' giu' ra Libanon.
Gunung-gunung muyog giu' ra saang ru
bulur-bulur lumuu' ra saang Nano.
Tana' ti mogonggon paat ra
tana' ti am ngaangai' ru mamagun nano monontol.
Osoi kia tumaan paat ra
Kolondo' osoi pana makalabus intor ra sangit Nano.
Paabuson No sangit Nano ondo' bibilak,
saboi batu maumok am masauk ra kaau giu' ra saang Nano.
manindung Io ra ulun Nano paat ra ilo mapagon,
magalung Io ra ulun ondo' sumindung Riso.
Pusoon No ngaangai' pantula' Nano,
Io koson ra liur maayo ondo' nakalumpa' risilo.
Binutus No painawo ru ulun ondo' manggal ra kasagaan Nano.
Kalaatan ra atan kia ondo' inatang min ra
Mamuso Io ramuyun ngaangai'.
Io kalo pana mansuli'
saboi induo ra pantula' Nano.
Akau magauk solobon koson ra rami ondo' mapua',
koson ra bulungkut makaruui ondo' nanririlit.
Intor rirun, okou Niniwi, siminalula' noyo sangulun ondo' nototop ra inatangan malaat. Nangatang io koson manggal ra
Gitio noyo ragu ru
Raino pupusin Ku kuasa' ru Asyur ramuyun, am ukaton Ku rantai ondo' nakabangkil ramuyun.”
Gitio noyo ondo' inaru' ru
Okou Niniwi, tatanga' kou bulunsaron!
Ondo' makakuasa' manutuk rirun nakaratong noyo!
Alungi' kubu-kubu sindungan!
Pagilai' ralan-ralan!
Tampos kano mangayou.
Katakion ru
Saujor ru pantula' nagibit ra perisai malia',
am nambayang ra bayang sarampun makabatik malia'.
Pantula' nakatampos noyo mamulunsar!
Koson ra apui, kurita' kuda nilo manguliat!
Kuda
Giu' ra ralan-ralan, kurita' kuda magisimbul ra kalo maaruan angayan,
mugar giu' am giti giu' ra padang ru bandar.
Kurita' kuda mapaang koson ra pilasut,
mugar maribok koson ra ganit.
Pagawai ru saujor susubon jumalai;
makasaru ilo paat ra mugar.
Ulun mamulunsar mugar ra maribok sumuku' ra timbok,
mampaatang ra kuliamos pomopol ra timbok.
Kulobon-kulobon ru timug giu' ra kiing ru sungoi naukab;
am mangalaa' ngaangai' ulun giu' ra istana.
Ulun mamulunsar namparakop ra andu' raja',
ulipon-ulipon ruandu' nano mampalaa koson ra susuit asang,
luluntug ra kubab sabap ra mangiluk guang.
Mamagun ru Niniwi masimbul mingkual intor ra bandar
koson ra timug mingkual intor ra ombon ondo' naabak.
Morongog golok, “Longgo'! Longgo'!”
kaa' kolondo' sangulun pana ondo' masaga' sumaguli'.
Gaawo' noyo pirok!
Gaawo' noyo mas!
Nososok bandar ra masuang rapu'!
Napuso noyo Niniwi, nokoloso am masiluk.
Sabap ra malaa', nagiru' ambiluo ru ulun;
atur monontol, kalo maikang;
ngaangai' ulun mabula' bulos.
Ati kia bandar no raino?
Bandar ondo' koson ra luang batu intok ru singa' manabunsut;
intok ru anak-anak ru singa' aniin ra akanon,
intok sukuan ru singa' ungkuyon am singa' ruandu',
intok ondo' moonsoi ra tayar ru anak-anak ru singa'.
Mansaam singa' ra ondo' akanon nano,
am kual nano binsangon no
koson akanon ru singa' ruandu' am anak nano.
Sosokon ru singa' luang batu nano
ra binsang ru kual ru ondo' sinaam nano.
Mindagu
Aibui boo ra bandar ondo' nososok ra ulun mampatoi am ulun magabau,
am niayuk nososok ra masuang rapu'
ondo' gaawon am talingaawon.
Rongog kano ra libos ru pitol lalapos am kuritot ru luda' mugar,
kurutuk ru kuda masimbul am kuriku' ru kurita' kuda mauyog.
Pulalai mangkuda mamulunsar ra guang maantak,
ilang manguliat am tutura' makapiniat.
Ulun ondo' matoi kalo mauntob,
baangkai nilo satuntur-tuntur,
mangkinibit ra ulun makasaru.
Niniwi mantalan ra inan no aniin ra ukuman.
Kinantalur nano mamunduk kaga' ra guang.
Masuang bansa' nasinggayawan riso,
am nampasauk risilo ra ulipon nano.
Mindagu
“Okou Niniwi, ukumin Tokou!
Pagibaangon Tokou,
am mompoloso ra bansa'-bansa' magilong rirun;
makito nilo baal muno ondo' makauyuyu'.
Pamakuan Kuno rirun nototop ra sisang;
Binobol Tokou ra jamol.
Tantangin kou ru ulun ra guang malaa'.
Ngaangai' ulun ondo' magilong rirun lumugut am mindagu,
‘Niniwi nalunsai ayuk boo soroi!
Osoi kia ondo' maya' riso mangiluk guang?
Kolondo' boo ondo' masaga' manimayo riso.’ ”
Okou Niniwi, moonsoi kou poyo kia intor ra Tibi, pusor bandar ru Misir? Tibi niayuk mokoondo' ra sungoi ondo' mangampin riso koson ra timbok; Sungoi Nil noyo gagampin nano.
Tibi namarinta ra pagun Itiopia

Kabalu' pana raginio, mamagun ru Tibi rinakop am pinatiran ra pagun. Giu' ra moonong pisuk ru ralan, anak-anak nilo linamba' saboi minatoi. Tingganai-tingganai nilo rinantai am tinayar-tayar ra gino ngai' ru ulun ondo' namparakop risilo.
Okou Niniwi, okou pana magauk. Piroton mu niayuk koson mamayag ra inan intor ra pantula'.
Ngaangai' ru kubu muno masauk koson ra puun ru ara ondo' kawa' nano naansak noyo. Paat ra uyogon puun tataun no, kawa' nano marayus maratu' ra kabang ru ulun ondo' masaga' mangakan no.
Saujor muno malawo koson ra ruandu' am pagun muno makatalang, kalo maalungan giu' ra saang ru pantula'. Apui sumolob ra lugu' ru kulobon garabang muno.
Pansagou ra timug koson ulaan buoi ra okou awangin. Kapioto' kubu-kubu muno! Kikinjangi' tana' labu' koson mambaal ra batu bata, am pongoono' intok pangutawan nano!
Atan pana ondo' baalon muno kolondo' onong, sabap maaru' solobon kou saboi matoi kapoam potoyon ralalom pangayawan. Nampaliot kou koson ra tatanom ondo' kinai' ru gapu'.
Nansayat kou noyo koson ra gapu'!
Ulun mantalan muno masuang poyo intor ra butitin giu' ra limbowon! Kaa' raino minugar ilo noyo, koson ra gapu' ondo' napabingkal ra kawo am nansiab ra liminiot.

Pagawai-pagawai muno koson ra sampanon ru gapu' ondo' sumindung giu' ra timbok paat ra orou masimu'. Kaa' pakasirang mato ru orou, gapu' no mataki' mansiab ra lumiot; kolondo' sangulun pana nakapandai ra intok inangayan ru sampanon ra gapu' no!

Okou raja' ru Asyur! Gabenor-gabenor muno minatoi noyo am tingganai-tingganai muno nokororot ra sabubuoi no. Mamagun muno nantutuliar giu' ra kagunungan, am kolondo' sangulun pana makapagibit risilo muli' saguli'.

Pilat muno kalo mababas am ruruko-ruruko muno kalo mapali'. Ngaangai' ulun ondo' nokorongog ra tanou katutukan muno magitapap ra longon sabap ra maansukan. Kolondo' sangulun pana makapamayag ra inan intor ra kalaatan muno ondo' kalo lumonggo'-longgo'.
Gitio noyo tanou ondo' pinabala' ru
Iou

Kua polosoo' Mu aku makaliman ra kapaganan koson ragitio? Ati kulaan Kou tumaan guang ra ulun ondo' mambaal ra kalaatan? Katutukan am kalaatan masauk ra libung kuno. Pansangaran am pagansangan masauk ra ati-ati intok.
Ginio ra undang-undang malawo am kolondo' onong; katimpakan kalo igondo' paugaro'. Ulun malaat masalok mangala ra ulun mabanis guang giu' ra makama; ginio ra katimpakan pinatimpurok.
Rongog kano! Pasaukon Ku ulun Babilonia makakuasa', bansa' ondo' masangit am makuliga'. Mongoi ilo ra titikop ru tana' koson manguasa' ra pagun ra bokon.
Mapasingkual ilo ra kalaanan giu' ra ngaangai' intok. Malilimbau ilo kaga' saboi mangkara' ra ngaangai' binaal nilo motopot am iowon ralalom ru undang-undang.

Kuda ru ulun Babilonia maribok poyo intor ra ampunguon am masangit poyo intor ra taani ondo' maitilan. Pulalai ru saujor mangkuda ru Babilonia matong intor ra pagun-pagun maalur; kuda nilo mokobolos ra kukurutuk. Pulalai saujor mangkuda matong mamulunsar koson ra susuit kanui manimpar ra ondo' akanon.
Saujor ru Babilonia matong am mamulunsar ra tigaluon; moonong ulun malaa' paat ra ilo matong.
Ulun ru Babilonia magasab ra raja'-raja' am makakurit ra tingganai-tingganai ru pamarintaan. Kolondo' kubu mokopongompong risilo. Pinumpunan nilo ra tana' timbok ru kubu, am nampagaau raginio.
Kopongo raginio nataki' ilo minugar koson ra siob ru angin. Makasala ilo sabap sumamba ra kaikangan galama'.”
Iou

Kaa' ati kulaan Kou tumaan guang magilong ra ulun ondo' malaat kaga' koson risilo? Okou matulai kaga' koson magilong ra kalaatan; Okou kalo tumaan guang ra ulun ondo' mambaal ra kasalaan. Kaa' kua pongkoror Kou paat ulun Babilonia mamuso ra ulun ondo' kalo malaat koson risilo?
Kua karaa' Mu ulun koson ra papait giu' ra raat kapoam koson ra sampanon ru bibiag boborok am mansiab ondo' kolondo' tingganai?

Ulun Babilonia namparakop ra ulun ra pamata', ilain koson ra ondo' rinakop no papait. Ulun ru Babilonia namparalaat ra ulun rinakop nilo ra ralalom ru ralo liliwa' nagindii sabap ra namparakapan raginio!
Ilo pana siminamba ra ralo nilo am nampataak ra taak simbalui ra ralo no, sabap ra ralo nangani' risilo ra akanon ra masuang kaga' am langkaya'.
Mantilayun ilo kia mamakai ra ilang am mararayus mamuso ra bansa'-bansa' ra kolondo' guang makaasi'?
Magaloi aku ra manara ru ulun magalung, am maginaa ra atan ondo' paraguon ru
Taam

Tulisi' tanou no sabap ra kalo poyo nasaboi orou koson masauk. Kaa' orou raginio mataki' matong am atan ondo' pabalaan Kuno rirun maaru' masauk. Kabalu' pana ilain ra orou raginio mabuoi matong, kaa' kulimano' ayuk; baal raginio maaru' masauk am kalo painjulon.
Gitio noyo tanou no: ‘Ulun ondo' nambaal ra kalaatan pusoon, kaa' ulun ondo' nambaal ra kasagaan ri Aki Kapuuno' maayag sabap ra gumagaya' ilo ri Aki Kapuuno'.’ ”
Kalangkayaan

Ulun nanguasa' iison am asabin ru ulun ondo' kinuasa'. Konilo, “Aibui boo ramuyun sabap ra nangalap ra kuliamos ondo' sala' ka longgom min! Kula' poyo buoi min mapalangkaya' ra inan ra mampajajal ra ulun ondo' nagutang ramuyun koson mambayar ra utang?”
Kaa' kalo nalimanan min, akau ondo' nanguasa' ra ulun bokon magutang niayuk am jajalin koson mambayar ra bunga'. Pantula' matong am mangkinibit ramuyun monontol ra malaa'. Gaawon nilo rapu' min!

Nampagaau kau ra rapu' ru masuang bansa'. Kaa' raino bansa'-bansa' ondo' naayag mampagaau ra rapu' min sabap ra namatayan ondo' binaal min am sabap ra kalaatan min ra mamagun ru tana' ti am niayuk bandar-bandar ra tana' ti.
Aibui boo ramuyun! Napalangkaya' kau ra sasambaloi min ra atan ondo' noowot min ra kalaatan. Nanambaloi kau ra mapiot koson manindung ra sasambaloi min intor ra karaat.
Kaa' inatangan mino mampakauyu' ra sasambaloi min; am mamuso ra masuang bansa', maparatong kau ra katutukan ru inan galama'.
Mulu' poyo ra batu-batu ru timbok pana gumolok mononsol ramuyun am lugu'-lugu' ru baloi miis am mamintanou golok no.
Aibui boo ramuyun sabap ra nambaal kau ra bandar ondo' mimpuun ra kalaatan am nambaal raginio ra namatayan.
Bansa'-bansa' ondo' kinuasa' min makai' ikang ra kolondo' onong; ngaangai' ondo' baalon nilo makai' kosolob ru apui.
Kaa' koson ra raat ondo' nototop ra timug, koson raginio noyo ra tana' ti pana mososok ra ulun ondo' makaulig ra
Aibui boo ramuyun sabap ra nabaya' ra sangit akau nagasab am nanauyu' ra sambalayan-sambalayan min; mangkinibit kau risilo kakasiling koson ra ulun magauk.
Raino nasaboi paat min koson tauyuon am sala' ka urumaton. Pangurumatan ramuyun makulau masauk ra pagasaban. Jajalin kau ru

Nantagar kau ra puun-puun tataun giu' ra kataunan Libanon, kaa' raino akau galama' tagaron. Namatoi kau ra bibiag ra giu' no, kaa' raino ilaanon kau ru bibiag. Ngaangai' ti masauk sabap ra namatayan am kalaatan ondo' binaal min ra mamagun ru tana' ti am niayuk bandar-bandar ra tana' ti.

Atan onong ru sinungkalalaing? Sinungkalalaing binaal ayuk ru ulun am ondo' noowot min intor raginio abau ayuk toojo. Atan kia kalabaan ondo' moowot ru ulun nambaal ra sinungkalalaing intor ra sinungkalalaing no? Sinungkalalaing kalo mindagu!

Aibui boo ramuyun sabap mindagu kau ra saputul luton, “Tirong no!” kapoam mindagu ra rondo' batu maayo, “Ingkakat no!” Makaindagu kia sinungkalalaing rirun? Maaru' lair sinungkalalaing inangkupan ra pirok am mas, kaa' sinungkalalaing no kalo mamainawo.
Gitio noyo pakiasian ri Nabi Abakuk:
Iou
guang kuno natikop ra imuag.
Gama' ru baalon Mu poyo
binaal Muno ondo' makaimuag ra paat maiti.
Pakaasi' no ramon kabalu' pana sumangit Kou.
Matong Kou poyo intor ra Idom;
Okou i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' matulai matong intor ra Kabuluran Paran.
Katulayan Muno nakatikop ra limbowon;
tana' ti natikop ra pangamparan Rirun.
Matong Kou am makapiniat koson ra ganit;
sinda mapaang intor ra kalindu' Muno,
ra giu' noyo kuasa' Muno pasibunion.
Nanusub Kou ra maruol magulu Rirun
am nanusub ra kapatayan sumunu' Rirun.
Paat ra Okou lumonggo', muyog tana' ti;
paat ra Okou magilong, bansa'-bansa' songongonsol.
Gunung-gunung ondo' lair noyo soroi natutuk kalingon;
bulur-bulur ondo' nagulayun soroi pana liminonson,
bulur-bulur intok Muno mugar intor noyo ra galing.
Nakito ku ulun ru Kusian malaa',
am ulun ru Midian monontol.
Sungoi kia nangkinibit Rirun siminangit,
iou
Raat kia nangkinibit Rirun siminangit?
Sinakayan Mu gaun
am siminakoi ra gaun ru rasam maawas,
paat ra Okou matong koson mangani' ra kamanangan ra ulun Muno.
Nakatampos Kou noyo mamakai ra tanggayan ru panah Muno,
nakatampos koson mampalabus ra anak panah Muno.
Tana' ti lumata' am sungoi tumilis.
Paat ra gunung-gunung makakito Rirun, ngaangai' no muyog;
rasam rumatu' intor ra limbowon.
Timug giu' ra ragana' ru tana' mompongoos
am kinulun nano lumapos.
Paat ra panah Muno ondo' maribok manguliat,
am tanggulan ondo' suminda ra manguliat,
mato ru orou am sila' lumonggo' minsir.
Ralalom ru sangit lumiput Kou ra tana' ti;
ralalom ru sangit manginjang Kou ra bansa'-bansa'.
Miningkual Kou koson mamayag ra ulun Muno,
koson mamayag ra raja' pinili' Muno.
Namparatu' Kou ra tingganai ru ulun malaat,
am namuso ra ngaangai' maamaya' nano.
Anak panah Muno nansabut ra panglima saujor nano,
paat ra saujor nano matong koson ra bagiu'
koson mangkinibit ramon magiru' ra mantutuliar.
Maansayan ilo koson ra ulun ondo' simininok
mangimbolo' ra ulun musikin.
Kikinjangin Mu raat ra kuda Muno,
am timug ru raat ondo' lumapos manamputa'.
Norongog Ku ngaangai' no am monontol aku;
bibil kuno monontol sabap ra malaa' aku.
Inan kuno malawo kalo maikang,
kalayam kuno nakasaru
Maginaa aku ra guang mororo' paat raginio
Okou mangukum ra ulun ondo' mamulunsar ritakau.
Kabalu' pana puun ru ara kalo nambusak,
am puun ru anggur kalo nangkawa',
kabalu' pana ampos ru puun jaitun makangiluk ra guang,
am umo ru gandum makasinduol ra guang,
kabalu' pana ngaangai' domba matoi,
am kandang ru sapi' kolondo' suang no,
masalok aku maansayan am maansukan,
sabap ra Okou
koson ra kalayam ru tambang, kalayam kuno kinaikang Mu,
am pamayagan kuno inalungan Mu giu' ra kagunungan.
Indagu
ngaangai' ulun am bibiag, makaaya' susuit am papait. Kalaan Ku
“Ukumin Ku mamagun ru Jirusalim am mamagun ru titikop Jiuda. Saliiron Ku ondo' natatang ra sumamba ra Baal intor ra intok-intok raginio. Imam-imam ondo' mangandoi ayuk ra Baal lilianin ra malingon.

Pusoon Ku osoi ayuk ondo' magaloi ra taap koson sumamba ra mato ru orou, sila' am butitin-butitin. Pusoon Ku niayuk ulun ondo' sumamba Raki' am magibot ra gumagaya' Raki', kaa' niayuk magibot ralalom inggalan ru Dewa Milkom.
Pusoon Ku ulun ondo' nangiruan noyo Raki' am kalo boo maya' Raki'; ilo ondo' kalo matong Raki' am kalo makitulu' intor Raki'.”
Orou ru
Indagu
Ukumin Ku ngaangai' ulun ondo' siminambayang koson ra ulun ondo' kalo nakaulig Raki', am ondo' nantakou am niayuk namatoi koson nompososok ra baloi ru tingganai pangandayan
Indagu
Panulaboi kano am pantangi' kano paat min morongog ngaangai' no, akau mamagun ru bandar giu' ra tampilon ragana', sabap ra ngaangai' ulun mantalan minatoi noyo.
“Paat raginio alapon Ku lampung am uliaton bandar Jirusalim. Ukumin Ku mamagun nano ondo' najala' am mangintopot ra inan galama', am ondo' mindagu, ‘
Rapu' nilo gaawon am baloi nilo pusoon. Manambaloi ilo, kaa' kalo makaayan raginio. Mangandoi ilo ra umo ru anggur kaa' kalo manginum ra wain, ampos ru umo no.”
Orou pangakiman ru
Orou raginio orou sangitan, orou kapaganan am pagalabaan, orou karatuan am kapusaan, orou kalandaman am maitom, orou ondo' majuut am masait.
Monsongorou no morongog bolos ru bujung am golok ru pangayawan intor ra saujor-saujor ondo' mamulunsar ra bandar-bandar mokoondo' ra kubu am manara-manara masawat.
Indagu
Paat ra orou raginio, manulu'
Akau bansa' ondo' kalo mapandai mauyu', pakaliman kano
ra akau kalo poyo pagiruon koson ra apol ondo' siobon ru angin. Pakaliman kano ra kalo poyo makasaboi orou sangitan ru
Saguli' no ra
Aibui boo ramuyun, akau ulun ru Palistin, bansa' ondo' minayan giu' ra nagas. Inaru' noyo ru
Tana' min giu' ra kiing ru raat masauk ra padang sakot; kalukub-kalukub ru magagalung am kandang ru domba baalon ra giu'.
Mamagun ru Jiuda ondo' maayag mayan ra tana' min. Alungin nilo bibiag tinambiag ra giu' no, am paat ra rondom ti mombolong ilo giu' ra baloi-baloi giu' ra bandar Askilon.
Sabap ra Aku
Koson raginio noyo mamagun ru Moab am Amon ukumin sabap ra kinalimbau am minsawat guang nilo, am niayuk sabap ra nagasaban nilo ra ulun ru
mangkinibit risilo malaa' kaga'. Tutukon No dewa-dewa ra tana' ti. Mopongo raginio ngaangai' bansa' sumambayang ra
Giu' no bibiag tinambiag am ngaangai' salinut ru bibiag magupu'. Susuit puok manabunsut giu' ra intok nalunsai no am manimpakaak intor ra gigimpalan. Susuit bangkaak

Ginio noyo ondo' masauk ra bandar ondo' noloos maansukan am ondo' mangkara' ra inan nano makakaansayan. Mamagun nano mangkara' ra bandar nilo noyo bandar ondo' maayo kaga' ra tana' ti. Mapara' siluk no ru libung no, kolondo' ulun minayan ra intok no ondo' ayuk am bibiag ru kataunan ondo' makabunsut ra giu' no! Moonong ulun ondo' mansail giu' ra bandar no magasab riso am makaliman ra malaa'.
Aibui boo ra Jirusalim, bandar malaat ondo' masaga' gumuor ra
Bandar no kalo mampalio ra bilin ru
Tingganai-tingganai ru bandar no koson ra singa' ondo' mansasangal. Akim-akim no koson ra taani maitilan ondo' masuung kaga' saboi saputul bungul pana kolondo' ondo' natatang koson ra suabon no.
Nabi-nabi ru bandar no kalo malansanan am kalo maintopot; imam-imam nampajamol ra atan ondo' pakayon ra tayar ru
Kaa'
Indagu
Mangkara' Aku, ‘Raino maaru' ulun Kuno mangurumat Raki' am mangapu ra pangilaan Kuno. Maaru' masalok ilo mangkara'
Indagu
Kaa' malupus raginio kulawon Ku guang ru bansa'-bansa' no, saboi makiasi' ilo Raki' ayuk am sala' ka tuhan-tuhan ra bokon. Ngaangai' bansa' no gumagaya' Raki'.
Kaa' niayuk intor ra Itiopia
Paat raginio, akau ulun Kuno, kalo boo pana mauyu' kau sabap giminuor kano Raki'. Impayin Ku moonong ulun malilimbau am minsawat ragu; akau kalo boo gumuor Raki' giu' ra bulur Kuno ondo' matulai.
Ulun ondo' asabin am ondo' minggana' guang polosoon Ku mayan ra giu' no. Matong ilo makiindangan Raki'.
Ulun ru Israil ondo' maayag kalo lumaat ra osoi pana; kalo magabau ilo am kalo mamparuung. Lumangkaya' ilo am makakaansayan; kalo malaa' ilo ra osoi pana.”
Akau ulun ru Israil,
pakaansuk kano am parimbai!
Akau mamagun ru Jirusalim,
pakaansuk kano ra totopot ru guang!
Linanggaan noyo ru
Pinagiru' No ngaangai' pantula' min.
kolondo' boo ondo' mampakalalaa' ramuyun.
Masaboi paat no ra ulun mindagu ra Jirusalim,
“Okou Bulur Sion, pai' kalaa' am pai' kalawo guang.
namanang kau sabap ra kuasa' Nano.
Naansukan
nangani' Io ramuyun ra kaayagan bagu
sabap ra motogom Io ramuyun.
Napabansuk kau ra guang Nano,
am Io pana marimbai ra maansukan,
koson ra ulun ondo' tatanga' munsag.”
Indagu
“Kalo boo polosoon Takamin malumpa' ru karaat;
kalo boo polosoon Takamin asabin.
Masaboi paat no;
ukumin Ku ulun nangimbolo' ramuyun.
Bayagon Ku ulun kimpo',
am ibiton muli' ulun ondo' pinatiran.
Mangkinibit Aku ra ulun mangurumat risilo,
saboi giu' ra titikop ru tana',
kalo boo asabin ilo.
Masaboi paat no;
ibiton Ku muli' ulun ondo' nantutuliar;
pasaukon Takamin ra mauligan kaga' giu' ra titikop ru tana',
am pasaukon kau ra langkaya' igondo' poyo.”
Minindagu
Kopongo raginio pinabala' galing ra Nabi Agai, minindagu
“Akau ulun Kuno, kua ayan kau giu' ra ralalom ru baloi moonsoi, kaa' Baloi Kuno lakat poyo nalunsai?
Ilai' noyo atan ondo' nasauk ramuyun!

Masuang pinatias min ra sampug, kaa' nangkumos kau ra kalo kukula'. Makaakanon kau, kaa' kalo maukop koson mampabasug ramuyun. Makaruu' ru anggur kau kaa' kalo majala', makabayang kau kaa' kalo maukop koson mampalasu' ra inan. Gaji' ondo' inapu ru ulun mangandoi kalo maukop koson ra pakuan ru kaayagan nilo.
Kalo kia nakaliman kau kua kasauk ngaangai' baal raginio?
Raino, pagaloi no ra bulur-bulur koson mangalap ra tataun balak, am baalo' sagulio' Baloi Kuno. Aku pana mansayan ramuyun, am sambaan Aku poyo ra ralan ondo' sotopot no.
Malansan kau ra masuang kumoson, kaa' ondo' naalap min totopot kalo kukula'. Paat ra akau magibit muli' kinumos no, sampuyon Ku ginio saboi makai' siabin ru angin.
Ginio sabap no ra rasam kalo rumatu' saboi kolondo' tinanom ondo' tumuu'.

Naparatong Aku noyo ra tampio ra pagun ti saboi bulur, umo ru gandum, umo ru anggur, umo ru jaitun am ngaangai' tutuu' ra pagun ti mangapua'. Ulun, bibiag am ngaangai' tinanom min malumpa' ru tampio.”
Kopongo raginio i Jirubabil am i Josua am niayuk ngaangai' ulun ru Israil ondo' siminaguli' noyo intor ra namatiran
Kopongo raginio nampasaboi i Agai ra ragu ru
Koson raginio noyo
Napatalimpuun ilo ra kandoi gili ra orou karuo ngoopor am apat ra sila' koonom ra bilor karuo ru pamarintaan ri Raja' Darius.
Paat ra orou karuo ngoopor am rondo' ra sila' katulu' ra bilor raginio niayuk, minindagu poyo
Nanusub
“Mokoondo' kia osoi intor ramuyun ondo' lakat poyo makakara' ra mapara' indon ru Baloi Kuno ragili? Raino ati kulaan baal nano, sumugut ra pamaguangan min? Maaru' lair ilain totopot kalo maindon.
Kaa' pai' sangulun pana malawo guang! Rayuso' min kandoi no, sabap ra mabaya' Aku ramuyun.
Paat ra akau miningkual intor ra Misir, binantu' Ku noyo koson masalok mabaya' ramuyun. Raino pana lakat poyo mabaya' Aku ramuyun. Ginio ra kalo pana malaa' kau.
Luiron Ku ngaangai' pamarintaan am ngaangai' rapu' nilo ibiton ra giti, saboi Baloi Kuno mososok ra kalangkayaan.
Ngaangai' mas am pirok ra tana' ti longgom Kuno.
Baloi Kuno ondo' bagu maindon poyo intor ragili, am giu' no panganian Ku ra ulun Kuno ra kalangkayaan am kaansayan.” Ginio noyo ragu ru
Paat ra orou karuo ngoopor am apat ra sila' kasiam ralalom bilor karuo ra pamarintaan ri Raja' Darius, mindagu poyo
Mindagu
Amon ru mokoondo' sangulun ondo' nangalap ra sangkinis kual intor ra taak simbalui ondo' pinataak ra
Paat i Agai nampasaboi ra pangkuatan no, taam imam-imam no, “Kalo.”
Taam imam-imam no, “Iou.”
I Agai pana mindagu boo, “Minindagu
Indagu

Minongoi kau ilong ra tinuntur ra gandum am nangkara' ra makaalap 200 ngakilogram gandum, kaa' sotopot no mokoondo' 100 ngakilogram ayuk. Minongoi kau suuk ra 100 ngalito wain intor ra tuung ru wain, kaa' ondo' soroi 40 ngalito ayuk.
Pinaratong Ku noyo angin malasu' am namparatu' ra rasam batu koson manutuk ra ngaangai' ampos ru umo min, kaa' lakat poyo marara' kau sumaguli' Raki'.
Paat ra orou raiti', orou karuo ngoopor am apat ra sila' kasiam, batu maatang ra Baloi Kuno nopongo pinabanta'. Ilai' noyo atan ondo' masauk intor raino.
Kabalu' pana kolondo' boo gandum ra natatang, am puun ru anggur, puun ru ara, puun ru dalima', am niayuk puun ru jaitun kalo poyo nangkawa', kaa' tumalimpuun raino barakaton Takamin!”
Paat orou raginio niayuk, orou karuo ngoopor am apat sila' kasiam, nangani'
koson posoboyon ri Jirubabil, gabenor ru Jiuda. Indagu
mamparatu' ra pamarintaan, am manutuk ra kuasa' nilo. Palapiaton Ku kurita'-kurita' kuda am ulun nampaugar no; ngaangai' kuda matoi am ulun-ulun nangura' no mampatoi ra rondo' am bokon.
Paat orou raginio, okou Jirubabil, ulipon Kuno, pasaukon Tokou koson mamarinta ralalom ru inggalan Kuno, sabap okou noyo ondo' pinili' Kuno.” Ginio noyo ragu ru
Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa' nangani' ra susuban ri Jakaria koson mampasaboi ra tanou ti ra ulun Nano, “Aku,
Kaa' raino mindagu Aku ramuyun: Saguli' kano Raki', am Aku pana sumaguli' ramuyun.

Pai' kano koson ra kinamatuaan min. Ra galing i, nabi-nabi nampasaboi ra tanou Kuno risilo maa' raginio lumonggo' mambaal ra malaat am mambaal ra tula. Kaa' marara' ilo rumongog Raki' am marara' gumagaya' Raki'.
Ati kia kinamatuaan min am nabi-nabi i raino? Namagatoi ilo noyo.

Pinabala' galing ra nabi-nabi, ulipon Kuno, nampasaboi Aku ra susuban am pampakaraan Kuno ra kinamatuaan min. Kaa' kalo nampalio ilo raginio saboi musiti' mansaan ra kinibit nano. Kopongo raginio timinalikur ilo intor ra tula am nangiou ra Aku,
Paat ra orou karuo ngoopor am apat sila' ru Syibat, iono sila' koopor am rondo' ralalom bilor karuo ra pamarintaan ru Raja' Darius, nampasaboi
nakito ku malaikat ru
Nangkuot aku riso, “Tuan, atan kia arati' ru ngaangai' kuda ti?”
Taam io, “Tuluin tokou ra arati' nano.
Inataran ru
Ngaangai' ru kuda no nambala' ra malaikat, “Inongoi mai liputo' titikop ru tana' am nakito ra titikop ru tana' moonsoi am mamimio.”
Indagu boo malaikat no, “Iou
Taam
am malaikat no pana nanusub raki' mampatanou ra ragu ru
Kaa' siminangit Aku kaga' ra bansa'-bansa' ondo' makaliman ra moonsoi am mamimio. Paat ra Aku nongorot ra sangit Kuno ra ulun Kuno, bansa'-bansa' no namparuang ra kaimbalaan ru ulun Kuno.
Ginio ra siminaguli' Aku ra Jirusalim koson makaasi' ra bandar no. Baloi Kuno baalon saguli' am bandar no punaan.”
Nanusub malaikat no raki' nampatanou ra tanou ti niayuk, “
Ralalom ru pinaintalang ra bokon, nakito ku apat sangau ru sapi'.
Nangkuot aku ra malaikat ondo' minindagu raki', “Atan kia arati' ru sangau-sangau no?”
Timinaam io, “Sangau-sangau no tatandu' ru kuasa' pamarintaan ru tana' ti ondo' nampatutuliar ra mamagun ru Jiuda, Israil am Jirusalim.”
Nangkuot aku, “Atan kia arati' ru rinatangan nilo?”
Taam io, “Minatong ilo koson mampakalalaa' am mampaluir ra bansa'-bansa' ondo' namuso ra Jiuda am niayuk nampatutuliar ra mamagun nano.”
Ralalom ru pinaintalang ra sumunu' no, nakito ku sangulun ungkuyon ondo' nampaguut ra kalat panuku'.
Nangkuot aku riso, “Ati angayan muno?”
Taam io, “Masaga' aku manuku' ra Jirusalim. Moogot aku makapandai ra gawar am pila' ru bandar no.”
Aku pana nakakito boo ra malaikat ondo' minindagu raki' no, jiminalai, am rondo' malaikat ra bokon minuma' riso.

Malaikat ondo' kasaa' mindagu ra malaikat ondo' karuo, “Ribaki' ongoi ra ungkuyon mamulok ondo' nampaguut ra kalat panuku' no, am balai' io ra Jirusalim mososok ra ulun am bibiag tinambiag, saboi timbok ru bandar no kalo boo maalap kabaal.
nambantu' ra Io galama' masauk ra timbok ru apui ondo' lumibung ra bandar no koson manindung riso, am mayan Io ra giu' ra ngaangai' ru katulayan Nano.”
Indagu
Osoi ayuk ondo' mamulunsar ramuyun, mamulunsar ra katagaman ru guang Kuno.”
Ginio ra
Paat ra baal raginio masauk, ngaangai' ulun makapandai ra
Indagu
Paat raginio masuang bansa' matong ra
Igondo' poyo Jiuda masauk ra longgom ru
Akau ngaangai' ulun, pongkoror kano ra saang ru
Malaikat ru
Minigor i Josua ra giu' am nambayang ra ondo' majamol kaga'.

Indagu malaikat no risilo ondo' mangindangan riso giu' ra suruga', “Patiri' min bayang majamol ondo' binayang ru ulun ti.” Kopongo raginio kono ri Josua, “Pinatiran ku noyo tula muno; mangani' aku rirun ra bayang bagu.”
Nanusub io risilo ondo' mangindangan riso mampasampak
Kopongo raginio malaikat ru
ra ragu ru

Rongogo' noyo Tingganai Maayo Imam Josua, am niayuk akau imam ondo' nasauk ra rangan nano, akau ngaangai' tatandu' ru orou matong ondo' moonsoi. Paat raginio, susubon Ku ulipon Kuno ondo' sabiton ri ‘Talantar’.
Pabantaan Ku rondo' batu tulu' persegi giu' ra saang ri Josua. Tulisin Ku ra tulisan-tulisan ra batu no. Ralalom songorou, patirin Ku tula ru pagun ti.
Paat orou raginio masaboi, moonong ulun mangkimait ra pasambalayan nano matong am sumia' ra kaansayan am kinamio giu' ra tatanga' ru umo ru anggur am puun ru ara min.”
Malaikat ondo' minindagu raki' no minatong poyo am nangkarat raki' koson ayuk ondo' tatanga' nombolong.
Nangkuot io, “Atan kia nakito muno?”

Taam aku, “Nakito ku rondo' tampakan ra lampung mas. Tampilon ra rasawat nano mokoondo' rondo' mangkuk ru umau. Tampilon ra ragana' ru lampung no mokoondo' tulu' lampung ondo' moonong rondo' mokoondo' tulu' intok ru sumbu'.
Giu' ra tampilon kait ra ragana' ru lampung no mokoondo' sampuun jaitun, am giu' ra tampilon pamiris pana mokoondo' sampuun jaitun.”
Kopongo raginio nangkuot aku ra malaikat no, “Atan kia ondo' tinatanduan ru kuliamos raginilo, tuan?”
Nangkuot malaikat no raki', “Kalo kia nakapandai kou?”
Taam aku, “Kalo tuan.”
Indagu Malaikat no raki', “Tulu' lampung no tatandu' ru mato ru
Atan kia poyo arati' ru ruo raan ru jaitun giu' ra tampilon ru ruo paip mas ondo' papabayaan ra umau jaitun no?”
Nangkuot malaikat no raki', “Kalo kia nakapandai kou?”
Taam aku, “Kalo, tuan.”
Kopongo raginio indagu io, “Raan no tatandu' ru ruo ngaulun ondo' pinili' am sinauk ri Aki Kapuuno' koson mangandoi ayuk Riso, Tuhan ondo' namingkal ra tana' ti am limbowon.”

Ompong maayo koson ra gunung pana inggion intor ra saang muno. Baalon mu sagulio' Baloi Kuno, am paat ra okou napabanta' ra batu ondo' pupus toojo ra intok nano, ulun gumolok, ‘Mapara' boo bonsoi no!’ ”
Kopongo raginio ratong poyo tanou ra bokon intor ra

Indagu Io, “Jirubabil napabanta' noyo ra batu maatang ru Baloi Kuno, am mopongo no mambaal ra baloi no. Amon baal raginio masauk, ulun Kuno makapandai ra Aku noyo ondo' nanusub rirun, Jakaria, mongoi risilo.
Nasindualan guang nilo sabap ra kasingkatan ru pambaalan no mototoi kaga'. Kaa' nakito nilo i Jirubabil namparayus ra pambaalan ra Baloi Kuno, am naansukan ilo.”
Inurio ku poyo, am raino ti nakito ku rondo' naskhah rinulun nansiab giu' ra limbowon.
Nangkuot malaikat no ra atan ondo' nakito kuno. Taam aku, “Nakito ku rondo' naskhah rinulun nansiab giu' ra limbowon. Gawar nano siam ngamito am pila' nano apat ngamito am naintanga'.”

Kopongo raginio indagu io raki', “Giu' ra naskhah rinulun no mokoondo' tinulisan pagulasan ra titikop ru pagun ti.
