Giu' ra rondo' tayar ru naskhah rinulun no mokoondo' tinulisan ra moonong mantatakou patirin intor ra pagun ti, am giu' ra tayar ru sapapa' ru naskhah rinulun no mokoondo' tinulisan ra moonong ulun ondo' nagibot ra kalo motopot patirin niayuk.
Minindagu
Minatong poyo malaikat no am indagu, “Ilai'! Mokoondo' poyo ondo' minatong!”
Nangkuot aku, “Atan kia ginio?”
Taam io, “Rondo' bakul. Bakul no tatandu' ru tula
Bakul no mokoondo' ra tataub ondo' binaal intor ra tima maitom. Liliwa' raginio inurio ku, tataub no nakakat am mokoondo' sangulun ruandu' nanturung giu' ra ralalom no.
Indagu malaikat no, “Ruandu' ti tatandu' ru kalaatan.” Kopongo raginio jinuulan no ruandu' raginio ra ralalom ru bakul am tinauban bakul no.
Nagilong aku ra rasawat am nakito ruo ngaulun ruandu' nansiab mongoi raki'. Mokoondo' ilo ra kawo ondo' maikang koson ra kawo ru susuit kanawai. Inalap nilo bakul ni am inibit nansiab.
Nangkuot aku ra malaikat no, “Ati kia pagibitan nilo ra bakul no?”
Taam io, “Inibit nilo io ra Babilonia, am nambaal riso ra kuil ra giu' no. Paat mopongo kuil no, paayanon bakul no ra giu' no koson sambaan.”
Nakakito Aku ra pinaintalang ra bokon. Raino ti nakakito aku ra apat kurita' kuda miningkual intor ra ruo gunung gangsa'.
Kurita' kuda ondo' kasaa' binunduk ru kuda malia', ondo' karuo bininduk ru kuda maitom,
ondo' katalu binunduk ru kuda mapulak, am ondo' kaapat binunduk ru kuda ondo' tangkakalut.
Kopongo raginio nangkuot aku ra malaikat no, “Tuan, atan kia arati' ru kurita' kuda ti?”
Kurita' kuda ondo' binunduk ru kuda maitom sumuku' ra Babilonia giu' ra ralayo. Kuda mapulak sumuku' ra kalasaan am kuda ondo' tangkakalut sumuku' ra pagun giu' ra rabugus.

Paat ra kuda ondo' tangkakalut no miningkual, ilain ra ngaangai' ru kuda no kalo boo makapaginaa koson mongoi pangimumui ra tana' ti. Indagu malaikat no, “Ongoi kano pangimumui ra tana'!” Ngaangai' ru kuda no minongoi.
Kopongo raginio golok malaikat no raki', “Kuda ondo' minongoi ra Babilonia giu' ra ralayo nampalinos ra sangit ri Aki Kapuuno'.”
Nangani'

Indagu Io, “Alapo' taak ondo' pataakon ru ulun ondo' bagu siminaguli' intor ra pamatiran giu' ra Babilonia, iono i Gildai, i Tobia am i Jidaya. Ibito' noyo taak nilono ra mataki' giu' ra baloi ri Josia anak ri Jipanya.
Baalo' rondo' karaun intor ra mas am pirok ondo' pinataak nilono, am pasampako' karaun no ra ulu ri Tingganai Maayo Imam i Josua anak ri Jojadak.
Balai' io ra Aku,
Io noyo ondo' mambaal ra Baloi Kuno am mangapu ra urumat ondo' aniin ru raja', am mamarinta io ra mamagun nano. Sangulun imam mamaya' riso am maguyu mangandoi ra moonsoi.’
Karaun no buliin giu' ra ralalom ru Baloi Kuno koson mapabansuk ri Gildai,
Ulun intor ra intok maalur matong koson mangindangan mambaal ra Baloi ru
Paat ra orou kaapat ra sila' Kisliw, sila' kasiam, ralalom bilor kaapat ra pamarintaan ru Raja' Darius,
Mamagun ru Bitil nanusub ri Sarijir am i Rigim-Milik am niayuk ulun nilo mongoi ra Baloi ru
Sinusub ilo niayuk mangkuot ra imam-imam am nabi-nabi, “Lakat poyo kia akai musiti' manulaboi ra kapusaan ru Baloi ru
Gitio noyo tanou ru
Indagu Io, “Balai' ngaangai' mamagun ru pagun ti am imam-imam ra mampali am sulaboi ondo' binaal nilo ra sila' kalimo am katulu' buoi tulu' ngoopor ngambilor ti, sala' ka mangurumat Raki'.
Paat ilo mangakan am manginum, binaal raginio pana koson mangansuk ra guang nilo galama'.”
Ginio noyo ondo' rinagu ru
Nangani'
“Paat ra galing i, nangani' Aku ra susuban ti ra ulun Kuno, ‘Akau musiti' mambaal ra matimpok, moonsoi guang am makaasi' ra ulun ru akau po ngai'.

Pai' imboloo' ruandu' napuor, anak nailusan ra matuo, ulun bokon ondo' minayan ra tatanga' min, kapoam osoi ayuk ondo' ralalom ru kapaganan. Pai' pangatang ra baal ondo' malaat ra ulun ru akau po ngai'.’
Kaa' ulun Kuno mokotog ulu am marara' rumongog ra susuban Kuno; silongon nilo talingo maa' raginio kalo mokorongog.
Kinokotog nilo guang saboi kalo siminugut ra pangilaan ondo' tinaakan Kuno risilo ondo' pinabala' galing ra nabi-nabi ra galing i. Ginio ra siminangit Aku kaga' risilo.
Kalo tinaam Ku pakiasian nilo sabap marara' ilo rumongog paat ra Aku mindagu.
Koson ra bagiu' mapuor, kinuliagai Ku ilo saboi ilo minayan kalalaat giu' ra pagun ra bokon. Tana' ondo' malabung ti nasauk ra mapua', masiluk kaga', am kolondo' ulun minayan.”
Nangani'
“Moogot Aku kaga' mangindangan ra Jirusalim sabap ra motogom Aku kaga' ra mamagun nano, am sabap ra togom Kuno, siminangit Aku ra pantula' ru bandar no.
Sumaguli' Aku ra Jirusalim, bandar Kuno ondo' matulai am lumayun ra giu' no. Jirusalim mauligan ra bandar ondo' gumagaya', am bulur ru
Aki am aru' ondo' matutuo noyo kaga', saboi musiti' mugar ra manjujuga', manturung poyo giu' ra padang ru bandar Jirusalim.
Ralan-ralan giu' ra bandar mososok poyo ra anak ungkuyon am ruandu' ondo' mangkukuli.
Baal raginio kalo makaimuag ra ulun ondo' lakat poyo naayag intor ra bansa' ragitio, kaa' kalo makaimuag Raki'.
Mamayag Aku ra ulun Kuno intor ra pagun-pagun intok ilo pinatiran,

am magibit risilo sumaguli' intor ra sirangon am intor ra kalasaan, maa' raginio mayan ilo saguli' giu' ra Jirusalim. Masauk ilo ra ulun Kuno am Aku masauk ri Aki Kapuuno' nilo. Mamarinta Aku risilo ra motopot am matimpok.
Kaikango' guang mino! Raino morongog min ragu-ragu ondo' niayuk rinagu galing ru nabi-nabi paat ra batu maatang pinabanta' koson mambaal saguli' ra Baloi Kuno.
Kalo poyo raginio, kolondo' ulun ondo' makaandar mampagaji' kapoam mampasiwa' ra bibiag, am kolondo' ulun ondo' makaliman ra mamimio intor ra ulisoon ru pantula'. Nangkinibit Aku ra ulun mansasangor.
Kaa' pamakuan Kuno ra ulun intor ra bansa' ragitio ondo' lakat poyo naayag suai intor ra galing i.

Mampatias ilo ra sampug ra kaansayan. Puun ru anggur nilo mangkawa', tana' mangani' ra ampos, am rasam rumatu'. Mangani' Aku ra ngaangai' ru barakat ti ra ulun intor ra bansa' ti ondo' lakat poyo naayag.

Akau mamagun ru Jiuda am Israil! Paat ragili, bulintok ru ulun bansa' ra bokon magulas ra rondo' am bokon, mindagu ilo, ‘Gama' ru karaat ondo' nakalumpa' ra Jiuda am Israil makalumpa' niayuk ramuyun!’ Kaa' bayagon Takamin, saboi ulun bansa' ra bokon no mindagu ra ilo po ngai', ‘Gama' ru barakat ondo' pinataak ra Jiuda am Israil pataakin niayuk ramuyun!’ Ginio ra kaikango' guang mino am pai' kalaa'!”
Mindagu
Kaa' raino masaga' Aku mambarakat ra mamagun ru Jirusalim am Jiuda. Ginio ra pai' kalaa'.
Gitio noyo baal ondo' musiti' min baalon: Amon ru mindagu kau, raguo' noyo ondo' motopot ra akau po ngai'. Pamatas no ra matimpok, pamatasan ondo' magibit ra kaansayan, giu' ra intok pangakiman.
Pai' pangatang ra baal malaat ra akau po ngai'. Pai' indagu ra ibot kalo motopot. Masisang Aku ra magabau, kalo matimpok am kalaatan.”
Nangani'
“Mampali ondo' binaal ra sila' kaapat, kalimo, katulu' am koopor masauk ra pangiantakan ondo' natikop ra kaansukan am kasagaan ru mamagun Jiuda. Tagami' noyo katapatan am kaansayan!”
Mamagun intor ra bandar ondo' rondo' mindagu ra mamagun ru bandar ra bokon, ‘Ibok ongoi takau samba ra
Masuang ulun am masuang bansa' ondo' maikang matong ra Jirusalim koson sumamba ra
Paat raginio mopor ngaulun bansa' ra bokon matong ra sangulun ru Jaudi am mindagu, ‘Akai niayuk masaga' barakaton koson ramuyun sabap nokorongog akai ri Aki Kapuuno' mabaya' ramuyun.’ ”
Gamat ondo' nambalit ra pagun Siria pana longgom ru
Nambaal noyo Tirus ra kubu-kubu nano am nanimung ra masuang kaga' mas am pirok, saboi nasauk ra kuliamos ru kaindalaman koson ra agis giu' ra ralan.
Kaa' Tuhan nangalap ra ngaangai' ondo' soroi riso. Patirin No ngaangai' kalangkayaan no ra ralalom ru raat, am bandar no koyoon solobon.
Bansa' ra nararatok mayan giu' ra Asdod. Indagu

Lumonggo' ilo mangakan ra kual ondo' lakat poyo makararaa' am atan ayuk akanon ondo' kalo maakan. Ngaangai' ulun ondo' naayag masauk ra ulun Kuno am masauk ra rondo' intor ra bansa' ru Jiuda. Ikron masauk ra ulun Kuno koson ra ulun ru Jibusi
Alungin Ku tana' Kuno am kalo mangiou ra pantula' mansail. Kalo boo polosoon Ku ulun malaat mangimbolo' ra ulun Kuno. Nakito Ku noyo kaimbalaan ru ulun Kuno.”
akau mamagun ru Sion!
Pagitapap kano,
akau mamagun ru Jirusalim!
Ilai', raja' min matong!
Matong io ra katulayan am kamanangan,
kaa' ra minggana' guang,
matong io nangura' ra kaladai,
am nangura' ra anak kaladai ondo' mamulok.
“Patirin Ku kurita' kuda intor ra Israil,
am niayuk kuda giu' ra Jirusalim;
busur ondo' pinakai ralalom pangayawan pusoon.
Raja' min makimobonsoi ra gino ngai' ru bansa';
pamarintaan nano malangka' intor ra raat saboi ra raat,
intor ra Sungoi Iprat saboi ra pompor ru tana' ti.”
“Sabap ra nabantuan Kuno am akau,
nabantuan ondo' sinaapan ra raraa' ru taak simbalui,
palabuson Ku bansa' min
ondo' naimbolo' ralalom pamatiran
koson ra ulun ondo' naaput ralalom ru tulubong mapua'.
Uli' kano, akau ulun pinatiran,
raino makakalansanan kau;
uli' kano ra intok sindungan min.
Balain Takamin raino,
ra barakaton Takamin induo ruli' no
ra ngaangai' kaimbalaan ondo' nauma' min.
Pakayon Ku Jiuda koson ra busur ru ulun tutumula',
am Israil koson ra anak panah.
Pakayon Ku mamagun ru Sion koson ra ilang,
koson mangayou ra ulun ru Junani.”
Mintalang
palabuson no anak panah koson ra ganit.
jumalai Io intor ra rabugus giu' ra tatanga' ru bagiu'.
pusoon nilo pantula'.
Mampaluwau ilo koson ra ulun magauk mampaluwau,
liliwa' mampasasar ra raraa' ru pantula';
raraa' ru pantula' tumilis koson ra raraa' ru taak simbalui,
ondo' pinasasar giu' ra rasawat ru altar intor ra rondo' mangkuk.
Paat orou raginio ra tauli no, bayagon ru
koson ra magagalung mamayag ra bibiag tinambiag intor ra makalalaa'.
Suminda ilo giu' ra pagun ru
koson ra intan ra karaun.
Mapara' bonsoi no am kinaantak ru pagun no ra tauli no!
Ungkuyon mamulok am ralaa lumanja' maikang;
gandum am wain mangikang risilo.
Pakitaak ra

Mangkuot ulun ra sinungkalalaing am ulun mapandai kaga' mangilong, kaa' taam ondo' inapu nilo abau ayuk am ragu kolondo' onong. Mokoondo' ulun ondo' mampaarati' ra inupi, kaa' ragu pinaarati' nilo mampalayau ayuk ramuyun. Simayo ondo' tinaakan nilo pana kolondo' onong. Ginio ra mamagun saugar-ugar koson ra domba ondo' nakalayau. Soroi ilo ralalom kapaganan sabap kolondo' tingganai.
Indagu
Mampili' Aku ra ulun manguasa', tingganai am panglima intor ra ilo po ngai' koson mamarinta ra ulun Kuno.
Mamagun ru Jiuda mamanang koson ra saujor ondo' manginjang-injang ra pantula' ralalom ru losok giu' ra ralan. Mangayou ilo sabap ra
Kaikangon Ku mamagun ru Jiuda;
mamayag Aku ra mamagun ru Israil.
Makaasi' Aku risilo
am magibit risilo ngaangai' muli'.
Pamakuan Kuno risilo
ilain koson ayuk ra ilo kalo igondo' Ku impayi'.
Aku noyo
iowon Ku pakiasian nilo.
Mamagun ru Israil masauk ra maikang koson ra ulun tutumula',
am maansukan koson ra ulun ondo' nanginum ra wain.
Papag nilo mangkara' ra kamanangan ti,
am maansukan sabap ra binaal ru
Piawon Ku ulun Kuno,
timungon Ku ilo.
Bayagon Ku ilo,
am ilo kasuangon koson ragili.
Kabalu' pana pinantutuliar Ku ilo ra gino ngai' ru bansa',
kaa' giu' ra intok maalur makakara' ilo Raki'.
Ilo am anak-anak nilo maayag
am mababaya' muli'.
Intor ra Misir am Asyur, ibiton Ku ilo muli',
am mampaayan risilo giu' ra pagun nilo galama'.
Paayanon Ku ilo giu' ra Giliad am giu' ra Libanon;
titikop ru pagun no nososok ra mamagun.
Paat ra ilo lumaup ra raat ru kapaganan,
Aku,
saboi Sungoi Nil pana mapua' kalingon.
Ulun ru Asyur ondo' lumimbau mampainggana' ra guang,
am Misir ondo' maikang kaga' matatakan ra kuasa'.
Kaikangon Ku ulun Kuno;
sumambayang ilo am gumagaya' Raki'.”
Okou Libanon, ukabi' noyo kulobon-kulobon muno,
maa' raginio apui mokosolob ra puun ru sidar muno.
Okou puun ru sipris, pantangi' no am panulaboi no,
sabap ra puun ru sidar naratu' noyo;
puun-puun tataun ondo' maayo napuso noyo.
Akau puun-puun ru oak giu' ra Basan, pantangi' no am panulaboi no,
sabap ra kataunan makapal tinagar noyo.
Ulun-ulun manguasa' manulaboi,
sabap ra katulayan nilo liminiot noyo.
Rongogo' sangal ru singa';
sabap ra intok ayanan ru singa' giu' ra kataunan giu' ra gawar ru Sungoi Jordan napuso noyo.
Ulun-ulun tatangan ra domba nanimbalui ra sampanon ru domba no kaa' kalo ukumin ilo; nantalan ilo ra kual ru domba no am indagu, ‘Koompor noyo
Indagu

Ulun mantalan ra domba nampagaji' raki', am aku pana nasauk ra magagalung ru domba sampanon ondo' simbaluyon. Alapon ku ruo jujuga': ondo' rondo' inggalanin ku “Kataawan” am ondo' rondo poyo “Pasimpungan”. Tumalimpuun aku boo magalung ra domba-domba no.
Nakai' noyo orot kuno ra talu ngaulun magagalung ra bokon ondo' masisang raki'. Ginio ra pagiruon ku ilo ralalom buoi sansila'.
Kopongo raginio indagu aku ra domba sampanon no, “Marara' aku boo magalung ramuyun. Ondo' matoi, polosoon matoi. Ondo' mapuso, polosoon mapuso. Ondo' lakat poyo maayag mampatoi ra rondo' am bokon.”
Kopongo raginio nangalap aku ra tataun ondo' ininggalanan “Kataawan” am pinandak, koson tatandu' ra nabantuan ondo' binaal ru
Koson raginio noyo nabantuan no inukat paat ra orou raginio. Ulun-ulun mantalan ra domba nagilong raki', am nakapandai ilo ra
Indagu
Kopongo raginio namandak aku ra tataun karuo, ondo' ininggalanan “Pasimpungan”, am naukat noyo pabukatan ru Jiuda am Israil.
Kopongo raginio indagu

Pinangandoi ku sangulun magagalung koson magalung ra domba Kuno, kaa' kalo nampalio io domba ondo' natatak. Kalo naguyum io ra domba ondo' nakalayau, kapoam namabas ra ondo' napilat, kapoam nangani' ra akanon ra domba ondo' lakat poyo naayag. Kaa' inakan no kual ru domba ondo' molomok kaga', am namagus ra salindu ru domba.
Kaulas noyo magagalung ondo' kolondo' onong no! Nangiruan io ra domba sampanon nano. Pangayawan mamupus ra kuasa' nano. Kalindu' nano lumawo am mato pamiris nano moolou.”
Gitio noyo tanou intor ra

“Pasaukon Ku Jirusalim koson ra sasangkir wain. Bansa'-bansa' giu' ra liliut manginum riso am kakasiling koson ra ulun magauk. Paat ra ilo mangala ra Jirusalim, bandar-bandar giu' ra titikop ru Jiuda pana kalaan.
Paat ra tauli no, pasaukon Ku Jirusalim koson ra batu ondo' maagat. Ati-ati bansa' ondo' kuminam mangkayang riso mapilatan. Ngaangai' bansa' ra tana' ti magamung koson mamulunsar ra Jirusalim.
Paat raginio ilaanon Ku ngaangai' kuda, am ulun-ulun nangura' ra kuda masauk ra mantuyang. Alungin Ku mamagun ru Jiuda, kaa' bolowon Ku mato ru kuda ru pantula' nilo.
Bagu no bansa'-bansa' ru Jiuda mindagu ralalom ru guang, ‘

“Paat raginio pasaukon Ku bansa'-bansa' ru Jiuda koson ra apui giu' ra tatanga' ru kataunan kapoam giu' ra tatanga' ru umo ru gandum ondo' naansak; pusoon nilo ngaangai' bansa' ra libung nilo. Mamagun ru Jirusalim maayag giu' ra ralalom ru bandar.
“Aku,

Paat raginio sindungin Ku ilo ondo' minayan giu' ra Jirusalim, am niayuk ulun ondo' malawo kaga' pana masauk ra maikang koson ri Daut. Tingganayon ilo ru papag ri Daut koson tingganayon ru malaikat ru
Paat raginio pusoon Ku ngaangai' bansa' ondo' kuminam mamulunsar ra Jirusalim.
Paat raginio mokoondo' manulaboi giu' ra Jirusalim koson ra manulaboi ri Gadad-Rimon

Moonong sasambaloi giu' ra pagun no manulaboi sigagama': sasambaloi ru papag ri Daut, i Natan, i Liwi, i Simii am ngaangai' sasambaloi ra bokon. Moonong sasambaloi manulaboi sigagama'. Ungkuyon-ungkuyon intor ra moonong sasambaloi manulaboi sumuai intor ra ruandu'-ruandu'.”
Mindagu

Paat raginio luluon ku inggalan ru sinungkalalaing ra pagun ti; kolondo' osoi pana boo makakara' raginio. Luuson Ku osoi ayuk migiangku ra io nabi, am mangiru' ra gogoton koson sumamba ra sinungkalalaing.
Kopongo raginio osoi ayuk ondo' lakat poyo masaga' mindagu ra manala', matuo nano galama' mambala' riso ra musiti' io ukumin ra matoi, sabap ra mangiou nampasaboi ra tanou ru
Paat raginio, kolondo' boo nabi ondo' lumimbau sabap ra pinaintalang-pinaintalang nano, kapoam mangku ra sangulun nabi, kapoam nambayang ra sukub makabulu maa' raginio makapamparuung io ra ulun.
Kaa' mindagu io, ‘Sala' ka nabi aku. Aku ti magitanom – magitanom buoi ru bayag kuno.’
Amon mangkuot ulun riso, ‘Pilat ru atan giu' ra kubab muno?’ Tumaam io, ‘Pilat ti noowot ku paat giu' ra baloi ru rangan kuno.’ ”
am giu' ra titikop ru pagun ti ruo ra sampitalu intor ra mamagun nano matoi.

Sampitalu ayuk intor ra mamagun nano maayag. Kapasawon Ku ilo koson ra pirok tinuyu' toojo ru apui. Kinamin Ku ilo koson ra ulun mangkinam ra mas. Ilo pana makiasi' boo Raki', am iowon Ku pakiasian nilo. Balain Ku ilo ra ilo ulun Kuno, am ilo pana mangiou ra Aku
Mamaar masaboi paat ra
Timungon ru
Kopongo raginio bagu no

Paat raginio, migor Io giu' ra Bulur Jaitun giu' ra tampilon sirangon ru Jirusalim. Kopongo raginio Bulur Jaitun malapak kapiruo ru limayak ondo' malangka', tumalimpuun intor ra sirangon saboi ra kalasaan. Sampiruo ra bulur no minsir mongoi ra tampilon ralayo am sampiruo poyo mongoi ra tampilon rabugus.
Magiru' kau mansail ra limayak ondo' nampalapak ra bulur no. Magiru' kau koson ra kinamatuaan min ragili paat nasauk tana' mogonggon bulintok ra pamarintaan ri Ujia, raja' ru Jiuda.
Paat raginio, kolondo' boo bulintok masimu' am kolondo' bolobou ondo' kumotog,
kapoam kalandaman. Orou matawang ayuk, am niayuk paat ra rondom ti.
pana masauk boo ra raja' ru titikop ru tana' ti. Moonong ulun sumamba Riso koson ri Aki Kapuuno' am makaulig Riso ra nogondo' inggalan.

Tana' giu' ra titikop ru pagun, intor ra bandar Giba giu' ra ralayo saboi ra Rimon giu' ra rabugus, masauk ra mabanis. Jirusalim sumawat toojo, masawat poyo intor ra tana' giu' ra libung nano; kinalangka' ru bandar no intor ra Kulobon Garabang Binjamin saboi ra Kulobon Garabang Pisuk, iono intok ru kulobon garabang ragili, am intor ra Manara Gananil saboi ra intok pamagaan ra kawa' ru anggur longgom ru raja'.
Mamagun mayan ra giu' ra maayag, kalo boo lolobon ru kapusaan.
Porotongon ru
Paat raginio
Mamagun ru Jiuda mangayou koson manaung ra Jirusalim. Gaawon nilo rapu' ru ngaangai' bansa' – mas, pirok am bayang ondo' masuang kaga'.
Rondo' maruol ondo' masaran niayuk makalumpa' ra kuda, baghal, unta am kaladai, am niayuk ngaangai' bibiag giu' ra intok nangkiman ru pantula'.
Amon ru bansa' ondo' kalo masaga' matong koson sumamba ra Raja',
Amon ru bansa' ru Misir marara' mangiantak ra Pangiantakan Mangkalukub ra Raun, ilo pana malumpa' ru maruol ondo' porotongon ru
Ginio noyo ukuman ondo' paratuon ra Misir am ngaangai' bansa', amon ru kalo mangiantak ilo ra Pangiantakan Mangkalukub ra Raun.
Paat raginio lunsing-lunsing ra pinabayang ra kuda pana inukir ra ragu-ragu “Patimpokon tayar ru
Ngaangai' pagangan giu' ra Jirusalim masauk ra longgom ru
Gitio noyo tanou ru
Kaa' taam ilo, “Ati kulaan
Taam
kaa' masisang Aku ri Isau am niayuk papag nano. Pinuso Ku noyo intok makabulur longgom ri Isau am nompoloso ra tana' nano ayanin ru bibiag masigo.”
Amon ru papag ri Isau, iono ulun ru Idom mindagu, “Bandar maino pinuso noyo kaa' baalon mai sagulio',” am
Bansa' ru Israil makakito galama' ra kasaukan raginio, am mindagu, “Totopot
Mindagu

Ralan koson ragitio; Nampataak kau ra akanon ondo' kalo maaya' pataakon giu' ra rasawat ru altar Kuno. Kopongo raginio nangkuot kau, ‘Atan koson akai kalo mangurumat Rirun?’ Mambala' Aku toojo: Nagasab kau ra altar Kuno.

Paat ra akau mampataak ra bibiag ondo' bolou, ondo' marualan, kapoam ondo' kimpo' koson ra taak ra tayar Kuno, kalo kia baal raginio makasala? Kinami' pataako' bibiag koson raginio ra gabenor! Maansayan io kia ramuyun, am pamakuan ramuyun moonsoi kia?”
Raino, akau imam-imam, kinami' makitaak maa' raginio makaasi' i Aki Kapuuno' ritakau. Kalo mangiou Io ra pakiasian min, am baal raginio kasalaan min galama'.
Mindagu

Urumaton Aku ru bansa'-bansa' ra titikop ru tana' ti. Solobon nilo kaminyan giu' ra ngaangai' intok koson mangurumat Raki', am mampataak ilo ra taak simbalui ondo' maaya' pataakon. Ilo ngaangai' mangurumat Raki'!
Kaa' akau nagasab Raki' sabap ra minindagu ra altar Kuno kolondo' onong, am nampataak kau ra akanon ondo' kararain min giu' ra rasawat ru altar no.
Kamin, ‘Nasuraan akai no ra ngaangai' ti’, am nagasab kau Raki'. Nagibit kau ra bibiag ondo' tinakou, ondo' kimpo', kapoam ondo' marualan koson pataakon raki'. Indoson min kia apuon Ku taak raginio?

Kaulas noyo ulun mamparuung ondo' nampataak ra bibiag ondo' kolondo' onong Raki', kaa' mokoondo' io ra bibiag ondo' moonsoi ra ngaangai' ru bibiag tinambiag nano ondo' binantu' nano Raki'; Aku noyo Raja' ondo' maayo,
Mindagu

Musiti' kau mangurumat Raki' ra binaal min. Amon ru marara' kau rumongog ra ragu Kuno, ulason Takamin. Ulason Ku ngaangai' ondo' apuon min koson ra barakat. Sotopot no, inulas Ku noyo ngaangai' no sabap ra kalo lioon min susuban Kuno.
Ukumin Ku anak-anak min, am luitin Ku bulos min ra ampangara' ru bibiag ondo' pataakon min. Mopongo raginio ralaaton kau ru ulun ra nampabujukan ra ampangara'.
Koson raginio ra akau makapandai ra Aku nangani' ramuyun ra susuban ti maa' raginio nabantuan Kuno am imam-imam, papag ri Liwi kalo masulang.

Mangila' ilo ra atan ondo' motopot am sala' ka ondo' sala. Lumampit ilo Raki'; sala' ka ayuk mambaal ilo ra kasagaan Kuno, kaa' ilo niayuk mangindangan ra masuang ulun maa' raginio lumonggo' mambaal ra malaat.
Imam-imam musiti' toojo mangila' ra atan ondo' motopot intor ri Aki Kapuuno'. Mamagun musiti' matong ra imam-imam koson makapandai ra kasagaan Kuno sabap ilo ulun sinusub ru
Kaa' raino, akau imam-imam, siminiang intor ra ralan ondo' motopot. Pangilaan min nangkinibit noyo ra masuang ulun nambaal ra kasalaan. Inanggal min nabantuan ondo' binaal Kuno ramuyun.
Ginio ra Aku pana mangkinibit ramuyun kalo urumaton ru ulun ru Israil sabap ra kalo ginagaya' min kasagaan Kuno, am sabap ra pinasusuai min ulun paat ra akau nangila'.”

Sala' ka kia itakau ngaangai' mokoondo' ra ama' ondo' nogondo'? Sala' ka kia itakau ngaangai' binaal ri Aki Kapuuno' ondo' nogondo'? Kaa' kua ritakau kalo manugut ra bantu' rondo' am bokon? Kua kia pagasab takau ra nabantuan ondo' binaal ri Aki Kapuuno' ra kinamatuaan takau?
Mamagun ru Jiuda minanggal ra bantu' nilo ri Aki Kapuuno' am niayuk nambaal ra baal-baal ondo' makalalaa' giu' ra Jirusalim am giu' ra titikop pagun. Jinamalan nilo noyo Baloi ru
Gama' ru inggion ru
Suai raginio mokoondo' poyo binaal min. Tinimugan min altar ru
Mangkuot kou ra sasaban no ra Io kalo boo mangapu ra taak muno. Koson raginio baal no sabap ra

Sala' ka kia i Aki Kapuuno' nampasauk rirun rondo' inan am rondo' saliguor ra ruandu' no? Atan kia arati' ri Aki Kapuuno' ra baal raginio? Arati' Nano ioginio maa' raginio makaalap kou ra anak ondo' totopot ulun ri Aki Kapuuno'. Ginio ra, tutuno' noyo maa' raginio kolondo' ulun ra gino ngai' min ondo' liminungkang ra bantu' ra andu' nano.
Mindagu
Binaal min
Matong Io koson mangakim ra ulun, koson sangulun ondo' mamasau am manuyu' ra mas am pirok, koson niayuk ra ulun sinusub ru
Kopongo raginio koson ra galing i, maansukan
Mindagu
“Aku noyo

Koson ra kinamatuaan min ragili, akau ngaangai' siminiang noyo intor ra ukum Kuno am kalo ginagaya' mambaal raginio. Saguli' kano Raki', am Aku niayuk sumaguli' ramuyun. Kaa' mangkuot kau, ‘Atan kia ondo' musiti' mai baalon koson sumaguli' Rirun?’
Raino kuatin Takamin, ‘Maruung kia ru ulun i Aki Kapuuno'?’ Maaru' kalo. Kaa' namparuung kau niayuk Raki'. Nangkuot kau, ‘Ati kulaan?’ Taam Aku, ‘Ralalom ru baal mangani' ra sampiopor am papataakan.’
Akau ngaangai' matiu' ra ulas sabap ra ngaangai' bansa' namparuung Raki'.

Ibito' min ngaangai' sampiopor min giu' ra Baloi Kuno maa' raginio mokoondo' masuang akanon ra giu'. Pangkinam kano Raki', am makito min Aku mangukab ra gigimpalan-gigimpalan ru suruga' am labain kau ra ngaangai' ondo' moonsoi.
Kalo polosoon Ku bibiag boborok mamuso ra tinanom min; puun ru anggur min makakawa' ra maawas.
Akau pana raguon boo ra ondo' maansukan ru ngaangai' bansa', sabap ra pagun min masauk ra intok ayanan ondo' moonsoi.”
Mindagu
Kamin, ‘Kolondo' onong mangandoi ayuk ri Aki Kapuuno'. Atan onong no sumugut ra susuban Nano, kapoam mampakito ra itakau pansagulian guang ra kasalaan takau giu' ra saang ru

Itakau galama' makakito ra ulun malilimbau noyo ondo' maansukan. Ulun malaat kalo ayuk rumuang langkaya', kaa' niayuk mangkinam ilo ra guang tumaan ri Aki Kapuuno' ra mambaal ra malaat, am masalok ilo makalabus intor ra ukuman.’ ”
Kopongo raginio ulun ondo' malaa' ra
Mindagu
Ulun Kuno makakito poyo ra pansuayan ru pupus ru ulun moonsoi am pupus ru ulun malaat, ulun ondo' mangandoi ayuk Raki' am ondo' kalo.”
Mindagu

Kaa' akau ondo' gumagaya' Raki', kuasa' Kuno ondo' mamayag ramuyun sumirang koson ra mato ru orou, am kuasa' Kuno mangani' ra pamabasan koson ra sinda mato ru orou. Makalabus kau am maansukan koson ra anak ru sapi' ondo' pinaingkual intor ra kandang.
Paat orou raginio mimbuor Aku, am kalaan min ulun malaat. Masauk ilo koson ra kaau ondo' kinjangin min.
Karaa' pangilaan ru ulipon Kuno i Musa. Karaa' ukum am susuban ondo' tinaakan Kuno riso giu' ra Gunung Sinai koson gagayaan ru ngaangai' ulun ru Israil.
Baalon no ama' am anak rondo' guang, maa' raginio Aku kalo matong koson mamuso ra pagun min.”

Gitio noyo tunung ru kaayagan ri Tobit. Suang ru papag nano intor ra ragana' saboi ra rasawat koson ragitio: Tobit, Tobiil, Ananiil, Aduil, Gabail, Rapail am Raguil papag ri Asiil intor ra bansa' ru Naptali.

Paat ra Asyur pinarinta ru Raja' Salmanisir, i Tobit rinakop am inibit intor ra bandar Tisbi giu' ra Ralayo ru Galilia. Bandar no tampilon rabugus ru Kadis giu' ra Naptali, giu' ra kalasaan ru raat Gajor, am giu' ra tampilon ralayo ru Pogor.

Aku i Tobit, masalok mabanis guang am gumagaya' ra ugama, am buoi ru bayag gumogot mambaal ra moonsoi. Masalok aku mangindangan ra pabukat ondo' makiindangan am ulun ru Israil ra bokon ondo' nababaya' raki' ralalom pinatiran giu' ra Niniwi, pusor bandar ru Asyur.

Paat ra aku lakat poyo mamulok, minayan aku ra Ralayo ru Israil. Ngaangai' bansa' ru Israil musiti' mampataak ra taak simbalui giu' ra Jirusalim, bandar ondo' pinili' ri Aki Kapuuno'. Giu' no, binaal noyo Baloi Nano, ayanan Nano ra matulai ra sabuoi-buoi no. Kaa' ngaangai' bansa' ru Naptali, bansa' kuno, minanggal ra raja' papag ru Raja' Daut giu' ra Jirusalim.

Ginio ra sasambaloi kuno, koson ulun ra bokon intor ra bansa' kuno, maindalom mongoi ra bandar Dan giu' ra kagunungan ru Ralayo ru Galilia. Giu' no mampataak ilo ra taak simbalui ra sinungkalalaing sapi' gawayan ondo' pinaundok ru Raja' Jirobiam raja' ru Israil ra intok raginio.

Ngaangai' no taakin ku ra imam-imam papag ri Arun koson taak ru sambayang. Sampiopor intor ra gandum, wain, umau jaitun, kawa' ru dalima', kawa' ru ara am ampos ru tana' ra bokon no, taakin ku ra ulun Liwi ondo' maningganai ra sambayang giu' ra Jirusalim. Sampiopor ra karuo no tinalan ku, am ruit no makapakuan aku ra pangiantakan-pangiantakan giu' ra Jirusalim. Moonong bilor baalon ku ginio, ondo' ak am paat bilor katulu', bilor tangusan ru tana'.

Moonong bilor ondo' katalu mantayar aku ra sampiopor poyo ra ruandu' nangapuor, anak nailusan ra matuo am ulun bansa' ra bokon ondo' namagun ra popolos ru bansa' mai, am mangakan akai mabaya' ra pasulungon ra bunsag. Ngaangai' raginio baalon kuno koson gumagaya' ra Ukum ri Musa, ondo' inila' ri Dibora, ina' ru aki kuli, i Ananiil. Paat ra ama' kuli minatoi, nailusan aku ra matuo.
Kasukor aku, inandu' ku i Anna, ralaa intor ra bansa' mai galama'. Makaanak akai sangulun ungkuyon am ininggalanan ku ri Tobias.

Kopongo raginio rinakop aku am inibit giu' ra pagun Asyur am namagun giu' ra bandar Niniwi. Buoi minayan ra giu', ngaangai' pabukat kuno am ulun ru Israil ra bokon maindalom mangakan ra akanon ru ulun giu' ra pagun no,
kaa' marara' aku mangakan ra akanon nilo.
Makara' ku toojo susuban ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Ginio ra nambaal i Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga' no ra Raja' Salmanisir nangiou napasauk raki' ra pagawai istana koson mangatang ra balanja' ru ngaangai' pakuan ru raja'.

Ra kalo poyo minatoi raja', maindalom aku mongoi ra pagun Midia koson mambali ra kuliamos ru raja'. Sangarawan ragili minapit aku giu' ra bandar Ragai giu' ra pagun Midia, am napatatang aku ra ruit kukula' ngangkarung ri Gabail pabukat ri Gabria. Karung-karung no makasuang nasailan 300 ngakilogram pirok.
Kopongo Raja' Salmanisir minatoi, minalit riso anak ungkuyon nano i Sanirib. Kopongo raginio kiralanon giu' ra Midia makalalaa' kaga', saboi kalo boo mokoongoi aku ra giu' no.
Nampaakan aku ra ondo' nangaitilan am nangani' ra konoon ra ondo' kolondo' konoon. Amon makito ku baangkai ru bansa' kuno patirin giu' ra lisar ru timbok ru bandar, lobongon ku io.

Paat ra sangarawan nagulas Raja' Sanirib ri Aki Kapuuno' Raja' Ondo' Masawat Kaga', saboi inukum io ri Aki Kapuuno' am Raja' Sanirib liminugut kalalaat intor ra Jiuda. Pakasaguli' intor ra Midia, raja' no siminangit toojo ra ulun ru Israil, am masuang intor risilo pinatoi no. Ra kalinuos kuno nangalap ra baangkai nilo am lobongo' ngaangai' no. Raja' no pana nanusub boo maguyum ra baangkai-baangkai no, kaa' kalo najampa'.

Pambala' boo sangulun mamagun ru Niniwi ra raja' ra aku noyo ondo' nompolobong ra ulun-ulun pinatoi no. Paat nalimanan ku ra bayag kuno mapagon sabap ra binaal kuli, pansibuni aku. Paat baal raginio napandayan ru raja', nalaa' am pagiru' aku.
Ngaangai' rapu' kuno ginaau am pinasimpung ra rapu' ru istana. Kolondo' boo atan-atan raki' ondo' ak am andu' kuno i Anna am anak kuno i Tobias.

Kalibos onom ngaminggu' ragili, Raja' Sanirib pinatoi ru ruo ngaulun anak ungkuyon nano ondo' narayus pagiru' giu' ra kabuluran Ararat. Anak ungkuyon no ra bokon i Isaradon sinauk ra raja'. Pinalansan no ri Agikar, anak ru maayo ungkuyon kuno i Anail ngaangai' panalingapuan ra ruit ru parinta am istana.

I Agikat pinasauk saguli' ra tingganai manalingapu ra istana, sabap paat ra pamarintaan ru Raja' Sanirib, raja' ru Asyur, kandoi ri Agikar manalingapu ra inumon, mambuli ra mohor ru raja', manalingapu ra ruit am magalung ra istana. Sabap ra akon kuno i Agikar, nasauk io ra ulun maparapit ondo' moonsoi raki' am raja', saboi nakauli' aku ra Niniwi.

Paat nagilong ra akanon masuang kaga' ra rasawat ru mija', indagu aku ri Tobias, “Buayoi kuno, ongoi no paguyum ra gino ngai' ru pabukat takau ra bandar ti, sangulun ondo' musikin am gumagaya' toojo ra Tuhan. Kimaiti' io mongoi akan ragiti. Inaanin tokou saboi kou makasaguli'.”

Ongoi i Tobias paguyum ra sangulun pabukat ondo' musikin. Kaa' mataki' io siminaguli' am indagu, “Ama'! Ama'!” “Atan?” Kaku nangkuot. “Mokoondo' ra ulun takau pinatoi! Sinikak io am baangkai nano pinatiran am lakat poyo nakabanta' giu' ra pasar.”
Pulali' aku ingkakat am iruani' mija' no am kalo nangakan ra akanon no. Alapo' ku boo baangkai, am palangano' ku ra ralalom rondo' baloi, sabap ra paat mokotolop mato ru orou bagu no molobong ku.
Uli' aku am pariu'. Kopongo raginio pangakan aku ra guang mangiluk.
Makara' ku ragu-ragu ru Nabi Amos intor ra bandar Bitil:
“Pangiantakan mino makulau masauk ra panguliran
am ngaangai' rimbai mino masauk ra sulaboi.”
Aku pana nantangi'.
Pokotolop mato ru orou, ongoi aku pangkali ra luang, am lobongo' baangkai no.
Kinuritan aku ru pasambalayan am indagu, “Inuyum kono ragili ra potoyon sabap nompolobong kou ra baangkai, am amon ru kalo nagiru' kou, lair kopo patoi. Binaal mu poyo raino ti. Kalo kia malaa' kou?”
Rondom raginio niayuk nariu' aku, am ingkual ra liliut mongoi koolong maar ra timbok. Rondom raginio malasu' kaga', saboi kalo sinilian ku bulos.

Kalo nakapandai aku giu' ra timbok no, tuma' ru rasawat kuli, makapilit. Tatai' nano lakat poyo malaalasu' nakasubo ra mato kuti. Salula' boo bulangkung mapulak ra mato kuti. Tuum aku ra duktur, malupus sangulun mongoi ra sangulun, kaa' piroton tapisi', gumaai japul ru mato kuti, saboi pupus no nalingon aku kobolou.
Apat ngambilor buoi ra kalo makakito aku. Pabukat-pabukat kuno malumpus guang magilong ra baal kuno. Buoi ru ruo ngambilor inalungan aku ri Agikar saboi minanding io ra libung Ilumais.
Pakabanding i Agikar, andu' kuno i Anna, koson kasuangan ru ruandu' ra bokon musiti' mangandoi koson mambaal ra konoon.

Masauk boo ra konoon, atarin no ra ulun nakibaal no, am bayarin. Sangarawan ragili, bulintok mambusak nopongo no rondo' konoon, am atari' no boo ra ulun nakibaal no. Iningkoos io bayari', rinuangan ra anak ru kambing alapon ra kana'.
Pakasaboi ra baloi, tumalimpuun anak kambing no mampagala'. Piawo' ku andu' kuno am kuati', “Ati intor ru kambing no? Tinakou mu kia? Pasagulio' ra tatangan no! Kalo makaakan takau ra ondo' tokowon.”

Taam andu' kuno, “Kambing ti pinaruang tupo ra pinambayar no.” Kaa' kalo mangintopot aku. Binaal ru andu' kuno nampakauyu' kaga' raki'. Nanusub aku riso mapasaguli' ra kambing no ra tatangan no, kaa' minansang io. “Raino makito paliso muno ra sotopot no!” ra io giminolok. “Ati boo bonsoi muli? Ati boo binaal moonsoi muli?”
Mangiluk kaga' guang kuno, saboi nantangi' aku. Ra lumpus kuno pakiasi' aku koson ragitio,
“Matimpok Kou, iou Tuhan.
Makaasi' Kou ralalom ru ngaangai' baalon Muno
am gumagaya' ralalom ru ngaangai' timbalos Muno;
Okou noyo mangakim ra limbowon am tana' ti.
Koonsoi no raki'
am pai' pangukum raki' sabap ra tula-tula kuno,
am tula-tula ondo' nakasibuni.
Kinamatuaan kuli giminuor am minanggal ra susuban Muno;
pai' pangukum raki' sabap ra tula-tula nilai.
Polosoon Mu akai takawin, rokopon am potoyon,
tauyuon, iison am asabin
giu' ra pagun-pagun intok akai pinatiran.
Motopot ngaangai' ukuman Muno,
paat Okou mangukum ramon sabap ra kasalaan mai.
Kalo gumagaya' akai; inimpayan mai susuban Muno
am kalo naayag ra matanda' ra saang Muno.
Raino guguang Mu mambaal ra atan ayuk raki',
alapo' noyo painawo kutu maa' raginio maliom aku intor ra tana' ti,
am sumaguli' masauk ra kaau.
Moonsoi poyo matoi raki' intor ra maayag,
sabap ra marayus aku simbaalin ra ragu malaat, am asabin,
am mangiluk toojo guang kutu.
Iou Tuhan, polosoon noyo ngaangai' kapaganan ti mapupusan;
ibito' aku noyo ra intok ayanan mantilayun.
Pai' impayi' pakiasian kutu,
iou Tuhan,
sabap moonsoi poyo ra aku matoi
intor ra maayag ra maimbolo' am marayus tauyuon.”
Paat orou raginio niayuk giu' ra bandar Ikbatana giu' ra Midia, i Sara anak ruandu' ri Raguil inasaban ru mangangandoi ruandu' ru ama' nano.

Intulu' noyo i Sara inuot, kaa' moonong ra kalo poyo makaparulug, riwato i Asmodius, mamatoi ra ralaki nano. Indagu mangangandoi no ri Sara, “Okou galama' namatoi ra ralaki-ralaki muli! Tulu' ngaulun noyo naguot rirun, kaa' minatoi ngaangai' ra kalo poyo nakapasimpung rirun.
Kua pangukum kou ramon sabap ra pinatayan nilai? Moonsoi poyo ru okou galama' sumunu' risilo, maa' raginio kalo makakito akai ra sangulun pana ra anak muno!”

Pokorongog koon raginio, mangiluk toojo i Sara. Sisikok io mantangi' am pagaloi ra rasawat ru baloi ru ama' nano koson mantuo. Kaa' pakapangkara', kono ralalom ru guang, “Pai'. Asabin ama' kuno ru ulun. Mindagu ilo riso, ‘Makaanak ruandu' kou ondo' tagamin muno kaga'. Kaa' nantuo io sabap kapaganan nano.’ Kangilukan boo ru ama' kuno ondo' matutuo noyo maaru' magibit ra patayan nano. Intor ra mantuo, moonsoi poyo makiasi' ra Tuhan maa' raginio matoi aku ayuk. Aku pana kalo boo mokorongog ra pagasaban raginio.”
I Sara pana nompotoroi ra kalindu' tampilon ra pagimpalan am pakiasi' koson ragitio,
“Koompor Kono, iou Aki Kapuuno' ra Motogom!
Gama' ru masalok urumaton inggalan Muno.
Gama' ru katulayon Kou ru titikop ru binaal Muno
ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Iou Tuhan, magilong aku Rirun
am makiasi' Rirun.
Makitaak aku, polosoon aku matoi ayuk,
maa' raginio kalo boo mokorongog aku ra pagasaban raginio.
Nakapandai kou, Tuhan, ra lakat aku poyo ralaa,
kalo igondo' rulug ra ungkuyon.
Kalo igondo' ku jamali' inggalan kuno kapoam inggalan ru ama' kuno,
buoi minayan ra tana' pamatiran ti.
Anak langkuir aku ru ama' kuno,
rorondo' ra manugul riso.
Kolondo' pabukat ri ama' kapoam pabukat ra bokon
ondo' maaya' manangandu' raki'.
Nailusan aku noyo tulu' ngaulun ralaki;
atan onong no ru maayag koson ragitio?
Kaa' amon marara' Tuhan ra aku matoi,
rongogo' noyo kalumpusan kutu, iou Tuhan!”
Liliwa' makiasi' i Tobit am i Sara, momporongog Tuhan Ondo' Masawat Kaga' ra kitaakon nilo

am nanusub ri Rapail, malaikat Nano mangindangan risilo. Sinusub io koson mangiru' ra bulangkung mapulak intor ra mato ri Tobit maa' raginio makakito io poyo saguli'. Sinusub niayuk i Rapail koson manalingapu ra paguatan ri Sara am i Tobias anak ri Tobit. I Tobias noyo ulun ondo' maaya' kaga' maguot ri Sara. Sinusub niayuk i Rapail koson mapalabus ri Sara intor ra riwato Asmodius.
Paat ri Tobit nangiruan ra liliut koson mumpos ralalom baloi nano, paat raginio niayuk i Sara ondo' giu' ra Ikbatana timinuun intor ra lamin rasawat.
Paat orou raginio niayuk nakara' ri Tobit ruit pinabulian nali ri Gabail giu' ra Ragai, giu' ra pagun Midia.
Kon ru guang nano, “Kinitaak ku noyo ra Tuhan maa' raginio matoi aku ayuk. Moonsoi piawon ku anak kuno i Tobias am tunungin ku ra ruit no ra aku kalo poyo matoi.”

I Tobit pana nampiau ri Tobias am indagu, “Buayoi kuno, malupus ra aku matoi, lobongon aku ra bobonsoi. Urumato' ina' muno am alungi' io buoi ru bayag nano. Mopongo ra io matoi, lobongon ra sapapa' kuno. Karaan ra naimbolo' io paat maapang am naganak rirun. Ginio ra pirot no koson mapabansuk ra guang ru ina' muno, am pai' pantipagon riso ra paliso muno.

“Buayoi kuno, karaan Tuhan i Aki Kapuuno' muno buoi ru bayag muno. Pai' pakatula am pai' anggal ra susuban-susuban Nano. Masalok kou mambaal ra ondo' moonsoi am motopot, am pai' kou labit ra kalaatan,
sabap ulun ondo' mambaal ra ondo' motopot makaampos ralalom ngaangai' pirot nilo.

Pangani' no ra taak pangindangan maya' ra mataakan muno. Sumuang linonggom muno, sumuang poyo ondo' musiti' muno aniin koson ra taak pangindangan. Kaa', kabalu' pana paginakanan muno sanganu, pai' kalaa' mangani',
sabap ra okou mangani' no mambuli ra rapu' ondo' mologo ra paat ru kapaganan.
Motopot ra mambaal ra moonsoi ra ulun musikin iono baal ondo' kasagain ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga'. Baalo' noyo ginio, am makalabus kou intor ra kalandaman ru kapatayan.

“Buayoi kuno, alungi' inan muno ra ruandu'-ruandu' mantalan ra inan. Ondo' maatang, musiti' kou manambili' ra andu' intor ra bansa' takau galama', sabap ra papag itakau ti ru nabi-nabi. Pai' anduo' ulun ondo' sala' ka intor ra bansa' takau. Karaa' noyo ra kinamatuaan takau i Nuu, i Abragam, i Isak am i Jakub, ngaangai' no naguot ra pabukat nilo. Nambarakat i Aki Kapuuno' risilo saboi masuang anak nilo am papag nilo nanugul ra tana' ru Israil.

Ginio ra tagami' pabukat-pabukat muno. Pai' kalimbau manambili' ra sangulun ralaa ra popolos nilo koson alapon mu ra andu'. Kalimbawan magibit ra kasindualan maayo am kapusaan, koson niayuk ra katiaran mangkinibit ra kamusikinan am bitilan.

“Bayarin gaji' ru ulun mangngandoi muno moonong orou, am pai' guuto' ruit no saboi ra suabon no. Amon mangurumat kou ri Aki Kapuuno', moonsoi balos No rirun. Buayoi kuno, alungi' paliso muno moonong paat. Kasalok tumimbalos ra matanda' koson ra ulun masawat kaga' inigilaan.
Atan ondo' okou galama' kalo masaga', pai' mu baalo' ra ulun bokon.
“Pai' majanjayan kaga' manginum ra wain am pai' kou indalom magauk.

“Intor ra akanon muno, pangani' ra ulun ondo' maitilan, am intor ra bayangon muno, pangani' ra ulun musikin. Atan ondo' kalabaan muno pangani' no koson ra taak pangindangan. Paat ra akau mangani' ra taak pangindangan, pangani' ra mabanis guang am mataau.
“Pakibilin ra moonong ulun mapintar, am pai' jojowo' bilin ondo' mokoonong.

“Omporo' noyo Tuhan, i Aki Kapuuno' muno ra moonong paat. Pakitaak noyo Riso maa' raginio maningganai ra bayag muno, am maa' raginio ngaangai' inatangan muno am baalon muno makaampos. Ra gino ngai' ru bansa'-bansa' ra bokon kolondo' ondo' mangapu ra bilin ri Aki Kapuuno'. Io noyo puun ru ngaangai' bilin ondo' moonsoi. Kaa' amon masaga' Io, mapatuun Io niayuk ra ulun giu' ra intok ru kapatayan. Karaa' toojo ngaangai' panuluan kutu; pai' saboi mokoondo' malilianan muno.
“Raino masaga' tokou balain ragili pinabulian ku ruit masuang ri Gabail anak ri Gabria giu' ra bandar Ragai ra pagun Midia.

Raino nasauk takau ra musikin, kaa' kalo pana magalabo kou. Amon gumagaya' kou ri Aki Kapuuno', minggalur ra ngaangai' tula am mambaal ra kasagaan ru Tuhan, i Aki Kapuuno' muno, mokoowot kou ra masuang rapu'.”
Taam boo i Tobias ra ama' nano koson ragitio, “Baalon ku ngaangai' susuban muno ama'.

Kaa' ati kulaan ku maalap ruit no intor ri Gabail? Kalo igondo' akai pakapantuum. Ati kulaan ku mapainono' riso ra osoi aku ti, saboi mangintopot io am manaak raki' ra ruit no? Mulu' poyo kalo makatanda' aku ra ralan mongoi ra Midia.”

Taam i Tobit, “Aku am i Gabail nabaya' siminain ra rondo' surat pambalaan. Surat no piniruo ku, am sigagama' mai nambuli ra sampiruo. Tayar ri Gabail binulian ku ralalom ru kantungan ru ruit ondo' pinabulian kuli. Sauk raginio ruo ngoopor ngambilor ra nakasail i. Raino ongoi noyo alapo' ruit no intor ri Gabail. Uyumon galing ulun ondo' maintopot am ondo' masaga' mamparangan rirun mongoi ra Midia. Gaji' nano bayarin takau paat ra okou makasaguli'.”
Pangkuot boo i Tobias, “Ati intor mutu?”
Taam i Rapail, “Ulun aku ru Israil. Lakat takau poyo mabukat. Minatong aku ra Niniwi ti maguyum ra kandoi.”
Pangkuot i Tobias, “Nakatanda' kou kia ra ralan mongoi ra Midia?”

Taam i Rapail, “Nakatanda'. Masalok aku mongoi ra giu' am nakatanda' ra ngaangai' ralan no. Maindalom aku mayan ra baloi ri Gabail pabukat takau ondo' minayan giu' ra Ragai, bandar ru kabuluran giu' ra pagun Midia. Galur ru bandar Ragai no ruo ngoorou pangkiralanan intor ra bandar Ikbatana.”

Indagu boo Tobias ri Rapail, “Rangan, paginaa ragiti. Mumpos aku sangkinolor mambala' ra baal raginio ra ama' kuno. Mapara' bonsoi no amon ru maranganan mu aku mongoi ra Midia. Mampagaji' akai rirun ra pangkiralanan no.”
Taam i Rapail, “Iou. Maginaa aku, kaa' pai' kabuoi.”
Umpos i Tobias ra ralalom ru baloi am indagu ra ama' nano, “Ama', nakatuum aku no ra sangulun Israil ondo' mamparangan raki'.”
Taam i Tobit, “Susubo' ulun no mumpos. Masaga' aku makapandai ra intor io ra sasambaloi ri osoi am ati ra bansa', maintopot kia io mamparangan rirun.”
I Tobias pana miningkual am pampiau ri Rapail. Kono, “Masaga' ama' kuno tumuum rirun. I Rapail pana minumpos, am panabi' galing i Tobit.
Pambalos i Rapail ra tabi' no, am indagu io, “Gama' ru maligag kou toojo.”

Taam i Tobit, “Ati boo maligag aku? Bolou am kalo makakito aku ti, koson ulun minatoi ondo' kalo makakito ra sinda. Iou, soroi aku ralalom kalandaman koson ulun minatoi! Mokorongog aku ra ulun mindagu, kaa' kalo makakito risilo.”
Taam i Rapail, “Kaikang no toojo, ama', Kalo boo mabuoi mamabas i Aki Kapuuno' rirun. Kaikango' noyo guang muno!”
I Tobit pana mindagu, “Anak kuno i Tobias masaga' mongoi ra Midia. Makaaya' kou kia riso am manulu' ra ralan? Bayarin ku gaji' muno.”
Taam i Rapail, “Ranganin ku anak muno. Masalok aku mongoi ra giu' am nakatanda' ra ngaangai' ralan giu' ra tana' limayak am giu' ra kabuluran.”
Pangkuot poyo i Tobit, “Kinam tunungo', okou intor ra sasambaloi am bansa' ru ati?”
Kaa' taam i Rapail, “Kua kuati' mu baal raginio?”
Kon i Tobit, “Masaga' aku ayuk makapandai ra osoi kou am osoi inggalan muno.”
Taam i Rapail, “Ajaria aku, anak ri Ananias ondo' matutuo no, pabukat muno.”

Indagu boo i Tobit, “Kaansayan matong ra baloi mai! Pai' panginalu sabap mangkuot aku ra osoi kou am osoi sasambaloi muno. Napandayan ra intor kou ra pabukat ra moonsoi kaga' am akai po ngai'. I Ananias am i Natan, anak ri Simiya ondo' matutuo no, nauligan ku. Gumagaya' ilo ra ugama. Galing i maindalom akai mabaya' mongoi sambayang giu' ra Jirusalim. Pabukat-pabukat muno ulun ondo' urumaton kaga', am papag kou ru ulun moonsoi. Kaansayan matong!”
Indagu poyo i Tobit, “Bayarin tokou moonong orou makaaya' paruangon ra balanja' ru pangkiralanan min ruo.
Ongoi no mabaya' ra anak kuno, gaji' muno ruangin poyo.”
Indagu i Rapail, “Ranganin ku io. Kalo pana maimamang kou. Makasuku' akai ra giu' am muli' ra maayag, sabap ralan-ralan nano mongoonsoi.”

Taam i Tobit, “Gama' ru barakaton kou ri Aki Kapuuno'.” Io pana nampiau ri Tobias am indagu riso, “Buayoi kuno, tomposo' ngaangai' ibiton muno ra pangkiralanan min ruo. Gama' ru i Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga' manindung ramuyun ruo ra giu' am mangator ramuyun muli' ra matanda'. Gama' ru mangampin malaikat ru Tuhan no ramuyun ralalom ru pangkiralanan min.”
Pintor i Tobias giminanggol ra matuo nano ra kalo poyo minugar. Kon poyo ri Tobit, “Tumoojo!”
Kaa' tumalimpuun ina' nano mantangi'. Kono ri Tobit, “Kua susubo' mu anak kuno mugar? Io noyo sangulun ondo' lansanin to ra orou matong? Osoi kia ondo' magalung rito raino?
Maatang kia' kaga' ruit no rirun saboi painawo ru anak muno galama' kinibitin mu ra mangalap saguli' ra ruit no?
Kalo kia maukop to maayag ra atan ondo' taakin ru Tuhan rito?”
Taam i Tobit, “Pai' kalaa', makasuku' io ra giu' am makasaguli' ra maayag. Makakito kou riso muli' ra maligag.
Pai' kaimamang, sabap bayaan i Tobias ru malaikat moonsoi. Makaampos pangkiralanan nano am muli' io ra maayag.”
Pakaining raginio, longgo' i Anna nantangi'.
I Tobias pana minugar nabaya' ra malaikat. Minaya' uku' ri Tobias risilo. Narayus ilo minugar saboi ra timinolop mato ru orou, am pombolong maar ra Sungoi Tigris.
Tuun i Tobias ra sungoi koson mambagu' ra kalayam nano. Pulusat ru papait ondo' maayo timinindak intor ralalom timug am kuminam manimpar ra kalayam nano. Golok io,
am indagu malaikat no riso, “Rokopo' papait no! Pai' labusi'!”
Rokopo' ri Tobias ginio am ralaato' no ra lantur.
Indagu malaikat no, “Abui' papait no. Alapo' amparu, pusu' am angkayau no, am bulii' toojo, sabap ginio tatapis pamabas. Kaa' musiti' mu patirin suang ru tinai' no.”
Abui' ri Tobias papait no. Kaingkual amparu, pusu' am angkayau no, tunui' no papait no. Santayaran no inakan am santayaran no inusian koson ra lutu'.
Ilo ruo pana namparayus ra pangkiralanan saboi maar ra pagun Midia.
Pangkuot i Tobias, “Rangan ku Ajaria, atan maruol ondo' maalap kababas ra amparu, pusu' am angkayau ru papait no?”
Taam malaikat, “Amon solobon pusu' am angkayau ru papait no, lisun no makapangunjau ra riwato intor ra ulun subolon. Mugar ra mataki' riwato no, am kalo boo jojowon ulun no ra mantilayun.
Amparu ru papait no pamabas ra ulun ondo' mato nano nakulaupan ru bulangkung mapulak. Amon paluiton amparu ru papait no ra mato nano am sampuyon, bulangkung no pana mairu', am mababas ulun no.”
Paat ilo nakasaboi giu' ra pagun Midia, am maar noyo ra bandar Ikbatana,
indagu i Rapail, “Rangan ku Tobias!”
Taam i Tobias, “Atan ginio?”
Indagu i Rapail, “Musiti' to mombolong giu' ra baloi ri Raguil. Okou po ngai' riso. Rondo' ayuk anak nano; sangulun ralaa makainggalan ri Sara.

Okou pabukat no ra mamaar kaga', am maaya' toojo koson maguot riso am manungkus ra ngaangai' kalangkayaan ru ama' nano. Ralaa raginio moonsoi guang, baani am mantalur kaga'. Ama' nano niayuk sangulun ondo' moonsoi guang.

Rondom raiti' mansunur aku ra ama' nano, maa' raginio mangiou io rirun manangandu' ra anak nano, sabap okou no maaya' kaga'. Bunsag ru paguatan baalon takau malupus ito makasaguli' intor ra bandar Ragai. Nakapandai i Raguil ra okou no maaya' kaga' manangandu' ra anak nano. Ginio ra kalo maimpayan no panamung muno kapoam manaak ra anak nano ra ulun bokon, sabap amon impayin no, lumungkang io ra Ukum ri Musa am musiti' ukumin ra matoi. Ginio ra iningo' bilin kutu. Rondom no mansunur aku am i Raguil intor ra ralaa no, am atangon mai pantamungan min. Makasaguli' to intor ra Ragai, ibiton to io muli'.”

Kaa' indagu i Tobias, “Rangan ku Ajaria, nakaining aku ra tunung ru katulu'-tulu' ngaulun ralaki nano ragili. Ngaangai' nilo minatoi giu' ra lamin pambalangan paat ra rondom parulugan ra kalo poyo makaparulug riso. Koon ru ulun, pinatoi ilo ru riwato.

Kalo jamarin no i Sara, kaa' moonong ulun ondo' masaga' lumampit ri Sara potoyon paat raginio. Aku ti anak langkuir, am amon ru matoi aku, maaru' kalumpusan ru matuo kuno magibit ra patayan nilo. Mulu' poyo kolondo' anak nilo ra bokon koson mompolobong risilo.”

Taam malaikat no, “Nalilianan mu noyo kia bilin ru ama' muli? Moogot io maa' raginio manambili' kou ra ralaa intor ra pabukat muno galama'. Iningo' toojo. Pai' lioo' riwato no. Tambilio' noyo ralaa no. Mangintopot aku ra rondom no pataakon i Sara masauk ra andu' muno.

Paat ra okou mumpos ra lamin pambalangan, musiti' kou magibit ra santayaran ra pusu' am angkayau ru papait, am patampako' ra intok panalaban ra kaminyan. Owou no mongowou ra titikop ru lamin no. Amon maalok ginio ru riwato no, magiru' io am kalo boo minggaar ri Sara ra sabuoi-buoi no.

Kaa' kalo poyo marulug kou ra andu' muno, musiti' akau ruo migor am makiasi' ra Tuhan Ondo' Masawat Kaga' maa' raginio makaasi' am magalung Io ramuyun. Pai' kalaa'. Intor ra talimpuun i ralaa no suput ru abuk muno. Mamayag kou riso am magibit riso ra baloi muno. Mangintopot aku ra okou am i Sara aniin ra anak masuang. Igondo' poyo, pai' kaimamang!”
Kaining ri Tobias ragu ri Rapail ra pabukat no poyo i Sara tampilon ra ama' nano, makaguang io riso am masaga' maguot riso.

Pakasaboi ilo ra bandar Ikbatana, indagu i Tobias, “Rangan ku Ajaria, rayuso' aku atari' ra baloi ri Raguil pabukat kuno.” Malaikat no pana nangator riso ra giu' no. Napaat nilo i Raguil tuturung maar ra kulobon ru liliut ru baloi nano. Panabi' i Ajaria am i Tobias ri Raguil, am balasi' no tabi' nilai ra minindagu, “Pabukat kau, ibok umpos! Kaansayan matong ra baloi mai.”
Ibito' ri Raguil ilo mumpos ra baloi nano,
am indagu ri Idna, “Mansalu toojo tuu' bagu no ra pabukat kuli i Tobit.”
Indagu i Idna risilo, “Pabukat kau, ati intor min?”
Taam i Tobias am i Rapail, “Ulun akai ru Israil intor ra bansa' Naptali, intor ra bansa' pinatiran giu' ra bandar Niniwi.”
Pangkuot poyo i Idna, “Makaulig kau kia ri Tobit pabukat mai?”
Taam ilo, “Makaulig akai riso.”
Pangkuot i Idna, “Ati kulaan boo riso i?”
Taam ilo, “Lakat poyo naayag am maligag.”
Ruangi' boo ri Tobias, “I Tobit ama' kuno.”

Kaining ginio, bigor i Raguil am alok ri Tobias liliwa' nantangi' ra kaansukan. Io pana mindagu, “Gama' ru mambarakat i Aki Kapuuno' rirun anak kuno. Ama' muno sangulun moonsoi am matanda'. Mangiluk toojo ra ulun maayag ra moonsoi am masaga' mangindangan no nobolou!” Ganggali' no i Tobias liliwa' mantangi'.
Andu' nano i Idna am anak nilo i Sara minaya' pantangi'.
Inuma' ri Raguil ra maansukan i Tobias am i Rapail. Nanimbalui io risilo ra domba gawayan.
Pakapariu' karuo-ruo tambului no am tumurung ra mangakan, indagu i Tobias ri Rapail, “Rangan ku Ajaria, kitaako' ri Raguil maa' raginio pataakon no anak nano masauk ra andu' kuno.”

Naining ri Raguil ragu-ragu no am indagu io ri Tobias, “Akan no am inum no, am rumamai noyo ra rondom raiti'. Okou no maaya' kaga' manangandu' ri Sara. Kalo pataakon ku ra ulun bokon, sabap okou pabukat kuno ra mamaar kaga'. Kaa' musiti' aku mambala' rirun ra ondo' sotopot no.

Pinawatan ku noyo io nakapansusunu' ra tulu' ngaulun, ngaangai' no pabukat mai. Kaa' ngaangai' nilo minatoi sigagama' paat ra rondom kasaa' marulug. Raino akan no am inum no. Alungin kau ruo ru Tuhan.”
Taam i Tobias, “Kalo mangakan am manginum aku ra kalo poyo tumaam kou.”

Nangiou i Raguil. Kono, “Iou. Pataakon ku io rirun sumugut ra Ukum ri Musa. Inaru' noyo paguatan ti ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga', am apuo' noyo io koson ra andu' muno. Intor raino nakapagirot kau, rondo' am bokon, am pataakon i Sara rirun ra sabuoi-buoi no. Gama' ru Tuhan Ondo' Masawat Kaga' magalung ramuyun ra rondom raiti' maa' raginio maayag. Gama' ru makaasi' Io ramuyun am moonsoi rirun!”

Piawo' boo ri Raguil anak nano. Pakaumpos io, guuto' ri Raguil kalindu' ri Sara am patutuyo' no ri Tobias am ra barakat nano, “Alapo' noyo io ra andu' muno sumugut ra inaru' ru Ukum ri Musa. Ibito' noyo io ra matanda' ra baloi ru ama' muno. Gama' ru manaak i Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga' no ramuyun ra kaayagan moonsoi.”

Panusub boo i Raguil ra andu' nano i Idna mangalap sampila' karatas rinulun ondo' lakat poyo kolondo' tulisan. Tulisi' no ra karatas no nabantuan ru paguatan ondo' mambala' ra napataak io ri Sara no ri Tobias saukon ra andu' nano sumugut ra inaru' ru Ukum ri Musa. Kopongo raginio bagu no nangakan am nanginum ilo.
Piawo' boo ri Raguil andu' nano am indagu riso, “Tomposo' rondo' lamin am paumposo' i Sara.”
Panampos i Idna ra lamin koson ra susuban ru ralaki nano, am paumposo' i Sara ra giu' no. Tumalimpuun io mantangi' sabap ra anak nano, am piiri' no lomou ru mato nano, am indagu ri Sara,
“Sara, kaikang no. Mangintopot aku raino ti aniin kou ru Tuhan Ondo' Masawat Kaga' ra kaansukan tayar ru pasualion ra kalumpusan. Kaikango' noyo guang muno!” Iruani' boo ri Idna lamin no.
Kopongo nangakan am nanginum, nasaboi paat no mombolong, am atari' ru matuo ri Sara i Tobias ra lamin kaalangan ondo' tinampos no.
Nakara' ri Tobias bilin ri Rapail, am alapo' no pusu' am angkayau ru papait intor ra ralalom ru kantungan inibit nano, am patampako' ra intok panalaban ra kaminyan.
Owou ru papait no mapajajou ra riwato, saboi nagiru' io ra Misir.
Paat sikaruo ayuk i Tobias am i Sara ra lamin ondo' nakaput, luat i Tobias intor ra nambalangan am indagu ra andu' nano, “Tirong no, antuob. Ibok pakiasi' to makimasi' am makialung ra Tuhan.”
I Sara pana timinirong am pakiasi' ilo makialung ri Aki Kapuuno'. Pakiasi' i Tobias koson ragitio,
“Koompor Kono, iou Aki Kapuuno' ru kinamatuaan maili!
Gama' ru omporon inggalan Muno ra sabuoi-buoi no
ru ngaangai' binaal Muno giu' ra suruga' am ra tana' ti.
pinataak Mu riso i Awa masauk ra andu' nano
koson mangindangan am manungka' riso;
nasauk ilo ra kinamatuaan ru ngaangai' ulun.
Mindagu Kou, ‘Kalo moonsoi amon ru misasangulun ulun no;
pataakon Ku riso mangindangan ondo' maaya'.’
Iou Tuhan, raino alapon ku ra andu' i Sara,
ra ngaangai' kabanisan ru guang,
am sala' ka sabap ra guang kumambil.
Kasaga' no makaasi' ramon ruo ngaulun,
maa' raginio masimpung akai saboi ra matutuo.”
Nagampan ilo mindagu, “Amin,”
am pombolong buoi ru rondom.
Rondom raginio tirong i Raguil. Piawo' no ulun-ulun mangngandoi nano, am pabaya' ilo minongoi pangkali ra lobong, sabap kinara' no, “Ati lair minatoi i Tobias, am alapon takau ra kakuritan ru ulun.”
Pakapangkali ra luang, umpos ri Raguil ra baloi am indagu ra andu' nano,
“Susubo' mangngandoi ruandu' mumpos koson magilong ru lakat poyo maayag i Tobias. Amon ru minatoi io noyo, moonsoi lobongon takau io ra kalo poyo mapandayan ru ulun.”

Ilo pana nanusub ra mangngandoi ruandu' magibit ra lampung am mangukab ra kulobon koson magilong ru lakat poyo maayag i Tobias kapoam kalo. Pakaumpos mangngandoi no, ilai' no karuo-ruo no tatanga' nokororot.
Indibok io miningkual am pambala' ri Raguil am i Idna ra lakat poyo maayag ri Tobias am kalo napilatan.
Ilo pana nongompor ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga'.
“Koompor Kono, iou Aki Kapuuno'!
Gama' ru mongompor ulun Muno Rirun ra sabuoi-buoi no;
gama' ru mongompor ilo Rirun ra guang ondo' totopot mapasau.
Koompor Kono sabap napabansuk raki';
maayo kimasi' Muno ramon;
makito atan ondo' kalaanan kuno kalo nasauk.
Koompor Kono, iou Tuhan,
sabap ra makaasi' Kou ra karuo-ruo anak langkuir no.
Pakaasi' no am alungi' no ilo,
maa' raginio magulayun ilo maayag ra maansukan ralalom ru togom.”
Panusub i Raguil ra ulun-ulun mangngandoi nano namumpun ra luang ru lobong no ra kalo poyo sumirang mato ru orou.

Kopongo raginio panusub i Raguil ra andu' nano nambaal ra masuang ruti'. Io galama' minongoi ra intok napalabusan ra bibiag tinambiag nano am saguli' ra nagibit ruo ngainan sapi' gawayan am apat ngainan domba gawayan. Nanusub io ra ulun-ulun mangngandoi nano nanimbalui ra bibiag tinambiag no am momongo ra bunsag paguatan.
Io pana nampiau ri Tobias am indagu riso, “Ayan no ragiti buoi ruo ngaminggu' koson mangakan am manginum mabaya' ramon. Polosoo' anak kuno maansukan sabap naimbolo' io kaga'.

Mopongo raginio makapangalap kou sampiruo intor ra rapu' kuno am muli' ra baloi ru ama' muno ra maayag. Rapu' kuno ra sampiruo poyo masauk ra longgom muno niayuk malupus ra aku am i Idna matoi. Kaikango' noyo guang muno! Raino aku ama' muno am i Idna ina' muno, am okou anak mai koson ri Sara.”
Piawo' boo ri Tobias i Rapail am indagu riso,

“Rangan ku Ajaria, moonsoi mongoi kou tuum ri Gabail giu' ra bandar Ragai. Ibito' apat ngaulun mangngandoi am ruo ngainan unta. Pataako' ri Gabail surat inono' ti maa' raginio makataak no ruit no rirun. Kimaiti' niayuk io sumaang ra bunsag paguatan mai.

Nakapandai kou ra untotobon ru ama' kuli orou saboi aku makauli'. Mangiluk io kaga' amon ru mabuoi aku. Nakapandai kou niayuk ra jinajalan aku ri Raguil mayan ragiti, am kalo maalap ku ra lungkang susuban nano.”

I Rapail pana minugar nabaya' ra apat ngaulun mangngandoi am ruo ngainan unta mongoi ra bandar Ragai giu' ra pagun Midia, am ayan ra baloi ri Gabail. Pataako' no ri Gabail surat inono' no. Io pana nantunung ra i Tobias anak ri Tobit bagu ayuk naguot, am piniau i Gabail sumaang ra bunsag paguatan no. Untobo' no kantungan-kantungan ru ruit ondo' lakat poyo mokoondo' ra meterai, am posokoyo' ngaangai' no ra tampak ru unta-unta.

Suabon no riminondom ilo kaga' minugar minongoi ra bunsag paguatan. Pakasaboi ra baloi ri Raguil, natuum nilo i Tobias tatanga' nangakan. Nalingas i Tobias ingkakat am panabi' ri Gabail. Balasi' ri Gabail tabi' no ra nalamawan, am ruangi', “Anak ra moonsoi kaga' guang, koson kou ra ama' muli ondo' moonsoi am mataau! Gama' ru mambarakat i Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga' no rirun am andu' muno am niayuk iwan muno. Koompor noyo i Aki Kapuuno', sabap makito ku bulos ri Tobit pantukir kuli!”
Liliwa' raginio moonong orou i Tobit manguntob ra paat ondo' gogoton mongoi ra Ragai am muli'. Kaukop noyo paat no, am kalo poyo minuli' anak nano, indagu i Tobit,
“Maaru' lair ru naaput io ra giu'. Ati lair ru minatoi noyo i Gabail saboi kolondo' ulun mapataak ra ruit no riso.”
I Tobit pana tumalimpuun mangiluk guang.
Indagu andu' nano i Anna ri Tobit, “Maaru' minatoi noyo anak kuli.” Io pana tumalimpuun mantangi' am manulaboi ri Tobias.
“Alii bagu raki', alii ra anak kuli, buayoi kuli, kua polosoo' tokou minugar?”

Indagu i Tobit ra andu' nano, “Roro' no, antuob. Pai' pangkara' ra jajajou. Maligag io. Ati lair ru mokoondo' nakaawang risilo saboi naaput ra giu'. Malansanan ulun namparangan riso, mabukat takau tupo riso. Pai' kangiluk sabap io. Muli' io ra mataki'.”
Kaa' taam i Anna, “Pongkoror! Pai' pagabau raki'! Maaru' minatoi noyo anak kuli!”

Moonong orou mingkual i Anna ra baloi am marayus monontong ra ralan binayaan ri Tobias paat minintor. Kalo masaga' io mangining ra osoi ayuk pana am muli' ayuk ra malupus mokotolop mato ru orou. Makasuku' ra baloi kalo mombolong io, kaa' sorondom mantangi' am manulaboi ra anak nali.

Binantu' ri Raguil ra ibot ra bunsag paguatan ra anak nano atangon buoi ruo ngaminggu'. Kopongo bunsag no, indagu i Tobias ri Raguil, “Kataak no raki' muli' raino. Maaru' matuo kuli maimamang am kalo boo malansan makailong raki'. Nantunung aku noyo rirun ati kulaan baal ru ama' kuli paat ra aku nangiruan ra baloi.”
Taam i Raguil, “Pai' poyo, anak! Manusub aku ra sangulun mongoi ri ama' muli koson mambala' ra moonsoi kou ayuk.”
Kaa' jumajal i Tobias, “Pai'. Kataak noyo raki' muli' ra baloi ru ama' kuli raino.”
I Raguil pana mingkakat am pataako' i Sara, anak nano ri Tobias, am niayuk sampiruo intor ra rapu' nano, iono ulipon, sapi', domba, kaladai, unta, bayang, ruit am parabot nano.

Koon raginio noyo io nangiou risilo mugar ra maligag toojo. Panabi' io risilo, kono, “Tumoojo kau. Gama' ru mambarakat Tuhan Ondo' Masawat Kaga' no rirun am i Sara. Gama' ru lakat poyo maayag aku koson makakito ra anak-anak min.”

I Raguil pana mindagu boo ri Sara, “Ongoi no ra iwan muno. Intor raino ilo noyo matuo muno am okou anak nilo. Tumoojo anak kuno. Polosoon aku mangining ra mongoonsoi ayuk intor rirun buoi ra aku lakat poyo maayag.” Ganggol io boo risilo am polosoo' ilo minugar.

Kopongo raginio indagu i Idna ri Tobias, “Gama' ru mangator Tuhan no rirun muli' ra maayag, anak kuno am pabukat tagamin kuno. Gama' ru ralalom ru kaayagan ti makakito aku ra anak-anak muno. Nasauk Tuhan ra sasi': Ra okou palansanon ku anak kuno. Pai' kangiluko' guang nano buoi ru bayag muno. Tumoojo Tobias. Intor raino andu' muno i Sara am ina' muno aku. Gama' ru maansukan takau ngaangai' saboi ra pupus ru bayag takau.” Ganggol boo i Idna risilo am polosoo' ilo minugar.

Kopongo raginio nongompor i Tobias ra Tuhan ru limbowon am tana' ti, Raja' ru limbowon am tana' ti sabap pangkiralanan nano makaampos noyo ra moonsoi. Nambantu' io ra mangurumat ra karuo-ruo iwan nano ra buoi ilo maayag.
Paat ra ilo sumuku' ra bandar Kasirin kalo maalur intor ra bandar Niniwi, indagu i Rapail,
“Tobias, nakapandai kou ra atan koson baal ru ama' muno paat ito minugar.
Ginio sabap ra moonsoi sigulu to ra andu' muno am manampos ra baloi ra kalo poyo makaratong bokon no.
Pai' liliani' magibit ra amparu ru papait.” Ilo ruo pana nagulu minugar, am minaya' uku' ri Tobias no risilo.
Liliwa' i Anna monontong ra ralan ondo' musiti' bayaan ru anak nali,
kakito no i Tobias matong. Pampiau io ri Tobit, “Ilai', matong anak tano! Rangan nano niayuk!”
Kalo poyo nakasuku' ra ama' nano, indagu i Rapail ri Tobias, “Mapali' mato ru ama' muno.
Papipilo' amparu ru papait no ra mato nano. Tatapis no sumalangi' am makalungkab ra bulangkung mapulak intor ra mato nano, saboi makakito poyo ama' muno.”
Nasimbul i Anna minuma' ra anak nano, am ganggali' no am indagu, “Buayoi kuno, nakakito aku poyo saguli' rirun. Raino matoi aku ra kalinuos!” Io pana nantangi'.
I Tobit pana minigor am kabalu' pana nakasaru kalayam nano, ingkual io niayuk intor ra kulobon ra liwar.

Inggaar i Tobias ra ama' nano liliwa' nampaguut ra amparu ru papait. Sampuyo' no mato ru ama' nano, liliwa' nanungka' riso, indagu io, “Ikango' guang muno ama'!” Io pana napapipil ra amparu ru papait no ra mato ru ama' nano, am pinoloso tatapis no sumalangi'.
Io pana ra karuruo kalindu' nano nanganit ra ondo' mokoondo' ra pompor ru mato ru ama' nano.
Ganggol i Tobit ri Tobias liliwa' mantangi'. Pampiau io, “Makakito aku! Makakito aku rirun, anak kuno, buayoi kuno!

Koompor noyo i Aki Kapuuno'! Omporo' noyo Io, sabap maayo Io! Koompor noyo ngaangai' malaikat Nano ondo' matulai. Gama' ru mabaya' Io ra kuasa' Nano mangampin ritakau. Omporo' noyo ngaangai' malaikat Nano ra sabuoi-buoi no. Nangimbolo' noyo Tuhan raki' ra maruol ti. Kaa' raino makakito aku saguli' ra anak kuno i Tobias.”

Umpos boo i Tobias ra baloi. Naansukan kaga' guang nano, am mongompor-ngompor io ri Aki Kapuuno' ra bolos matangil. Tunungi' no ama' nano ra pangkiralanan nali makaampos noyo ra moonsoi. Sala' ayuk ka ruit inibit nano minuli', kaa' niayuk i Sara anak ri Raguil, ondo' nasauk noyo ra andu' nano. Nambala' io ra maar noyo andu' nano ra kulobon garabang ru bandar Niniwi am maar noyo makaratong.

Naansukan toojo i Tobit, am liliwa' mongompor-ngompor ri Aki Kapuuno', ingkual io manguma' ra anak mangiwan nano giu' ra kulobon garabang ru bandar. Kakito i Tobit ru mamagun ra bandar Niniwi, nakasioro' ilo sabap minugar io misangulun am kolondo' nangitang riso. Tunungi' ilo ngaangai' boo ri Tobit ra makaasi' i Aki Kapuuno' riso am namabas ra mato nano.

I Tobit pana timinuum ri Sara andu' ri Tobias, am nanguma' riso ra ragu-ragu ragitio, “Kaansayan matong anak kuno! Koompor noyo i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' nangator rirun ramon. Nambarakat noyo i Aki Kapuuno' ri ama' muno, am okou niayuk am poyo anak kuno i Tobias. Kaansayan matong ra baloi bagu mutu! Gama' ru masalok kou barakaton, masalok maligag am maansukan. Umpos agang!”
Paat orou raginio naansukan ngaangai' ulun ru Jaudi ondo' minayan ra Niniwi. Akon ri Tobit, i Agikar am i Nadab, minatong niayuk am baya' naansukan risilo.
Kaampus bunsag paguatan no, pampiau i Tobit ri Tobias am indagu riso, “Anak kuno, pai' liliani' mangani' ra ayup ra ulun ondo' nangator noyo rirun, am niayuk ruit paruangon.”
Taam i Tobias, “Kula' musiti' pataakon kuno? Kalo malubatan aku koborok pana amon mangani' riso sampiruo intor ra ngaangai' ondo' inibit kuno.

Nangator io raki' minuli' ra maayag am napalabus ra andu' kuno intor ra riwato. Io poyo nagibit ra ruit no minuli' nabaya' raki' am pupus no namabas rirun. Ginio ra kula' kia suang ru ayup musiti' kuno pataakon riso?”
Taam i Tobit, “Pangani' riso sampiruo intor ra ngaangai' ondo' inibit muno minuli' ra inindangan no. Ayup no maaya' riso.”
Pampiau boo i Tobias ri Rapail am indagu riso, “Apuo' noyo koson ra ayup muno sampiruo intor ra ngaangai' ondo' inibit to. Okou pana makaugar ra maayag.”

Kaa' pampiau i Rapail ri Tobit am i Tobias sikaruo ayuk, am indagu io risilo, “Omporo' noyo i Aki Kapuuno', am tunungo' noyo ngaangai' kinoonsoi ondo' binaal Nano ramuyun ra ngaangai' ulun, maa' raginio ilo pana mongompor am mapatulai Riso. Potonowo' noyo binaal ri Aki Kapuuno' ra matanda' ra ngaangai' ulun. Omporo' noyo Io ra kalo lalanggain.
Motopot ra moonsoi mambuli ra ondo' inopot ru raja', kaa' binaal ri Aki Kapuuno' no musiti' potonowon am omporon.
Baalon noyo ondo' moonsoi, akau pana kalo malumpa' ra karaat.
Ulun ondo' masaga' manaak ra indangan palabuson intor ra kapatayan am pusoon ngaangai' tula nano. Makaumur io ra maawar.
Kaa' ulun ondo' malaat am makatula tumula' riso galama'.

Raitii' ni minindagu aku ra musiti' buliin ondo' inopot ru raja', kaa' binaal ri Aki Kapuuno' musiti' potonowon ra ngaangai' ulun. Raino mindagu aku ramuyun ra sotopot no am kalo pasibunion ku atan-atan.

Tobit, paat ra okou am i Sara nakiasi' ra Tuhan, aku noyo ondo' nagibit ra pakiasian no ra saang Nano ondo' matulai. Moonong ra okou mompolobong ra ulun minatoi, aku niayuk ondo' napasuku' ra binaal moonsoi no ra Tuhan.
Paat ra okou miningkakat intor ra mija' ra kalo nangumit ra koborok pana akanon ra mompolobong ra baangkai no, sinusub aku ri Aki Kapuuno' koson mangkinam rirun.
Koon niayuk ra nanusub Io raki' mamabas rirun am mapalabus ra anak mangiwan muno i Sara intor ra kapaganan nano.
Aku ti i Rapail, rondo' intor ra tulu' malaikat ondo' migor giu' ra saang ru Tuhan Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa', nakatampos koson mangandoi Riso.”
I Tobit am i Tobias pana kubu samba ra tana' am nonontol ra malaa'.
Kaa' indagu i Rapail risilo, “Pai' kalaa'! Kaansayan ramuyun! Omporo' noyo i Aki Kapuuno' ra sabuoi-buoi no,
sabap ra minatong aku ra mangindangan ramuyun ra kasaga' ri Aki Kapuuno' am sala' ka kasagaan kuno galama'. Parimbai kano ra mongompor ra Tuhan buoi ru bayag mino.
Paat ra akau mangkara' ra nakakito kau raki' nangakan, sotopot no kalo nangakan aku, baal no ayuk koon raginio.
Omporo' noyo i Aki Kapuuno' buoi ru bayag min giti ra tana' ti, am paringkuanang kano Riso. Raino sumaguli' aku Riso ondo' nanusub raki'. Tulisi' noyo ngaangai' ondo' nailian mino.”
I Rapail pana nagaloi giu' ra limbowon.
Pakaingkakat i Tobit am i Tobias, kalo boo nakito nilo io.
Ilo pana narimbai ra rimbai mongompor ri Aki Kapuuno' am naringkuanang Riso sabap nambaal ra binaal ra mangaayo, sabap ra minintalang noyo malaikat ri Aki Kapuuno' risilo.
I Tobit pana nakiasi' koson ragitio,
“Koompor noyo i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' naayag ra sabuoi-buoi no,
Koompor noyo Io ondo' makakuasa'!
Motopot ra mangukum Io,
Kaa' makaasi' Io niayuk.
Mapatuun Io ritakau giu' ra tana' ru ulun namagatoi,
malupus raginio mapaluat ritakau intor ra kapatayan;
kolondo' makalabus intor ra kuasa' Nano.
Okou Israil, paringkuanang no Riso
ra saang ru bansa'-bansa',
intok napatuliaran ramuyun.
katulayo' noyo Io ra saang ru ngaangai' ondo' naayag;
sabap Io noyo i Aki Kapuuno', Tuhan takau,
Ama' takau ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Kabalu' pana nangimbolo' Io ramuyun sabap ra kalaatan min,
makaasi' Io ramuyun poyo
am mapauli' ramuyun intor ra gino ngai' ru bansa'-bansa',
intok min pinantutuliar.
Amon sumaguli' kau Riso
ra ngaangai' ru guang am salibuor min
am nambaal ra ondo' motopot ra saang Nano,
maaru' rumuli' Io mangindangan ramuyun
am kalo marayus mansibuni intor ramuyun.
Ilai' noyo atan ondo' binaal noyo ri Aki Kapuuno' ramuyun,
Paringkuanang noyo Riso ra bolos matangil.
Koompor noyo Tuhan sabap ra matimpok Io,
katulayo' noyo Raja' ondo' mantilayun.
Kabalu' pana minayan aku ralalom ru namatiran,
maringkuanang aku niayuk ra Tuhan
am mindagu ra kuasa' Nano ondo' maayo
ra ulun ondo' makatula.
Talikur kano intor ra tula-tula min
am pambaal kano ra atan ondo' kasagaan ri Aki Kapuuno'.
Pai' ru napandayan ra matimpakan Io
am makaasi' ramuyun.
maanggak guang kuno sabap ra kinaayo Nano.
Musiti' ngaangai' ulun mapatanou ra katulayan Nano
am marimbai ra rimbai mongompor Riso giu' ra Jirusalim.
Okou Jirusalim, bandar matulai,
ukumin kou sabap ra tula-tula ru mamagun muno.
Kaa' makaasi' Tuhan
ra ulun ondo' nambaal ra kasagaan Nano.
Paringkuanang kano ra Tuhan ra matanda' no,
omporo' noyo Raja' ondo' mantilayun.
Gama' ru baalon saguli' Baloi Nano
am maansukan kau poyo.
Mapabansuk Tuhan ra ngaangai' ulun pinatiran muli,
am mamagun muno ondo' naimbolo'
tagamin No ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Jirusalim, sinda muno mapaang kaga'
tayar ra titikop ru tana' ti.
Intor ra maalur matong bansa'-bansa' rirun
koson sumamba ra Tuhan i Aki Kapuuno'.
Kalindu' nilo nototop ra taak
tayar ru Raja' Ondo' Masawat Kaga'.
Papag ka papag maansukan ulun sabap okou,
am inggalan muno koson ra bandar pinili' ru Tuhan
maingal ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Ulason noyo ngaangai' ondo' lumasang rirun,
ondo' manungkob am momopol ra timbok-timbok muno,
ondo' mamunsai ra manara-manara muno
am monolob ra baloi-baloi muno.
Kabarakat noyo ra sabuoi-buoi no
ngaangai' ulun ondo' mangurumat rirun.
Pakaansuk am kaanggak noyo, okou Jirusalim,
sabap ra mamagun muno ondo' nambaal ra motopot.
Muli' ilo intor ra namatiran
am marimbai mongompor ra Tuhan.
Pakaansuk noyo ulun ondo' motogom rirun
am ondo' maansukan magilong ra kaansayan muno.
Pakaansuk noyo ulun ondo' mantangi' sabap ra kaimbalaan muno,
sabap makakito ilo ra bansuk muno
am maansukan ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Mongompor aku ri Aki Kapuuno', Raja' Ondo' Matulai,
sabap ra baalon saguli' Jirusalim
masauk ra ayanan Nano ra mantilayun.
Jirusalim, mapara' bansuk ru guang kuno,
paat makito ru papag kuno kaantakan muno
am maringkuanang ra Raja' Ondo' Masawat Kaga'.
Kulobon garabang muno intor ra jamrud am nilam,
timbok muno intor ra batu parmata.
Manara-manara muno intor ra mas
am kubu-kubu muno intor ra mas kopoyo.
Ralan-ralan muno inangkupan ra batu dalima'
am batu-batu parmata ra mongologo.
Intor ra kulobon-kulobon garabang muno morongog rimbai ra mangaansukan
am intor ra baloi-baloi muno ulun sapipiau,
‘Koompor noyo Tuhan! Koompor noyo i Aki Kapuuno' ru Israil!’
Ulun ondo' binarakat ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Matulai
mongompor Riso ra sabuoi-buoi no.”
Ra ragu-ragu raginio namupus i Tobit ra rimbai mongompor nano

Umur ri Tobit 62 ngambilor paat io nobolou. Pakakito poyo saguli', moonsoi bayag nano. Nambaal io ra masuang moonsoi am nagulayun nongompor ri Aki Kapuuno' am niayuk nantunung ra katulayan Nano. Umur ri Tobit nakasaboi 112 ngambilor am minatoi ra kalinuos. Linobong io giu' ra Niniwi ra upacara ondo' sotopot no.
Kalo poyo minatoi, pampiau i Tobit ra anak nano i Tobias am indagu riso,

“Buayoi kuno, ibito' ngaangai' anak muno am ongoi noyo ra pagun Midia. Mangintopot aku ra sangkinolor poyo bandar Niniwi ti ukumin ri Aki Kapuuno', koson ra rinagu noyo ru Nabi Nagum. Ngaangai' ondo' rinagu noyo ru nabi-nabi ri Aki Kapuuno' giu' ra Israil intor ra Niniwi am Asyur maaru' masauk. Moonong ragu suguton. Ngaangai' ondo' rinagu ri Aki Kapuuno' saukon ra paat no. Kalo lumungkang i Aki Kapuuno' ra bantu' Nano. Giu' ra Midia mamimio poyo ramuyun intor ra giu' ra Asyur kapoam giu' ra Babil.

Pabukat-pabukat takau ondo' lakat poyo soroi giu' ra Israil pantutuliaron am auton intor ra pagun ondo' moonsoi no mongoi ra intok pamatiran. Titikop pagun Israil masauk ra tana' kaagisan. Samaria am Jirusalim masauk ra bandar ondo' mangasiluk. Baloi ri Aki Kapuuno' makai' kosolob am nalunsai-nalunsai no polosoon ra kukula' buoi.

Kaa' makaasi' i Aki Kapuuno' ra ulun Nano poyo am magibit risilo muli' ra pagun Israil. Baalon nilo saguli' Baloi ri Aki Kapuuno' kaa' kalo moonsoi koson ragili, paat maukop ra maagu no. Paat raginio ngaangai' bansa' ru Israil sumaguli' intor ra pamatiran. Punaan bandar Jirusalim moonsoi koson ragili. Baloi ri Aki Kapuuno' baalon saguli' giu' ra bandar no koson ra rinagu ru nabi-nabi.

Ngaangai' bansa' ra tana' ti pana tumalikur intor ra tula. Mangurumat ilo ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Rondo' ayuk am Motopot, am mamatir ra sinungkalalaing nilo ondo' totopot mampalayau. Ngaangai' bansa' ra titikop ru tana' ti mongompor ri Aki Kapuuno' ondo' mantilayun am mambaal ra kasagaan Nano.

Paat raginio mamayag i Aki Kapuuno' ra ngaangai' bansa' ru Israil ondo' gumagaya' Riso. Matong am tumimung ilo giu' ra Jirusalim. Pataakin risilo tana' ri Abragam no, am maayag ilo ra giu' no ra mamimio ra sabuoi-buoi no. Ngaangai' ulun ondo' motogom ri Aki Kapuuno' ra totopot no maansukan. Kaa' ulun malaat am ondo' makatula liomon intor ra tana' ti.

Ginio ra iningo' bilin kutu, akau anak ku ngai'! Musiti' kau mangandoi ri Aki Kapuuno' ra guang mapasau, am baalon noyo atan ondo' kasagaan Nano. Ilaan noyo anak-anak min maa' raginio mambaal ilo ra moonsoi am masaga' mangindangan ra ulun musikin. Niayuk, maa' raginio mangkara' ilo ri Aki Kapuuno' am masalok mongompor ra Tuhan ra guang mapasau am ngai' ru ikang.

Tobias anak kuno, ugar no iruani' bandar Niniwi ti. Pai' layun ragiti. Mopongo mu molobong ina' muno ra sapapa' kuno, musiti' kou mataki' mugar. Pai' ayan sorondom pana ra mabuoi poyo ra wilayah ru bandar ti. Malaat pagun ti am nototop ra makauyuyu'. Mamagun nano kalo makaliman ra mauyu'.

Karaa' noyo atan koson pinamakuan ri Nadab ri Agikar, kamaman nano galama' ondo' napatuu' riso! Linobong i Agikar ra naayag poyo. Kaa' nambalos i Aki Kapuuno' ri Nadab ra kalaatan nano galama'. Mingkual i Agikar mongoi ra sinda, am i Nadab tumuun ralalom ru kalandaman mantilayun sabap masaga' io mamatoi ri Agikar. Nakalabus i Agikar intor ra landak ru kapatayan ondo' pinaatang ri Nadab riso, sabap masaga' i Agikar mangindangan ra ulun musikin. Kaa' i Nadab galama' naratu' ralalom ru landak ru kapatayan am pinatoi.
Ginio ra anak ku ngai', nakito min galama' atan ampos ru binaal moonsoi am atan ampos ru binaal malaat. Topot ra kalaatan makaampos ra kapatayan. Kaa' raino malawo aku no.”
I Tobit pana pinaluya' ra intok pambalangan nano am minatoi. Linobong io ra ondo' sotopot no.
Kopongo andu' ri Tobit minatoi, linobong io ra sapapa' ru ralaki nano. I Tobias am anak andu' nano pana minugar minongoi ra Ikbatana giu' ra Midia, am siminimpung ri Raguil, iwan ri Tobias.

Nangurumat am nagalung i Tobias ri Raguil am i Idna ondo' matutuo noyo suku' ilo minatoi. Linobong ilo giu' ra Ikbatana. Nanungkus i Tobias ra kalangkayaan ri Raguil, koson ra io nanungkus noyo ra kalangkayaan ri Tobit ama' nali.
Minatoi i Tobias giu' ra Ikbatana koson ra ulun urumaton kaga' paat ra umur 117 ngambilor.

Ra kalo poyo minatoi, nakarampot io nangining ra tanou nalunsayan ru bandar Niniwi am nakakito ra mamagun nano inibit koson ra ulun rinakop mongoi ra pagun Midia ri Siaksaris, raja' Midia. Nongompor i Tobias ri Aki Kapuuno' sabap nangukum Io noyo ra mamagun ru Niniwi am Asyur. Binaal ri Aki Kapuuno' no nambaal riso maansukan am maringkuanang ra Tuhan buoi ru bayag nano.
Paat ra Raja' Nibukadnijar, raja' Asyur namarinta giu' ra bandar maayo Niniwi, Raja' Arpaksad, raja' ru Midia namarinta giu' ra bandar Ikbatana.
Raja' Arpaksad nambaal ra timbok pinaliput ra bandar Ikbatana. Sawat ru timbok no 35 ngamito am kapal no 25 ngamito, binaal intor ra batu pinahat, pila' no 1.5 ngamito am gawar no 3 ngamito.
Moonong kulobon garabang no binaalan rondo' manara ra sawat no 50 ngamito, am kapal ru lugu' no 30 ngamito.
Sawat ru moonong kulobon ru garabang no 35 ngamito am pila' no 20 ngamito, maa' raginio makapansailan ngaangai' saujor nano, nakasimpung ngaangai' pulalai ru saujor mantana'.
Ralalom ru bilor koopor am ruo ru pamarintaan nano, nangayou Raja' Nibukadnijar ra Raja' Arpaksad giu' ra tana' limayak malangka' ra liliut ru bandar Ragau.

Raja' Arpaksad no mokoondo' ra masuang rangan, ioginio ngaangai' mamagun ra kabuluran, mamagun ra kiing ru Sungoi Tigris, Sungoi Iprat am Sungoi Gidaspis am mamagun ru tana' marata' ondo' pinarinta ru Raja' Ariok intor ra Ilumais. Masuang poyo bansa' ra bokon nagamung ra saujor ru ulun Giliud no.

Raja' Nibukadnijar, raja' ru Asyur pana nampasaboi ra bilin ra bansa'-bansa' ra bokon maa' raginio mangindangan riso. Bilin no pinasaboi ra ngaangai' mamagun ru pagun Pirsia, mamagun ru libung kalasaan, libung Kilikia, Damsyik, Libanon am Antilibanon, niayuk ra mamagun ru nagas
am mamagun ru libung Karmil, Giliad, Galilia Ralayo am tana' limayak maayo Isdrilon.

Bilin no pinasaboi no niayuk ra mamagun ru Samaria am bandar-bandar ra libung no, namagun ra tampilon kalasaan ru Sungoi Jordan suku' ra Jirusalim, Bitani, Gilus am Kadis, Wadi Il-Aris am bandar Tapni, Ramsis am niayuk titikop ru wilayah Gosyin saboi ra bandar Tanis am Mimpis, riwa' no ra ngaangai' mamagun ra Misir nakasuku' ra balitan ru Itiopia.

Kaa' mamagun ra titikop ru libung no kalo nampalio ra kimait ru Raja' Nibukadnijar. Kalo masaga' ilo maya' ra mampapatoi, sabap kalo malaa' ilo riso. Mangkara' ilo ra Raja' Nibukadnijar no kalo mapanggol. Ulun-ulun sinusub ru raja' no inasaban am sinusub minuli' ra kolondo' banang.

Raja' Nibukadnijar pana nakaabus sangit. Nagibot io koson mangani' ra titikop ru karajaan nano ra mangala ra ngaangai' ru mamagun Kilikia, Damsyik, Siria, Moab, Amon, Judia am Misir ioginio ngaangai' bansa' ondo' minayan ra lolot ru Raat Tanga' am Teluk Pirsia.

Paat ra bilor koopor am tulu' ru pamarintaan nano, Raja' Nibukadnijar nanusub ra ngaangai' saujor nano ralalom pangayawan manggal ra Raja' Arpaksad. Ngaangai' saujor ru Raja' Arpaksad kinala no, nakaaya' pulalai nangkuda am pulalai nangkurita' kuda.
Raja' Nibukadnijar pana nanguasa' ra ngaangai' bandar giu' ra pagun Midia am binulunsar bandar Ikbatana. Manara-manara ru bandar no ginaau, pasar-pasar no tinakawan am bandar ondo' moonsoi linunsai.
Raja' Arpaksad rinakop giu' ra kabuluran Ragau, am tinura' ra tanggulan.
Kopongo ragili Raja' Nibukadnijar am ngaangai' saujor nano ondo' masuang kaga' no siminaguli' ra Niniwi. Apat ngansila' buoi nilo minunsag ra rumamai am naansukan ra giu'.

Paat ra orou karuo ngoopor am ruo ra sila' kasaa' bilor koopor am balu' pamarintaan ru Raja' Nibukadnijar namatas koson mapaugar ra lolob ru ukum ra bansa'-bansa' ondo' ragili marara' mangindangan riso.

Nanimung io ra ngaangai' tingganai ru pagawai am tingganai ru saujor no am napaugar ra pantutuuman nasibuni risilo. Nampatanou raja' ra namatasan nano koson mangukum ra ngaangai' bansa' ondo' minanggal ra susuban nano.
Ulun ondo' nantutuum no nangiou ra bansa'-bansa' ondo' minanggal ra susuban ru raja' no musiti' pusoon.
Kopongo pantutuuman no, nampiau raja' no ri Golopirnis, panglima masawat nano, ulun karuo nalupus raja' am mindagu riso,

“Aku Raja' Nibukadnijar, raja' matulai am nanguasa' ra ngaangai' tana', manusub rirun mongoi pagibit ra saujor-saujor ondo' baani suang 120,000 ngaulun pulalai ru saujor mantana' am 12,000 ngaulun pulalai ru manangkuda.
Sumonsog pangayou manggal ra ngaangai' wilayah ru kalasaan, sabap ra mamagun no minanggal ra susuban kutu.

Susubo' ilo mampatampos ra tana' am timug koson tatandu' ra ilo makirakop. Paabuson ku sangit kuno risilo. Polosoon ku saujor-saujor kuno manginjang-nginjang ra moonong dangou ru tana' nilono am tokowon rapu' kalangkayaan nilono.
Limayak-limayak suangin ra ngaangai' ulun nilono ondo' mapilatan. Sungoi-sungoi lumuab sabap mososok ra baangkai.
Ulun ondo' lakat poyo maayag no rokopon am ibiton ra sangkiingan ru tana'.
Kaa' okou Golopirnis, musiti' magulu raki' am ayanin ngaangai' wilayah nilono. Mopongo ra ilo makirakop, ingai' ilo saboi aku matong koson mangukum risilo.
Amon manggal ilo, pai' pakaasi' risilo. Potoyo' ilo am gaawon ngaangai' wilayah nilono,
sabap ra nakapagibot aku noyo sabap ru bayag kutu am sabap ra kasingkatan ru karajaan kutu, am gogoton ku suguto'.
Pai' anggalo' rondo' pana ra susuban kutu. Karaa' ra aku ti raja' muno. Ginio ra suguto' ra mataki' atan ondo' susuban kuno rirun!”
