Amon sangulun urumaton kabalu' pana io musikin, mulu' poyo amon io langkaya'. Amon sangulun asabin kabalu' pana io langkaya', mulu' poyo amon io musikin.
Sabap ra kapintaran nano, sasangulun ondo' musikin makapamanggo, am io makaalap ra intok ru gino ngai' ru ulun mangaayo.
Pai' omporo' ulun sabap ilo maindon am pai' asabi' ulun sabap kalo maindon.
Maningot iono bibiag ondo' boborok toojo ra gino ngai' bibiag makakawo, kaa' ruu' ondo' binaal nano iono matamis kaga'.
Pai' pamanggo ra bayang ondo' moonsoi am pai' sauk ra malimbau amon ru okou omporon. Koson raginio baal no sabap kandoi ru Tuhan no makaimuag am nasibuni ra tayar ru ulun.
Masuang raja' ra pupus no manturung ayuk boo ra sulig, kaa' ulun ondo' ra galing i kalo nauligan, inanian ra karaun.
Masuang mangunguasa' masauk musikin toojo, am masuang ulun ondo' urumaton naratu' ra kalindu' ru ulun bansa' ra bokon.
Pai' pangalimut ra kalo poyo naimumuyan am pai' pansawai ra kalo poyo nakapangkara'.
Pai' taam ra kalo poyo norongog am pai' sombot ra ragu ru ulun.
Pai' pakimagansang intor ra baal ondo' sala' ka kaatangan muno am pai' baya' ralalom pansangaran ru ulun makatula.
Anak kuno, pai' kumantitisuk ra masuang kaga' kandoi. Amon ru masuang kaga' kandoi muno, maaru' okou maimbolo'. Kalo mopongo mu ginio, kaa' kalo niayuk malabusan.
Mokoondo' ondo' maagui am mingkotog mangandoi ra kalo tumangus, kaa' gumaai makayaan.
Mokoondo' niayuk mototoi mangandoi am kalo makabaal ra kandoi, ondo' musikin am musiti' indanganon. Kaa' Tuhan maansayan risilo am mangkayang risilo intor ra kapaganan.
Tuhan nampainsawat risilo saboi ngaangai' ulun nangimuag.
Ngaangai' no intor ra Tuhan: moonsoi am malaat, musikin am langkaya', maayag am matoi.
Kapintaran, kaintutunan, kapandayan intor ra ukum, togom, am binaal moonsoi, ngaangai' no pana intor ra Tuhan.
Intor ra talimpuun ru kalayawan am kalandaman nabaya' ra ulun makatula, am kapaganan narampus minaya' ra ulun ondo' masaga' mambaal ra malaat.
Ulun ondo' motopot maaru' mangapu ra taak ru Tuhan. Kasagaan ru Tuhan mangila' risilo ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Mokoondo' ulun ondo' masauk ra langkaya' sabap mingkotog mangandoi am magayai. Kaa' atan maalap nano?

Kono ra ralalom ru guang, “Raino aku makatangus am makasia' ra ampos ru naaguyan kutu.” Kaa' io kalo nakapandai kula' buoi poyo io lakat maayag ra kalo poyo io matoi am musiti' manatang ra rapu' nano tayar ru ulun ra bokon.
Paugaro' noyo kandoi muno ra gagaya' am musiti' kou rumayus mambaal ra kandoi muno saboi okou matutuo.

Pai' solon ra ampos ru kandoi ru ulun ondo' makatula. Baalo' noyo kandoi muno ra gagaya' am pangintopot no ra Tuhan. Koson raginio baal no sabap ra Tuhan ra matasu' mambaal ra ulun musikin pasaukon langkaya' ra mamulali'.
Ulun ondo' motopot makaapu ra barakat ri Aki Kapuuno' koson balos, am sangkuliop ayuk Tuhan mampagayo ra barakat nilo.
Pai' kuati': Atan poyo musiti' kuno uyumon am atan poyo kalo naalap kuno?
Pai' niayuk pangkara' ra okou naukapan noyo am kalo malumpa' ru karaat paat ra orou tauli no.
Paat ra langkaya' malilianan ru ulun kapaganan nilo, am paat ra mapagon malilianan ru ulun kalangkayaan nilo.
Maaru' matasu' ra Tuhan mambalos ra ulun maaya' ra binaal nilo paat ra orou pupus nilo.
Paat raginio ngaangai' binaal nilo makasalula', am sanjam kapaganan mambaal risilo makalilian ra ngaangai' kalangkayaan.
Ginio ra pai' karaa' kaayagan ru sasangulun no maansukan ra io kalo poyo matoi, sabap ra inan ru ulun mauligan paat ra io matoi.
Pai' kimaiti' moonong ulun matong ra baloi mino, sabap ra sangulun ondo' mapintar masuang ruung nano.
Guang ru sasangulun ondo' malilimbau koson ra manuk ru kataunan giu' ra nangaputan, kapoam koson ra sangulun mansigo ondo' magilong ra karatuan mino.
Maginaa io ra kaluagan koson mapalukiat ondo' moonsoi masauk ra malaat, am koson mansiwou ra baal moonsoi.
Sampiat apui ru panjut makasimbula' ra baa, am ulun ondo' makatula maginaa ra kaluagan koson mampatoi.
Ilalai' noyo ulun malaat sabap ra mangatang ilo ondo' mangalaat; pai' saboi' ilo mapakalaat ra inggalan muno koson sabuoi-buoi no.
Amon ru mampakan kau ra ulun suai ra baloi mino, mamparatong ilo ra kapaganan am mapatuliar ramuyun intor ra pabukat mino.
Koonsoi noyo ra ulun ondo' motopot, okou pana balasin; amon sala' ka intor risilo, maaru' intor ra Tuhan Ondo' Masawat Kaga'.
Ulun ondo' marayus mambaal ra malaat kalo makaapu ra moonsoi, nogondo' baal no ra ulun kalo masaga' mangani'.
Pangani' no ra ulun ondo' motopot, kaa' pai' indangano' ulun ondo' makatula.

Pambaal no ra ondo' moonsoi ra ulun ondo' minggana' guang, kaa' pai' anii' ra atan-atan ra ulun malaat. Pai' anii' ilo ra akanon, maa' raginio ilo kalo maikang poyo intor rirun. Koson raginio baal no sabap ra ngaangai' kinoonsoi muno risilo balasin nilo ra kalaatan saboi induo ruli'.
I Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga' pana masisang ra ulun ondo' makatula, am mangukum Io risilo.
Ginio ra anii' noyo ulun moonsoi, kaa' pai' indangano' ulun ondo' makatula.
Paat ra kaansayan, mapagon manutun osoi rangan ondo' motopot, kaa' paat ra kapaganan matasu' mauligan pantula'.
Paat sasangulun makakaansayan, pantula'-pantula' nano mangaruol guang; kaa' paat io makakapaganan, rangan-rangan nano pana mangiruan riso.
Pai' lingon pangintopot ra pantula', sabap ra kalaatan nilo mapalunsai koson ra togol.
Kabalu' pana minggana' guang nilo am mugar tumangkokoong, ilalain toojo ilo. Pamakuan risilo koson ra sangulun mangisas ra galas logam; pupus no mairu' niayuk togol no.

Sangulun pantula' pai' anii' ra intok ra sapapa' muno, maagu no insion kou am talisonon intok muno. Pai' polosoo' io manturung ra pamiris muno; maagu no mamulir io rirun intor ra intok panturungan maatang muno. Pupus no okou pana mangiou ra katapatan ru ragu-ragu kutu am pansagulian guang amon makara' bilin kutu.
Kolondo' sangulun pana makaasi' amon sangulun babalian ru kukuo kapoam mampakaup ra bibiag mangasangit tindukon.
Koson niayuk ra kolondo' makaasi' paat ra okou lumatok ra ulun ondo' makatula am makaaya' ra kalaatan nano.
Koson ra buoi mayan io sumimpung rirun. Kaa' amon okou makakapaganan, pangkubayawan nano mapupusan boo.
Sangulun pantula' mindagu maamis, kaa' ralalom ru guang nano mangatang koson mamparatu' rirun. Babaalon no maya' kalumpus, kaa' amon mokoondo' ra kaluagan, mampatoi io rirun.
Amon malumpa' kou ra kalungganangan, makito mu io maginaa, babaalon no masaga' mangindangan; kabalu' pana nakatampos io mangkayang ra tunob muno maa' raginio maratu' kou.
Bulos nano malui am maansukan io ra kapaganan muno; pisik-pisik io am mapatanou ra ragu magabau intor rirun.
Ulun ondo' mangambong ra tiir makasait, am ulun ondo' lumatok ra ulun malilimbau masauk koson risilo.

Pai' kayango' ondo' maagat kaga' rirun, am pai' simpung ra ulun ondo' langkaya' poyo am makakuasa' poyo intor rirun. Paliuk ru tana' pai' paulio' mamaar ra paliuk ru basi', sabap amon makapagingku', maaru' paliuk ru tana' no mapilang.
Ulun langkaya' mambaal ra kalo matimpok, kaa' lakat poyo magasab. Sangulun musikin naimbolo', kaa' lakat poyo musiti' makimaap.
Amon okou mokoonong, okou pakayon ru ulun langkaya'; kaa' amon okou makiindangan risilo, mangiruan ilo rirun.
Amon okou makarapu', ulun langkaya' mayan simpung rirun am mangingkaut ra kalangkayaan muno ra kalo mapirot galama'.
Amon sasangulun langkaya' makiindangan rirun, jingit-jingit io mampagamis rirun. Ra mantaligamis io mangkuot, “Atan kitaakon muno?”

Mamasug io rirun ra akanon saboi okou manangguang. Pupus no, mopongo kou gaawin induo kapoam kaintalu, magasab io rirun. Tauli no, paat ra okou makatuum riso, kalo masaga' io makaulig rirun am sailin kou ak boo.
Ilalai', pai' saboi' ra okou ruungon am asabin sabap ra sambung muno.
Amon okou kimaitin mongoi ra baloi ru sangulun ondo' makakuasa', musiti' mapandai kou mampaguang. Okou pana masalok kimaitin no.
Pai' antal toojo maa' raginio okou kalo juulin, kaa' pai' niayuk inggalur toojo, maagu no okou lilianin no.
Pai' karaa' ra okou nogondo' ra ulun ondo' makakuasa' no. Pai' niayuk pangintopot ra ngai' ru ragu nano, sabap ra masuang ragu nano masaga' mangkinam rirun am jingit nano mangambi' rirun.
Mapuka' toojo ulun ondo' kalo mapauli ra opoton muno; io kalo manangguang mamilat rirun kapoam mangaput rirun.
Paulio' noyo opoton muno ra ralalom ru guang am ilalai', sabap ra mugar kou ra intok ondo' makalalaa'.
Togom no ra Tuhan sabuoi ru bayag muno am pakitaak no Riso maa' raginio mangindangan Io rirun.
Moonong ilo ondo' maayag masaga' toojo ra salinut nano am ulun masaga' ra pogondo' risilo.
Koson ra tambiag masisimpung salinut nano, koon niayuk ra ulun mangkukubayau ra ulun ondo' koson risilo.
Koson ra taani kalo kumubayau ra anak ru domba, koon niayuk ra ulun ondo' makatula kalo kumubayau ra ulun motopot.
Uku' ru kataunan kalo mokopobonsoi ra uku' makaup; koon niayuk ra ulun langkaya' kalo mokopobonsoi ra ulun musikin.
Kaladai masigo saamon ru singa' giu' ra tana' makasakot; koon niayuk ra ulun musikin ingkautin ru ulun langkaya'.
Minggana' guang karaan ra kauyuan ru ulun masumbung; koon niayuk ra musikin karaan kauyuan ru ulun langkaya'.
Amon sangulun langkaya' makasaru, sungkaan ru rangan-rangan nano. Kaa' amon sangulun musikin maratu', io no poyo tunobon ru rangan-rangan nano.

Amon sangulun langkaya' masala', masuang manaung riso. Amon mindagu io ra jajajou, ragu-ragu nano intopoton. Kaa' amon sangulun musikin masala', lulutaan io. Mulu' poyo amon ragu-ragu nano ra mapintar, kalo rongogon.

Amon sangulun langkaya' mindagu, ngaangai' ru ulun mongkoror am mongompor riso koson ra sawat ru gaun. Kaa' amon sangulun musikin mindagu, moonong ulun mangkuot, “Osoi io?” Amon monontol io, iison io saboi kalo boo makaindagu.
Langkaya' no moonsoi, ginio ak ra kalo moowot ra ralan ondo' makatula. Kaa' musikin karaan kalo moonsoi ru ulun malaat.
Suang ru guang ru ulun mapulanuan intor ra bulos ondo' malumpus kapoam maansukan.
Amon maansukan guang, bulos no niayuk mapulanuan ra maansukan. Kaa' mambaal ra pangabigan piroton ra mingkotog am pamaguangan ondo' masuang.
Pakaansuk noyo sangulun ondo' kalo mindagu ra mambanyou, sabap ra io kalo malaa' ra mapagon sabap ru tula nano.
Pakaansuk noyo sangulun ondo' kalo sinonsol ru guang nano am kalo igondo' nairuan ra kalansanan.
Kalo sama' amon sangulun makalit masauk ra langkaya'. Atan onong ru rapu' ra ulun ondo' makalit toojo?

Osoi ak mangumung ra rapu' saboi mampalubat ra inan galama', sotopot no ulun raginio mampalulur ra kalangkayaan koson ra ulun ra bokon. Koson raginio baal no sabap kalangkayaan muno pakayon ru ulun bokon koson maayag ra matasu'.
Atan koson sangulun mataau ra ulun bokon amon maikal-ikal io ra inan galama'? Io noyo kalo makasia' ra rapu' nano galama'.
Osoi ondo' maulas toojo intor ra sangulun ondo' makalit ra inan nano galama'? Ginio noyo ukuman ra tayar ru kalaatan nano.
Mulu' poyo amon io mambaal ra moonsoi, baal raginio binaal kalo siningon. Buoi kabuoi kalit nano makito niayuk.
Ulun ondo' sumolon ioginio sangulun malaat; ilo mikakalingou am mataman ra ulun ra bokon.
Sangulun ondo' mampaluung kalo igondo' majala' ra linonggom nano. Mampaluung
Sangulun makalit magayai toojo, saboi kalo maukop akanon giu' ra mija' nano.
Anak kuno, ginio ayuk katanggangan muno alungi' noyo inan muno bonsoi-bonsoi, kaa' pagibit niayuk ra pataakon ondo' sama' ra Tuhan.
Karaa' noyo ra rondo' orou okou matoi am okou kalo balain sanggilan orou no.
Ra kalo poyo nasaboi orou no musiti' kou mambaal ra moonsoi ra rangan-rangan muno, am anii' ilo maya' ra katanggangan muno.
Pai' impayi' katasuan ondo' raino am pai' oroto' kasagaan ondo' moonsoi,
sabap ra ngaangai' ampos ru kandoi muno matatang mu am ampos ru bagui muno tayaron ra ulun bokon.
Ginio ra musiti' kou mangani', mangapu, am mamamaan, sabap ra intok ru ulun namagatoi kolondo' boo masiaan.
Ulun masauk ra lairon koson ra saputul bayang am sumugut ra inaru' mantilayun, itakau ngai' musiti' matoi.
Koson ra puun ru tataun magana', mokoondo' raun matutu' am mokoondo' raun ondo' tumuu', koon niayuk ra ulun: rondo' no matoi ondo' bokon anakon.
Ngaangai' binaal ru ulun maapu am mapuso mabaya' ra nambaal no.
Ulun ondo' mangkara' ra ralan-ralan ru kapintaran niayuk tumutun ra inopot-inopot nano.
Ilowo' noyo kapintaran koson sangulun mampalula' am ampangi' noyo kapintaran giu' ra ralan-ralan nano.
Asilo' noyo ra gigimpalan-gigimpalan no am rongogo' noyo giu' ra kulobon nano.
Pangkim noyo ra kamaaro' ra baloi nano,
am okou pana makaayanan ondo' moonsoi.
Paayano' noyo anak-anak muno ralalom sindungan nano. Kaayag noyo ra kaansayan ralalom sindungan nano am ayan no ralalom katulayan nano, nakasindung intor ra orou malasu'.
Sangulun ondo' malaa' ra Tuhan mampakito riso ralalom ru baalon nano. Ulun ondo' gumagaya' ra Taurat ru Tuhan mokoowot ra kapintaran.
Kapintaran manguma' rirun ra koson ra sangulun ina' kapoam ulun inuot ondo' lakat poyo ralaa.
Nangani' io rirun ra pangaratian koson ra akanon am kapintaran koson ra inumon.
Ulun ondo' sumandig riso kalo maratu' am ulun ondo' mangintopot riso kalo mauyu'.
Okou sinauk ra urumaton poyo intor ra rangan-rangan muno am okou inanian ra ragu-ragu ondo' motopot paat okou mindagu ra saang ru masuang ulun.
Makatuum kou ra kaansayan am kaansukan ondo' motopot am inggalan muno karaan ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Ulun sasambungon kalo mokoowot riso am ulun makatula kalo makakito riso.
Kapintaran no maalur intor ra ulun malilimbau am kalo nakara' ru ulun ondo' masaga' magabau.
Rimbai-rimbai pangamparan kalo sama' rimbayon ru ulun makatula, sabap rimbai-rimbai no sala' ka intor ra Tuhan.
Rimbai pangamparan ondo' motopot ioginio ragu kapintaran am intor ra Tuhan galama'.
Pai' indagu ra Tuhan napalayau rirun, sabap ra Io kalo gumogot makiindangan ra ulun makatula.
Masisang Tuhan ra ngaangai' binaal ra malaat, am ulun ondo' malaa' ra Tuhan niayuk kalo mabunduk ra binaal malaat.
Paat Tuhan nambaal ra ulun ra talimpuun i, nangani' Io risilo ra kuasa' koson mangalap ra kapatasan.
Amon masaga' kou, maalap mu kagagaya' susuban-susuban ru Tuhan. Makapampili' kou ra gumagaya' Riso kapoam kalo.
Noposoroi Tuhan ra apui am timug ra saang muno. Alapo' ayuk ati kasaga' muno.
Maayag am matoi soroi ra ulun. Atan pilion nilo pataakin risilo.
Maayo noyo kuasa' am kapintaran ru Tuhan, am Io makakito ra ngaangai' no.
Makapandai Io ra ngaangai' baalon ru ulun am magilong ra ulun ondo' motopot.
Kalo manusub Io ra ulun masauk ra malaat am kalo mangani' ra osoi-osoi ak mambaal ra tula.
Pai' kasaga' masuang anak ra kalo matanda' am pai' pakaansuk sabap anak ra mapuka'.
Masuang pana anak muno, pai' pamanggo ra suang no amon ru kalo malaa' ilo ra Tuhan.
Pai' kalansan ra umur nilo ra maawar, am pai' kalansan ra anak masuang. Moonsoi poyo mokoondo' sangulun anak ka saribu,
Sabap no ra sangulun ondo' mapintar, ulun ru bandar rumuang ra masuang, kaa' bansa' ondo' mapuka' makai' kaluus.
Baal koson raginio masalok makito kuno, mulu' poyo ra baal ondo' igondo' jojok poyo morongog kuno.
Apui manimbula' ra tatanga' ru tinimungan ru ulun ondo' makatula am sangit ru Tuhan nasimbulukan ra bansa' ondo' kalo gumagaya'.
Galing i Tuhan kalo nangampun ra ngaangai' maayo ulun ondo' lumansan ra ikang nilo galama' am ondo' manggal Riso.
Masisang Io ra ulun malilimbau ondo' maayag ra rondo' bandar ri Lot am Io kalo makaasi' risilo.
Bansa' ondo' makatula no kalo tinagaman No, kaa' luuson No sabap ra tula nilo.
Koson niayuk ra nasip ru 600,000 ngaulun ralalom pangkiralanan giu' ra tana' kaagisan ondo' bambalingatan timinimung koson gumuor.

Amon mokoondo' sangulun ayuk bambalingatan, rondo' kaimuagan amon io makalabus intor ra ukuman. Maayo guang makaasi' ru Tuhan kaa' makasangit niayuk. Makakuasa' Io mangampun, kaa' niayuk mapalumpa' ra sangit Nano.
Maayo kaga' guang makaasi' ru Tuhan, kaa' ukuman Nano pana maagat toojo. Mangakim Io ra ulun sama' ra binaal nilo.
Ulun makatula am kuliamos ra tinakou nilo kalo makalabus, ondo' ulun mapasau guang ondo' mokoorot kalo sindualin.
Moonong ulun ondo' mapasau guang mangapu ra ayup nali
Pai' indagu, “Mansibuni Aku intor ra Tuhan. Giu' ra rasawat no kolondo' sangulun mangkara' raki'. Aku kalo mauligan ra susuang ru ulun. Aku kolondo' arati' ralalom ru binaal ondo' kolondo' polos ti.”
Paat ra Tuhan matong, ngaangai' mauyog: tana' am raat ondo' malangka' ra ragana' no, limbowon am intok malangka' giu' ra rasawat no.
Gunung-gunung mauyog am lonor-lonor ru tana' monontol paat ilain ru Tuhan.
Kaa' ginio ngaangai' kalo nakara' ru ulun am kolondo' nampalio ra ralan-ralan ru Tuhan.
Kasuangan binaal ru Tuhan nasibuni koson ra bagiu' ondo' kalo makito ru ulun.
“Osoi masaga' mampatanou ra binaal-binaal ru Tuhan ondo' matimpok am osoi lakat maginaa Riso? Koson raginio baal no sabap mototoi kaga' Tuhan mambaal atan ondo' binantu' Nano.”
Ginio noyo guang ru ulun ondo' maningka' napandayan no, sasambungon am nakalayau.
Anak kuno, rongogo' noyo am lioo' noyo ragu-ragu kutu maa' raginio okou mokoowot ra kapandayan.
Mampasuku' aku ra pangilaan ra masusui am kapandayan ra matuyu'.
Paat ra talimpuun i, i Aki Kapuuno' nambaal ra ngaangai' no
am Io mangaru' ra moonong intok no.
Ngaangai' binaal inaru' No koson sabuoi-buoi no,
am koson moonong ilo ondo' maayag am papag no inaru' wilayah kinuasa' no.
Kolondo' naitilan
am kolondo' naagui kapoam liminonggo' ra nangandoi.
Ondo' rondo' kalo mampajajal ra bokon
am kolondo' igondo' minanggal ra susuban ru Tuhan.
Kabaal ngaangai' no,
Tuhan nampulolou ra tana' ti am nanuang ra ngaangai' ondo' moonsoi.
Io nonotop ra ralimbou ru tana' ti ra ngaangai' salinut ru ilo ondo' maayag.
Ngaangai' nilo ondo' maayag iono mapandai matoi am musiti' sumaguli' masauk ra tana'.
am nanusub risilo sumaguli' masauk ra tana'.
Orou-orou ru bayag nilo inanian ra polos,
kaa' ilo inanian ra kuasa' ra ngaangai' ra tana' ti.
Nambaal Io risilo pinogondo' Riso galama'
am nangani' risilo ra kaikangan Nano galama'.
Nambaal Tuhan risilo kalaanin ru ngaangai' nilo ondo' maayag
am nangani' risilo ra kuasa' ra ngaangai' susuit am bibiag ra bokon no.
Nangani' Io risilo ra rila', mato
am talingo nabaya' ra kapintaran koson mangkara'.
am manulu' risilo ati ondo' moonsoi am ati ondo' malaat.
Mampasasar Tuhan ra pangaratian Nano ra ralalom ru guang nilo
maa' raginio makakito ilo ra kandoi Nano ondo' matulai.
Ilo pana mongompor ra inggalan Nano ondo' matulai
am mapatanou ra binaal Nano ondo' matulai.
Nangani' Tuhan risilo ra kapandayan
am nangani' risilo ra ukum koson panuluan ru kaayagan.
Nambaal Io ra nabantuan mantilayun risilo
am nambala' ra kapatasan Nano risilo.
Nakakito ilo ra katulayan Nano ondo' matulai
am nokorongog ra bolos Nano ondo' matulai.
Nampakara' Io risilo maa' raginio kalo mambaal ra malaat,
am sigagama' ilaan atan koson pamakuan ra ulun bokon.
Masalok Tuhan makapandai ra paliso ru ulun; kalo lair makasibuni intor Riso.
Intor boborok ilo masaga' ra kalaatan; guang nilo mokotog koson ra batu, am ilo kalo makakulau raginio masauk ra ulun poyo toojo.
Nantayar-tayar Io ra bansa'-bansa' ra titikop ru tana' ti. Moonong bansa' inanian No sangulun mangunguasa', kaa' Israil iono longgom ru Tuhan galama'.
Masalok Tuhan mangurio ra kandoi ru ulun. Ra tayar Nano ngaangai' ondo' baalon nilo matalinuan koson ra matawang.
Kolondo' kalaatan ru ulun ondo' masibuni ra tayar ru Tuhan; ngaangai' tula mapandayan No.
Indangan ondo' tinaakan takau ra ulun musikin soroi ra Tuhan koson ra sinsing meterai. Pangimayaan ra togom ru ulun alungin ru Tuhan koson unor ru mato Nano.
Tauli no Tuhan mambalos ra ulun; sigagama' balasin No.
Ulun ondo' pansagulian guang iowon sumaguli' Riso am ulun ondo' mariwa' guang aniin No ra kaansukan.
Saguli' no ra Tuhan Ondo' Masawat Kaga' am pai' noyo boo pambaal ra tula. Musiti' topot-topot masisang ra kalaatan.
Ulun maayag maringkuanang ra Tuhan. Kaa' intok ru ulun matoi osoi kia makaparimbai mongompor Riso Ondo' Masawat Kaga'?
Ulun ondo' maayag am maligag mokoompor ra Tuhan. Kaa' ulun ondo' minatoi kolondo' boo; liminonggo' ilo noyo maringkuanang.
Mapara' kia gayo ru guang makaasi' ru Tuhan am mangampun ra ulun ondo' sumaguli' Riso.
Kaa' ulun kalo noyo mokolonggom ra ngaangai' no sabap ra ilo ondo' maayag ondo' mapandai matoi.
Kolondo' mapaang poyo intor ra mato ru orou, kaa' sinda nano pana masauk majuut. Mulu' poyo ra ulun mapandai matoi ondo' mangkara' ayuk ra malaat.
Tuhan makakito ra ngaangai' butitin giu' ra limbowon, kaa' ulun sait am kaau ayuk.
Tuhan ondo' maayag ra sabuoi-buoi no nambaal ra limbowon am tana' ti.
Io ayuk ondo' motopot.
Tinuyu' No tana' ra kalindu' Nano am ngaangai' gumagaya' Riso. Io noyo raja' ru ngaangai' am kuasa' Nano mampatuliar ra ondo' mapasau intor ra kalo mapasau.
Kolondo' sangulun pana inanian No ra kuasa' koson mapatanou ra binaal ru Tuhan am kolondo' sangulun pana makatutun toojo ra baalon Nano ondo' matulai.
Osoi makapanuku' ra kuasa' Nano ondo' maayo kaga'? Osoi poyo makapantunung ra ngaangai' binaal Nano ondo' makaasi' toojo.
Itakau kalo makapamparuang kapoam mangiruru' raginio. Kaimuagan ru Tuhan kalo maalap kaimumuyi'.
Amon mamupus takau ra tunung no, itakau sotopot no kalo poyo nakatalimpuun; liminonggo' takau sabap naubong naguyum ra ragu-ragu.
Atan kia ulun no am atan onong ilo? Atan arati' ru moonsoi am malaat ondo' binaal nilo?
Umur ru ulun maatus ngambilor no maawar noyo kaga'.
Pogondoon ra mantilayun, bilor-bilor raginio koson somposok timug giu' ra raat malangka' ondo' malandom kapoam koson saputir agis.
Ginio noyo sabap ra Tuhan mokoorot kaga' ritakau am Io makaasi' toojo.
Magilong Io ritakau am makapandai ra mapara' itakau ti mapasa', ginio ra mangampun Io ritakau.
Ulun makaasi' ayuk ra gino ngai' nilo, kaa' Tuhan makaasi' ra ngaangai' ulun. Io mansawai, mapatanda' am mangila' ritakau. Magibit Io ritakau muli' Riso koson ra magagalung magalung ra domba nilo.
Makaasi' Io ritakau amon mangapu takau ra ila' Nano am masaga' mangapu ra kapatasan Nano.
Anak kuno, pai' pangindangan ra ulun liliwa' sumangit risilo. Amon mangindangan kou, pai' pabayaa' ra ragu-ragu ondo' mapakaruol ra guang.
Ragu-ragu muno koson ra bolobou ondo' mampasalui paat mogorou ra malasu' am mokologo poyo ka mangani'.
Rinagu ondo' motopot mokologo poyo ka mangani' ra tangguang ondo' moonsoi. Kaa' ulun ondo' mataau toojo mangani' ra karuo-ruo no.
Ulun sasambungon kalo mangani', ka mampaluta'. Mangani' ondo' pabayaan ra sangit kalo mambaal ra ulun maansayan.
Migila' ra kalo poyo mindagu am alungi' kaligagan muno ra kalo poyo marualan.
Imumuyi' noyo guang muno ra kalo poyo Tuhan mangakim rirun, maa' raginio masaboi paat raginio ampunon kou.
Isisingkamo' noyo ra kalo poyo okou ukumin ra maruol. Paat ra okou makatula, pambala' no ra okou tumalikur intor ra tula.
Amon okou mabantu' ra Tuhan, suguto' toojo bantu' no ra paat ra inaru', am pai' injuli' saboi okou matoi.
Kaa' ra kalo poyo mambaal ra bantu', tampos noyo koson manugut raginio am pai' kinami' kaaratan ru Tuhan.
Karaa' noyo sangit ru Tuhan ra orou patayan muno am pambalos Nano paat ra Io manalikur rirun.
Paat okou langkaya' am malabaan, karaa' noyo paat ra maitilan am musikin.
Baal ti maalap kabalui ralalom songorou ayuk. Ngaangai' no ra mataki' masauk ra saang ru Tuhan.
Ulun mapintar totomolon ralalom ngai' baalon nilo. Giu' ra tatanga' ru ulun makatula ilo mononoomol maa' raginio kalo mambaal ra sala.
Moonong ulun mapintar makaulig ra kapintaran am mongompor ra ulun ondo' minintutun ra kapintaran no.
Ulun ondo' makarati' ra amsal masauk ra mapintar am mindagu masuang amsal ondo' motopot.
Pai' makuasa' ru kasagaan-kasagaan muno, kaa' kuasaa' noyo ngai' kalaayan ru guang muno.
Amon maguyum kou ra kajalaan ralalom ru ngaangai' kasagaan muno, masauk kou ra kasuatan ru pantula' muno.
Pai' paguyum ra katasuan ralalom ru bayag ra masuang rapu' am pai' ibangkil ra inan koson maya' mambayar ra balanja' no.
Amon kolondo' ruit muno, pai' pagira' koson munsag maa' raginio okou kalo masauk ra musikin.
Sangulun mangngandoi ondo' gagaukon kalo lumangkaya', am ulun ondo' kalo mampalio ra baal boborok, buoi kabuoi masauk ra musikin.
Inumon makagauk am ruandu' mapalayau ra ulun mapintar, am ulun ondo' lumatok ra ruandu' mantalan ra inan masauk ra lumanja' kalo mononoomol.
Pupus no paliso ondo' kalo mononoomol magibit risilo ra patayan am inan nilo mootong masauk ra akanon ru lingguang.
Sasambungon ulun ondo' mataki' mangintopot ra ulun bokon. Ulun ondo' makatula mampalubat ra inan galama'.
Ulun ondo' masaga' mambaal ra kalaatan ukumin.
Ulun ondo' masisang ra mampaluta' mailiwan kapaganan.
Pai' potonowo' atan ondo' rinagu rirun, am okou pana kalo pansagulian guang.
Pai' pantunung ra rangan kapoam pantula', ondo' ak am amon ru mongkoror okou makatula.
Koson raginio baal no sabap ra ulun ondo' mokorongog ra ragu no pagilain no okou, am rondo' paat masisang rirun.
Amon ru mokorongog kou ra tanou kalo motopot, paulio' noyo ra guang saboi ra okou matoi, pai' pagalabo, okou kalo lumaput sabap raginio.
Ulun sasambungon ondo' masaga' mapauli ra inopot maimbolo' koson ra sangulun ruandu' marualan ra maganak.
Rondo' tanou ralalom guang ru ulun sasambungon koson ra anak ru pana makatansok ra kalayam nilo.
Amon ru mokorongog kou ra rangan muno nambaal ra sala, kuati' io. Ati lair ru baal raginio kalo motopot. Kaa' amon motopot, kalo boo baalon no.
Amon ru mokorongog kou ra pasambalayan muno mindagu ra kalo moonsoi, kuati' io. Ati lair ru baal raginio kalo motopot. Kaa' amon ru motopot, kalo boo mindagu io.
Amon ru mokorongog kou ra ondo' malaat intor ra rangan muno, kuati' io. Ati lair ru baal raginio sinimbaal. Pai' pangintopot ra ngaangai' ondo' norongog muno.
Maaru' lair ru sangulun nasala ragu am sala' ka baal raginio ondo' koon nano. Osoi kia ritakau kalo igondo' pakasala ra rila' nano?
Amon ru mokorongog kou ra ondo' malaat intor ra sambalayan muno, kuati' io ra kalo poyo sangitin mu io. Polosoo' noyo baal raginio sama' ra ukum ru Tuhan Ondo' Masawat Kaga'.
Malaa' ra Tuhan ioginio talimpuun ru ulun apuon ru Tuhan am ulun mapintar tagamin ru Tuhan.
Ulun ondo' makapandai ra susuban ru Tuhan mangapu ra pangilaan intor ra kaayagan. Ulun ondo' mambaal ra atan kasagaan ru Tuhan makasia' ra kawa' intor ra puun ru kaayagan.
Ngaangai' ru kapintaran nogondo' ra malaa' ra Tuhan am makasimpung noyo ra manugut ra ukum ru Tuhan.
Amon ru sangulun ulipon mindagu ra io kalo masaga' gumagaya' ra tuan nano, kaa' gumagaya' niayuk, magulayun io mampakaruol ra guang ru tuan nano ondo' napaayag riso.
Ulun kalo masauk ra mapintar ra mangulig ra malaat, am ulun ondo' mononoomol kalo maya' ra bilin ru ulun ondo' makatula.
Mokoondo' kapintaran pakayon koson mambaal ra malaat, am mokoondo' ulun sasambungon kalo kukula' mapintar.
Moonsoi poyo kalo kukula' mapandai kaa' mapasau guang, intor ra mapintar kaga' kaa' masauk manggal ra ukum.
Mokoondo' ulun mapintar am matuyu' kaa' kalo matimpok, am mokoondo' poyo mampalimpatui ra moonsoi koson mapamanang ra baal raginio.
Mokoondo' sangulun malaat mugar tumangkokoong ra bulos mangiluk, kaa' guang nano nototop ra ruung.
Pinalikar no bulos nano am mitambingai ra kalo mokorongog, kaa' kalo napandayan ra io maringkumaa' intor rirun.
Amon ru sabap ra rondo' baal io naampangan koson makatula ra paat raino ti, mambaal io ra mataki' amon ru makakaluagan.
Sangulun mauligan intor ra paliso ru inan nano, am ulun mapintar mauligan intor ra bulos nilo.
Baal ru sasangulun mapandayan intor ra paliso nano mambayang, makakurit, am mugar.
Mokoondo' sawai ondo' paraguon paat kalo motopot. Mokoondo' poyo mapintar poyo koson mongkoror ayuk.
Kaa' moonsoi poyo mansawai ka magulayun sumangit.
Ulun ondo' mangiou ra kasalaan kalo malubatan.
Ulun ondo' masaga' mampajajal ra ukum ra kuligaan nogondo' ra ulun kinambiri' ondo' masaga' manawa' ra sangulun ralaa.
Mokoondo' ulun ondo' karaan ra mapintar sabap ra kalo masuang ragu, am mokoondo' kasisangin sabap ra ragu-ragu nano.
Mokoondo' mongkoror sabap ra kalo nakapandai ra taam no, am mokoondo' mongkoror sabap ra nakapandai ra paat ondo' motopot koson mindagu.
Sasangulun ondo' mapintar mongorot ra raguon nano saboi paat ondo' motopot, kaa' ulun sasambungon am maluluta' mindagu masailan polos ru jam.
Ulun ondo' mindagu mabuoi kaga' am kalo mangani' ra kaluagan ra ulun bokon mindagu kasisangin.
Kapaganan makapagibit ra maulian, am nasip moonsoi ondo' kalo kinara'-kara' makapagibit ra kalubatan.
Sanganuan ra bulintok taak muno totopot kalo makapagibit ra maulian kou, kaa' mokoondo' niayuk taak muno balasin ra mauli' kaga'.
Mokoondo' ulun ondo' paingganaan kinibit ru maguyum ra inggalan moonsoi kaga', kaa' mokoondo' niayuk ondo' makatirong intor ra inasaban saboi ra urumaton.
Sanganuan ra bulintok rorondo' ondo' balion ra logo maningka', kaa' bayarin ra mologo kaga'.
Amon ulun mapintar mindagu, makaalap ilo ra masuang rangan. Kaa' amon ulun sasambungon mindagu ra molomoi, baal raginio papalo ayuk.
Taak ru sangulun sasambungon kolondo' onong ra tayar muno, sabap ra io malansan ra masuang balos no.

Mangani' io koborok kaa' masuang mampaluta', am io mindagu ra mosongou maa' raginio morongog ru ngaangai' ulun. Orou raiti' mapaira' io am suabon no sikaan no sagulio'. Ulun koson raginio sotopot no kasisangin.
Ulun sasambungon mindagu, “Aku kolondo' rangan. Kolondo' mindagu ra paringkuanangan ra binaal moonsoi kuno. Masaga' ilo mangapu ra pataakon kuno, kaa' talikur kuno ilaaton nilo inggalan kuno.”
Ulun sasambungon koson raginio magulayun iison ru ulun.
Moonsoi poyo maratu' ra masala tumpang ka maratu' ra masala ragu. Ulun malaat maratu' nogondo' koson ra ulun maratu' ra makasunsuyar.
Ulun ondo' kalo nakapandai ra kaulayan koson ra sunur kalo matanda' ondo' pasasandulion ru ulun sasambungon.
Abig ondo' paraguon ru ulun sasambungon kalo apuon, sabap ra paraguon paat ondo' kalo motopot.
Mokoondo' ulun ondo' makailiu intor ra tula sabap musikin toojo. Makatangus io ra kalo mauliso ru bolos ru guang nano.
Mokoondo' ulun ondo' mairuan urumat ru inan sabap mauyu' koson mindagu ra saang ru ulun sasambungon.
Mokoondo' ulun mauyu' manugut ra bantu'-bantu' ondo' binaal ra rangan, am kalo musiti' no rangan raginio saukon no ra pantula'.
Abau rondo' sait ondo' malaat ra sasangulun; ulun ra malaat paliso marayus-rayus magabau.
Sangulun mantatakou moonsoi poyo intor ra sangulun magabau, kaa' karuruo no sumuku' ra kapusaan.
Kaindalaman ru magabau ioginio rorondo' mampakauyu', am uyu' nano kalo mairu'.
Ulun ondo' mapintar mindagu makasingkot, am ulun mapintar kasagain ru ulun mangaayo pangkat.
Ulun ondo' mangandoi ra tana' mangumung ra kumoson ondo' mauli' kaga'. Koson niayuk ra ulun ondo' kasagain ru ulun mangaayo pangkat makaalap ra pangampunan ru kasalaan nilo.
Indangan am tangguang momolou ra mato ru ulun mapintar am mongompong risilo ra mansawai.
Kapintaran ondo' sinibuni koson ra rapu' ondo' nolobong; karuruo no kolondo' onong.
Moonsoi poyo ulun ondo' manibuni ra sambung ka ulun ondo' manibuni ra kapintaran.
Anak kuno, amon ru makatula kou, pai' boo pambaal ra tula, kaa' pakiasi' no maa' raginio tula muno ampunon.
Inggaluri' noyo tula koson minggalur ra kukuo. Amon ru inggaarin mu io, maaru' tindukon no okou. Ripon nano koson ra ripon ru singa' ondo' makapatoi ra ulun.
Moonong manggal ra ukum manatang ra pilat ondo' kalo mapali', koson ra tobok ru ilang ruo mato.
Kalaatan am puka' makapuso ra rapu' kalangkayaan. Koson niayuk ra baloi ru ulun malilimbau malunsai.
Ulun ondo' kalo masaga' sawayon, maya' ra ralan ru ulun ondo' makatula. Kaa' ulun ondo' malaa' ra Tuhan tumalikur intor ra tula ralalom ru guang.
Ulun ondo' maayo kabang mauligan ra ati-ati, kaa' sangulun ondo' mapintar makaliman amon mambaal io ra sala.
Sangulun ondo' magira' ra ruit koson mambaal ra baloi nano, nogondo' ra sangulun ondo' manimung ra batu koson labangan nano.
Santimungan ulun malaat koson ra tuntur ru tataun suruin; pupus no maluus ilo maumpo ru apui.
Ralan ondo' bayaan ru ulun makatula malumot am marata', kaa' ralan no sumuku' ra intok ru ulun minatoi.
Sangulun ondo' gumagaya' ra Ukum makapanguasa' ra pangkaraan nano. Ulun ondo' mapintar ioginio ulun ondo' malaa' ra Tuhan ralalom ru ngaangai' baal.
Ulun mapintar ayuk maalap kaila', kaa' mokoondo' niayuk kapintaran ondo' maparatong ayuk ra mapait.
Kapandayan ru ulun mapintar koson ra liur ondo' lumabai. Bilin nilo rumayus tumilis koson ra taur ru timug ondo' maayag.
Kaa' pangkaraan ru ulun sasambungon koson rarapu' naabat; atan ayuk ondo' inigigilaan nilo mataki' mairu'.

Amon ru sangulun mapandai kaga' mokorongog ra ragu-ragu mapintar, mongompor io am mokoowot ra pangkaraan ra bokon. Kaa' ru amon ulun ondo' kalo kukula' mangkara' mokorongog raginio, kalo maansukan io am kalo mangapu raginio.
Mangkirongog ra sunur ru ulun sasambungon, nogondo' ra mansaan ra maagat paat ra mangkiralan, kaa' mangkirongog ra ragu-ragu ru ulun mapintar masauk ra katasuan.
Ragu-ragu ru ulun mapintar anggakon ru pasimpungan ulun am posoroton ra ralalom ru guang.
Tayar ru ulun sasambungon, kapintaran kolondo' onong koson ra baloi ondo' nalunsai noyo. Kapandayan ru ulun sasambungon masauk ra ragu-ragu ondo' kalo naratian nilo galama'.
Pangilaan koson ra babangkil ra tayar ru ulun sasambungon,
kaa' koson ra golong mas ra tayar ru ulun mapintar. Ulun sasambungon masuatan, kaa' ulun mapandai mongkoror ra jumingit.
Ulun sasambungon mansigo intor kulobon ru baloi ulun ra bokon am tutului sumubol, kaa' ulun nakaigigila' bonsoi-bonsoi maginaa ra tuma' ru kulobon.
Ulun kolondo' guang mangintalingo giu' ra kulobon, kaa' ulun ondo' nakaigigila' mauyu' mambaal koson raginio.
Sangulun mampaluta' mangulit ra ragu ru ulun ra bokon,
Ulun sasambungon mindagu ra atan ayuk ondo' makara' nilo, kaa' ulun mapintar mangkara' galing ra kalo poyo mindagu.
Amon ru ulun malaat magulas ra riwato,
Sangulun ondo' masaga' manimbaal ra ragu lumaat ra inan galama', am kasisangin io ru ulun ra libung nano.
Sangulun matiar nogondo' ra majamol; io makatataman am kolondo' masaga' minggaar riso.
Paat ra mokoondo' anak kalo nakaigila', baal raginio mapakauyu' ra sangulun ama', am sangulun anak ruandu' inanak rondo' kalubatan.
Sangulun ralaa ondo' makaguang makaalap ra ralaki, kaa' sangulun ralaa ondo' kalo mapandai mauyu' mantipagon ra ama' nano.
Sangulun ruandu' ondo' kolondo' guang mapakauyu' ra ama' nano am ralaki nano, am kalo urumaton ru ilo ruo no.
Sumangit paat ra ondo' kalo motopot nogondo' ra mangkuli ra miujik ra tayar ru ulun tatanga' mangulir. Mampalapos ra mangila' masalok rondo' baalon ra motopot.
Sangulun anak ondo' matanda' pangila' kalo mambala' ra papag ru matuo no ra musikin.
Kaa' sangulun anak ondo' kalo matanda' pangila', ondo' malilimbau am masawat guang, mapakalaat ra inggalan moonsoi ru pabukat nano galama'.
Mangila' ra ulun sasambungon nogondo' ra moposokot saguli' ra pagangan nopoto kapoam mangkarat ra ulun intor ra nokororot toojo.
Mambala' ra rondo' ra ulun sasambungon nogondo' ra mindagu ra sangulun ondo' matikoolong. Pupus no mangkuot io, “Mokoondo' ra atan?”

Tangii' noyo ulun matoi sabap ra ilo kalo boo makakito ra matawang; tangii' noyo ulun sasambungon sabap ra ilo kolondo' guang. Kalo pana mangiluk toojo sabap ra ulun matoi sabap ra ilo nakaalap noyo ra kalinuos. Kaa' bayag ru ulun sasambungon malaat poyo ka matoi.
Ulun mangulir saboi tulu' ngoorou tayar ru ulun matoi. Kaa' ulun mangulir buoi ru bayag tayar ru ulun sasambungon am ulun malaat.

Pai' tambuluyo' ulun sasambungon am pai' indagu kabuoi risilo. Ilalain ilo am pai' saboi ra okou tinipagon am imboloon nilo. Inggaluri' noyo ilo, am okou pana makaalap ra kalinuos am kalo mauliso ru sambung nilo.
Ulun koson raginio masauk ra saanin ondo' maagat poyo ka tima maitom. Panginggalanan ondo' motopot tayar nano ioginio “i sambungan”.
Matasu' poyo mansaan ra agis, usi', am basi' ka lumatok ra ulun sasambungon.

Tataun ondo' pinaatang am mapiot ralalom ru baloi, kalo maalap kauyog ra gumonggon ra tana'. Koson niayuk ra ulun ondo' lumansan ra pangkaraan ondo' masukor kalo maimamang ralalom ru baal ondo' mapagon pana kaga'.
Pangkaraan ondo' mimpuun ra guang matanda' koson ra bunga' pinosokot ra rinding ondo' marata'.
Batu-batu ondo' mongoborok pinabanta' ra rasawat ru timbok
Amon ru tinsukon mato mingkual lomou ru mato, am amon ru susunanin guang masingkual pamalimanan nano.
Ulun ondo' nomobol ra batu koson manganjau ra susuit; ulun ondo' magasab ra rangan mangukat ra pangkubayawan.

Amon ru mansangor kou kapoam magabu' ra rangan muno, pai' kalawo guang. Lakat poyo mokopobonsoi kou riso. Kaa' moonong rangan magiru' amon ru magasab kou riso, minsawat guang, mambala' ra inopot nano kapoam manumbalik riso.
Sauk no ra ulun intopoton ru rangan muno paat ra io musikin, am okou pana maansukan mabaya' riso paat io langkaya'. Lampit no riso ralalom kapaganan, am okou pana matayaran ra tungkuson nano.
Koson ra lisun-lisun makasigulu ra apui, koson niayuk ra pagasaban makasigulu ra pampatayan.
Kalo mauyu' aku manindung ra rangan am kalo mansibuni amon gumogot io makiindangan raki'.
Kaa' amon ru malumaagan aku sabap no io, moonong ulun ondo' mokorongog no koson mononoomol riso.
Gama' ru kabang kutu alungin am bibil kutu saapin ra meterai ru kapintaran. Aku pana makailiu intor ra mambaal ra kasalaan am kalo koson mausung sabap ra masabit ru rila' kutu.
Iou Tuhan, Ama' am Manguasa' ra bayag kutu, pai' polosoo' aku kuasaan am maulas ru ragu-ragu kutu.

Gama' ru pangkaraan kutu sinalingapu ru pitol lalapos ru kapintaran koson mapakatanda' ra guang kutu. Kalo masaga' aku polosoon amon ru aku makasala, am kalo masaga' aku ra rondo' tula pana makatangkus intor ra pantainuin Nano.
Kasalaan am tula kutu pana kalo rumuang-ruang. Kalo maratu' aku ra kalindu' ru pantula' am kuritin nilo.
Iou Tuhan, Ama' am i Aki Kapuuno' ru bayag kuno, alungi' aku no maa' raginio kalo masauk ra minsawat guang.
Sindungi' noyo aku intor gogoton ra malaat.
Pai' polosoo' aku kuasaan ru mangangkum am laai ru guang. Pai' pataako' aku ra laai-laai ru guang ondo' mampakauyu'.
Anak-anak kuno, rongogo' noyo pangilaan kutu intor ra ragu-ragu ondo' motopot. Ulun ondo' maya' ra pangilaan kutu kalo malandak.
Ulun ondo' makatula, ulun minsawat guang, am manimbaal ra ragu masulungan ru ragu-ragu nilo galama'.
Sangulun ulipon ondo' magail loposon kalo makapagiru' ra balis-balis. Koson niayuk ra ulun ondo' marayus-rayus magibot ralalom inggalan ru Tuhan kalo mabaguan intor ra tula.

Sangulun ondo' magail mampator masuang tula nano, am ilo sambaloi kalo makalabus intor ra kaimbalaan. Amon makasala io, io magiba' ra tula nano. Amon io kalo mampalio ra kasalaan nano, tula nano maruangan. Amon io magibot ra magabau, io kalo ampunon am pabukat nano malumpa' ru karaat.

Mokoondo' rondo' ralan mindagu ondo' mokopogondo' ra kapatayan. Gama' ru gino ngai' ru ulun ru Israil kolondo' mindagu koson raginio. Ulun moonsoi guang minggalur ra paliso koson raginio am kalo gumuong ralalom ru tula.
Pai' indalom mindagu ra malasang am majamol, sabap baal raginio makatula.

Karaa' noyo ama' am ina' muno paat ra okou mantitimung mabaya' ra ulun mangaatang. Pai' masaboi lilianin mu inan galama' am tauyuon ra saang nilo sabap ra kaindalaman muno ondo' kalo moonsoi. Maagu no magulas kou ra orou naganakan muno am gumogot maa' raginio okou kalo igondo' inanak.
Sangulun ondo' naindalom noyo mindagu ra kalo moonsoi kalo tumanda' sabuoi ru bayag nano.

Mokoondo' masuang ralan koson mamparuang ra tula, kaa' rondo' ti namparatong ra kasangitan ru Tuhan. Kalaayan ru guang koson ru apui ondo' bibilak am kalo malasa' saboi makai'. Sangulun ondo' nambaal ra jaka' mabaya' ra laai ru guang galama' ondo' maikang kalo lumonggo' saboi apui i monolob riso.
Tayar ra sangulun mangangambi', moonong ralaa mampatabual ra kalaayan ru guang am buoi ru kaayagan nano, kalo maalap io ra jala'.

Sangulun ralaki ondo' mansawa' mangkara', “Osoi nua' magilong raki'? Giti molondom; sinilian aku ru timbok am kolondo' makakito. Kalo pana malaa'. Io Ondo' Masawat Kaga' pana kalo mampalio ra tula kutu.”

Ulun no malaa' ayuk makito ru ulun. Kalo nalimanan no ra mato ru Tuhan inggopor ngaribu mapaang poyo intor ra mato ru orou. Tuhan magilong ra ngaangai' binaal ru ulun am mato Nano makaantos suku' ra linsuk ondo' nakasibuni toojo.
Nakapandai Io ra ngaangai' no, ra kalo poyo am nopongo binaal Nano.
Ulun ondo' makatula no rinakop ra bulintok ondo' kalo nakuliman am inukum ra saang ru ulun masuang.
Koson raginio niayuk ra sangulun ruandu' ondo' kalo gumagaya' ra ralaki nano am nangani' riso ra anak intor ra ungkuyon bokon.

Kasaa', ruandu' no minanggal ra ukum ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga'. Karuo, makasala io ra ralaki nano. Katalu, nansawa' io koson ra ruandu' mantalan ra inan am naganak ra anak intor ra ungkuyon ondo' sala' ka ralaki nano.
Io galama' ibiton ra saang ru ulun masuang am imumuyin anak-anak nano ru motopot sala' ka anak sawa'.
Kolondo' intok nilo ralalom ru mamagun am kalo makapaguot.
Ruandu' no matatakan ra urumat nano koson ra sabuoi-buoi no. Mopongo ra io matoi, inggalan nano ulason.
Ngaangai' ulun pana makaliman boo ra kolondo' ondo' moonsoi poyo intor ra kaayagan motopot, am kolondo' ondo' maamis poyo intor ra gumagaya' ra susuban ru Tuhan.
Kapintaran mongompor ra inan galama' am mamanggo ra tatanga' ru ulun ru Israil ulun nano,
ra saang ru ulun ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga' am ra saang ru kuasa' Nano:
“Aku ragu ondo' intor ri Ondo' Masawat Kaga',
koson ra gaun mapulak siliin ku ra tana' ti.
intok turungan kuno mokoondo' giu' ra tampak ru gaun.
Misangulun aku liminiput ra limbowon
am monggolob ra raat ra ragana' ru tana'.
Manguasa' Aku
titikop ra tana' am kinulun ru raat,
am niayuk ngaangai' bansa'.
Maguyum aku ra intok ayanan ra gino ngai' ru ilo:
rondo' wilayah koson lumayun mayan.
Io pana ondo' Nambaal ra tana' ti ondo' nambaal raki'
mangaru' ra intok ayanan kuno.
‘Ayan no ra Israil,’ susuban Nano,
‘papag ri Jakub masauk ra longgom muno.’
Binaal No aku intor noyo ra talimpuun
am sumoroi koson ra sabuoi-buoi no.
Mangandoi aku Riso giu' ra ralalom Kim ru Tuhan
am lumayun ayan giu' ra Bulur Sion.
Nomposoroi Io raki' giu' ra bandar katagaman Nano;
inanian aku ra kuasa' ra bandar Jirusalim.
Aku pana manambakat boo ra tatanga' ru bansa' ondo' noompor
ondo' pinili' ru Tuhan sumauk ra longgom Nano galama'.
Tinumuu' aku koson puun ru sidar giu' ra Libanon,
koson puun ru sipris giu' ra Gunung Girmon.
Mungkalar aku koson ra puun kurma giu' ra In-Gidi,
koson ra bunga' ros giu' ra Jiriko,
koson ra puun jaitun ondo' moonsoi giu' ra tana' malimparang
koson ra puun berangan ondo' giminayo ra kiing ru timug.
Maamis owou kuno koson ra kaningau,
koson ra umau maamis owou am kaminyan pinili';
iul-iul koson ra owou mangaamis
am lisun ru kaminyan ra giu' Kim ru Tuhan.
Koson puun ru oak pinabingkal ku raan-raan kuno;
raan-raan kuno moonsoi ilain.
Koson puun ru anggur nampatuu' aku ra talantar-talantar moonsoi,
busak kuno sumauk ra kawa' ondo' masuang am maamis.
Ratong no, osoi ayuk ondo' gumogot raki',
akano' noyo kawa'-kawa' kuno saboi maasug.
Pangkaraan kuno maamis poyo intor ra ruu' ru maningot,
mompolonggom raki' maamis poyo intor ra tambaloi ru maningot.
Ondo' nangakan raki' lakat poyo maitilan
am ondo' nanginum raki' lakat poyo pinaason.
Ulun ondo' gumagaya' raki' kalo malumpus guang
am ondo' mangandoi mabaya' ra ila' kuno kalo makatula.”
Kapintaran mokoondo' ralalom ru Nabantuan ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga', iono ukum ondo' tinaakan ri Musa ritakau koson ra tungkus ru ulun ru Israil.
Musiti' masalok maikang ralalom ru Tuhan. Ayan no Riso maa' raginio ikangon kau. Kolondo' i Aki Kapuuno' ondo' ak am Tuhan Ondo' Maayo Kaga' Kuasa' am kolondo' mamamayag ondo' ak am Io.
Ukum no nototop ra kapintaran lumuab-luab koson ra Sungoi Pison kapoam Sungoi Tigris bulintok mangkawa'.
Ukum no nampaluab ra arati' koson ra Sungoi Iprat kapoam Sungoi Jordan bulintok mangkumos.
Ukum no nampatilis ra pangilaan koson ra Sungoi Nil
Ulun ra kasaa' kalo makaulig ra kapintaran ra matanda', am ulun ra pamupusan pana kalo makai' kapandayi',
sabap ra pangkaraan nano makasuang poyo intor ra raat am bilin nano malandom poyo intor ra raat malangka' ra ragana' ru tana' ti.
Aku ti koson ra parit ondo' nampatilis ra timug intor ra sungoi suku' ra taman.
Kuayan kutu timugin umo kuno am bokok pantanaman kuno. Kaa' pulali' ru parit kuno nasauk ra sungoi, am sungoi nasauk ra raat.
Gumogot aku mampasinda ra pangilaan kuno maa' raginio makito saboi maalur koson ra orou tumawang.
Gumogot aku mampasalula' ra pangilaan kuno koson ra ragu manala' am patungkuson ku ra ngaangai' anak ondo' matong.
Kapandai no ra aku kalo mampabagui ra inan kuno galama', kaa' ra ngaangai' ulun ondo' sumauk ra mapintar.
Mokoondo' talu baal ondo' kasagain ku toojo ondo' mampabansuk ra guang ri Aki Kapuuno' kapoam ulun,
pabukat-pabukat ondo' maayag ra kaansayan,
sambalayan ondo' mangkubayau
am suput ru mansawo ondo' maayag ra maansukan.
Mokoondo' talu salinut ru ulun ondo' kasisangin kuno am paliso nilo ra majamol toojo, iono:
ulun musikin ondo' minsawat guang,
ulun langkaya' ondo' masaga' magabau,
am ungkuyon matutuo ondo' sasambungon am masaga' mansawa'.
Atan ondo' kalo inigilaan paat ra mamulok maaru' lair kolondo' moowot paat ra matutuo.
Mampaguang ondo' motopot am pinson ondo' moonsoi maaya' ra sangulun matutuo ondo' makauan.
Kapintaran, pangaratian, am pinson maaya' ra ulun urumaton toojo ondo' matutuo.
Karaun ru ulun matutuo iono masuang kaga' nailian, am malaa' ra Tuhan noyo ra ilo mamanggo.
Siam ngaulun ondo' karaan kuno ra maayag maansukan, am ondo' koopor no omporon ku ra maansukan, iono:
sangulun ondo' maansukan sabap ra anak-anak nano,
sangulun ondo' ralalom ru kaayagan nano makarampot magilong ra naratuan ru pantula' nano,
sangulun ondo' mokoondo' ra andu' ondo' mapintar,
sangulun ondo' kolondo' tula ra kabang nano,
sangulun ondo' kalo mangandoi ra tuan nano ondo' kalo sotopot no urumaton,
sangulun ondo' makaalap ra pangaratian,
sangulun ondo' rinongog toojo paat ra io mindagu.
Mapara' gayo ru ulun ondo' makaalap ra kapintaran!
Kaa' ondo' maayo kaga' intor ra ngaangai' no iono ulun ondo' malaa' ra Tuhan.
Ulun koson raginio kolondo' makatilu, sabap malaa' ra Tuhan iono baal ondo' masawat kaga' ra tana' ti.
Kolondo' napilatan ondo' malanjag poyo intor ra pilat ru guang. Kolondo' kalaatan ondo' maagat poyo intor ra kalaatan ru sangulun ruandu'.
Kolondo' kaimbalaan ondo' maagat poyo intor ra ondo' kinibit ru ulun masisang. Kolondo' kalikatan ondo' makalalaa' poyo intor ra kalikatan ru pantula'.
Kolondo' tuwo
Moonsoi poyo mayan rondo' baloi ra singa' am tambuakal intor ra mayan ra sangulun andu' ondo' malaat.
Kalaatan ru sangulun ruandu' makabalui ra baal ru bulos nano am mampakarus ra bulos nano saboi nogondo' ra bulos ru baawang.
Ralaki nano mugar ak kalalaat am mangakan giu' ra sambalayan, am maaru' io mampalaa ra mapait.
Moonong kalaatan makito ra boborok paat ra pinogondo' ra kalaatan ru sangulun ruandu'. Gama' ru ukumin io koson ra ulun ondo' makatula.
Ungkuyon moomor ondo' mokoondo' ra andu' mabaji' koson ra sangulun matutuo ondo' musiti' magaloi ra gunung kaagisan.
Pai' gogoto' ruandu' am pai' kaambi' ra kinantalur nilo.
Amon sangulun andu' mampakan ra ralaki nano, maaru' sumangit io, magasab, am manauyu' ra ralaki nano.

Sangulun andu' ondo' malaat nambaal ra ralaki nano malaut bulos, maruol guang, am makarus bulos. Sangulun andu' ondo' kalo mampakaansuk ra ralaki nano mampasauk riso ra ulun ondo' malawo am kalo makalulu'.
Tula tumalimpuun intor ra sangulun ruandu', am sabap riso itakau ngaangai' musiti' matoi.
Pai' polosoo' sangulun andu' ondo' malaat mindagu ra babanyou, koson ra timug ralalom ru tangki' niayuk kalo polosoon lumawas.
Amon kalo gumagaya' io ra ragu muno, alio' noyo io.
Pakaansuk no sangulun ralaki ondo' makaandu' ra moonsoi. Umur nano rumuang induo poyo.
Sangulun andu' ondo' moonsoi guang mampaansuk ra guang ru ralaki nano saboi io maayag mamimio suku' ra pupus ru kaayagan nano.
Andu' ondo' moonsoi iono taak ondo' pinataak ra ulun ondo' malaa' ra Tuhan.
Ru langkaya' kapoam musikin, guang nilo masalok matasu' am bulos nilo maansukan.

Mokoondo' talu baal ondo' makalalaa' ra guang kutu, iono: ragu sinimbaal ondo' pinatanou giu' ra bandar, ulun nasuangan ondo' timinimung, am panguwan kalo motopot. Ngaangai' no malaat poyo intor ra kapatayan. Baal ra kaapat mambaal raki' malaa', iono
kalumpusan am maruol guang ondo' pinaratong ru sangulun ralaa ondo' mangusolon ra ralaa ru bokon, am ondo' manginguli' ra moonong ulun.
Sangulun andu' ondo' malaat koson ra kuk ru sapi' ondo' maunga'; mampaguut riso nogondo' ra mampaguut ra lingait.
Sangulun ruandu' ondo' nagauk mampasangit toojo ra ulun sabap ra io kalo mapandai mampasibuni ra paliso nano ondo' makauyuyu'.
Sangulun andu' ondo' kalo gumagaya' mauligan intor ra tontong nano ondo' mangambi' am lumaya'.
Pagigilai' noyo toojo sangulun anak ruandu' ondo' mokotog ulu. Amon kalo, sasala' pakuan nano ra moonong kaluagan ondo' noowot nano.
Tainui' noyo tontong nano ondo' kalo mapandai mauyu', am pai' pangimuag amon makatula io rirun.
Giu' ra ati ayuk, manturung io kumanjal ra saang ru moonong ungkuyon ondo' malaai riso, koson ra ulun tumanggau ondo' pinaason manginum ra atan ayuk ondo' naalap nano.
Kinantalur ru sangulun andu' mampabansuk ra ralaki nano, am kapandayan nano mampaligag riso.
Andu' ondo' moomor iono taak intor ra Tuhan; kolondo' mologo poyo intor ra andu' ondo' naila'.
Andu' ondo' moonsoi am mapasau mologo toojo, am kolondo' nakatilu riso.
Kinantalur ru andu' ondo' moonsoi ralalom ru baloi ondo' nalulur koson ra mato ru orou ondo' suminda giu' ra limbowon ru Tuhan.
Bulos ondo' mantalur am inan ondo' moonsoi koson ra lampung ondo' mapaang ra tampakan ra lampung giu' ra baloi ru Tuhan.
Kalayam ondo' moonsoi am lalakuon ru kalayam ondo' maikang
Anak kuno, alungi' kaligagan muno ra okou lakat poyo mamulok am pai' taaki' kaikangan muno ra ulun bokon.
Giu' ra titikop ru pagun paguyum no sampila' umo ondo' malabung am tanami' ra sampug muno galama', am lumansan ra papag moonsoi muno galama'.
Anak-anak muno pana am magulayun maayag am masukor sabap ra mangintopot ra sasambaloi nano ondo' moonsoi.
Sangulun ruandu' mantalan ra inan kinara' koson ra tiwog, ali ka sangulun andu' no motopot koson ra kubu ondo' magibit ra kapatayan ra ulun ondo' masaga' marulug riso.
Ulun ondo' kalo mampalio ra ukum ru Tuhan makaalap ra andu' ondo' malaat, ali ka ulun ondo' malaa' ra Tuhan makaalap ra andu' ondo' moonsoi guang.
Sangulun ruandu' ondo' kalo mapandai mauyu', paliso nano masalok makauyuyu'. Kaa' sangulun ruandu' ondo' moonsoi paliso magulayun niayuk moonsoi ra ralaki nano.
Ruandu' ondo' mokotog ulu kinara' koson ra uku', ali ka ruandu' ondo' moonsoi paliso malaa' ra Tuhan.

Andu' ondo' mangurumat ra ralaki kinara' mapintar ru ngaangai' ulun, ali ka andu' ondo' malilimbau am kalo mangurumat ra ralaki mauligan koson ra ruandu' malaat. Pakaansuk no ralaki ondo' makaandu' ra moonsoi, sabap ra umur nilo rumuang induo poyo ruli'.

Ruandu' ondo' makakabang maayo am masaga' mindagu ra kolondo' ampos, koson ra bujung ondo' samputin bulintok mangayou. Ulun ondo' makaandu' koson raginio musiti' maayag ralalom baal ru pangayawan buoi ru kaayagan nano.
Ruo baal mampangiluk ra guang kuno am ondo' katalu mampasangit raki', iono:
sangulun saujor ondo' nasauk ra musikin,
sangulun maikang ondo' kalo inurumat,
am sangulun moonsoi ondo' nasauk ra malaat.
Ulun koson raginio ukumin ru Tuhan mabaya' ra kapatayan.
Mapagon kaga' ra sangulun ulun mantalan koson kalo mambaal ra kasalaan. Kolondo' ulun mantalan ondo' nakalabus intor ra tula.
Masuang ulun nambaal ra tula sabap ra ruit, am ulun ondo' gumogot sumauk ra langkaya' makito koson ra nobolou.
Koson ra paku' tataun pinatansok ra lolot ru ruo batu ondo' pinarikit, koson niayuk ra guang kalo mabanis manambusut ra lolot ru mantalan am mambali.
Sangulun ondo' kalo totopot malaa' ra Tuhan, sasambaloi nano maluoi matutuk.
Amon ayakan uyogon, ginsamol nano ayuk soroi. Koson niayuk ondo' majamol minayan ra mabuoi kaga' ralalom pangkaraan ru ulun.
Koson ra rarapu' kininaman ralalom ru apui, koson niayuk ra paliso ru ulun kininam ralalom ru ragu-ragu nano.
Intor ra kawa' nano napandayan pinagalung ra puun nano. Koson niayuk ra ragu ru sasangulun napandayan ginuang nano.
Pai' omporo' sasangulun no ra kalo poyo nakaining ra ralan ru pangkaraan nano, sabap ginio noyo batu pangkinaman nano.
Amon mangilou kou ra katimpakan, maaru' makaampos kou. Katimpakan koson ra bayang ru pamarinta ondo' nampakaindon poyo rirun.
Susuit tumuop ra susuit nogondo' salinut. Koson niayuk ra ulun ondo' makapaliso ra guang mabanis mambaal ra matanda'.
Koson ra singa' mongoror ra saamon nano, tula mongoror ra ulun ondo' mambaal ra kalaatan.
Paat ra ulun moonsoi guang mindagu, ragu-ragu nilo masalok mapintar, ali ka ragu ru ulun sasambungon maimbabalui koson ra bulan.
Amon okou nakaaya' ru ulun sasambungon, paguyum no ra kaluagan koson magiru', kaa' amon okou nakaaya' ra ulun mapintar, ayan no ra kula' pana buoi.
Ragu-ragu ru ulun sasambungon mamparuol ra guang; makakurit ilo ra tatanga' ru kaansukan ru tula.
Ibot nilo mampasimu' ra impus ru ulun. Amon ru tumalimpuun ilo mansangor, moonsoi poyo sonsongon talingo.
Ragu magasab nilo mampakaus ra guang ru ulun, am pansangaran nilo ondo' lumimbau mangkinibit ra mampapatoi.
Tagami' noyo rangan muno am gagaya' no riso. Kaa' amon pinabala' mu noyo ondo' inopot nano, inggaluri' io,
sabap ra okou nampalunsai ra pangkubayawan no koson ra ulun namuso ra pantula' nilo.
Koson ra sanginan susuit ondo' pinalabus muno kalo boo sumaguli' ra kalindu' muno, koson niayuk ra rirun natatakan ra sangulun rangan, am kalo boo sumaguli' io rirun.
Pai' pangilou riso, sabap ra maalur io noyo. Nasimbul io koson ra tambang ondo' nagiru' intor ra balatik nano.
Pilat mabangkos am pagasaban maapon. Kaa' kolondo' kalansanan ra tayar ru ulun ondo' nampabala' ra inopot.
Sangulun ondo' manguliorom ra mato no rirun maaru' mangatang ra kalaatan, am kolondo' sangulun pana makainga' riso.
Paat ra io mabaya' rirun, ragu-ragu nano maamis. Ngaangai' ragu muno omporon no. Kaa' ra talikuron muno ragu-ragu nano sala'; namakai io ra ragu muno koson mamparatu' rirun.
Kolondo' ondo' kasisangin ku poyo ra tana' ti intor ulun koson raginio am Tuhan niayuk masisang riso.
Sangulun ondo' namuong ra batu giu' rasawat, nomobol ra rasawat ru ulu nano galama'. Sangulun ondo' namilat, io galama' mapilatan.
Sangulun ondo' nangkali ra luang maratu' ralalom nano, am sangulun nampaatang ra balatik makasulung galama'.
Sangulun ondo' nambaal ra kalaatan malumpa' ru kalaatan nano galama', am kalo nakapandai io ati intor no.
Ulun ra minsawat guang masaga' magasab am mangiis, kaa' ukuman magawang risilo koson ra sanginan singa'.
Ulun ondo' masaga' magilong ra kaimbalaan ru ulun motopot makasulung ra balatik, am maimbolo' ra kalo poyo io matoi.
Kasangitan am suli' iono paliso malaat ondo' manguasa' ra ulun makatula.
Sangulun ondo' mansuli' balasin ru Tuhan. Untobon ru Tuhan tula nano.
Kaa' sangulun ondo' nangampun ra kasalaan ru ulun bokon ampunon amon makiasi' io.
Sangulun ondo' mansuli' ra ulun bokon kalo malansan ra pangampunan intor ra Tuhan.
Amon kalo masaga' io mangampun ra sangulun koson riso, pai' io pakiasi' maa' raginio tula-tula nano ampunon.
Amon sangulun ondo' kalo makalulu' nampauli ra suli', kalo pana malansan io ra tula nano ampunon.
Karaa' noyo ra rondo' paat ra okou matoi am inan muno mootong. Ginio ra langgai' noyo pantulaan am gagaya' no ra ngaangai' susuban.
Karaa' noyo susuban ru Tuhan am pai' no mansuli' ra gino ngai' ulun. Karaa' noyo nabantuan ri Aki Kapuuno' Ondo' Masawat Kaga' am maapon noyo kasalaan ru ulun.
Ulun ondo' minggalur ra pansangaran kalo masuang mambaal ra tula, sabap ra pansangaran simbulukin ru ulun ondo' malasu' guang.
Sangulun ondo' makatula mampajajou ra pangkubayawan; mampatabual io ra pantulaan ra gino ngai' ru ulun ondo' maayag ra mamimio.

Gumaai suang pampaang ra apui, gumaai lasu' simbula' ru apui nano. Gumaai kotog guang ru ulun, gumaai poros ru pansangaran nilo. Gumaai gayo kuasa' ru ulun, gumaai poros ru sangit nilo. Gumaai suang ru kalangkayaan nilo, gumaai makalalaa' likokot nilo.
Pansangaran ondo' sumimbuluk ra namulali' mangkinibit ra pampatayan.
Amon panjut sampuyon, apui nano manimbula'. Amon tiwagin, apui nano malasa'. Karuruo nano binaal ra kabang.

Sangulun ondo' masaga' manimbaal ra ragu mampagagai ra masuang ulun am ginio ra tumanggau ilo mongoi ra rondo' pagun am pagun ra bokon. Bandar-bandar ondo' maikang pinuso no am sasambaloi ru ulun-ulun makainggalan maayo linunsai no.
Sabap ra ragu sinimbaal, andu'-andu' ondo' makapaliso moonsoi inali am ampos ru kandoi nilo ginaau.
Ulun ondo' mangkirongog ra ragu sinimbaal kalo makatuum ra guang mamimio am guang luminos.
Linapos ra pitol lalapos mangkinibit ra babalis, kaa' ragu-ragu malaat makapandak ra bungul.
Masuang ulun maratu' sabap ra ilang, kaa' masuang poyo ulun naratu' sabap ra rila' nilo.

Pakaansuk noyo ulun ondo' nakapagiliu intor ra sangitan ru ulun manimbaal ra ragu, am pakaansuk niayuk ulun ondo' kalo mansaan ra saanin koson bagat ru basi' am kalo nabangkil kalayam nano ra rantai ru tambaga'.
Ragu-ragu malaat mangkinibit ra kapatayan ru ulun ra naimbolo', kaa' ra tayar nilo moonsoi poyo matoi intor ra maayag.
Ulun motopot kalo makuasa' ru ragu sinimbaal am kalo mosolob ru apui nano.

Ulun ondo' mangiruan ra Tuhan masauk inimbolo' ra ragu sinimbaal. Igondo' apui ru ragu sinimbaal sinikitan ra tatanga' risilo, apui no kalo boo maalap ra lasa'. Ragu sinimbaal no inataran risilo koson ra singa' ondo' mansaam am koson ra ampunguon ondo' maminsang-minsang.
Sala' ka kia tana' linonggom muno inanian mu ra insor am ruit muno pinauli ra intok ondo' kinaputan?
Koson niayuk ra musiti' ilalain mu ngaangai' rinagu muli. Guango' noyo moonong rinagu muli am kimuto' kabang muno.
Pagigilai' noyo maa' raginio pai' masuku' masala ragu muno am maratu' kou ra kalindu' ru ulun ondo' maginaa ra kaluagan raginio.
Musiti' kou mampaira' ra sambalayan muno paat ra ilo matutusan. Amon makautang kou, bayari' noyo utang no paat ra inaru' noyo.
Suguto' noyo binantu' muno ra guang gumagaya', am moonong bulintok okou makaalap ra atan ondo' gogoton muno.
Masuang ulun mangkara' ra ondo' iniraan koson ra kuliamos ondo' naalap nilo, saboi mantipagon ra ulun ondo' mangindangan risilo.

Mokoondo' ulun mindagu ra guang minggana' am mangalok ra kalindu' ru ulun bokon saboi makaira' ra rapu' nano. Kaa' amon makasuku' bulintok ru utang nano musiti' bayarin, rayus io mampainjul am mindagu ra bulintok nano kalo naulian, kapoam ra ragu-ragu ondo' kolondo' puun nano.

Amon ru ulun nampaira' no rumayus jumajal, maringkuanang noyo io amon mabaya' ra pagon no nakaalap ra sampiruo no saguli'. Amon ru kalo, ulun nampaira' no mampagaau ra ruit nano am ra kolondo' sasaban nampasauk riso ra pantula' nano. Sala' ka mangurumat io, kaa' magulas, mangiis am magasab ra ulun ondo' nampaira' riso no.
Ginio ra masuang ulun kalo masaga' mampaira', sala' ka sabap ra malaat, kaa' sabap ra malaa' gaawon ayuk lalayau.
Kabalu' pana raginio, oroto' noyo guang ra ulun musikin. Pai' polosoo' ilo maginaa ra taak indangan muno.
Nanusub Tuhan ritakau koson mangindangan ra ulun musikin; sabap ra ilo natutusan, pai' susubo' ilo mugar ra kolondo' atan-atan.
Moonsoi poyo ruit muno kalio sabap ra mangindangan ra pabukat kapoam rangan, intor ra kalio sabap ra nontogol ra ragana' ru batu.
Pakayo' noyo ra rapu' muno sumugut ra susuban ru Tuhan Ondo' Masawat Kaga'; baal raginio mokoonong poyo rirun ka mampauli ra kalangkayaan muno tayar ra inan muno galama'.
Taak indangan ra ulun musikin musiti' no masauk ra rapu' muno; ondo' baalon moonsoi muno mamayag rirun intor ra ngaangai' kapaganan.
Ralalom pansangaran ra pantula', ondo' baalon moonsoi muno maikang poyo intor ra perisai ondo' maikang am tutura' ondo' maagat.
Ulun ondo' moonsoi paliso manampilon ra utang ru sambalayan nano. Ulun ondo' kalo mapandai mauyu' kalo mambaal koson raginio.
Pai' liliani' binaal moonsoi ru sangulun ondo' nanampilon rirun, sabap okou noyo nangkinuo io ra painawo nano.
Sangulun ondo' makatula' manabulus ra rapu' ru ulun ondo' manampilon riso,
am sangulun ondo' kalo mapandai maringkuanang mampalilian ra ulun nangindangan riso.

Sabap ra manampilon ra ulun bokon, masuang ulun langkaya' nailusan ra rapu' am kakasiling ralalom kapaganan ondo' maayo. Ulun ondo' makainggalan ra maayo nailusan ra baloi am tumanggau kalalaat ra pagun-pagun ru bokon.
Ulun makatula' ondo' gumogot sumauk ra ulun manampilon ra utang koson mangilou ra kalabaan makalabit ralalom ukum ru undang-undang.
Indangano' noyo ulun ra bokon maya' ra kaandaran muno, kaa' pagigilai', pai' saboi ra okou galama' maratu' sabap raginio.
Gogoton kasaa' ralalom kaayagan iono timug, akanon, bayang, am baloi intok sindungan.
Moonsoi poyo maayag ra musikin giu' ra kalukub galama' intor ra mangakan ra akanon mangaamis giu' ra baloi ulun langkaya'.
Okou musiti' no majala' ra atan ondo' linonggom muno, masuang kapoam sanganu, am okou pana kalo boo asabin sabap ra magayan ayuk.
Naimbolo' noyo kaayagan ru sangulun ondo' sotopot no tumanggau intor ra baloi ka baloi, sabap koson ra sangulun tambului kalo iowon io mindagu.
Manguma' io ra tambului am nansulung ra inumon, kaa' kolondo' sangulun pana maringkuanang riso. Inambai ra pinaining io ra ragu-ragu ondo' mampakaruol ra guang koson ra,
“Okou ulun tumanggau, tomposo' mija' no! Amon mokoondo' kou ra atan pana, anii' aku ra akanon.
Okou ulun tumanggau, ugar no koson mangani' ra intok ra ulun urumaton. Matong pabukat kuno am makapakuan aku ra intok muno!”
Tayar ru ulun ondo' moonsoi paliso, maagat kaga' amon lulutaan sabap ra magayan ra baloi ru ulun am inasaban ru ulun mampaira'.
Sangulun ama' ondo' motogom ra anak nano masalok mampalamba' riso maa' raginio anak no masauk ra kinamanggo nano paat ra orou tauli.
Sangulun ondo' mangila' ra anak nano ra moonsoi mokoowot ra jala' intor raginio. Makapamanggo io ra anak nano ra gino ngai' ru ulun nauligan nano.
Sangulun ondo' mangila' ra anak nano ra moonsoi, kalo ayuk maayo guang ra saang ru rangan-rangan nano, kaa' niayuk nambaal ra pantula' nano sumolon.
Buoi ru bayag nano makaansuk io paat makakito ra anak nano. Paat ra matoi, kalo mangiluk io. Sotopot no, kalo matoi io, sabap ra nangiruan io sangulun anak ondo' sumalu toojo riso.
Nangiruan io ra sangulun ondo' mansuli' ru pantula'-pantula' nano am mambalos ra kinoonsoi ru rangan-rangan nano.
Kaa' sangulun ondo' mampalaya' ra anak nano mapilatan guang nano. Mangiluk guang nano ra moonong makaining ra tangi' ru anak nano.
Kuda ondo' kalo kinakaup sumauk ra bambalingatan. Koson niayuk ra baal no ra anak ondo' kalo inila' ra matanda'.
Sangulun ondo' mananggal ra anak nano am makimangkuli riso, pangkauson guang ra orou tauli am pangilukon no.
Ulun ondo' raino makakurit mabaya' ra anak nilo, mantangi' ilo ra orou tauli no am pupus no manguritot ripon sabap ra pansagulian.
Pai' anii' anak muno ra kalabusan paat ra io mamulok am pai' no mitambingai ra kalo makakito ra kasalaan nano.
Pakukuo' noyo am loposo' noyo io paat ra lalaing maa' raginio mangurumat io ra kuasa' muno. Amon kalo, sumauk io ra sangulun mokotog ulu, kalo gumagaya' rirun, am mampangiluk rirun.
Ginio ra ilaa' noyo anak muno maa' raginio moonsoi paliso. Pirot no koson mangila' riso maa' raginio okou kalo boo maruol guang sabap ra mampakauyu' io rirun.
Moonsoi poyo musikin kaa' maligag am maikang, intor ra langkaya' kaa' masalok marualan.
Inan ra maligag am maikang mologo poyo intor ra mas am kalangkayaan maayo.
Kolondo' kalangkayaan ondo' makasail intor ra kaligagan ru inan, am kolondo' katasuan ondo' makasail intor ra kaansukan ru guang.
Moonsoi poyo matoi am tumangus mantilayun intor ra maayag maimbolo' sabap ra masalok marualan.
Mampasulung ra akanon maamis ra ulun ondo' marualan nogondo' niayuk koson mampabanta' ra akanon rasawat ru kalabangan.
Kolondo' onong no koson mampasulung akanon ra sinungkalalaing, sabap ra sinungkalalaing no kalo mangakan kapoam mongolok ra owou nano. Koson niayuk baal ru sangulun ondo' inimbolo' ru Tuhan;
magilong io ra akanon nano am mampalaa koson ra ulun ondo' kinambiri' gumanggol ra sangulun ralaa.
Guang ra maansukan mampagawar ra umur ru ulun am maayag ra maansukan.
Simoyoo' noyo guang muno am pakaansuk no. Patiri' noyo kangilukan muno ra maalur, sabap ra kangilukan kalo igondo' mauli', am poyo namuso ra masuang ulun.
Kaimamangan mambaal ra ulun mataki' matutuo; guang sumolon am kasangitan mampariwa' ra umur.
Ulun ondo' maansukan am moonsoi guang masuung mangakan.
Ulun ondo' masalok magalabo ra kalangkayaan kalo mokororot am tumukal.
Sangulun ondo' magalabo ra rapu' nano
Ulun langkaya' gumogot toojo mangandoi koson mamparuang ra rapu'. Paat ra ilo tumangus, sumia' ilo ra kalangkayaan.
Ulun musikin gumogot toojo mangandoi kaa' ra rapu' nilo maganggal. Paat ra ilo tumangus, musikin ilo.
Ulun ondo' motogom ra ruit kalo nakalabus intor ra tula, am ulun ondo' mangilou ra rapu' makalayau.
Masuang ulun naratu' sabap ra mas, am pinuso no ilo.
Ruit iono balatik ru ulun ondo' mongongompor riso, am moonong ulun ondo' sasambungon no maratu' ralalom nano.
Pakaansuk no ulun langkaya' ondo' napandayan kolondo' sala mangilou ra ruit.
Tuluo' noyo ra ulun koson raginio, am sabiton takau ra io makaansuk, sabap ra nambaal io ra kaimuagan ra tatanga' ru bansa' nano.
Ulun ondo' tumaan ra pangkinaman makapamanggo. Osoi kia nua' ondo' makaalap ra kaluagan koson makatula kapoam mambaal ra malaat kaa' kalo mamakai ra kaluagan raginio?
Ulun no maayag makakaansayan am binaal moonsoi nano omporon ru ulun.
Amon manturung kou ra mija' ondo' napanu' ra akanon, pai' koroot am pai' indagu, “Taa, masuang kaga'!”
Karaa' noyo ra kalo moonsoi gumogot kou ra ngaangai' ondo' nakito muno. Intor ra ngaangai' binaal, kolondo' moroot poyo intor ra mato. Ginio noyo sabap ra mato mampatilis ra lomou ra moonong bulos.
Pai' alapo' atan ayuk ondo' makito muno am pai' alapo' atan ondo' masaga' alapon ru ulun bokon.
Urumato' noyo ulun ondo' mabaya' rirun mangakan, am koonsoyo' pamakuan muno risilo koson okou galama' moogot ra moonsoi pamakuan.
Atan ayuk ondo' pasulungon rirun, akano' noyo mabaya' ra moonsoi paliso koson ra ulun. Pai' tolojoko' akan no, maagu no kasisangin kou ru ulun.
Ulun ondo' makapandai ra kaulayan, lumonggo' pagulu ra mangakan. Ulun ondo' tolojokon akan no makasisisang.
Amon mangakan mabaya' ra masuang ulun, pai' pagulu tumalimpuun.
Akanon ra sanganu sama' noyo ra ulun ondo' makapandai ra kaulayan. Kalo mapisok ilo maminawo ra intok pambalangan.

Mangakan ra masuang kaga' mangkinibit ra maninggool, marualan ra tinai', am mapagon mombolong. Ulun ondo' mangakan ra maggangal ayuk mokororot ra bolong am tumirong mabaya' ra guang moonsoi paat ra susuab ti.
Amon ru jumajal kou mangakan ra masuang kaga', ongoi no pampalua', am malimanan muno ra moonsoi.
Okou anak kuno, iningo' noyo ragu kuno am baalo' noyo, am pupus nano maringkuanang kou raginio. Ololoon mu inan muno
Ulun ru baloi ondo' mataau guang omporon ru ulun, am ompor no maintopot.
Kaa' ulun ru baloi ondo' makalit lutaan ru ulun giu' ra bandar, am motopot noyo luta' raginio.
Kaa' ulun ru baloi ondo' makalit lutaan ru ulun giu' ra bandar, am motopot noyo luta' raginio.
Kotog ru basi' kinamin ralalom ru apui. Koson niayuk ra guang ru sangulun ondo' malimbau kinamin bulintok ulun magansang paat ra magauk.
Wain mangani' ra kalansanan, amon inumon ra ololoon. Ati kulaan kaayagan ti amon kolondo' wain? Wain binaal koson mapabansuk ra guang ru ulun.
Amon ru inumon ra bulintok motopot am sasamaan, wain mampaligag am mapabansuk ra ulun.
Kaa' amon inumon ra majanjayan, wain mambaal ra ulun pansagulian guang, sumangit-sangit, am masaga' gumabu'.
Amon ru ulun sasambungon magauk, sumangit-sangit ilo am mampalubat ayuk ra inan galama'. Kaikangan nilo tumutus am ilo maluoi pilatin ru ulun.
Pai' sayawo' rangan muno ondo' manginum ra wain mabaya' rirun. Pai' pagasab riso paat ra io maansukan. Paat raginio sala' ka bulintok nano koson mansawai ra ulun kapoam mansika' ra rondo'.
Amon okou pinasauk ra tingganai ru bunsag, pai' pakikiilong koson ra ulun maatang. Tiluo' noyo koson ra ulun bokon am pagayam no ra tambului-tambului ra kalo poyo okou galama' manturung.
Mopongo mambaal ra ngaangai' kandoi muno, bagu no okou makapanturung am makakaluagan mabaya' ra ulun bokon. Okou pana urumaton sabap ra pinaugar mu noyo kandoi ra matanda'.
Amon matutuo kou noyo, makaindagu kou, sabap ra baal raginio okou ra kuasa'. Kaa' musiti' kou mindagu koson ra ulun ondo' makakapandayan am pai' jojowo' miujik.
Pai' indagu tatanga' ru maririmbai no; bulintok raginio kalo motopot koson mampakito ra kapintaran muno.
Koson ra batu ru dalima' ralalom ru bingkai ru mas, koson niayuk ra miujik paat ra bunsag ru wain.
Miujik ondo' painingon mabaya' ra wain matamis koson ra batu jamrud ralalom ru bingkai mas.
Amon lakat kou poyo mamulok, indagu no ru maatang ayuk, pai' masailan intor ra induo, am amon kuatin ayuk.
Raguon muno musiti' mariwa' am motopot. Sauk no ra ulun ondo' makapandai ra masuang kaa' mongkoror ayuk.
Giu' ra saang ru ulun nauligan toojo, pai' salu koson ra okou ti nogondo' risilo, am pai' tutului pakimansunur amon ru ulun bokon tatanga' mindagu.
Koson ra ganit magulu intor ra tingkalur, koson niayuk ra inggalan moonsoi magulu ra ulun ondo' minggana' guang.
Iruani' noyo bunsag ra bulintok no masuku' am pai' noyo tumauli muli'. Pai' pagiginaa giu' ra kulobon, kaa' ugar no ra mataki'.
Giu' ra baloi muno mangkukuli kou am mambaal ra atan ayuk kasagaan ru guang muno, kaa' pai' pakatula sabap ra mansusunur.
Suai raginio paringkuanang noyo Riso Nambaal muno ondo' nampalaba rirun ra taak-taak ondo' moonsoi.
Ulun ondo' malaa' ra Tuhan gumagaya' ra sawai Nano. Barakaton ru Tuhan ulun ondo' tumirong ra susuab ti koson makiasi' Riso.
Osoi ondo' mimumui ra Ukum makarati' kaga' ra Ukum no. Kaa' ulun ondo' kalo totopot maratu' sabap ru ginio.
Ulun ondo' malaa' ra Tuhan makapandai ra atan ondo' motopot, am ilo mauligan toojo sabap ra baal ondo' moonsoi.
Ulun ondo' makatula kalo masaga' mangapu ra sawai, am mambala' ra arati' ru Ukum maya' ra kasagaan galama'.
Ulun ondo' mapintar mampaguang ra moonong pamaguangan, ali ka ulun ondo' malimbau toojo
Karaa' ra kalo poyo mimbuor kou, am okou kalo pana pansagulian guang muno ra binaal muno.
Pai' kiralano' ralan ondo' makalalaa' maa' raginio kalo makasaru kou ra batu-batu nano.
Pai' masailan kalansanan giu' ra ralan ondo' kalo poyo nauligan muno.
Pagigilai' noyo ra masalok ralan-ralan ondo' kiralanon muno.
Ilalain noyo
Ulun ondo' gumagaya' ra ukum mambaal ra susuban ru Tuhan, am ulun ondo' mangintopot ra Tuhan kalo malubatan.
Sangulun ondo' malaa' ra Tuhan kalo matiu' ru karaat; kaa' masalok io bayagon ru Tuhan ralalom ru pangkinaman.
Ulun ondo' mapintar kalo masisang ra Ukum, kaa' ulun ondo' kalo mabanis guang malinggan-linggan koson ra parau ralalom ru bagiu'.
Sangulun ondo' mapintar, mangintopot ra Ukum koson mangintopot io ra inala' matulai.
Tuyuo' noyo ragu-ragu muno, am rongogon kou ru ulun. Kalo poyo tumaam, luluro' noyo atan ondo' napandayan muno.
Karaan ru ulun sasambungon koson ra luda' ru kurita' ondo' marayus lumimbokou.
Rangan ondo' masaga' manginguli' koson ra kuda ondo' makimampaa'; kuda no rumayus magipaturau kabalu' pana sakayin ru osoi ayuk.
Kua kia rondo' orou matulai poyo intor ra orou-orou ra bokon, kabalu' pana sabuoi ru bilor no moonong orou masinda ru nogondo' mato ru orou?
Tuhan Ondo' Makapandai Kaga' nampasuai ra orou-orou i, saboi mokoondo' ra orou ru bunsag am paat ra luntukon rondo'.
Kukula' ngoorou inaru' Nano koson ra orou pangiantakan ondo' matulai, ali ka orou-orou ru bokon pinasauk No ra orou kaindalaman.
Koson ri Adam, moonong ulun sinauk intor ra tana'.
Kaa' Tuhan, ralalom kapintaran Nano nampasauk risilo ra mansasala', am sigagama' inanian ra ralan ondo' mansasala'.
Mokoondo' binarakat am pinainsawat ru Tuhan, mokoondo' niayuk ondo' pinatulai am pinainggaar Riso. Kaa' mokoondo' niayuk ondo' inulas am pinainggana' am pinagiru' intor ra intok nano.

Koson ra tana' labu' giu' ra kalindu' ru ulun manukang ra pagangan ondo' inayur maya' ra kasagaan nano, koson niayuk ra ulun giu' ra kalindu' ru Io Nambaal ondo' pinamakuan risilo maya' ra kasagaan Nano.
Ondo' moonsoi no gumula' ra ondo' malaat, am kaayagan gumula' ra kapatayan. Koson niayuk ra ulun ondo' makatula gumula' ra ulun ondo' gumagaya' ra Tuhan.
Ilai' no ngaangai' kandoi ru Tuhan Ondo' Masawat Kaga'; ngaangai' no binaal mantutuop, rondo' no gumula' ra bokon no.
Aku galama' minatong pupus koson mantamung, koson ra ulun ondo' manganam ra atan ondo' pinatatang ru ulun nangupu' ra kawa' ru anggur.
Mabaya' ra barakat ru Tuhan makaampos aku ra moonsoi koson ra sangulun nangupu' ra kawa' ru anggur ondo' nakapanuang ra intok pamagaan ra kawa' ru anggur nano.
Kaa' pakapandai noyo ra kalo mambaal aku ra ngaangai' no ra tayar ru inan kuno galama', kaa' ra tayar ru ngaangai' ulun ondo' gumogot migila'.
Rongogo' noyo am ilai' noyo ragu-ragu kuno, akau ngai' tingganai ru bansa' am tingganai ru ulun!

Sabuoi ru bayag muno, pai' polosoo' inan muno kuasaan ru ulun ra bokon, ru anak muno, andu' muno, pabukat muno kapoam rangan muno. Pai' taaki' rapu' muno ra ulun bokon, maagu no pansagulian guang muno am musiti' kitaakon saguli'.
Buoi ru painawo soroi ra inan, pai' taaki' intok muno ra osoi pana.
Moonsoi poyo malansan anak-anak muno rirun intor ra malimpatui.
Musiti' kou mantamung ra ngaangai' ondo' binaal muno, am pai' polosoo' inggalan muno jamalin.
Taaki' noyo tinungkus muno paat ayuk ra pupus ru kaayagan muno, amon mamaar noyo bulintok ru pamukatan muno.
Sanginan kaladai musiti' aniin ra sakot am saanin am niayuk lambaan ra susukur. Sangulun mangandoi musiti' aniin ra akanon am kandoi am niayuk ilaan ra matanda'.
Susubo' noyo mangangandoi muno mangandoi, am makatangus kou. Amon polosoon milampuag, maguyum io ra kalabusan.
Sanginan tambiag maalap kaupon ra kuk am kakang; sangulun mangangandoi ondo' malaat musiti' tagion am ukumin.
Susubo' noyo io mangandoi am pai' polosoo' io milampuag, sabap ra kalampuagan magibit ra ulun no malaat.
Ginio ra susubo' noyo mangngandoi muno mangandoi ra sotopot no, am amon kalo gumagaya' io, rantayo' io.
Kaa' pai' najanjayan malasang ra osoi pana am pai' baalo' atan-atan ondo' kalo matimpok.
Amon mokoondo' kou ra sangulun mangngandoi, pamakuan riso no koson ra okou galama' moogot moonsoi pamakuan, sabap ra binali mu noyo io pinaaya' ra ampos ru pirot muno.
Pamakuan riso koson ra pabukat muno, sabap kalo maayag kou ru kolondo' io.
Amon pamakuan muno riso malaat am nagiru' io, ati kia' paguyuman muno riso?
Ulun ondo' mangintopot ra inupi koson ra ulun ondo' mamparakop ra babara' kapoam mangilou ra angin.
Ondo' inilayan ralalom ru inupi koson ayuk ra tampulau ru bulos ralalom ru saramin.
Ondo' majamol kalo manangampos ra mapasau, koson niayuk ra inupi kalo manangampos ondo' motopot.
Inupi, nujum, am mangilong no inupi ayuk, koson ondo' makito ru sangulun ruandu' ondo' marualan ra maganak.
Pai' pagilong ra inupi, ondo' ak am ondo' minatong intor ra Tuhan.
Inupi mampakalayau ra masuang ulun; ondo' mangintopot raginio makasunsuyar.
Ukum maukapan ra kolondo' inupi ondo' mampakalayau, am kapintaran matanda' noyo amon rinagu ru ulun ondo' maintopot.
Sangulun ondo' masuang tinanggawan, masuang niayuk napandayan nano. Sangulun ondo' masuang nailian nano mindagu mabaya' ra napanu' pangaratian.
Sangulun ondo' kalo kukula' nailian nano sanganu ayuk napandayan nano. Kaa' mabaya' ra inugaran, ulun no nanimung ra kapandayan.
Ralalom inugaran-inugaran kuno, masuang noyo nakito kuno am nailian kuno, masuang poyo intor ra raguon kutu.
Masalok aku ralalom laa' ru kapatayan, kaa' binayag aku mabaya' ra nailian-nailian no.
Ulun ondo' malaa' ra Tuhan magulayun maayag, sabap ra malansan ilo Riso ondo' mampakaayag.
Ulun ondo' malaa' ra Tuhan kalo igondo' kalaa' am magalabo, sabap ra Tuhan iono lansanin nilo.
Pakaansuk noyo ulun ondo' malaa' ra Tuhan, sabap ra nakapandai ilo ra osoi lansanin.

Magilong Tuhan ra ulun ondo' motogom Riso; masauk Io ra sindungan ondo' maikang am sandigan ondo' mapiot ra tayar nilo. Manindung Io risilo intor ra angin malasu' am orou mapangit, am niayuk mangindangan am magalung risilo maa' raginio kalo makasaru am maratu'.
Nambaal Io ra guang nilo maansukan am mato nilo suminda. Mambarakat Io ra kaayagan nilo am mangani' risilo ra kaligagan.
Ulun ondo' mampataak ra rorondo' ondo' noowot pinabaya' ra lapau, nambaal ra baal ondo' masiwou. Taak simbalui intor ra ulun malaat kalo apuon.
Io Ondo' Masawat Kaga' kalo masaga' ra taak simbalui ondo' pinataak ru ulun malaat, am taak simbalui ondo' masuang kalo manangampos ra pangampunan.
Ulun ondo' mangalap ra longgom ru ulun musikin am pataakon no koson ra taak simbalui, nogondo' ra ulun ondo' mamatoi ra sangulun anak ra saang mato ru ama' nano.
Tayar ru ulun musikin, akanon iono mamparayus ra kaayagan. Ginio ra mangalap ra akanon intor risilo nogondo' ayuk koson mampatoi risilo.
Paat ra gumaau ra rapu' ru ulun bokon kapoam manginga' ra ayup ru sangulun ulipon, baal raginio nogondo' ayuk koson mampatoi riso.
Amon ru rondo' ti manirong am ondo' bokon no mamunsai, atan nua' ampos nano suai ra bagui?
Amon ru rondo' no mambarakat am bokon no magulas, osoi nua' rongogon ru Tuhan?
Amon ru sangulun mangimpasau ra inan galama' kalupus nakakambong ra baangkai, kaa' kumambong poyo, atan onong nano mangimpasau ra inan?
Paat sangulun mampali sabap ra tula-tula nano, kaa' minongoi pambaal ra tula ondo' nogondo', atan onong nano minggana' guang mabaya' ra mampali? Osoi nua' ondo' mangkirongog ra pakiasian nano?

Gumagaya' ra Ukum nogondo' logo nano koson mampataak ra taak simbalui ondo' masuang, am gumagaya' ra susuban ru Tuhan nogondo' ayuk logo nano ondo' mampataak ra taak simbalui koson makibarakat ra Tuhan.
Paat mambalos ra kinoonsoi, nogondo' noyo magibit ra taak simbalui koson paringkuanangan ra Tuhan,
Ulun ondo' minggalur ra tula mapabansuk ra guang ru Tuhan, am ulun ondo' mangimpai ra kalaatan ampunon tula nilo.
Kaa' pai' no ongoi ra Baloi ru Tuhan ra kolondo' ibiton, sabap ra ukum manusub ra musiti' takau magibit ra taak.
Amon ulun mabanis guang mampataak ra taak simbalui, lomok intor ra taak simbalui nilo mingkual ra rasawat ru altar am maamis owou nano magaloi mongoi saang ru Io Ondo' Masawat Kaga'.
Tuhan masaga' ra taak simbalui intor ra ulun mabanis guang am kalo lilianin no.
Omporo' noyo Tuhan ra taau ru guang, am pai' pagingkalit bulintok mampataak ra tayar kasaa' ampos ru tana' muno.
Ibito' noyo moonong taak muno mabaya' ra bulos ondo' maansukan am taaki' noyo taak simbalui sampiopor muno mabaya' ra guang maansukan.
Anii' noyo Io Ondo' Masawat Kaga' ra taak ondo' nogondo' ra taak Nano rirun; taaki' no taak mabaya' ra taau ru guang am mabaya' ra kaandaran muno.
Pambaal no koson raginio sabap ra Tuhan noyo ondo' mangani' ra pangayupan; mambalos Io rirun saboi ra intulu' ruli'.
Pai' kinami' mampasuu' ra Tuhan, sabap ra kalo apuon no. Pai' niayuk malansan ra taak ondo' kalo mapasau,
sabap ra Tuhan no akim, am io kalo pilion osoi saungon.
Io kalo pilion osoi saungon ralalom baal ru ulun musikin, kaa' rumongog ra pakiasian ru ulun ondo' kalo matimpok pinamakuan.
Kalo mangimpai Io ra pakiasian ru lalaing nailusan ra matuo kapoam ruandu' napuor ondo' nampabala' ra suang ru guang.
Lomou ru mato tumulisan ra pingas ru sangulun napuor ondo' giminolok sumonsol ra ulun ondo' nampatangi' riso.
Tuhan mansayan ra ulun ondo' mangandoi Riso am pakiasian nilo makasuku' ra limbowon.
Pakiasian ru ulun musikin makaantos ra gaun, am ilo kalo makaansuk amon ru kalo poyo nakasuku' pakiasian nilo ra Tuhan.
Kalo lumonggo' ilo saboi Io Ondo' Masawat Kaga' magilong risilo am paugaron katimpakan am niayuk sumaung ra ondo' motopot.
Mataki' Tuhan tumimbalos; kalo tumaan guang Nano ra ulun malaat.
Ukumin No bansa'-bansa' am pusoon no ulun ondo' kalo nakaulig ra guang makaasi'.
Sampulalai ulun ondo' minsawat guang kinala, am kuasa' ru ulun malaat pinagaba' no.
Moonong ulun balasin nogondo' ayuk ra binaal am inatangan nano.
Manaung Tuhan ra ulun Nano, am makaansuk ilo sabap ra guang makaasi' Nano.
Motopot noyo rinatangan ru guang makaasi' ru Tuhan ra tatanga' ru kapaganan, koson ra rasam ondo' rumatu' bulintok tampio.
